Bastilla.nm12aabast01021_.mp3: The Wookiees of Kashyyyk make their home high among the wroshyr branches; only their bravest warriors dare to descend into the forbidding depths of the forest.
Bastilla.nm12aabast01022_.mp3: If the Star Map is located far beneath us on the planet's surface, as our vision seems to suggest, it is unlikely the Wookiees even know of its existence.
Bastilla.nm12aabast01024_.mp3: Tatooine is known for little but blowing sand. I find it surprising that there would be a Star Map somewhere in its desolate wastes.
Bastilla.nm12aabast01026_.mp3: The Star Map would likely have to be within some kind of shelter to protect it against dust and sandstorms.
Bastilla.nm12aabast01027_.mp3: I suspect there are many such caves and caverns hidden in the sands of the Dune Sea. The creatures of this world probably use them as their lairs.
Bastilla.nm12aabast01029_.mp3: Perhaps, though that would have been tens of thousands of years in the past. Now there is nothing but the howling emptiness of the Dune Sea.
Bastilla.nm12aabast01030_.mp3: It is strange that anyone would have built a Star Map here; the entire surface of Manaan is covered by nothing but vast oceans.
Bastilla.nm12aabast01032_.mp3: The ocean floor is vast and much of it is uncharted, even by the native Selkath. But how could Revan and Malak have found their way down?
Bastilla.nm12aabast01034_.mp3: It is possible. The melting of polar caps or a cataclysmic earthquake could have buried the land beneath the waves eons ago. Records from that time are incomplete.
Bastilla.nm12aabast01035_.mp3: Another vision. The Force is guiding us, helping us retrace the steps of Malak and his old Master. Leading us ever closer to the Star Forge.
Bastilla.nm12aabast01036_.mp3: You felt it, yes? Another vision? The Force continues to work through us; showing us the Star Maps unearthed by Revan and Malak.
Bastilla.nm12aabast01059_.mp3: Hmmm... maybe you're right. Most of the dark Jedi would only know me by name, but there are a few among them who might recognize my face.
Bastilla.nm12aabast01060_.mp3: For the safety of our mission I must remain on the Ebon Hawk while we are on this planet.
Bastilla.nm12aabast06895_.mp3: We can't risk having any of the dark Jedi Masters recognize me. For the sake of the mission I must remain hidden in the Ebon Hawk while we are on this world.
Bastilla.nm12aac06001000_.mp3: The Republic Fleet must have got the message Carth sent as we were crashing onto that planet. Maybe we can use their arrival to our advantage.
Bastilla.nm12aac06001001_.mp3: If Malak is distracted by the attack, we should be able to get in close enough to dock on the Star Forge and hunt the Dark Lord down!
Bastilla.nm12aac06001003_.mp3: Admiral Dodonna, this is Bastila Shan of the Jedi Order.  We are receiving your transmission.
Bastilla.nm12aac06001005_.mp3: The Jedi sent to rescue me from the Dark Lord did their job well - though I am sorry to report Carth did not survive the mission.
Bastilla.nm12aac06001009_.mp3: Don't pull back, Admiral.  You have to attack the Star Forge now, otherwise the Sith will use its power to destroy the Republic.
Bastilla.nm12aac06001020_.mp3: The fools!  Even Master Vandar did not realize you have reclaimed your identity as the Dark Lord! ## The Jedi strike team and the Republic forces will provide the perfect distraction as we hunt down your ex-apprentice.  And once we have slain Malak, I can use my Battle Meditation ## and the power of the Star Forge to crush the Republic fleet.
Bastilla.nm12aac06001021_.mp3: All our enemies will be destroyed in a single glorious day!
Bastilla.nm12aacuts01000_.mp3: Plot a course for Dantooine! There's a Jedi enclave there where we can find refuge!
Bastilla.nm12aacuts01002_.mp3: Quickly, to the gun turrets! You have to hold the Sith fighters off until we get those hyperspace coordinates punched in.
Bastilla.nm13aaahla03014_.mp3: This task has its own importance. It may also serve to divert our minds for a short time... something which carries its own rewards.
Bastilla.nm13aabast01000_.mp3: Dantooine looks peaceful enough, but packs of kath hounds roam these plains. We would be wise to keep our guard up while we are out here.
Bastilla.nm13aabast01002_.mp3: Look at all these crystals - so beautiful, and so powerful. Each crystal gives off a different energy stream, so choose wisely when selecting the one for your lightsaber.
Bastilla.nm13aabast01004_.mp3: Ahlan Matale has a reputation for being very temperamental. You must be the model of diplomacy when you speak to him.
Bastilla.nm13aabast01009_.mp3: This is the entrance we saw in our dream. The Force has shown us how to open these doors through our visions.
Bastilla.nm13aabast01011_.mp3: Nothing seems to be happening. If we focus our minds together, we may be able to call on the Force and witness the vision of Malak and Revan once more.
Bastilla.nm13aabast01013_.mp3: Open yourself to the power. Let the Force flow through you.
Bastilla.nm13aabast01016_.mp3: As you wish - though a Jedi must not be afraid to turn to the Force when in need of guidance.
Bastilla.nm13aabast01018_.mp3: We have done as the vision directed. When we pass through this door we will learn the secret uncovered by Malak and Revan.
Bastilla.nm13aabast01020_.mp3: I have spoken briefly with the Council; they request an audience with you. We should go at once.
Bastilla.nm13aabast01024_.mp3: I'm sorry, Carth, but I cannot tell you. All I ask is that you trust in the Force and the wisdom of the Council.
Bastilla.nm13aabast01028_.mp3: Come, they are expecting us. I will lead you to the Council chambers.
Bastilla.nm13aabast01030_.mp3: The vision again! Did you see it? You must have. Revan and Malak were here before us - I feel their dark presence. They must have come and found... this.
Bastilla.nm13aabast01032_.mp3: It's a map of hyperspace coordinates. Some sort of star chart. But what is this Sith Star Forge they mentioned? And why did they lust to uncover its secrets?
Bastilla.nm13aabast01034_.mp3: Maybe... that might explain how the Sith were able to amass a fleet so quickly...
Bastilla.nm13aabast01036_.mp3: Whatever this Star Forge is, it was important enough for Revan and Malak to betray the Jedi. This Star Forge must be the seat of their power. If it could be destroyed...
Bastilla.nm13aabast01038_.mp3: The hyperspace coordinates on this map might lead us to the Star Forge, if they were complete. But there are pieces missing.
Bastilla.nm13aabast01041_.mp3: I recognize one of the planets on the map: Korriban - a Sith world. And if that's Korriban, then this must be Kashyyyk... and Tatooine... and here's Manaan...
Bastilla.nm13aabast01043_.mp3: Now I think I understand. This map was only the starting point for Revan's dark journey into the ways of the Sith.
Bastilla.nm13aabast01045_.mp3: Tatooine, Kashyyyk, Manaan, Korriban: Revan visited each of these worlds searching for clues to reveal the hidden location of the Star Forge.
Bastilla.nm13aabast01047_.mp3: Before we do anything we must inform the council of what we have discovered. They will decide our next course of action, though I suspect our task has only just begun.
Bastilla.nm13aabast01052_.mp3: Such thoughts speak of the dark side! We serve the Republic and the Jedi Council. It must be their decision as to what course of action to take.
Bastilla.nm13aabast01057_.mp3: The Council has finished its deliberations and are waiting. We should see them now.
Bastilla.nm13aabast01059_.mp3: The Council must be told about what we have discovered! Meet me in the Council chambers.
Bastilla.nm13aabast04000_.mp3: If you have questions, you should direct them towards the Jedi Council members.
Bastilla.nm13aacrat07091_.mp3: The crystals are sacred! No self-respecting Jedi would ever do such a thing!
Bastilla.nm13aaelis08026_.mp3: I think we understand. Love can do strange things to anyone.
Bastilla.nm13aaelis08039_.mp3: Well, if his ego is similarly halved he should be just about right.
Bastilla.nm13aajuha11029_.mp3: This has been a painful lesson, Juhani, but it seems you have learned it well. I am certain you will be a credit to the Order.
Bastilla.nm13aashen16006_.mp3: Good luck to you both. May you find the happiness you deserve.
Bastilla.nm13aavand17306_.mp3: What are you talking about? The Council must be told of what we found there!
Bastilla.nm13aavand17307_.mp3: We found an incomplete Star Map, Master Vandar. And an ancient droid that mentioned something about a Star Forge.
Bastilla.nm13aavand17308_.mp3: *whisper* It is obvious Master Vandar senses something is not right with your story. Yet he chooses to believe you, and I will not question the wisdom of a Jedi Master.
Bastilla.nm13aazhar19011_.mp3: Proof? Surely the entire Council can feel the strength of the Force within this man... and I have already related to you the events that took place on Taris...
Bastilla.nm13aazhar19023_.mp3: As you wish, Master Vandar. We shall return to the Ebon Hawk and leave you to your deliberations.
Bastilla.nm13aazhar19026_.mp3: Proof? Surely the entire Council can feel the strength of the Force within this woman... and I have already related to you the events that took place on Taris...
Bastilla.nm13aazhar19028_.mp3: This is no trap. The Council just wants to talk to you. There is much that needs to be discussed.
Bastilla.nm14aaelis04039_.mp3: There is no need for you to make fun of her. She is obviously desperate.
Bastilla.nm14aajon006030_.mp3: Perhaps we should look into this matter. I was unaware of any Mandalorian activity here, myself.
Bastilla.nm14aanemo07011_.mp3: Greetings, Master Nemo. It is good to see you again.
Bastilla.nm14abahla01032_.mp3: I'm impressed, Carth. That interjection was very Jedi-like.
Bastilla.nm14abahla01038_.mp3: Two thousand? Even if he would pay such a fee, what could you possibly need so many credits for?
Bastilla.nm14abahla01047_.mp3: I'm afraid Ahlan is not just making idle threats. He is rash and foolish enough to attempt a full assault on the Sandral estate. Such action would result in all-out war between the families.
Bastilla.nm14abmdro03022_.mp3: I am sure the Council will realize these accusations are completely unfounded. The Matale grievance will fall on deaf ears.
Bastilla.nm14acbolo01022_.mp3: Don't be absurd. Can't you be serious?
Bastilla.nm14acbolo01345_.mp3: Well done. I am impressed... I'm not sure I could have done as well.
Bastilla.nm14acbolo01361_.mp3: We should provide what help we can. Surely it is not that difficult to ascertain the truth.
Bastilla.nm14adcuts02361_.mp3: Are you mad? They will slaughter each other!
Bastilla.nm15aaanci01004_.mp3: I think the droid is trying to communicate with us by cycling through a variety of languages. Each time it spoke it was using a very different alien dialect.
Bastilla.nm15aaanci01005_.mp3: The droid can probably understand us. The only problem is it may not have been programmed with the phonemes of a language we can understand.
Bastilla.nm15aaanci01008_.mp3: I recognize this language as well. It is an archaic variant of the Selkath dialect spoken on Manaan. But why would a droid on Dantooine be programmed to speak ancient Selkath?
Bastilla.nm15aaanci01011_.mp3: It must be referring to Revan. The Dark Lord and Malak likely encountered this droid when they explored these ruins.
Bastilla.nm15aaanci01017_.mp3: Ten revolutions would take more than 20,000 years. If this is true then this droid is nearly 5,000 years older than the Republic itself! There must be some mistake.
Bastilla.nm15aaanci01023_.mp3: The droid must be talking about poor Nemo. The Council sent him here to investigate... and it cost him his life.
Bastilla.nm15aaanci01029_.mp3: Revan and Malak unlocked the sealed door and uncovered the secrets of the Star Forge. Now Malak is using the Star Forge to fuel his conquest of the Republic.
Bastilla.nm15aaanci01030_.mp3: We have to find out what they uncovered. We have to find a way to unseal these doors to learn more about the Star Forge! The Republic is depending on us.
Bastilla.nm15aaanci01036_.mp3: These Builders must have been an extinct people, though it is strange there is no record of their existence. Even the archives at the Jedi Academy make no mention of them.
Bastilla.nm15aaanci01037_.mp3: In the years before the Republic the Hutts were a dominant force in the galaxy, but they never constructed an empire. In fact, I know of no species that would fit with this information.
Bastilla.nm15aaanci01050_.mp3: The droid is obviously not programmed with the knowledge we seek. The Star Forge sounds like some type of weapon, perhaps... though, in fact, it could be anything
Bastilla.nm15aaanci01052_.mp3: Maybe... that might explain how the Sith were able to amass a fleet so quickly. But I suspect the Star Forge is more powerful than a mere factory.
Bastilla.nm15aaanci01053_.mp3: Maybe the droid has more information we can use. It seems to respond to you; perhaps you should ask it something else.
Bastilla.nm15aaanci01055_.mp3: Our vision was clear. We saw Revan and Malak speaking of the Star Forge. I am certain it is somehow connected to the Sith's sudden rise to power.
Bastilla.nm15aabast02000_.mp3: If the droid is correct, then we must complete the tasks in the proving grounds to the east and west before these doors will open.
Bastilla.nm15aabast02001_.mp3: This... this must be what Revan and Malak found when they entered this temple. This must be where their journey down the dark side began.
Bastilla.nm15aabast02003_.mp3: This is a... a map. Some sort of intergalactic navigational chart. Revan and Malak must have used this to lead them to the Star Forge.
Bastilla.nm15aabast02004_.mp3: We could use this map to follow their path and find the Star Forge ourselves. But we must be wary... they may have laid traps or concealed what they found.
Bastilla.nm15aabast02007_.mp3: I... I don't know, but Revan and Malak were very interested in finding it. It must be a tool of some type... or maybe a weapon. Perhaps the Council can tell us more.
Bastilla.nm15aabast02008_.mp3: But I think this map might be the key to finding the Star Forge, whatever it is.
Bastilla.nm15aabast02009_.mp3: See this world here? This looks like Korriban, a Sith world. And if that's Korriban, then this is... Kashyyyk... and Tatooine... and here's Manaan.
Bastilla.nm15aabast02010_.mp3: But there are pieces missing: incomplete hyperspace coordinates, corrupted data... and there doesn't seem to be anything indicating where the Star Forge itself might be.
Bastilla.nm15aabast02012_.mp3: I was thinking that, too. This map can't take us to the Star Forge, but I know that Revan and Malak visited Korriban at least once. Perhaps they discovered something more there.
Bastilla.nm15aabast02013_.mp3: They may have found something on each of the other worlds that completed this map. Maybe if we find all the pieces they will lead us to the Star Forge... and some way to destroy it.
Bastilla.nm15aabast02015_.mp3: What if I'm right? We can't ignore this. Finding the Star Forge might very well be the key to defeating the Sith!
Bastilla.nm15aabast02016_.mp3: We must inform the Council of what we have discovered. They must decide our next course of action, though I suspect our task has only just begun.
Bastilla.nm16aanuri01012_.mp3: Jedi are renowned for their fairness and pursuit of justice. There is nothing to fear from us... unless you have something to hide.
Bastilla.nm16aanuri01016_.mp3: Privacy is all well and good, but justice must be valued higher. Is it not obvious to you that this man hides something?
Bastilla.nm16aanuri01031_.mp3: Typical. Anything to continue the feud which has become so customary to you people.
Bastilla.nm16aanuri01044_.mp3: Your actions show you are overly focused on material wealth. This is not the way of the Jedi. You will have to learn to let go of your greed if you wish to walk in the light.
Bastilla.nm16aaraha02009_.mp3: I see. Well there is the answer we seek. The Jedi Council should be informed of this at once.
Bastilla.nm16aaraha02011_.mp3: Of course not. It seems very simple to me. The Council must be allowed to decide the next step.
Bastilla.nm16aaraha02035_.mp3: The Council would not approve of your actions here. Perhaps we should find this girl and try to help her.
Bastilla.nm17aa03sh01031_.mp3: Thank you for helping this woman. It may not seem like such a great thing to you, but you are making a difference.
Bastilla.nm17aa03sh01052_.mp3: Was that really necessary? I hope you intend to keep your word if you act so forcefully with an innocent.
Bastilla.nm17aa03sh01061_.mp3: This is beneath even you, stealing from a helpless woman. How could you?!
Bastilla.nm17aa11iz05096_.mp3: So these Jawas are scavengers who are enslaved by the Sand People? I think I am beginning to understand his plight.
Bastilla.nm17aa11iz05106_.mp3: It could be that this Jawa knows things about this planet's history that the Republic has no inkling of.
Bastilla.nm17aa11iz05114_.mp3: It does seem convenient, but we've no reason to disbelieve this creature.
Bastilla.nm17aa11iz05118_.mp3: I am *not* naive, Carth. I simply sense no deceit here.
Bastilla.nm17aaiziz99154_.mp3: This nothing but wanton greed and cruelty! Beware, lest these things lead you to the dark side.
Bastilla.nm17aaxbas12000_.mp3: Have you seen a woman that may resemble me somewhat? She is my mother.
Bastilla.nm17aaxbas12001_.mp3: Ask whether they have seen my mother.
Bastilla.nm17aaxbas12002_.mp3: My mother was supposed to be here somewhere. Ask if they have seen her.
Bastilla.nm17aaxbas12003_.mp3: That messenger said my mother is on Tatooine somewhere. We should ask about her.
Bastilla.nm17aaxbas12004_.mp3: We should try to find her. I doubt she wants to be kept waiting.
Bastilla.nm17aaxbas12005_.mp3: I want to find out what my mother wanted. We need to find her.
Bastilla.nm17ac08yu02016_.mp3: And if the unit proves even more 'uncooperative' once we purchase it?
Bastilla.nm17ad03gu03141_.mp3: These... things... are just looking for trouble. Be careful.
Bastilla.nm17ad03ta06076_.mp3: Perhaps you had best turn your thoughts back to your wife, sir.
Bastilla.nm17ae04ce02008_.mp3: My friend tells the truth. I am a Jedi... are you going to imply that I am lying, as well?
Bastilla.nm17ae04ce02025_.mp3: And? It sounds like you have something special. What do you want help with?
Bastilla.nm17ae04ce02088_.mp3: [Force Persuade] I have heard enough. You want to act in a fair manner. Now.
Bastilla.nm17ae04ga03064_.mp3: I would have thought we have more important things to do than extort credits from the common folk.
Bastilla.nm17ae04ni04025_.mp3: Forcing the boy to sign his life away? Is that really necessary?
Bastilla.nm17af07ja05008_.mp3: It's not that hard to understand if you listen. It's just... odd.
Bastilla.nm17af07ja05012_.mp3: Your sarcasm is not appreciated, Carth.
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01008_.mp3: I have the holocron, Mother. I'm just not sure I want to give it to you.
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01012_.mp3: I've never denied you anything, Mother. You may think I don't remember what it was like before I left for the order, but I do.
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01014_.mp3: You were the one who pushed Father to go on one treasure hunt after the other. You loved living in wealth. You think I don't remember the fights?
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01016_.mp3: You were eager to send me to the Jedi, even though I didn't want to go. You took Father away from me, and now this holocron is all I have of him.
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01020_.mp3: No. I don't wish to argue with you any more, Mother. It's time we parted ways, now, for both our benefit.
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01022_.mp3: You don't know her. My mother is notoriously deceptive when she wants something. Why should she have the holocron?
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01026_.mp3: I find it difficult to believe anything you say, Mother.
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01028_.mp3: *Sigh* You're right. It shames me, but I just... I find it difficult to... let go of the past. I'm... sorry, Mother.
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01036_.mp3: So that's why you gave me to the Order?
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01048_.mp3: I'm so sorry, Mother. I don't know what to say...
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01050_.mp3: Keep the holocron, Bastila. It would do me good to know you have it. This... talking to you... this is what I really needed before I...
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01052_.mp3: I know, Mother. Thank you. I'm glad we talked, too.
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01058_.mp3: Where are you going to go?
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01076_.mp3: I... perhaps not. I can remember my father well enough. But I ask you: why should she have it?
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01081_.mp3: On the contrary, I've learned much. I've learned, for instance, when it is best to walk away from a situation that can lead only to conflict.
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01087_.mp3: Farewell, Mother. May the Force be with you.
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01091_.mp3: I don't have the holocron, if that's what you're asking.
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01119_.mp3: I am here, Mother. Or don't you recognize me?
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01123_.mp3: You knew as well as I communication would be impossible once I joined the order. Now what is this about? Where is Father?
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01127_.mp3: Has something happened to him? Are you going to tell me or not?
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01131_.mp3: Dead? What happened? What did you do to him?!
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01137_.mp3: I was told you were sick. Are you actually dying, or is this merely melodrama for my benefit?
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01141_.mp3: You could start by telling me what you got Father into that killed him.
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01149_.mp3: How can you be sure of that? Father is an experienced --
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01153_.mp3: I... see. So what do you want from me? Credits?
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01157_.mp3: Why? So you can sell it?
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01161_.mp3: We're very busy on a mission from the Jedi Council. I doubt I'll have the time. Ask my companions if you doubt me.
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01165_.mp3: What remains would there be? Krayt dragons are huge predators, easily able to devour a human, and the desert is a harsh environment.
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01167_.mp3: Finding my father's remains would be an even more impossible task than finding his holocron. An ignoble end to a fine man.
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01169_.mp3: It doesn't seem to have anything to do with what she's asking. Are you actually sick, Mother?
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01171_.mp3: What difference does it make to you? None, I'm sure. Just find your father's holocron and you won't have to worry about me again either way.
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01173_.mp3: That's the kind of response I would expect. Very well. We'll look for the holocron if we have time. I can't promise any more than that.
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01185_.mp3: Here. Take these 500 credits. It's all I have. Go to Coruscant and find a doctor. I'll meet you there after... after what I have to do.
Bastilla.nm17afhhel01187_.mp3: Please, take it. I... want to see you again. When we can talk.
Bastilla.nm17ag10cz01173_.mp3: *whisper* Czerka may be a corrupt organization, but that doesn't justify us using the Force for personal gain.
Bastilla.nm18ab10ta05023_.mp3: I take it back. Let's congratulate his wife.
Bastilla.nm18abbast14000_.mp3: So we have found it. Father's holocron. I suppose I should be thankful the desert sands had not swallowed it up.
Bastilla.nm18abbast14002_.mp3: I don't know. I'll...I'll have to think about that. I'll keep it on me while I decide.
Bastilla.nm18acstar99001_.mp3: The Star Map is an artifact of the dark side. The krayt dragon may have been drawn here by its dark power, only to be enslaved by it.
Bastilla.nm18acstar99002_.mp3: Come. We should leave this place. There is nothing else for us here.
Bastilla.nm18acstar99019_.mp3: I do not think it is mere chance that we have found the Star Map here, in the lair of a krayt dragon.
Bastilla.nm22aaczer03013_.mp3: Shipped as slaves to work as soldiers and heavy laborers in Czerka camps, no doubt.
Bastilla.nm22aadaso07059_.mp3: Feeding this man's hatred is an act of malice and petty evil. The Council would not approve of your actions here, and neither do I.
Bastilla.nm22aaelix08056_.mp3: An honest man and a good mechanic. Seems like you got a favorable trade, sir.
Bastilla.nm22aajano06057_.mp3: [Force Persuade] You wish to tell us more about this agreement with the Wookiee leadership.
Bastilla.nm22aajano06096_.mp3: It's not our place to judge, Carth. As he said, it would change nothing anyway.
Bastilla.nm22aajano06098_.mp3: Of course not. I would gladly end it, had I the power. However, we are here for other reasons, if you will recall.
Bastilla.nm22aazaal01044_.mp3: Perhaps you should reconsider leaving Zaalbar behind. This is, after all, his homeworld.
Bastilla.nm22aazaal01046_.mp3: We know very little of this planet. I also sense that Zaalbar has much that is unresolved here... it may be beneficial to aid him in this respect.
Bastilla.nm22aazaal01049_.mp3: Is this about power, then? You would rather make a decision for the sake of making it than make it wisely?
Bastilla.nm22aazaal01051_.mp3: I am only suggesting that both we and Zaalbar would benefit from his company while on Kashyyyk. You do want to find the Star Map, don't you?
Bastilla.nm22abdehn06016_.mp3: Put it down? You... you murdered him?
Bastilla.nm22abdehn06112_.mp3: *whisper* I do not approve of this game you are playing! This Wookiee's death is a tragedy, not a chance for your profit.
Bastilla.nm22abzaal01028_.mp3: This place is so wonderful, yet so strange. Maybe we should have Zaalbar with us. A guide with local knowledge could be invaluable.
Bastilla.nm23aawook01039_.mp3: Surely that is no way to gain co-operation from the Wookiees. Some subtlety is not out of the question, is it?
Bastilla.nm23abjaar01053_.mp3: I do not like where this is leading. I fear it can only end in sorrow.
Bastilla.nm23abwoor02048_.mp3: I think I begin to see what has occurred here. We should speak to Jarak at once.
Bastilla.nm23acworr01038_.mp3: This isn't justice, it doesn't seem right! But... what else could we do?
Bastilla.nm23acworr01058_.mp3: How sad. It feels like the right thing to do, but... to destroy a hero...
Bastilla.nm23acworr01141_.mp3: You mustn't let greed rule your decision here. Justice must be served.
Bastilla.nm23adchuu01141_.mp3: Are you sure this is wise? To support a slaver feels... wrong.
Bastilla.nm23adchuu01145_.mp3: Of course not. Only the idiots around me.
Bastilla.nm23adchuu01248_.mp3: Then I suppose we have little choice. We should proceed with caution, however.
Bastilla.nm23adfrey02072_.mp3: This Wookiee does not like this line of questioning. You'll anger him past reasoning.
Bastilla.nm23adfrey02089_.mp3: I did warn you this wouldn't work.
Bastilla.nm24aajole06205_.mp3: I can feel the power of the Force within you, old man, but I do not sense the taint of the dark side. I think you are a servant of the light, despite what you claim.
Bastilla.nm25aafrey02174_.mp3: Wait - I don't trust Chuundar. Maybe we should try talking to this Wookiee.
Bastilla.nm25aastar99001_.mp3: The Star Map is an artifact of the dark side. The horrors that live here in the Shadowlands could be the result of thousands of generations affected by the Star Map's power.
Bastilla.nm25aastar99002_.mp3: Come. We should leave this place. There is nothing else for us here.
Bastilla.nm25aastar99019_.mp3: The Shadowlands are a dark and dangerous place. I am not surprised to find the Star Map here, though I cannot help but wonder if the Star Map predates the forest itself.
Bastilla.nm26aaelor04036_.mp3: Now, now, Elora. We're not here to pass judgment, my dear. We do need to know everything if we're to help, yes?
Bastilla.nm26aaelor04037_.mp3: Madam. I would remind you that I am a Jedi. Now, then... was he having an affair?
Bastilla.nm26aairim06029_.mp3: [Force Persuade] But we are not your enemies... we are your friends. Tell us what you know.
Bastilla.nm26aairim06061_.mp3: So you brought these youths to the Sith. And then what did you do to them?
Bastilla.nm26aanilk09039_.mp3: And what if the Republic does mean harm, Carth? Will you tell them?
Bastilla.nm26aanilk09115_.mp3: I doubt the Republic would be involved in anything illegal. Still, if this Selkath has concerns we could look into it for him.
Bastilla.nm26aaselj17062_.mp3: Jedi are renowned for being arbiters in times of need. We will investigate this matter as best we are able.
Bastilla.nm26aaselj18022_.mp3: 'Almost seems'? They do wish to conquer everything, and will not stop at Manaan. Why the Selkath believe themselves invulnerable I have no idea.
Bastilla.nm26aaselj21036_.mp3: If you had listened, Carth, you would know that that *is* the law. Sunry is guilty until proven innocent.
Bastilla.nm26aaselj21040_.mp3: Angering the judge won't get us a more impartial decision, Carth.
Bastilla.nm26aasunr26069_.mp3: And you would propose what? Letting a murderer free on the chance it will help the Republic?
Bastilla.nm26aasunr26071_.mp3: But you're willing to overlook it. Are the principles that the Republic stands on so very weak, Carth?
Bastilla.nm26acignu04077_.mp3: I know you want to help Sunry, but we should not be manufacturing evidence like this.
Bastilla.nm27aashas06020_.mp3: Yes... certainly you must have heard of the destruction of Taris. It is your 'honorable' friends that committed that atrocity.
Bastilla.nm27aashas06036_.mp3: [Persuade] Wait! If you do not allow us time to prove our claims, you act just like you claim the Sith not to be!
Bastilla.nm27aashas06047_.mp3: I can understand why you're doing this, but surely it can't be that hard to *prove* the evil of the dark side, can it?
Bastilla.nm27aashas06066_.mp3: Use the Force, then. Look into your heart and you will realize what is truth and what is lies.
Bastilla.nm27aashas06080_.mp3: You have been saved from more than you know. Given time, the Sith would have turned you fully to the dark side... and you would have betrayed your world gladly.
Bastilla.nm27aashas06108_.mp3: *whisper* How does promoting the Sith help our cause? Think about what you are doing!
Bastilla.nm28absur201006_.mp3: Changed inside them? Yes... this whole place feels wrong, somehow.
Bastilla.nm28acsur303027_.mp3: How horrible! I can only imagine how frightened you were.
Bastilla.nm33aapros18014_.mp3: That is unworthy of you. And it draws unwanted attention.
Bastilla.nm33aapros18021_.mp3: That is murder, and this young person is not even a Sith!
Bastilla.nm33aashaa19033_.mp3: What? Why didn't you try to help them?!
Bastilla.nm33aayuth21107_.mp3: I... yes -- we are only servants to the... master.
Bastilla.nm33abacad01010_.mp3: Ahh... ignore him, sir. He is mentally deficient. And he drools.
Bastilla.nm33abmeke02008_.mp3: Disgusting and barbaric. That these men chose to do this willingly astounds me to no end.
Bastilla.nm33abmeke02010_.mp3: And what is that supposed to mean?
Bastilla.nm33abmeke02012_.mp3: Never mind what I thought. Just be quiet.
Bastilla.nm33abmekf03018_.mp3: That was a kind thing to do. Better he give up on the Sith while he can.
Bastilla.nm33abmekf03034_.mp3: What are you doing? This man is not even a Sith, in truth. This is beneath contempt.
Bastilla.nm33abmekf03055_.mp3: That's madness! How long have you been here?
Bastilla.nm35aabast06000_.mp3: I know we have not spoken often during our time together, despite my best efforts. And to this point I have respected your privacy. But there is something we must discuss.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06003_.mp3: No, this cannot wait any longer. You have no understanding of what we are going up against; I will not allow you to go in unprepared!
Bastilla.nm35aabast06005_.mp3: I feel the end of our quest is near. Soon we will discover the location of the Star Forge; though what will happen next is... uncertain.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06006_.mp3: I've been watching you. I've seen how you have resisted great temptations and continue to walk the path of the light side. Very commendable.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06008_.mp3: My role in what you will become is a small one. I can only give you the warnings taught to me by my own master, ultimately it is your own actions that will decide your fate.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06010_.mp3: The path of the light is a difficult one to walk. We might not even see the shadows until we are surrounded and can never find our way back.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06011_.mp3: I've been watching you. I've seen you give in to temptation and indulge your baser emotions on many occassions. I'm afraid you are on the path that leads to the dark side.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06016_.mp3: About my mother? I am unsure. I seem to find it difficult to remain objective when it comes to her. I find that... disturbing.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06018_.mp3: We have more important things to do. Still... my father is dead. Just because we find the holocron doesn't mean I have to give it to her.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06020_.mp3: Father recorded all his personal thoughts in that holocron even when I knew him. Having it would be like having him with you.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06021_.mp3: I don't see why she deserves it, however. She drove him to his death. I loved him... and I didn't even have a chance to say goodbye.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06023_.mp3: I don't know. Part of me would keep it just so she didn't get it. I don't like that part of me.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06024_.mp3: I would have thought my Jedi training would have put me past this kind of pettiness. I wish... I really don't want to think about this.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06027_.mp3: It does, doesn't it? I can't seem to help myself.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06029_.mp3: Yes... maybe. I don't feel good about it, still.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06033_.mp3: That would just lead into another argument. How I always despised talking to her.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06035_.mp3: I would like to keep something to remember Father as much as she would.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06037_.mp3: I find myself agreeing with you, but I don't like how that feels.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06038_.mp3: I'll think about it. I should... try and remember my training. I should be able to let go of this, but I can't.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06040_.mp3: I have my doubts as to whether she's actually sick.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06042_.mp3: Mother used to lie about many things to get her way. She is a selfish woman who pushed my father into doing what she wished.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06044_.mp3: Yes, I... thought I had let go of that anger. All my training, and it comes back so quickly...
Bastilla.nm35aabast06045_.mp3: I don't want to talk about this any more. Let's... keep going.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06047_.mp3: I told you that my mother and I never got along. Obviously that has not changed.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06048_.mp3: And now Father is dead. That... leaves a hurt inside, you just can't imagine. I haven't seen him in so long...
Bastilla.nm35aabast06050_.mp3: You're probably right. There are more important things to do. Mother can wait.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06053_.mp3: Hmm? Sorry, I am just thinking about my mother. It is strange to hear news after all this time. It is quite distracting.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06054_.mp3: Should we have the opportunity, I would like to find her on Tatooine. There is only one small colony there; it should not be difficult.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06055_.mp3: It's not that I look forward to seeing her, I just can't help but wonder what she wants. But... perhaps we have better things to do.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06058_.mp3: The surface of Taris is covered with an urban skyscrape. Its glittering spires belie the decay that lies in its lower reaches, however.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06059_.mp3: Beyond that, there is little else I can tell you.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06060_.mp3: Dantooine is a peaceful and pastoral planet. There are few large communities. Mostly what you will find here are ranchers and farmers.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06061_.mp3: I find it a tranquil place like few in the galaxy. The perfect site for the Jedi enclave. You will like it here.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06062_.mp3: Manaan is a water world inhabited by an aquatic race known as the Selkath. Their only surface city and spaceport is called Ahto.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06063_.mp3: It is unique in that the Selkath are firm in their neutrality. They are neither part of the republic nor controlled by the Sith, and they wish to keep it that way.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06064_.mp3: Tatooine is a dry planet that has not been inhabited long and has little law. This town of Anchorhead may be its only settlement.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06065_.mp3: Kashyyyk is a planet where most of what you see is actually foliage that has grown to enormous heights. No one has ever been to the true surface of the planet below.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06066_.mp3: Korriban is a sparsely populated planet controlled by the Sith. It feels... wrong. There is an old evil here that permeates the Force.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06067_.mp3: There's nothing I could say that would be helpful, I'm afraid.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06069_.mp3: I can try. What would you like me to recall?
Bastilla.nm35aabast06071_.mp3: I shall do my best. Calm your mind and remember...
Bastilla.nm35aabast06073_.mp3: I shall do my best. Calm your mind and remember...
Bastilla.nm35aabast06075_.mp3: I shall do my best. Calm your mind and remember...
Bastilla.nm35aabast06077_.mp3: I shall do my best. Calm your mind and remember...
Bastilla.nm35aabast06079_.mp3: Yes. That brought me a lot of peace. More than I thought it would have.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06080_.mp3: Thank you for urging me towards it. After all my training, I would have thought it would have been easier. Apparently I still have much to learn.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06082_.mp3: Yes, but I don't feel any better. After all my training, I would have thought myself above such anger.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06083_.mp3: For it to come so easily disturbs me greatly. I don't need a holocron to remember my father, and I will never see Mother again.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06084_.mp3: Have I learned nothing? It... no, I don't want to talk about this. Thank you, but I must think about what I have done.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06086_.mp3: It was less of a dream and more of a vision... a vision the two of us shared. But I am certainly willing to answer any questions the Jedi Council did not.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06088_.mp3: Are you wondering why we shared the vision? Or why we even received it in the first place?
Bastilla.nm35aabast06089_.mp3: To the first I can only repeat the answer that the Council gave us. Our fates are linked, and for two as strong as we are in the Force that amounts to a near-physical bond.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06090_.mp3: As to the second, I don't truly have an answer for you. The Force works as it will, and perhaps we should be grateful for what we have been given.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06092_.mp3: I... I don't know. Believe me, I certainly don't find the prospect of being joined to you enjoyable in any fashion.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06094_.mp3: Please forgive me. I did not mean to imply that you were repulsive in any sense of the word. That we shared something so personal is just not something I'm used to.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06096_.mp3: Then perhaps the sooner we see to our destiny the sooner that we can proceed on our separate paths. That seems the logical solution, no?
Bastilla.nm35aabast06098_.mp3: The Force often seems to cause events that bend the laws of probability, especially with those that are strongly affiliated with it.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06099_.mp3: In this respect, you and I will simply have to become accustomed to such 'convienience'. We are the tools of the Force and we will do as it wills.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06101_.mp3: The Force does not compel obedience. You have a destiny, but the choices you make along it are ultimately your own.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06103_.mp3: Quite the contrary. Ours is the ultimate free will. The Force is our destiny, but the choices we make along it are ultimately our own.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06105_.mp3: There is no evidence one way or the other. What you believe the Force to be ultimately will decide who you are.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06107_.mp3: What would you like to know?
Bastilla.nm35aabast06110_.mp3: Perhaps because we desired to. Perhaps because they came to this planet and were strong enough in the Force to leave a... a trace.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06112_.mp3: That would not be my first choice, either, but choice appears to be irrelevant in this matter.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06113_.mp3: We dreamed about Revan and Malak either because we were meant to or because we needed to. There is no other way to look at it.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06115_.mp3: They did something important here, of that I am certain. It may be simply that we are sensitive to that event. Or it may not.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06117_.mp3: And what else should we dream about except that which is most important to our fate?
Bastilla.nm35aabast06119_.mp3: I have no idea. It was obviously important, however. That is why we must investigate this further.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06121_.mp3: And are you so certain that it is not you in my dreams?
Bastilla.nm35aabast06123_.mp3: I see. That is most likely vanity speaking, for I am not certain, myself. Regardless, our fates are linked... the vision was no doubt meant for us both.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06125_.mp3: Regardless of which it is, our fates are linked... the vision was doubtless meant for us both.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06128_.mp3: I would rather not rely on such visions to guide us, but when we have so little else to go on and the galaxy hangs in the balance...
Bastilla.nm35aabast06130_.mp3: As you wish. We really should return our thoughts to business, anyway.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06135_.mp3: I would like to know what happened after you crashed on Taris. I'm curious as to what you and Carth were doing before we all joined forces.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06137_.mp3: I managed to free myself, as I recall. In fact, if I hadn't been there Brejik and his thugs might have killed you in that fight. It's probably more accurate to say that I rescued you.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06139_.mp3: I'll admit that I probably wouldn't have been able to free myself if not for the brawl after the swoop race. I guess I should thank you for that, at least.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06146_.mp3: Yes, I realize that of course. But surely there was more to it than a simple search. I doubt there were flashing signs pointing you in my direction; yet somehow you found me.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06148_.mp3: Yes... well. I hardly consider myself a damsel in distress. I'm a member of the Jedi Order, after all. But I won't deny you've impressed me with what you've done.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06153_.mp3: When you were chosen to join this mission, I doubt any of us expected this much from you. A Jedi could have done such things, of course. But only by drawing heavily upon the Force.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06183_.mp3: No, not bothering me. Not exactly. I've been thinking about what the Jedi Council said about the two of us.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06184_.mp3: There is a bond between us, I do not dispute that. I can feel it, as I'm sure you can. The nature of that bond and its effect on our mission remain in question.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06186_.mp3: Necessary, perhaps, but it is no guarantee of our success. I admit, I'm a little disturbed that such a bond could be possible in the first place.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06188_.mp3: Deny it if you will, but there is a connection between us. I understand why you would find this disturbing. I have my own reservations about it, to be honest.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06190_.mp3: Our fates are strongly connected; so connected that a literal bond has been forged between us.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06191_.mp3: I saw your service records when you were transferred aboard the Endar Spire, but nothing beyond that. I know very little about you. I'd like to ask you some questions, given our relationship.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06193_.mp3: I was referring to the bond we share; the one the Jedi Council spoke of. If I actually was interested in you, rest assured I could come up with a better approach than this!
Bastilla.nm35aabast06211_.mp3: Good. On which planet were you born?
Bastilla.nm35aabast06215_.mp3: Yes, well... The truth is I was studying *how* you responded to my questions. Your reactions help me judge you; this was a test for me to learn more about your character.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06217_.mp3: You were honest, which is good. And you treated this as a serious matter, which it is. This bond we share will shape both our destinies, it is not to be taken lightly.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06224_.mp3: I see you intend to be childish about this. I guess I won't get anywhere continuing our discussion right now, will I?
Bastilla.nm35aabast06226_.mp3: Why would you refuse to answer? These are simple questions, nothing too intrusive. First, what kind of background do you have?
Bastilla.nm35aabast06229_.mp3: I see. I didn't mean to upset you, but I suppose it was inevitable. You've had a lot to absorb since we escaped Taris. I apologize.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06232_.mp3: I do. How did you know?
Bastilla.nm35aabast06234_.mp3: A... a kinrath pup?! It most certainly is not!
Bastilla.nm35aabast06235_.mp3: I am a Jedi, remember? I have far too much mental discipline to reveal what goes on inside my mind with such obvious physical clues.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06237_.mp3: Our connection allows us glimpses into each other's mind. We can feel some of what the other feels. And what I feel within you troubles me.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06238_.mp3: A Padawan must receive considerable training. They must learn to control their emotions and darker impulses. Often it takes years before using the Force can be considered safe.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06239_.mp3: The fact that you are so strong in the Force and have had such relatively little training could have terrible consequences. For you, and for everyone around you.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06241_.mp3: This is not a joke! The choices you make could affect both our destinies, not to mention the fate of the Republic and the entire galaxy! There is much at stake.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06243_.mp3: No? Self-control is a maxim for all Jedi. It is what gives us the strength to resist the dark side. All who have fallen from our Order have shown a flagrant disregard for such control.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06245_.mp3: I don't think there is much you can do. If things were different I would recommend several years of training under one of the Jedi Masters. But I fear that won't be possible.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06246_.mp3: Already you exhibit the kind of willfullness, erratic behavior and lack of compassion that will lead you to corruption.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06247_.mp3: Thankfully you have exhibited a degree of compassion and self-control up to this point. I sincerely hope you can maintain these traits in the future.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06248_.mp3: We must all resist the influence of the dark side! It is everything we are fighting against! This is doubly important for you, with your natural affinity for the Force!
Bastilla.nm35aabast06250_.mp3: I'm sorry if I come across as harsh. But I am concerned. For you, for our mission. And for myself, as well.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06252_.mp3: I am not trying to harass you. But you must understand the trials and perils that lie ahead. For you, and for me.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06254_.mp3: That is good to hear. Without the proper training, however, I'm afraid you will find the path difficult even with the best of intentions. There is great danger ahead, for both of us.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06255_.mp3: Our destinies are intertwined. Everything one of us does will have consequences for the other. Any reckless behavior on your part is likely to affect me as well.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06257_.mp3: That's not true. I am worried about myself, but also about you. I would rather see neither of us come to any harm.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06259_.mp3: Yes, that is true. I will do my best to guide you, but I am no Master. Not yet. And there are times when I find the sheer strength of your power almost overwhelming.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06261_.mp3: I believe you truly mean what you say. For now. But sometimes it is not so easy to keep such promises.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06262_.mp3: Your power could be a gift or a curse. When you need guidance, or advice, or support I will do my best to help you stay on the path of the light.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06266_.mp3: No, of course not. Not yet. But there will be challenges ahead that might make it otherwise.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06268_.mp3: Why do you still try to deny the existence of this bond between us? Like it or not, we are linked... as our shared vision of the Star Map proved.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06272_.mp3: I am a Jedi. I am far too disciplined to betray my emotions with outward physical displays. We both know the real reason you have some idea of what I am thinking: the bond we share.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06276_.mp3: Yes, I did. I wanted to speak to you about our mission. About what lies ahead for us. It seems fate, or the Force, is driving us into a confrontation with the Dark Lord.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06294_.mp3: It's true that, due to my Battle Meditation, I was with the Jedi strike team that boarded Revan's ship. We did not kill Revan, however.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06296_.mp3: Our mission was to capture Revan, if possible. It was Malak who turned on his own master, firing upon Revan's ship while we were still on board it.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06297_.mp3: It was his desire to kill us and his master both. Thankfully we narrowly escaped the vessel as it exploded.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06299_.mp3: As I said, we were there to capture Revan alive. The Jedi do not believe in killing their prisoners. No one deserves execution, no matter what their crimes.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06300_.mp3: Remember that Revan and Malak were once great Jedi. Heroes in every sense of the word. They demonstrate the danger of the dark side to us all.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06301_.mp3: I'm sorry. We really shouldn't speak of this anymore. The memory of my confrontation with Revan is... painful. Let's return to the mission, please.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06303_.mp3: True, I suppose. And yet the outcome of that battle was... unexpected. To all of us. Revan's end was... unforeseen.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06310_.mp3: You must prepare yourself for when we face Malak. The confrontation will be difficult for you. I remember how hard it was when I first faced Revan.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06315_.mp3: Yes, I suppose I can understand your curiosity, given the bond that connects us. Very well, I'll tell you a bit about myself.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06317_.mp3: I was found to be strong with the Force at a young age, as most Padawans are. As a girl I was given to the Order to be trained.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06318_.mp3: When I joined the Order I left my family on Talravin, as all Padawans do. My family is still there, the last that I heard. I have had little contact with them, as it is discouraged.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06320_.mp3: Relationships with family members are fraught with powerful emotions. Such extremes are to be avoided. Anger and hate are the worst, but even love can lead to folly.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06322_.mp3: Emotional entanglements can be dangerous. They can impair rational thought, they can lead to outbursts of uncontrolled emotion. A Jedi must be above such things.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06325_.mp3: The gift of the Force comes with a high cost. Sacrifice of one's emotional attachments is one of the prices a Jedi must be willing to pay. The alternative is to fall prey to the dark side.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06327_.mp3: Please, you mustn't say things like that. The dark side is destruction and chaos, the opposite of all that gives the universe order and purpose. You have to understand this.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06329_.mp3: And you need to be more mindful of your responsibilities! Have you any idea of the danger a fallen Jedi represents? Not only to yourself, but to others as well?
Bastilla.nm35aabast06331_.mp3: That is something every Jedi should be afraid of.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06337_.mp3: Like all who join the Order, I have learned to embrace the life I have chosen. I had to let go of my attachments to my family.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06339_.mp3: It can be a hard lesson to learn. I was not on good terms with all of my family, but I do remember missing my father terribly for a very long time.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06341_.mp3: I was not on good terms with my mother. I was only a little girl when I left, but I was old enough to resent her and the way she treated my father.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06342_.mp3: She pushed my father into treasure hunting. I spent all my young life on ships traveling from one false lead to the next.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06343_.mp3: She whittled away my father's entire fortune, and I hated her for it. I think she was relieved to give me to the Jedi, but my father was heartbroken.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06345_.mp3: Very close. I was only a little girl when I left my family, but I still remember him fondly. He was kind and gentle and doted on me. My mother, however, was different.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06347_.mp3: You were the one who asked to know more about me! Very well, if you have changed your mind then I suppose we should just get back to our mission.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06348_.mp3: A child is too young to understand the sacrifices that must be made. It is better if they have no contact with their family once they are removed.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06350_.mp3: Once I was older I realized the wisdom of this policy. A Jedi must do what is needed, personal desires notwithstanding. Love can only obscure and confuse the matter.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06353_.mp3: I... I do not wish to discuss this anymore. I would rather return to our mission.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06355_.mp3: Even a Jedi cannot always control the feelings of the heart. We must do our best to guard against it, no matter what the cost. But some sacrifices are harder than others.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06365_.mp3: I do. I've been watching you. Studying you closely to see what kind of progress you have made since your training at the hands of Master Zhar.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06367_.mp3: I've seen how you have resisted many temptations and continue to walk the path of the light side. Very commendable, but I'm afraid you might stray from this path.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06368_.mp3: I've seen you give in to temptation and indulge your baser emotions on many occasions. I'm afraid you are on the path that leads to the dark side.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06371_.mp3: We must, for all our sakes. If you had the proper training under a true Master you would know all this. But because of our mission, I must be the one to try and help you understand.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06375_.mp3: You need to see what the dark side represents in its entirety, for it is what we battle. Only the wisdom of a Jedi Master can truly explain this, but I will do my best to make you understand.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06376_.mp3: The dark side is not simply giving in to anger or temptation to use the Force to destructive ends. These things only lead to the dark side.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06377_.mp3: The dark side grows stronger and more insidious the closer you draw to it. It begs you to surrender to it, to release all its terrible power... and it becomes harder and harder to resist.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06378_.mp3: And once you stop resisting, it is too late. It twists you up inside and... and turns you into a mockery of everything you once stood for.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06380_.mp3: I am no less resistant to temptation than any other. I simply have the benefit of training that you do not. But even the training of the Jedi might not be enough to save us.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06382_.mp3: We need only to look at the atrocities which have been committed by those under its sway to understand the terrible, corrupting evil of the dark side.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06383_.mp3: Millions dead, and far more suffering. What sort of person would you have to become to perform such deeds gladly?
Bastilla.nm35aabast06385_.mp3: One who serves the light side does not strike down an innocent. We take arms against the dark side and the injustice that follows it only.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06387_.mp3: Neither do I, and I hope I never do.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06389_.mp3: And how adept must one become at making excuses for one's actions, if suffering is the result? How long before you stop making excuses at all?
Bastilla.nm35aabast06391_.mp3: And that is why the dark side is so insidious. If you are not careful, you do not even see each small step you take towards it until it is too late.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06392_.mp3: It is so easy to think that we would never fall prey to such a horror; that we have unlimited control, vigilance and foresight. If only that were true.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06393_.mp3: The Sith have become powerful because there are many Jedi who have succumbed to the lure of the dark side and joined their cause.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06394_.mp3: What greater weapon is there than to turn an enemy to your cause? To use their own knowledge against them?
Bastilla.nm35aabast06395_.mp3: We are weakened while they are strengthened. So we must harden our hearts and do whatever is required to fight against the dark side. Even when the battle becomes wearying.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06397_.mp3: I don't know. The vision of our future is clouded by shadows cast from the dark side. But I sense something ominous lurking in those shadows.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06398_.mp3: But words alone cannot save one from the dark side. Come, we should continue with the task at hand. When the time comes I only hope we are all strong enough to do what we must.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06400_.mp3: No, I suppose not. I have spoken more than enough of the dark side. It is up to you whether you heed my words or not.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06402_.mp3: You say you understand, but I'm afraid you are taking this too lightly. The power of the dark side can be... alluring.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06405_.mp3: Why? I could not accomplish this on my own, I need the aid of others - especially one who is strong in the Force. The bond between us made you a natural choice.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06409_.mp3: I admit, there were times that I wondered if this is more than just a mission to stop Malak. There were times when I wondered if this was also a way for the Council to test my own abilities.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06411_.mp3: You must learn to trust in the wisdom of the Council. Your destiny will come in its appointed time. You mustn't be so impatient.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06413_.mp3: *Must* you be so frustrating? I admit, I had a moment of foolish pride. But I'm over it. Now I am focused on my true responsibilities.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06414_.mp3: I am simply trying to help you and complete this mission, and yet you battle me at every turn!
Bastilla.nm35aabast06416_.mp3: Fun?! Fun?! Driving me insane is your idea of a good time?
Bastilla.nm35aabast06418_.mp3: You... you are a very odd man, do you know that? I simply don't know how to deal with you. All I want to do is help you, but you seem determined to drive me mad.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06421_.mp3: Unfortunately it isn't as easy as that. But your point is well taken.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06422_.mp3: Come on, come, let's move on... there's much to be done.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06424_.mp3: I don't know if I should be outraged that you keep joking about serious matters, or if I should be grateful that you can always lighten the mood.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06427_.mp3: I must admit: I simply don't know how to deal with someone like you.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06435_.mp3: I started it? You were the one who brought up the issue of the Council! You were the one who questioned our mission! You're the one who mocked me for thinking I was being tested!
Bastilla.nm35aabast06443_.mp3: I do. I have been trying to come up with the best way to say this for some time, but I suppose I should just come out and say it.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06444_.mp3: The truth is, I have come to depend on you. Not just for the sake of the mission, but for my own sake as well. I am... I am glad you are with us.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06446_.mp3: Well, yes. Surely that is not so surprising.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06448_.mp3: No, I'm not. Why must you make this so difficult for me? Can't you just accept a simple compliment?
Bastilla.nm35aabast06453_.mp3: Now you're teasing me. You know very well what I said.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06457_.mp3: Did I? I am trying to be sincere, here. It occurred to me that I may have been too critical of you. Too demanding, at times.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06459_.mp3: I am trying my best. You are not making this easy for me, you know.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06463_.mp3: I see. Is there nothing I can do to make it up to you? I would rather we were friends.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06465_.mp3: What? But I... alright. Have it your way, if that's what you'd prefer. We needn't talk further.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06468_.mp3: I... you know I can't feel that way about you. About any man. It isn't permitted. I am a Jedi, I must resist these temptations.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06469_.mp3: But I still want to consider you a friend. We could... we could never be anything more, though. That... that isn't allowed.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06474_.mp3: I know my manner can be a bit taciturn. I know you must be getting sick of my lectures about the dark side and... and everything else.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06475_.mp3: I spent all my years being hounded by my instructors. Being told so often how gifted and important I was until I was sick of it.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06476_.mp3: I remember when I was younger I used to swear that I would never become as self-absorbed and stodgy as the Jedi Masters. It's ironic, really.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06478_.mp3: That's kind of you to say, but I know for myself that it's not really true.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06480_.mp3: I suppose not. But I am becoming like that, though it's not easy for me to admit.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06482_.mp3: Yes, well... there's no need for you to agree so whole-heartedly.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06483_.mp3: Being controlled has kept everyone around me at an arm's length; even those like yourself who are most in need of my understanding and compassion.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06484_.mp3: But maybe it's time to change that. You deserve to know how much I respect and admire you. I thought... I just thought I should tell you.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06488_.mp3: Well, that was not nearly so difficult as I feared. Thank you for hearing me out. I feel... I feel much better.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06490_.mp3: Am I so transparent? I suppose I shouldn't be surprised, considering our bond. Yes, there is something I would like to ask, if you'll permit it.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06492_.mp3: Don't even start with that. You're the one who asked. I wasn't even going to say anything. But now that you've brought it up, I see I shouldn't have waited as long as I have.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06494_.mp3: In our time together I've been watching you. I've seen your tendency towards giving in to your darker emotions. You do as you please, for the most part.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06495_.mp3: Don't worry, this isn't a lead-up to a lecture. I'm... fascinated by your passion, by how easily it comes to you.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06496_.mp3: You seem to do whatever you want, something I would never dare consider. Don't you fear the consequences?
Bastilla.nm35aabast06498_.mp3: I doubt my old Master would approve of your advice. Besides, I'm not like you. I must always be on guard against such outbursts.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06500_.mp3: Is it? The thought of what could happen to me if I lose control... somehow I think life could be very long, indeed.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06502_.mp3: That... that's a relief to hear. That you would even be willing to risk so much is... is very brave. Braver than I could be.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06503_.mp3: In our time together I've been watching you. You are a true servant of the light, you follow the tenets of the Jedi Order despite the lure of the dark side. And with so little training.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06504_.mp3: For me it has always been a constant battle. Don't you find it difficult at all? You make it seem so easy. Or is that only an illusion?
Bastilla.nm35aabast06506_.mp3: And that's enough for you? If only it were as easy for me. If only the right path was always clear.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06508_.mp3: That's a relief to hear. I have never found the Jedi path an easy one to walk, and it's good to know I'm not alone.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06510_.mp3: You don't? Sometimes I find that it is nearly all I can think of. I have never found the Jedi training easy to master.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06511_.mp3: I've always struggled for control over my passions. I've always been too quick to anger, too quick to get involved. My instructors constantly berated me for it.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06512_.mp3: I've often dreamed that I might be able to confront Darth Malak myself. I dream I can use all this power I have to kill him and stop all the death and destruction.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06513_.mp3: I just think about all the evil that the Sith have caused and I... I get so furious. Yet we are told that these feelings are the path to the dark side.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06515_.mp3: I don't know. Would the power I used to kill Darth Malak be too tempting to keep using? Would I become the kind of evil I want to destroy?
Bastilla.nm35aabast06517_.mp3: But what comes next? After using all that power, would you decide to impose your own view on the universe? The dark side corrupts your very thoughts.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06519_.mp3: I suppose I do. Part of me thinks that it would be worth anything to vanquish evil, even if it meant giving in to my base emotions.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06520_.mp3: The very thought that I could become as evil as Malak; I just can't fathom it. It just doesn't seem possible. How could I... no, wait. I'm sorry.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06521_.mp3: I shouldn't even be asking you this. The Jedi teachings are clear; who am I to question them? And even worse, who am I to try and make you question them?
Bastilla.nm35aabast06523_.mp3: These are dangerous thoughts, the indulgence of a vain mind. Please, forget I ever mentioned this. Let's just return to our mission.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06525_.mp3: Yes, I did end that quite abruptly, didn't I? Perhaps a Master could have addressed my questions with the proper wisdom. But I never should have brought it up here. Not with you.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06526_.mp3: I don't think I'm the proper Jedi to guide you. I am no Master. You should have remained with the Council.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06528_.mp3: The fact of the matter is that I have never possessed much skill at controlling myself. With the bond that joins us, it seems I have even less.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06530_.mp3: Whether you will continue on your current path and fall to the dark side, I don't know. But it is increasingly obvious I am unable to guide you properly.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06531_.mp3: You have maintained the path of the light side. But it has been in spite of my influence, not because of it. It is increasingly obvious I am unable to guide you properly.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06533_.mp3: I don't know. I think... I think I may have made a very big mistake.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06534_.mp3: I simply hope that you are not the one who pays the price, ultimately, for the fact that I can't help you enough.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06538_.mp3: That's a kinder response than I deserve. And I can see there is wisdom in your words.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06539_.mp3: You... you continue to be there for me, don't you? Even after I keep pushing you away, you're still around when I need you most.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06541_.mp3: Well, just... different, I suppose. Things are not going as I thought they would. I... I need time to think about all this.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06542_.mp3: Perhaps you can help me. And I will try to help you, if I can. Hopefully this will all work out, for the both of us. And for the sake of the mission.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06545_.mp3: That is kind of you to say, but I think the evidence speaks for itself. I think... I think I may have made a very big mistake.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06547_.mp3: Fair enough. You will probably be better off on your own, in any case. I won't trouble you with this anymore.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06550_.mp3: Perhaps you are not being truly objective, then. There is no need to spare my feelings on this point.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06552_.mp3: Please don't make light of this. The very fact that I am plagued by this doubt is yet further evidence of my inadequacy.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06554_.mp3: You have been patient with me, haven't you? I suppose you deserve an answer. But you have to understand how difficult this is for me to say.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06561_.mp3: With all my training, I should be able to control myself better than this. But you're not anything like I expected. You're not like any man I've ever met before.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06562_.mp3: I find myself watching you when I don't mean to. I'm thinking about you when I don't want to. It isn't supposed to be like this!
Bastilla.nm35aabast06564_.mp3: Every time I try to call on all my teachings to calm myself, they fail me. You have such power, such passion! I don't know if it's due to the bond between us, but I'm drawn to you.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06566_.mp3: The Force is a part of you, as is your power. But that's not what attracted me to you. It's more than that. Maybe it's the bond we share. It gives us a certain... intimacy.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06567_.mp3: If I could, I would return to Dantooine. I need to be away from this bond of ours. I need to weaken it. I need to be anywhere but near you!
Bastilla.nm35aabast06580_.mp3: And go where? I am needed here, just as you are. There is nothing that is more important than what we are doing. Which is why we need to resolve this.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06586_.mp3: Oh, I thought... No, this is good. I'm glad you told me. This makes everything much easier.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06590_.mp3: Don't worry - I can put this behind me. Let's just continue on with what we must do. It is better this way.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06592_.mp3: I don't know. It shouldn't be so hard to not think of you. It should be easy to not think of you. I should have discipline! Jedi discipline!
Bastilla.nm35aabast06596_.mp3: Yes, I promised you an answer when we reached the Ebon Hawk, didn't I? But I'm afraid you won't like it. We should have some privacy for this.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06598_.mp3: I can't deny that there are parts of you I am drawn to. Your power, your will. You are so much stronger than I am.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06599_.mp3: In some ways you make me feel weak, like I am caught up in the wake of our destiny. But at the same time, you make me feel stronger, more alive.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06601_.mp3: I realize now these feelings are part of the bond we share. The Jedi Council surely realized this; they knew my loyalty to the doctrines of our Order would be tested on this mission.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06602_.mp3: By facing and overcoming my feelings for you I have learned a valuable lesson about control and the dangers of emotion. This is an important step in understanding the Force.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06603_.mp3: I'm sorry if this is not what you wanted to hear. But I felt it was important you know our... infatuation... was nothing more than a result of our powerful bond.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06604_.mp3: Please, don't say it like that. You make it sound like I was using you! Don't you realize how difficult this was for me?
Bastilla.nm35aabast06614_.mp3: You're stronger than I am, and there's no point in telling me otherwise. You will be a great Jedi, I think. I hope.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06616_.mp3: Then I suggest we move on.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06617_.mp3: I am confident that you can deal with that on your own.
Bastilla.nm35aabast06618_.mp3: I wish I could help you with that.
Bastilla.nm35aautha22070_.mp3: One has to wonder exactly what a Sith Master would find 'impressive'.
Bastilla.nm35aautha22157_.mp3: I can't say I approve, putting this weapon in the hands of --
Bastilla.nm35aayuth24204_.mp3: You sound much like... someone I know.
Bastilla.nm37aafree04049_.mp3: What is this? A... spirit, full of the Force. Be careful. I sense an extremely old and confused mind behind this presence...
Bastilla.nm37aafree04104_.mp3: The ancient Sith... destroyed each other. The fundamental flaw in their philosophy, one would think.
Bastilla.nm38aaassa01082_.mp3: It was a pleasure to have met you, er... do you have a name?
Bastilla.nm38abmeke03012_.mp3: It's never too late for anyone to feel compassion... or remorse. Not even you, Mekel.
Bastilla.nm38abmeke03043_.mp3: It is a small mercy, Carth, and that's a start.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01000_.mp3: Don't try to move too quickly, you might not be fully recovered yet. Admiral Karath had his guards continue to torture you even after you passed out.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01002_.mp3: The dark side has perverted him, Carth. Once you start down the tainted path it leads you ever further into the depths of evil. I fear he is forever lost.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01004_.mp3: Yes, hmm, I suppose you are correct. Sometimes it is easy to lose sight of that hope in the face of such unbridled cruelty, but you speak the truth.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01005_.mp3: I suppose I'm taking the news of Dantooine's destruction quite hard. First Taris, now the Academy... is there no end to the killing?
Bastilla.nm40aabast01007_.mp3: I'd like to believe that Saul was lying to us, but even as he said the words I knew they were true. The Academy is gone.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01008_.mp3: We should have felt a disturbance in the Force when the attack came. The fact that we did not is a bad sign. I fear the dark side is growing stronger, casting shadows our vision cannot pierce.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01009_.mp3: I can only hope that some of the Jedi escaped. Vrook, Vandar, Zhar... I cannot imagine all of them being gone. In any case, we have lost our one place of refuge in the galaxy.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01013_.mp3: I only wish you had been able to resist the Admiral's questioning. I hope the information you revealed does not bring the entire galaxy under the dominion of the Sith.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01015_.mp3: I appreciate your... feelings... for me. But you can't let your feelings override your judgment. Remember the Jedi code: There is no emotion, there is peace.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01016_.mp3: Your efforts were well intentioned but poorly thought out; Saul tortured us all anyway. There is too much at stake to let reckless passion rule our actions.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01018_.mp3: I know if I had been in that position I would not have betrayed the Order and the Republic!
Bastilla.nm40aabast01024_.mp3: I appreciate your... feelings... for Carth. But you can't let your feelings override your judgment. Remember the Jedi code: There is no emotion, there is peace.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01028_.mp3: Did you feel that? A disturbance in the Force. The Admiral has sent his message, the Dark Lord knows we are here now. Malak is coming.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01036_.mp3: Your attitude disturbs me. Such selfishness is a sign of the dark side's taint, and it does little to fill me with confidence in you.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01038_.mp3: It is fortunate you were able to resist the Admiral's questioning. The fate of the galaxy could be changed by revealing the slightest piece of vital information.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01039_.mp3: I have to confess something. There was a moment - just a moment - when part of me was hoping you would tell him what he wanted to know. Just to make the horrible pain stop.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01041_.mp3: I know you wouldn't ever do anything to intentionally cause me pain. But you did the right thing.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01042_.mp3: I don't honestly know if I could have been as strong in your position. To watch you suffer like that... it might have been too much for me to bear.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01045_.mp3: You wanted me to suffer? You enjoyed my torment? I don't know what to say. I thought there was a bond between us.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01046_.mp3: Maybe... maybe you're not the man I thought you were.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01058_.mp3: This is not a matter to joke about! If there is one thing we can learn from Saul it is how the power of the dark side can corrupt even the bravest of heroes!
Bastilla.nm40aabast01059_.mp3: I'm sorry. Forgive me. Snapping at you like that won't help our situation.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01063_.mp3: We better get moving. I can feel the darkness of Malak's presence approaching, and I don't want to be here when he arrives. None of us is a match for the Sith Lord.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01065_.mp3: Then you are a fool! The power of the Dark Lord is strong enough to destroy any of us... even you. It would be suicide to face Malak here! We need to get away before he arrives.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01067_.mp3: Surprise and secrecy will serve us best. A small group might have a better chance of sneaking onto the bridge undetected while the others make their way down to the Ebon Hawk.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01070_.mp3: That's a good idea. The others can get to the Ebon Hawk on their own, but Carth and I might need your help.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01071_.mp3: The three of us will get our equipment and make our way to the bridge. The rest of you head down to the docking hangar where they've got the Ebon Hawk. You'll have to find a way to deal with guards.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01073_.mp3: We'll meet you there as soon as we get those docking bay doors open. Just make sure the Hawk is ready to fly when we get there. And may the Force be with you.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01075_.mp3: That's true, Carth. You can come, but don't let your hatred of Saul Karath jeopardize our true mission: getting the Ebon Hawk safely off the Leviathan.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01077_.mp3: You better come with me and Carth. The others can find their way on their own, but we might run into trouble. We'll need you and your powerful Force abilities to deal with it.
Bastilla.nm40aabast01079_.mp3: Well done, Jolee. I knew we could count on you. A Jedi never fails to get the task done!
Bastilla.nm40aabast01081_.mp3: Well done, Juhani. In freeing us from the cell you have proven yourself truly worthy of the title of Jedi.
Bastilla.nm40aacart05007_.mp3: Talk of an escape is somewhat premature, don't you think? We don't even have a plan to get out of this mess yet!
Bastilla.nm40aacart05011_.mp3: Maybe Admiral Karath doesn't know how many of us there are on board. We all have special talents; talents we could exploit so that one of us could stage a rescue.
Bastilla.nm40aacart05013_.mp3: We just have to figure out who has the best chance to avoid capture so that they can come and rescue us later. It's a long shot, but it's our only hope.
Bastilla.nm40aacart05015_.mp3: The admiral will be watching the three of us far too closely for any plot involving you, me or Carth to succeed. It's going to be up to one of the others to get us out of this.
Bastilla.nm40aacart05082_.mp3: Is that wise? We need someone inconspicuous for this task, and Wookiees tend to draw a lot of attention... especially from arresting troops. Maybe you should go with someone else.
Bastilla.nm40aacart05084_.mp3: That is not the way of the Jedi. Vengeance, anger, emotion: these things lead to the dark side!
Bastilla.nm40aasaul10016_.mp3: We will never serve Malak or the dark side! The Sith will be destroyed, Admiral Karath... as will you if you don't turn away from this path.
Bastilla.nm40aasaul10033_.mp3: Don't waste your breath, Saul! We won't answer any of your questions.
Bastilla.nm40aasaul10045_.mp3: My pain is meaningless. Tell him nothing!
Bastilla.nm40aasaul10087_.mp3: NO! AHHH!! NO!! AUGH! The pain - THE PAIN! AHHHH!!! AUGH!
