Bastilla.nm40aasaul10113_.mp3: Why? Why are you telling him this?
Bastilla.nm40aasaul10117_.mp3: Words that betray the Jedi Order bring me more pain than any torture ever could!
Bastilla.nm40aasaul10126_.mp3: For the sake of the Republic don't tell him anything!
Bastilla.nm40aasaul10133_.mp3: No! How could you betray the Jedi like this?
Bastilla.nm40aasaul10161_.mp3: What are you saying? Physical pain is nothing compared to the suffering of the galaxy if Malak should defeat the Jedi!
Bastilla.nm40absaul09006_.mp3: He speaks the truth, Carth. I can feel the Dark Lord's presence approaching.
Bastilla.nm40absaul09022_.mp3: No, Carth, not like this! Do not give in to the hate.
Bastilla.nm40absaul09026_.mp3: Killing him won't ease the pain, Carth. Do not become what you despise.
Bastilla.nm40absaul09038_.mp3: Carth, it's not what you think. We had no other choice! Please, you don't understand...
Bastilla.nm40absaul09042_.mp3: Not here, Carth. Please... there's no time. Malak is coming. This isn't the place.
Bastilla.nm40absaul09044_.mp3: Please, Carth, I'm asking you to trust me. For just a little while longer.
Bastilla.nm40absaul09048_.mp3: Of course, Carth. As soon as we get to the Ebon Hawk I'll explain everything. To both of you. I promise.
Bastilla.nm40accart02004_.mp3: I'll hold Malak off. You two get out of here! Find the Star Forge!
Bastilla.nm40acdart03028_.mp3: It's true. I was part of the team sent to capture Revan... to capture you. When Malak fired on the ship you were badly injured. We thought you were dead.
Bastilla.nm40acdart03030_.mp3: Your mind was destroyed, but I used the Force to preserve the flicker of life in your body. I brought you to the Jedi Council. They were the ones who healed your damaged mind.
Bastilla.nm40acdart03034_.mp3: I wanted to tell you, but the Council forbid it! They were afraid you might return to the dark side if you discovered your real identity!
Bastilla.nm40acdart03038_.mp3: How can you say that? Malak nearly killed you, but the Jedi Council gave you another chance to live! They gave you a chance to redeem yourself by defeating the Sith!
Bastilla.nm40acdart03043_.mp3: The Jedi hold all life sacred, even that of a Sith Lord. I could not just let you die, Revan. Not if it was possible to save you.
Bastilla.nm40acdart03047_.mp3: We couldn't simply restore your true identity; Revan was too dangerous. But locked inside your mind was information the Republic needed: the secrets of the Star Forge.
Bastilla.nm40acdart03049_.mp3: The Council created an identity for you: a soldier under my command. Your subconscious memories were supposed to lead me to the Star Forge; there was no other way to get the information.
Bastilla.nm40acdart03053_.mp3: When I used my Force powers to keep you alive on that bridge it created our bond. I convinced the Council that I could use that bond to draw out your memories and lead us to the Star Forge.
Bastilla.nm40acdart03057_.mp3: NO! I wanted to help you, Revan. I thought this mission would redeem you; that it would atone for your past crimes. How else could you be saved?
Bastilla.nm40acdart03059_.mp3: You had to be healed so I could try and draw out the secrets of the Star Forge - it was our only hope of stopping the Sith! It was a risk the Council chose to take.
Bastilla.nm40acdart03061_.mp3: That was a risk the Council chose to take. I had to try and draw out the secrets of the Star Forge. It was our only hope of stopping the Sith! There was no other choice.
Bastilla.nm40acdart03063_.mp3: I used my Force powers to heal you on that bridge; we share a bond. I convinced the Council I could use our bond to draw out your memories and lead us to the Star Forge.
Bastilla.nm40acdart03067_.mp3: NO! I... I wanted to help you, Revan. I thought this mission would redeem you, that it would atone for your past crimes. How else could you be saved?
Bastilla.nm41aabast01000_.mp3: Dantooine... it seems like a lifetime since I last set foot on her surface, though in truth it has only been a few months. We should be safe from Malak here... for now, at least.
Bastilla.nm41aabast01002_.mp3: Even the Sith would think twice before attacking Dantooine. There are many Jedi here, including several of the most powerful Masters of the Order. There is great strength within this place.
Bastilla.nm41aabast01004_.mp3: We can get supplies here and recuperate. The Academy is a place of mental and spiritual healing; something we could all use after what we've been through.
Bastilla.nm41aabast01006_.mp3: She will find a way to come to terms with her grief. She is stronger than she appears. We just need to give her time.
Bastilla.nm41aabast01007_.mp3: Now I must go speak with the Council. I need their advice on... recent developments. After I have met with them I will meet you outside the ship.
Bastilla.nm41aabast01009_.mp3: We can't just keep running; Malak will find us eventually. We need to regroup; we need a plan.
Bastilla.nm41aabast01010_.mp3: The Force has given us a... a vision. Like the one we shared on Dantooine. Did you see it? Of course... you must have. The Force is strong with us both.
Bastilla.nm41aabast01011_.mp3: There are some who believe Korriban is the birth place of the Sith... this planet is an evil place. There are secrets here best left uncovered.
Bastilla.nm41aabast01013_.mp3: During the vision I felt cold and trapped; almost as if I was buried alive. It felt... it felt like we were in some kind of tomb.
Bastilla.nm41aabast01014_.mp3: No doubt things will become more clear once we discover the Star Map's location.
Bastilla.nm41aabast01016_.mp3: You are right, of course. We cannot turn away from the path we have started on... no matter where it may lead.
Bastilla.nm41aabast01018_.mp3: The visions are as much yours as mine - and they are the key to finding the Star Forge and stopping Malak!
Bastilla.nm41aabast01019_.mp3: Kashyyyk is a lush but simple and undeveloped world. I would not have expected to find the alien technology of a Star Map here.
Bastilla.nm41aabast01021_.mp3: The Wookiees of Kashyyyk make their home high among the Wroshyr branches; only their bravest warriors dare to descend into the forbidding depths of the forest.
Bastilla.nm41aabast01022_.mp3: If the Star Map is located far beneath us on the planet's surface, as our vision seems to suggest, it is unlikely the Wookiees even know of its existence.
Bastilla.nm41aabast01024_.mp3: Tatooine is known for little but blowing sand. I find it surprising that there would be a Star Map somewhere in its desolate wastes.
Bastilla.nm41aabast01026_.mp3: The Star Map would likely have to be within some kind of shelter to protect it against dust and sandstorms.
Bastilla.nm41aabast01027_.mp3: I suspect there are many such caves and caverns hidden in the sands of the Dune Sea. The creatures of this world probably use them as their lairs.
Bastilla.nm41aabast01029_.mp3: Perhaps, though that would have been tens of thousands of years in the past. Now there is nothing but the howling emptiness of the Dune Sea.
Bastilla.nm41aabast01030_.mp3: It is strange that anyone would have built a Star Map here; the entire surface of Manaan is covered by nothing but vast oceans.
Bastilla.nm41aabast01032_.mp3: The ocean floor is vast and much of it is uncharted, even by the native Selkath. But how could Revan and Malak have found their way down?
Bastilla.nm41aabast01034_.mp3: It is possible. The melting of polar caps or a cataclysmic earthquake could have buried the land beneath the waves eons ago. Records from that time are incomplete.
Bastilla.nm41aabast01035_.mp3: Another vision. The Force is guiding us, helping us retrace the steps of Malak and his old Master. Leading us ever closer to the Star Forge.
Bastilla.nm41aabast01036_.mp3: You felt it, yes? Another vision? The Force continues to work through us; showing us the Star Maps unearthed by Revan and Malak.
Bastilla.nm41aacart03061_.mp3: The Jedi Council has failed, Carth - Darth Revan has been reborn! Together we will destroy Malak and seize control of his fleet, then use it to crush the Republic!
Bastilla.nm41aacart03062_.mp3: Juhani and Jolee would not swear loyalty to the new ruler of the Sith. They died for their foolishness. Now swear loyalty to Darth Revan, or face your own death!
Bastilla.nm41aacart03068_.mp3: My, my. I think the sad fool may actually be in love with you, Revan.
Bastilla.nm41aacart03080_.mp3: Wait, Lord Revan. Carth speaks only for himself - he does not speak for the others. He may find he stands alone here!
Bastilla.nm41aacart03081_.mp3: The droids will continue to serve you Revan - they are programmed to obey their master. And there may be others who will choose to join us.
Bastilla.nm41aacart03082_.mp3: The Republic is doomed, Revan has returned! Who will now swear loyalty to the second coming of the Dark Lord?
Bastilla.nm41aacart03096_.mp3: Let him go! We have more important things to worry about. We have to get to the Star Forge and kill Malak. Then we can turn our attention to the Republic.
Bastilla.nm41aacart03106_.mp3: Jolee would not swear loyalty to the new ruler of the Sith. He died for his foolishness. Now swear loyalty to Darth Revan, or face your own death!
Bastilla.nm41aacart04061_.mp3: The Jedi Council has failed, Carth - Darth Revan has been reborn! Together we will destroy Malak and seize control of his fleet, then use it to crush the Republic!
Bastilla.nm41aacart04062_.mp3: Juhani and Jolee would not swear loyalty to the new ruler of the Sith. They died for their foolishness. Now swear loyalty to Darth Revan, or face your own death!
Bastilla.nm41aacart04080_.mp3: Wait, Lord Revan. Carth speaks only for himself - he does not speak for the others. He may find he stands alone here!
Bastilla.nm41aacart04081_.mp3: The droids will continue to serve you Revan - they are programmed to obey their master. And there may be others who will choose to join us.
Bastilla.nm41aacart04082_.mp3: The Republic is doomed, Revan has returned! Who will now swear loyalty to the second coming of the Dark Lord?
Bastilla.nm41aacart04097_.mp3: Let him go! We have more important things to worry about. We have to get to the Star Forge and kill Malak. Then we can turn our attention to the Republic.
Bastilla.nm41aamiss04027_.mp3: Well done, Lord Revan. You are as ruthless as Malak ever was! Quickly, now. We have to get to the Star Forge and destroy the Usurper!
Bastilla.nm44aac02001005_.mp3: I'll never fall to the dark side!
Bastilla.nm44aac02001015_.mp3: You think torture will turn me, Malak? You are a fool.
Bastilla.nm44acc01001000_.mp3: Malak is dead - all hail the return of Darth Revan, the true Lord of the Sith!
Bastilla.nm44acc01001001_.mp3: The Sith bow before you, you have reclaimed your rightful throne! The Jedi Order is in tatters, ## it is only a matter of time until your Sith minions wipe them from the face of the galaxy. ## The Republic fleet is decimated, the Core Worlds are defenseless against us!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01001_.mp3: Revan - I knew you'd come for me. Malak thought you might be afraid to enter the Temple again, but he doesn't know you like I do. Not anymore. Not since you've changed.
Bastilla.nm44acevil01003_.mp3: Escape? You don't understand. I have sworn allegiance to Lord Malak and the Sith; I am no longer a pawn of the Jedi Council.
Bastilla.nm44acevil01005_.mp3: You say that as if the dark side is some terrible entity. The Jedi Council has brainwashed you like all the others. Like they once did with me.
Bastilla.nm44acevil01006_.mp3: They speak of the dark side as if it something to be feared. But in reality their only goal is to manipulate those who are strong in the Force. The fear of the dark side is a tool to maintain control.
Bastilla.nm44acevil01007_.mp3: Why do you think the Jedi forbid you and Malak from joining the Mandalorian Wars? They knew you would realize your true potential and break free of their domination.
Bastilla.nm44acevil01008_.mp3: Malak has shown me how the Jedi Council have been using me the same way they once tried to use you. They've been holding me back because they knew one day I would surpass them all.
Bastilla.nm44acevil01012_.mp3: I resisted at first. I endured the Sith torments with the passionless serenity of a true Jedi, emptying my mind. But after a week of endless tortures I finally saw the truth.
Bastilla.nm44acevil01013_.mp3: Malak forced me to acknowledge my anger and pain. He showed me the liberating power of these emotions. Then he made me see how the Jedi Council has denied me what is mine by right!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01014_.mp3: The Jedi Council gladly used my Battle Meditation in their wars, but they still treated me like a child - like an inferior. They were jealous of my power... of what I could become!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01015_.mp3: They wanted me to bow and call them Master and follow their Code and obey their every order. But all the while they were exploiting my Battle Meditation for their own use!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01017_.mp3: You are a sad little fool. You speak as if I were the same Bastila that you've known all along. But freed from the control of the Jedi Council I've become much, much more.
Bastilla.nm44acevil01018_.mp3: I almost wish you could see things as I do now. I wish you could join me and taste true power once again. Sadly, I doubt you are even capable any longer.
Bastilla.nm44acevil01020_.mp3: You think so, do you? You style yourself the Master of the Sith that you once were? To think I once envied you your passion, your power.
Bastilla.nm44acevil01022_.mp3: Lies? You are the one living a lie, Revan. The Jedi Council made you into something you are not; they programmed you to be their slave.
Bastilla.nm44acevil01024_.mp3: You used to be Revan, Master of the Sith, but no longer. You are simply a pawn of the Jedi Council and the Republic they serve... like I was until Malak freed me from their shackles!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01026_.mp3: A pity the power you once had is so diluted in you. You could have been strong as I am now... stronger, even. But that will never happen, now.
Bastilla.nm44acevil01027_.mp3: With the power of the Star Forge Malak will destroy the Republic and conquer the galaxy. And I will be the apprentice at his side - after I prove my worth by killing you!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01029_.mp3: Surely you know what I mean, Revan. Look at what the Council did to you; they turned you into their puppet. The same thing they do to all who are truly strong in the Force.
Bastilla.nm44acevil01031_.mp3: You are stronger than I would have thought possible, after what the Jedi Council did to you. Seems that Malak was wrong - the power of the dark side is not lost to you after all, Revan.
Bastilla.nm44acevil01033_.mp3: You can deny what you are, Revan, but you are only fooling yourself. I know the truth. I have seen the shadows inside your mind.
Bastilla.nm44acevil01034_.mp3: Remember: I was there when you nearly died in the trap set by the Jedi Council. I used the Force to preserve your life, Revan. We are forever linked by my actions on that bridge!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01036_.mp3: These are not your true feelings, Revan. You are speaking as a tool of the Jedi Council - as I once did. But now I see how the Jedi used us both!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01037_.mp3: The Council tried to exploit the bond between us. They hoped I would draw out your memories to lead them to the Star Forge. We were slaves to their will - like all who follow the Jedi Code!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01038_.mp3: But in our shared visions of the Star Maps I also felt the so called taint within you. I resisted it at first, but now I embrace the power of the dark side - your dark side!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01040_.mp3: Mistakes? No, Revan - the only mistake you are making is the one you are making now! You deny yourself the power that is yours by right! Only now do I realize how strong you are.
Bastilla.nm44acevil01041_.mp3: You deserve to be the true Master of the Sith, not Malak. I see this now. Together we can destroy your old apprentice. Join with me and reclaim your lost identity!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01043_.mp3: Your mind was too badly damaged to ever fully restore your memories, Revan. But your power, your strength of will, the essence of who and what you are: these things still remain!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01044_.mp3: Once long ago you defied the Jedi Council, freeing yourself from their control. You claimed your rightful title of Dark Lord of the Sith. Together we can defeat Malak and take back what is yours!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01046_.mp3: I... I don't. The only Revan I could respect is one who would break free of the Council's slavery. One who would grasp the power that lies before him... not the weak fool I see.
Bastilla.nm44acevil01049_.mp3: You are beneath my contempt, Juhani. When you felt the power of the dark side you fled to a cave like some cowering animal! You know nothing of the Force or its true potential!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01050_.mp3: But you, Revan - the power of the dark side is yours to command! You can use it to destroy Malak! With my help you could rule over the entire galaxy!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01054_.mp3: You are beneath my contempt, old man! You hid like a coward for decades on Kashyyyk! You know nothing about the true potential of the Force!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01057_.mp3: Shut up, old man. Your time is over! The age of the Jedi and the Republic is no more! This is the age of Darth Revan and the Sith!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01061_.mp3: Kill her! Rend her flesh! Show her the fate of all who dare stand against us! Embrace the power of the dark side!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01065_.mp3: Kill him! Grind his old bones to dust! Show him the fate of all who dare stand against us! Embrace the dark side!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01067_.mp3: Yes! The sacrificial blood will consecrate this ancient temple in the name of the Sith! With the death of the Jedi the rebirth of Darth Revan will be complete!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01070_.mp3: Shut up, Juhani! You know nothing of the dark side's true potential! When you felt its touch you fled to a cave and cowered in terror!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01073_.mp3: I need deny my passions no longer, Revan. I would stand by your side gladly, as your lover and apprentice!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01074_.mp3: I swore allegiance to Malak only because I thought you had lost the power you had once wielded. But this... this would be much better.
Bastilla.nm44acevil01075_.mp3: I would be utterly yours, master! Together we would destroy Malak and you would reclaim the mantle of Dark Lord!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01077_.mp3: It is your power that will keep me as your loyal apprentice, Revan. I swore allegiance to Malak only because I thought you had lost the power you once wielded.
Bastilla.nm44acevil01078_.mp3: But you have proven yourself in our battle; I see you possess the strength to destroy Malak and reclaim the mantle of Dark Lord. Now I see you will make a worthy Sith Master.
Bastilla.nm44acevil01081_.mp3: You are a pathetic fool, Revan! Together we could have defeated Malak and ruled over an Empire, but now I will be at Lord Malak's side instead!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01082_.mp3: You will be crushed with the Republic and all the fools who bow down to the Jedi Council! No one can stand against the power of the Star Forge and the Sith fleet!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01086_.mp3: Of course not! I have been reborn in the wake of destiny... *your* destiny! The power of the dark side is yours by right!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01091_.mp3: Our bond is not easily broken, Revan. Even when your mind was destroyed and reprogrammed with a new identity the bond between us endured.
Bastilla.nm44acevil01093_.mp3: Do not mistake the power of the Force for love, Revan. It does not exist. Power is what forged our bond, and power is what made us both tools of the Jedi Council!
Bastilla.nm44acevil01096_.mp3: Yes, Revan! I was there when you almost died in the trap set by the Jedi Council; I used the Force to preserve your life. We are forever linked by my actions on that bridge.
Bastilla.nm44acevil01097_.mp3: The Council tried to exploit our bond. They hoped your memories would lead me to the Star Forge. But in our shared visions of the Star Maps I also tasted the power of the taint within you!
Bastilla.nm44acexit03000_.mp3: You will have to disable the energy shield around this temple before we can leave. There is a computer here on the Temple summit that has access to the power generators.
Bastilla.nm44acexit03001_.mp3: You can also use it to disable the disruptor field that protects the Star Forge. Otherwise, the Ebon Hawk will not be able to leave the planet without crashing.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01000_.mp3: The fool is dead. Now there is nothing in the way of your victory!
Bastilla.nm45aabast01002_.mp3: The Republic knocked out the Star Forge generators! This factory is doomed! It's falling from orbit!
Bastilla.nm45aabast01003_.mp3: Quickly! we have to get to the Ebon Hawk before this whole complex plunges into the heart of the sun!
Bastilla.nm45aabast01006_.mp3: Sadly, I know this is true. Had you reclaimed the power of your previous identity I would be your apprentice, not Malak's. But you rejected the dark side.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01007_.mp3: Now you must pay the price. Here on the Star Forge the power of the dark side is at its strongest. This time you will not defeat me!
Bastilla.nm45aabast01009_.mp3: You are wasting your time. I have seen the Jedi for what they are: weak and afraid. The Sith are the true Masters of the Force. You have forgotten that lesson, Revan.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01011_.mp3: I have no doubt of that. I was no match for you in the Temple, but when I fled I knew you would follow me here.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01012_.mp3: I see now why Malak followed you. Even though you are only a shell of your former self, you are still a formidable opponent.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01013_.mp3: I can't even imagine the power you must have wielded when you were the Dark Lord. You were a fool to give it all up and follow the light side.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01015_.mp3: The dark side has made me stronger than I ever was before! I have a greater command of the Force than all but the most powerful Jedi Masters.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01016_.mp3: As Malak teaches me the greatest secrets of the Sith, I will unlock more of my potential. Eventually there will be no limit to what I can accomplish with the Force!
Bastilla.nm45aabast01018_.mp3: Have you forgotten the ways of the Sith already, Revan? Eventually I will challenge my Master. If I am worthy he will die by my hand and I will become the new Sith Master.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01019_.mp3: Then I will take on my own apprentice and the cycle will begin again. This is the way of the Sith, it is how we assure our leaders are always the strongest and most worthy!
Bastilla.nm45aabast01021_.mp3: No, Revan, it is you who are doomed!
Bastilla.nm45aabast01023_.mp3: Jedi propaganda. The dark side is only a tool, and Malak will train me in its use. Eventually I will surpass my Master and challenge him. If I am worthy he will die by my hand.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01025_.mp3: No, Revan. You are the one who will die here!
Bastilla.nm45aabast01028_.mp3: Then it's time for you to prove it!
Bastilla.nm45aabast01029_.mp3: You are growing weary, I can sense it! Your strength falters, the light side is failing you while the power of the Star Forge re-energizes me! Soon this will all be over!
Bastilla.nm45aabast01031_.mp3: The dark side will always triumph over the light! Malak has assured me of victory! You can't defeat me here on the Star Forge! YOU CAN'T!
Bastilla.nm45aabast01033_.mp3: You dare spew those Jedi lies in my face? You will die screaming, Revan!
Bastilla.nm45aabast01036_.mp3: What type of trick is this?
Bastilla.nm45aabast01039_.mp3: I am a Sith apprentice now. You place too much faith in what I used to be... and for that you shall pay!
Bastilla.nm45aabast01041_.mp3: No, this is not possible! You have rejected the dark side, you are a weak and pathetic servant of the light! How can you still stand against me? Why can't I defeat you?
Bastilla.nm45aabast01044_.mp3: Yes, I see you speak the truth. I am no match for you. Please, for the sake of what we once shared, do not make me suffer. End my life quickly. There is no other way.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01047_.mp3: What other choice do you have? I have fallen to the dark side, I am the apprentice to the Dark Lord himself. You cannot let me live.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01049_.mp3: No... I'm not strong enough. There is too much anger inside me now. Too much hatred and fear. I can no longer find peace in the Force.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01051_.mp3: [Success] You... always had more strength than I did. I told you that. I felt so... helpless before your destiny.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01052_.mp3: You were Revan and I couldn't tell you... it was agonizing! Even worse when I began to... feel closer to you. I despised myself for it.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01053_.mp3: And even now I... feel your strength. It... does help me. Thank you, I think I can face the end, now. If you are the one to end it for me.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01054_.mp3: [Failure!] No! That bond is what took me down this path to begin with! It poisoned me... I hated myself for loving you and now I have betrayed everything!
Bastilla.nm45aabast01056_.mp3: [Success] I doubt mere words can help me now, but to appease you I will recite them:
Bastilla.nm45aabast01057_.mp3: There is no emotion: there is peace. There is no ignorance: there is knowledge. There is no passion: there is serenity. There is no chaos: there is harmony...
Bastilla.nm45aabast01058_.mp3: Strange, but even now I find comfort in these words. I... suppose old habits die hard.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01059_.mp3: There is no death: there is the Force. Thank you, Revan. I am ready to face my fate now.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01061_.mp3: [Success] I... I know a flicker of the light still burns within me. Malak felt it too. He knew it could only be extinguished if I killed you.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01062_.mp3: But what good is a single flicker of light against the sea of darkness I am drowning in? I can never atone for my betrayal.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01063_.mp3: [Failure] There is nothing in my heart but the blackness of the dark side! I am sick of your preaching, Revan!
Bastilla.nm45aabast01065_.mp3: Yes, I... could join you in your battle against the Dark Lord. That alone would not make up for all I have done, yet... it would be a step in the right direction.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01066_.mp3: But how would you be able to trust me? How do you know I wouldn't turn on you when you faced Darth Malak? How do you know the dark side wouldn't make me betray you again?
Bastilla.nm45aabast01068_.mp3: You play a dangerous game. Are you certain you wish to take this risk? I could end your life and gain Malak's favor with a single stroke of my lightsaber.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01071_.mp3: You are brave... and some would say foolish. But you are also right. The dark side has not wholly consumed me. I cannot raise my blade against you.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01072_.mp3: You will go on to defeat Malak, of this I have little doubt. You will have gone from being the Sith Lord, himself, to the savior of our galaxy.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01073_.mp3: And... and you said you loved me. This may not be the best time to say it, but...
Bastilla.nm45aabast01074_.mp3: I love you, too. With all my heart.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01076_.mp3: After this? No, nothing could make me feel safer than to be loved by you.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01077_.mp3: I... I must know something, first, before that happens. I must ask you something.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01078_.mp3: Will there be a place for me in your future? Do you... do you love me?
Bastilla.nm45aabast01082_.mp3: I see. Thank you for your honesty. It's probably for the best that it goes no further. You saved me and I will always be grateful.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01083_.mp3: You should go. Malak awaits. This isn't over, yet... for any of us.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01084_.mp3: I should stay here, though. If we face Malak I am afraid his dark presence will overwhelm me. It would not be wise to expose myself to such temptation.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01086_.mp3: I'm sorry, but the risk is too great. I am not wholly free of the dark side's shadow. Not yet. But you are more than a match for the Dark Lord. I understand that now.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01088_.mp3: Yes, that would be for the best. You don't need me to defeat Malak, anyway. Now I understand that a true Jedi is a match for any Sith. Even the Dark Lord himself.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01089_.mp3: You are brave... and foolish. The dark side has wholly consumed me, and you will suffer for failing to see that!
Bastilla.nm45aabast01091_.mp3: A wise decision. You cannot trust me, and you cannot bring yourself to execute me. I see now there is only one way this can end. The time for words is done! Defend yourself!
Bastilla.nm45aabast01092_.mp3: [Failure] The Jedi code is nothing but words, the babblings of senile old Masters! The code cannot help me now!
Bastilla.nm45aabast01093_.mp3: I ask you for an honorable death, but you are too weak to even grant me that! No more words! This must end with blood!
Bastilla.nm45aabast01097_.mp3: You were a special case. The Council had no other choice. They needed you alive so they could discover the location of the Star Forge. It was an act of desperation.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01098_.mp3: It was my responsibility to watch over you, to make sure you did not slip back into your evil ways. I was supposed to protect you from the dark side.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01100_.mp3: But at what cost? In protecting you, I fell to the dark side myself. Is that the price of a Jedi's redemption? Must another of the Order fall to save me?
Bastilla.nm45aabast01101_.mp3: I cannot allow that to happen. Please, this is too painful. Strike me down. End this now, quickly. There is no other way.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01103_.mp3: I... I suppose you are right. Yet the path I have chosen is that of the dark side. I don't see any way I could atone for what I have done. I deserve to die.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01105_.mp3: It's true I possess... feelings for you. But was it only an illusion brought about by our bond? And what was the cost?
Bastilla.nm45aabast01106_.mp3: Please... this is too painful. End it now, quickly. There is no other way.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01108_.mp3: [Success] You... love me? Heh. I... there was a time I yearned for and yet dreaded to hear those words. I loved you, too, but I could never... face who you were.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01109_.mp3: Malak knew how I felt. Any part of the light that was within me would be extinguished when I killed you.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01110_.mp3: But what good is love? It cannot save me from the sea of blackness I am drowning in. I have betrayed everything I ever believed in! How can I atone for that?
Bastilla.nm45aabast01114_.mp3: I will stay here in this chamber and use my Battle Meditation to aid the Republic fleet. I am their only hope of destroying the Star Forge and ending the Sith menace.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01115_.mp3: You must go and face Malak, but you have to hurry. Once I turn the battle in the Republic's favor we won't have much time to escape the Star Forge before it is destroyed.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01116_.mp3: Good luck, my love... and may the Force be with you.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01117_.mp3: Good luck... and may the Force be with you.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01165_.mp3: Revan - I knew you'd come for me.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01166_.mp3: The Star Forge is under assault from the entire Republic fleet! If I don't use my Battle Meditation to turn the tide, Admiral Dodonna's capital ships will destroy the Star Forge.
Bastilla.nm45aabast01167_.mp3: I have to stay here in the command center so that I can best use my Battle Meditation against our enemy. If I don't the Star Forge will be lost!
Bastilla.nm45aabast01168_.mp3: You must go to face Malak without me. Find him, kill him and reclaim the title of Dark Lord of the Sith!
Bastilla.nm45aabast06902_.mp3: With each passing moment your old apprentice becomes stronger, Master. We must act quickly to exact your vengeance. Malak will pay for stealing the mantle of Dark Lord from you!
Bastilla.nm45aacart02020_.mp3: I don't think anyone actually expected that he could be redeemed. I'm surprised you would even think of trying.
Bastilla.nm45aacart02024_.mp3: There's no time to celebrate just yet. I was able to use my Battle Meditation to allow the Republic to break through the Sith fleet. The capital ships are in bombardment range!
Bastilla.nm45aacart02039_.mp3: Carth. I knew I sensed your presence. I should have known you would find a way to meddle in this one last time!
Bastilla.nm45aacart02041_.mp3: You are a fool. Revan has already made her choice, and there is no turning back!
Bastilla.nm45aacart02042_.mp3: Don't listen to him, master! Let me strike him down! Seize your victory!!
Bastilla.nm45aacart02047_.mp3: Your words are meaningless. You have no idea of the power we now wield! Revan will rule the galaxy!!
Bastilla.nm45aacart02057_.mp3: No! I won't let you do this! Don't be a fool, Revan!!
Bastilla.nm45aacart02061_.mp3: No! No-ooo!! You can't do this! Not when we're so close!!
Bastilla.nm45aadrkj03001_.mp3: The only fools are those who still follow Malak. Open your eyes and see the true Lord of the Sith: Revan has returned!
Bastilla.nm45aajedi01003_.mp3: Excellent! The Jedi fools will provide a distraction to the Sith troops while we hunt down Malak!
Bastilla.nm45aajedi01006_.mp3: The Wookiee is weak; the strain of Mission's murder was too much for him. His mind has snapped!
Bastilla.nm45aajedi01007_.mp3: Excellent! The Jedi fools will provide a distraction to the Sith troops while we hunt down Malak!
Bastilla.nm45aaligh01000_.mp3: Master, why have you summoned me? Without my Battle Meditation there is a chance the Republic capital ships could break through and attack the Star Forge itself!
Bastilla.nm45aaligh01008_.mp3: Of course, Master. I will not fail you again.

BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01000_.mp3: You're back, I see. And Bastila isn't even with you.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01002_.mp3: I suppose she's too busy to even help her own mother, correct? Nothing more than I would expect from her after all this time.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01004_.mp3: Go on, leave me be. I will find the holocron myself, if I have to.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01006_.mp3: Back already? Have you even looked for the holocron, yet?
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01010_.mp3: And why not? Would you deny me even that?
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01018_.mp3: Fool girl! You have a strange way of remembering things. That wasn't --
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01024_.mp3: Is it too difficult to believe that I am a dying woman who simply wishes to see her husband one last time?
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01030_.mp3: I was hard on you, dear. I wasn't a very good mother to you, I know that.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01032_.mp3: Your father loved you so. He wanted you to be just like him... he wanted to take you on his hunts, but I said they were too dangerous.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01034_.mp3: I always tried to keep him from the dangerous ones, but he would have none of it. It was a reckless life we led, always moving... I didn't want that for you.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01038_.mp3: What do your father and I have to show for all those years of hunting? Nothing. That was no life for anyone, especially not someone as gifted as you.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01040_.mp3: Your father... he spent all his last years trying to pay for my treatments. That's why he went for the pearls. I begged him not to, but...
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01044_.mp3: I'm dying, Bastila. I did not lie about that. It's been a long time in the coming, and there's really nothing that can be done anymore.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01046_.mp3: I told your father to let me go, but you know how he was. Stubborn. Like you.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01054_.mp3: Well, now. You said you had important business, and you were never one to mince words. You there... you take care of my daughter, you hear me?
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01056_.mp3: That's good. I'll feel a lot better knowing there's someone to watch her.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01060_.mp3: *sigh* Alright, I will. Now you do what you have to, Bastila. You go make your father and I proud.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01065_.mp3: So could her father. That doesn't mean she doesn't need help now and again.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01068_.mp3: You make her let you. She's too much like her father in that respect.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01071_.mp3: So you're not. I'd feel better knowing that someone was there to watch over her, however. I wasn't.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01079_.mp3: So that's the way it is, is it? All that Jedi training and you haven't learned a thing.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01083_.mp3: How can you learn anything when you hear only what you want to hear? Well, go on, then. Keep the holocron. It was for you, anyhow.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01085_.mp3: I'll just go off and die peacefully and you needn't bother with me anymore. That's obviously what's best.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01089_.mp3: Hmph. It may as well be with one of us.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01093_.mp3: Then what are you waiting for? Go, find it!
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01095_.mp3: Yes? I'm sorry, do I know you?
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01097_.mp3: You know my daughter? Where is she?
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01099_.mp3: Is that so? Has she said this, herself? Tell her it is quite urgent that I speak with her at once. She has been most difficult to find.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01101_.mp3: I most certainly will not. What I have to say is for Bastila alone. It is... family business. That should be enough for her to come.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01104_.mp3: I don't see why Bastila should be telling anything to a stranger about family business. Simply tell her to come and that should be enough.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01107_.mp3: See that you do. If Bastila is here, I can't see why she didn't come herself.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01110_.mp3: I'm sure there are plenty of other strangers about for you to harass with questions. Why don't you select one of them?
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01112_.mp3: Thank you. I would rather be alone.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01115_.mp3: Good. I thought you were perhaps one of those collectors from the Exchange. Since you're not, I doubt we have any business. Good day.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01117_.mp3: Yes, I'm sorry, do I know you?
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01121_.mp3: What do you expect, when I haven't so much as had a picture of you since you left? Do you know how long I've been trying to find you?
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01125_.mp3: Then you haven't heard. I should have known.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01129_.mp3: Your Father is dead, Bastila. That is part of the reason why I was looking for you.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01133_.mp3: Isn't this a lovely reunion? Already she is flinging insults at me. Tell me... you're one of her friends. Do you treat your mother this way?
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01135_.mp3: Is that so? Well, I'll be joining her soon enough, I suppose.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01139_.mp3: Such sweet things you say. *sigh* Perhaps I should tell you everything, first, before we start arguing again.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01143_.mp3: I hadn't realized Jedi were so spiteful. You want me to tell you I brought your father here for an expedition, do you? You want to blame me for his death?
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01145_.mp3: You never accepted that your father loved going on his treasure hunts, leaving you alone with me. I was always to blame for everything, what else is new?
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01147_.mp3: So yes, fine. I brought your father here to look for krayt dragon pearls. He took an expedition into the Tatooine desert and he died.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01151_.mp3: Do you think I would look for you if I wasn't sure? They were attacked by a krayt dragon and one of the guides fled the battle. He saw your father killed.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01155_.mp3: Don't be insulting. I want you to use those senses of yours. I want you to find him. I want you to bring back his holocron.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01159_.mp3: Is it too much to ask that I have something to remember your father by? Of course it is, isn't it? You couldn't be bothered.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01163_.mp3: As my daughter is quick to point out, I haven't the coin to hire another expedition. Nor am I the adventurer my husband was.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01175_.mp3: I believe your father was headed north towards the Sand People enclave. I would check along that route, dear. Do please hurry.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01178_.mp3: I'm sure Bastila feels the same way you do. She would prefer to be left out of it, at least until I'm as dead as her father is.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01181_.mp3: I see Bastila seeks out friends that are as selfish as she is. This is how you treat a dying woman?
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01184_.mp3: It doesn't matter, dear. Don't you worry about me.
BastillasMom.nm17afhhel01186_.mp3: But I already told you there's nothing that can --

Bindo.nglobebant00092_.mp3: Yep, I figured it was only a matter of time until we had the whole "come back to the Order" discussion. Well, I guess there's no avoiding it now, so let's get it over with.
Bindo.nglobebant00094_.mp3: Well, I've managed to avoid it the last 20 years or so. Besides, light side, dark side: they don't mean the same to me as they do to you. I don't see in absolutes.
Bindo.nglobebant00097_.mp3: I want to stop Malak as much as anyone. But I don't have to join the Order to do it. Look at Carth, or Canderous. They're with us in this quest, but they aren't Jedi.
Bindo.nglobebant00098_.mp3: The capacity for good or evil, like the Force itself, is in all living creatures. And belonging to the Jedi Order, or the Sith, or any group, won't change what you are at your core.
Bindo.nglobebant00100_.mp3: Yeah, I'm old and stubborn. But I appreciate the effort. But from now on you can just think of me as any other non-Jedi in our little group - with a lightsaber. And Force powers.
Bindo.nglobebant00103_.mp3: Yeah, that's right, sonny. The Sith are the greatest evil to hit the galaxy since, well, the Mandalorians. And they're the worst thing since Exar Kun. Blah, blah, blah, etcetera, etcetera, etcetera.
Bindo.nglobebant00105_.mp3: Look, everybody always figures the time they live in is the most epic, most important age to end all ages. But tyrants and heroes rise and fall, and historians sort out the pieces.
Bindo.nglobebant00107_.mp3: Malak is a tyrant who should be stopped. If he conquers the galaxy we're in for a couple of rough centuries. Eventually it'll come around again, but I'd rather not wait that long.
Bindo.nglobebant00108_.mp3: So we do what we have to do, and we try to stop the Sith. But don't start thinking this war - your war - is more important than any other war just because you're in it.
Bindo.nglobebant00110_.mp3: You believe whatever you need to to get you through this, sonny. The bottom line is we both want to stop Malak, so let's not get hung up on the details. Let's just get back to stopping him.
Bindo.nglobedavi05002_.mp3: Well, I'll be a Wookiee's uncle. Davin! Davin Kotras!
Bindo.nglobedavi05010_.mp3: You're too kind. Not the young lad anymore yourself, I see.
Bindo.nglobedavi05012_.mp3: Yes, yes, right you are. Sorry, Davin, but duty calls. Maybe I'll run into you again soon.
Bindo.nglobedavi05016_.mp3: What, are you deaf? His name's Davin. Old friend from my wanderer days. By the by, Davin, I really should be running off...
Bindo.nglobedavi05020_.mp3: No. Why? What's there to hear?
Bindo.nglobedavi05030_.mp3: Perhaps I will at that. It's up to my old friend, here, actually. I'm just tagging along.
Bindo.nglobedavi05032_.mp3: I'd appreciate that. Sunry's an old friend... I'd hate to see him hurt.
Bindo.nglobedavi05036_.mp3: I will. Be safe, old friend.
Bindo.nglobedavi05039_.mp3: I was expecting that. Still... if we get the chance, I'd be grateful. Sunry's an old friend... I'd hate to see him hurt.
Bindo.nglobedavi05042_.mp3: Perhaps I will at that. It's up to my friend, here, actually. I'm just tagging along.
Bindo.nglobejole09742_.mp3: Nope. Never was. Technically I never rose above the rank of Padawan, for various reasons. Does that surprise you?
Bindo.nglobejole09744_.mp3: Heh. I suppose I'm not prone to live my life like most of the Jedi Masters do, that's true. My opinions on love are no different.
Bindo.nglobejole09746_.mp3: In my case, becoming a Jedi would have been a formality. I doubt the order and I would have gotten along well, considering my opinions on things such as love.
Bindo.nglobejole09748_.mp3: No I didn't. I may never have become a Jedi technically, but I'm an old Padawan with a lifetime of experience. That applies both to the Force as well as topics like love.
Bindo.nglobejole09749_.mp3: I was an experienced Padawan, surely... but not yet ready to be a full Jedi and certainly not ready to train another. Especially not one so old as my wife.
Bindo.nglobejole09750_.mp3: Not to mention that I had remained a Padawan throughout the war. A formality, perhaps, but with the trial it had to be decided if I was worthy to become a Jedi at all.
Bindo.nglobejole09751_.mp3: They said I had learned wisdom the hard way. For all I had done during the war, they wished to raise me to full Jedi status at long last.
Bindo.nglobejole09758_.mp3: *whisper* The Jedi Council wouldn't approve, but they always were a little stodgy about using the Force on people. Sometimes you gotta do what you gotta do.[R1]
Bindo.nglobejole09759_.mp3: I know I'm just an old codger, but in my time I've learned what goes around comes around. These things have a way of coming back to you in the end.
Bindo.nglobejole09760_.mp3: *whisper* Heh! Reminds me of my old smuggling days. Nothing better than the old Jedi mind trick for getting past an overly curious customs officer.
Bindo.nglobejole09762_.mp3: Nice. Real nice. Maybe later we could find some insects to pull the legs off, huh?
Bindo.nglobejole09763_.mp3: Hey, kid, that was a good thing you did there. Almost brought a tear to this old man's eye.
Bindo.nm03aecalo05031_.mp3: It's four against one, Calo. What do you think about those odds? Well? You have something more to say?
Bindo.nm12aastar03001_.mp3: I can feel the power of the dark side emanating from that space station. It almost feels like... like it's alive. That must be where Malak has taken Bastila.
Bindo.nm12aastar03005_.mp3: What was that? What's wrong? Did one of the Sith fighters hit us?
Bindo.nm17aa03sh01033_.mp3: *sigh* And how many more like you are there out there, with no one to buy their plates, I wonder?
Bindo.nm17aa03sh01065_.mp3: My, my. You should be proud of yourself, outwitting her like that.
Bindo.nm17aa03sh01159_.mp3: You've got a real mean streak, kid. You might want to work on that; nasty people tend to come to nasty ends.
Bindo.nm17aa11iz05082_.mp3: I'm thinking they're with the Sand People, who live in the south. Either that or I need my ears cleaned.
Bindo.nm17aa11iz05124_.mp3: That seems pretty convenient, but it won't hurt to look. We *are* going to look, right?
Bindo.nm17aaiziz99151_.mp3: Oh, I get it. He's small and helpless so we can just do whatever we want, right? Sometimes I just don't know about you, kid.
Bindo.nm17ac08yu02074_.mp3: You know, I may have been out of circulation for a while, but doesn't it seem likely to you that this friend of yours didn't own the droid?
Bindo.nm17ad03gu03038_.mp3: Ugh. Must we stand so close to them? I'd forgotten what Gamorreans smelled like.
Bindo.nm17ad03ta06006_.mp3: [Force Persuade] Just answer the lady's questions.
Bindo.nm17ad03ta06009_.mp3: I thought it obvious. Should he act like that after mentioning his wife? Greasy little wrench-rat. He asked for it.
Bindo.nm17ad03ta06011_.mp3: I have no doubt. I just don't like him. Mentions his wife and then acts like that.
Bindo.nm17ad03ta06013_.mp3: I only meant to help him clear his thoughts. He's confused if he'll mention a wife and then act like that... the greasy little scavenger.
Bindo.nm17ad03ta06041_.mp3: Hmph. Hunting a species to extinction. Now there's a logical way to make a living.
Bindo.nm17ae04ce02029_.mp3: And you're surprised that the boy doesn't want to sign?
Bindo.nm17ae04ce02057_.mp3: *ahem* Do as we say, scoundrel! You don't want to anger a shortempered Jedi!
Bindo.nm17ae04ce02086_.mp3: *ahem* Do as we say, scoundrel! You don't want to anger a shortempered Jedi!
Bindo.nm17ae04ce02105_.mp3: I bet you just can't understand why they wouldn't trust someone who's only in it for the money, too.
Bindo.nm17ae04ce02107_.mp3: You know, for a brute you say the sweetest things.
Bindo.nm17af07ja05016_.mp3: Seems fairly clear to me, though he doesn't seem used to people actually stopping to listen.
Bindo.nm17ag10cz01172_.mp3: *whisper* Nicely done, kid. Those extra credits could come in handy on our little search. Besides, it's not like Czerka Corp. can't afford it.
Bindo.nm18ab10ta05011_.mp3: Philandering ways coming back to haunt him, I'll wager.
Bindo.nm18ab10ta05024_.mp3: Maybe we could program them to tap-dance? I love a good tap-dance.
Bindo.nm18ackoma99136_.mp3: You keep turning on people like this, kid, and one day you just might find yourself without any help when you really need it.
Bindo.nm18acstar99005_.mp3: The Star Map is an artifact of the dark side. The krayt dragon may have been drawn here by its dark power, only to be enslaved by it.
Bindo.nm18acstar99006_.mp3: Well, no point hanging around here. Now that we've got the Star Map we might as well move on.
Bindo.nm18acstar99012_.mp3: Finding this Star Map here in this cave gives me a cold shiver. You don't think it's just coincidence that the krayt dragon made its home here, do you?
Bindo.nm22aajano06056_.mp3: [Force Persuade] Hmph. 'Harvesting'. Tell us about this agreement with the Wookiee leadership.
Bindo.nm22abchor02021_.mp3: Hmph! I merely have an appreciation for solitude.
Bindo.nm22abgorw08024_.mp3: That would be me. Jolee Bindo. Do I really look so different up close?
Bindo.nm23aawook01025_.mp3: Madam, I am not a fool. I survive because I am careful.
Bindo.nm23abjaar01031_.mp3: *sigh* This will end in sadness. Don't say I didn't warn you.
Bindo.nm23acworr01034_.mp3: There was pain no matter how this ended. Perhaps this is for the best.
Bindo.nm23acworr01054_.mp3: A painful end, but perhaps it is the right thing to do. We shall see.
Bindo.nm23acworr01076_.mp3: I urge you caution. This may seem like the right path to follow... but you do not know these people as I do.
Bindo.nm23acworr01142_.mp3: Greed will lead you down the dark side if you are not careful. You must not seek material gain at the expense of the ideals the Jedi hold dear.
Bindo.nm23adchuu01041_.mp3: Oh, yes. Far better to have both the blade and a possible rival as far from Kashyyyk as possible, hey? *sigh* I feel very tired of this place, now.
Bindo.nm23adchuu01045_.mp3: Right you are. I think I'll do just that.
Bindo.nm23adchuu01092_.mp3: Oh, you're wrong on that count, actually. Not that I would expect you to know that.
Bindo.nm23adchuu01103_.mp3: Bah! Save your threats, I'm sick of the forest. And I'm not too fond of what happened here. I'll take the ride.
Bindo.nm23adchuu01137_.mp3: *That* is your advice? Side with the slaver? Fine, fine... it's your call.
Bindo.nm23adfrey02033_.mp3: Now, you just close your hole, child. It's a shock, I'm sure, but this isn't about you.
Bindo.nm23adfrey02062_.mp3: Oh, this isn't wise. An angry Wookiee can't be reasoned with.
Bindo.nm23adfrey02081_.mp3: Oh, I don't think that will work this time.
Bindo.nm24aaforc01001_.mp3: Here we are again. Shall I bypass the field so we may pass?
Bindo.nm24aaforc01003_.mp3: There, you see? Beautifully subtle, isn't it? At least, compared to other Czerka equipment dumped down here.
Bindo.nm24aaforc01004_.mp3: It's only been here a short while, or the Wookiees would have disabled it. They wouldn't have had an easy time of it, though.
Bindo.nm24aaforc01006_.mp3: I think it was an attempt to block the more dangerous carnivores from wandering freely, but it's not very effective.
Bindo.nm24aaforc01007_.mp3: It limits us non-climbers, but the creatures of Kashyyyk are very adaptable. You'll see why when we reach your goal.
Bindo.nm24aaforc01009_.mp3: Yes, but I don't make a habit of it. The other side is genuinely dangerous.
Bindo.nm24aaforc01011_.mp3: I can manipulate it for a moment. Let me see... how did the Czerka engineers do it...
Bindo.nm24aaforc01013_.mp3: There are others, each blocking similar points on certain paths. It is all very calculated. Very precise.
Bindo.nm24aaforc01014_.mp3: It would have been effective if it hadn't relied on the creatures to be walking. Climbers don't have much trouble getting around it.
Bindo.nm24aaforc01016_.mp3: You aren't going to ask about it? A repulsor field in the woods and you have no interest?
Bindo.nm24aaforc01019_.mp3: All right then, uh, how did it go...
Bindo.nm24aaforc01020_.mp3: Ah, very well. Young durga-spits like you have no appreciation for details. Now, let's see... how did I do it...
Bindo.nm24aaforc01021_.mp3: Ahh, there we go. Now keep moving. These are the most dangerous depths of Kashyyyk.
Bindo.nm24aaforc01022_.mp3: A few surprises wait for us, I'll wager.
Bindo.nm24aajole05000_.mp3: Ah, the damnable racket of battle! Watch yourself, even more of these crawling beasts are hiding in the underbrush.
Bindo.nm24aajole05002_.mp3: Quit your yapping for now. We'll talk when the company is better. Get to fightin'!
Bindo.nm24aajole05006_.mp3: Well, that was acceptable. You're not quite the commander I'd have accompanied in my youth, but you managed to walk away.
Bindo.nm24aajole05008_.mp3: I'm Jolee. Jolee Bindo. Follow me to my camp and we'll talk a bit.
Bindo.nm24aajole05010_.mp3: Why am I here? Hmph. Well it isn't because I like the stink of dead kinrath. Let's move this talk to my camp where the air is better.
Bindo.nm24aajole05012_.mp3: Keep close. It's nearby, under a log. Yeah, I live like some burrowing rodent. I fought the Sith... now look at me. Hmph!
Bindo.nm24aajole05015_.mp3: Ah, don't start fawning just yet, I'm too old for it. *Sigh* I...I know a few things, but we can talk about it at my camp.
Bindo.nm24aajole05018_.mp3: Look, you can follow now or stumble around on your own, but I'm too old to care whether you think I'm babysitting you.
Bindo.nm24aajole05020_.mp3: That's the way! Now prove that wasn't blind luck, you baby!
Bindo.nm24aajole06000_.mp3: Well, welcome to my home, such as it is. Pull up a stump and be comfortable. We should discuss a few things.
Bindo.nm24aajole06002_.mp3: Don't coddle me, child. I'm neither a Jedi nor your master. I'm just an old man that's been lost in the woods for far too long.
Bindo.nm24aajole06003_.mp3: My days of glory are behind me, but... perhaps there is something I can do for you. You must have questions.
Bindo.nm24aajole06005_.mp3: Look, we've been through this before. My past is my affair. Get some years behind you and then we'll talk about me.
Bindo.nm24aajole06006_.mp3: I think you'll agree that we have more important things to discuss, no?
Bindo.nm24aajole06007_.mp3: Ah, what is there to tell? Jolee Bindo is the crazy old man in the dangerous woods. I'm content with the impression I give.
Bindo.nm24aajole06009_.mp3: I follow the Jedi Way and I command the Force, yes, and I suppose that makes me as much a Jedi as anyone... but what of it?
Bindo.nm24aajole06010_.mp3: I've seen my share of the dark and the light. And frankly, both extremes annoy me. Of course... I have felt the rumblings of change...
Bindo.nm24aajole06011_.mp3: Perhaps you will be of some assistance to me after all. Let us discuss what you came here for.
Bindo.nm24aajole06013_.mp3: Ah, and it makes you think I may have the taint of the dark side in me, doesn't it? Ooh. Is that what you are wondering, huh? Ooh.
Bindo.nm24aajole06014_.mp3: Well, I assure you, I see more grey than dark or light. I'm just a stubborn old man, tired of the foolishness of others.
Bindo.nm24aajole06016_.mp3: Wait wait wait, slow down. I have to ask something of you. I've got something you need, and you can help me.
Bindo.nm24aajole06017_.mp3: We both know why you have come here. The Star Map. That has to be it. There is nothing else here.
Bindo.nm24aajole06018_.mp3: The problems of a few Wookiees don't amount to anything before the concerns of the Jedi. No, you are here for the map.
Bindo.nm24aajole06020_.mp3: Kashyyyk is an interesting place, more so than anyone suspects. If Czerka Corporation knew, heh, the planet would be a strip mine.
Bindo.nm24aajole06021_.mp3: The Wookiees have their legends that they were not always here, but it is more than that. The trees themselves are strangers.
Bindo.nm24aajole06023_.mp3: What I'm saying is that there are literally walls in your way, and you won't find what you need without my help... and my help has a price.
Bindo.nm24aajole06024_.mp3: Of course, this won't be a problem for you, since you have already completed my task. Removal of the Czerka poachers.
Bindo.nm24aajole06025_.mp3: Now, I'm not sure if you'll measure up to my task, seeing as how you've already joined up with the slime I want gone.
Bindo.nm24aajole06027_.mp3: The Czerka poachers, I can smell that scent they use on you. I don't care what you told them, I want them gone.
Bindo.nm24aajole06028_.mp3: After you do that, I want to join up with you. Then I'll remove the barrier between you and the lower Shadowlands.
Bindo.nm24aajole06030_.mp3: Hunting monkey is part of your great plan? I know you talked to the Czerka poachers, and I don't care. I want them gone.
Bindo.nm24aajole06031_.mp3: You must do a task for me, and then allow me to join with you. I will then remove certain barriers in your path.
Bindo.nm24aajole06033_.mp3: Oh, save it. I know this sounds absurd, but I'm old and entitled to work you around a bit. Besides, the test is simple.
Bindo.nm24aajole06037_.mp3: Since they began expanding in the Shadowlands, the Czerka have left me alone, for the most part. Until recently, anyway.
Bindo.nm24aajole06038_.mp3: A group of them set up camp not far from here. Poachers is all they are. I'd like them removed from this place.
Bindo.nm24aajole06040_.mp3: They don't respect this place. They are butchering wildlife and threatening entire species. It's getting under my skin.
Bindo.nm24aajole06041_.mp3: The Wookiees could take care of themselves if they wished, but the animals are truly helpless victims.
Bindo.nm24aajole06043_.mp3: Oh please, this is arbitrary errand work, but such are the requests of the aged. You still have to do it.
Bindo.nm24aajole06044_.mp3: Their camp is in the far northeast. Now remember, if I wanted them dead, I'd have done it myself. Find a better way.
Bindo.nm24aajole06046_.mp3: Good. Return to me here and we will see how you have done. Shoo. Shoo!
Bindo.nm24aajole06048_.mp3: Yes, yes, I'm an old man that's getting fussy. Call me foolish if you will, I don't care. You still have to do it.
Bindo.nm24aajole06049_.mp3: I told you, they are destroying the environment. People are mostly annoying, but the balance of nature, *that* needs protecting.
Bindo.nm24aajole06051_.mp3: They are not that far northeast of here. There is usually five in the area, as far as I can see.
Bindo.nm24aajole06052_.mp3: The Captain of the lot is the one that earned my ire. Mishandle my garden, will he? Hmph!
Bindo.nm24aajole06054_.mp3: You presumably have a ship. I've seen all I wish to here. Isn't that enough? I mean, I'm really sick of the trees.
Bindo.nm24aajole06055_.mp3: And perhaps your destiny might show me something new. You never know.
Bindo.nm24aajole06057_.mp3: Don't talk back to your elders, child. Look, they know me quite well, and are always on alert when I approach.
Bindo.nm24aajole06058_.mp3: The only way I could get rid of them would be violence, which would eventually lead to trouble for the Wookiees.
Bindo.nm24aajole06059_.mp3: I want them gone, but with as little fuss as possible. They have already caused enough trouble as it is.
Bindo.nm24aajole06064_.mp3: Did I? You have annoyingly good ears. It doesn't matter. Those days are gone. Leave them in their graves.
Bindo.nm24aajole06066_.mp3: Why, don't you like what I've done with the place? The creatures here aren't any more treacherous than elsewhere.
Bindo.nm24aajole06068_.mp3: Yes, among the Wookiees. Intriguing creatures. I like that they have little patience for bureaucrats.
Bindo.nm24aajole06069_.mp3: But of course, even here there are hidden things that manipulate.
Bindo.nm24aajole06071_.mp3: Czerka Corporation was smart to put him in power. He's as good at destroying Wookiee culture as dropping corpses full of Ardroxian Flu.
Bindo.nm24aajole06072_.mp3: Will you work for him or against him, I wonder? I will be interested to see.
Bindo.nm24aajole06074_.mp3: Uh, sure, how's this: think for yourself. I don't care for politics, and I'm big on letting people figure things out for themselves.
Bindo.nm24aajole06075_.mp3: The Wookiees have prophesies of deliverance if you ask them, but for now they follow without hesitation. That is their wish.
Bindo.nm24aajole06077_.mp3: Maddened with grief, perhaps, but not crazed. I helped him pass to the lower forests where only a Wookiee could follow.
Bindo.nm24aajole06078_.mp3: Some other matters will determine if you can follow. There is a barrier that... well, we'll talk of that more in a moment.
Bindo.nm24aajole06080_.mp3: It is a very unfortunate matter. It will end in shame and sorrow. You will find Rorworr down here. And more.
Bindo.nm24aajole06081_.mp3: I have witnessed a number of happenings, but I have left them for others to sort out.
Bindo.nm24aajole06083_.mp3: I wasn't aware I had to be. Look, events like these reveal much about the people involved. I'm well past that introspective tripe.
Bindo.nm24aajole06084_.mp3: I'm not saying that outside help isn't needed. I just... well...
Bindo.nm24aajole06085_.mp3: I didn't want to make anyone mad while I didn't have a way off the planet. We'll talk more about that momentarily.
Bindo.nm24aajole06087_.mp3: On the body of Rorworr, I know. His death will not go unnoticed. I have been wondering how this foolishness would play out.
Bindo.nm24aajole06088_.mp3: I am no weaponsmith, but someone in the village will be able to identify the owner of that bolt casing. They are very personal items.
Bindo.nm24aajole06092_.mp3: I smell their tach-scent on you. Did you agree to hunt for them? Let me remind you that I do not approve, and you need me.
Bindo.nm24aajole06093_.mp3: Go to their camp and get rid of them. When you are through, we can proceed to the lower Shadowlands. Not before.
Bindo.nm24aajole06094_.mp3: They are not hard to find. Their camp is to the far northeast. Try to get them to leave without too much fuss.
Bindo.nm24aajole06095_.mp3: After you finish, I will make it so you can pass the barrier that prevents your access to the lower Shadowlands.
Bindo.nm24aajole06097_.mp3: Now why would you be asking about that, hmm? Don't answer. I knew that had to be why you were here.
Bindo.nm24aajole06098_.mp3: I told you my price. After you complete my task I'll make it so you can pass the barriers blocking your goal. That's all I will add on the subject.
Bindo.nm24aajole06100_.mp3: Ahh, I thought you would spot that. It's easy to see with Force-sensitive eyes, isn't it? Heh heh. Czerka put it there.
Bindo.nm24aajole06101_.mp3: It's a troublesome thing, blocking some access to the lower Shadowlands. That's where you want to go, isn't it?
Bindo.nm24aajole06102_.mp3: As I said, if you complete my task and allow me to join your group, I will remove the repulsor field from your path.
Bindo.nm24aajole06103_.mp3: I saw them put it in, so only I know how to manipulate it. That knowledge will serve me now. Do as I ask.
Bindo.nm24aajole06105_.mp3: You'll have nothing but time if you don't take what help you can. I've been here for many years. I know things. Remember that.
Bindo.nm24aajole06107_.mp3: I'm sure you are, but you have to take time to listen. Really, you shouldn't try so hard to make new enemies.
Bindo.nm24aajole06109_.mp3: Do you? Well, I'd better not keep you. I mean, I've only spent about twenty years here. Heh. What could I possibly tell you?
Bindo.nm24aajole06110_.mp3: Hmph! You don't want to be just another fool with a big impatient chip on their shoulder. That's a dark road, child.
Bindo.nm24aajole06113_.mp3: Yes, yes. I suppose it's my lot in life, to spend years learning something so that someone else can be impatient to hear it.
Bindo.nm24aajole06115_.mp3: Oh ho, your manner is fearsome. Like the little ullers I shoo from the garden, hissing at what they don't understand.
Bindo.nm24aajole06116_.mp3: I'm too old for your posturing, child. If you have questions, then ask them.
Bindo.nm24aajole06117_.mp3: Welcome back. I wonder, have you had much luck? Have you done as I asked?
Bindo.nm24aajole06119_.mp3: Yes, I heard the fuss of it. I told you I wanted a non-violent solution, and I had my reasons for it. You should have thought about that.
Bindo.nm24aajole06120_.mp3: Czerka Corporation will find the bodies and blame the Wookiees. This may cause more troops to be deployed. That means more disruption.
Bindo.nm24aajole06121_.mp3: I'm not pleased, but what's done is done and I'm not here to judge you. Hopefully you'll take care of that yourself.
Bindo.nm24aajole06123_.mp3: Well, perhaps I have a duty to point out what you should have learned from this. Or perhaps... no.
Bindo.nm24aajole06125_.mp3: I see. You are completely detached. Are you sure you're not a droid? It doesn't matter. A trivial thing like this is no measure of anyone.
Bindo.nm24aajole06127_.mp3: Oh, go bark up a tree. You'll get the same response out of me. Besides, I'm not about to get in the habit of grading you.
Bindo.nm24aajole06129_.mp3: You're pretty much right, really. Truth be known, I won't judge how you fared... as long as you can LIVE WITH YOURSELF!
Bindo.nm24aajole06130_.mp3: Was that convincing? It's been a while since I've been in the company of someone that needed that kind of babysitting.
Bindo.nm24aajole06132_.mp3: A good teacher, and I'm not saying I am one, but a good teacher doesn't mash a book in a student's face shouting "learn this bit here!"
Bindo.nm24aajole06133_.mp3: If you can't look at the situation for yourself and see the logic behind my way of doing things, you're not the type to understand me anyway.
Bindo.nm24aajole06134_.mp3: Besides, you're a little old for that master/student fuss, aren't you? I know I am.
Bindo.nm24aajole06136_.mp3: You were here and it needed doing. Besides, dealing with the Czerka is dirty business. I hope you washed your hands.
Bindo.nm24aajole06138_.mp3: Yes, yes, in the east past the poacher camp. I saw it when it was installed. It's a very effective barrier, but I know how to get past it.
Bindo.nm24aajole06140_.mp3: Yes, of course. Let's get moving. I noticed the old paths some time ago. You probably wouldn't have found them on your own.
Bindo.nm24aajole06141_.mp3: There's also a Czerka repulsor field blocking the way, past the poacher camp in the east. I saw it when it was installed, so I know how to pass it.
Bindo.nm24aajole06142_.mp3: And on the other side... ancient answers. And perhaps a Wookiee you were seeking. I hope he's in the mood for visitors.
Bindo.nm24aajole06144_.mp3: I know where you want to go. I can get you through to the old paths. This forest hides some strange things.
Bindo.nm24aajole06145_.mp3: Yes, I could feel it as you walked near. And I don't sense the smell of death on you. You spared them? Interesting.
Bindo.nm24aajole06147_.mp3: Wasn't there? I suppose not, but the environment would say otherwise, if it could talk. No matter.
Bindo.nm24aajole06149_.mp3: If you imagined a meaning behind it, I suppose that's good, but I don't think such a trivial thing is any real measure of a person.
Bindo.nm24aajole06152_.mp3: Well hurry up! You don't want to be stuck here as long as I have.
Bindo.nm24aajole06202_.mp3: Why should being what I am compel me to entertain others with tales of the 'good old days' huh?
Bindo.nm25aabike01006_.mp3: More than a threat enough for you!
Bindo.nm25aacomp01009_.mp3: Yes, there's the thing. Obstinate machine. I've no doubt it holds what you seek, but good luck getting it operational.
Bindo.nm25aacomp01011_.mp3: Match found...? What the... it always muttered something about "rejected patterns" for me.
Bindo.nm25aacomp01039_.mp3: Well, that is surprising. I doubt any Wookiee would support such a claim. The forest is millenia old.
Bindo.nm25aacomp01058_.mp3: Hmm, five years ago? I didn't notice it. This must have been installed in strictest secrecy. It couldn't have been Czerka.
Bindo.nm25aacomp01062_.mp3: Heh... call me stubborn, I guess. Heh. There wasn't much else to do around here.
Bindo.nm25aacomp01174_.mp3: This machine certainly seems to want a very specific type of response.
Bindo.nm25aafrey02002_.mp3: He is almost feral after all this time. Calm yourself, Freyyr. We are friends. Don't you remember me?
Bindo.nm25aafrey02040_.mp3: That's when I first saw him. I helped his pursuers lose him for a moment. Do you remember me now, Freyyr?
Bindo.nm25aafrey02085_.mp3: I don't approve of this! Is Chuundar to be blindly obeyed?
Bindo.nm25aafrey02087_.mp3: Perhaps not. Do what you will. I'm just wondering if Chuundar is the wiser choice of ally.
Bindo.nm25aafrey02105_.mp3: Did we come this far only to kill this old wook? I don't approve of this at all.
Bindo.nm25aafrey02107_.mp3: I know he did, but not without reason. The only outsiders he's seen for years have been slavers.
Bindo.nm25aafrey02111_.mp3: Hold your tongue, child. I'm not challenging you. I just thought you'd have the smarts to consider every option.
Bindo.nm25aafrey02156_.mp3: I don't support this action! Think on this, child!
Bindo.nm25aafrey02158_.mp3: Look, I'm not your nanny-droid, but I just don't think following Chuundar is the best course.
Bindo.nm25aafrey02169_.mp3: Is that it? You spared his life initially just to cut him off before he can fully explain himself?
Bindo.nm25aastar99012_.mp3: Well, well. A Star Map. An ancient artifact of dark side power. Can't say I'm surprised. I always knew there was something funny down here.
Bindo.nm25aastar99026_.mp3: I wonder if the Star Map has had an effect on the evolution of the creatures here in the Shadowlands. Might explain why it's so dangerous down here.
Bindo.nm25aastar99027_.mp3: An interesting theory, but I suppose we don't have time to test it now, do we? Now that we've got what you came for we should be heading back up to the treetops.
Bindo.nm26aaelor04010_.mp3: Elora? Of all the people... How did you even know I'd left Kashyyyk?
Bindo.nm26aaelor04012_.mp3: Why? Whatever could be the matter, my dear?
Bindo.nm26aaelor04016_.mp3: Calm down, Elora. Where's Sunry now?
Bindo.nm26aaelor04020_.mp3: That's true... I'd forgotten about that. Let's not forget that he would have had to have been considerably older than the Sith woman.
Bindo.nm26aaelor04022_.mp3: Hmph. I'm a Jedi... and one who was living alone in the Shadowlands until recently. That keeps you in shape, damn it! We're talking about Sunry, here.
Bindo.nm26aaelor04048_.mp3: Don't worry, Elora. We'll get to the bottom of this and help Sunry... somehow.
Bindo.nm26aairim06064_.mp3: Sounds like the Sith are trying to win this planet by corrupting the Selkath youth. Much more subtle than their usual methods.
Bindo.nm26aanilk09070_.mp3: Hmmm. You think the Republic is trying to steal the kolto, perhaps? An odd thing for the Republic to do, no?
Bindo.nm26aanilk09117_.mp3: Be careful here, kid. Start poking your nose in places it doesn't belong and you might not like what you find.
Bindo.nm26aapris10000_.mp3: *growl* *snarl* When I get out of here, you're dead! I'll gut your fishy little corpse, cut off your head and bathe in your blood!
Bindo.nm26aaselj17024_.mp3: Hmmm. Simply because it was real does not mean Sunry would have overlooked it being in Elassa's hand.
Bindo.nm26aaselj17060_.mp3: I suppose you're Sunry's only hope. We have to at least try to help him.
Bindo.nm26aaselj17078_.mp3: Yes... but it almost seems too heavily stacked, doesn't it? Very suspicious.
Bindo.nm26aaselj21028_.mp3: So nice to meet an impartial judge, for a change.
Bindo.nm26aasunr26001_.mp3: Elora sent me, Sunry. I'm here to get you out of this mess. The courts went and made us Arbiters for your case.
Bindo.nm26aasunr26003_.mp3: You saved my wrinkled butt more than a few times as well, friend, if I recall. But there'll be time for catching up later. Right now we need to focus on the case.
Bindo.nm26aasunr26057_.mp3: That's different, Sunry, and you know it. We don't kill them in cold blood while they sleep.
Bindo.nm26aasunr26066_.mp3: Sunry... this is wrong, and you know it. I am a Jedi... what is it that you expect me to do to defend your actions?
Bindo.nm26aasunr26080_.mp3: But Sunry is a murderer. I'm sorry, old friend, but you are. I... I can't approve of this. You go ahead, however, if that's what you think is best.
Bindo.nm26aasunr26098_.mp3: Soon, old friend. But we don't want to go to trial until we've got the whole picture.
Bindo.nm26aatria27456_.mp3: I... I'm sorry, Sunry. And Elora. There is nothing more we can do.
Bindo.nm26aatria27480_.mp3: The Republic will attempt to have him freed, Elora, I am sure. This... this is the best we could do. I'm sorry.
Bindo.nm26aatria27500_.mp3: We have done all we could for you, old friend.
Bindo.nm26aatria27504_.mp3: Don't thank me, thank your Arbiter. I was glad to help.
Bindo.nm26acignu04079_.mp3: Hmm... I guess this is what they call working the system. Not that I'm objecting. I just hope the Selkath don't find out about it.
Bindo.nm27aashas06045_.mp3: Oh-ho! Is this how you win an argument? I would have thought it easier to prove the evil of the dark side than that.
Bindo.nm27aashas06082_.mp3: Just be careful with those gifts you've already learned. Beware the dark side... or you may end up betraying your world regardless.
Bindo.nm27aashas06107_.mp3: *whisper* I'm not sure what kind of game you're playing, kid, but I don't understand it. Why you would help spread Sith propaganda like this is beyond me.
Bindo.nm27aasith07004_.mp3: Well, let me guess! You intend to collect this reward, right?
Bindo.nm27aasith07010_.mp3: See? What did I tell you?
Bindo.nm28absur201008_.mp3: They looked wrong? Hmmm... this whole place smells wrong. Like an Urellian urgoth egg gone bad in the hamper.
Bindo.nm28absur201012_.mp3: Must be those reliable and finely tuned senses of yours, mercenary.
Bindo.nm33aalash11006_.mp3: Well, if you'd seen us before, we wouldn't be newcomers, would we?
Bindo.nm33aalash11064_.mp3: Thank you. It takes effort to be properly irreverent at my age.
Bindo.nm33aalash11077_.mp3: Thank you. It takes effort to be properly irreverent at my age.
Bindo.nm33aapros17021_.mp3: If a Sith told you to go jump off a cliff, would you?
Bindo.nm33aapros18022_.mp3: If a Sith told you to go jump off a cliff, would you?
Bindo.nm33aashaa19013_.mp3: Well, if you can't think of anything cruel you really shouldn't be out here, young man, should you?
Bindo.nm33aayuth21110_.mp3: My hearing's not so good. I'm just pleased my nice master doesn't beat me so much anymore, yes sir.
Bindo.nm35aajole09000_.mp3: There'll be time for chatter after we find whatever has caused this disturbance in the Force. It's dangerous, so keep on your toes.
Bindo.nm35aajole09001_.mp3: Got something on your mind, do you?
Bindo.nm35aajole09007_.mp3: Oh, I know plenty about Kashyyyk. You think someone doesn't live here for twenty years and pick up a thing or two?
Bindo.nm35aajole09008_.mp3: Chances are that by the time I finished telling you about it all, you would have found out for yourself. So there's no reason for me to start blathering on.
Bindo.nm35aajole09009_.mp3: It should be enough for me to tell you that there's kilometer after kilometer of trees on this planet. The deeper you go, the more dangerous it gets.
Bindo.nm35aajole09010_.mp3: If you're smart, you stay on top with the Wookiees. Go deep, however, and you may find some things you weren't expecting.
Bindo.nm35aajole09011_.mp3: And that's about all I got to say about that. Now let's get going.
Bindo.nm35aajole09012_.mp3: Well, unless you're one of the local species and end up being slaughtered or enslaved, Tatooine's a nice enough desert.
Bindo.nm35aajole09013_.mp3: Pfah. Korriban's a rock. Mind the Sith.
Bindo.nm35aajole09014_.mp3: Manaan's an unusual place. Not for its water, mind you... it's the kolto. Healing juice. Only place where it occurs in the galaxy.
Bindo.nm35aajole09015_.mp3: Hmph. Hard to say what this planet is. Been lost for thousands of years, if not more. *Sniff* Smells like bad, bad karma so watch your step.
Bindo.nm35aajole09016_.mp3: It's a ship. To be more specific, it's *your* ship. You tell me.
Bindo.nm35aajole09017_.mp3: No more than you. Get going.
Bindo.nm35aajole09019_.mp3: How many could you possibly need? And besides, I don't have enough supplies on me to put some more together.
Bindo.nm35aajole09020_.mp3: Ask me later when you're actually in need and I'm less tired. I'm not a kit factory, you know.
Bindo.nm35aajole09021_.mp3: Hmph. I suppose I could whip up something, uh... you know... few herbs and such. You do know that the best alternative is not to get hurt, right?
Bindo.nm35aajole09022_.mp3: Not to say that you go leaping into the path of blaster fire or anything, but I know how you young people get. Here, take it.
Bindo.nm35aajole09024_.mp3: What? You think because I'm a hermit I've always been a hermit? Just because I haven't seen Sunry for twenty years doesn't mean he's not a friend.
Bindo.nm35aajole09025_.mp3: A man could have changed a lot in that span of time, though. But to become a murderer? Oh, mm mm mm. I can't see it. That's not the Sunry I knew.
Bindo.nm35aajole09026_.mp3: He was a good man. Put me up in his home for a year back after I left the order. War hero, too, or so I hear.
Bindo.nm35aajole09027_.mp3: I wouldn't mind helping the fellow, if we can. I owe it to him. Or you can be a young monkey-lizard and ignore me, I guess... well, I don't expect much these days.
Bindo.nm35aajole09029_.mp3: So you do. I once had a holodisc that showed Mandalore doing the three-step jiggy with a rancor beast. Marvelous technology we have.
Bindo.nm35aajole09031_.mp3: It may have been. I believe you should, at least, keep that possibility in mind.
Bindo.nm35aajole09032_.mp3: If somebody was going to go through all the trouble of making a false tape to indict Sunry you think it would have 'turned up' before now.
Bindo.nm35aajole09033_.mp3: Maybe it would be a good idea to show the tape to Sunry. Perhaps he has an explanation. Or perhaps he doesn't.
Bindo.nm35aajole09034_.mp3: It would be sad if this proved that Sunry did actually perform this crime, but... the truth is the truth. Whether I like it or not.
Bindo.nm35aajole09036_.mp3: You did what was necessary. Sunry was guilty, as sad as that fact makes me, justice had to be done.
Bindo.nm35aajole09037_.mp3: Doesn't matter that his victim was a Sith or that he was once a hero. I only wish that my old friend hadn't done it.
Bindo.nm35aajole09038_.mp3: But that's the thing about wishes. They don't come true. And now Sunry's dead, which is a shame. He *was* a good man, you know... once.
Bindo.nm35aajole09039_.mp3: Bah. I don't want to talk about this anymore. My jaw aches.
Bindo.nm35aajole09040_.mp3: You defended him well enough. I wish we had had time to look into matters more fully, but wishing is only useful for the young and idealistic.
