Carth.nm40aabast01052_.mp3: You... you wanted me to suffer? You enjoyed my torment? I... I don't know what to say. I thought there was a... a bond between us.
Carth.nm40aabast01053_.mp3: Maybe you're not the woman I thought you were.
Carth.nm40aabast01060_.mp3: Good job, Mission! I knew you wouldn't let us down. When we get out of this I'm going to see you get a medal from the Republic for everything you've done!
Carth.nm40aabast01061_.mp3: If I remember the layout of this ship our equipment should be in a storage chamber just through the north doors. After we grab our stuff we need to get to the main bridge controls.
Carth.nm40aabast01062_.mp3: The bridge is the only place we can open the docking gates of the hangar where they've got the Ebon Hawk. We have to open those gates before we can fly out of here!
Carth.nm40aabast01068_.mp3: Count me in, then. I've got a score to settle with the Admiral before we get off this ship, and I have a feeling I'm gonna find him on the Leviathan's bridge!
Carth.nm40aabast01080_.mp3: Nice job, Canderous. You keep getting us out of jams like this and there might be a place for you in the Republic army, even if you are a Mandalorian!
Carth.nm40aabast01082_.mp3: You may be a droid, but when this is all over I'm going to see the Republic gives you a medal for your part in this!
Carth.nm40aacart05000_.mp3: Admiral Karath taught me everything I know about being a soldier. He was a legend in the Republic fleet, and a hero to me. Until he betrayed us.
Carth.nm40aacart05002_.mp3: When the Sith attacked my home world, the Leviathan - which is Saul Karath's flagship - was at the head of the fleet. My family was destroyed that day and my wife died in the Sith bombardment.
Carth.nm40aacart05005_.mp3: I'm not going to do anything stupid. I won't throw our lives away in some mad quest for vengeance. But if I get a chance to kill Saul during our escape, nobody better get in my way.
Carth.nm40aacart05009_.mp3: I'll admit it won't be easy. Saul's no fool and he won't underestimate us either. You can count on plenty of guards watching every move we make.
Carth.nm40aacart05020_.mp3: Well, if we're going to pick someone to save our skins we better do it quick. In another minute we're going to have Sith troops marching up our loading ramp!
Carth.nm40aacart05035_.mp3: Hold on! They're dragging us into the docking bridge!
Carth.nm40aacart05040_.mp3: Well, the droid's right. If we disable him the Sith will probably wipe his memory chips and take him to the junkpile.
Carth.nm40aacart05042_.mp3: But we can rig a back-up memory chip with a timer. When it kicks in the little fella will be reactivated and he can come find us.
Carth.nm40aacart05044_.mp3: Well, that's a risk we might have to take, unless you can come up with a better plan to get us out of this.
Carth.nm40aasaul10002_.mp3: But I recognized you, Saul. I see your face every night even as I promise myself I will kill you for what you did to my home world.
Carth.nm40aasaul10006_.mp3: It was a cowardly act of betrayal! Your fleet bombed a civilian target into oblivion without warning or provocation. And the blood of those innocent people is on your hands!
Carth.nm40aasaul10010_.mp3: My wife died in that attack, Saul. And for that, I swear I'll kill you.
Carth.nm40aasaul10129_.mp3: For the sake of the Republic don't tell him anything!
Carth.nm40aasaul10139_.mp3: No! How could you betray the Republic like this?
Carth.nm40aasaul10143_.mp3: Why? Why... why are telling him this?
Carth.nm40aasaul10147_.mp3: Words that betray the Republic bring me more pain than any torture ever could!
Carth.nm40aasaul10154_.mp3: My pain is meaningless! Tell him nothing!
Carth.nm40aasaul10163_.mp3: What are you saying? Physical pain is... is nothing compared to the suffering of the galaxy if Malak should defeat the Jedi!
Carth.nm40aasaul10165_.mp3: Don't waste your breath, Saul! We won't answer any of your questions.
Carth.nm40absaul09002_.mp3: The only thing you taught me was betrayal and death, Saul.
Carth.nm40absaul09010_.mp3: I've seen enough of Sith mercy!
Carth.nm40absaul09024_.mp3: Don't you understand what this man has done to my life? Do you know the pain he's brought me?
Carth.nm40absaul09034_.mp3: He's gone. He said... it can't be true, can it? No. No... no - it can't! Damn you, Saul! Damn you!
Carth.nm40absaul09036_.mp3: Bastila - it is true, isn't it? And... and you knew! You and the whole damn Jedi Council. You knew the whole time!
Carth.nm40absaul09046_.mp3: I'll trust you, Bastila but as soon as we're off this ship I expect some answers!
Carth.nm40accart02012_.mp3: The door's sealed, we can't get past! Come on, we have to get to the Ebon Hawk!
Carth.nm40accart02014_.mp3: Bastila doesn't stand a chance against Malak, but we can't help her. Not here. We have to get off this ship and find the Star Forge. That's the key to beating the Dark Lord!
Carth.nm40accart02016_.mp3: Bastila sacrificed herself so we could get away. We can't let her sacrifice be in vain! Come on!
Carth.nm40adcart01001_.mp3: We ran into Malak. He would have killed us, but Bastila sacrificed herself so we could get away.
Carth.nm40adcart01005_.mp3: Not so fast. I need to know if what Malak said about you is true or not, first. You aren't... you *can't* be, can you?
Carth.nm40adcart01008_.mp3: I suppose I shouldn't be surprised by your attitude now that I know who you really are... Revan.
Carth.nm40adcart01009_.mp3: Not so fast. We've got a bigger issue to deal with here. They deserve to know the truth about you. Do you want to tell them what Malak said, or should I?
Carth.nm40adcart01012_.mp3: No, it's no joke. The Jedi Council captured Revan and erased the Dark Lord's mind, programming in a new identity. Saul Karath told me on the Leviathan and Bastila confirmed it!
Carth.nm40adcart01017_.mp3: Of course it still matters! How do we know more memories won't come flooding back? How do we know Revan won't suddenly turn on us?
Carth.nm40adcart01018_.mp3: I've been such a fool! I... I swore to protect you! And here you were the enemy all this time!
Carth.nm40adcart01020_.mp3: But... you're the one responsible for the death of my wife, the destruction of my home world! You destroyed my life!
Carth.nm40adcart01021_.mp3: How could I have been such a fool! How could I have not known?! How could you betray me like this?!
Carth.nm40adcart01023_.mp3: You should have known. I...*sigh* I should have figured it out. I just can't... was, was everything a lie, then? Everything we talked about?
Carth.nm40adcart01025_.mp3: Are you sure? I'm not sure what to believe any more. Who's to say that your old life won't come back... all of it?
Carth.nm40adcart01027_.mp3: That's what I feared. Who's to say your old life won't come back... everything you felt and thought, all of it?
Carth.nm40adcart01029_.mp3: This isn't a joke. You know what I'm talking about. I'm talking about you, about the way you felt...
Carth.nm40adcart01030_.mp3: Was the woman we knew Revan or... or someone else? Will you change into Revan? How...how can any of us trust you?
Carth.nm40adcart01034_.mp3: Get over it? Yeah... yeah, I can get over it. I should have figured out earlier you weren't what you seemed. That's my fault.
Carth.nm40adcart01035_.mp3: Do you think everybody else is going to be so quick to 'get over it'? You think they're going to follow a Sith Lord?
Carth.nm40adcart01037_.mp3: But it is true. It's horribly true! It was...it was you... you killed my wife, you ravaged my world. You...you destroyed my life!
Carth.nm40adcart01039_.mp3: It doesn't matter who's to blame. You're still the one who did it. You killed my wife... you betrayed everything that I believed in! You destroyed my life!
Carth.nm40adcart01041_.mp3: Oh, it changes everything! It was... it was you! You were the one that attacked my world! You were the one that destroyed my life!
Carth.nm40adcart01042_.mp3: The whole time we've been chasing after Malak we've had his old Sith Master right at our side; listening to our secrets; hearing our plans!
Carth.nm40adcart01051_.mp3: I don't know if I can get over it that easily, Mission. I mean... after all Revan did... how could any of us forgive her?
Carth.nm40adcart01052_.mp3: How can you say that, Mission? The Sith bombed my home world! Revan took away my family and destroyed my life!
Carth.nm40adcart01094_.mp3: Well, the others seem to trust you... and I don't see any other way that we can stop the Sith. And I suppose that Malak is the real enemy here... I really don't have any other choice, do I?
Carth.nm40adcart01096_.mp3: I want to believe you. You've proven yourself time and time again during our mission, but this is a little much for me to wrap my mind around.
Carth.nm40adcart01098_.mp3: This must be even more of a shock to you... I don't know how you even keep going. I guess we both just have to find a way to push forward.
Carth.nm40adcart01099_.mp3: Don't worry about me - I'm a soldier. I can put aside my misgivings for now. We can, uh... we can talk later, you and I. Just give me time.
Carth.nm40adcart01104_.mp3: I see. Well, I guess that answers a lot of my questions about who you really are.
Carth.nm40adcart01105_.mp3: Don't worry - I won't let my personal feelings get in the way of my assignments or this mission. But don't forget: I've sworn an oath to defend the Republic!
Carth.nm40adcart01106_.mp3: As long as this mission stays on course I'll stick with you. But I won't let you betray the Republic under any circumstances!
Carth.nm40adcart01107_.mp3: So I guess that's it then... we keep going. We've still got one more Star Map to uncover if we're going to find that Star Forge and save Bastila, so let's do it before it's too late.
Carth.nm40adcart01109_.mp3: I don't know. Maybe I just need time to, uh... to think about it.
Carth.nm40adcart01110_.mp3: The others seem to trust you... and we need you to stop the Sith. And I suppose Malak is the real enemy here. But I don't have much choice but to go along with this for now, do I?
Carth.nm40adcart01114_.mp3: It, uh... it all makes sense now... Revan. I've watched you, I've seen your cruelty. I've seen your... your dark side. And now this! I don't know if I can trust you. Can any of us?
Carth.nm40adcart01115_.mp3: I... I suppose you've proven yourself to be a friend of the Republic by your actions so far... Revan. But can I trust you? Can any of us?
Carth.nm40adcart01117_.mp3: And so the lies begin. It was obvious you remembered something back there when Malak confronted you with the truth. It might have only been small pieces, but there was something there!
Carth.nm40adcart01120_.mp3: Threats? You can't bully me - though I shouldn't be surprised now that I know who you really are... Revan.
Carth.nm40adcart01123_.mp3: Malak won't kill her. I think he'll want to use her battle meditation against the Republic. He'll keep her alive so he can turn her to the dark side!
Carth.nm40adcart01126_.mp3: Let's get out of here before they close those docking bay doors!
Carth.nm41aabast01001_.mp3: Safe? You saw what his fleet did to Taris: there wasn't a building over two stories high left standing! They turned the planet into one big pile of rubble.
Carth.nm41aabast01005_.mp3: Maybe you're right. It isn't easy to witness the annihilation of an entire planet. I know Mission must be taking it pretty hard.
Carth.nm41aablac01002_.mp3: Wait a minute - you understood these creatures? Of course... you and Malak must have been here before. You...you probably learned their language back when you were Revan.
Carth.nm41aacart03000_.mp3: You're back! But where's Bastila? Is she alive? What happened inside that Temple?
Carth.nm41aacart03002_.mp3: The dark side? Bastila? No! How could that happen?
Carth.nm41aacart03010_.mp3: But there's still hope for her, right? I mean, Revan rejected the dark side so Bastila could too, right? We still might be able to save her.
Carth.nm41aacart03016_.mp3: So... you did it? You turned against Revan once and for all? I knew she wasn't part of you anymore. I knew it.
Carth.nm41aacart03020_.mp3: I told you that you would have to make a choice eventually, that you would be tested. I think that was it, I can feel it.
Carth.nm41aacart03021_.mp3: And you did exactly what I'd hoped you would. It couldn't have been easy... I'm very proud of you.
Carth.nm41aacart03023_.mp3: I'm sure she did. I can't say that any one of us wouldn't have been tempted.
Carth.nm41aacart03025_.mp3: I know. I can't blame Bastila for being turned, however... she's just so young and doesn't deserve this kind of fate.
Carth.nm41aacart03027_.mp3: Always. I'm not certain any one of us wouldn't have been tempted by Bastila's offer.
Carth.nm41aacart03028_.mp3: I... I love you. I can't wait until all of this is over with.
Carth.nm41aacart03034_.mp3: Right. Sorry. I just... can't remember the last time I felt this happy. I can wait until the Star Forge is destroyed.
Carth.nm41aacart03041_.mp3: Okay - let's get moving. The longer we wait the harder this is going to be!
Carth.nm41aacart03043_.mp3: Bastila tried to tempt her to the dark side, to reclaim Revan's heritage. She failed.
Carth.nm41aacart03044_.mp3: No doubt. Let's go, then, before she has time to organize a bigger welcoming committee.
Carth.nm41aacart03052_.mp3: Dead? I... I can't believe it.
Carth.nm41aacart03056_.mp3: Hold on a second! What about Bastila? Wasn't she in the Temple? What happened?
Carth.nm41aacart03057_.mp3: Bastila - you're alive! I was worried about you. For a minute there I was sure we'd never see you again once Malak got his... wait a minute.
Carth.nm41aacart03058_.mp3: Where are Juhani and Jolee Bindo? Are they okay? What happened inside that temple?
Carth.nm41aacart03060_.mp3: What... what are you talking about?
Carth.nm41aacart03063_.mp3: No, you can't mean that! This... this isn't you! You're not Revan, I know it!
Carth.nm41aacart03067_.mp3: You've got to resist it! This isn't you talking... we can help you, we can find a way to --
Carth.nm41aacart03071_.mp3: Never! You're not the woman I love. We'll stop you if we have to, all of us.
Carth.nm41aacart03073_.mp3: I refuse to believe that! We'll stop you if we have to, all of us. We'll save you from yourselves!
Carth.nm41aacart03076_.mp3: No - we serve the Republic! You're no better than Malak! We'll never swear allegiance to one who serves the dark side!
Carth.nm41aacart03091_.mp3: You don't have to help the Sith, Mission. Not while I'm here.
Carth.nm41aacart03093_.mp3: I won't let you do this to yourself. I... I love you. No matter what.
Carth.nm41aacart03095_.mp3: Run for it, Mission! Get to the jungle! Go! Go!
Carth.nm41aacart03099_.mp3: Run for it, Mission! Get to the jungle! Go! Go!
Carth.nm41aacart03109_.mp3: Where's Jolee Bindo? Is he okay? What happened inside that temple?
Carth.nm41aacart03112_.mp3: That disruptor field fried our stabilizers - we're lucky we made it down in one piece! But if we can't find the salvage to make repairs I won't even be able to get the Ebon Hawk airborne again!
Carth.nm41aacart03117_.mp3: Even if we get the stabilizers fixed, we'll have to find and disable the source of that disruptor field before we can take off. Otherwise we'll just end up crashing again.
Carth.nm41aacart03119_.mp3: You're right! That Sith fleet we saw must have some type of protection against the disruptor field. We have to find a way to disable it or the Republic will be slaughtered!
Carth.nm41aacart03123_.mp3: We haven't forgotten about her. But we can't do her much good stuck down here. We have to help ourselves before we can help her.
Carth.nm41aacart03131_.mp3: Well, if Bastila is on the Star Forge like you think, Jolee, then we can't rescue her until we disable that disruptor field. The sooner we investigate that temple to the east the better.
Carth.nm41aacart03132_.mp3: We can probably find the wreckage of a downed ship along the way. If we're lucky we can salvage some stabilizers from it to get off this planet.
Carth.nm41aacart03139_.mp3: The stabilizers won't do much good if we don't disable that disruptor field first. Otherwise, we'll end up crashing back down to the planet's surface again. And this time we might not survive!
Carth.nm41aacart03142_.mp3: Good idea. If that temple's generating power it probably has something to do with that disruptor field.
Carth.nm41aacart03145_.mp3: They must have some kind of protection against it. But the Republic fleet won't. We have to find a way to disable that disruptor field or the Sith will slaughter them!
Carth.nm41aacart03146_.mp3: Hey, where are you going? We can't leave the planet yet. Remember all those wrecked ships we saw?
Carth.nm41aacart03147_.mp3: We need to salvage some new stabilizers or the Ebon Hawk won't even be able to get off the ground.
Carth.nm41aacart03148_.mp3: Until we get inside that temple and find some way to disable that disruptor field, the Ebon Hawk is grounded.
Carth.nm41aacart04000_.mp3: You're back! But where's Bastila? Is she alive? What happened inside that Temple?
Carth.nm41aacart04002_.mp3: The dark side? Bastila? No! No! How could that happen?
Carth.nm41aacart04003_.mp3: She was always in danger of being seduced by the dark side, Carth. Bastila was strong, but she was always impatient and headstrong. Malak preyed upon her weaknesses.
Carth.nm41aacart04004_.mp3: This planet is a tainted place, the Star Forge and the Temple have twisted the Force into an instrument of evil - just as Malak has twisted Bastila into a servant of the Sith.
Carth.nm41aacart04006_.mp3: Malak has a strong hold on Bastila now - it will be difficult for her to break free of his influence. Especially considering her long association with you.
Carth.nm41aacart04008_.mp3: In the end we all choose our own path, but keep in mind the role that you played in her downfall. You and the task assigned to her by the Jedi Council.
Carth.nm41aacart04009_.mp3: Remember the bond that was forged between you when she rekindled the spark that was your life. Through that bond she touched your memories... and also the echo of the dark taint within you.
Carth.nm41aacart04010_.mp3: But there's still hope for her, right? I mean, Revan rejected the dark side so Bastila could too, right? We still might be able to save her.
Carth.nm41aacart04012_.mp3: I don't know what fate awaits us, but I sense Bastila still has a role to play in the events to come. I have no doubt she will be waiting for us on the Star Forge.
Carth.nm41aacart04013_.mp3: No doubt. I must say that it's good to have you with us, my dear. For a minute there I thought you might decide... well, never mind what I thought.
Carth.nm41aacart04015_.mp3: Bastila tried to tempt her to the dark side, to reclaim Revan's heritage. She failed.
Carth.nm41aacart04016_.mp3: So... you did it? You turned against Revan once and for all? I knew she wasn't part of you anymore. I...I knew it.
Carth.nm41aacart04020_.mp3: I told you that you would have to make a choice eventually, that you would be tested. I think that was it, I...I can feel it.
Carth.nm41aacart04021_.mp3: And you did exactly what I'd hoped you would. It couldn't have been easy... I'm...I'm very proud of you.
Carth.nm41aacart04023_.mp3: I'm sure she did. I can't say that any one of us wouldn't have been tempted.
Carth.nm41aacart04025_.mp3: I know. I can't blame Bastila for being turned, however... she's...she's just so young and doesn't deserve this kind of fate.
Carth.nm41aacart04027_.mp3: Always. I'm not certain any one of us wouldn't have been tempted by Bastila's offer.
Carth.nm41aacart04028_.mp3: I... I love you. And I...I can't wait until all of this is over with.
Carth.nm41aacart04030_.mp3: Hey! Sheesh... get a room, will ya?
Carth.nm41aacart04032_.mp3: Oh, sure. Even a good omen can get itself a room, though, don't ya think?
Carth.nm41aacart04034_.mp3: Right. Sorry. I just... can't remember the last time I felt this happy. I can wait until the Star Forge is destroyed.
Carth.nm41aacart04035_.mp3: You make that sound so easy. Just fly over and boom, one less Star Forge in the universe, huh?
Carth.nm41aacart04036_.mp3: I feel more confident now than I ever did before. The Force is with us, Mission.
Carth.nm41aacart04037_.mp3: Well, I'm an old man and I know you should take love when you can find it. Good for you two, I say.
Carth.nm41aacart04039_.mp3: Answer: I have no idea what they speak of, droid. Organic meatbags are an eternal mystery to me.
Carth.nm41aacart04040_.mp3: Confidence is all well and good, Carth, but if we are going to catch up to Bastila we should leave soon, don't you think?
Carth.nm41aacart04041_.mp3: Okay - let's get moving. The longer we wait the harder this is going to be!
Carth.nm41aacart04043_.mp3: Bastila tried to tempt her to the dark side, to reclaim Revan's heritage. She failed.
Carth.nm41aacart04044_.mp3: No doubt. Let's go, then, before she has time to organize a bigger welcoming committee.
Carth.nm41aacart04045_.mp3: I'm not sure what's in store for us, but I sense Bastila still has a role to play. I have no doubt she'll be waiting for us on the Star Forge.
Carth.nm41aacart04049_.mp3: Weakness has nothing to do with the corruption of the dark side. A Jedi must always guard against pride and the desire for power. Especially you.
Carth.nm41aacart04052_.mp3: Dead? I... I can't believe it.
Carth.nm41aacart04053_.mp3: She is not dead, Carth - though maybe that might have been easier for you to accept. She has fallen to the dark side and fled to the Star Forge.
Carth.nm41aacart04054_.mp3: She's not dead, Carth - though that might have been easier for you to accept. She's fallen to the dark side and fled to the Star Forge.
Carth.nm41aacart04056_.mp3: Hold on a second! What about Bastila? Wasn't she in the Temple? Wh...what happened?
Carth.nm41aacart04057_.mp3: Bastila - you're alive! I was worried about you. For a minute there I was sure we'd never see you again once Malak got his... w... wait a minute.
Carth.nm41aacart04058_.mp3: Where are Juhani and Jolee Bindo? Are they okay? What happened inside that temple?
Carth.nm41aacart04060_.mp3: What... what are you talking about?
Carth.nm41aacart04063_.mp3: No, you can't mean that! This... this isn't you! You're not Revan, I know it!
Carth.nm41aacart04067_.mp3: You've got to resist it! Th... this isn't you talking... we... we can help you, we can find a way --
Carth.nm41aacart04068_.mp3: My, my. I think the sad fool may actually be in love with you, Revan.
Carth.nm41aacart04071_.mp3: No, never! You're not the woman I love. We'll stop you if we have to, all of us.
Carth.nm41aacart04073_.mp3: I refuse to believe that! We'll...we'll stop you if we have to, all of us. We'll save you from yourselves!
Carth.nm41aacart04076_.mp3: Wh... what? No! We serve the Republic! You're no better than Malak! We'll never swear allegiance to one who serves the dark side!
Carth.nm41aacart04091_.mp3: You don't have to help the Sith, Mission. Not while I'm here.
Carth.nm41aacart04092_.mp3: I see now it was a mistake to let you go into that Temple. I of all people should have seen this coming. First Saul Karath, and now you... I mean, I should be an expert on betrayal by now!
Carth.nm41aacart04093_.mp3: But nothing you can say or do can make me betray the Republic. I won't join you, and I won't just stand aside and let you become ruler of the Sith again, Revan!
Carth.nm41aacart04095_.mp3: I... I'll find a way to save you, I swear! I won't give up on you... no matter what!
Carth.nm41aacart04096_.mp3: Run for it, Mission! Go! Go!
Carth.nm41aacart04098_.mp3: Run for it, Mission! Go! Go!
Carth.nm41aacart04105_.mp3: Jolee would not swear loyalty to the new ruler of the Sith. He died for his foolishness. Now swear loyalty to Darth Revan, or face your own death!
Carth.nm41aacart04108_.mp3: Where's Jolee Bindo? Is he okay? What happened inside that temple?
Carth.nm41aacart04110_.mp3: Whew! Talk about your rough landings, Carth! What's the matter? You're flying like you've been on an all night Tarisian ale drinking binge!
Carth.nm41aacart04111_.mp3: That disrupter field fried our stabilizers - we're lucky we made it down in one piece! If we can't find the salvage to make repairs I won't even be able to get the Ebon Hawk airborne again!
Carth.nm41aacart04112_.mp3: You know, during our rather rapid descent I noticed the hulls of many crashed ships scattered across the landscape. Perhaps the parts you need can be found among their wreckage.
Carth.nm41aacart04113_.mp3: The Cathar's right: this planet's a technological graveyard. I saw dozens of downed ships out there. That disrupter field must have wiped them all out. But where could it be coming from?
Carth.nm41aacart04114_.mp3: During our rather rapid descent I noticed the hulls of many crashed ships scattered across the landscape. Maybe the parts you need can be found among their wreckage.
Carth.nm41aacart04115_.mp3: The old man's right: this planet's a technological graveyard. I saw dozens of downed ships out there. That disrupter field must have wiped them all out.
Carth.nm41aacart04116_.mp3: Even if we get the stabilizers fixed, we're gonna have to find and disable the source of that disrupter field before we can take off. Otherwise we'll just end up crashing again.
Carth.nm41aacart04118_.mp3: You're right! That Sith fleet we saw must have some type of protection against the disrupter field. We have to find a way to disable it or the Republic will be slaughtered!
Carth.nm41aacart04120_.mp3: T3's picking up massive power fluctuations on the ship's sensors. They seem to be coming from some type of large stone structure to the east... it looks like some kind of ancient temple.
Carth.nm41aacart04122_.mp3: We haven't forgotten about her. But we can't do her much good stuck down here. We have to help ourselves before we can help her.
Carth.nm41aacart04123_.mp3: I only hope we're not too late. Bastila has been Malak's prisoner for a long time. If he can turn her to the dark side she will join him and the Sith will be invincible.
Carth.nm41aacart04125_.mp3: I fear Bastila will find the lure of the dark side difficult to resist. She is strong in the Force, but she is also impulsive, willful and proud - as you once were, Revan.
Carth.nm41aacart04127_.mp3: I am glad to hear you say that. Now that you know your true identity I was afraid you might slip back over to the dark side. If Bastila feels as you do there may yet be hope for her.
Carth.nm41aacart04129_.mp3: Let us hope it does not come to that.
Carth.nm41aacart04130_.mp3: Well, if Bastila is on the Star Forge like you think, Jolee, then we can't rescue her until we disable that disrupter field. The sooner we investigate that temple to the east the better.
Carth.nm41aacart04131_.mp3: We can probably find the wreckage of a downed ship along the way. And if we're lucky we can salvage some stabilizers from it to get off this planet.
Carth.nm41aacart04132_.mp3: I hope everything works out as smooth as you make it sound, Carth.
Carth.nm41aacart04133_.mp3: So do I, Mission. So do I.
Carth.nm41aacart04135_.mp3: I remember... though I hoped you would not be so quick to embrace the being you once were. If Bastila feels as you do then she is lost to us, Revan.
Carth.nm41aacart04136_.mp3: I just hope we're not too late. Bastila's been Malak's prisoner for a long time. If he turns her to the dark side she'll join him and the Sith will become invincible.
Carth.nm41aacart04138_.mp3: The stabilizers won't do much good if we don't disable that disrupter field first. Otherwise, we'll end up crashing back down to the planet's surface again. And this time we might not survive!
Carth.nm41aacart04139_.mp3: Hey, don't forget about Bastila, guys! We still have to rescue her, too.
Carth.nm41aacart04141_.mp3: Good idea. If that temple's generating power it probably has something to do with that disrupter field.
Carth.nm41aacart04143_.mp3: They must have some kind of protection against it. But the Republic fleet won't. And we're gonna have to find a way to disable that disrupter field or the Sith will slaughter them!
Carth.nm41aacart04144_.mp3: Hey, where are you going? We can't leave the planet yet. Remember all those wrecked ships we saw?
Carth.nm41aacart04145_.mp3: We need to salvage some new stabilizers or the Ebon Hawk won't even be able to get off the ground.
Carth.nm41aacart04146_.mp3: Until we get inside that temple and find some way to disable that disrupter field, the Ebon Hawk is grounded.
Carth.nm41aastar03000_.mp3: The Star Forge... it's huge. I've never seen anything like it before.
Carth.nm41aastar03002_.mp3: I'm transmitting these co-ordinates to Admiral Dodonna. Maybe a quick strike by the Republic can cripple the Sith fleet.
Carth.nm41aastar03003_.mp3: Message is away. We should probably wait for the Republic fleet to show up before we try and rescue Bastila. We'll need cover if we want to fly in and dock on the Star Forge.
Carth.nm41aastar03004_.mp3: We've got company... a small vanguard of Sith fighters, coming in hard! Get on those gun turrets! Take those fighters out before they report our position to the main fleet!
Carth.nm41aastar03006_.mp3: No, it's something else. We've flown into some kind of disruptor field. All my instruments are jammed... we've got massive overloads on all systems!
Carth.nm41aastar03007_.mp3: I'm picking up a single planet in this system. I'm gonna try and put us down there. Hold on - this might be a rough landing.
Carth.nm45aacart02001_.mp3: Soon the Republic fleet will break through and the capital ships will be able to bombard the Star Forge. Then it will finally be over.
Carth.nm45aacart02003_.mp3: There's no point. There's no other place I'd rather be than here.
Carth.nm45aacart02005_.mp3: You know that can't happen. There's no turning back for you... there's just an ending.
Carth.nm45aacart02007_.mp3: It's the only way. The only alternative is a path I know you don't want to take.
Carth.nm45aacart02008_.mp3: You're very brave to make the decision you did. I... I love you. You know that, right?
Carth.nm45aacart02011_.mp3: There isn't much time. It should be over soon.
Carth.nm45aacart02013_.mp3: This is all the time we have. It should all be over soon.
Carth.nm45aacart02014_.mp3: We have to kill her! Her Battle Meditation is the only thing stopping the fleet from getting through!
Carth.nm45aacart02018_.mp3: That's great news! I knew you could do it!
Carth.nm45aacart02021_.mp3: I don't think anyone actually expected that he could be redeemed. I'm surprised you would even think of trying.
Carth.nm45aacart02023_.mp3: Hey! I was doing what I could, thank you very much!
Carth.nm45aacart02025_.mp3: No time to celebrate just yet. With Bastila dead, the Republic has broken through the Sith fleet! The capital ships are in bombardment range!
Carth.nm45aacart02026_.mp3: And that means we have to get out of here right now, before this entire complex comes down around our ears! Everyone else is already on the ship! Let's move!!
Carth.nm45aacart02027_.mp3: So you killed Darth Malak. Somehow I... I always knew you would.
Carth.nm45aacart02031_.mp3: The Republic fleet picked me up from the planet. I told them of your betrayal... but I also told them I couldn't abandon you.
Carth.nm45aacart02032_.mp3: I had to come. I said I'd find a way to save you from yourself, and I will.
Carth.nm45aacart02034_.mp3: I don't believe that. I don't think you do, either.
Carth.nm45aacart02036_.mp3: And abandon you? No, I couldn't have done that.
Carth.nm45aacart02038_.mp3: All you have to do is listen to me. That's all I ask.
Carth.nm45aacart02040_.mp3: Don't interfere, Bastila. This is between me and Revan.
Carth.nm45aacart02044_.mp3: I love you. Even now. Even after... after...after all you have done. I love you like I haven't loved anyone or anything since my wife died. And I didn't even think that was possible.
Carth.nm45aacart02045_.mp3: You may not love me. You may not love anything anymore now that you've gone over to the dark side... but I believe that there's still some part of you I can reach.
Carth.nm45aacart02046_.mp3: There's a part of you that believes in hope... and mercy... and love. And that part knows that it will soon be gone forever.
Carth.nm45aacart02049_.mp3: No, it's too late for that. And it's too late for you to turn back... but you can end this here. There's still time for one final act of redemption.
Carth.nm45aacart02050_.mp3: Kill Bastila. Without her Battle Meditation the Republic fleet can destroy the Star Forge and rid the galaxy of this evil.
Carth.nm45aacart02052_.mp3: Stay here on the Star Forge. With me. We won't have time to get off before the Star Forge is destroyed, not if you stop Bastila. But our sacrifice can save the Republic.
Carth.nm45aacart02053_.mp3: If you don't, all you'll have is...is emptiness and darkness. You don't want that. Please don't want that. Stay... let's end this now. Together.
Carth.nm45aacart02065_.mp3: I know. It's too late to turn back... but you can end this here. There's still time for one final act of redemption.
Carth.nm45aacart02068_.mp3: I wish... I wish there could have been another way.

Carth_radio.nm01aacart01000_.mp3: This is Carth Onasi on your personal communicator. I'm tracking your position through the Endar Spire's life support systems.
Carth_radio.nm01aacart01001_.mp3: You're the last Republic survivor on the Endar Spire! You have to get off the ship!
Carth_radio.nm01aacart01002_.mp3: Bastila's escape pod is away - you're the last surviving crew member of the Endar Spire! I can't wait for you much longer; you have to get to the escape pods!
Carth_radio.nm01aacart01003_.mp3: But be careful. There's a Sith patrol just down the corridor. Use your STEALTH skill to sneak past him.
Carth_radio.nm01aacart01004_.mp3: First, make sure you have a stealth field generator equipped on your belt. You can't use your stealth skill without one.
Carth_radio.nm01aacart01005_.mp3: Be careful! There's a whole squad of Sith Troopers on the other side of that door! You need to find some way to thin their numbers.
Carth_radio.nm01aacart01006_.mp3: You could reprogram the damaged assault droid to help you, if you have enough repair parts.
Carth_radio.nm01aacart01007_.mp3: Or you could use computer spikes to slice into the terminal and use the Endar Spire's security systems against the Sith.
Carth_radio.nm01aacart01026_.mp3: Then use the D-pad to cycle through your ACTION MENU, and press <abutton> when you see "STEALTH" highlighted.
Carth_radio.nm01aacart01027_.mp3: The generator will wrap you in a cloaking effect so you can sneak past the Sith. Just be careful you don't get too close or he might notice someone's there.
Carth_radio.nm01aatras02057_.mp3: This is Carth Onasi - the Sith are threatening to overrun our position! We can't hold out long against their firepower! All hands to the bridge!

CasusDad.nm14adcuts02005_.mp3: Is there something - anything - we can offer you as a reward?
CasusDad.nm14adcuts02064_.mp3: This... this has all gone horribly wrong somewhere. Ahlan, what can we be thinking? How could we have let this go this far?
CasusDad.nm14adcuts02065_.mp3: We are at each others throats now fighting over our children's lives when they are old enough to live their own.
CasusDad.nm14adcuts02116_.mp3: My daughter is not a harlot, Matale dog!
CasusDad.nm14adcuts02118_.mp3: We are trying to be reasonable here, of course. We ARE sensible people after all. But our children are being so stubborn.
CasusDad.nm14adcuts02122_.mp3: And I won't let my daughter go with him!
CasusDad.nm14adcuts02201_.mp3: Do not tell me what to do, Jedi! The Council will hear of the trouble you caused here today!
CasusDad.nm14adcuts02203_.mp3: You think to make us stand here, then?!
CasusDad.nm14adcuts02205_.mp3: I... I don't know why we fight like this. We got along in the beginning, didn't we Ahlan?
CasusDad.nm14adcuts02207_.mp3: Well, it wouldn't be so bad would it? Shen seems to genuinely care for my Rahasia. He might be a good husband for her someday.
CasusDad.nm14adcuts02212_.mp3: Of course not, you pompous old windbag! They'll be living with me!
CasusDad.nm14adcuts02217_.mp3: Um... well, yes, actually that sounds like a good idea.
CasusDad.nm14adcuts02225_.mp3: Of course not! My house is more than good enough!
CasusDad.nm16aanuri01000_.mp3: I have been informed by my protocol droid that you wish to speak to me.
CasusDad.nm16aanuri01002_.mp3: I feel great sorrow at the young Matale heir's disappearance, but they are not the only family to suffer such a tragedy. Dantooine is a dangerous place.
CasusDad.nm16aanuri01004_.mp3: My own son Casus has been missing for some time now. But I know nothing about the disappearance of Shen. Perhaps he and Casus now share a similar fate.
CasusDad.nm16aanuri01006_.mp3: I brought my family here to find peace and safety - not to be harassed and treated like common criminals! Your Council has no authority here, and I respectfully ask you to leave this property at once.
CasusDad.nm16aanuri01022_.mp3: I trust you will show yourself out. If not, my security droids will be sure to deal with you.
CasusDad.nm16aanuri01024_.mp3: I know nothing about Shen! Please, just tell me what you know about my son!
CasusDad.nm16aanuri01027_.mp3: Casus... is dead? I was afraid of this, yet in my heart I knew it must be true. What... what happened to my son?
CasusDad.nm16aanuri01029_.mp3: Kath hounds? I... I was so certain the Matale family was to blame... But this changes nothing! My own son is dead - why should I shed one tear about the disappearance of my bitter enemy's son?
CasusDad.nm16aanuri01033_.mp3: I must ask you something, though it is difficult for me. My son had a diary. His private, personal thoughts. Now that he is gone, I have nothing else to remember him by.
CasusDad.nm16aanuri01035_.mp3: Please, the diary means more to me than it ever could to you. I will give you a hundred credits for its return.
CasusDad.nm16aanuri01039_.mp3: [Success] I did not realize the Jedi were such cold hearted monsters. Very well, you shall have your two hundred credits. Here!
CasusDad.nm16aanuri01042_.mp3: [Failure] You think you can exploit a father's grief? I loved my son, but I am no fool! You shall get nothing from me! May the curse that brought Casus to his death be on your head as well!
CasusDad.nm16aanuri01049_.mp3: I thank you for this. The diary is all I have left of my son.
CasusDad.nm16aanuri01051_.mp3: We have nothing further to discuss. Please, leave me to my grief.
CasusDad.nm16aanuri01054_.mp3: Are all Jedi so callous towards those who grieve? No matter. Your cruel words hurt me no more than the news itself.
CasusDad.nm16aanuri01056_.mp3: I have been informed by my protocol droid that you have news about my son Casus.

C_Radio.nm28abc01001002_.mp3: Come on - hurry up! ## Don't just stand there, we have to keep moving! The water is filled with... ## Ahhhhhhh....

Davik.nglobecalo02006_.mp3: You underestimate me; there's other ways down here besides the Republic subs. A small vessel with the right weapons can blast a path right through those firaxian sharks.
Davik.nglobecalo02008_.mp3: Once I got down to the ocean floor all I had to do was come here and wait. I knew you'd come back this way eventually.
Davik.nglobecalo02010_.mp3: Sorry, I'm not in this for the credits. You're the only ones who've ever gotten away from me - I've got a rep to protect!
Davik.nglobedavi05000_.mp3: Excuse me, have you seen a mechanic about? Short fellow, bald. I've been looking --
Davik.nglobedavi05018_.mp3: Of course, old man. Oh, wait... if you've been traveling in this sector, I suppose you heard about Sunry?
Davik.nglobedavi05022_.mp3: He's been picked up by the Selkath authorities here on Manaan. For murder.
Davik.nglobedavi05024_.mp3: He's been picked up by the Selkath authorities on Manaan. For murder.
Davik.nglobedavi05028_.mp3: I know. Elora is beside herself, as you can imagine. Maybe you could help them? I'm sure Sunry would appreciate a Jedi's assistance right about now.
Davik.nglobedavi05034_.mp3: Same here. Well, heh, it was good to see you again. Give my regards to Elora, if you see her.
Davik.nm03aabrej02028_.mp3: Vulkars - to me! Kill this woman! Kill the swoop rider! Kill them all!
Davik.nm03aacand06006_.mp3: Ah, so you want to play this the hard way? Haha. OK. *sharp whistle*
Davik.nm03aecand07006_.mp3: Ah, so you want to do this the hard way? Haha. Ok. (sharp whistle)
Davik.nm08aadavi08000_.mp3: So, Canderous - I see you have brought someone with you. Most intriguing, if I do say so myself. You usually travel alone.
Davik.nm08aadavi08006_.mp3: Enough! I won't have my top two men killing each other - that's not good business. I'm sure Canderous has an explanation as to why he's not working solo anymore.
Davik.nm08aadavi08010_.mp3: Ah, yes - now I recognize your companion. The rider who won the big swoop race. Very impressive... as was your display in the rather heated battle afterwards.
Davik.nm08aadavi08012_.mp3: You know, Canderous was right. The Exchange is always looking for new talent. You could have a bright future with our organization.
Davik.nm08aadavi08015_.mp3: An important lesson to learn, no doubt. In my line of business I've seen far too many people suffer for not understanding it.
Davik.nm08aadavi08018_.mp3: A casual fan at best, but everyone on Taris follows the big season opener. But we have more important issues to discuss now.
Davik.nm08aadavi08020_.mp3: With a recommendation from Canderous - and a thorough background check - you could become part of the Exchange. Many would kill to prove themselves worthy of this honor.
Davik.nm08aadavi08023_.mp3: Don't be so hasty. Our allies end up much better off than our enemies - as both Canderous and Calo Nord could surely tell you. The Exchange has much to offer.
Davik.nm08aadavi08025_.mp3: Come with me - I will give you a tour of my operations. I'm certain you'll be most impressed.
Davik.nm08aadavi08027_.mp3: Ah, there she is - the Ebon Hawk. My pride and joy; the fastest ship in the Outer Rim! Note the state of the art security system I've had installed to protect her.
Davik.nm08aadavi08029_.mp3: The shields are completely impregnable. Nobody can get past them without the codes to try and steal my baby. Unfortunately, the Sith military blockade has grounded my vessel.
Davik.nm08aadavi08031_.mp3: The Ebon Hawk can outrun any vessel in the galaxy, but even she isn't fast enough to avoid the auto-targeting laser cannons of the orbiting Sith fleet.
Davik.nm08aadavi08033_.mp3: I am, of course, working on acquiring the Sith departure codes so that I may come and go as I please. However, progress has been slow... but we should continue our tour.
Davik.nm08aadavi08035_.mp3: These will be your accommodations. The slave quarters are just down the hall. If you need anything during your stay - food, a massage - feel free to call upon their services.
Davik.nm08aadavi08037_.mp3: If all goes well with your background check you will be invited to join the Exchange. I'd advise you to accept the offer when it comes - or suffer the dire consequences of refusal.
Davik.nm08aadavi08041_.mp3: You will stay in these rooms as my guest for the next few days; I will not accept no for an answer. Feel free to visit the slave quarters at any time during your stay.
Davik.nm08aadavi08043_.mp3: I must warn you that if you are found anywhere outside the guest wing during your stay - or if you bother my other guests - my security forces will deal with you most harshly.
Davik.nm08aadavi08045_.mp3: I will return after the investigation into your background is complete. Until then, make yourself comfortable. Come, Calo, let us leave our guests in peace.
Davik.nm08aadavi09000_.mp3: Damn those Sith - they're bombing the whole planet! I knew they'd turn on us sooner or... well, look what we got here! Thieves in the hangar.
Davik.nm08aadavi09002_.mp3: So, you figured you'd just steal my ship for your get-away and leave me high and dry while the Sith turn the planet into dust? Sorry, but that ain't going to happen!
Davik.nm08aadavi09006_.mp3: Make it quick, Calo. The Sith mean business. If we don't get to our ships and find somewhere safe, the bombs they're dropping will kill us all.
Davik.nm17ae04ni04026_.mp3: Tsk tsk. Not even willing to expend a bit of effort in actual persuasion, hey? Well, you do what you like.

Female_01.nm02adyung12008_.mp3: Careful, Yun. That wine's got quite the kick. A couple more bottles and we'll all be passed out on the floor!
Female_01.nm02aeyung26002_.mp3: Careful, Yun. That wine's got quite the kick. A couple more bottles and we'll all be passed out on the floor!
Female_01.nm33aashaa19004_.mp3: Oh, of course, Shaardan! Anything you command us!
Female_01.nm40aasaul10095_.mp3: No! AHHH!!! AUGH! NO!!! I beg you... No! Mercy!!! NO!!! AUGH!
Female_01.nm45aafema07000_.mp3: You made it! Several Jedi have already gone ahead into the Star Forge. We have to strike while we still have the element of surprise!
Female_01.nm45aafema07001_.mp3: If we don't stop Bastila from using her Battle Meditation the entire Republic fleet will be wiped out!
Female_01.nm45aafema07002b.mp3: Damn! So much for catching them unprepared.
Female_01.nm45aafema07003_.mp3: We'll deal with these Sith - you get into the Star Forge and find Bastila! Hurry!
Female_01.nm45aafema07004_.mp3: We'll deal with these Sith - you get into the Star Forge and find Malak!
Female_01.nm45aafema07005_.mp3: We have to find Malak! A victory by the Republic fleet won't mean anything if the Dark Lord gets away.
Female_01.nm45aafema07006_.mp3: We don't want the Sith to cut off our escape route. We'll stay here and hold this docking bay. You get in there and find Bastila!
Female_01.nm45aafema07007_.mp3: We don't want the Sith to cut off our escape route. We'll stay here and hold this docking bay. You get in there and find Malak!

Female_02.nm26absith16000_.mp3: Hey - this street is for Sith only. You got to pay a 20 credit toll to walk down this street.
Female_02.nm26absith16005_.mp3: Hiding behind the Selkath laws - typical Republic cowardice!
Female_02.nm26absith16008_.mp3: You talk big - but remember what we did to Taris. Maybe you're next on our list.
Female_02.nm26absith16010_.mp3: Hey, you working for the Republic? You look like a Republic agent - I can see the cowardice in your eyes.
Female_02.nm26absith16012_.mp3: You think you can impress me by spouting a bunch of Jedi garbage? If it wasn't for the Selkath neutrality laws, I'd add your name to the list of Jedi I've killed.
Female_02.nm26absith16015_.mp3: Are you threatening me? It's illegal to try to start a fight in Ahto City! Constable - over here! This Republic scum is trying to break the peace!
Female_02.nm26absith16023_.mp3: The Selkath claim neutrality, but you're always giving preferential treatment to the Republic! I'm going to report this incident to the Sith Embassy!
Female_02.nm26absith16030_.mp3: Me? I didn't do anything! This is an outrage! A travesty of justice!
Female_02.nm26absith16036_.mp3: I'll get you for this, Jedi! The Sith won't stand for this!
Female_02.nm26absith16053_.mp3: Out of my way - unless you want to feel the wrath of the Sith!
Female_02.nm26absith16055_.mp3: You dare mock me? If it wasn't for the Selkath laws I'd teach you proper respect!
Female_02.nm26absith16058_.mp3: The wrath of the Sith is a terrible thing! Remember Taris! You'll see - you'll all see!
Female_02.nm26absith17000_.mp3: Back off, Republic scum! A man like you couldn't hope to satisfy a Sith woman!
Female_02.nm26absith17002_.mp3: Back off, Republic dog! You couldn't hope to compare to a real woman!

Female_03.nm13aazzsh24000_.mp3: Hello there, I... it's you! I remember you! You're the one that gave me the credits to leave Tatooine! I could never forget your face.
Female_03.nm13aazzsh24001_.mp3: Thank you so much for what you did. Here on Dantooine, we've got a chance.
Female_03.nm13aazzsh24003_.mp3: Well, I may be able to get hired as a servant for one of the influential families here. I haven't yet, but I'm sure I will.
Female_03.nm13aazzsh24004_.mp3: At least there's hope here. Tatooine was just dying, all of it.
Female_03.nm13aazzsh24006_.mp3: I found a small apartment for now. They're resting now. They're still getting used to the new surroundings.
Female_03.nm13aazzsh24007_.mp3: Once I'm working I'll see about getting them into school. There are opportunities here they would have never had on Tatooine.
Female_03.nm13aazzsh24009_.mp3: Thank you. I won't trouble you any more, but... thank you.
Female_03.nm13aazzsh24011_.mp3: Er... all right then. But thank you again. I couldn't have made it here without you.
Female_03.nm13aazzsh24012_.mp3: Thank you again. We've got a chance now, and it's all because of you.
Female_03.nm13aazzsh24013_.mp3: You've helped so much. It's good that I can tell my children that there are nice people in the galaxy.
Female_03.nm13aazzsh24014_.mp3: I wish Ward could have come here with us. I miss him.
Female_03.nm13aazzsh24015_.mp3: It's so different here, so alive. I can't remember seeing green on Tatooine
Female_03.nm14aac86901001_.mp3: Aren't you just a sweet little droid, yes you are!
Female_03.nm14aaelis04000_.mp3: Greetings, young Jedi, I wonder if you could assist me. I seem to have lost my... companion, you see.
Female_03.nm14aaelis04002_.mp3: We were working on my farm to the north of here. I was working in the garden outside, and he was working inside.
Female_03.nm14aaelis04003_.mp3: I heard the door to the house open, but not close. I went to see and found it wide open!
Female_03.nm14aaelis04004_.mp3: I searched everywhere, and could not find him! I worry so much. I need him back so badly. I wonder if he... Could he have been kidnapped?
Female_03.nm14aaelis04006_.mp3: Maybe it was the Mandalorians... or maybe kath hounds. But... no...
Female_03.nm14aaelis04008_.mp3: Kath hounds are not intelligent enough to open doors. Although they have been more vicious lately...
Female_03.nm14aaelis04009_.mp3: No, it must have been someone who could open the door by himself. Come to think of it, the door was locked!
Female_03.nm14aaelis04011_.mp3: No, the door was undamaged and showed no signs of tampering...
Female_03.nm14aaelis04014_.mp3: Well... Yes, it could have. But he had no reason to run away! His programming...
Female_03.nm14aaelis04015_.mp3: He was supposed to be completely loyal! To serve me after my husband died!
Female_03.nm14aaelis04019_.mp3: Not that I know of... Er... *ahem* None of my neighbors really know he's there.
Female_03.nm14aaelis04021_.mp3: Oh, I'm sorry, master Jedi, I did not give you a proper introduction. I am Elise Montagne. I own the farm to the north of here.
Female_03.nm14aaelis04022_.mp3: But I really am in need of your assistance. Time may be critical with so many kath hounds about. Oh, and those Mandalorians! Please, will you help me find him?
Female_03.nm14aaelis04024_.mp3: Please, I beg of you, I must find him. How can you leave him out there with so many dangerous beasts and predators? Have you no humanity?
Female_03.nm14aaelis04027_.mp3: Please, if you do see him, return him to me. He is so far from home... He is a C8 model droid about a meter and a half tall...
Female_03.nm14aaelis04029_.mp3: Well... yes... he is a droid.
Female_03.nm14aaelis04030_.mp3: But he is very valuable to me all the same! He is the last piece of my poor, passed-away husband that I have left.
Female_03.nm14aaelis04031_.mp3: He is very dear to me, my precious is. I don't know what I'd do without him!
Female_03.nm14aaelis04034_.mp3: He's the only companionship I have on all of Dantooine!
Female_03.nm14aaelis04036_.mp3: He is a personal assistance droid. My husband was a genius at constructing droids. He made this one capable of taking care of me for the rest of my life.
Female_03.nm14aaelis04037_.mp3: As the last legacy of my husband, for my own personal ease of mind, I need him back! His absence gnaws at me like a gaping wound.
Female_03.nm14aaelis04042_.mp3: Please, I beg of you, return my droid to me!
Female_03.nm14aaelis04045_.mp3: Thank you! Thank you, master Jedi! If you find him, please send him home to me. I need him so much!
Female_03.nm14aaelis04047_.mp3: Please! Should you find him, send him home to me!
Female_03.nm14aaelis04052_.mp3: My droid is still missing. I can feel him like a hole in my aching heart.
Female_03.nm14aaelis04054_.mp3: My droid... destroyed? No, no! This cannot be happening! I cannot bear to live without him!
Female_03.nm14aaelis04057_.mp3: He is out there still? I must find him!
Female_03.nm14aaelis04061_.mp3: Please, if you come across my droid, bring him to me. I need him so much...
Female_03.nm14aaelis09001_.mp3: I don't know what I would have done if I had lost him!
Female_03.nm14aaelis09003_.mp3: It's just soo great to have him back!
Female_03.nm14aaelis09004_.mp3: We're just going to go right home, right now, and celebrate, aren't we, my lovely little droid?
Female_03.nm14aaelis09005_.mp3: Don't worry, I'm going to hug you and oil you and care for you and make sure you never ever get away again.
Female_03.nm14aaelis09006_.mp3: I'll be waiting for you, Master Jedi.

Female_04.nm33aagenp09000_.mp3: You are so lucky. You got accepted into the academy, didn't you? I'm beginning to think I never will. *sigh*
Female_04.nm33aagenp09001_.mp3: Hey! You've got one of the medallions! You've been accepted! How did you ever manage that?!
Female_04.nm33aagenp09002_.mp3: If you're looking to get into the academy, you're going to have a tough time. There's lots of us here trying to get accepted.
Female_04.nm33aagenp09003_.mp3: When one of the Sith thinks you're ready for the academy, he gives you a medallion. I wish I had one of those...
Female_04.nm33aagenp09004_.mp3: Can you imagine if I actually became a Sith? The power I'd have! I could do anything!!
Female_04.nm33aagenp09005_.mp3: Do you know where I can find Yuthura Ban? I understand she's the one who determines if you are accepted into the academy or not.
Female_04.nm33aagenp09006_.mp3: You'd better be careful around some of those Sith. They'll eliminate any prospects just to remove a potential future threat!
Female_04.nm33aagenp09007_.mp3: I've had two friends killed by the Sith already. It must be some kind of test... I'll survive and make it into the academy, I know it!
Female_04.nm33aamech12007_.mp3: I knew we'd run into some of Davik's old associates sooner or later. No matter where you go somebody's working for the Exchange!
Female_04.nm33aaport16029_.mp3: Hmph! Wherever you find the Sith, Czerka isn't far away. Like granite slugs on a sky tower.
Female_04.nm33aapros17000_.mp3: You... are one of the Sith from the academy, yes? Would you happen to be looking for new prospects?
Female_04.nm33aapros17001_.mp3: So you're already part of the academy. I am unimpressed.
Female_04.nm33aapros17004_.mp3: Why would you ask that? The Sith who gave you that must have mentioned that it represented your acceptance. All you have to do is bring it to Yuthura Ban at the cantina and you're in!
Female_04.nm33aapros17005_.mp3: Might you have any advice for me? How did you obtain it?
Female_04.nm33aapros17007_.mp3: I see. Well, keep your secrets to yourself, then. I'll find a way.
Female_04.nm33aapros17009_.mp3: So you're not going to tell me. *sigh* I suppose I really didn't expect you to.
Female_04.nm33aapros17011_.mp3: So there *is* a secret to it. I knew there had to be!
Female_04.nm33aapros17012_.mp3: Would you tell me what it is? I'll do anything to know!
Female_04.nm33aapros17014_.mp3: [Success] Oh. I'm not much of a combatant... but I guess you have to be brave if you're going to get into the Sith, right? I'll... have to think about it.
Female_04.nm33aapros17015_.mp3: [Failure] That sounds like it would be suicide. You are obviously lying to me.
Female_04.nm33aapros17017_.mp3: [Success] Hmm... I suppose that might work. A newly accepted student wouldn't have all the powers of the other Sith, would they? Thank you!
Female_04.nm33aapros17018_.mp3: [Failure] Take a medallion that doesn't belong to me? I doubt that would work. But thank you regardless.
Female_04.nm33aapros17024_.mp3: [Success] R-really? *gulp!* That... that sounds like it's very dangerous. You survived it, though... maybe it isn't so bad...
Female_04.nm33aapros17025_.mp3: [Failure] Jump in the chasm? Do I look like an idiot? No thanks.
Female_04.nm33aapros17028_.mp3: [Success] I... but... oh, you're right. It's hopeless.
Female_04.nm33aapros17029_.mp3: *sigh* I... I guess I should go home. Perhaps I could get a job at the droid shop...
Female_04.nm33aapros17030_.mp3: [Failure] My family couldn't talk me out of this, and you sure aren't going to. Thanks anyway.
Female_04.nm33aapros17033_.mp3: No. You're very lucky, that's all I meant.
Female_04.nm33aapros17035_.mp3: I doubt I could take it from you if I tried. Good luck in your training, I suppose.
Female_04.nm33aapros17040_.mp3: I'm trying to get into the Sith academy. Around here they call us 'hopefuls'.
Female_04.nm33aapros17042_.mp3: Well... that's the only way to become a Sith, isn't it? In the academy you learn to use the Force.
Female_04.nm33aapros17044_.mp3: After the Sith conquer the galaxy there aren't going to be any more Jedi, are there? I guess I'd rather join the winning side.
Female_04.nm33aapros17046_.mp3: I thought they were good... but I've been here for days, now, and I haven't drawn any attention at all.
Female_04.nm33aapros17047_.mp3: I suppose that might be good, I don't know. Some of the 'attention' the Sith have shown to other hopefuls has been pretty... deadly.
Female_04.nm33aapros17049_.mp3: *sigh* I wish I knew, to tell you the truth. You have to impress one of the Sith, I guess. Either way, it's Yuthura Ban who makes the final decision.
Female_04.nm33aapros17050_.mp3: She's a Twi'lek Sith master, I hear. Very high rank. She's the one who decides which hopefuls make it and which ones don't.
Female_04.nm33aapros17052_.mp3: I really couldn't say. I hear that sometimes she comes out into the colony to drink at the cantina, though, but I guess she could be anywhere.
Female_04.nm33aapros17054_.mp3: There's not much I could tell you. Unless you're a hopeful... are you?
Female_04.nm33aapros17056_.mp3: There are people who come here all the time to try to get into the Sith academy. I'm one of them.
Female_04.nm33aapros17058_.mp3: May the Force serve you well.

Female_05.nm02aemusi24000_.mp3: Did you hear what happened after the big swoop race? They say Brejik wouldn't pay up when he lost, and a brawl broke out! I can't believe I missed it!
Female_05.nm02aemusi24002_.mp3: Hmph - who dresses you? You look like you crawled up here from the Lower City. Oh well, I guess we can't all have style.
Female_05.nm02aemusi24004_.mp3: Isn't this band great? They can't leave Taris because of the Sith quarantine, so they've been playing here every night! Talk about a good break for us!
Female_05.nm02aemusi24006_.mp3: Did you hear? Bendak got dusted in that death match - by a woman, no less! Heh. Isn't that great? That should show these men a thing or two about who's the boss!
Female_05.nm02aemusi24008_.mp3: Did you hear the news? Bendak got dusted in that death match! I'll never get a chance to see something like that again. I can't believe I didn't get a ticket!
Female_05.nm02aemusi24010_.mp3: Have you heard? Someone's going to fight Bendak Starkiller in an illegal death match! I should go talk to that Hutt and try to get some tickets...
Female_05.nm02aemusi24012_.mp3: Everyone's worried the Sith will come in here and shut this place down. Can you imagine how dull it would be if we didn't have any music on Taris?

Female_07.nm28acsur303016_.mp3: No, no, no. Don't do it!
Female_07.nm28acsur303025_.mp3: The... firaxan sharks just tore them apart... It was like they were frenzied...
Female_07.nm28acsur303030_.mp3: We... thought everyone was dead... dead or insane.
Female_07.nm28acsur303031_.mp3: I must have been hysterical, I... I don't know what I can say... I truly apologize for the horrible mistake I was making.
Female_07.nm28acsur303036_.mp3: Those thugs would wipe out the whole damn planet just to get at the kolto.
Female_07.nm28acsur303046_.mp3: Don't talk to him like that! We've gone through a lot, and we said we're sorry for the mistake we made!
Female_07.nm28acsur303050_.mp3: But... there were some ruins that were excavated when we were digging the foundations for the last section of the kolto harvesting machine.
Female_07.nm28acsur303056_.mp3: Well, we're not too clear ourselves just exactly what happened...
Female_07.nm28acsur303060_.mp3: We don't know! Not for sure...
Female_07.nm28acsur303062_.mp3: This... this monster rose up from the Rift...
Female_07.nm28acsur303064_.mp3: It was like it was screaming inside my head...
Female_07.nm28acsur303069_.mp3: Well... maybe it was protecting the ruins by the Rift.
Female_07.nm28acsur303074_.mp3: And all those other firaxan sharks! Those might be its offspring!
Female_07.nm28acsur303078_.mp3: We were working on a soluble chemical compound that would drive them away. Something that smelled or tasted repulsive to them, but we never got it working right.
Female_07.nm28acsur303080_.mp3: No! It's not working right! You don't know what it will do!
Female_07.nm28acsur303083_.mp3: The repellant we made was supposed to drive firaxan sharks away, but we never got very far in its development.
Female_07.nm28acsur303084_.mp3: The one we tested instead was violently toxic to them, rupturing their outer skin in seconds and preventing them from drawing oxygen from the water by clogging their intakes.
Female_07.nm28acsur303086_.mp3: But we don't know how else the chemical reacts! We only tried it in a controlled environment. In the open ocean, who knows what it could do... it could even affect the kolto.
Female_07.nm28acsur303095_.mp3: Wait! Don't! We don't know what effect the toxin will have on the ocean environment around the Rift!
Female_07.nm28acsur303096_.mp3: It could poison the water against all life. It could poison the kolto itself, even! There is another way...
Female_07.nm28acsur303098_.mp3: Well, the monster seems to have been driven out by the machinery we installed at the edge of the Rift. We've seen it out there on the cameras bashing itself against the machines.
Female_07.nm28acsur303099_.mp3: I think if you could destroy the machinery we installed, the shark would calm down and retreat back into its lair inside the Rift.
Female_07.nm28acsur303101_.mp3: You can reprogram the harvesting machines to overpressure their self-oxidizing fuel, so that the fuel tank cannisters will rupture and the entire machine will destroy itself.
Female_07.nm28acsur303102_.mp3: The Hydrolium gas we use is a gas at 1 to 3 million sangen, a liquid at about 4 million sangen, and a solid above that. When it's a liquid it's VERY explosive.
Female_07.nm28acsur303103_.mp3: If you inject enough of the Hydrolium gas into the tank, the pressure will be so great that it will turn to liquid form and start a chain reaction inside the machine.
Female_07.nm28acsur303105_.mp3: It's better than whatever your chemical will do to the water!
Female_07.nm28acsur303109_.mp3: No! You shouldn't do that! It could poison everything!
Female_07.nm28acsur303110_.mp3: Just reprogram the harvesting machine's computer to overpressure the fuel tanks. Once it's destroyed, the shark should just leave.
Female_07.nm28acsur303112_.mp3: I just hope you make the right choice.
Female_07.nm28acsur303114_.mp3: Good! Destroying the machinery will be better in the long run. We can't risk damaging the environment or the kolto.
Female_07.nm28acsur303115_.mp3: You'll have to break into the computer on the harvesting machine and fiddle with the fuel injectors to get the tank pressure up to the point where the Hydrolium will liquidize.
Female_07.nm28acsur303116_.mp3: Once the machinery is gone, the shark should leave.
Female_07.nm28acsur303120_.mp3: Run, Kono! He's one of them!
Female_07.nm28acsur303121_.mp3: Run, Kono! She's one of them!
Female_07.nm28acsur303136_.mp3: I think it might live there. Live there because of the kolto.
Female_07.nm28acsur404000_.mp3: We saw what you did out there on the cameras...
Female_07.nm28acsur404002_.mp3: Destroying the machinery was the right thing to do, for everyone.
Female_07.nm28acsur404004_.mp3: That creature... the giant firaxan shark, the guardian of the kolto or whatever it was, seems to have calmed down a lot. It may even be safe to go outside now.
Female_07.nm28acsur404006_.mp3: But we'll still stay here and wait for the Republic rescue crews. Thank you for not making a huge mistake.
Female_07.nm28acsur404008_.mp3: Why did you have to poison the water?? We don't know what effect it could have on the environment around here... or on the kolto.
Female_07.nm28acsur404010_.mp3: Whatever it is that's coming out of the vent now doesn't look the same at all... I only hope you didn't pollute whatever was making it... We never were able to synthesize it.
Female_07.nm28acsur404012_.mp3: I think we're just going to sit here. We have a lot of food and water, so we should be alright for a while.
Female_07.nm28acsur404014_.mp3: If you can make it out to the kolto harvesting machines, try to reprogram them to self destruct. Maybe that will cause the creature to stop its psychic screams.
Female_07.nm28acsur404016_.mp3: Once you do that, you can open the doors to the submersible bay and go back to the surface. Make sure you tell the Republic there are still some survivors down here.
Female_07.nm28acsur404018_.mp3: Kono says he won't leave, and I can't leave him here by himself. We'll stay and wait until the Republic sends a larger rescue mission. Please don't delay too long!

Female_08.nm33aalash11000_.mp3: Look here, my dear friends. We have some newcomers to the colony... led by a Jedi, no less. I don't believe I've seen any of them before, have you?
Female_08.nm33aalash11001_.mp3: Look here, my dear friends... we have a newcomer to our little colony. A Jedi, no less. I don't believe I've seen this one before, have you?
Female_08.nm33aalash11003_.mp3: Look here, my dear friends... we have a group of newcomers to our little colony. I don't believe I've seen any of them before, have you?
Female_08.nm33aalash11009_.mp3: That's what I thought. Well, stranger... I don't know whether you're aware of this or not, but here on Korriban the Sith do as they please. And we are Sith.
Female_08.nm33aalash11010_.mp3: Quite literally, whether you live or die depends upon our whim. What do you think of that, hmm?
Female_08.nm33aalash11016_.mp3: How precocious. I think this one tried to make a joke, don't you?
Female_08.nm33aalash11018_.mp3: Neither did I. A brave face, perhaps, but I'm more interested in being amused at the moment, I think.
Female_08.nm33aalash11019_.mp3: What do you say? Amuse us. Make us laugh, and we just might consider allowing you to live.
Female_08.nm33aalash11023_.mp3: Shut up, fool! Unless you want to be next!
Female_08.nm33aalash11029_.mp3: Fine, we'll go. As for you... I'll find you later. Trust me on that.
Female_08.nm33aalash11043_.mp3: Yes, I suppose that wasn't too bad. Alright then, my friend... you've done as you were asked. Perhaps we will meet again.
Female_08.nm33aalash11045_.mp3: Well, it certainly didn't amuse us, did it? Try again.
Female_08.nm33aalash11047_.mp3: Oh? I see. We'll just have to see about that, won't we?
Female_08.nm33aalash11049_.mp3: Are you going to let us be insulted?!
Female_08.nm33aalash11058_.mp3: Very well, boys. I'm sure we can find something more exciting than these... dead fish. Let's go.
Female_08.nm33aalash11061_.mp3: Those are very brave words for such an insignificant person. Do you not realize how many Sith are here in Dreshdae?
Female_08.nm33aalash11072_.mp3: Now, now, let's not be hasty. Perhaps our friend here could yet offer up some amusement.
Female_08.nm33aalash11074_.mp3: Oh, neither do I. I simply stated a fact. Do you know how many Sith there are in Dreshdae?
Female_08.nm33aalash11085_.mp3: Look here, my dear friends... we have a newcomer to our little colony. I don't believe I've seen this one before, have you?
Female_08.nm35aautha22009_.mp3: I met this one in the colony... unworthy, if you ask me.

Female_09.nm26aaduan01000_.mp3: Look, lady - we Sith aren't here to make friends. So let me enjoy my drink in peace.
Female_09.nm26aaduan01001_.mp3: You're new around here, aren't you. My name's Duan. Care to buy a Sith girl a drink? That is, unless you're one of those simpering Republic soldiers.
Female_09.nm26aaduan01003_.mp3: Some of the other soldiers like to go and bet on the swoops on their days off, but this planet is bad enough without mingling with the locals.
Female_09.nm26aaduan01005_.mp3: I couldn't agree with you more. Just the sight of a Republic uniform makes me want to vomit. I can't wait until we crush them all like the pathetic vermin they are!
Female_09.nm26aaduan01006_.mp3: Sorry - I tend to get a little worked up. I think I've been stationed on Manaan too long. This place can make you crazy.
Female_09.nm26aaduan01008_.mp3: You some kind of historian, or something? You should forget about the past and look towards the future. That's why I joined the Sith - the Republic is old news. And then I get stuck on Manaan, the worst post in the galaxy!
Female_09.nm26aaduan01009_.mp3: It isn't easy here, you know. Not with all the Republic soldiers walking the streets while we sit and do nothing. Malak should send a fleet in and conquer this whole sector, kolto or no!
Female_09.nm26aaduan01010_.mp3: But I don't really want to talk about that right now. I'm just here to have a couple drinks and try to unwind, you know?
Female_09.nm26aaduan01012_.mp3: Sure, pull up a seat. I'll have the bartender ring us up a couple mugs of the local favorite. It's called a firaxian tooth.
Female_09.nm26aaduan01013_.mp3: Watch out for these - they pack quite the bite. Two or three of these babies and you won't even remember who you are.
Female_09.nm26aaduan01014_.mp3: Whoa - that's good stuff! Might even be better than Kessel spice, you think? Never touch the hard stuff.
Female_09.nm26aaduan01016_.mp3: I better take it easy - I've got a shift tomorrow and I don't want to end up passed out on the floor.
Female_09.nm26aaduan01018_.mp3: [Success] I suppose one more wouldn't hurt. As long as you're buying.
Female_09.nm26aaduan01019_.mp3: Oh, that's good stuff. Really takes the edge off, know what I mean? Whoa, feeling a little light-headed, there.
Female_09.nm26aaduan01020_.mp3: Firaxian tooth - almost as valuable as kolto, right? Ha ha ha! I gotta get this recipe someday. Wonder if I can brew it up right at home? What do you think is in this stuff, anyway?
Female_09.nm26aaduan01022_.mp3: I might be a little giddy, but I hope you don't think I'm going to start spilling Sith secrets all of a sudden. It'll take more than a couple drinks to get me there... but not much more! Ha ha ha!
Female_09.nm26aaduan01025_.mp3: Sure, why not? You know, hardly anyone ever buys me drinks around this place. It's enough to make a woman doubt herself, you know?
Female_09.nm26aaduan01026_.mp3: [Failure] I better not. You don't even want to know what the punishment is if we Sith show up drunk or hung-over for our shift.
Female_09.nm26aaduan01028_.mp3: [Success] I suppose one more wouldn't hurt. As long as you're buying.
Female_09.nm26aaduan01030_.mp3: [Success] I suppose one more wouldn't hurt. As long as you're buying.
Female_09.nm26aaduan01032_.mp3: I suppose there's no harm in that. It's the least I can do after you bought me a drink and all.
Female_09.nm26aaduan01036_.mp3: Aw, you want to talk business? I was hoping you wanted to ask something about me. Look, I don't want to talk shop. I just want to relax with my drink... which is, unfortunately, empty now.
Female_09.nm26aaduan01038_.mp3: What is there to investigate? Obviously Sunry is guilty. But the Republic is doing everything they can to keep him out of a Selkath prison.
Female_09.nm26aaduan01040_.mp3: We Sith are interested in a lot of things. If you're smart you'll stay out of Sith business.
Female_09.nm26aaduan01042_.mp3: Oh... I get it. I get a little bit wild, and you want to hold it against me.
Female_09.nm26aaduan01043_.mp3: Come on, what's the matter? Afraid I'll drink you under the table? Hey, if you're not man enough to keep up, who needs you?
Female_09.nm26aaduan01044_.mp3: Seems I'm not lady like enough for some men... well, I may be a woman, but I'm still a soldier! Barkeep, bring me another round!
Female_09.nm26aaduan01045_.mp3: Well, shir... I fear I am good and truly drunk. Don't you be takin' advantage of me now, hear? Shay... you're handshome. You ain't married, are you? (hic)
Female_09.nm26aaduan01046_.mp3: Sheems like all the good ones are married... (hic!) Oh, 'schuse me - that's not very ladylike, ish it?
Female_09.nm26aaduan01048_.mp3: Yesh! One more drink! Jus' what I wash thinking!
Female_09.nm26aaduan01050_.mp3: Dunno what yer talkin' about... Mmmm, but you don't need a map to get what I can give ya!
Female_09.nm26aaduan01052_.mp3: Shunry... he's gettin' what he desherves! We Shith will make sure of that!
Female_09.nm26aaduan01054_.mp3: Jus' rumors. Shtuff I heard about making sure the shtupid fish people find the evidence they need..
Female_09.nm26aaduan01055_.mp3: I don't wanna talk about that shtuff. Shay, you never said if you was married...
Female_09.nm26aaduan01057_.mp3: Who knows? Who cares? Those Selkath punks are crawling around our embassy, making the whole place stink like fish!
Female_09.nm26aaduan01064_.mp3: Oh... head hurts... eyes bleary... must get back to embassy... find bed.
Female_09.nm26aaduan01065_.mp3: Oh, it's you again. I didn't think I'd see you around here.
Female_09.nm26aaduan01066_.mp3: I probably should cut back on the drinking, but it's a good way to relax. There's a lot of tension here on Manaan.
Female_09.nm26aaduan01067_.mp3: Look, I might have said some stuff... but I'm not a bad person, you know. It's just the pressure of this place. Makes me edgy. And the drinks don't help, even though they wear off pretty fast.

Female_10.nm04aainfe09000_.mp3: Do you... do you have the cure, up-worlder? Have you come to save us from the horrible fate of the others?
Female_10.nm04aainfe09001_.mp3: Why have you come back, up-worlder? Do you come to mock us in our suffering as the disease destroys us?
Female_10.nm04aainfe09003_.mp3: When the rakghouls infected me I never thought I'd see my family again. Thank you for all your help, up-worlder.
Female_10.nm04aainfe09005_.mp3: Please... you have to help us. We beg you. We don't want to end up like the others. Please help us. We can't end up like them.
Female_10.nm04aainfe09007_.mp3: You... you have a cure? Please, give it to me. Please. Quickly, before it's too late.
Female_10.nm04aainfe09009_.mp3: Quickly - I must inject it before it is too late. Yes... I feel it working!
Female_10.nm04aainfe09011_.mp3: I feel the disease burning away! It... it is like a miracle! I am cured!
Female_10.nm04aainfe09013_.mp3: Thank you, up-worlder. You have saved us from a fate worse than death. I only wish I had some reward to give you. Maybe you can find something worthwhile in the wreckage of that Republic escape pod.
Female_10.nm04aainfe09015_.mp3: Not long ago an escape pod crashed in the Undercity, far to the northeast of the village. We were going to try and salvage equipment from it but we were attacked by the rakghouls and infected.
Female_10.nm04aainfe09017_.mp3: I'd tell you more if I could, but our salvage team never reached the pod. It's probably still there, unless some of the other up-worlders already found it and picked it clean.
Female_10.nm04aainfe09019_.mp3: We should go now, up-worlder. We're anxious to return to the village and see our families again. Thank you once again for everything you have done.
Female_10.nm04aainfe09023_.mp3: We... we have nothing, up-worlder. We are Outcasts. All we have are the clothes on our backs.
Female_10.nm04aainfe09025_.mp3: Please, up-worlder. Show us mercy. Give us the cure out of the goodness of your heart!
Female_10.nm04aainfe09028_.mp3: You... you will help us? Bless you, up-worlder! Bless you. But... you must hurry!
Female_10.nm04aainfe09031_.mp3: We have the rakghoul disease. It is only a matter of time until we are transformed into terrible creatures like those who attacked you when you first came into the pen.
Female_10.nm04aainfe09033_.mp3: It is too late for them. Soon it will be too late for us and we will transform into those horrible rakghouls ourselves!
Female_10.nm04aainfe09035_.mp3: Please hurry, up-worlder. We don't have much time until the transformation.
Female_10.nm04aainfe09038_.mp3: Go then, up-worlder. Leave us here to die, abandoned by everyone!
Female_10.nm04aainfe09041_.mp3: Don't forget about us, up-worlder. If you find any way to cure this disease, please come back and help us.
Female_10.nm04aaoutc12008_.mp3: Rukil Wrinkle-Skin is a funny old man! He talks crazy talk!

Female_13.nm11aagado02016_.mp3: They might be spies, Gadon! They might be working for the Sith!
Female_13.nm11aagado02052_.mp3: Mission? Gadon, you can't be serious! She's just a kid - how is she supposed to help them with this?
Female_13.nm11aagado02091_.mp3: Are you crazy? The Vulkars shoot people on sight in the streets! Why would you be stupid enough to try and get inside their base?
Female_13.nm11aagado02095_.mp3: Of course! You're a soldier who survived the crash! That's why you want into the base - to rescue that Republic officer before Brejik sells her to some intergalactic slaver!
Female_13.nm11aagado02103_.mp3: How dare you?! I should kill you where you stand!
Female_13.nm11aagado02117_.mp3: Don't fool yourself, Gadon. Brejik wants to control the Lower City gangs. If you'd stepped down, he'd have led the Beks against the Vulkars. He wanted this war, one way or another.
Female_13.nm11aagado02139_.mp3: Gadon! You can't be serious! We need one of our best riders on that bike! We can't let some rookie take the prototype engine into the race!
Female_13.nm11aazaer09000_.mp3: Hold it right there - who are you and what is your business with Gadon?
Female_13.nm11aazaer09004_.mp3: You're too trusting, Gadon. Brejik and his Vulkars want you dead. Anyone we don't know is a potential threat, and it's my job to make sure you're safe!
Female_13.nm11aazaer09010_.mp3: Gadon can't speak to you right now. Brejik's put a price on his head, so I ordered him to stay in his private chambers until we find the assassin.
Female_13.nm11aazaer09012_.mp3: You have the accelerator? This is excellent news! I'll send for Gadon right way!
Female_13.nm11aazaer09015_.mp3: Yes. Good. The more people who keep an eye out, the better we'll catch this assassin in time.
Female_13.nm11aazaer09018_.mp3: I knew we couldn't trust you!
Female_13.nm11aazaer09020_.mp3: On behalf of Gadon, I want to offer the thanks of all the Hidden Beks. You rode like a true champion in the swoop race.
Female_13.nm11aazaer09022_.mp3: I'm sorry Gadon can't be here to thank you in person, but he has retired to the safety of his private chambers. I'm afraid he's grieving over Brejik's death.
Female_13.nm11aazaer09024_.mp3: Even so, I think Gadon hoped that somehow Brejik could be made to realize the error of his ways. Despite everything he had done, Gadon probably would have forgiven him.
Female_13.nm11aazaer09028_.mp3: Brejik violated the customs and traditions of Taris. He dishonored himself by refusing to honor his wager. He got what he deserved - even Gadon has to realize that.
Female_13.nm11aazaer09032_.mp3: But he isn't out of danger yet. The survivng Vulkars will still want him dead. He's a prime target now - as are you. You better be careful out on the streets.
