Female_13.nm11aazaer09035_.mp3: Brejik violated the customs and traditions of Taris. He dishonored himself by refusing to honor his wager. He got what he deserved - even Gadon has to realize that.
Female_13.nm11aazaer09037_.mp3: Even so, I think Gadon hoped that somehow Brejik could be made to realize the error of his ways. Despite everything he had done, Gadon probably would have forgiven him.
Female_13.nm11aazaer09041_.mp3: You can speak to Gadon if you want, but I've got my eye on you! You try anything and you'll be vaporized before you can say "Vulkar spy"!
Female_13.nm11aazaer09043_.mp3: It's Zaerdra here. I hope you're reading me. Your swoop run is about to begin. Remember: just hold on tight and try not to smash into anything.
Female_13.nm11aazaer09045_.mp3: The prototype accelerator should last about 60 seconds before it overheats and explodes; that should be enough time for you to finish your run. Good luck, the Beks are counting on you!

Female_14.nm02acchil01001_.mp3: You ain't supposed to be here! This ain't your home!
Female_14.nm13aaelis08002_.mp3: I don't know what I would have done if I had lost him!
Female_14.nm13aaelis08004_.mp3: It's just so good to have him back!
Female_14.nm13aaelis08006_.mp3: We're just going to go right home right now and celebrate, aren't we, my lovely little droid?
Female_14.nm13aaelis08008_.mp3: Don't worry, I'm going to hug you and oil you and care for you and make sure you never get away ever again.
Female_14.nm13aaelis08010_.mp3: I'll be waiting for you, Master Jedi.
Female_14.nm13aaelis08022_.mp3: I... I took the loss of my droid much too hard. I feel I must apologize.
Female_14.nm13aaelis08024_.mp3: But I must. I was much too attached to my droid... It was all that was left of my husband, you see. Maybe I thought that, through the droid, my husband could live again... be with me still...
Female_14.nm13aaelis08028_.mp3: But I went too far. I could not see what was missing in living a normal life. Fortunately, in my grief I returned here and ran into Samnt - an absolutely fascinating man!
Female_14.nm13aaelis08031_.mp3: Samnt and I got to talking and, well, we have a lot in common. I think we'll be seeing more of each other. It's funny how these things work out in the end. Maybe there is such a thing as fate, after all...
Female_14.nm13aaelis08033_.mp3: But I think we should be going now... we have so much more to talk about! I just wanted to thank you for what you've done for me, and what you tried to do.
Female_14.nm13aaelis08042_.mp3: I was much too attached to my droid... It was all that was left of my husband, you see. Maybe I thought that through the droid, my husband could live again... be with me still...
Female_14.nm13aaelis08045_.mp3: Unfortunately I have none to give, otherwise I would. But I still feel I must explain myself... I suppose I came across as a little odd.
Female_14.nm13aasamn15002_.mp3: Now, Samnt, don't be so rude. If it wasn't for this young Jedi, we wouldn't have met.

Female_15.nm02aeangr01000_.mp3: Was that Jergan I just saw you talking to? Do you know where he went?
Female_15.nm02aeangr01002_.mp3: You fell for his story, too? Well, I got some bad news for you sister - he ain't coming back. I gave him 20 credits last week, and he just disappeared with it!
Female_15.nm02aeangr01005_.mp3: Well if you see that slime ball tell him Lana is looking for him! I gave him 20 credits and he promised to get me backstage to meet the band. Then, he disappeared!
Female_15.nm02aeangr01007_.mp3: When I tried to get backstage to look for him, nobody even knew who he was! He can't set up a meeting with the band - he's just some sleazy con artist spinning lies!
Female_15.nm02aeangr01009_.mp3: I doubt he'd be dumb enough to show up here again; he knows I'm looking for him! And if I ever find him he's going to pay for ripping me off - with interest!

Female_17.nm13aabela05000_.mp3: You there! Padawan! Why are you not wearing the customary robes of the Jedi? Do you mock the honored traditions of our Order?
Female_17.nm13aabela05002_.mp3: My name is Belaya. I have come here to further my learning in the ways of the Force. Many Jedi come here to train under Master Zhar.
Female_17.nm13aabela05003_.mp3: Any who belong to the Order should surely know this. You must be neglecting your studies, Padawan.
Female_17.nm13aabela05005_.mp3: Bastila? I have heard of her. They say she has already mastered the art of Battle Meditation, remarkable in one so young. Though I have heard she has a foolish pride in her own talents.
Female_17.nm13aabela05006_.mp3: But as for you... you claim you are not a Padawan? I find this hard to believe. The Force is strong within you. I can feel its presence.
Female_17.nm13aabela05007_.mp3: If this is some type of jest, it is in very poor taste. The Jedi Order is not a subject for jokes.
Female_17.nm13aabela05009_.mp3: Please forgive the abruptness with which I first greeted you. It was harsh, and perhaps unfair. My Master often warns me I must learn to control my emotions. I see I have much left to learn.
Female_17.nm13aabela05011_.mp3: No, I suppose you did not. I apologize.
Female_17.nm13aabela05013_.mp3: I wish you a pleasant stay here on Dantooine. May the Force be with you.
Female_17.nm13aabela05014_.mp3: You have done a great thing. One of our own had strayed, but you have returned Juhani to the Order. For this you deserve the highest praise.
Female_17.nm13aabela05015_.mp3: Juhani was a... a dear companion to me for many years. We spent many nights together alone under the stars.
Female_17.nm13aabela05016_.mp3: That will never happen again, thanks to you. Curse the Council for sending you, of all people, to speak to her! Could you have done nothing else?!
Female_17.nm13aabela05018_.mp3: She had it coming, did she? She had it coming?!
Female_17.nm13aabela05020_.mp3: Do not presume to tell me how I should speak of anything! They should have known better than to entrust such a task to you!
Female_17.nm13aabela05022_.mp3: Pardon me if I find your apology rather disingenuous. Juhani meant nothing to you, and the Council should have known better than to entrust her life to you.
Female_17.nm13aabela05024_.mp3: Why? Because the Council believed that my closeness to her might do more harm than good... and yet they send *you*, instead? And look what has happened.
Female_17.nm13aabela05025_.mp3: The Juhani I knew deserved more than this! She deserved more from the Council, and more from you!
Female_17.nm13aabela05026_.mp3: You... you did not even try, did you? Did it even occur to you that Juhani might have been saved? That she might be worth saving?!
Female_17.nm13aabela05027_.mp3: I should kill you for what you've done! And yet I can't, can I? I am a Jedi, and we are sworn to protect all... even the likes of you.
Female_17.nm13aabela05028_.mp3: Get... get out of my sight! The very thought of the Council... and of you... makes me ill.
Female_17.nm13aabela05029_.mp3: Greetings, apprentice... though I understand you shall not have that lowly title much longer. Master Zhar tells me your progress has been remarkable.
Female_17.nm13aabela05030_.mp3: Soon, he feels, you will attain the rank of Padawan. Then you will truly be a full-fledged Jedi. How are you enjoying your training?
Female_17.nm13aabela05032_.mp3: With power comes responsibility, and only by learning discipline and sacrifice can we truly learn to master our potential.
Female_17.nm13aabela05033_.mp3: I wish you luck in your training, apprentice. There is much you must yet learn. May the Force be with you.
Female_17.nm13aabela05035_.mp3: You speak as if this were some foolish game! Have you no idea what is at stake?
Female_17.nm13aabela05037_.mp3: All Jedi must know the code. Its tenets are the fundamental teachings of our Order.
Female_17.nm13aabela05038_.mp3: There is no emotion; there is peace. There is no ignorance; there is knowledge. There is no passion; there is serenity. There is no chaos; there is harmony. There is no death; there is the Force.
Female_17.nm13aabela05039_.mp3: Think and meditate on these truths, apprentice, if you ever wish to become a Padawan.
Female_17.nm13aabela05041_.mp3: There are caves on Dantooine that hold those rare crystals. But be warned, apprentice: They are dangerous. You should not meddle in things beyond you.
Female_17.nm13aabela05042_.mp3: A battle took place earlier to the south of the Enclave. A lot of people died and many droids were destroyed.
Female_17.nm13aabela05043_.mp3: I wonder what dark force could have caused this to happen...
Female_17.nm13aabela05044_.mp3: Shen and Rahasia have been welcomed here in the compound for as long as they wish to stay. I am glad that your help enabled them to remain together.
Female_17.nm13aabela05045_.mp3: Master Zhar tells me you have successfully completed the tests, and I even see you have constructed your own lightsaber.
Female_17.nm13aabela05046_.mp3: You should be proud of your accomplishment... but never forget that you still have much to learn.
Female_17.nm13aabela05047_.mp3: As your power grows you will constantly face temptations to slip to the dark side. This is the eternal struggle of the Jedi.
Female_17.nm13aabela05048_.mp3: Greetings, young Padawan. I trust your training goes well.

Female_18.nm04aashal27001_.mp3: Just get away from me! I don't want to speak to you again!
Female_18.nm04aavict08000_.mp3: Please, help us! We are infected with the rakghoul disease. At any moment we could... unh!

Female_19.nm17ae04sf06000_.mp3: I love watching the races. Nothing much else to do.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06001_.mp3: Nico is the big favorite around here.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06002_.mp3: Not a lot of women on the swoop circuit. Not that there's much of a circuit left.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06003_.mp3: I Don't know how the riders do it. I get sick at speeds like that.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06004_.mp3: That's really too bad about your last race. You should have won it for sure.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06005_.mp3: I guess the pressure got to you out there. It's not the first time a racer lost their edge.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06006_.mp3: Your loss wasn't the worst I've seen. I saw Yuka's big crash on Taris two years ago.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06007_.mp3: I guess you're not quite up to taking the big prize. It's a shame.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06008_.mp3: You are quite the racer. Too bad there isn't much of a circuit anymore.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06009_.mp3: Too bad about Garm's time being beat, but he's just starting out. You're looking like you've been at this a while.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06010_.mp3: Yuka Rill isn't going to like you. He doesn't do well against new competition, and you're up against his time next.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06011_.mp3: So, was your win beginners luck? Most of the amateurs get stuck at about this level.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06012_.mp3: I bet Motta's going to start looking at you as a potential champ. Your times just keep getting better.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06013_.mp3: It's amazing the way you are shooting up the ranks. I haven't seen racing like that since Nico started getting good.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06014_.mp3: Yuka Rill won't recover from the loss you handed him anytime soon. That Ithorian's a sore loser.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06015_.mp3: You've beaten all the local talents. Only Zoriis is left, and she's a pro. Well, Nico too.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06016_.mp3: I have to say, you are looking very impressive to me right now. I hope you stick around.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06017_.mp3: I like having a champion around, but you're probably destined for the circuit, once it's back up and running.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06018_.mp3: I like a man that can move fast when he needs to. Maybe I could trouble you for an autoprint... or something.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06019_.mp3: You sure do look good out there on the track, champion. You look pretty good here too.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06020_.mp3: That was some impressive racing. Good to see you and Zoriis put the boys to shame
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06021_.mp3: That was some good racing. Best time of the season, I think.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06022_.mp3: What are you doing here when you can race like that? If the circuit were up, you'd be a star!
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06023_.mp3: You are too good for Tatooine, you know that? The best I've ever seen.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06024_.mp3: I saw some footage of Taris before the Sith destroyed it... I swear I saw you... couldn't be.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06025_.mp3: Did I see your bike getting prepped? Not many new ones like that come through here.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06026_.mp3: It's sad... one of our racers was on Taris. Ever race there? Probably not, I'd have heard of you.
Female_19.nm17ae04sf06027_.mp3: I'm surprised to see a new racer. How do you keep your bike running? Parts are scarce around here.

Female_20.nm02adchil04002_.mp3: You ain't supposed to be here! This ain't your home!
Female_20.nm02adsarn07000_.mp3: Did you come for the party? You really shouldn't be here if you're on duty... I don't want to get in trouble.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07002_.mp3: You're welcome to come back after you go change out of your uniform. We'll see you then.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07004_.mp3: Hey, you made it! I was beginning to wonder if you were going to show! The party's in full swing - come on in.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07006_.mp3: You have to try this Tarisian ale - it's fantastic! We should have conquered this planet ages ago!
Female_20.nm02adsarn07010_.mp3: Who cares? We're not on duty tomorrow - let's live a little! Come on - drink up!
Female_20.nm02adsarn07012_.mp3: I'm surprised to see you again. I thought you had gotten sick of me complaining about my job at the Sith military base. I guess I kind of obsess about it. That can't be healthy.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07014_.mp3: Well, are you here to close our deal? 2000 credits gets you access to the Military Base. Otherwise we really shouldn't be talking.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07015_.mp3: Sorry, but I'm not here looking for conversation. I just came to get a drink, listen to some music and try to relax before my next shift at the military base.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07017_.mp3: I don't wear my uniform when I'm off duty. I can do without those hate-filled stares while I'm trying to enjoy myself.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07019_.mp3: I shouldn't even be here, to tell the truth. The officers get pretty upset when we fraternize with the locals. But it gets pretty stale hanging around the base all the time.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07021_.mp3: Besides, the Sith don't own me. Being a soldier in their fleet is just a job, you know? A job with long hours and low pay, I might add.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07023_.mp3: When I signed up I was promised adventure and excitement in exotic locals. Instead, I end up stationed at a military base on some backwater planet on the fringes of the galaxy.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07025_.mp3: If I could just find some other way to earn some credits I could give up this lousy job. It's not like they even need me there. Nobody can get into the base without a keycard.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07027_.mp3: I don't have the card with me. But everyone who works at the military base has one. Otherwise we wouldn't be able to get inside the base.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07029_.mp3: What? Are you offering me a bribe? You realize this is treason, right? If I report you the Sith will have you executed!
Female_20.nm02adsarn07031_.mp3: Hey, now - let's not start making threats. I didn't say I *would* report you, only that I could. This kind of talk is dangerous, you know? But I'm not going to turn you in.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07034_.mp3: The truth is I find your offer rather tempting. I could probably get you inside the base. But if we get caught we're dead. You're asking me to take an awful risk.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07040_.mp3: If I'm going to do this, it's going to cost you. 2000 credits up front if you want to get inside the base. No more, no less. So how about it - we have a deal?
Female_20.nm02adsarn07043_.mp3: [Success] Hmmm... 1000 credits is a small fortune. I'll never have the chance to make that much in one shot again.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07045_.mp3: Okay, you've got a deal. All you need to get inside the base is my keycard. The trick is to get it to you without the Sith knowing about it. But I've got a plan.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07047_.mp3: I'm going to a party with some of the other Sith soldiers tonight. You show up and I'll make sure everyone else gets good and drunk. When we pass out you can take my keycard.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07049_.mp3: I'll probably get a reprimand for carrying my keycard while not on duty, but nothing too serious. Then, in another month I'll resign and retire with all those credits you gave me.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07051_.mp3: Here - I'll add the address of the party to your datapad. Show up there later. To be on the safe side we shouldn't speak again before or after the party.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07055_.mp3: I'll go make all the arrangements and I'll see you at the party later. Just remember - if you get caught breaking into the base, I don't know you.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07058_.mp3: We're in this together now. If either one of us goes to the Sith we'll both end up in the torture chambers. Anyway, it's not like you have a choice.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07060_.mp3: I'm not giving you your credits back, so you might as well show up at the party tonight and take the keycard after we all get drunk and pass out. What could be more simple?
Female_20.nm02adsarn07062_.mp3: [Failure] Look, I'm not going to risk my neck unless I get a big payday. 2000 credits or no deal.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07064_.mp3: Sorry to hear that, but I won't put my neck on the line for nothing! Tell you what - you come up with the credits and we can talk. Otherwise, no deal.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07068_.mp3: You... you weren't serious? Oh... okay. Although if you *were* serious, we might be able to work something out. No - wait! Forget I said that! We shouldn't be talking like this.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07070_.mp3: I might complain a lot, but it's a big step from complaining to treason. I think... I think maybe we should end this conversation - for both our sakes.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07073_.mp3: Oh... okay. See you around. Say, do me a favor and don't repeat all the stuff I just told you. It might not go over well with my superiors.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07076_.mp3: Hey, there. I didn't think we'd be chatting again so soon. You took off on me pretty quick last time.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07078_.mp3: Back again? Didn't I make myself clear enough? The senior Sith officers don't like us fraternizing with locals. Besides, I don't need you lecturing me for my career choice.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07080_.mp3: Good. Move along and leave me alone or I might have to run you in for questioning.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07082_.mp3: Hi there - I haven't seen you around before. Of course they don't give us Sith officers from the military base much time off...
Female_20.nm02adsarn07084_.mp3: I'm off duty right now, so I'm not in uniform. My name is Sarna - junior officer first class with the Sith occupation force.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07086_.mp3: I'm actually a little surprised you're talking to me at all... most of the people here on Taris can't stand us Sith. It can make this a pretty lonely job.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07088_.mp3: [Success] That's true, but people don't appreciate what we've done for them. We could have slapped a curfew on this whole planet, but we didn't.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07090_.mp3: [Failure] Save the sympathetic best friend act. I'm not buying it.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07092_.mp3: But I don't want to fill out a bunch of paperwork on my day off, so let's just pretend this conversation never happened. Now move along.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07095_.mp3: Oh, great... I can see where this is going: the Sith are evil; why did I join them; blah, blah, blah. I don't need a lecture from the likes of you.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07097_.mp3: Ah, it's okay. I might have overreacted a bit. But can you blame me? Everywhere I look I see one of you Tarisians glaring at me with hate in your eyes.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07099_.mp3: Don't try to analyze me. I'm just doing my job - same as any other soldier in any other army. Besides, I don't have to explain myself to you!
Female_20.nm02adsarn07101_.mp3: I don't think we have much else to say to each other. Let's keep this civil and go our separate ways, okay?
Female_20.nm02adsarn07104_.mp3: You're an off-worlder? Huh, I figured you'd be even more angry, being stuck on a foreign planet and all.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07107_.mp3: You know, it's like everyone on this backwater planet is in a permanent bad mood. Don't they know they have to make the best of things?
Female_20.nm02adsarn07109_.mp3: Exactly! It's all about attitude. I didn't ask to be assigned to this backwater planet, but I try to make the best of it!
Female_20.nm02adsarn07111_.mp3: It's pretty easy to get depressed on an assignment like this, but we do what we can to keep our spirits up.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07113_.mp3: That's true. It's nice to meet someone who understands what I'm going through. It's good to talk about this stuff - it gets pretty lonely up at the military base.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07115_.mp3: I have to get going soon - I've got a shift at the military base. But some of us junior Sith officers are having a party tonight to blow off some steam.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07117_.mp3: I'd really like to see you again. Why don't you drop by the party? I'll show you where it is on your map.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07119_.mp3: Don't worry - you won't be the only civilian there. A few of the locals who don't hate us are going to show up, too. I hope to see you there.
Female_20.nm02adsarn07125_.mp3: First you come over and say hi, then you scurry off as soon as you find out I'm a Sith soldier. You Tarisians are a funny bunch.
Female_20.nm02aechil04000_.mp3: You ain't supposed to be here! This ain't your home!
Female_20.nm02aesarn29000_.mp3: Hey, you made it! I was beginning to wonder if you were going to show! The party's in full swing - come on in.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29001_.mp3: You have to try this Tarisian ale - it's fantastic! We should have conquered this planet ages ago!
Female_20.nm02aesarn29003_.mp3: Who cares? We're not on duty tomorrow - let's live a little! Come on - drink up!
Female_20.nm02aesarn29004_.mp3: I'm surprised to see you again. I thought you had gotten sick of me complaining about my job at the Sith military base. I guess I kind of obsess about it. That can't be healthy.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29005_.mp3: Well, are you here to close our deal? 200 credits gets you access to a set of Sith uniforms. Otherwise, we really shouldn't be talking.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29006_.mp3: Sorry, but I'm not here looking for conversation. I just came to get a drink, listen to some music and try to relax before my next shift at the military base.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29008_.mp3: I don't wear my uniform when I'm off duty. It's not allowed. In fact, anyone in uniform is banned from entering the cantina.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29009_.mp3: The officers don't even like it when we show up here off duty. Don't like us fraternizing with the locals, I guess. But it gets pretty stale hanging around the base all the time.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29010_.mp3: Besides, the Sith don't own me. Being a soldier in their fleet is just a job, you know? A job with long hours and low pay, I might add.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29012_.mp3: When I signed up I was promised adventure and excitement in exotic locales. Instead, I end up stationed at a military base on some backwater planet on the fringes of the galaxy.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29013_.mp3: If I could just find some other way to earn some credits I could give this lousy job up. Retire my uniform, so to speak.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29015_.mp3: Back at the military base, of course. I keep it there when I'm off duty. If anything happens to it they dock the cost from my pay.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29017_.mp3: What? Are you offering me a bribe? You realize this is treason, right? If I report you the Sith will have you executed!
Female_20.nm02aesarn29019_.mp3: Hey, now - let's not start making threats. I didn't say I *would* report you, only that I could. This kind of talk is dangerous, you know? But I'm not going to turn you in.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29021_.mp3: The truth is I find your offer rather tempting. I could probably get you some uniforms. But if we get caught we're dead. You're asking me to take an awful risk.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29022_.mp3: If I'm going to do this, it's going to cost you. 200 credits up front if you want some uniforms. No more, no less. So how about it - we have a deal?
Female_20.nm02aesarn29025_.mp3: [Success] Hmmm... 100 credits is a small fortune. I'll never have the chance to make that much in one shot again.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29026_.mp3: Okay, you've got a deal. The trick is to get you the uniforms without the Sith knowing I gave them to you. But I've got a plan.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29027_.mp3: I'm going to a party with some of the other Sith soldiers tonight. You show up and I'll make sure everyone else gets good and drunk. When we pass out you can take our uniforms.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29029_.mp3: I'll probably get a reprimand for not locking it up, but that's about it. Then, in another month I'll resign and retire with all those credits you gave me.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29030_.mp3: Here - I'll add the address of the party to your datapad. Show up there later. To be on the safe side we shouldn't speak again before or after the party.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29031_.mp3: I'll go make all the arrangements and I'll see you at the party tonight. Just remember - if you get caught with those uniforms, I don't know you.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29033_.mp3: We're in this together now. If either one of us goes to the Sith we'll both end up in the torture chambers. Anyway, it's not like you have a choice.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29034_.mp3: I'm not giving you your credits back, so you might as well show up at the party later and take the uniforms after we all get drunk and pass out. What could be more simple?

Female_20.nm02aesarn29038_.mp3: Sorry to hear that, but I won't put my neck on the line for nothing! Tell you what - you come up with the credits and we can talk. Otherwise, no deal.

Female_20.nm02aesarn29042_.mp3: I might complain a lot, but it's a big step from complaining to treason. I think... I think maybe we should end this conversation - for both our sakes.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29044_.mp3: The senior officers don't really like it when we start answering questions, you know? They don't want us fraternizing with the locals. Just another "perk" of the job.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29045_.mp3: No offense, but I probably shouldn't be talking to you anymore. I'm just going to say something that might get me in trouble.

Female_20.nm02aesarn29073_.mp3: You know, it's like everyone on this backwater planet is in a permanent bad mood. Don't they know we have to make the best of things?
Female_20.nm02aesarn29075_.mp3: Exactly! It's all about attitude. I didn't ask to be assigned to this backwater planet, but I try to make the best of it!
Female_20.nm02aesarn29076_.mp3: It's pretty easy to get depressed on an assignment like this, but we do what we can to keep our spirits up.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29078_.mp3: That's true. It's nice to meet someone who understands what I'm going through. It's good to talk about this stuff - it gets pretty lonely up at the military base.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29079_.mp3: I have to get going soon - I've got a shift at the military base. But some of us junior Sith officers are having a party tonight to blow off some steam.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29080_.mp3: I'd really like to see you again. Why don't you drop by the party? I'll show you where it is on your map.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29082_.mp3: Don't be late. We're starting right after our shifts end. Most of us won't even be going back to the base to lock up our uniforms. I look forward to seeing you there.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29084_.mp3: Just because I'm with the Sith doesn't mean I don't know how to have a good time. You'll enjoy yourself. I promise.
Female_20.nm02aesarn29088_.mp3: First you come over and say hi, then you scurry off as soon as you find out I'm a Sith soldier. You Tarisians are a funny bunch.
Female_20.nm02aesith30000_.mp3: I'm not here to chat. I just finished a long shift at the military base and now I'm just looking to relax.
Female_20.nm02aesith30002_.mp3: Let me enjoy my drink in peace, and I won't have to run you in for questioning.
Female_20.nm02aesith30004_.mp3: If you're here to complain about the quarantine don't waste your breath. There's nothing I can do about it. I just follow the orders I'm given.
Female_20.nm02aetapr32012_.mp3: Nice outfit. I've seen Outcasts in the Undercity who dress better than you.

Female_22.nm26aatria27272_.mp3: Yes... Yes it was true. He was having an affair with that Sith harlot.
Female_22.nm26aatria27278_.mp3: He had been seeing her for some time, I think. *sniff* But he said he was going to change!
Female_22.nm26aatria27280_.mp3: He had gone there that night to end it! We talked the night before and he had promised!
Female_22.nm26aatria27282_.mp3: But now things have become so very complicated...
Female_22.nm26aatria27288_.mp3: He was a good man, but his injuries pained him terribly. But he always held on. Always persevered.
Female_22.nm26aatria27290_.mp3: I don't think he could have beaten her or anything like that... but a blaster? I just don't know...
Female_22.nm26aatria27295_.mp3: Yes. He fought against the Sith in the last war. He fought bravely and was even awarded the Hero's Cross!
Female_22.nm26aatria27297_.mp3: I don't know how much that means to the Sith or to your Selkath, your Honors, but in the Republic it is awarded only to the bravest, most valorous, most honorable men.
Female_22.nm26aatria27299_.mp3: The kind of man who earns that medal would not kill someone in cold blood!
Female_22.nm26aatria27516_.mp3: This is the will of the court, but it doesn't feel like justice to me.
Female_22.nm26aawait29000_.mp3: I heard the Republic are the cause of the kolto shortage. I wonder if it's true?
Female_22.nm26aawait29002_.mp3: Someone told me the Sith destroyed Taris. The whole planet is nothing but rubble. Can you even imagine something so awful?
Female_22.nm26aawait29004_.mp3: I hear the murder trial is over. Guess that Sunry guy was innocent after all. I'm glad to see he got off.
Female_22.nm26aawait29006_.mp3: I heard they found Sunry guilty of murder. Good - he got what he deserved, cheating on his wife and all!
Female_22.nm26aawait29008_.mp3: Hey, I know you - you're that famous Pazaak player! If I wasn't so busy I'd get your autoprint!
Female_22.nm26aawait29010_.mp3: Hey, I saw you at the swoop races! I wish I had time to talk, but these mercs keep my pretty busy.
Female_22.nm26aawait29012_.mp3: These mercenaries are running me off my feet! Talk to the bartender if you want something.
Female_22.nm26aawait29014_.mp3: Can't stop now - busy, busy, busy!
Female_22.nm26aawait29016_.mp3: Sorry, if I stand still for even a moment one of these mercs will have his hands where they don't belong.

Female_23.nm04aahend06002_.mp3: I still have you, Hendar. That's all I need. Let's go back to the village.
Female_23.nm04aahend06006_.mp3: As do I, up-worlder. I don't know what I would have done if anything had happened to Hendar.
Female_23.nm13aac86906002_.mp3: Aren't you just a sweet little droid, yes you are!
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01000_.mp3: Please, will you help me? I have nothing. Nothing left.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01002_.mp3: Oh thank you. I don't have anywhere else to turn. If you are down-and-out on Tatooine, you're on your own.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01004_.mp3: My husband was a hunter... killed out on the dunes. This wraid plate is all I have left. Please, will you buy it?
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01006_.mp3: I don't need a handout. I just can't sell it to Fazza without a license. Please, I'm worried about having it. They are so rare...
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01008_.mp3: I wouldn't have any idea who to trust. My husband didn't know most of them... he wasn't a proven hunter yet.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01010_.mp3: I think one of them killed him. I have my suspicions. I'd rather trust a newcomer like you.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01012_.mp3: Will you buy it? I can't sell it myself. They are worth more than 500 credits!
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01014_.mp3: I don't know what to do then. We need the credits desperately. Could you get it? I could wait...
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01016_.mp3: You will? Oh, thank you so much. Please, I know it is worth at least 500 credits.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01018_.mp3: Cheaper? Please, it is all I have. I need the credits. Can't you pay the 500?
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01020_.mp3: [Success] I guess I don't have much choice, do I? I have to take it.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01022_.mp3: It... it will have to do. I thank you, I guess. Maybe... maybe it's enough...
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01024_.mp3: [Failure] No, please, I need the full 500. I have a family... we have nothing.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01026_.mp3: [Success] Half is acceptable to me. I... I agree?
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01029_.mp3: Thank you. I hope it is enough. You have been a great help. I appreciate it. My children will too.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01035_.mp3: For whatever it means, may the Force be with you. You've saved us.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01038_.mp3: 700 credits! Oh, thank you. It is more than generous of you. I don't know what to say. I just don't.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01042_.mp3: I... I don't know. How could I be sure you would come back? Are you sure you can't buy it? Please?
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01044_.mp3: [Success] I guess I don't have much choice in the matter. Here, I'll trust you with it.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01046_.mp3: I'll be here. Please, don't take too long. I need the credits. Maybe we can get started again... maybe.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01048_.mp3: [Failure] I'm sorry, but I can't take the chance. Are you sure you can't buy it from me?
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01050_.mp3: [Success] I... I trust you. Take the plate and sell it. I will wait for you here.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01055_.mp3: What? Please, tell me you are kidding. I can't get any lower than this, and you would take advantage?
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01057_.mp3: Please no! Take it then... but you may as well have killed me. You've trapped us here... we have nothing.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01072_.mp3: [Success] I... I will give you the plate now... here, take it. What... what did you make me do?
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01074_.mp3: You... you have no conscience. That plate is all I had... we're trapped here now... all because of you.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01078_.mp3: [Failure] No! No I won't! What are you doing? Please, don't do this to me!
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01080_.mp3: Will you help after? I'll try to answer what I can.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01082_.mp3: No? But you looked... I'm sorry, I thought you looked equipped like a hunter. Are you sure you aren't going to be getting a license?
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01084_.mp3: I mean, you don't look like a farmer, and the only way to be allowed out of Anchorhead is to get a hunting license.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01086_.mp3: Czerka Corporation sells them in their office just south of here in the center of Anchorhead. That's where my husband got his.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01088_.mp3: I think they charge 200 credits... but they have been known to make exceptions. Please... no one else will help.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01091_.mp3: It's the bone plate from the head of the desert wraid. My husband was so proud that he found it. He had just started hunting.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01093_.mp3: He said he felt sure the next hunt would bring in more, so we waited to sell this one. Then he never came back.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01095_.mp3: We spent everything on my husband's hunting gear. We hoped that the sport would support us. We hoped...
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01097_.mp3: Whoever killed him took everything. All I have left is this desert wraid plate... we thought we were so lucky when he brought it home...
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01099_.mp3: If I could sell it the kids and I could get out of here, maybe buy passage to Coruscant... I don't know.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01101_.mp3: I still can't believe he's gone. What do you want to know?
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01103_.mp3: His name is... was Ward Fizark. He used to work in the mines but they were scaled back last year.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01105_.mp3: He was new to hunting, but he was a good fighter. Used to be a soldier. We spent everything on his gear.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01107_.mp3: After a few trips he didn't come back. Guards say a sandcrawler crew found his body stripped of everything.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01109_.mp3: Nobody saw anything, and most of the other hunters never even knew him. He had just started.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01111_.mp3: I don't trust any of them, but those Gamorreans... they just laugh when they see me. I think they did it.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01113_.mp3: It doesn't matter. There's no justice on Tatooine. I don't care what happens to them. I just need credits.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01119_.mp3: I've got to think about my family, not those vicious pigs.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01121_.mp3: I can't say I'm not grateful, but it doesn't change my situation. I still need credits to get my family out of here.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01123_.mp3: Please, will no one help? We need the credits. We have nothing.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01125_.mp3: I'll try not to take too much of your time. I realize that everyone is out for themselves on Tatooine.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01128_.mp3: I am no beggar! I just need a little help, is all. There is no one for me to turn to on this wretched planet.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01130_.mp3: You are back. Please, have you sold the plate I gave you? My children and I are counting on the credits.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01132_.mp3: You have? Did Fazza give a good price? How much did you get for us?
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01136_.mp3: What... what do you mean? My husband was sure it was worth 500 credits. He was so proud...
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01138_.mp3: I see. I suppose I should thank you for not stealing it all... but I won't. You have no conscience.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01140_.mp3: I hope it will be enough. Goodbye. I hope we never meet again.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01143_.mp3: [Success] I guess I don't have much choice, do I? I have to take it.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01145_.mp3: [Failure] No... no I think you lie. If you are trying to cheat me at least have the guts to admit it.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01147_.mp3: [Success] Half is acceptable to me. I... I agree?
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01151_.mp3: What? But... but I trusted you! How can you stand there and... and... No, I won't give you the satisfaction.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01154_.mp3: Please hurry. The credits are all we have to start again.
Female_23.nm17aa03sh01155_.mp3: You... please, have you reconsidered? I must sell this desert wraid plate, but I have no license. Can you help?

Female_24.nm02aetapr32000_.mp3: They're saying someone broke into the military complex! I hear the Sith are thinking about enforcing a city wide curfew to tighten security.
Female_24.nm02aetapr32002_.mp3: It's a good thing a few of the Sith come in here to relax when they're off duty. That should keep them from closing this cantina down.
Female_24.nm02aetapr32004_.mp3: You aren't from Taris, are you? Do yourself a favor and stay away from the Tarisian ale - it packs more kick than most off-worlders can handle.
Female_24.nm02aetapr32006_.mp3: Hey - you're the Mysterious Stranger! I saw you gun down Starkiller in that death match! Guess you proved you don't have to be a man to handle a blaster.
Female_24.nm02aetapr32008_.mp3: I know you - you're the one who killed Bendak Starkiller in that death match! Too bad the quarantine has made Tarisian ale so expensive or I'd buy you a drink.
Female_24.nm02aetapr32010_.mp3: Have you heard? Bendak Starkiller's coming out of retirement! I almost feel bad for the blaster fodder who's going up against him.

Female_26.nm14aajedi05000_.mp3: Good day to you. I am afraid I cannot speak to you at the moment. I apologize.
Female_26.nm14aajedi05002_.mp3: The kath hounds seem to have calmed down. The settlers must be relieved.
Female_26.nm14aajedi05004_.mp3: The kath hounds have been very active of late. The settlers feel they are becoming more dangerous.
Female_26.nm14aajedi05006_.mp3: Please, don't disturb me; I have pressing matters at hand.
Female_26.nm14aajedi05008_.mp3: I hear that the Sith have defeated another Republic battlefleet. I do not know how much longer the Republic can last.
Female_26.nm14aajedi05010_.mp3: I fear it is only a matter of time before the Sith find us here, too...
Female_26.nm14aajedi05012_.mp3: Dantooine has a splendid environment. I would hate to see it damaged by too many settlers.
Female_26.nm14aajedi05014_.mp3: If you are seeking information, perhaps the Jedi Council will help. I am afraid I cannot.
Female_26.nm14aajedi05016_.mp3: It is relaxing to come outside and enjoy the fresh air once in a while. It relieves stress.

Female_28.nm08aadavs10000_.mp3: Welcome to the slave quarters, fair mistress. I mean no disrespect, but perhaps one of the male slaves could serve your needs better.
Female_28.nm08aadavs10002_.mp3: Welcome to the slave quarters, master. Here we have succulent fruits and berries to tempt your palette, as well as luxurious baths to soothe your aches and pains.
Female_28.nm08aadavs10006_.mp3: Would you like a relaxing massage? Whatever your desire, we are here to serve.
Female_28.nm08aadavs10009_.mp3: But... what could I possibly tell you? It is forbidden for slaves to leave this room on pain of torture and death.
Female_28.nm08aadavs10011_.mp3: [Success] Praise from the guests is a valuable commodity here. Davik rewards the slaves who perform their duties well. I will tell you what I know.
Female_28.nm08aadavs10013_.mp3: [Failure] I'm sorry, master, but the risk is too great. Davik will have me flayed alive if he finds out. Is there something else I may do to please you?
Female_28.nm08aadavs10015_.mp3: [Failure] I won't betray Davik's secrets for credits; they are of no use to a slave. Is there something else I can do for you?
Female_28.nm08aadavs10017_.mp3: Please don't hurt me! I'll... I'll tell you everything I know. I only pray Davik doesn't find out, or my life will end in terrible agony.
Female_28.nm08aadavs10021_.mp3: Davik rarely lets us leave the slave quarters. We only know what we hear from Davik's guests. Recently they've all been talking about poor Hudrow.
Female_28.nm08aadavs10023_.mp3: He was caught trying to steal some spice from the lab. Normally Hudrow is allowed to get away with things like that because he's Davik's personal pilot for the Ebon Hawk.
Female_28.nm08aadavs10025_.mp3: But since the Sith have grounded every ship on the planet, Hudrow doesn't get anymore special treatment. They've locked him up in Davik's torture chambers.
Female_28.nm08aadavs10027_.mp3: I think you can get there through the hall behind the west door of Davik's throne room. Just keep going west from the slave quarters and you'll see the throne room.
Female_28.nm08aadavs10029_.mp3: But Davik's certain to have guards patrolling the area. If you leave the guest wing, they'll shoot you on sight. Please - I don't know anything else.
Female_28.nm08aadavs10031_.mp3: Nothing - Davik keeps us locked away in here day and night. I'm not even certain of the location of the torture chamber where they've got Hudrow locked away.
Female_28.nm08aadavs10034_.mp3: As you wish, master. You will find this most relaxing. If you would come with me into the massage room at the back...
Female_28.nm08aadavs10046_.mp3: I trust you were satisfied with the service? I have received many compliments on my skills from previous clients.
Female_28.nm08aadavs10048_.mp3: Thank you, kind sir. I hope you will express your appreciation to Davik. He often rewards those slaves who perform their duties well. Is there anything else you require?
Female_28.nm08aadavs10050_.mp3: Please, I beg you - don't tell Davik you are displeased with me! He punishes those slaves who do not satisfy his guests!
Female_28.nm08aadavs10052_.mp3: I have no wish to be beaten by Davik, so I will tell you all I know. I hope it is enough to buy your mercy.
Female_28.nm08aadavs10056_.mp3: As... as you wish, master. It will not be the first time I have been punished by Davik.
Female_28.nm08aadavs10058_.mp3: I am sorry I have failed to please you, master. I will try to do better in the future. Is there anything else you require from this most unworthy servant?
Female_28.nm08aadavs10061_.mp3: My, you certainly have a great hunger for my services. I will do my best to sate your prodigious appetites with another massage, master.
Female_28.nm08aadavs10065_.mp3: Of course. Return whenever you wish to partake of what is offered here. We exist only to serve.
Female_28.nm08aadavs10067_.mp3: I greet you once more, master. How may this humble servant be of use to you?
Female_28.nm08aadavs11004_.mp3: Wow! This guy's gorgeous; Davik sure knows how to pick 'em!

Female_30.nm02abithb10004_.mp3: Yeah - go back where you came from! We don't want your kind up here!
Female_30.nm02abithb10024_.mp3: Wow! You got him good that time! Hey - I think he's dead!
Female_30.nm02abithb10029_.mp3: Why do you care what happens to some scummy alien? He's just a freak!

Female_32.nm26abswoo25000_.mp3: Well, I guess the course proved too much for you at this level. Better luck next time.
Female_32.nm26abswoo25025_.mp3: You sure put Hukta in his place. I don't have to say that you are a much more appealing champion.
Female_32.nm26abswoo25026_.mp3: I haven't seen a race like that in years. Well, there was Gandroff on Coruscant, but he lacked your... charms.
Female_32.nm26abswoo25027_.mp3: You are amazing out on the course... and in person. Congratulations.

Female_35.nm02aefemy13000_.mp3: Do I know you? No? Then why are you speaking to me?
Female_35.nm02aefemy13002_.mp3: Why do you poor folk always smell so funny?
Female_35.nm02aefemy13004_.mp3: Are you our waiter? Gana's buying tonight. Talk to her to get my order.

Female_38.nglobelena12000_.mp3: Mission? Is that you? It's me, Lena. Remember? I was dating your brother back on Taris!
Female_38.nglobelena12004_.mp3: I'm just passing through. Griff and I broke up a few months after we left Taris together. Probably for the best. Your brother can be charming, Mission, but he's bad news.
Female_38.nglobelena12008_.mp3: Wha-?? Mission, what's wrong with you? Why are you acting this way?
Female_38.nglobelena12010_.mp3: You've got your facts a little backwards. Mission could have come with us if she wanted to! It was her choice to stay behind!
Female_38.nglobelena12014_.mp3: Is that what the Hutt-spawn told you? I wanted you to come with us, Mission. I even offered to pay for your ticket! Why not? I paid for everything else while I was with that freeloader.
Female_38.nglobelena12016_.mp3: But he told me you didn't want to leave Taris. I said we shouldn't even go then, but he said we'd come back and get you after we struck it rich on Tatooine - just another one of his lies!
Female_38.nglobelena12021_.mp3: Think about it. If Griff wasn't trying to ditch you, Mission, then why didn't he tell you where we were going?
Female_38.nglobelena12023_.mp3: After we left Taris he told me looking after you was holding him back - Griff's always looking to blame other people for his own problems. That's why he abandoned you.
Female_38.nglobelena12025_.mp3: He did the same thing to me, too, as soon as I ran out of money. He started blaming me for all his problems. Like it's my fault his get-rich-quick schemes never work out!
Female_38.nglobelena12027_.mp3: You damn well know it! He's nothing but a sleazy scam artist. If Mission knew what was good for her she'd forget he ever existed.
Female_38.nglobelena12030_.mp3: Hey, if you want to talk to Griff go ahead. Last I heard he was going to make a fortune working the Czerka Corp mines on Tatooine. But as far as I'm concerned he's out of my life forever!
Female_38.nglobelena12034_.mp3: *sigh* I guess that's my cue to leave, then. I didn't mean to upset you, Mission. But one day you'll see I'm right about your brother. I only hope it's not too late by then.
Female_38.nglobelena12037_.mp3: Still on Tatooine, as far as I know. Not that I really care anymore. And if Mission was smart she'd forget about that no-good con artist!
Female_38.nglobelena12044_.mp3: Yeah, I know how she feels. Griff can be pretty frustrating. I guess that's why Mission didn't want to come with us when we left Taris.

Female_39.nm04aaoutw19000_.mp3: I had fine clothes, a beautiful bed - now I wear rags and I sleep on the ground like an animal! Were my crimes so horrible that I should now suffer like this?
Female_39.nm04aaoutw19002_.mp3: We have no food, no weapons - nothing! How can we live like this? We are doomed.
Female_39.nm04aaoutw20000_.mp3: The rakghouls are increasing in number. We cannot even venture beyond the gates for food without being attacked!
Female_39.nm04aaoutw20002_.mp3: Thank you... my husband was one of those banished because he had the rakghoul disease. If you hadn't cured him, I would have never seen him again!
Female_39.nm04aaoutw20004_.mp3: The rakghouls will devour us all, unless we starve to death first.
Female_39.nm04aaoutw23000_.mp3: Wait, up-worlder. You can't go through this gate. There is too much danger and suffering beyond. For your own sake, turn back.
Female_39.nm04aaoutw23002_.mp3: Your offer is generous, up-worlder, but the serum is useless to us now.
Female_39.nm04aaoutw23004_.mp3: The villagers infected with the rakghoul disease have been quarantined beyond this gate. At any moment they could be transformed into terrible monsters.
Female_39.nm04aaoutw23006_.mp3: Nobody would be foolish enough to risk going into the pens to give them the cure: the infected ones could transform into rakghouls and attack them at any moment.
Female_39.nm04aaoutw23008_.mp3: I can't help the infected ones. They have to die so that the rest of the village can live. I accept this. If you think that makes me a coward, so be it.
Female_39.nm04aaoutw23010_.mp3: I am Esala, healer of this village. I use my knowledge and what little resources we have to care for the Outcasts who are sick or injured.
Female_39.nm04aaoutw23012_.mp3: But despite my medical training, there is nothing I can do to help the poor souls locked on the other side of this gate.
Female_39.nm04aaoutw23016_.mp3: If you have questions you should speak to Gendar. He's the leader of this village. All my attention has to stay focused on trying to ease the suffering of those within the village.
Female_39.nm04aaoutw23019_.mp3: I'm only warning you for your own protection, up-worlder.
Female_39.nm04aaoutw23021_.mp3: The villagers infected with the rakghoul disease are quarantined beyond this gate. It's only a matter of time until they transform into horrible creatures that would destroy us all.
Female_39.nm04aaoutw23023_.mp3: For the sake of the village, we have to keep the infected ones locked away. And when they finally do transform into rakghouls we'll let them destroy each other.
Female_39.nm04aaoutw23025_.mp3: Nothing can be done for the infected villagers. Even the serum to counteract the rakghoul disease wouldn't be any use, now.
Female_39.nm04aaoutw23028_.mp3: I can't stop you from going through the gates, up-worlder. But if the infected ones have already transformed into rakghouls you'll be walking into your grave.
Female_39.nm04aaoutw23033_.mp3: You amaze me. I always thought the surface dwellers couldn't care less about us Outcasts. But you risked everything to help those infected villagers!
Female_39.nm04aaoutw23035_.mp3: I wish I had some type of reward to give you, but we Outcasts have nothing. All I can offer is the gratitude of the entire village.
Female_39.nm04aaoutw23037_.mp3: Back again. Is there something else you need?

Female_40.nm17ag10cz01004_.mp3: Griff? Uh... there's no Griff here. Never heard of him. No, I... I don't remember a single Griff on the Czerka Corporation payroll.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01006_.mp3: [Success] Oh, you mean that Twi'lek! Must have slipped my mind for a second. Yes, of course I remember Griff.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01018_.mp3: Czerka Corporation cares deeply for all of its employees. That's why we've started a bounty program to thin the Sand People numbers.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01039_.mp3: Of course. You have done a good job for us and I'm happy to pay you.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01040_.mp3: I see that, but do you have the all important Chieftain's Gaffi? That was what you agreed to get for us.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01053_.mp3: [Failure] I think you'll find that the reward I have given is more than adequate for the task. No more is deserved.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01063_.mp3: Very well, but we need this matter taken care of.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01067_.mp3: We use them to insure that only people judged fit by Czerka Corporation are allowed outside the city.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01071_.mp3: It's just so we can keep track of people. No one leaves the city without a Czerka hunting license.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01081_.mp3: Which would you rather have dumped on your office floor? Besides, they are ceremonial weapons unique to each warrior. It's just as good.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01096_.mp3: With the downturn in mining, people want any chance at credits they can get. Most wouldn't survive a day, let alone qualify as hunters.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01104_.mp3: You have fulfilled your end of the bargain and Czerka Corporation is grateful. The Sand People will be less of a threat without their chieftain.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01109_.mp3: We don't have any new information on the subject. It is still possible that they have an enclave in the far south of the Dune Sea.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01115_.mp3: You are not authorized to do anything other than deliver what was promised. Do so, and don't talk of this foolishness again.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01117_.mp3: Of course. Czerka Corporation records are available at our Representative Kiosk on Coruscant. Business hours please.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01123_.mp3: I'm sorry, I'll have to direct you to our Representative Kiosk on Coruscant. Business hours only, please.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01133_.mp3: No one knows. There are odd energy fluctuations on this planet, but they defy analysis or explanation.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01135_.mp3: But the effect is obvious. Ore taken from Tatooine is useless for construction. It degrades incredibly fast.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01137_.mp3: Word is getting out about it too. We're running out of buyers. Czerka Corporation is not doing well here.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01145_.mp3: We can't ignore evidence that Anchorhead was settled more than once before, and abandoned each time.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01147_.mp3: There's probably about a century between each attempt. Just long enough for records about why it failed to disappear.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01150_.mp3: [Failure] I'm sorry, but I can't help you. I'll have to refer you to the Representative Kiosk.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01152_.mp3: [Success] Of course, I could just tell you now. No sense in being so secretive. It's all fairly obvious.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01159_.mp3: If you are looking for local events, I suggest you go to the swoop track. One of the few leisure industries on Tatooine.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01161_.mp3: Hmm... there was also a Jawa here earlier, saying something about needing help. I think he's out by the city gates.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01163_.mp3: I can't be more specific about what he wanted. Our droid translators had difficulty with the message.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01165_.mp3: Czerka Corporation policy is not subject to your approval. It is a sound business model. Save us your commentary.
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01170_.mp3: Er... not financially, you understand. Now, was this about bounties or something else?
Female_40.nm17ag10cz01171_.mp3: Greetings again from the offices of Czerka Corporation. Is this about bounties or something else?

Female_42.nm03abselv08000_.mp3: Stop right there, or I'll give you a blaster shot right between the eyes! Now, what are you doing here?
Female_42.nm03abselv08002_.mp3: No. I'm the one with the blaster pointed at you. I get to ask the questions. Now - what are you doing here?
Female_42.nm03abselv08004_.mp3: You think I care if you're with the Sith? I've killed plenty of your kind before and I've got no problem doing it again!
Female_42.nm03abselv08007_.mp3: Well go explore somewhere else. There's nothing interesting for you in here. This is your only warning - if you bother me again, you won't walk out of here alive!
Female_42.nm03abselv08010_.mp3: You're a fool if you think you can collect the price on my head!
Female_42.nm03abselv08012_.mp3: Now you'll see why I'm the most dangerous assassin on Taris!
Female_42.nm03abselv08015_.mp3: Bad luck for you that you picked my apartment then.
Female_42.nm03abselv08017_.mp3: I gave you a chance to get out of here and leave me alone, but I guess you're just too stupid to take it.

Female_46.nm17ag10cz01000_.mp3: Can I help you? These are the offices of Czerka Corporation. I trust you have business with the company?
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01002_.mp3: If this is about employment, I'm afraid all regular mining positions are full. And before you ask, we are also no longer selling hunting licenses.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01008_.mp3: We hired that Twi'lek some time ago. Not a good worker according to his crew chief: always complaining and faking injuries to get out of work.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01010_.mp3: He entered false time sheets and slept through his shifts. We even suspected him of stealing Czerka Corporation supplies, although we could never prove it.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01012_.mp3: We would've fired him but we needed workers. It would have been better for him if he had been fired. Then the Sand People wouldn't have gotten him.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01014_.mp3: He was lost in a Sand People raid we suffered not too long ago. There were prisoners taken, but our rescue parties never found anyone alive.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01016_.mp3: In the end it just wasn't cost effective to keep searching. All miners sign a waiver absolving Czerka Corporation of liability in these circumstances.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01021_.mp3: We didn't find his body so we have to assume he was taken prisoner. Whether he's still alive, I couldn't say.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01023_.mp3: That's all I can tell you. I shouldn't even have said this much; this is all privileged corporate information. I could lose my job!
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01025_.mp3: As I said, all employees have signed waivers absolving Czerka Corporation of any financial liability if this occurs. It is the industry standard.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01027_.mp3: I suppose you could apply for special dispensation from the Czerka Corporation Representative Kiosk on Coruscant. Business hours only, please.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01030_.mp3: [Failure] I'm sorry, but Czerka Corporation officials do not accept bribes. Now, unless you're interested in our bounties or some other business I'm going to have to ask you to leave!
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01032_.mp3: [Success] Can you spare me a few moments? I have something I want to get off my chest. I want to tell you about one of our workers. His name was Griff.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01035_.mp3: That... may help in this instance. Let me think... perhaps I remember this Griff character.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01042_.mp3: Then I'll take those off your hands, but the real prize is still out there.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01044_.mp3: Well, that is a very big headache that you have removed. I'm sure there are still Sand People out there, but they will be quieter now.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01046_.mp3: I think I'll give you a bonus for this. You've more than lived up to your side of the bargain. Czerka Corporation thanks you.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01048_.mp3: I'm sure. Czerka Corporation thanks you again.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01050_.mp3: [Success] It would be valuable to have someone on call if the Sand People made another incursion. I think you're right.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01052_.mp3: Yes, here is an additional reward. Once again, Czerka Corporation thanks you.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01055_.mp3: [Success] And I wouldn't want you to leave without this additional reward. Yes, of course I wouldn't.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01057_.mp3: Once again, Czerka Corporation thanks you.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01059_.mp3: *ahem* While I respect your... forcefulness, I must remind you that ours are the finest, and only, guards in Anchorhead.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01061_.mp3: It would simply be inadvisable to attempt such an action in here. There would be no place for you to run. I don't fear you here.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01065_.mp3: As I said, we are no longer selling them. There are too many people cavorting about outside the walls as it is.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01069_.mp3: We don't allow casual exploration because of legal concerns. Czerka Corporation takes no responsibility for loss of life on the dunes.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01073_.mp3: Well, normally we charge 200 credits, but I could make an exception if you agreed to perform a task for us. It's similar to hunting.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01075_.mp3: The Sand People are becoming a problem. They destroy our sandcrawlers and kill our miners. One particular tribe is the worst.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01077_.mp3: It's as if their chieftain has decided to wage a war against us. I would like their attacks... terminated. Bring me their gaffi sticks as proof.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01079_.mp3: If you agree to do this, I'll give you a hunting license now and pay a bounty for each stick later. I'll give a bonus for the chieftain's.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01083_.mp3: Then you are free to not leave the city, just like everyone else. Czerka Corporation will welcome your eventual change of mind.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01085_.mp3: Please, feel free to enjoy the door behind you.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01087_.mp3: Excellent. Now, just so we understand each other, this is an enforceable contract. Czerka Corporation takes this very seriously.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01089_.mp3: Here is your license, and a few directions. We believe one of their enclaves is in the far south of the Dune Sea.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01091_.mp3: You might try following one of our sandcawlers. They are regularly attacked. I wouldn't mind you escorting them.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01093_.mp3: Very good. Czerka Corporation looks forward to your future business.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01098_.mp3: The last license issued before the ban was given to a woman named Marlena Venn. She'll do fine; she had a mean streak a parsec wide.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01100_.mp3: She also paid double. Exceptions like this are rare, unless it suits the company to offer them.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01102_.mp3: Very well, though I do have work to get back to.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01106_.mp3: I will of course continue to give you bounties on regular gaffi sticks. Every one helps.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01107_.mp3: Yes, we are still waiting for you to return with the Sand People Chieftain's gaffi stick. I will reward you well when you do.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01111_.mp3: And I would remind you that you did agree to do this task for Czerka Corporation. We expect completion in a timely manner.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01113_.mp3: I should remind you that you were not retained as a diplomatic representative. You are a hunter, and should go after your prey as we agreed.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01119_.mp3: For your needs here, we maintain a fully stocked storehouse. Speak with Greeta Holda about any purchases.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01121_.mp3: I'm sorry, but day-to-day operations of Czerka Corporation outposts are fully regionalized. I have no information on Kashyyyk.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01125_.mp3: Certainly. Please pose your questions to the Representative Kiosk on Coruscant. Business hours please.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01127_.mp3: [Success] I suppose you're right. It's not like you can't tell the state of things just by looking around.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01129_.mp3: Mining operations here have not been a success. The ore is substandard, and there's less of it than surveys indicated.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01131_.mp3: With the Sand People raids on top of it all, it's no wonder this planet has been abandoned before.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01139_.mp3: The company would have to be foolish to stay. It will be costly, but in the end, leaving will be cheaper than staying.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01141_.mp3: I imagine all the heavy equipment will be abandoned. It's not worth shipping out things like sandcrawlers.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01143_.mp3: Maybe the Jawas will find a use for them when we're gone. Ha! That's a laugh!
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01149_.mp3: The Jawas scavenge ancient tech all the time. It's a remote world. Who knows what's here?
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01155_.mp3: I assume that by "out of the ordinary" you are referring to the destruction of Taris? That is all anyone is talking about.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01157_.mp3: I'm afraid Czerka Corporation is not offering any comment on those events. We wouldn't wish to anger the participants.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01167_.mp3: Farewell. Czerka Corporation welcomes your future inquiries.
Female_46.nm17ag10cz01168_.mp3: Hello again. I hear you've made an impression down at the swoop track. Czerka Corporation wholly supports local events.

Female_47.nm02ackebl04000_.mp3: Oh... hello there. Uh... what can I do for you? Would you like to see my inventory? That is why you're here isn't it? At least, I hope so.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04002_.mp3: Of course, of course. Right away.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04005_.mp3: Questions? Oh, I... I don't know anything. Nothing you Sith would find interesting, anyway. I'm just a simple shopkeeper.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04007_.mp3: Oh, good. I mean, goodbye. Please come back whenever... uh... whenever you want, I guess.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04009_.mp3: Hello there. I haven't seen you in my shop before... allow me to introduce myself. My name is Kebla Yurt. Welcome to the Equipment Emporium.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04011_.mp3: You looking to buy some supplies? My shop's the largest one in all of Upper Taris. Best selection on the planet. Whatever you need, I've got. Well, mostly.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04013_.mp3: The Sith confiscated all my heavy weapons. And they impounded all my ships and swoop bikes. But I've still got a real nice selection, if you're interested.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04015_.mp3: Ah, just so you know, the prices on the items are final - no bargaining here. This isn't a swap meet, ok? I only deal in top notch stuff.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04017_.mp3: Because of the Sith quarantine I haven't been able to stock any new inventory, but I've still got some nice items you might be interested in.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04020_.mp3: Anything I can do to help a potential customer out. What do you want to know?
Female_47.nm02ackebl04022_.mp3: I heard a couple of pods crashed down in the Undercity. I bet the crash sites have already been stripped clean by the Sith though - unless the swoop gangs or Davik's men got there first.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04024_.mp3: Uh, heh. It's not smart to say bad things about the people in power, if you get my meaning. I just wish the Sith would ease up on the quarantine - they're killing my business!
Female_47.nm02ackebl04026_.mp3: I can't say I like having them here in the Upper City, but it could be worse. And we're still a lot better off than the Lower City, what with those swoop gangs and all.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04028_.mp3: Oh, you're one of those off-worlders, arent you? Come to Taris for a short business trip and end up stuck here because of the Sith quarantine, right?
Female_47.nm02ackebl04030_.mp3: Oh, you can't be too happy, trapped on an unfamiliar world and all. But Taris isn't so bad, as long as you stay in the Upper City. Just try to avoid the Sith.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04032_.mp3: And stay out of the Lower City. The swoop gangs are totally out of control. Even Davik's men are having trouble down there.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04034_.mp3: I don't have anything good to say about the swoop gangs: zooming around on their swoop bikes, terrorizing the Lower City like a bunch of animals!
Female_47.nm02ackebl04036_.mp3: Things weren't so bad when the Hidden Beks were running the show, but ever since the rise of the Black Vulkar gang the Lower City has been nothing short of a war zone!
Female_47.nm02ackebl04038_.mp3: The Sith haven't even bothered trying to maintain order down there, and I heard a rumor that Davik's own people are having problems with the Black Vulkars now.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04040_.mp3: Oh, Davik's a legitimate businessman, if you get my drift: smuggling, slaving, extortion. Uh huh. They say he's a member of the Exchange - you know, the big intergalactic criminal organization.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04044_.mp3: I have to pay him a protection fee every month, but it's reasonable. And I get most of my inventory through Davik and his suppliers - I'm just smart enough not to ask where it came from, you understand?
Female_47.nm02ackebl04046_.mp3: Careful where you say that. Davik's got spies and agents everywhere. Besides, he's as much a part of Taris as the skyscrapers or the swoop gangs.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04048_.mp3: Davik hates the Sith as much as anybody - the quarantine has put a real dent in his operations too. But he's keeping a low profile as long as the occupation lasts.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04050_.mp3: Davik stays out of the way, and the Sith don't bother him. The swoop gangs could learn a thing or two from this tidy little arrangement, instead of always going after each other.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04052_.mp3: Oh well, see you around, then. Unless Bendak takes care of you first. Uh, good luck with that, by the way.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04054_.mp3: Good day to you then. Remember to come on back to my shop if you ever need any supplies.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04056_.mp3: Hey, I know you! You're the Mysterious Stranger, right? Everybody's saying you're going to fight Bendak Starkiller in an illegal death match!
Female_47.nm02ackebl04058_.mp3: You know Bendak's never lost a match in his life, right? You need to take a look at my weapons and armor.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04059_.mp3: Hey, look who's back - the Mysterious Stranger! You know, I had a front row seat when you gunned down Bendak Starkiller. Best duel I've ever seen!
Female_47.nm02ackebl04061_.mp3: If times weren't so tough I'd give you a discount, seeing as how you're a big celebrity and all. But with the Sith occupation I can barely afford to keep the doors open.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04062_.mp3: Hey, look at this - a real live celebrity right here in my shop! Winning that swoop bike race has made you into something of a local hero.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04064_.mp3: Hello, again. If you're interested in buying any of my equipment I'd suggest you do it now, because you might not get a chance later on.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04066_.mp3: Word on the street is somebody broke into the military compound. I bet they start closing down every business in Upper Taris until they find the culprit.
Female_47.nm02ackebl04068_.mp3: But until they shut me down I'm still open for business. So what do you say - you want to see what I have in stock?
Female_47.nm02ackebl04069_.mp3: Welcome to the Equipment Emporium - finest selection of supplies in all of Taris. You interested in seeing what I have in stock?

Female_48.nm27aasith99000_.mp3: You there! I don't recognize you! How did you get in here?
Female_48.nm27aasith99002_.mp3: Your pass-card is out of date! And I don't recognize you at all! We'll get to the bottom of this soon enough!
Female_48.nm27aasith99004_.mp3: Your pass-code is out of date! And I don't recognize you at all! We'll get to the bottom of this soon enough!
Female_48.nm27aasith99006_.mp3: [Failure] Ha! I don't recognize you and I know every Sith on this planet! We'll get to the bottom of this!
Female_48.nm27aasith99007_.mp3: Commander Grann, report to the security desk immediately!
Female_48.nm27aasith99009_.mp3: You authorized this person to enter?
Female_48.nm27aasith99011_.mp3: I don't know them... and their identification doesn't match up! They're spies!
Female_48.nm27aasith99014_.mp3: [Failure] You... I don't recognize you! I know the face of every Sith on the planet! We'll get to the bottom of this!

Female_49.nm02aechri05000_.mp3: Wow, are you really a noble? You must be pretty rich, right? Is your family important?
Female_49.nm02aechri05004_.mp3: Oh, don't pay any attention to him. He's just some Pazaak player I met. He's not an actual noble, like you! C'mon, sweetie... let's go back to your mansion.
Female_49.nm02aechri05006_.mp3: I saw your match against Niklos. He doesn't lose very often. I bet you could make a lot of credits as a professional Pazaak player!
Female_49.nm02aechri05008_.mp3: You know, you're my kind of guy; rich and handsome - just the way I like them. Why don't we slip away to the tap room together?
Female_49.nm02aechri05010_.mp3: The bartender can mix us up something special for only twenty credits. If you play your cards right Pazaak might not be the only game you get lucky at tonight.
Female_49.nm02aechri05012_.mp3: I love a man who's not afraid to spend his credits! I'll meet you in the tap room. Don't be too long - I'm not a patient girl.
Female_49.nm02aechri05015_.mp3: Well, I'm used to the finer things in life. I'm not about to lower my standards for any man. So how about it - you want me to get those drinks for us?
Female_49.nm02aechri05017_.mp3: Really? You must not be as good at Pazaak as I thought. Well, I'm not going to waste my time with some penniless gambler!
Female_49.nm02aechri05019_.mp3: Suddenly I find you very boring. Maybe I can find someone more interesting in the tap room.
Female_49.nm02aechri05022_.mp3: What's the matter, you shy? Suit yourself. I'll be here if you change your mind, just waiting for a nice, rich Pazaak player to come along...
Female_49.nm02aechri05025_.mp3: I saw your match against Niklos - if you could even call it that. You aren't much of a Pazaak player, are you?
Female_49.nm02aechri05027_.mp3: Don't you love watching the Pazaak players? All that strategy. All those credits... It's enough to make a girl get all flushed!

Female_54.nm18ab10wi06000_.mp3: Hello there. You're heading out to the desert? You're a hunter right? You must be if you've been allowed to leave Anchorhead.
Female_54.nm18ab10wi06001_.mp3: When you see Tanis, and I know you know him, tell him his wife hopes he enjoys the anniversary gift.
Female_54.nm18ab10wi06003_.mp3: Don't play dumb. You're just another of his playthings down at that "hunting" club. I know your type through and through.
Female_54.nm18ab10wi06004_.mp3: Well, he can do what he wants. He'll get what he deserves. I bought my own license just so I could see that he did.
Female_54.nm18ab10wi06006_.mp3: I'm sure you do. Like I said, when you see him, tell him his wife Marlena says hello.
Female_54.nm18ab10wi06008_.mp3: Oh, I'm through planning. I just left him a little mess that he has to take care of. If he's smart, he'll be just fine.
Female_54.nm18ab10wi06011_.mp3: Just a little something to remember me by. Something that symbolizes our years together. Something that will blow up in his face.
Female_54.nm18ab10wi06012_.mp3: Of course, he'll never understand how appropriate it is. He can't talk his way out of this one. He's not smart enough.
Female_54.nm18ab10wi06014_.mp3: Oh, I'll be long gone soon enough. The next shuttle to... anywhere, really. I've had it with cleaning up his messes, repairing his droids.
Female_54.nm18ab10wi06015_.mp3: If he lives, he can try and get by on his own. I doubt he'll last long with no one to listen to his lies.
Female_54.nm18ab10wi06016_.mp3: When you see Tanis, and I know you old boys always stick together, tell him his wife hopes he enjoys the anniversary gift.
Female_54.nm18ab10wi06018_.mp3: You're just another of his buddies from that "hunting" club. I know your kind. You all cover for each other, I bet.
Female_54.nm18ab10wi06019_.mp3:
Having fun on the dunes, Tanis? I made sure you
would. Here's the deal: Your precious droids have
trapped you. They'll hold you until you die of thirst.
Make a mistake while repairing them, they explode.
Have a good death. My mother was right about you.

Female_55.nm40abinjo08000_.mp3: Don't shoot! Only the guards were armed, I don't have any weapons! I'm injured! I surrender! I surrender!
Female_55.nm40abinjo08003_.mp3: I'm Major Hurka of the Sith's Second battalion. Most of my unit was sacrificed for the sake of better strategic position in the last land battle against the Republic.
Female_55.nm40abinjo08005_.mp3: Luckily only my arm was injured in the attack; I could still make a break for it when we were overrun. Because I'm an officer I was taken here to the medical bay for treatment.
Female_55.nm40abinjo08007_.mp3: Of course Lord Malak ordered that any enlisted Sith soldiers fleeing the battle be gunned down for desertion. I feel bad for my troops, but you've got to maintain discipline.
Female_55.nm40abinjo08009_.mp3: The Republic is soft. They don't even torture prisoners, let alone kill their own troops. That's why we Sith are winning so many of the battles.
Female_55.nm40abinjo08011_.mp3: The fear of Lord Malak keeps the troops in line. It makes my job as an officer easier, too. Nobody ever questions any of my orders.
Female_55.nm40abinjo08014_.mp3: You may have escaped your cell, but you'll never make it off the Leviathan. Your ship's locked up in the docking bay and only the main bridge computer can open the bay doors.
Female_55.nm40abinjo08016_.mp3: But you'll never make it to the bridge. Too much security. There's droids, soldiers and gun turrets. Anyone not accompanied by a Sith officer will be attacked on sight!
Female_55.nm40abinjo08018_.mp3: Why would I want to help you? You're the enemy!
Female_55.nm40abinjo08020_.mp3: [Success] Yes... you're my friend. I want to help you. Come on, follow me. I'll take you past the security station.
Female_55.nm40abinjo08022_.mp3: There you go, friend. I've unlocked the door and disabled the droids and gun turrets and... uh... and... wait a minute! What's going on here?
Female_55.nm40abinjo08024_.mp3: You used some kind of Jedi mind trick on me, didn't you?
Female_55.nm40abinjo08027_.mp3: [Success] If Admiral Karath finds out I helped you I'm dead... but I guess it's better than having you kill me now. I just hope no one ever finds out what I've done.
Female_55.nm40abinjo08029_.mp3: I'll get you past the bridge security station, but I think your plan is going to get us both killed!
Female_55.nm40abinjo08031_.mp3: Okay, I've punched in my security clearance. The doors are unlocked and you don't have to worry about the droids or the gun turrets in the next room.
Female_55.nm40abinjo08033_.mp3: But in the next room there's half a dozen guards. I don't know how you plan to get past them.
Female_55.nm40abinjo08035_.mp3: This is madness! It'll never work! The guards will see me with you. They'll tell Admiral Karath I was helping you. He'll have me flayed alive!
Female_55.nm40abinjo08037_.mp3: I should never have agreed to this! You've signed my death warrant!
Female_55.nm40abinjo08041_.mp3: I knew you couldn't be trusted! Guards! Help! The prisoners have escaped!
Female_55.nm40abinjo08043_.mp3: [Failure] If I help you Admiral Karath will kill me himself... after torturing me for days first! Believe me - I'm more scared of him than I am of you!
