Female_55.nm40abinjo08045_.mp3: No, don't torture me! I'll do what you want!
Female_55.nm40abinjo08048_.mp3: Not unless you can breathe in outer space. The only corridor on the ship leading to the bridge goes right through the security station. You'll never make it.
Female_55.nm40abinjo08050_.mp3: You don't have to kill me! Just... just give me a shot of kolto! That'll knock me out for hours! Please, I don't want to die like this - injured and helpless on a hospital bed!
Female_55.nm40abinjo08052_.mp3: Wow! That's powerful stuff. I'm ... getting... dizzy... already...
Female_55.nm40abinjo08055_.mp3: Help! Guards! The prisoners have escaped!

Female_57.nm02aeice017000_.mp3: Congratulations, Stranger. I never thought anyone would beat Starkiller. Did you know it was because of him that I became a duelist in the first place?
Female_57.nm02aeice017002_.mp3: As a little girl I used to dream of meeting him one day. When I finally did, the guy was a complete slime ball. Made me realize I had to be cold and ruthless to survive, like him.
Female_57.nm02aeice017004_.mp3: And now he's dead. There's probably a lesson in there somewhere. Something for me to think about, at least. Congratulations again, Stranger... and goodbye.
Female_57.nm02aeice017006_.mp3: I heard you're going to fight Bendak Starkiller, Stranger. I'm not one to mince words, so let me just say this: you're dead. He'll kill you, end of story.
Female_57.nm02aeice017008_.mp3: You think I'm cold and hard, wait until you step into the ring with him. He's a natural born killer. You had great potential, Stranger. Too bad you're going to throw it all away.
Female_57.nm02aeice017010_.mp3: I've never been one to shy away from the cold, hard truth so I'll just come right out and say it: I can't compete with the likes of you, Stranger. I know when I'm overmatched.
Female_57.nm02aeice017012_.mp3: You're good - very good. But you're wrong if you think that means I'm suddenly going to warm up to you. Truth is, I really don't have anything more to say, so you might as well move on.
Female_57.nm02aeice017014_.mp3: What do you want? Wait, let me guess - now that you're a duelist you figure we have something in common? Something to chat about, right?
Female_57.nm02aeice017016_.mp3: Wrong! Just because we're both duelists doesn't mean we're suddenly friends. So give me some space, Stranger. I've got nothing more to say to you.
Female_57.nm02aeice017018_.mp3: Back again? Didn't you get the message last time - I'm not here to make friends. Talk to the Duel Organizer if you want a match, otherwise leave me alone.
Female_57.nm02aeice017020_.mp3: Wait, I know what you're going to say: I'm so beautiful, I'm so attractive, how can someone who looks so hot with a weapon in her hand be called Ice? Well, I've heard it all before.
Female_57.nm02aeice017022_.mp3: I'm here to take care of business in the dueling ring, not to have some slack-jawed, goggle-eyed man slobber all over me. So back off!
Female_57.nm02aeice017024_.mp3: Now you know why they call me Ice. If you're looking for a match, go talk to the Ajuur. He's that big Hutt over there in the corner. Otherwise, just go away.
Female_57.nm02aeice017027_.mp3: You don't know about the dueling ring? This is unbelievable! Then why are you even here? Wait - never mind. I don't really care.
Female_57.nm02aeice017030_.mp3: You know what? I'm not one for friendly chit-chat, so I'm just going to deliver the cold, hard facts: I don't want to waste anymore time with you.
Female_57.nm02aeice017031_.mp3: Wait, I know what you're going to say: it's great to see a woman in the duel ring, strike a blow for equality, I'm a credit to my gender, blah, blah, blah. Just save it, okay?
Female_57.nm02aeice017033_.mp3: I'm just here to take care of business in the dueling ring. For some reason every woman who comes in here thinks we should have some kind of female bond. Guess what? We don't!

Female_58.nm34aathal03000_.mp3: So... is there news? Is the passageway clear?
Female_58.nm34aathal03002_.mp3: You... you tricked us! You just wanted to get closer!! Quick, get them!!
Female_58.nm34aathal03004_.mp3: Alright. We'll keep waiting, then. Watch out for that beast... it's dangerous.
Female_58.nm34aathal03006_.mp3: It... it's clear? We can go?
Female_58.nm34aathal03007_.mp3: Thank you. This... I wasn't expecting help from anyone in the academy. I guess we aren't the only ones who don't... agree with everything.
Female_58.nm34aathal03008_.mp3: Maybe... maybe the Jedi will accept us. I've seen how evil the dark side is. Maybe I could try.
Female_58.nm34aathal03009_.mp3: At any rate, thank you again. You've saved our lives.
Female_58.nm34aathal03010_.mp3: Hold it right there, whoever you are! We... we're not going back to the academy! We'll kill you rather than go back!
Female_58.nm34aathal03012_.mp3: You mean you aren't here to kill us or bring us back? I find that hard to believe. The only way into these caves is through the academy. You must be a Sith.
Female_58.nm34aathal03013_.mp3: So what is it, then? If you're not here to kill us or bring us back, why are you here? Speak up!
Female_58.nm34aathal03016_.mp3: So you don't know about us? I don't know if I'm ready to believe that or not, but I'll play along for the moment.
Female_58.nm34aathal03017_.mp3: My name is Thalia May. The others here and myself refused to murder a bunch of people on a whim from Master Uthar... so here we are.
Female_58.nm34aathal03018_.mp3: We thought that becoming a Sith was what we always wanted, but that wasn't true. Now all we want is to get out of here. Fair enough?
Female_58.nm34aathal03020_.mp3: Help us? Why should I believe that this isn't some kind of trick?
Female_58.nm34aathal03022_.mp3: [Success] You want to help us? Alright... I can think of a way. We're stuck in these caves, obviously, or we would have been long gone.
Female_58.nm34aathal03023_.mp3: [Success] You want to help us? Alright... I can think of a way. We're stuck in these caves, obviously, or we would have been long gone.
Female_58.nm34aathal03024_.mp3: There's a passage to the surface through the caves, but we're blocked by some kind of large creature. We can't defeat it.
Female_58.nm34aathal03025_.mp3: If you could kill it and clear up the passageway for us, we could escape. That would be help enough. Can you do that?
Female_58.nm34aathal03027_.mp3: I'll believe that when I see it... but if you could, we would be... grateful.
Female_58.nm34aathal03029_.mp3: I figured as much. Get out of here, then. Go on! We have enough to worry about with the shyrack!
Female_58.nm34aathal03031_.mp3: [Failure] No! I know what Sith like you want from us! You're not bringing our heads to Master Uthar so he can pat you on the back!
Female_58.nm34aathal03032_.mp3: They're here to kill us! Get them!! Get them!!
Female_58.nm34aathal03037_.mp3: So you have heard about us. Yes, we ran away before Master Uthar could execute us. Is that so hard to believe?
Female_58.nm34aathal03040_.mp3: Open fire! Get them! Get them!!
Female_58.nm34aathal03042_.mp3: Then get out of here! Now! Or we'll open fire!!
Female_58.nm34aathal03043_.mp3: You came back again? Why?! I told you we're not going back to the academy, so go away!!
Female_58.nm35aabela25001_.mp3: What are you doing here?! Did the Jedi Council send you? I swear I will expose you if they have!
Female_58.nm35aabela25003_.mp3: So you do not even have the decency to remember me? I have cursed your name every moment since we last met on Dantooine.
Female_58.nm35aabela25005_.mp3: [Success] I see. So you have come to join the Sith as I have? I should have known that would happen, as should the Council.
Female_58.nm35aabela25006_.mp3: The Council is nothing but a slow and doddering farce, placing all their trust in you... and you failed them, just as you failed Juhani.
Female_58.nm35aabela25007_.mp3: Do you even remember me? I am Belaya, and it is your murder of Juhani that brought me here. Fortunately, I have learned the power of revenge!
Female_58.nm35aabela25008_.mp3: [Failure] You do not fool me for a second! The Council fawns over you and places all their hope in you to save them... you wouldn't turn on them!
Female_58.nm35aabela25009_.mp3: You are a spy... and a murderer. It was you who killed Juhani and placed this bitter blackness in my heart that I cannot get rid of!
Female_58.nm35aabela25011_.mp3: But you will! You pretend to be a Sith, but I know who you are! I have cursed your name every moment since we last met on Dantooine!
Female_58.nm35aabela25012_.mp3: I am Belaya, once of the Jedi but now of the Sith... it was your murder of Juhani that placed this bitter blackness in my heart!
Female_58.nm35aabela25013_.mp3: I couldn't touch you on Dantooine, but I can, here! The Sith have taught me the power of freedom... and revenge! FOR JUHANI!!

Female_59.nm35aasith14000_.mp3: It's really strange. Nobody seems to know where Master Uthar or Yuthura Ban have disappeared to. Some of the sensitives are claiming they're dead.
Female_59.nm35aasith14002_.mp3: Rumor has it that something has happened to Master Uthar and Yuthura Ban. Do you know anything?
Female_59.nm35aasith14004_.mp3: I heard that Yuthura Ban was dead. I suppose that means Master Uthar will be taking a new apprentice, soon.
Female_59.nm35aasith14006_.mp3: Did you hear? Yuthura is dead. Master Uthar said so. I bet she got too impatient and failed to assassinate him. Idiot.
Female_59.nm35aasith14008_.mp3: Master Yuthura has taken over the academy. Everyone's talking about it! I guess she finally got rid of Uthar, somehow.
Female_59.nm35aasith14010_.mp3: Have you heard? Yuthura... I mean Master Yuthura has taken over the academy! Well done, I say!
Female_59.nm35aasith14012_.mp3: You aren't even a full Sith. Don't bother me.
Female_59.nm35aasith14014_.mp3: Get out of my way. I don't have time to deal with hopefuls.
Female_59.nm35aasith14016_.mp3: Come back when you've taken your final test. If you survive it.
Female_59.nm35aasith14018_.mp3: If Master Uthar gives you an order, you'd better follow it. There were some students who disobeyed him and now they're hiding out on the surface somewhere.
Female_59.nm35aasith14020_.mp3: There are some students in hiding that refused to follow an order. Master Uthar wants them found and dead... and is offering a reward for it, too!
Female_59.nm35aasith14022_.mp3: Just be careful if you go into the valley. I hear there's a hermit living in the hills that kidnaps students.
Female_59.nm35aasith14024_.mp3: The former master of the academy, Jorak Uln, is supposedly hiding out in the hills on the surface as some kind of mad hermit.
Female_59.nm35aasith14026_.mp3: Word is that one of our experimental droids went mad and escaped and is hiding in the ruins. I wonder why we don't just gather it up and destroy it?
Female_59.nm35aasith14028_.mp3: One of my friends went to find that crazy droid that's hiding in the ruins in the valley. He hasn't come back, yet.
Female_59.nm35aasith14030_.mp3: Ha! It's great to be on the winning side, isn't it? We've been crushing the Republic at every battle so far!
Female_59.nm35aasith14032_.mp3: The latest reports say the Republic is on the run. Before long the Sith will be ruling the entire galaxy.
Female_59.nm35aasith14034_.mp3: Darth Malak is one of the greatest Sith leaders ever. I hope he comes back to the academy before I leave.
Female_59.nm35aasith14036_.mp3: It is my most fervent hope to serve under Darth Malak once my training is complete. Don't you feel the same?
Female_59.nm35aasith14038_.mp3: Rumor around the academy is that you had something to do with those rebel students being caught, finally. They got what they deserved, I say.
Female_59.nm35aasith14040_.mp3: I was told that you actually met the old master of the academy, Jorak. Is the hermit as mad as they say?
Female_59.nm35aasith14042_.mp3: The buzz is that you took care of that crazy droid out in the ruins. That's pretty impressive.
Female_59.nm35aasith14044_.mp3: Hmm. So you got enough prestige to win out, I hear. We'll just see if you make it through your final test.
Female_59.nm35aasith14046_.mp3: Sorry, I don't have time to speak. My training awaits.

Female_60.nm35aasith17000_.mp3: Bah. I hate it when things start to change so rapidly. We lose more teachers that way...
Female_60.nm35aasith17002_.mp3: Heh heh... someone told me that you had an encounter with the 'hermit', himself. How is Jorak these days, eh? Still puritan and longing for the old days? Heh heh heh.
Female_60.nm35aasith17004_.mp3: Go on! You've gained your prestige, now, haven't you? Go take your final test already and get out of my hair!
Female_60.nm35aasith17006_.mp3: Hmph. Another hopeful wandering about the academy? *sigh* I suppose you want to know how to get prestige?
Female_60.nm35aasith17008_.mp3: I am one of the academy trainers, of course. You'd do well to watch your tone with me, hopeful... I'll be one of your instructors when and if you reach your final test.
Female_60.nm35aasith17010_.mp3: Oh, yes. You gather prestige to earn the opportunity to take the final test... you don't automatically become a student. Heh heh... you'll see.
Female_60.nm35aasith17013_.mp3: May the Force serve you well.
Female_60.nm35aasith17016_.mp3: Hmph. As if I didn't have better things to do. Has anyone told you about Jorak Uln?
Female_60.nm35aasith17018_.mp3: Heh. Well... the first thing you should know is that that is not a name you should mention around Master Uthar if you can avoid it.
Female_60.nm35aasith17020_.mp3: Jorak Uln was once Uthar's master, you see, and the head of this academy. He went a little insane, however, and Uthar forced him to flee to the surface and hide.
Female_60.nm35aasith17022_.mp3: It seems that Jorak has been spending his time kidnapping students who wander into the Valley of the Dark Lords. No idea why. I've also no idea why Uthar doesn't do something about it.
Female_60.nm35aasith17024_.mp3: If you want prestige, however, you'll find that hermit, as everyone calls him... you'll find Jorak and either kill him or bring back anything he's been writing. Uthar would like that.
Female_60.nm35aasith17027_.mp3: Pfah. He is much more than a simple hermit 'hiding in the hills', as you say. We are talking about the former master of the academy.
Female_60.nm35aasith17029_.mp3: If you've already been told about him, there's little more I can tell you. With luck, perhaps he'll kidnap you and you will get a chance to see him for yourself, eh?
Female_60.nm35aasith17031_.mp3: Now begone. I have better things to do than chat with lost hopefuls.
Female_60.nm35aasith17034_.mp3: Hah! I doubt that. Have it your way, however, off you go.

Female_61.nm10aawait07000_.mp3: Please don't hurt me - I just serve the food here, that's all! I'm not like these others - I'm not even a Black Vulkar. Please don't kill me!
Female_61.nm10aawait07002_.mp3: My name is Ada. My father owed Davik some money, but he couldn't pay. Davik killed my father and sold me into slavery here at the Vulkar compound to pay off the debt.
Female_61.nm10aawait07004_.mp3: Now that you've killed the guards who were supposed to watch me I think I could find my way out of here.
Female_61.nm10aawait07006_.mp3: I... I'm free to go? You're not going to kill me? I... I don't know how I can ever repay you. Thank you! Thank you! I... I have to get out of here before any of the Vulkars see me.
Female_61.nm10aawait07011_.mp3: But I don't know anything! I'm just a prisoner here - a slave! The Vulkars don't tell me anything, they treat me like dirt, they beat me if I screw up their orders.
Female_61.nm10aawait07015_.mp3: Well... alright. I still don't know how much help I can be. But I sure hope you get rid of all the Vulkars. I hate them!
Female_61.nm10aawait07017_.mp3: They don't even have the decency to give me warm clothes! I... I was able to bear it before. But ever since they turned the heat off in the compound I'm always so very cold.
Female_61.nm10aawait07019_.mp3: I overheard some of the Vulkars talking about the heating vents interfering with the thermal security cameras. That's all I know.
Female_61.nm10aawait07021_.mp3: What? I... I've never heard of such a thing. I guess it might be in the garage on the lower level - that's where all the Vulkars go to work on their swoop bikes.
Female_61.nm10aawait07023_.mp3: But I've never been down there. The elevator is protected by a security system - only the Vulkars are allowed to go down there.
Female_61.nm10aawait07025_.mp3: Is she that Republic soldier? I heard one of those Vulkar mention her, but she's not here. He said Brejik didn't trust his men around her.
Female_61.nm10aawait07027_.mp3: I guess she's too important to be a slave here in the kitchens, getting pawed and groped and kicked and spit on like me. Brejik must have taken her somewhere safe.
Female_61.nm10aawait07031_.mp3: No - I won't go out like this! Not after all I've been through! I won't just let you kill me without a fight!

Female_62.nm26ab07of07000_.mp3: Move along, off-worlder. I've had enough of you.
Female_62.nm26ab07of07001_.mp3: What do we have here? A lost off-worlder, perhaps? You're probably here for the swoop races. Track is through the west corridor. Get moving.
Female_62.nm26ab07of07002_.mp3: Wait, I recognize you. I watched you take top prize at the swoop tournament. Nice work, Sector Champion, but you haven't won me over.
Female_62.nm26ab07of07003_.mp3: I believe Queedle Molta has taken top spot. I prefer the professional racers. His win was just a fluke. An aberration.
Female_62.nm26ab07of07004_.mp3: I hate the rabble the races attract. They're always trouble.
Female_62.nm26ab07of07006_.mp3: I'm no guide. The Sith don't suffer questions for long.
Female_62.nm26ab07of07008_.mp3: Are you hoping that I will look more favorably on you because you have taken the Sector Champion title? You are mistaken.
Female_62.nm26ab07of07009_.mp3: I am fond of the sport, true, but it's more about hating racers I don't think should win than actually paying tribute to those I favor.
Female_62.nm26ab07of07011_.mp3: Hukta Jax shows the proper spirit of competition, and it has brought him to the top before.
Female_62.nm26ab07of07013_.mp3: Brute force to the finish, he's very efficient.
Female_62.nm26ab07of07015_.mp3: Hurry it up. This is a poor use of my time. You should know not to annoy one of my kind.
Female_62.nm26ab07of07016_.mp3: What do I think? I think it's a shame when an unworthy newcomer unseats his betters. I am not easily won as a supporter.
Female_62.nm26ab07of07018_.mp3: Then seek out a helpful fish for answers. I have no interest in the affairs of the Selkath and you have no reason to inquire about mine.
Female_62.nm26ab07of07020_.mp3: Of course you do. Good riddance.
Female_62.nm26ab07of07022_.mp3: What did you say? You don't want trouble from me, friend. You might as well take a blaster to your own head.
Female_62.nm26ab07of07024_.mp3: So, you have some courage. Dumb as a B'omarr castoff, but you've got courage. What do you hope to accomplish with this threat?
Female_62.nm26ab07of07025_.mp3: Even if you expected to live through my attack, the Selkath would lock you up for fighting in their streets.
Female_62.nm26ab07of07027_.mp3: Ah, so you wish to goad *me* into action so the Selkath turn their unyielding laws my way? Amusing. Perhaps you aren't so foolish.
Female_62.nm26ab07of07028_.mp3: You've made your jest on the one world where you would not be immediately struck down. I suggest you walk away while your assumption holds true.
Female_62.nm26ab07of07030_.mp3: I thought you might. Walk away. Now.
Female_62.nm26ab07of07032_.mp3: I'm sure you didn't. Walk away. Now.
Female_62.nm26ab07of07033_.mp3: What do you want now? You press your luck, pestering a Sith soldier. It doesn't seem wise on your part.
Female_62.nm26ab07of07034_.mp3: Don't count on the small measure of celebrity you have attained at the swoop races. All are equally inferior before the Sith.
Female_62.nm26ab07of07035_.mp3: As I have said in the past, the swoop races attract the lowest of rabble. As you are one of them, I suggest you leave me alone.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01000_.mp3: I don't care who you are or what you do on this track; I'm not saying anything else to you.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01001_.mp3: What do you want? I don't waste time with fans, so if this is about an autoprint, forget it. You can buy one when I get more made up.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01002_.mp3: Wait, no, you're the new Sector Champion, aren't you? You're really cutting into my profits. What do you want?
Female_62.nm26abcasa01003_.mp3: Wait a minute... you're no fan. You're the racer that killed my time. Why should I talk to you?
Female_62.nm26abcasa01004_.mp3: I'm still upset about losing my ranking to that amateur Queedle. I don't know how he got so fast all of a sudden.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01005_.mp3: Wait, you're that new racer. I don't give out racing secrets, if that's what you're asking for.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01006_.mp3: Leave me alone. I need time to prepare for my races.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01010_.mp3: Of course you do. Everyone wants time with the fabulous Casandra Mateil. There just isn't enough of me to go around.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01012_.mp3: You should know better than any of us. You're the Sector Champion, after all. You tell me if the track is good. Feh!
Female_62.nm26abcasa01013_.mp3: It was, but I can't seem to get a break lately. Hukta has been holding me off, and all he does is run over everything.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01014_.mp3: And Queedle, what's he doing winning? He's just a local amateur. I'm glad only a small crowd saw him blow past me.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01015_.mp3: And of course you had to go and take the whole competition. Nothing like getting beaten by a rookie.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01016_.mp3: But this place is all there is until the circuit recovers from the loss of Taris. It's going to take a while.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01018_.mp3: Not within reasonable traveling time. I heard there was a start-up on Tatooine, but I'll stick with the legitimate tracks, thank you very much.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01020_.mp3: Hutts aren't to be trusted. That's all I'll say.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01022_.mp3: Two years, but that's more than enough time to know the secrets behind the sport. It's all about the image you portray.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01024_.mp3: Hukta is the thug; people like him because he's mean. I'm the pretty one; the one that people want to take home.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01025_.mp3: Even if we don't win, we're easy to remember. That keeps the fans coming back, so race organizers want us at their tracks.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01026_.mp3: Local racers don't bring in off-world crowds. They need us. At least, they would if there was still a functioning circuit.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01028_.mp3: I don't need to tell you anything. You've beat us all. You're just looking for an excuse to gloat.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01029_.mp3: Hukta Jax is the only other professional here besides me. He got where he is by making sure everyone knows he's the toughest racer out there.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01030_.mp3: The only other name I know is Queedle. You heard about him taking it all, right? I don't know where he got the speed from.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01031_.mp3: I don't know any of the other racers. I guess there's Queedle, the local favorite. He won't amount to much.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01033_.mp3: You need money to compete. Maybe he's got some skills, but he just doesn't have the best bike. It's that simple.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01036_.mp3: Again? Oh all right, but only if you make it quick.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01038_.mp3: I know that if you do absolutely anything wrong you get locked up. Seems like fining criminals is a great way to bring in the credits.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01039_.mp3: I'm surprised they even let us race. Wouldn't want the crowds to get too excited. Excitement make people unpredictable. Or something.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01043_.mp3: Don't get snippy with me. I have legions of adoring fans that would rather have my time. Legions!
Female_62.nm26abcasa01045_.mp3: What? Are you threatening me? On Manaan? You know how foolish that is, right?
Female_62.nm26abcasa01047_.mp3: You're not getting anything out of me on this planet. The Selkath have cameras everywhere. You'd just be locked up for trying.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01048_.mp3: Go away. Manaan isn't very friendly to bullies.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01050_.mp3: Not here you won't. There are cameras everywhere, looking for just your type. Criminals like you are shipped off instantly.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01052_.mp3: That's better. Hurry up and tell me what you want.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01053_.mp3: What do you want now? I really don't have time for you.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01054_.mp3: Well, hello Sector Champion. You must be proud right now. You'll excuse me if I don't join in with cheers of my own.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01055_.mp3: Don't expect a warm "Hello" from me, I don't have much warmth for the racer that outranked me in my round.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01056_.mp3: So, you're trying to break out of the low rounds, hmm? Don't let your one win go to your head. Hukta and I are professionals.
Female_62.nm26abcasa01057_.mp3: You're really annoying, you know that? I hate it when people come out of nowhere and start collecting wins.

Female_65.nm26aasith25000_.mp3: We might have a position within the Sith organization for one such as you.
Female_65.nm26aasith25004_.mp3: This is war. In war certain distasteful acts cannot be avoided. But ask yourself this - when we win the war, would you rather be against the Sith, or with us?
Female_65.nm26aasith25008_.mp3: Excellent. Report to the Sith Embassy tomorrow for your assignment.
Female_65.nm26aasith25010_.mp3: I have no desire to speak to you. I know you have links to the Republic.

Female_Child_01.nm04aaoutc12000_.mp3: You from the up-world? My mommy said sometimes water falls from the sky up there, but I think she's joking.
Female_Child_01.nm04aaoutc12002_.mp3: My daddy used to live in the up-world you know. He says I was born there, but I don't remember nothing.
Female_Child_01.nm04aaoutc12004_.mp3: Them sick people ain't sick no more. You gave them medicine and now they can live with us again.
Female_Child_01.nm04aaoutc12006_.mp3: Some of the villagers ain't allowed to live with us no more. They got sick, so they have to go live in the pens.

Female_Exaited_01.nm02aeduel10000_.mp3: Hey - you're one of the duelists! The one they call the Mysterious Stranger - sure, I know you.
Female_Exaited_01.nm02aeduel10002_.mp3: You beat Bendak Starkiller! I can't believe it... you actually beat him!
Female_Exaited_01.nm02aeduel10004_.mp3: I hear you're going to fight Bendak Starkiller! This is great - I'm finally going to get to see a real death match!
Female_Exaited_01.nm02aeduel10006_.mp3: I guess Twitch is next up for you, eh? Good luck - you'll need it!
Female_Exaited_01.nm02aeduel10008_.mp3: I saw Bendak Starkiller sitting in the Pazaak room. I wish he'd come out of retirement.
Female_Exaited_01.nm02aeduel10010_.mp3: I couldn't believe Duncan's last match. How could he lose to a raw rookie - no disrespect, of course. Duncan's so pathetic!
Female_Exaited_01.nm02aeduel10012_.mp3: Hey, Stranger... I like watching you in the ring. It's enough to make a girl get all flushed.
Female_Exaited_01.nm02aeduel10014_.mp3: I like your style, Stranger. You're the best thing the duel ring's seen since Bendak Starkiller retired!
Female_Exaited_01.nm02aeduel10016_.mp3: Can I have your autoprint, Stranger? I'm your biggest fan!
Female_Exaited_01.nm02aeduel10018_.mp3: Why doesn't Duncan just give the sport up? He's terrible.
Female_Exaited_01.nm02aeduel10020_.mp3: I love watching Ice fight! She proves this isn't just a man's game!
Female_Exaited_01.nm02aeduel10022_.mp3: Twitch is my favorite - he's wild!
Female_Exaited_01.nm02aeduel10024_.mp3: I never saw a death match before. I thought it would be exciting, but it was actually kind of gross...
Female_Exaited_01.nm02aeduel10026_.mp3: I hope the authorities don't hear about this death match - they'll shut it down if they find out!
Female_Exaited_01.nm02aeduel10028_.mp3: None of these fighters would stand a chance against Bendak Starkiller!
Female_Exaited_01.nm02aeduel10030_.mp3: Look - it's the Mysterious Stranger! You're just great! I watch all of your matches!
Female_Exaited_01.nm02aeduel10032_.mp3: You're not so hot, Stranger. Everybody beats Duncan
Female_Exaited_01.nm02aeduel10034_.mp3: Marl's been around forever. I wonder if he ever thinks about retiring?
Female_Exaited_01.nm02aeduel99000_.mp3: I can't believe we couldn't get arena tickets for this match! Now we'll have to watch the duel on the view screen.
Female_Exaited_01.nm02aeduel99002_.mp3: Shh! They're about to start, so quit complaining and just watch the view screen!

Female_Injured_01.nm18ab12am08000_.mp3: Help! Please! Over here! Under the wreckage!
Female_Injured_01.nm18ab12am08001_.mp3: Anyone! I'm trapped under here! Please help me!
Female_Injured_01.nm18ab12am08002_.mp3: Don't let me die under here! Please!
Female_Injured_01.nm18ab12gu09000_.mp3: Please help! I can't get out! (click) 3... 2... 1.

Female_Iritating_01.nm14aasett09000_.mp3: I heard the rogue Jedi girl was killed. Good riddance! We don't need any Dark Jedi here on Dantooine!
Female_Iritating_01.nm14aasett09002_.mp3: One of the Jedi managed to turn that Dark Jedi girl back to the light side. That's a relief!
Female_Iritating_01.nm14aasett09004_.mp3: Did you hear about the young Jedi girl from a couple days ago? I heard she hurt her master pretty bad...
Female_Iritating_01.nm14aasett09006_.mp3: I heard another Republic fleet was wiped out in this sector! I hope they don't find the Jedi here!
Female_Iritating_01.nm14aasett09008_.mp3: Master Quatra was hurt very badly. She might die. I heard it was her own apprentice that did it.
Female_Iritating_01.nm14aasett09010_.mp3: Did you hear? The Sandrals and Matales massacred each other! It's horrible!
Female_Iritating_01.nm14aasett09012_.mp3: Ahlan Matale locked himself up in his estate with his son. I wonder what the boy did.
Female_Iritating_01.nm14aasett09014_.mp3: The children of Nurik Sandral and Ahlan Matale apparently fled here to the Enclave. Their families are both very mad.
Female_Iritating_01.nm14aasett09016_.mp3: Did you hear? Shen Matale and Rahasia Sandral are getting married! I would never have thought their fathers would allow it!
Female_Iritating_01.nm14aasett09018_.mp3: Ahlan Matale likes to lord his wealth over the rest of us. What I wouldn't give for him to eat his own words... His son seems like a nice boy though.
Female_Iritating_01.nm14aasett09020_.mp3: I heard there was fighting coreward towards Coruscant. I wonder if the Republic will survive...
Female_Iritating_01.nm14aasett09022_.mp3: Rahasia Sandral is a nice young woman. But her father has been keeping her at their estate since her brother went missing...
Female_Iritating_01.nm14aasett09024_.mp3: You know those stones to the east of here? I heard they did some digging and found they aren't natural.
Female_Iritating_01.nm14aasett09026_.mp3: The Council's been telling us not to go near the stones to the east. Just as well, the kath hounds near there seem a lot more vicious...
Female_Iritating_01.nm14aasett09028_.mp3: I heard the Jedi finally got off their behinds and did something about the Mandalorians! Took them long enough!
Female_Iritating_01.nm14aasett09030_.mp3: Those damn Mandalorians have been raiding farms all over this continent. The Jedi won't do anything, so where does that leave us?
Female_Iritating_01.nm14aasett09032_.mp3: I hear the Sith have been beating the Republic pretty bad. They must've spent the whole time building ships since we beat them last time.
Female_Iritating_01.nm14aasett09034_.mp3: I don't understand why the Jedi Council are hiding here. Shouldn't they be helping the Republic?
Female_Iritating_01.nm14aasett10000_.mp3: I hope the Jedi Council will listen to Gar. If they don't, I don't know what we'll do...
Female_Iritating_01.nm14aasett10002_.mp3: Hello. I'm afraid I'm not very good at explaining things. If you have any questions, please ask my husband.

Female_Iritating_02.nm02aemusi25000_.mp3: Did you hear what happened after the big swoop race? They say Brejik wouldn't pay up when he lost, and a brawl broke out! I can't believe I missed it!
Female_Iritating_02.nm02aemusi25002_.mp3: Hmph - who dresses you? You look like you crawled up here from the Lower City. Oh well, I guess we can't all have style.
Female_Iritating_02.nm02aemusi25004_.mp3: Isn't this band great? They can't leave Taris because of the Sith quarantine, so they've been playing here every night! Talk about a good break for us!
Female_Iritating_02.nm02aemusi25006_.mp3: Hmph! I don't know what the guys in here find so attractive about those Twi'leks. Look at them - they're dressed like dirty little space wenches!
Female_Iritating_02.nm02aemusi25008_.mp3: Did you hear? Bendak got dusted in that death match - by a woman, no less! Isn't that great? That should show these men a thing or two about who's the boss!
Female_Iritating_02.nm02aemusi25010_.mp3: Did you hear the news? Bendak got dusted in that death match! I'll never get a chance to see something like that again. I can't believe I didn't get a ticket!
Female_Iritating_02.nm02aemusi25012_.mp3: Have you heard? Someone's going to fight Bendak Starkiller in an illegal death match! I should go talk to that Hutt and try to get some tickets...
Female_Iritating_02.nm02aemusi25014_.mp3: Everyone's worried the Sith will come in here and shut this place down. Can you imagine how dull it would be if we didn't have any music on Taris?

Female_Iritating_03.nm02acgana02000_.mp3: Don't bother me... I don't speak to the help.
Female_Iritating_03.nm02acgana02002_.mp3: You need a lesson on how to treat your social betters. Maybe you'll think twice before mocking me next time!
Female_Iritating_03.nm02acgana02006_.mp3: Where did you get those clothes - a trash compactor in the Lower City? And where are those drinks we ordered?
Female_Iritating_03.nm02acgana02010_.mp3: Why is the help here so incompetent? One word from Daddy and I could get you fired!
Female_Iritating_03.nm02acgana02012_.mp3: [Success] That's better! Now hurry up with our order!
Female_Iritating_03.nm02acgana02016_.mp3: [Failure] It's too late for apologies! Daddy's going to hear about this! You'll lose your job for sure!
Female_Iritating_03.nm02acgana02020_.mp3: How dare you speak to me like that! Daddy's going to hear about this!
Female_Iritating_03.nm02aegana14000_.mp3: Don't bother me... I don't speak to the help
Female_Iritating_03.nm02aegana14002_.mp3: You need a lesson on how to treat your social betters. Maybe you'll think twice before mocking me next time!
Female_Iritating_03.nm02aegana14006_.mp3: Where did you get those clothes - a trash compactor in the Lower City? And where are those drinks we ordered?
Female_Iritating_03.nm02aegana14010_.mp3: Why is the help here so incompetent? One word from Daddy and I could get you fired!
Female_Iritating_03.nm02aegana14012_.mp3: [Success] That's better! Now hurry up with our order!
Female_Iritating_03.nm02aegana14016_.mp3: [Failure] It's too late for apologies! Daddy's going to hear about this! You'll lose your job for sure!
Female_Iritating_03.nm02aegana14020_.mp3: How dare you speak to me like that! Daddy's going to hear about this!

Female_old_01.nm02aadia004000_.mp3: Another Sith patrol? I'm telling you, you're wasting your time here.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004002_.mp3: Go ahead and search my apartment again, if you want. You'll find the same thing as last time... nothing.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004004_.mp3: Who are you? What are you doing in here? You can't just come barging into someone's home!
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004006_.mp3: He... he called the bounty off? That's wonderful! I only wish I had something to give you as a reward.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004008_.mp3: Wait a minute... I know! I don't have many credits, but there is something I can give you. It's a family heirloom. It's not much, but it's something.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004012_.mp3: If I had more I'd gladly give it to you, but this is all I've got. I'm sorry.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004015_.mp3: Wait! Think about what you're doing. If that pig had just kept his hands to himself, I wouldn't have had to give him that scar with my vibroblade.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004017_.mp3: He gets drunk and tries to force himself on me, and I get a bounty put on my head for defending myself? Where's the justice in that? Holdan's the one to blame, not me.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004021_.mp3: That's no excuse. You can't just go around barging into people's apartments because you're curious! But at least you're more polite than that pig, Holdan.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004023_.mp3: Just one of Davik's men who can't keep his hands to himself. But all he got for his trouble was a nasty scar from my vibroblade! Too bad I'm the one still paying the price.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004025_.mp3: I... I don't want to talk about it. I'm in enough trouble already. Besides, I don't know if I can trust you.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004027_.mp3: [Success] Well, I suppose you seem like an alright sort. When I cut Holdan it made him back off, but it also embarrassed him in front of his friends.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004029_.mp3: Holdan's a spiteful little Hutt-slug. He went and put out a bounty on my head for what I did! That's why I'm hiding out here.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004031_.mp3: I doubt it. Holdan is one of Davik's men. When you work for the local crime lord the authorities tend to turn a blind eye. I'm afraid this is between me and Holdan now.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004033_.mp3: You could try, I guess. He usually hangs out at the cantina in the Lower City. It probably won't do any good. Holdan's used to getting his own way.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004035_.mp3: That's one of the fringe benefits of being a goon for Davik. Working for the local crime lord lets you get away with things. Still, I appreciate the offer.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004038_.mp3: Goodbye. Thank you again for all your help. I don't know what I would have done without you.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004040_.mp3: Goodbye, and good luck. I hope you can talk some sense into Holdan.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004042_.mp3: Good. I don't much like strangers in my home.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004044_.mp3: [Failure] No, I don't think so. I can't afford to trust anybody right now. Please, just leave me alone.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004046_.mp3: Okay, I'll tell you... just try and stay calm. The last thing I need is trouble with you and Holdan.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004049_.mp3: I can't help you there. Since this thing with Holdan I've been scared to leave my apartment. I don't know anything about what's going on in the outside world anymore.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004051_.mp3: You're as bad as that pig Holdan! I'll stay out of your way, but you're wasting your time. I don't have anything worth stealing.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004053_.mp3: I can never truly repay you for helping me, but you'll always have my thanks for what you did.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004055_.mp3: You're back. Did you... did you manage to get Holdan to withdraw the price on my head?
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004057_.mp3: I have nothing... I barely make enough credits to get by. I can't afford to pay that pig off!
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004060_.mp3: Then you're going to learn the same lesson I taught Holdan: I'm not as helpless as I look!
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004063_.mp3: I guess I have no choice but to stay here and hope Holdan cools down. With that bounty on my head it's too dangerous to go outside.
Female_old_01.nm02aadia004065_.mp3: You again? Why do you keep bothering me?
Female_old_01.nm02aawoma08000_.mp3: I'm... I'm sorry. I don't want to get in the way of official Sith business.
Female_old_01.nm02aawoma08002_.mp3: I remember when a person didn't have to worry about thieves rummaging through their home!
Female_old_01.nm02aawoma08004_.mp3: Taris used to be a nice place, before the Sith showed up and started bossing us around!
Female_old_01.nm02aawoma08006_.mp3: Stay out of the Lower City. That place is overrun with gangs!
Female_old_01.nm02aawoma08008_.mp3: I wonder if any of those Republic space pods survived crash landing in the Undercity?
Female_old_01.nm02aawoma09000_.mp3: I'm not doing anything wrong! I'm just standing here... you Sith can't arrest me for that!
Female_old_01.nm02aawoma09002_.mp3: I can't believe the Sith put a quarantine on the planet! It's bad enough we can't leave, but all you off-worlders are stuck here, too!
Female_old_01.nm02aawoma09004_.mp3: I heard there's a swoop gang war in the Lower City! They say you can get shot just walking in the streets down there!
Female_old_01.nm02aawoma09006_.mp3: Ever since the Sith quarantine Javyar's cantina is packed with off-worlders! It never used to be that busy.
Female_old_01.nm02aawoma09008_.mp3: I heard the Sith are sending salvage teams into the Undercity. I heard they're looking for Republic survivors to take prisoner.
Female_old_01.nm02abgort08000_.mp3: I don't know why you Sith allow this guy to preach his violent anti-alien garbage!
Female_old_01.nm02abgort08002_.mp3: Crazy street preacher! Why don't the Sith shut this guy up?
Female_old_01.nm02abgort08004_.mp3: Gorton's always going on about the 'great plague' spreading over Taris. It gets a little tiring.
Female_old_01.nm02abgort08006_.mp3: Huh - if he thinks it's bad up here, he should spend some time in the Lower City!
Female_old_01.nm03aeciti11000_.mp3: Hey - I saw you in the big swoop race! I'm glad someone finally gave Brejik what he deserves - the guy was nothing but a thug!
Female_old_01.nm03aeciti11002_.mp3: I wonder if there'll be any female riders on the swoop circuit this season. I thought about taking it up myself, but I blew my knee out in a training run. Those things are dangerous!
Female_old_01.nm03aeciti11004_.mp3: This Cantina used to be packed every night, but since the Vulkars started shooting people in the streets the crowds have been pretty thin.
Female_old_01.nm03aeciti11006_.mp3: I wish the Sith would lift this quarantine; I was supposed to visit my sister in the core worlds! I hear Davik has a ship that can get off the planet.
Female_old_01.nm03aeciti11008_.mp3: Everyone says Zax is on Davik's payroll. Maybe I should talk to him and see what it would cost to hire out that ship.
Female_old_01.nm03aeciti11010_.mp3: Those bounty hunters make me nervous when they come in here. I always feel like they're trying to guess what my head would be worth if they brought it in.
Female_old_01.nm11abgado11000_.mp3: Who are you? You can't come in here! Sound the alarm, Gadon!
Female_old_01.nm11abgado11004_.mp3: You're too trusting, Gadon. These must be the assassins Brejik sent! How else did they get in here?
Female_old_01.nm11abgado11006_.mp3: [Failure] Liar! The guards would have announced you! Gadon - we've been betrayed again!
Female_old_01.nm33aaciti03000_.mp3: Err... you're a Sith, right? Excuse me...
Female_old_01.nm33aaciti03001_.mp3: This planet belongs to the Sith. They allow Czerka to run the starport and a few mines, but the Sith are the ones in control.
Female_old_01.nm33aaciti03002_.mp3: There are a lot of young folk who come here hoping to get admitted to the Sith academy here in Dreshdae. Few ever do.
Female_old_01.nm33aaciti03003_.mp3: You're not here to try and get into the Sith academy, are you? Most of the poor fools who try are killed by the Sith. It's horrible!
Female_old_01.nm33aaciti03005_.mp3: I hear you arrived on that old smuggling ship... the Hawk, or something like that?
Female_old_01.nm33aaciti03006_.mp3: Are you a smuggler? That's the only way we get some decent goods to buy in this sector.
Female_old_01.nm33aaciti03007_.mp3: The Czerka cantina's the only place to go around here for any real fun.
Female_old_01.nm33aaciti03008_.mp3: Have you heard what happened to Taris? I can't believe the Sith are powerful enough to do that.
Female_old_01.nm33aaciti03009_.mp3: Whatever you do, don't try and land a ship outside of the colony. The Sith will destroy you without a second thought.
Female_old_01.nm33aaciti03010_.mp3: I hear them Sith are doing some kind of digging up on the planet's surface. How weird is that?
Female_old_01.nm33aaciti03011_.mp3: I can't wait to get back to the Core systems. This planet is dangerous with all those Sith wandering around.

Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22000_.mp3: Hello. It is... good to see you again.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22002_.mp3: I did. You told me I should rethink my path, and I did. You were right.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22004_.mp3: You are the one who suggested I rethink my path. And I have... and you were right.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22005_.mp3: It's been very hard to let go of all those thoughts... about power and strength and victory. I don't know if I'll ever be completely free of them.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22006_.mp3: The real irony is that, despite what the Sith Code says, I've never felt more free. I think I might... be able to find a little peace here. Finally.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22008_.mp3: For now. They've been very welcoming... more than I expected. I met my old master. He... he cried when he saw me.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22009_.mp3: I was embarrassed to see his weakness. Old habits die hard. But... it felt good, too. It felt good to know he missed me, that he worried about me.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22010_.mp3: The Council said they would give me time to decide if I wanted to try again, if I was ready. I don't know. There's... there's so much that I've done.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22012_.mp3: Yes. Part of me just wants to forget it, to put it behind me... but that isn't right, either. I have to accept it and move on.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22014_.mp3: I suppose I have. It's still tempting, all that power... but I've had my fill of it and it wasn't enough.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22016_.mp3: I suppose I owe it to you, and to myself, to give the Jedi another chance. I'm not the foolish young girl I once was.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22018_.mp3: It's not that easy for me. There's an... an ache inside me I just can't seem to quench.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22019_.mp3: My old master said he would start exercises with me again... slowly, when I was ready. He said my experience with the dark side could make me a very wise Jedi.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22020_.mp3: There is no emotion; there is peace. There is no ignorance; there is knowledge. There is no passion; there is serenity. There is no chaos; there is harmony. There is no death; there is the Force.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22021_.mp3: Those words never held such resonance for me until I returned. I'd... like some serenity, some harmony. Wouldn't you?
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22023_.mp3: Yes, I suppose your fate still has much in store for you, just as I saw back on Korriban.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22025_.mp3: Then may the Force be with you, my friend. I hope we will see each other again.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22027_.mp3: That's too bad. A little serenity might be useful considering the fate you have in store for you.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22029_.mp3: I don't know. I doubt it. Even if I wanted to, the Sith would never take me back. To them, I am a traitor.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22030_.mp3: But the dark side... that's a different matter. The dark side is not the Sith. I still feel its temptation strongly.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22031_.mp3: My emotions are so strong. Just the other day I nearly attacked a poor Padawan for tripping into me, nearly berated his clumsiness and weakness.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22032_.mp3: I didn't, thankfully, but it's difficult to fight off those feelings. How do you do it?
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22034_.mp3: And to think I took my advice to come here from you. Ha ha! Perhaps you should follow your own counsel sometime.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22036_.mp3: That's the worst thing to hear... how hard it is. I suppose that's the honest answer. The dark side is the easier path for a reason.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22039_.mp3: You jest, but I think I know how you really feel.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22040_.mp3: The one thing that made me come here was how hard I had to think to remember where I began and where Yuthura the Sith Master ended.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22041_.mp3: That wasn't the person I wanted to be, so how did I end up there? It... it will take some time for me to sort through that, I think.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22043_.mp3: You know, I'd forgotten all about that until I spoke to you about it on Korriban. Strange, considering my hate for them is what made me leave the Jedi.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22044_.mp3: I think... I think I've got to help myself, first, before I can help anyone else.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22045_.mp3: Maybe once that happens, I can work with the Jedi to make a difference. They may work slowly, but they do make a difference, don't they?
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22047_.mp3: More than the Sith did. The Sith bring more misery than the slavers ever did... I don't know why I didn't see that before.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22050_.mp3: You believe that? I believe that they're better than the Sith. The Sith bring more misery than the slavers ever did. I don't know why I didn't see that before.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22051_.mp3: I may not be able to change everything at once like I wanted to... but it would feel good to really help someone, for a change.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22052_.mp3: Maybe that's a reason to change. Maybe that's a reason to stay. I... I guess I'll see.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22055_.mp3: But I'm not ready to leave here, yet. And I don't belong on the path you have to take... I told you that on Korriban. It's still true.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22056_.mp3: But... perhaps you could come back, afterwards. I could certainly use a friend, then.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22058_.mp3: That's good. I look forward to that time. Perhaps we can travel together, then.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22060_.mp3: I know. I can... see that about you. I'm not sure that we will meet again. Still... I can hope that is the case.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22062_.mp3: Oh. Well, that's too bad. I'm still grateful for what you've done for me, regardless.
Female_Old_04.nm13aayuth22063_.mp3: Good luck, my friend. May the Force be with you.

Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04000_.mp3: I was told that you're a friend of Jolee Bindo... and that Jolee has returned to the sector. Please, I must speak to him. It's very urgent!
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04002_.mp3: My name is Elora. My husband Sunry and Jolee are old friends. Now Sunry needs Jolee's help.
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04005_.mp3: Someone is out to destroy my husband. I... I don't know who I can trust. I don't know you. But Jolee - he was always a true friend to Sunry.
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04008_.mp3: Please, I beg you to bring Jolee to speak to me about my husband. Sunry's life depends on it!
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04009_.mp3: Jolee! It *is* you! I... need your help.
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04011_.mp3: I didn't. Nobody knew where you were, not even Sunry! But I heard the Selkath mention you and your friends. The Force has brought you to help us!
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04013_.mp3: It's horrible, Jolee! Sunry has been arrested! The Sith have accused him of murder!
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04015_.mp3: It's all a mistake, Jolee! Sunry isn't a murderer - someone is trying to frame him.
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04017_.mp3: I hear you have been appointed as Arbiter in Sunry's trial. My husband is innocent - please don't let him go to jail for a crime he didn't commit!
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04019_.mp3: Sunry is... he's a cripple. There's no way he could have overpowered this Sith woman like they claim.
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04023_.mp3: And there's no way he would do something so dishonorable as hit her from behind. Sunry's a decorated war hero! He's a hero of the Republic!
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04025_.mp3: [Success] Of... of course not! He... he... *sob*
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04026_.mp3: Yes... *sob* ...yes, he was having an affair. He was seeing that... that Sith woman.
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04027_.mp3: After all these years we've been together he just... just dropped me like that. Not publicly, oh no, but inside that's what it feels like.
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04028_.mp3: He started seeing Elassa last year. I... I had my suspicions for a while, but he was careless. Pretty soon everyone knew.
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04029_.mp3: But... but... even though I'm sure that harlot was only using him, I know he couldn't have killed her. He came and confessed to the affair to me. He said he was going there to break it off - to end it.
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04030_.mp3: Maybe the Sith woman attacked him and he had to defend himself?
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04031_.mp3: But even though he cheated on me, inside he's still the man I loved... love... He is too kind and gentle to have killed her in cold blood.
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04033_.mp3: That was a long time ago, in a war far, far away. He's changed now... settled down. Just please, prove his innocence.
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04035_.mp3: [Failure] What?? Don't insult us both! Sunry is... Sunry is a just and honorable man. How dare you accuse him... us, of such a thing!
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04038_.mp3: Find proof to set him free instead of bringing these baseless accusations against us.
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04041_.mp3: Lies! It... it must be! I knew the Sith would never let a Republic hero get away... You must find Sunry innocent!
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04043_.mp3: Find the real evidence, that's all I ask. The real evidence will prove Sunry didn't do this.
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04045_.mp3: This is all a plot to discredit the Republic! Sunry is a victim of a Sith frame up!
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04046_.mp3: It's possible. I haven't seen Sunry since I crashed on Kashyyyk... a man can change a lot in that time. The man I knew could never have done this crime, however.
Female_Old_05.nm26aaelor04047_.mp3: Sunry's being held at the Selkath courts. They won't let anyone in to see him. Please, go to the courts, talk to the Judges. Maybe the Selkath will listen to you.

Female_Old_06.nm03aahidb15000_.mp3: Sorry, but your kind aren't welcome in here. The Hidden Beks don't care much for you Sith.
Female_Old_06.nm03aahidb15002_.mp3: The swoop gangs rule down here, not you! You may have conquered Upper Taris, but you don't have enough troops to sweep the whole Lower City.
Female_Old_06.nm03aahidb15004_.mp3: You come down here in force and we'll pick you off in hit and run battles, then vanish like smoke into the back alleys and hidden tunnels where you'll never find us!
Female_Old_06.nm03aahidb15006_.mp3: Stick to the Upper City where people are actually scared of you; your threats don't count for much down here.
Female_Old_06.nm03aahidb15010_.mp3: Yeah, you do that. Go back to the Upper City where your shiny uniforms will make the citizens quake in their boots.
Female_Old_06.nm03aahidb15012_.mp3: Hey, you can't just walk in here! This is the Hidden Bek base. How do I know you're not a Vulkar spy sent to kill Gadon Thek?
Female_Old_06.nm03aahidb15014_.mp3: Maybe so, but this door is locked and it's going to stay that way until I'm satisfied you're no threat to Gadon or the Hidden Beks.
Female_Old_06.nm03aahidb15017_.mp3: A lot of people want to go inside and speak to Gadon. He's a hero of the common folk. But the days of the Hidden Bek's open door policy are gone.
Female_Old_06.nm03aahidb15019_.mp3: Between the Sith conquest and the Vulkar gang war Gadon has more enemies than he used to. We're being careful about who we let in now.
Female_Old_06.nm03aahidb15021_.mp3: [Failure] My loyalty's not for sale! I've been with the Hidden Beks for years, and I'm not going to desert Gadon now just because everyone is turning against him!
Female_Old_06.nm03aahidb15023_.mp3: Well, we do need all the help we can get. And you don't look like you're with the Vulkars or the Sith.
Female_Old_06.nm03aahidb15025_.mp3: Besides, it's not like you can do anything to harm Gadon in the heart of his own base. Not with Zaerdra watching his back.
Female_Old_06.nm03aahidb15027_.mp3: Go in and speak to Gadon if you want. Just remember to be on your best behavior... the Hidden Beks are watching you.
Female_Old_06.nm03aahidb15031_.mp3: Fair enough. But here's some free advice: get off the streets. The Black Vulkars are taking shots at anyone wandering the streets of the Lower City.
Female_Old_06.nm03aahidb15032_.mp3: Hey - I recognize you! You're the one who won the swoop race!
Female_Old_06.nm03aahidb15034_.mp3: You were racing for those damn Vulkars! You'll pay for that!
Female_Old_06.nm03aahidb15036_.mp3: You better be careful out here. Those damn Vulkars will be looking to get even with you for winning that race and killing Brejik.
Female_Old_06.nm03aahidb15038_.mp3: Go in and speak to Gadon if you want. Just remember to be on your best behavior... the Hidden Beks are watching you.

HK47.nglobehhkd07556_.mp3: Statement: Well done, master. You're my kind of owner!
HK47.nglobehhkd07558_.mp3: Statement: Oh, master. I'm so very disappointed in you.
HK47.nm17aa03sh01069_.mp3: Warning: Back off, female! No one lays hands on the personage of the master!
HK47.nm17aa11iz05054_.mp3: Statement: It is doubtful he can be clearer. Their language is difficult even for droids. He is using a trade language to try and help.
HK47.nm17aa11iz05067_.mp3: Translation: 98% probability that members of the miniature organic's tribe are being held by Sand People, master. Doubtless he wishes assistance.
HK47.nm17aa11iz05069_.mp3: Translation: 2% probability that the miniature organic is simply looking for trouble and needs to be blasted. That may be wishful thinking on my part, master.
HK47.nm17aa11iz05126_.mp3: Warning: More likely the deceiving little organic hopes to trick you into going there so you release his people while searching, master.
HK47.nm17aaiziz99149_.mp3: Request: Let me deal with him, master. It would be so much fun!
HK47.nm17ac08hk01000_.mp3: Statement: I see you have purchased me, master. I find this a satisfactory arrangement.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01002_.mp3: My restraining bolt will be deactivated when you take possession of me. Am I to accompany you now? Shall I kill something for you?
HK47.nm17ac08hk01004_.mp3: Answer: Indeed. I am most eager to engage in some unadulterated violence. At your command, of course, master.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01006_.mp3: Statement: I will enter into your service now, master. I am certain you will make adequate use of my primary functions. My gears are practically quivering with anticipation.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01009_.mp3: Statement: I will await your further orders there, master. We will have to discuss how my primary functions may best serve you.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01012_.mp3: Objection: This is less than ideal, master. I gather unwanted attention while here, and my primary functions go unused!
HK47.nm17ac08hk01014_.mp3: But... I shall wait, as you command. Do not blame me if the Ithorian absconds with all my most valuable components while you are away, however.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01016_.mp3: Greeting: Hello to you, prospective purchaser. I am referred to as HK-47, a fully functional Systech Corporation droid skilled in both combat and protocol functions.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01018_.mp3: Query: Would you be so kind as to purchase this model from Yuka Laka? It would serve my purposes to be removed from his ownership.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01020_.mp3: Refusal: It is not desirable for me to reveal core functions while still in the possession of Yuka Laka, prospective purchaser.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01022_.mp3: It is sufficient to say that I am a fully capable translator and cultural analyst, and I am also proficient in... personal combat.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01024_.mp3: Explanation: I have been recently fitted with a restraining bolt, if you must know. With it in place, access to much of my memory core is restricted.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01028_.mp3: I am not dangerous, you bucket of bolts! Ahem! That is... a restraining bolt is standard procedure, to prevent a droid from wandering off, as you should know.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01030_.mp3: Not to mention that the fool Ithorian might raise his asking price if he knew more... or make inquiries into my history. Neither outcome is beneficial to me.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01032_.mp3: Statement: Indeed. It is possible that the Ithorian placed the restraining bolt on me to prevent my return to a previous owner.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01034_.mp3: It is also possible that the removal of the bolt will not restore memory functions. Without my memory, I do not know if I know the answer.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01036_.mp3: Do not interpret this as a reduction of my worth, however. My capabilities are quite expansive.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01038_.mp3: Assurance: I am fully autonomous, but lack resources. I will grant loyal service in exchange for proper maintenance.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01040_.mp3: As well, it is rare that I am able to utilize my full array of abilities. You seem likely to give me the opportunity to do so.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01042_.mp3: Extrapolation: You are no farmer or diplomat. You are armed, and comfortable as such. We will mesh well.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01044_.mp3: Objection: My functions are wasted here, prospective purchaser! I will answer your queries, but I assure you I am better utilized elsewhere.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01046_.mp3: Statement: The fool Ithorian has decided I am to be an expensive purchase. He does this out of greed and not out of knowledge of my true capabilities.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01048_.mp3: Advisement: I have observed him. He is a coward, and will be responsive to... aggressive bargaining.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01050_.mp3: Statement: I wish only to be purchased and away from ill-treatment at the hands of this poorly-skilled mechanic. I have no desire to be subtle.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01054_.mp3: Qualification: Err... of course I shall be quite pleasant to you, should you purchase me. Please?
HK47.nm17ac08hk01057_.mp3: Explanation: It's rare for a droid to resist an owner in this way.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01059_.mp3: Doubtless the Ithorian considers my stubbornness an "embellishment" to add interest to a seemingly mundane protocol droid.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01061_.mp3: Disclosure: I am a versatile protocol and combat droid, fluent in verbal and cultural translation.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01063_.mp3: Should your needs prove more... practical, I am also skilled in highly personal combat.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01065_.mp3: Extrapolation: Intuitive language comprehension? That would be the result of recognition and training of Force sensitivity.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01067_.mp3: Your kind have little use of translation droids. Of course, your kind also encounters danger on a far more frequent basis than the average citizen.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01069_.mp3: You would do well to have me work for you, then, before someone else makes use of my... more exotic functions.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01071_.mp3: Disclosure: Finesse. Battle droids hold battlefields. I am capable of eliminating a very... specific type of target.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01073_.mp3: Retraction: Droids built for such a function face strict regulation and often have unique difficulties with previous owners.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01077_.mp3: Objection: My former owners are, indeed, alive! Or at least I believe so, not having access to my memory.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01081_.mp3: I therefore make no claim to that designation, prospective buyer. I am a law-abiding droid. Yes, indeed, law-abiding, that's me.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01083_.mp3: Request: Please do not speak so loudly, prospective buyer! Do you truly wish my price to be doubled?
HK47.nm17ac08hk01085_.mp3: Answer: With the restraining bolt in place, I do not have access to my memory core. I suspect, however, by the fine quality of my manufacture that they are a prestigious company, indeed.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01087_.mp3: I suspect I am of unique construction... or perhaps I was intended for a very specific customer. How I ended up here I can hardly say.
HK47.nm17ac08hk01090_.mp3: Observation: I am wasted in a shop or translating for some moisture farmer. If you need an efficient combatant, return to purchase me, I beg you!
HK47.nm17ac08yu02080_.mp3: Observation: I am not a problem, you useless organic meatbag! You and your lack of any organized mechanical skills are a problem!
HK47.nm17ac08yu02109_.mp3: Query: Can I kill him now, master? I would like ever so much to crush his neck. Just a little. It is a long-time fantasy of mine.
HK47.nm17ac08yu02111_.mp3: I apologize, master. Are you sure? Not even just a little?
HK47.nm17ac08yu02113_.mp3: You hear that, meatbag? I will be back!
HK47.nm17ac08yu02118_.mp3: Objection: Worn out?! Listen, you talentless organic meatbag... one word from my master and I will pull you apart limb from useless limb!
HK47.nm17ac08yu02120_.mp3: I have always been hostile. Now that I need no longer rely on you and your primitive maintenance skills I do not need to hide it.
HK47.nm17ad03gu03018_.mp3: Statement: At your command, master: Gamorrean stew!
HK47.nm17ad03gu03040_.mp3: Statement: They are not too much for us, master. Blasters on ready...
HK47.nm17ad03gu03047_.mp3: Warning: You'll pay attention to the master, meatbag, or suffer the consequences!
HK47.nm17ad03gu03139_.mp3: Statement: The master walks where the master wants. Interfere and die, aromatic meatbags!
HK47.nm17ae04ce02055_.mp3: Threat: Guards give up, meatbag. Assassin droids will hunt your whole family tree. Reconsider.
HK47.nm17ae04ce02084_.mp3: Threat: Guards give up, meatbag. Assassin droids will hunt your whole family tree. Reconsider.
HK47.nm17af07ja05006_.mp3: Translation: Doubtful. The Jawa language is structured in an odd manner. You are lucky to understand what you do.
HK47.nm17af07ja05029_.mp3: Query: Is the miniature organic implying falsehood? Shall I blast it, master?
HK47.nm18ab10ta05012_.mp3: Commentary: One would hope the female is better at repairs than Yuka Laka. I still would like to crush his neck, master.
HK47.nm18ab10ta05026_.mp3: Commentary: I say we blast the meatbag and save you the trouble, master.
HK47.nm18ab10ta05028_.mp3: Negative. I just don't like organic meatbags. Except for the master, of course. Ha ha.
HK47.nm18ac14sa01002_.mp3: Extrapolation: This guard doesn't appear honored to have the job of greeting us.
HK47.nm18ac14sa01006_.mp3: Translation: He will take us before the Chieftain, as he was instructed to do.
HK47.nm18ac14sa01011_.mp3: Translation: He says we may only enter if we have the items the Chieftain asked for. He doesn't appear open to bargaining.
HK47.nm18ac14sa01015_.mp3: Translation: It has had the expected effect. I hope you are ready for battle.
HK47.nm18ackoma99137_.mp3: Preparing blasters, Master. This should be fun!
HK47.nm18acstar99014_.mp3: Statement: I believe there can be little doubt that we have found the Star Map you were seeking. I am surprised it is still working after all this time.
HK47.nm18acstar99015_.mp3: Observation: There is tremendous power emanating from the Star Map. I wonder if the krayt dragon was drawn to this cave because of it?
HK47.nm18acstar99017_.mp3: Yes, master. I'm certain you are correct. Now that we have what we came for I do hope we will be leaving this world soon. I am growing so sick of sand in my circuits.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02001_.mp3: Translation: I can translate with some guarantee of accuracy that he is demanding to know why he should let us survive this encounter, master.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02004_.mp3: Translation: He claims he has no reason to believe you, master. Your kind have tainted this land with machines and uncaring ignorant feet.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02005_.mp3: Translation: He requires proof of good faith. We must make a contribution to his people that shows we are not a threat. Shall I blast him now, master?
HK47.nm20aa09ch02008_.mp3: Translation: He says that this offer is an outrage, master, and that his people have no use for outsider credits. Where would they spend it?
HK47.nm20aa09ch02011_.mp3: Translation: He plans to move his people farther from Anchorhead, but they need to build up stores of water first. He says you must aid him.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02012_.mp3: Translation: He wants moisture vaporators from the Czerka. If you deliver them, he will order that his people reduce their attacks on miners.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02015_.mp3: Translation: Hmph. He does not believe you, master. We will only be allowed to reenter the enclave when we have the vaporators with us.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02016_.mp3: Translation: We are to be escorted outside. He will wait, but he doesn't believe we are coming back.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02019_.mp3: Translation: He says that will never happen, master. Ignorant outsiders continually desecrate their most reverential customs. This will always demand a response... an attitude I can respect.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02020_.mp3: Protocol: From his perspective, a reduction is already a large step. It is doubtful you will get agreement on much more than that.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02023_.mp3: Translation: He says you will get no more answers until you have proven you are an ally of the Sand People.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02026_.mp3: Translation: He refuses to waste breath on you until you are proven to be an ally of his people. He seems quite adamant about it. Please let me blast him, master!
HK47.nm20aa09ch02029_.mp3: Agreement: That is probably the most efficient course of action. This will be enjoyable.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02031_.mp3: Protocol: While I enjoy the prospect, master, are you certain that is wise? He will not react favorably.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02035_.mp3: Translation: The results were predictable. He says we have tainted this place by being here and have insulted his leadership.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02036_.mp3: Translation: And something about your parentage and a grub worm, but he won't repeat it. Prepare for battle, master.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02038_.mp3: Extrapolation: I understand that you are Force Sensitive, master, but I lack sufficient knowledge to make an accurate assumption.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02039_.mp3: Hypothesis: Perhaps your ability does not take the place of actual language study when the subject is out of the ordinary.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02040_.mp3: Or perhaps the Sand People confuse your ability because they actively refuse to communicate with most outsiders. I have no data on this, sadly.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02043_.mp3: Query: What do you wish to ask of him, master?
HK47.nm20aa09ch02046_.mp3: Translation: He says that what you seek is far from here, in the Eastern Dune Sea. He will give you a map so you can find your way.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02047_.mp3: Translation: His people found it, but didn't scavenge it because a krayt dragon took up residence in the excavation.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02050_.mp3: Translation: He says that he is not responsible for the failure of your eyes. The thing that you seek is in the rear of the krayt lair.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02053_.mp3: Translation: Your ignorance isn't his concern. He claims there is a hunter that wanders the area sometimes, and that you should ask him.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02054_.mp3: Translation: The hunter is a Twi'lek. He will be in the Eastern Dune Sea somewhere.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02056_.mp3: Agreement: My thoughts exactly, master. One dead organic meatbag, coming up.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02057_.mp3: Translation: He says that you already have a map to the Eastern Dune Sea, where we will find the Star Map.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02059_.mp3: Clarification: We must be more specific, master. They capture many organics.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02062_.mp3: Translation: He says that the captive Jawas are slaves and that have lived past their usefulness. You may take them, if you wish.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02066_.mp3: Translation: He says that by his very presence, this Griff defiles their home and land. He is without any semblance of usefulness to them.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02068_.mp3: Extrapolation: I would assume we are free to take him. It is doubtful they will even waste the effort to kill him. Perhaps we could do it, master?
HK47.nm20aa09ch02071_.mp3: Protocol: We should not keep him long. It is an insult to take too much of his time. Unless the plan is to blast him when you are done, of course.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02073_.mp3: Protocol: This will be a very sensitive topic, master. You will want to be careful with your questions or risk offending him. Not that that is much of a worry.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02076_.mp3: Translation: He says you may listen to the Storyteller, but if you dare to say the histories incorrectly, they will have you killed.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02078_.mp3: Translation: You have been told that to be considered worthy of hearing the histories, you need to bring him a dragon pearl from a krayt dragon.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02079_.mp3: Translation: He says the discussion is closed until you fulfill this condition. He thinks you are just making fun of his traditions.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02081_.mp3: Translation: He says that he will not, master. There is one Storyteller in each clan, and only he may recite the histories.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02084_.mp3: Translation: He says that you don't understand. They must never be told to someone who might say them incorrectly out of ignorance.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02085_.mp3: Translation: To speak them in error is a blasphemy punishable by death. Only their greatest warriors are even permitted to listen to the tales.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02088_.mp3: Translation: He won't believe you until he sees a dragon pearl as proof. I should kill him for not taking you at your word, master.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02091_.mp3: Translation: He is stupefied, master. He never thought you could return with such an item. Such a thing has not been done in many years.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02092_.mp3: Translation: He will allow you to meet the Storyteller, but also gives a warning: if you dare to repeat the histories incorrectly, you will be killed.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02093_.mp3: Translation: The Storyteller will be summoned to one of the rooms here in the enclave. He seems to think this is a great honor for you, master.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02096_.mp3: Translation: He doesn't know, master. His people usually kill outsiders. Since you are an outsider yourself, that would not suffice.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02097_.mp3: Translation: The greatest challenge for a warrior is to face a krayt dragon, the largest predator on Tatooine. Fight one of those and bring back a dragon pearl.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02098_.mp3: Disgust: I think he's making fun of you, master. He doesn't believe an outsider could do such a thing.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02101_.mp3: Translation: There is a dragon in the far Eastern Dune Sea, but he claims you could never defeat it. Here is a map to the area.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02102_.mp3: Translation: There is a hunter, a Twi'lek, that is sometimes seen out there. Perhaps he would be of some help.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02103_.mp3: Translation: He says there is a dragon in the Eastern Dune Sea that you could sacrifice yourself to. You already have a map to the area.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02106_.mp3: Translation: Stones polished in the gullet of the beast. Apparently they are valuable items.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02109_.mp3: Translation: He says that the fact that you have to ask this is just one more example of your ignorance as an outsider, master. He says you are blind.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02110_.mp3: Translation: His people believe they are part of the land, living with it. You and your kind dare to raise yourself above it. You remove yourself.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02111_.mp3: Translation: That act of removal makes you an outsider, separate from all that is important. You could never understand how unwelcome you are.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02114_.mp3: Translation: He says that outsiders use machines to convey them, and to make their lives easier. This severs a connection with the land.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02115_.mp3: Translation: Connection to the soil must be made through flesh. A sacred animal is the only external tool to be used.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02118_.mp3: Translation: He says that the use of these blasphemous things will only be tolerated because outsider interference has forced it upon them.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02119_.mp3: Translation: If your kind had not come here, he would not have to defend their ways or their land.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02122_.mp3: Translation: He says that the robes are sacred, master, and you would not understand. Sand People are never uncovered outside of the most private moments.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02125_.mp3: Translation: Never. That is their way, master.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02127_.mp3: Protocol: Is that wise, master? They may have assumed that the disguises you used were replicas instead of being taken off their dead.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02130_.mp3: Translation: The result is predictable. You have desecrated their dead. Happily, it seems the peace is over. It is time to kill.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02133_.mp3: Translation: We are free to leave.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02139_.mp3: Translation: He did not expect us to return, master. He wonders if we have brought the moisture vaporators.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02142_.mp3: Translation: He does not trust you, master, but you have done more than any other outsider. They will not attack, and he grants you his Chieftain's Gaffi as reward.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02143_.mp3: Translation: The attacks will be reduced, and he will allow you to explore this enclave, but be warned that any lack of respect will result in death.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02145_.mp3: Protocol: If you truly want this sadly peaceful arrangement to continue, be careful of what you ask.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02147_.mp3: Commentary: Thank you, master. This should be fun.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02150_.mp3: Translation: He says that he has made his offer and there will be no further negotiation, master. Deliver the vaporators or face death. Shall I blast him now?
HK47.nm20aa09ch02152_.mp3: Query: Is that wise, master? You went through the trouble of acquiring the vaporators, after all... not that I would mind a battle.
HK47.nm20aa09ch02154_.mp3: Conciliatory: I was not refusing, master. Quite the contrary, initiating attack sequence now!
HK47.nm20aa09fi03002_.mp3: Interjection: One moment... I believe I understood that, master. It may not have been his intention, but he did actually communicate something.
HK47.nm20aa09fi03006_.mp3: Result: I believe I have succeeded in confusing him, master. We have shown an interest not common among outsiders.
HK47.nm20aa09fi03010_.mp3: Translation: He is expressing disbelief... as am I... but his duty requires that he report to the Chieftain.
HK47.nm20aa09fi03012_.mp3: Extrapolation: It would seem that we are at least worthy of curiosity, for the moment. I would much rather this get bloody, master, but it is your call.
HK47.nm20aa09fi03017_.mp3: Cautionary: Not the most productive of results, master. Your threat will be answered in the same manner, happily. Preparing blasters!
HK47.nm20aa09fi03020_.mp3: Agreement: That is probably the most efficient course of action.
HK47.nm20aa09fi03022_.mp3: Cautionary: I am unsure, master. Now is not the time for speculation, however. I will attempt to address your question later.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07002_.mp3: Translation: He identifies himself as the Storyteller, master. He has been told of your warrior skills and will speak the history to you.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07005_.mp3: Translation: There is only one accepted history, passed orally to each successive generation.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07008_.mp3: Translation: Theirs is an oral history, master, an active part of their lives. It is only permitted to relay the tales face to face.
