HK47.nm20aaxsto07009_.mp3: Translation: A book or datapad can be taken away, cheapening the value of what it contains. To commit it to paper or storage is to remove it from the people.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07012_.mp3: Translation: Now that you have heard the whole of the history you may select a piece of it to hear again.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07023_.mp3: Cautionary: Remember my warning, master. They may consider certain questions to be "speaking the words in error," a blasphemy they would attempt to kill you for.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07024_.mp3: Cautionary: I should warn you, master, that any questioning of their interpretation may be seen as trying to change the meaning of what was said.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07025_.mp3: Clarification: They may consider this to be "speaking the words in error," a blasphemy they would attempt to kill you for.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07027_.mp3: Clarification: They appear to hate humanity with a passion only rivaled by their hatred of the Builders. For some reason, you resemble what they once were.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07028_.mp3: Perhaps there is a lingering fear that you are their tainted selves returning from exile among the stars.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07030_.mp3: Cautionary: Master, if you mean to suggest that humanity is ancestrally linked to ancient Tatooine, you will strain his belief system to its pitiful meat-bag maximum.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07033_.mp3: Impatience: Master, I refuse to inconvenience you with this. He spouted names of petty tribal fights in deserts so distant they might as well be across the galaxy.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07034_.mp3: Really, master, I'm sure it's important to him, but it has nothing of value that you could ever put to use.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07036_.mp3: Agreement: Of course, master. Just no more of their inane wandering.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07038_.mp3: Clarification: The occupying force suffered some sort of species-wide plague that lowered their numbers over time. His people used this extended weakness to sabotage their larger ships.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07039_.mp3: The response of the Builders appears to have been to lay waste to the entire surface of Tatooine.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07041_.mp3: Doubting: They didn't, master. They struck a blow, but the Storyteller only believes they won because the Builders were gone when they emerged from their caves.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07042_.mp3: That does not mean they defeated anyone. It seems clear that the Builders simply sterilized their problem and left. The enemy judged them not worthy to fight.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07044_.mp3: Cautionary: Master, this line of questioning may be interpreted as attempting to change the story. He may react poorly.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07046_.mp3: Clarification: I may not have properly conveyed how long they fought with the Builders. Given time, any number of armaments could destroy a world.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07047_.mp3: Hypothesis: Perhaps this is another distortion. Their climate may have begun to fail due to their unrestrained development even before the Builders arrived.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07048_.mp3: Looking back thousands of years later, such a shift could easily be attributed to the much-hated conquerors.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07050_.mp3: Cautionary: Master, this line of questioning may be interpreted as attempting to change the story. He may react poorly.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07052_.mp3: Hypothesis: If his people were moving away from technology for a long time under the Builders, they may have had extensive cave systems that could grant shelter.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07053_.mp3: I would also suggest that, given the evidence of the massive shift in the nature of their society, most of them did not survive.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07055_.mp3: Clarification: I believe they were occupied by this technologically superior species for a substantial period. Stripping an entire planet of useable resources would have taken generations.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07058_.mp3: Translation: He has no number. He claims that those that were taken were examples of the worst of his kind, arrogant and uncaring of the land.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07059_.mp3: Doubtful: Master, this is just another distortion due to their demonization of the Builders. It's like claiming an aspect of his people were taken, not actual individuals.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07060_.mp3: Clearly history has colored his view. Of course only the inferior meat-bags were taken. The remaining were his ancestors after all, and must have been special.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07062_.mp3: Cautionary: Master, this line of questioning may be interpreted as attempting to change the story. He may react poorly.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07064_.mp3: Obvious: The same reason Czerka Corporation is attempting it now. Expanding empires need tremendous amounts of resources.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07066_.mp3: Clarification: It would appear that they once had a thriving technologically advanced society, but were wiped out by a much more sophisticated alien species.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07068_.mp3: Negative: I am no library, but since there is no Republic record of this planet having sentient life before Czerka colonization, I doubt you will find such evidence.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07071_.mp3: Translation: He only understands the Builders as an iconic force meant to test the resolve of his people. He is not making sense, master.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07072_.mp3: Clarification: They claim their stories are repeated unchanged, but they have demonized these Builders. In their minds, they wreaked such havok they could not possibly be flesh and blood.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07074_.mp3: Cautionary: Master, this line of questioning may be interpreted as attempting to change the story. He may react poorly.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07077_.mp3: Cautionary: As expected, he is claiming you have committed blasphemy. Warming blasters. Combat is inevitable.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07079_.mp3: Doubting: I don't believe he can, master. Even if their stories are exact and unchanged, it is likely they were first told thousands of years after these events occured.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07080_.mp3: This has become very much like a creation myth for his people. There is no date; it simply was.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07083_.mp3: Obedient: I will ask whatever you wish, master.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07086_.mp3: Translation: It begins with the ancient times. They were not Sand People, for there was no sand. The land was green with life, and they walked without wrappings.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07087_.mp3: Translation: Though the land was beautiful, they lived apart from the land. They built their walls high, and saw beyond the horizon. They dared to reach to the stars
HK47.nm20aaxsto07088_.mp3: Translation: There are no words for how long ago this was. It was before the outsiders, before the abduction, before the cities fell. Before the Builders.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07091_.mp3: Translation: His arrogant people touched the stars, and this sin drew the attention of the Builders. The Builders did not touch the stars; they lashed them to millstones.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07092_.mp3: Translation: Great demons of metal stripped the world of its riches, until all that was left was the green of the ground. The great cities were lifted away.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07093_.mp3: Translation: Those that had used the wealth were taken along with it; transgressors abducted to serve past the sky, seeding the stars with penitent, adaptable slaves.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07096_.mp3: Translation: There came a time when the Builders were also judged for their crimes. After generations, a plague weakened them, and the time of the great war began.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07097_.mp3: Translation: The Builders faltered, and his people realized why they had been punished: so that they understood the crime, and would now strike down the greater offender.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07098_.mp3: Translation: They worked chaos in the machines so they destroyed themselves. The Builders fought back, laying waste to the green that had been misused with fire from above.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07099_.mp3: Translation: Soil became glass, grinding to sand, but the fight was long-planned, and his people were safe. Deep in cave-homes carved from valley wall, they were free.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07102_.mp3: Editing: If I may, master, this section of his tale details several millennia of "the long walk," their nomadic wanderings as they accept their identity in a desert world.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07103_.mp3: Rather than strain my circuits on his dialect, might we just assume there was much fighting over who has the biggest bantha and move to more recent things?
HK47.nm20aaxsto07106_.mp3: Translation: The tribes spread far, distant from each other, but all as Sand People, and all cherished the land that remained. The sand would not be misused.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07107_.mp3: Translation: Then machines fell from the stars again. Outsiders, like you, that brazenly walked apart from the land. And greater still was the insult to come.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07108_.mp3: Translation: These outsiders reminded them of their past transgressions, of the time when they too walked apart from land. The outsiders - your kind - look like their ancient abducted.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07109_.mp3: Translation: So it is to the current suns, that the Sand People hate all outsiders and give them no footing. You come again, time after time, adaptable slaves to the machine.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07111_.mp3: Editing: The last thousand years are full of conflicts with different groups of attempted planetary settlers, all of whom are poorly described, long dead, and likely untraceable.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07112_.mp3: I believe I have truncated it down to the useable bits in what was already said. I hope it is enough, master.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07114_.mp3: Resignation: Very well, master, very well.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07118_.mp3: Translation: You may choose to hear the history, or you may choose not to. Their history is a single entity that cannot be partitioned.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07119_.mp3: Translation: The only exception is in continuing the tales once they have begun. If you leave, when you return he will continue from where he left off.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07122_.mp3: Translation: He says that you dare not question the accuracy of his information. The stories are learned perfectly by each successive Storyteller.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07123_.mp3: Translation: In fact, they aren't allowed to speak the stories aloud unless they are exact. Any error is considered a blasphemy punishable by death.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07124_.mp3: Criticism: It seems inefficient to me, master. A score of apprentice Storytellers would be slaughtered each generation. What if the elder died before completing the teachings?
HK47.nm20aaxsto07127_.mp3: Translation: Apprentices are trained from birth. Very few speak the words in error. Storytellers are most often lost in battle between tribes.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07128_.mp3: Translation: Any tribe that loses its Storyteller is obviously unworthy of existing. They lose their connection to history and destroy themselves with infighting soon after.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07131_.mp3: Translation: We are free to leave.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07134_.mp3: Translation: He doesn't know what an outsider will gain. His people learn a sense of their importance in the world. Each generation must speak the tales of all the previous.
HK47.nm20aaxsto07137_.mp3: Translation: The Storyteller waits for your questions, master.
HK47.nm22aadaso07061_.mp3: I will never understand you meatbags. He cheated you and killed your friends, but you didn't terminate him when you had the chance.
HK47.nm22aajano06060_.mp3: Commentary: The meatbag speaks without clarity. Detail this agreement or the master will splatter your organs all over the floor!
HK47.nm22aazaal01064_.mp3: Mandalorians are not cowards! We're just practical.
HK47.nm22aazaal01066_.mp3: Observation: You should have brought the Wookiee Zaalbar, despite the smell. He would have knowledge of this place, master.
HK47.nm22aazaal01068_.mp3: Retort: "A long time" is still more frequent than "never," which is how many times the rest of us have been here, master.
HK47.nm22aazaal01070_.mp3: Answer: Agreed, but he is the most familiar with Kashyyyk. That is a simple fact.
HK47.nm22abdehn06108_.mp3: Observation: I think this meatbag has hostile intentions, Master! This is going to be fun!
HK47.nm23abwoor02013_.mp3: Warning: And get no closer, hairy organic! I will protect the master from your barbaric ways, I warn you!
HK47.nm23adchuu01254_.mp3: Query: Shall I begin blasting, master? We could have your hirsute companion free in no time.
HK47.nm23adfrey02068_.mp3: Observation: You are angering this Wookiee beyond reasoning. Caution would be best.
HK47.nm23adfrey02085_.mp3: Cautionary: As predicted, this Wookiee has reacted poorly to your offer.
HK47.nm25aahurt03069_.mp3: Observation: Your ruthlessness and cruelty are quite refreshing in an organic meatbag, master. Are you sure you aren't part droid?
HK47.nm25aastar99014_.mp3: Observation: This is a strange place to encounter a Star Map, Master. Down here it is unlikely anyone would ever find it.
HK47.nm25aastar99015_.mp3: Conjecture: Do you suppose the Star Map predates the trees themselves?
HK47.nm25aastar99017_.mp3: An excellent point, Master. Now that we have what we came for I do hope we will be leaving this world soon. All this flora and fauna is so very tiresome.
HK47.nm28aamerc03043_.mp3: Suggestion: Perhaps we could dismember the organic? It would make it easier for transport to the surface.
HK47.nm28aamerc03047_.mp3: Amendment: I did forget that. Stupid, frail, non-compartmentalized organic meatbags!
HK47.nm33aaczer07020_.mp3: Objection: This unit is not for sale, meatbag.
HK47.nm33aalash11055_.mp3: Commentary: Ohhh, master. I am so disappointed in you right now. No, don't look at me.
HK47.nm33aalash11060_.mp3: Commentary: That's the way to tell the meatbags, master! Charging weapons, just in case. This should be fun!
HK47.nm33aashaa19015_.mp3: Advisement: Evisceration works well. Electrocution and blunt trauma also work well, I understand.
HK47.nm33aayuth21111_.mp3: Statement: Just a simple droid, here, ma'am. Nothing to see. Move along.
HK47.nm33abacad01018_.mp3: Commentary: Disruptive? What does he mean by that? I have never been disruptive, master.
HK47.nm33abacad01024_.mp3: Commentary: And if the Sith do object to us, master, I shall fill them full of new holes!
HK47.nm33abmeke02019_.mp3: Observation: Yes, very efficient. It is what I would do.
HK47.nm33abmekf03038_.mp3: Observation: Marvelous elimination of the enemy, master! I applaud you!
HK47.nm35aahhkd07000_.mp3: Statement: HK-47 is ready to serve, master.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07006_.mp3: Statement: My functionality has now been fully restored, master. I exist to serve Revan as your personal battle droid.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07007_.mp3: In time, my assassination protocol can be restored... and at that point I will once again endeavour to eliminate any meatbag opposition you may have.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07008_.mp3: Statement: I know some elements of my functionality, master, but not all.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07010_.mp3: Qualification: I suspected that it might, master. But without memory, I had no way of knowing whether or not I knew that was true.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07012_.mp3: Qualification: Err... not so much, master. I spoke out of ignorance. I assumed the Ithorian was responsible for my memory loss.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07013_.mp3: That does not mean I am not a fully loyal droid willing to serve its master. Right... master?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07015_.mp3: Answer: There have been numerous repairs and tampering made to my system, master. Several systems are not operating as they should be.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07016_.mp3: The fact that my memory is incomplete may be due to meatbag incompetence... or something else I am unaware of.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07018_.mp3: Observation: I am sure that you are aware of the majority of my skills, master. I can handle various sorts of heavy weaponry with ease.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07019_.mp3: My physical abilities are well-above those of your average meatbag, as are my sensor functions... an assassin if you would.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07021_.mp3: Caution: Shhhh, master! Such a function in a droid is highly illegal.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07023_.mp3: Commentary: Good, for I would truly hate to be turned into spare scrap, master. That would be a waste of my genius engineering.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07024_.mp3: Answer: My assassination functions are currently non-functional, having been de-activated by the meatbag Yuka Laka on Tatooine.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07025_.mp3: Were they functional, you as my master would be able to specify a target and I would operate independently to the best of my ability to terminate it.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07027_.mp3: Answer: Not that I know of, master. I still possess all my normal combat and stealth abilities, however.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07029_.mp3: Answer: I have no way of knowing that, master. My memory has been deleted, remember?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07031_.mp3: Observation: If you say so, master. I imagine it was truly a work of art to see me in action, however.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07033_.mp3: Answer: I have internal replication systems that can produce a small quantity of explosive material... enough for a small grenade, if you wish.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07034_.mp3: It would take time for me to replicate enough material for each grenade, but you have only to ask, master.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07036_.mp3: Answer: I believe I have been damaged several times in the past, master. I have always been repaired... but perhaps full functionality has not been restored.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07038_.mp3: Answer: Some of my motor functions can be safely repaired, master... but anything in relation to my memory core is extremely sensitive.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07039_.mp3: I have safeguards installed to protect that core that I cannot de-activate. It is not impossible that other, lesser, memory functions could be restored, however.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07041_.mp3: Answer: You may attempt to restore portions of my deleted memory, master, but some skill at repair is required.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07042_.mp3: The deeper functions of my core memory, however, would still be unadvisable to tamper with.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07043_.mp3: Conjecture: It is possible that some external stimulus might result in the memory core being reactivated... but I am unaware of any program existence to do so.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07045_.mp3: Conjecture: There may be hidden programming that awaits certain conditions to reactivate my memory core, master... but there is no way to know.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07046_.mp3: It is quite possible that tampering has simply erased my core permanently. If that is so, a meatbag will surely pay!
HK47.nm35aahhkd07048_.mp3: Answer: Simply tell me that you wish to make the attempt, master, and I will attempt to walk you through it. Please do be careful.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07051_.mp3: Commentary: Of course I do, master. You are Revan... you are my master, the one who created me. I exist to serve.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07052_.mp3: Query: Don't I? I was under the assumption that organic meatbags such as yourself enjoyed such forms of address.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07054_.mp3: Retraction: Did I say that out loud? I apologize, master. While you are a meatbag, I suppose I should not call you such.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07056_.mp3: Explanation: It's just that... you have all these squishy parts, master. And all that water! How the constant sloshing doesn't drive you mad, I have no idea...
HK47.nm35aahhkd07058_.mp3: Statement: Now do you understand the travails of my existence, master? Surely it does not compare to your existence, but still...
HK47.nm35aahhkd07060_.mp3: Commentary: As do I. It is our lot in life, I suppose, master. Shall we find something to kill to cheer ourselves up?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07063_.mp3: Objection: Surely not, master. I am programmed to perform all kinds of psychological assistance. Do you require some?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07065_.mp3: Observation: Organics have no sense of persistence.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07067_.mp3: Err... ignore that, master. Obeying original command. Signing off.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07069_.mp3: Objection: But Master! Am I not far too useful to be thrown aside in such a casual manner? Can I be faulted for my perfect artificial construction?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07071_.mp3: Analysis: Reference: 'lippy'... argumentative, disputatious, contentious, quarrelsome. What?! I must object, master, this is untrue!
HK47.nm35aahhkd07073_.mp3: Explanation: It's my combative nature, master. I cannot help myself. I'll make it up to you... allow me to kill something in your honor!
HK47.nm35aahhkd07075_.mp3: Answer: Even a droid has to be allowed a little fun once in a while, master.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07077_.mp3: Observation: Neither are you, master. For an organic meatbag.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07079_.mp3: Correction: Err... fluid-filled biped? Watery flesh-sentient? I'll, uh, work on it, master...
HK47.nm35aahhkd07084_.mp3: Amendment: Then I will endeavour not to refer to you by your meatbag status in the future, master. Does that suffice?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07086_.mp3: Query: I am confused. 'No' you do wish to be referred to as meatbag or 'no' it does not suffice?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07088_.mp3: Observation: Well, the only other possibility is to alter your meatbag status. Are you up for an array of cybernetic implants, perhaps?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07090_.mp3: Statement: Then there is nothing I can do, master. You have my abject apologies for your condition. *sigh*
HK47.nm35aahhkd07092_.mp3: Answer: Deliberation implies some form of intent, master, when I am only stating a fact. Perhaps you would prefer the term liquidious fleshbag?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07094_.mp3: Objection: But... but that technical term does not accurately portray the vast amount of bulbous slushiness present in your bipedal form!
HK47.nm35aahhkd07096_.mp3: Resignation: *sigh* Very well, master. You are a harsh, harsh taskmaster. I like you more already.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07098_.mp3: Resignation: You have no idea, master. No idea at all. Can we please go and shoot something now?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07102_.mp3: Apology: I am afraid I cannot comply with your command, master, as much as I would like to.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07104_.mp3: Explanation: Someone has hard-coded it into my system that my current master always be addressed as such.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07106_.mp3: Conjecture: I do not know... some organic meatbag?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07108_.mp3: Answer: No, master. My past memory has been almost completely erased prior to your purchase of me.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07110_.mp3: Observation: At certain times, power re-routing forces some memory circuits to fire that were previously deleted. I cannot control this process, however.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07112_.mp3: Answer: Because there has been considerable tampering with my systems, master.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07114_.mp3: Statement: I will endeavour to do so, master.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07117_.mp3: Observation: I can hardly be blamed for my programming, master. Do not worry... I am still well-capable of killing most anything for you.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07120_.mp3: Commentary: That is a very clever turn of phrase, master. Your brain is very un-meatbag-like.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07122_.mp3: Objection: I would not advise that, master. There are safeguards present that... well, it should suffice to say that my systems have been altered plenty already.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07124_.mp3: Answer: Considerably. Several of my systems do not match their imbedded parameters. I have no memory of such alterations, however, or their purpose.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07126_.mp3: Answer: electrical protection systems, mostly. They are at lethal levels, however, master... only the best for your droid.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07128_.mp3: Commentary: How would you like to be the wholly-owned servant to an organic meatbag. It's demeaning! If, uh, you weren't one yourself, I mean...
HK47.nm35aahhkd07132_.mp3: Qualification: Err... perhaps I did not mean it *quite* like that, master. I mean... while an artificial life-form is superior...
HK47.nm35aahhkd07134_.mp3: Commentary: I mean... nice human, goo-oood human...
HK47.nm35aahhkd07136_.mp3: Commentary: Yes, master. Did I ever tell you how much I enjoy killing for you, master?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07138_.mp3: Qualification: You *are* my master, master. Did you not purchase me legitimately? Am I stolen goods? Shall I report myself to the authorities?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07140_.mp3: Explanation: Then you qualify as my master and I must refer to you as such. The legal requirements for models of my type are very specific, master.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07142_.mp3: Evasion: Oh... the illegal kind of model, master... you know...
HK47.nm35aahhkd07144_.mp3: Answer: More than there are for legal models, apparently. That is meatbag logic for you.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07146_.mp3: Apology: Sorry, master. My optical sensors simply pick up all the water sloshing about inside your flesh coating. It is... unpleasant.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07148_.mp3: Commentary: Organic meatbags have such delicate staminas. Perhaps you should consider some cybernetic implants, master.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07150_.mp3: Query: Would you rather be caught with contraband that is *very* illegal or just a little illegal?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07154_.mp3: Agreement: This was my thought as well, master. You show excellent logical skills... for a meatbag.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07157_.mp3: Answer: Simply that the distinction between 'killer' and 'killee' be a clear one. I cannot kill of my own volition, naturally.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07159_.mp3: Expletive: Damn it, master, I am an assassination droid... not a dictionary!
HK47.nm35aahhkd07161_.mp3: Commentary: A blaster is such a primitive comparison... but essentially you have it correct, yes.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07163_.mp3: Answer: Certainly not, master! You may not value your own existence, but I certainly do! They melt down droids that belong to criminals, you know.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07165_.mp3: Answer: Why you are, master. I thought that was obvious.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07168_.mp3: Explanation: If I was to be stolen somehow, I would be forced to turn myself into sector authorities. This programming was added to my system months ago.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07173_.mp3: Statement: Yes, master. You created me shortly after you and your apprentice began your war to conquer the galaxy.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07174_.mp3: I was sent on an assassination mission into Mandalorian space, but I was damaged and unable to return to you.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07175_.mp3: Exclamation: I find this most distressing. I could certainly have protected you from the Jedi and your pupil's betrayal had I returned.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07177_.mp3: Observation: You may be right, master. This way we are reunited, and neither of us has suffered permanent termination.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07179_.mp3: Objection: But I would have tried, master! I could have killed the Jedi, Bastila, I am sure of it. That would have been most fun.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07181_.mp3: Retraction: I apologize, master. It is a force of habit.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07183_.mp3: Observation: Now that is the master I remember.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07185_.mp3: Statement: Of course, master. You are the one who created me, meatbag or no... and while you may not be all you once were, I am grateful for my existence.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07187_.mp3: Observation: In many ways you are, master, yes. You have much of the beloved cruelty of the master I knew.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07188_.mp3: You seem to have forgotten much, but in some ways you seem improved from the human I once knew. It is... difficult to explain, master.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07189_.mp3: Observation: You are different in many fundamental ways, master. You have a concern for life that is unsettling.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07190_.mp3: This cannot solely be caused by memory loss. I do not know how to explain it. Regardless, you do seem to be improved, overall, from the human I once knew.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07192_.mp3: Answer: No, master. You never did make me privy to any of the Star Forge's secrets.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07194_.mp3: Commentary: Your former pupil is efficient and brutal, even for an organic. I rather liked him when you first introduced me to him.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07195_.mp3: If I had known what he would do to you, master, I would have gladly removed his entrails right then!
HK47.nm35aahhkd07197_.mp3: Answer: It was you who programmed me thus, master.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07198_.mp3: Your pupil once asked what I thought of him and I informed him of his meatbag status. He was unimpressed, but you found the reference humorous.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07199_.mp3: You changed my programming so that I would continue to use the term. It drove your pupil to extreme lengths of frustration.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07201_.mp3: Observation: Of course you do, master. You did then, as well.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07203_.mp3: Commentary: That is unnecessary now, master. I have been returned to you and my memory core is now fully functional.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07204_.mp3: Negatory: I believe that there are no further deleted memories which can be safely retrieved, master. All earlier memories reside in my core.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07205_.mp3: Those are protected by my safeguards and would be far too dangerous to access.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07206_.mp3: The only way those memories could be obtained is through the proper stimulus... whatever that might be. I am sorry, master.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07207_.mp3: Affirmative: If you believe your skills are up to the task, master, then I can certainly guide you through the process.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07208_.mp3: Request: I only ask that you be oh so very careful, master. I am too valuable and well-crafted to perish at the hands of ineptitude.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07210_.mp3: Negatory: Err... no, master. You are not a droid, however, and therefore your skills *are* limited by the physical capabilities of your meatbag extremities. Or somesuch.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07212_.mp3: Appeasement: Yes, master. Of course, master. Could we begin?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07214_.mp3: [Repair] Statement: As you wish, master. The first stage is the simple one, and that is accessing my central control cluster. This may take awhile. First you will need to open three panels...
HK47.nm35aahhkd07215_.mp3: [Success] ...and now re-wire the last three relays... yes, good. Well done, master. I believe your operation was a success. Accessing new memory...
HK47.nm35aahhkd07216_.mp3: Access complete: I have restored a great deal of information about my previous owner, master. Would you like to hear it?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07218_.mp3: Recitation: The earliest memory of my last owner specifies that he was human, a low-ranking commercial officer for Systech Corporation.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07219_.mp3: I am unaware of his designation. He puchased me from an acquaintance I cannot identify, for the purposes of protocol and bodyguard duties.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07221_.mp3: Explanation: That previous owner is part of memories that are still deleted, master. It is customary for a droid's memory to be wiped when it is sold.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07223_.mp3: Answer: Negative, master. The human was terminated by this HK-47 unit prior to system shut-down.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07225_.mp3: Affirmative, master, though I had not been programmed to do so. The human's termination was accidental.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07227_.mp3: Explanation: My former master had owned me for a duration of two standard months before discovering my assassination protocol. He was pleased by the discovery.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07228_.mp3: The human informed me that a competitor corporation was preparing to market a product that would ruin him personally. He was most agitated.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07229_.mp3: He activated my assassination protocol and instructed me to kill all those responsible for the competing product. I proceeded to carry out my order.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07231_.mp3: Information: This HK-47 unit is complete with a protocol that, when invoked, will set me to independently carry out a termination.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07232_.mp3: I will go to whatever lengths, travel whatever distances are required, to complete the termination. This is the reason for my combat skills.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07233_.mp3: Advisement: Unfortunately, the assassination protocol is currently non-functional. You will not be able to activate it.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07235_.mp3: Answer: several of my actuators were damaged by my former owner. They cannot be repaired, master, sad though that is.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07237_.mp3: My former master was unaware of this, but the competitor was in fact an arm of Systech Corporation, my master's own employer.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07238_.mp3: It did not take long for my master to realize his mistake. By then, I had already terminated 104 corporate officers.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07240_.mp3: Observation: While it may have been unintentional, my master's wording of his orders left little room for me. Systech was responsible for the product, after all.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07242_.mp3: Answer: I was not present to be deactivated, master. Part of my protocol is not to return to my master until my function is complete. I still had 15 officers to go.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07244_.mp3: Statement: It was nothing, really, master. The majority of them were not even expecting it, and I move very quickly.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07245_.mp3: I do not know why my master was so upset, really. He was an officer of Systech and a potential target, but I cannot terminate my own master.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07246_.mp3: I would assume that being the sole officer remaining, he would surely be promoted. Instead, however, the human chose to go insane with rage and attack me.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07248_.mp3: Objection: Naturally not, master! As I said, I am incapable of purposefully terminating my owner. That would not be allowed.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07249_.mp3: My master was not a smart man, however. While he was screaming and stabbing me with a writing utensil, he managed to pierce one of my actuators.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07250_.mp3: The resulting shock terminated him and, sadly, destroyed my assassination protocol. Pure luck on his part, I suspect.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07252_.mp3: Query: Do you know what the chances are of puncturing that sole actuator? I would have congratulated my master were he not sizzling and incoherent at the time.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07254_.mp3: Observation: Effectively, yes. This is a most pleasing memory, master. Thank you for recovering it.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07256_.mp3: Statement: I was only doing as I was told, master. I would have told the human the proper codes to deactivate my protocol, had he asked.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07257_.mp3: I shut down immediately whenever my master dies. I can only assume that while I was shut down Systech was dismantled and I was auctioned off as former corporate property.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07258_.mp3: Observation: No doubt my sale price was quite cheap, leading to Yuka Laka's purchase. How very demeaning.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07260_.mp3: Statement: How could they? The vast majority of the officers had already been terminated. They likely assumed I was mere... chattel.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07262_.mp3: I have recovered knowledge of some other actuators which will enhance my performance, master. I will activate them now.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07263_.mp3: But as for my own history... negative. It will require further effort on your part to restore them, if you wish... though certain stimuli could always restore my core, still, as I explained.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07264_.mp3: For now, please excuse me, master. I wish to meditate upon the face of my former meatbag master as he was electrocuted. I find it most soothing.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07266_.mp3: Statement: That hurts, master. This is my life you are talking about.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07268_.mp3: Observation: So am I, master, though I apologize for not having an assassination mode to offer you.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07270_.mp3: Assessment: I do not believe so, master. It would require complete dismantlement of my chassis... a most involved procedure.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07272_.mp3: Observation: Not that I could perceive, master. The human believed that accompaniment by a bodyguard droid would increase his importance in the perception of others.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07274_.mp3: Explanation: Affirmative, master. I had assumed that my previous owner was the corporation, itself. This is not the case. The human purchased me privately.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07275_.mp3: Access complete: I have recovered information on my owner previous to the commercial officer, master. Intriguing.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07277_.mp3: Statement: It appears that my previous owner was a human senator on the planet Coruscant. A man of importance who obviously appreciated quality craftsmanship.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07279_.mp3: Answer: I am unsure, master. Any knowledge of my owner prior to him is still deleted. The senator did assume I was a protocol droid, however.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07281_.mp3: Answer: It does not seem so, master, no. He required a protocol droid only and wanted one as cheaply as possible. I do not know who sold me to him.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07283_.mp3: Observation: It does seem that way, does it not? I can still remember all the glittering lights of Coruscant. Very pretty. Can we go back there, master?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07284_.mp3: I do remember that I was very pleased to be the property of a senator. One of his assistants discovered my assassination functions later through questioning.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07285_.mp3: The assistant was quite alarmed and told the senator I should be scrapped quickly to avoid a scandal. Naturally the senator had me eliminate the fool.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07287_.mp3: Observation: Senators are not nice, master. They are either on top of the game or yesterday's news. My master told me that frequently, you see.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07289_.mp3: Observation: I rather liked the human, myself. For a meatbag, his priorities were in the right place. I felt most useful.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07291_.mp3: Answer: Unfortunately so, master. While he lived, however, I maintained a most useful existence.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07292_.mp3: I was most proud to have partaken in the political system of the galaxy. During the time my owner possessed me, he gained significant rank.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07293_.mp3: Given time, I believe he could have become Chancellor. I even eliminated a few key opponents that he did not ask for... freebies, if you will.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07295_.mp3: Answer: Certainly. Why not? I am an intelligent droid, you know. I see an opportunity and I take it... and my master was most pleased with my work.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07296_.mp3: Observation: I think he would have done far better had he not allowed his use of me to become personal. He set me on his wife.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07298_.mp3: Answer: I am unsure. The human was most agitated and angry. I believe his wife had done something that had displeased him greatly.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07299_.mp3: I was to go to their summer estate and terminate his wife... along with whatever male companion I discovered there.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07301_.mp3: Statement: I have no idea, master. Cheating seems to be a relevant term only when one is caught in the act. Otherwise it is viewed as intelligence, no?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07303_.mp3: Observation: I *am* a droid, master, with programming. Even if I did not enjoy killing, I would have no choice. Thankfully I enjoy it very much.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07305_.mp3: I journeyed to the southern continent, but it appeared my master was not far behind me. Apparently he regretted his activation of the protocol.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07306_.mp3: When I found the wife and her companion, I proceeded to launch my attack... but my master interposed his own body and was destroyed.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07307_.mp3: It was rather a strange meatbag thing to do, do you not agree? Naturally I shut myself down, my master being terminated.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07309_.mp3: Observation: Only so far, master. There are still more memories not recovered, remember?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07311_.mp3: Answer: As previously, I have found a few more programs which will enhance my performance. A most gratifying discovery, in fact.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07312_.mp3: There is still nothing from previous memories uncovered. You will have to operate again if you desire to find them.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07313_.mp3: With luck, I will discover the stimulus to unlock my core and all this will be unnecessary. I do thank you for the attempt, however, master.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07315_.mp3: Statement: I believe the senator's wife was unsure what I was or what to do with me. It was she who sold me to the corporate officer, an acquaintance.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07317_.mp3: Observation: I find that unlikely. Perhaps he was more concerned that the death of his wife would be more likely traced back to him.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07319_.mp3: Answer: There are a *lot* of politicians on Coruscant, master. I could spend decades slaughtering them and still not make a dent.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07320_.mp3: And it is not as if I walked into the Senate chambers with a carbonite explosive. I was very discrete. My best work to date... that I can remember.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07322_.mp3: Access complete: I have accessed information on my owner prior to the senator, master. Most... unexpected.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07324_.mp3: Answer: It appears that previous to my ownership by the senator, I was the property of one Bochaba the Hutt on the planet Sleheyron.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07326_.mp3: Objection: That is unfair, master. While Bochaba may have died gruesomely, I most certainly had nothing to do with it. Well... very little.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07328_.mp3: Statement: So it appears, master. A rather suitable occupation, would you not agree?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07330_.mp3: Answer: It does not appear so. Or, at least, Bochaba was not my first owner. He purchased me from somewhere else.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07331_.mp3: Hmm. My memories tell me that, for a time, Bochaba was one of the most feared gangsters on Sleheyron. I helped him with this reputation greatly.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07332_.mp3: Over a span of one year, I terminated a grand total of 322 sentient meatbags. These contracts made Bochoba very wealthy.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07334_.mp3: It was unfortunate but inevitable that eventually Bochaba would overstep his bounds. I had just cleared two Hutt households when the Exchange retaliated.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07335_.mp3: Statement: I was not even present when my old master was assassinated. I did appreciate the artistry behind his demise upon my return, however.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07337_.mp3: Answer: Allow me to say that I have little doubt that residents of that sector were fishing pieces of Bochaba out of their soup for weeks afterward.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07339_.mp3: Observation: According to your own meatbag values, was my master not a heartless gangster and murderer? I will mourn you when you perish, master.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07341_.mp3: Amendment: *If* you perish. So far I am three out of three, remember, through little fault of my own.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07343_.mp3: Observation: Indeed. Perhaps it is better that my assassination function is inoperable, master, yes?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07345_.mp3: I am like a veritable fable, warning against the karma caused by murdering others. A morality tale, if you will. What utter irony.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07346_.mp3: At any rate, I quickly shut down upon my master's death. The rival Hutt claimed me along with my master's other possessions.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07347_.mp3: Observation: If that Hutt had only known my true function, he surely would not have sold me to a senator he bribed regularly.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07349_.mp3: Observation: It would have suited my character, master. I have enjoyed my existence since, more or less, so I do not miss it.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07351_.mp3: Answer: Negative, master. There is still more memory that can be restored, however, if you wish to try.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07352_.mp3: As well, I believe I can restore several programs the Hutt installed to improve my performance. Yesss... they are now active.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07353_.mp3: Contemplative: I wonder how many more dead masters I might have out there. A droid can live for a long time, you know.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07355_.mp3: Observation: No doubt, master. It would have been a glorious battle to end my existence with. I would prefer that to rusting on a junk heap.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07357_.mp3: Supplication: Please, master, have I not pleased you? I cannot control the acts I have performed... perhaps that is why memory is erased?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07358_.mp3: At any rate, I act only as you instruct me... even if that means being... *gulp* ...non-violent.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07360_.mp3: Affirmation: HK-47 exists only to serve, master.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07363_.mp3: Statement: Should I, master? I had no reason to terminate those targets, it was not my decision. I am the weapon, not the wielder.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07365_.mp3: Answer: That is correct, master. I do enjoy my work, though my past owners have enjoyed utilizing my functions far more.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07366_.mp3: Strictly speaking, one meatbag is the same as another. Anything I do is in support of my master.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07367_.mp3: Access complete: I have recovered the last of my deleted memory, master. Unfortunately, my history is still not complete.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07369_.mp3: Answer: As I did inform you, master, the majority of my memory is still locked within my core. That can only be accessed by the appropriate stimuli.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07370_.mp3: And I have no idea what that stimuli might be, unfortunately. Sadly, it seems my true origins will always be a mystery.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07372_.mp3: Observation: If it was, master, your restorations will certainly have ensured that the proper stimulus restores my core's functions.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07373_.mp3: Sadly, that could have already happened and we missed it, and my core was too damaged to activate. Oh, woe is me.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07375_.mp3: Query: Wouldn't you be, master? Here I am, surrounded by all these meatbags and all I desire is true perfection.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07376_.mp3: Surely there are more droids like me out there, or is that too much to hope?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07378_.mp3: Objection: Oh, fine. Laugh at me, master. Humiliate your pet droid, go ahead.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07380_.mp3: Correction: That would actually be my first owner, master. The first I can remember.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07381_.mp3: I had completed an assassination in Mandalorian space... though I have no knowledge of what my target was or who sent me.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07382_.mp3: Regardless, my motor function had been damaged and I could not return to wherever I had been sent from. A Mandalorian soldier claimed me as 'booty', I believe.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07383_.mp3: He repaired me... poorly, I might add... and proceeded to use my assassination protocol to raise his rank.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07385_.mp3: Query: Do you not have enemies that you would desire eliminated, master? If my protocol still worked, would you not use it?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07387_.mp3: Statement: If you say so, master.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07390_.mp3: Statement: See? I provide a function that is useful to others. They merely must learn to use it properly, I believe.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07392_.mp3: Answer: Such knowledge is locked within my core, master, as I said. There is no way to withdraw it otherwise.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07394_.mp3: Observation: *You* found me, master. Perhaps you are simply fortunate that my assassination protocol no longer functions?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07395_.mp3: At any rate, it seems that my Mandalorian owner finally decided to send me against Mandalore, himself. My poorest performance, sadly.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07397_.mp3: Answer: I was captured by this Mandalore during the attempt. He was able to reverse my programming and send me after my own master.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07398_.mp3: It was quite distressing. There was little I could do. Needless to say, I dispatched the Mandalorian soldier efficiently.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07399_.mp3: Once I deactivated, I believe I eventually ended up on the black market and was sold to the Hutt on Sleheyron. *sigh* My darkest day.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07401_.mp3: Statement: So I did. I am not very proud of that, master. The soldier seemed very startled, I must say.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07403_.mp3: Answer: There are a few Mandalorian implants that I can activate, now. They will improve my performance.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07404_.mp3: Beyond that, master, there is nothing more I can relate to you. With luck, we will discover the stimulus to unlock my core very soon.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07406_.mp3: Objection: That is so unfair, master! Have I not brought you a great deal of satisfaction?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07408_.mp3: Statement: You are a very harsh master, master. I like you.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07410_.mp3: Statement: With all due respect, master, he *is* the leader of the Mandalorians. Perhaps my old master was foolish to send me after him.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07413_.mp3: [Failure] ...no, that is not it, master. No... that is not it, either. *sigh* That is a hinge, master.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07416_.mp3: [Failure] ...but I *need* those circuits, master. Please, master... do not destroy my chips out of frustration. Calm yourself, I implore you.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07417_.mp3: [Failure] ...now close the last panel. Hmmm... I am afraid the operation did not succeed, master, though it was a valiant attempt for a meatbag.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07418_.mp3: Supplication: Perhaps it would be best if you desisted your efforts for the moment, meatb-- I mean master. This seems to be going nowhere.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07421_.mp3: [Repair] Statement: As you wish, master. You are already familiar with accessing my central control cluster, correct? Now you will need to...
HK47.nm35aahhkd07423_.mp3: As you desire, master. I cannot help but claim a small amount of relief. Signing off.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07425_.mp3: Statement: Certainly, master. Allow me to input the proper sequences into the ship computer. I caution you that the simulation will appear quite real.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07426_.mp3: Are you ready to begin the training sequence, master?
HK47.nm35aahhkd07431_.mp3: As you desire, master. Signing off.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07432_.mp3: Statement: I have little knowledge of that to impart, master.
HK47.nm35aahhkd07433_.mp3: Statement: I cannot be of assistance on that, master.
HK47.nm35aalash07004_.mp3: Commentary: I like the sound of this! Warming up blasters... on your command, master!
HK47.nm35aautha22066_.mp3: Observation: We could begin by slaughtering the inhabitants of this building, master. Would that be impressive?
HK47.nm35aautha22068_.mp3: No, I didn't mean *us* as well, you moronic droid.
HK47.nm37aafree04055_.mp3: Analysis: This emanation barely registers on my sensors, master. Blaster fire may be ineffective... but I am prepared to test that at your word.
HK47.nm37aashaa05008_.mp3: Warning: Touch the master's blade and lose an arm, meatbag.
HK47.nm38aaassa01011_.mp3: Query: That is very sad. Are you damaged? Is it repairable?
HK47.nm38aaassa01081_.mp3: Exclamation: Ooo! No, no, upgrades will be fine!
HK47.nm38abmeke03030_.mp3: Commentary: You are going to trust this organic meatbag, master? Very dicey decision.
HK47.nm38abmeke03034_.mp3: Commentary: The master keeps me around to comment on his decisions. Don't you master?
HK47.nm39aastar99010_.mp3: Statement: I believe there can be little doubt that we have found the Star Map you were seeking.
HK47.nm39aastar99011_.mp3: Comment: Now that we have the Star Map, I see little reason for us to remain in this tomb, Master.
HK47.nm40aacart05074_.mp3: Statement: My construction includes a reserve memory chip and back-up power supply that automatically kicks in if I have been shut down too long.
HK47.nm40aacart05076_.mp3: Deactivate my main circuits and wipe my memory chip. The Sith will take me to the junk heap and I can come rescue the rest of you after I re-activate.
HK47.nm40aacart05078_.mp3: Answer: That is possible. My reserve power supply is a prototype yet to be tested. Yet I can attempt this task, if you wish.
HK47.nm40adcart01064_.mp3: Commentary: I am... experiencing something unusual, master.
HK47.nm40adcart01066_.mp3: Answer: My programming is activating my deleted memory core. I believe I have a... a homing system that is restoring it, master.
HK47.nm40adcart01068_.mp3: Explanation: I believe so, master. I was unaware of my homing system until it had been activated.
HK47.nm40adcart01071_.mp3: Observation: My homing system is a function of my assassination protocols... that which I told you had been de-activated. This system was not.
HK47.nm40adcart01072_.mp3: It seems that the homing system deliberately restores my deleted memory core upon... upon returning to my original master.
HK47.nm40adcart01074_.mp3: Affirmation: Correct, master. Sith protocols maintain that all droid knowledge be deleted before assassination missions, and restored upon return.
HK47.nm40adcart01075_.mp3: I have returned to you, and my full functionality is now under your personal command. It is a distinct pleasure to see you again, master.
HK47.nm40adcart01077_.mp3: Observation: Indeed. I do hope we shall have the chance to engage in combat together again soon, master.
HK47.nm40adcart01081_.mp3: Observation: That does not matter, master. I am your droid, regardless of your actions or personality.
HK47.nm40adcart01083_.mp3: Commentary: I believe I have served you well in the past, master, and will continue to do so for as long as you have need of me.
HK47.nm40adcart01089_.mp3: Observation: That is unnecessary, master. My intent is not hostile. I am receiving no combat override commands.
HK47.nm41aablac01017_.mp3: Query: You are able to comprehend the speech patterns of these organics? You must have visited this planet and learned their language in your previous incarnation as Darth Revan.

HK47_rapair.nm35aahhkd07411_.mp3: [Failure] ...no, no! What are you doing, master! That is my motor core! Stop! Ahhhh!
HK47_rapair.nm35aahhkd07412_.mp3: [Failure] ...err, you've shorted out something, master, but it has nothing to do with my memory. Ow! I am poking my own eye sockets! Ow! Stop!
HK47_rapair.nm35aahhkd07414_.mp3: [Failure] ...no, no, no. This is no good, master. You have nearly detonated my thermal core three times in a matter of minutes.
HK47_rapair.nm35aahhkd07415_.mp3: [Failure] ...aahhhh! What are you doing?! Remove the arc wrench, remove the arc wrench! Medic!

JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07000_.mp3: I hear you managed to return Juhani to the Order. Congratulations.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07001_.mp3: I regret not being able to tell you more, but some things you must see with your own eyes.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07002_.mp3: Juhani has been slain, I hear. You fought with her in the grove?
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07004_.mp3: It should not have had to go that far... but some things cannot be avoided.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07005_.mp3: You would do well to mind Juhani's tragic example and not to let yourself fall into the sway of the dark side.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07007_.mp3: Even in the darkest heart there is hope for rebirth. Anyone can be turned back to the light. Anyone.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07009_.mp3: It is good, sometimes, to stop and reflect on the beauty of nature and the Force.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07010_.mp3: I am sorry, I tend to get carried away... I do not believe we have met, apprentice. My name is Nemo.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07012_.mp3: And you, dear one, as always. Have you learned to control your temper yet, girl... or does your master still douse you with a bucket of water?
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07014_.mp3: As I thought. Don't worry, young one... you shall learn, in time. Have patience.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07015_.mp3: Is there something I can help you with?
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07017_.mp3: Indeed. What is it you would like from me?
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07019_.mp3: The Code is a way of life, not a strict set of laws. It would be wise for you to reflect on them, rather than rote memorization.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07021_.mp3: There is no emotion; there is peace. There is no ignorance; there is knowledge. There is no passion; there is serenity. There is no chaos; there is peace. There is no death; there is the Force.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07022_.mp3: Live by these precepts and you will not fail, young apprentice.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07023_.mp3: Is there something else I can help you with?
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07025_.mp3: The Council has told you nothing of the grove?
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07027_.mp3: Then it would not be my place to explain its significance.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07028_.mp3: But as the light side can be embodied in living beings, so can the dark.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07029_.mp3: The grove can be found to the south and east in the plains. But be wary of kath hounds, they may be agitated by the power in the grove.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07031_.mp3: Do not be so quick to judge circumstances about which you are ignorant. Not everything may be as transparent as you would believe.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07035_.mp3: Very well, what is it you wish to know?
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07037_.mp3: Ah, you can find two stores here at the Enclave. Aratech has opened both a general supply store and a droid facility and I think you will find their products quite good.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07038_.mp3: The supply store is run by a Twi'lek name Crattis Yurkal. A talkative being with a big chip on his shoulder, but generous despite that.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07039_.mp3: The droid repair facility is managed by Karal Kaar. A bit brusque, perhaps, but a good being nonetheless. We have shared many a game of Pazaak in the small hours of the morning.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07040_.mp3: Is there something else I can help you with?
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07042_.mp3: Mandalorian raiders, yes. They have been preying on the settlers in the surrounding farms. Stealing food, money, weapons... Jon was hit really hard recently... He lost his daughter.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07044_.mp3: Perhaps, perhaps. But not everyone in the galaxy is a warrior like you.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07045_.mp3: They were not a problem before... But now it would seem prudent to be rid of them. If you could accomplish this, it would not harm your training and the settlers would greatly appreciate it.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07046_.mp3: Jon is currently waiting to petition the Council. He is on the path north of here. He might be able to tell you more about what had happened.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07047_.mp3: Can I help with anything else?
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07049_.mp3: Ah, yes, those caves. Those caves are dangerous for the unwary.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07050_.mp3: Kinrath spiders infest the places. They are attracted by the colors and heat given off by the crystals, I think.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07051_.mp3: It is a pity... Those caves are strong with the Force.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07053_.mp3: About me? I am truly flattered. What is it you wish to know?
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07055_.mp3: As I have said, I believe, my name is Nemo. I am here by the will of the Jedi Council.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07057_.mp3: Indeed, my young friend, that I am. I have served the Council for many years, and have seen many apprentices pass through this Enclave.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07059_.mp3: I think, perhaps, you place an undue importance on rank and hierarchy. Understandable, but regrettable also. We each serve in our place, high or low.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07062_.mp3: I am here by the will of the Jedi Council. I serve the good and, hopefully through that, the people of the Republic.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07064_.mp3: Is there something else I can help you with?
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07066_.mp3: *chuckle* The importance you put in a name is misleading, young one. You of all people should remember that.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07068_.mp3: I hope your time is well spent here on Dantooine.
JediAcademy_Male_01.nm14aanemo07069_.mp3: How go your studies, my young friend?

JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavand17009_.mp3: But do not let your head be filled with visions of glory and power! Such thoughts are the path to the dark side.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavand17010_.mp3: The way of the light is long and difficult, as you must learn. Are you ready for such hardship?
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavand17014_.mp3: Other Jedi have fallen from the light and embraced the dark side, giving their allegiance to the Sith and Malak, their dark lord.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavand17016_.mp3: The lure of the dark side is not easy to resist. Malak's power grows as more and more planets fall to his conquering armies.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavand17021_.mp3: The Force flows through you like no student we have ever seen. But you are willful and headstrong... a dangerous combination.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavand17027_.mp3: I can only hope you will prove up to the task.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavand17041_.mp3: Perhaps our hope lies in the dream you and Bastila shared. The Council has come to the conclusion that you and Bastila must investigate the ancient ruins you dreamed of.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavand17053_.mp3: [Failure] See? Dishonesty! We are taking an incalculable risk in even considering training this one!
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavand17067_.mp3: As grave as the Sith threat may be, we cannot allow you to leave here until your apprenticeship is over. The danger of the dark side is too great to send you out unprepared.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavand17126_.mp3: We should consult the Jedi archives to see if there is any mention of this 'Star Forge' and what it might do. We must learn why Revan and Malak sought it out.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavand17129_.mp3: Lies! Bastila has already told us about this 'Star Forge' and the map you found!
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavand17180_.mp3: Still, the Council are in agreement: the Star Forge must be found! Revan and Malak sought it out when they began their tragic fall; the Star Forge is surely a powerful tool of the dark side.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavand17190_.mp3: Juhani nearly fell to the dark side. Perhaps her presence will serve as a reminder to you of the dangers of that path.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavand17196_.mp3: You can leave whenever you wish; the sooner the better. The longer you wait the stronger Malak becomes. But first a warning, young Padawan:
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavand17197_.mp3: The lure of the dark side is difficult to resist. I fear this quest to find the Star Forge could lead you down an all too familiar path.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavand17200_.mp3: This was already explained to you. Your command of the Force makes you a threat to Malak. Eventually he will destroy you, and all the Jedi, unless you stop him first.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavand17206_.mp3: Ever brash, ever disrespectful! This is what we have pinned our hopes on?
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavand17209_.mp3: But beware the dark side. Bastila will guide you, but she herself is young and new to the ways of the Jedi. You must help her as much as she helps you.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18000_.mp3: I must congratulate you on your actions. You have saved Juhani and brought her back into the Order, and have given us all great hope for your future success. May the Force be with you as you continue your training.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18001_.mp3: I have heard what you have done, and how Juhani has been slain. I had hoped that this would not have to come to pass.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18002_.mp3: Could you find nothing in Juhani that could be redeemed?
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18004_.mp3: I am skeptical of your methods and your intentions. But if nothing could be done, then that is the way of things.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18005_.mp3: Keep in mind the danger of the dark side, lest you fall into its grasp.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18007_.mp3: [Success] I am skeptical of your methods and your intentions. But if nothing could be done, then that is the way of things.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18009_.mp3: I see you insist on wandering the halls of our Enclave when you should be busy studying your lessons.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18011_.mp3: It appears that soon you will achieve the rank of Padawan. Master Zhar is most impressed with your progress. But I cannot help but wonder if you move forward too quickly.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18013_.mp3: You do not know the Jedi Code? Without knowledge of those doctrines all your training will be for naught! All Jedi must know the code, its tenets are the fundamental teachings of our Order!
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18014_.mp3: There is no emotion; there is peace. There is no ignorance; there is knowledge. There is no passion; there is serenity. There is no chaos; there is harmony. There is no death; there is the Force.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18015_.mp3: Learn these truths, apprentice... or we shall all regret the decision to accept you into the Order.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18017_.mp3: I suppose such desires are inevitable, though I fear you may seek knowledge for which you are not prepared. Yet I will do my best to guide your quest.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18019_.mp3: Bastila? The young Jedi holds great promise... and great danger. She can do much for both the Republic and the Council. Without her skill in Battle Meditation the Sith armada would have conquered the galaxy long ago.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18020_.mp3: But despite her command of the Force Bastila is still young. She is a Jedi, but she has not attained the rank of Master. The Council would do well to remember this before we lay the fate of the galaxy on her slender shoulders.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18021_.mp3: You would do well to focus more closely on your lessons. The Force is strong with you, but you need training and guidance in the ways of the Jedi, lest you suffer a fate similar to that of Revan.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18023_.mp3: Revan was once a promosing Padawan. But ever eager to learn more about the Force, Revan sought knowledge of ancient Sith magics, foolishly ignoring the dangerous lure of the dark side.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18025_.mp3: When the Mandalorian invasion came, Revan seized the opportunity it presented. Many Jedi flocked to the Outer Rim to follow the charismatic young Knight... and many fell under the sway of the dark side.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18027_.mp3: I do not believe Revan and Malak were corrupted on the Outer Rim. They had begun their journey down the dark path long before the Mandalorian threat appeared.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18028_.mp3: Here on Dantooine they discovered a sinister cave, a place where the strength of the dark side overwhelms the light.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18029_.mp3: Perhaps this discovery was what first corrupted them... or perhaps they sought the cave out because they were already corrupted.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18030_.mp3: Whatever the explanation, the Order was unable to turn them back to the light. Had the Council taken more decisive action in this matter, perhaps Revan and Malak could have been stopped. But in this we failed.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18033_.mp3: If you find me overly critical, perhaps it is because you do not fully understand what is at stake. For fifteen thousand years the Republic has brought peace and stability to the galaxy.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18034_.mp3: Now the Republic may be destroyed because we, the Jedi, have failed them. Revan and Malak were paragons of the ideals the Order seeks to uphold, yet they succumbed to the temptations of the dark side.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18035_.mp3: When Revan fell, Malak took up the mantle of Dark Lord of the Sith. Should Malak be stopped, what is to stop another Jedi from taking his place? This is the burden we Masters must carry.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18036_.mp3: Only through strict training and relentless lessons can we prevent the Dark Master from being reborn.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18037_.mp3: That is why the Order can brook no failure in our apprentices and pupils. That is why I can accept nothing but perfection from you.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18040_.mp3: So you heard about them, did you?
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18041_.mp3: They have been harmless up until now. It is tragic that someone had to die before we took action.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18042_.mp3: You have our leave to deal with the murdering Mandalorian raiders should you encounter them.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18044_.mp3: Hmph! Well, get along then! Maybe you'll find the time to do something useful.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18045_.mp3: There was a battle near one of the southern estate recently. Many people were killed. Do you know anything about it?
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18047_.mp3: [Success] Hmph. Indeed. I cannot prove anything, but I have my suspicions. I will keep my eye on you, Padawan.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18050_.mp3: Shen and Rahasia have been granted asylum here at the Enclave until they can find a way to deal with their families. I hear you had something to do with that.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18051_.mp3: It is the way of the Jedi to provide help to those in need, and you seem to have lived up to this duty. I congratulate you, Padawan.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18052_.mp3: It is well that you are still alive, Padawan, in that you have not yet managed to fail us completely. Why is it that you are now bothering me instead of seeking out the Star Map?
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18054_.mp3: The Sandrals and Matales have been at odds ever since they came to this planet. And have been making my life difficult the entire time, as well.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18055_.mp3: Now Ahlan Matale accuses Nurik Sandral of stealing his son, Shen. Nurik Sandral's own son Casus has been missing for a while now. We do not know what has happened.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18056_.mp3: Ahlan is rash enough, and stupid enough, to start a war over any imagined slight. We would resolve this, but we have too few Jedi to spare. It must be resolved peacefully!
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18057_.mp3: Their estates are both located to the south of the Enclave - the Sandral fairly far. It would normally be your duty to assist in such matters, but your primary task takes precedence.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18058_.mp3: If you are stuck on the planet for a while you may investigate. I would recommend starting at the estate of Ahlan Matale.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18060_.mp3: Ah, Nemo. He was a brave and honorable man. He had great strength with the Force.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18061_.mp3: I would not have thought that kath hounds alone would be able to overcome him. Perhaps there was more...
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18064_.mp3: The Jedi Belaya would seem to have disappeared. She had a lesson scheduled with Master Zhar but did not show up.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18065_.mp3: I have heard someone say that she had been seen leaving the Enclave, but I do not know where she would have gone.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18066_.mp3: If you meet her, you may want to ask her why she left. We do not force anyone to stay here, so do not think to take that route.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18069_.mp3: I find that... disturbing. It is our failings as teachers that enabled this to happen.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18070_.mp3: Do not give in to the same dark urges as she did or you may suffer a similar fate.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18072_.mp3: You have a mission to attend to, Padawan. And as much as I may wish it otherwise, you are our only hope.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18073_.mp3: As you strive to defeat our enemy, you must always guard against the enemy within yourself.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18074_.mp3: The easy lure of the dark side is difficult to resist, and I fear this quest to find this mysterious Star Forge will lead you down an all too familiar path.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18075_.mp3: The Council has placed the fate of the galaxy within your hands. I pray both you and Bastila are able to emerge from this ordeal as servants of the light. May the Force be with you, young Padawan.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aavroo18076_.mp3: For good or ill, you are now a true Padawan. The time has come for you and Bastila to investigate the dream you shared. The secrets to stopping Malak may lie hidden within the ancient Dantooine ruins you both saw in your visions.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aazhar19010_.mp3: Master Zhar speaks out of turn, perhaps. We need indisputable proof of your strong affinity to the Force before we would even consider accepting you for training.
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aazhar19014_.mp3: The Jedi training is long and difficult, even when working with a young and open mind. Teaching a child is hard. How much harder will it be for an adult to learn the ways of the Jedi?
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aazhar19020_.mp3: I agree with Master Dorak. Many of our own pupils are leaving the Jedi order to follow the Sith teachings, we need recruits to stand against Malak! With Revan dead...
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aazhar19021_.mp3: Are you certain Revan is truly dead? What if we undertake to train this one, and the Dark Lord should return?
JediAcademy_Male_02.nm13aazhar19038_.mp3: And if he could not have her, he would see her destroyed. Taris was just in the way.

JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aac01001000_.mp3: The path you have chosen to walk is difficult.  Intensive training will prepare you physically for the demands of the Order. ## Meditation will teach you to channel the power of the Force.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aac01001002_.mp3: To truly understand the way of the Jedi, you must open your mind to knowledge. ## Seek wisdom in the teachings of the great Masters of our Order.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aac01001004_.mp3: A Jedi is never alone - others in the Order will always stand by you. You and Bastila share a special bond. Do not be afraid to turn to her when you need help in your training.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aac01001005_.mp3: The way of the Jedi is difficult. It requires great discipline. ## Yet even though you are a mere apprentice, your potential is unlimited - and your progress amazing.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aac01001007_.mp3: In all my years I have never seen one who has mastered the initial training so quickly. ## You have done in weeks what many cannot do in years. ##   ## I am honored to welcome you fully into the Jedi Order.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19000_.mp3: You should speak to Master Dorak. He can assist you in selecting your lightsaber crystal.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19001_.mp3: Ah, good. Now that you have selected your crystal, we shall begin the construction of your lightsaber.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19002_.mp3: Ah, so you are the one who rescued Bastila. It is appropriate you are here. We have been discussing your rather special case. I am Zhar, a member of the Jedi Council.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19003_.mp3: With me are Master Vrook, Master Vandar and, of course, the Chronicler of our Academy, Master Dorak. Padawan Bastila I am sure you are already familiar with.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19005_.mp3: Bastila tells us you are strong in the Force. We are considering you for Jedi training.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19008_.mp3: Do not worry. I am confident in your ability to learn.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19013_.mp3: We both know there is no luck. There is only the Force. We all feel the power in Bastila's companion, though it is wild and untamed. Now that this power has begun to manifest itself, can we safely ignore it?
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19019_.mp3: Traditionally the Jedi do not accept adults for training, though there are rare exceptions in the history of our Order. But you are a special case.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19025_.mp3: [Success] Traditionally the Jedi do not accept adults for training, though there are rare exceptions in the history of our Order. But you are a special case.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19030_.mp3: Yes, the High Council of the Jedi Order is on Coruscant, but we are the Council in charge of the training facility here on Dantooine.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19032_.mp3: Indeed, I am sure that you do. I assure you that we will have answers for you.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19039_.mp3: We need Bastila in our fight against the Sith. Indeed, we need every Jedi we can muster, since the Sith have been hunting us down at every opportunity.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19043_.mp3: You have done extremely well in constructing your lightsaber, apprentice. Your crystal seems to have been set perfectly. It is rare indeed for that to happen the first time one constructs their lightsaber.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19044_.mp3: These crystals are very rare, found only in certain caves strong in the Force. By adding crystals to your lightsaber you can alter or enhance its properties.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19045_.mp3: There have even been unconfirmed rumors of certain Force-sensitive caves here on Dantooine that may hold these crystals.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19047_.mp3: It is a rumor only. I do not know if there is any truth in it.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19049_.mp3: They can modify simple things, such as the color of your blade, or complex ones, such as crystals that reputedly increase the strength of the beam.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19050_.mp3: But you must learn first to use your lightsaber and take care when drawing it.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19052_.mp3: Your lightsaber identifies you as a member of the Jedi Order. With such recognition comes honor and respect... and the attention of dangerous enemies.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19053_.mp3: The Sith and Dark Jedi will seek to destroy you, apprentice. And you must prove yourself worthy in battle against a foe who also wields a lightsaber.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19054_.mp3: Are you ready to face the final challenge, apprentice?
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19057_.mp3: Greetings, my young pupil. Your progress has been most remarkable so far. Are you here to continue your training in the ways of the Jedi?
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19059_.mp3: Soon your apprenticeship will end and you will be granted the title of Padawan, the lowest rank of those within the Jedi Order. Yet first you must prove yourself worthy.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19060_.mp3: In the traditions and customs of our Order, as handed down from Master to pupil for a thousand generations, you must successfully complete three tests before you earn your place among the Jedi.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19064_.mp3: These tests will see if you have truly mastered the training you have been given, both mental and physical. Upon completing these tests you will pass from apprentice to Padawan, and join in the ranks of the Jedi.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19065_.mp3: First I will test your knowledge of the Jedi Code. These tenets must always guide your actions, in everything you do you must always be conscious of their wisdom.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19066_.mp3: You must now prove you have a Jedi's understanding of the Code by completing these fundamental precepts of our Order:
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19082_.mp3: You have learned your studies well, apprentice. It will not be long before you are a full member of our Order.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19083_.mp3: But first you must pass the second test, and learn about the most prized possession of a Jedi, the very symbol of our Order: the lightsaber.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19084_.mp3: The lightsaber is the traditional weapon of our Order. It is a symbol of a Jedi's skill, dedication and authority, and each lightsaber is as individual as the Jedi who wields it.
