JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19085_.mp3: The blade is made of pure energy, focused by polished crystals in the hilt. As the second test, each Jedi must construct her lightsaber with her own hands.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19086_.mp3: The blade is made of pure energy, focused by polished crystals in the hilt. As the second test, each Jedi must construct his lightsaber with his own hands.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19087_.mp3: And now it is your time. Speak with Master Dorak and he will guide you through the choosing of a crystal.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19090_.mp3: That is not correct, apprentice. Perhaps you are not yet ready for this challenge.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19091_.mp3: There is no shame in admitting weakness. Feel free to speak to the other Jedi in the academy if you require assistance. They will gladly share their knowledge with you.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19092_.mp3: Return when you feel you are ready for this challenge. May the Force be with you.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19093_.mp3: For every Jedi the threat of the dark side is always present. You must truly understand this before you are accepted into the Order. You must see the corruption of the dark side for yourself.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19094_.mp3: Even here on Dantooine there are places where the dark side holds sway, twisting and tainting nature itself.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19095_.mp3: The ancient grove once used for deep meditation by the Jedi is now tainted, a wave of darkness perverts the region around it.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19096_.mp3: The kath hounds in the area have become savage and ruthless. They have become a threat to the settlers, a threat the Jedi have promised to stop.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19100_.mp3: The kath hounds are but a symptom of the true problem. You must journey into the grove and confront the true source of the darkness. That is your task.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19103_.mp3: I can say no more; some things you must see for yourself. None of the other Jedi at the academy are permitted to help you in this task.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19104_.mp3: But remember this, my young apprentice: a Jedi acts with patience and care, and those on the dark path are not always lost forever.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19106_.mp3: You have learned much, yet there is much more for you to still understand. The way of the Jedi must be entered into with a clear and focused mind.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19107_.mp3: When you feel you are ready to continue your training, know that you can find me here.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19109_.mp3: Few mention those names around here anymore... but I suppose it is just as dangerous to deny they were ever part of the Order.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19110_.mp3: When I was still on Coruscant Revan and Malak often came to me for additional training. In particular, Revan's hunger to learn seemed insatiable. I should have recognized this as a warning sign.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19111_.mp3: But I perceived the young Padawan's lust for knowledge as simple exuberance and eagerness. Revan was my most promising pupil, one I felt sure would someday become a champion of the Jedi Order.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19113_.mp3: The Jedi Order moved too slowly for Revan and Malak; we were too cautious in their eyes. They always sought to learn far quicker than their Masters felt was prudent.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19114_.mp3: It is one thing to understand a lesson, but to truly comprehend it takes a wisdom that only comes with time.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19115_.mp3: Several years ago, when the Mandalorian threat first arose, Revan and Malak were eager to journey to the Outer Rim to defeat the enemy of the Republic.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19116_.mp3: But the Council felt it best if we moved with care and caution. The true threat, the Council feared, had not yet revealed itself.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19117_.mp3: But Revan would not be dissuaded. Charismatic and powerful, it was inevitable many of the Order would flock to Revan's seemingly noble cause.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19118_.mp3: Malak was the first to join his closest friend. Others soon followed, many of our youngest and brightest, intent on saving the galaxy from the Mandalorian threat.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19121_.mp3: They were foolish to disregard the Council's wishes. I do not know what happened to Revan, Malak and their followers on the farthest reaches of the Outer Rim, but something corrupted them.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19122_.mp3: Their ideals became twisted, their spirits were tainted and they fell to the dark side.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19123_.mp3: There is a lesson in this, a lesson you would do well to take to heart: the dark side can corrupt even the most noble of Jedi.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19127_.mp3: The dark side still taints the ancient grove. Your lessons cannot continue until the spreading corruption of the dark side has been stopped. This is your task, apprentice. May the Force be with you.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19128_.mp3: You have done well, my pupil. The ancient grove has been purified, and Juhani's journey down the dark path has been halted. Because of you she walks once more in the light.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19129_.mp3: But though she was saved, do not dismiss what happened to her. Juhani is both dedicated and true to the ideals of the Order, yet she was still vulnerable to the dark side. As are we all.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19130_.mp3: She struck her master in anger during training, and injured her greatly. But it was Quatra's choice to test Juhani this way, and it seems to have made its point.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19131_.mp3: Juhani has been redeemed, and you have passed your final test.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19132_.mp3: Congratulations, apprentice. Or should I say congratulations, Padawan? You have proven yourself worthy of joining the Jedi. Let me be the first to welcome you as a full-fledged member of our Order!
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19133_.mp3: You have cleansed the grove of its dark taint, but at great cost. Juhani was a most promising student and could one day have been strong in the Force.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19134_.mp3: Do not dismiss what happened to her, however. Juhani was both dedicated and true to the ideals of the Order, yet she was still vulnerable to the lure of the dark side.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19135_.mp3: Keep this in mind always in the future, and do not forsake the path of the light.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19136_.mp3: I have nothing left to teach you, Padawan, though a Jedi is ever learning. Even the Masters know their training is but in its infancy. Now is the time for you to seek wisdom outside the training chambers.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19137_.mp3: The lessons that yet await you are to be found beyond the walls of this academy. You should speak to the Council, Padawan.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19138_.mp3: Now that the first stage of your training is complete I am certain they would be eager to have you aid us in our struggle against Darth Malak and the Sith.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19139_.mp3: I have heard there was some sort of large battle to the south of here between two families of settlers.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19140_.mp3: Apparently both the families were completely killed in the fight, along with their respective droids.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19141_.mp3: I find that most suspicious. Were you not in that area recently?
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19143_.mp3: [Success] Hm, is that so... It is tragic that this had to happen to those families. Their children were in love, I hear.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19144_.mp3: Perhaps it was Mandalorian raiders, or a feud that got out of control. It is tragic, but nothing can be done now that all who were involved are dead.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19145_.mp3: Let this be a lesson against hate and violence: a Jedi must always be wary lest these lead to the dark side.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19148_.mp3: [Success] Perhaps, perhaps. That or a feud that got out of control. It is tragic, but nothing can be done now that all who were involved are dead.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19149_.mp3: Shen Matale and Rahasia Sandral have fled their feuding families and asked for sanctuary here in the Enclave. The Council has granted this request.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19150_.mp3: I have heard that it was by your actions that they managed to escape, and I must congratulate you for avoiding a potentially dangerous situation.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19151_.mp3: May the Force be with you in your quest.
JediAcademy_Male_04.nm13aazhar19231_.mp3: You must prove you have a Jedi's understanding of the Code. Return when you feel you are ready for this challenge.

Joda.nm01aac03001001_.mp3: I have - but never from the Sith. It's almost as if... ## No! Bastila is using her Battle Meditation against us!
Joda.nm01aac03001004_.mp3: Not anymore, Admiral. I sensed something different about Bastila during her transmission, but I thought I was only feeling the evil presence of the Star Forge itself. I see now I was wrong.
Joda.nm01aac03001005_.mp3: Bastila has turned to the dark side, Admiral. ## You have to give the order to retreat!
Joda.nm01aac04001002_.mp3: It is too late to retreat, Admiral. The Sith armada has cut us off. ## There is no escape for us now.
Joda.nm01aac05001003_.mp3: But at what cost, Admiral? Where is the Ebon Hawk and her crew?
Joda.nm13aaahla03001_.mp3: The Council will look into this matter, Mr. Matale. You must be patient. Your accusations have no proof, and we do not want you stirring up trouble with the Sandrals if there is some mistake.
Joda.nm13aaahla03005_.mp3: As dangerous as the threat from Darth Malak and the Sith may be, we Jedi cannot simply abandon our other responsibilities. The Council has promised Alhan Matale we will look into his son's disappearance.
Joda.nm13aaahla03006_.mp3: Should you have time, Padawan, you may want to investigate this matter.
Joda.nm13aaahla03011_.mp3: Your study and training are important, of course. But the Jedi are not a cloistered Order. Our influence and teachings must spread beyond the walls of our Academies.
Joda.nm13aaahla03016_.mp3: These two families have been settled here for some years now...
Joda.nm13aaahla03018_.mp3: Indeed. They have been settled here for some time and feuding ever since.
Joda.nm13aaahla03020_.mp3: I do not know how the original feud started, but they want nothing to do with each other.
Joda.nm13aaahla03021_.mp3: As you may have heard, Ahlan Matale believes that his son, Shen, has been kidnapped by Nurik Sandral.
Joda.nm13aaahla03023_.mp3: Is there anything else you wish to know?
Joda.nm13aaahla03025_.mp3: The Sandral and Matale families are involved.
Joda.nm13aaahla03026_.mp3: The Sandrals live far to the south. The head of that family is Nurik Sandral. He is a stern man, but I believe him fair. Under the present circumstances, though... who knows?
Joda.nm13aaahla03027_.mp3: Ahlan Matale can be much more unstable. He is convinced of his own importance and can be a most... oppressive individual at times. He lives closer to the enclave, but still to the south.
Joda.nm13aaahla03028_.mp3: Is there anything else you wished to know?
Joda.nm13aaahla03030_.mp3: Both families have settled to the south of this enclave. The Matales are the closer of the two.
Joda.nm13aaahla03031_.mp3: Both have similar estates, but Ahlan is much more paranoid about his and guards it quite heavily.
Joda.nm13aaahla03032_.mp3: Is there anything else you wish to know?
Joda.nm13aavand17000_.mp3: Bastila has told us of a most unusual development. She claims you and she have shared a dream, a vision of Malak and Revan in the ancient ruins here on Dantooine.
Joda.nm13aavand17003_.mp3: Bastila has described this shared dream to the Council in great detail. We feel it is more than a dream. It is a vision. The Force is acting through you as it acts through Bastila.
Joda.nm13aavand17006_.mp3: Whatever dangers may lie ahead, we cannot ignore the destiny that has brought you and Bastila here to us. Together.
Joda.nm13aavand17008_.mp3: You and she are linked, as is your fate to hers. Together, you two may be able to stop Darth Malak and the Sith.
Joda.nm13aavand17012_.mp3: Understand that there is little choice in this matter, for you or us. Across the galaxy the numbers of our Order dwindle. We have sent many Jedi in quest of a way to thwart Malak's advance... many have not returned.
Joda.nm13aavand17013_.mp3: The Sith hunt the Jedi down like animals, ambushing and assassinating our brothers wherever they are found. We fear it is only a matter of time until they discover even this hidden refuge.
Joda.nm13aavand17018_.mp3: The Council has decreed that you and Bastila must investigate the ancient ruins you dreamed of... once the Council deems you ready.
Joda.nm13aavand17022_.mp3: Before we send you to investigate the ruins, you must be trained in the ways of the Jedi so that you can resist the darkness within yourself... within all of us. Otherwise you are doomed to fail.
Joda.nm13aavand17024_.mp3: You must learn patience and discipline. The ruins are a place of corruption. The dark side is strong there. We cannot risk sending you there unprepared.
Joda.nm13aavand17029_.mp3: [Success] We must begin your training at once. You have a destiny upon you that you must be prepared to face. The entire fate of the galaxy is upon you.
Joda.nm13aavand17031_.mp3: You have a strong affinity with the Force. With such power comes great responsibility... and danger. You may wish to deny what you are, but the Council cannot turn a blind eye.
Joda.nm13aavand17037_.mp3: [Success] Hm, yes. Your devotion is most commendable.
Joda.nm13aavand17044_.mp3: Good. It is well that you see how important this is and have the devotion to follow it.
Joda.nm13aavand17049_.mp3: She says that she felt your presence within the dream, the presence she has felt within you ever since...
Joda.nm13aavand17051_.mp3: ... ever since Taris. It is not unknown for this to happen between two people strong in the Force.
Joda.nm13aavand17055_.mp3: It is good to see Juhani has returned to the way of the light. You are to be commended for your role in this. Your actions give us great hope for the future.
Joda.nm13aavand17056_.mp3: Go to Master Zhar and inform him that Juhani has returned to us. I think you may be nearing the end of your apprenticeship.
Joda.nm13aavand17057_.mp3: It is most regrettable that Juhani could not be saved. We in the Council had high hopes for her in the future.
Joda.nm13aavand17058_.mp3: In every heart there is some means of redemption. Could you find none in Juhani?
Joda.nm13aavand17060_.mp3: Perhaps that was the case. It is most regrettable, indeed.
Joda.nm13aavand17061_.mp3: Heed her example: all are susceptable to the lure of the dark side. We must always remain vigilant against it.
Joda.nm13aavand17062_.mp3: Go to Master Zhar and inform him that the grove has been cleansed. I think you may be nearing the end of your apprenticeship.
Joda.nm13aavand17064_.mp3: [Success] Perhaps that was the case. It is most regrettable, indeed.
Joda.nm13aavand17066_.mp3: Bastila has told us of your discovery in the ancient ruins. The Council has decided it would be best if you complete your apprenticeship before you embark on any further investigations in this matter.
Joda.nm13aavand17068_.mp3: Master Zhar feels you are ready to begin the final tests of your apprenticeship. Return to us when you have completed your training.
Joda.nm13aavand17069_.mp3: Good evening, apprentice. I trust your training goes well?
Joda.nm13aavand17071_.mp3: I have faith that you will achieve the rank of Padawan soon. Master Zhar is most impressed with your progress. May the Force be with you, apprentice.
Joda.nm13aavand17073_.mp3: All Jedi must know the code, its tenets are the fundamental teachings of our Order. Think and meditate on these truths, apprentice:
Joda.nm13aavand17074_.mp3: There is no emotion; there is peace. There is no ignorance; there is knowledge. There is no passion; there is serenity. There is no chaos; there is harmony. There is no death; there is the Force.
Joda.nm13aavand17076_.mp3: A Jedi must ever be seeking knowledge. What is it you wish to know?
Joda.nm13aavand17078_.mp3: Bastila will be a great Jedi someday. Even among the Masters and the Council it is rare to find one so skilled in the art of Battle Meditation.
Joda.nm13aavand17079_.mp3: Bastila was there when Revan was slain. Did you know that?
Joda.nm13aavand17081_.mp3: Bastila herself does not like to talk about it. She was accompanying the strike team that confronted Revan when the Dark Lord was destroyed. Her role in the death of such a promising young Jedi as Revan upset her greatly.
Joda.nm13aavand17082_.mp3: But Bastila knew she had to set her personal feelings aside for the sake of the galaxy and the Republic. The Force is strong with her now, and without her skill in Battle Meditation we would have lost this war long ago.
Joda.nm13aavand17083_.mp3: The way ahead will be difficult for young Bastila... and for you. But you must draw strength from each other. May the Force be with you.
Joda.nm13aavand17084_.mp3: Is there anything else you would like to know?
Joda.nm13aavand17088_.mp3: I knew Revan as a promising young pupil. Revan was strong in the Force, but also headstrong and proud. Such traits are not unusual in a Padawan. Perhaps that was why I did not see the true extent of the danger.
Joda.nm13aavand17089_.mp3: Many of the young Jedi admired Revan, including Malak. When Revan set off to challenge the Mandalorians, Malak was the first to join the cause.
Joda.nm13aavand17091_.mp3: And when Revan fell to the dark side it was inevitable Malak would fall as well.
Joda.nm13aavand17093_.mp3: Revan was always the leader, the more powerful of the pair. When Revan fell we had hoped the Sith threat was ended. But Malak quickly assumed Revan's role, and has embraced the dark side power as fully as his old master ever did.
Joda.nm13aavand17094_.mp3: Now Malak leads the Sith armada against the Republic. Hate and vengeance for his master's death draw Malak ever further down the path of the dark side, fueling his powers until they surpass those of his old master.
Joda.nm13aavand17095_.mp3: Only you and Bastila together can stop Malak now.
Joda.nm13aavand17099_.mp3: Master Vrook may seem harsh and critical, but he understands the dangers that lie in your path. He wants you and Bastila to be fully prepared when you finally face Lord Malak.
Joda.nm13aavand17101_.mp3: The Mandalorians have not hurt anyone before now. We thought they would keep their activities down with our presence here.
Joda.nm13aavand17102_.mp3: But it seems we were tragically wrong...
Joda.nm13aavand17103_.mp3: You may deal with the Mandalorian raiders should you meet them. It might be good training to test your fighting skills this way.
Joda.nm13aavand17106_.mp3: Very well. May the Force be with you.
Joda.nm13aavand17107_.mp3: There has been a report of a terrible battle near the Sandral estate to the south of the Enclave. Apparently a large force of droids attacked the estate.
Joda.nm13aavand17108_.mp3: The defending droids returned in kind. The attacking family was apparently the Matale family launching an attack on the Sandral estate.
Joda.nm13aavand17109_.mp3: Both entire families were slain, including the boy Shen who had been reported missing.
Joda.nm13aavand17110_.mp3: There was a mention that someone noticed one or more other persons leaving the battle area after the conflict had finished. You were in that area, were you not? Did you see something?
Joda.nm13aavand17112_.mp3: [Success] Is that so... I cannot find fault with your statement, but something in your manner is odd. But no matter, more pressing things are at hand.
Joda.nm13aavand17113_.mp3: You must always remember the destruction and chaos that the dark side can reap, and avoid it at all costs.
Joda.nm13aavand17116_.mp3: We have heard that there was a close confrontation between the Sandral and Matale families by one of the southern estates earlier. We also heard that it was by your actions that direct conflict was avoided.
Joda.nm13aavand17117_.mp3: It is good to hear that you have learned the lessons of the Jedi Order well enough to avoid conflict when necessary.
Joda.nm13aavand17118_.mp3: Rahasia Sandral and Shen Matale have come here seeking shelter against their families. The Council has decided to give it to them.
Joda.nm13aavand17119_.mp3: Their love for each other was being denied by overly possessive parents and we learned that it was only by your intervention that they managed to escape here.
Joda.nm13aavand17120_.mp3: While it is regrettable that the fences between the families were not repaired, it is good that these two young lovers can live their lives free of oppression.
Joda.nm13aavand17121_.mp3: I have heard that the Sandrals and Matales have agreed to cooperation in the construction of a new estate to house their children. Apparently a son of one family and the daughter of the other are getting married.
Joda.nm13aavand17122_.mp3: I also I hear that we have you to thank for this happy occurrence. I am glad that you are using the authority our Order wields to achieve some measure of good.
Joda.nm13aavand17123_.mp3: Ah, you have returned, young Padawan. Have you discovered what it was that Revan and Malak sought in those ruins?
Joda.nm13aavand17125_.mp3: This news of a Star Forge is disturbing. Action is required, but we must not do so in haste. We must discuss recent events in light of this new information.
Joda.nm13aavand17127_.mp3: Return to your ship with Bastila and we will summon you when we are done.
Joda.nm13aavand17130_.mp3: Peace, Master Vrook. I'm certain the Padawan only meant they had not found anything beyond what Bastila would surely have told us.
Joda.nm13aavand17131_.mp3: Your training is now complete, young Padawan. And perhaps now it is time we dealt with the matter of the dream you and Bastila shared.
Joda.nm13aavand17132_.mp3: When we heard of the ruins in your dreams, Master Dorak recognized it as one of a series of ancient structures here on Dantooine. This one in particular lies to the east of this Enclave.
Joda.nm13aavand17133_.mp3: We sent a Jedi to investigate... but he has not returned. Perhaps sending him in the first place was a mistake.
Joda.nm13aavand17134_.mp3: The Force is guiding you through your visions; it may be that exploring the ruins is a task tied to your destiny. That is why the Council has now decided you should be the one to investigate this.
Joda.nm13aavand17135_.mp3: The secrets to stopping Malak may be hidden within those ruins. You must investigate them and find what Revan and Malak were looking for.
Joda.nm13aavand17137_.mp3: A Jedi must ever be seeking knowledge. What is it you wish to know?
Joda.nm13aavand17139_.mp3: Bastila will be a great Jedi someday. Even among the Masters and the Council it is rare to find one so skilled in the art of Battle Meditation.
Joda.nm13aavand17140_.mp3: Bastila was there when Revan was slain. Did you know that?
Joda.nm13aavand17142_.mp3: Bastila herself does not like to talk about it. She was accompanying the strike team that confronted Revan when the Dark Lord was destroyed. Her role in the death of such a promising young Jedi as Revan upset her greatly.
Joda.nm13aavand17143_.mp3: But Bastila knew she had to set her personal feelings aside for the sake of the galaxy and the Republic. The Force is strong with her now, and without her skill in Battle Meditation we would have lost this war long ago.
Joda.nm13aavand17144_.mp3: The way ahead will be difficult for young Bastila... and for you. But you must draw strength from each other. May the Force be with you.
Joda.nm13aavand17148_.mp3: I knew Revan as a promising young pupil. Revan was strong in the Force, but also headstrong and proud. Such traits are not unusual in a Padawan. Perhaps that was why I did not see the true extent of the danger.
Joda.nm13aavand17149_.mp3: Many of the young Jedi admired Revan, including Malak. When Revan set off to challenge the Mandalorians, Malak was the first to join the cause.
Joda.nm13aavand17150_.mp3: And when Revan fell to the dark side it was inevitable Malak would fall as well.
Joda.nm13aavand17152_.mp3: Revan was always the more powerful of the pair. When Revan fell we had hoped the Sith threat was ended. But Malak quickly assumed Revan's role and embraced the dark side as fully as his Master ever had.
Joda.nm13aavand17153_.mp3: You should speak to Master Dorak after this council. As Chronicler of this Academy, he can give you more details of these events. But we must concern ourselves with the present.
Joda.nm13aavand17154_.mp3: Now Malak leads the Sith armada against the Republic, hate and vengeance drawing him ever further down the dark path, fueling his powers until they have surpassed those of his old Master.
Joda.nm13aavand17155_.mp3: Only you and Bastila together can stop Malak now.
Joda.nm13aavand17159_.mp3: Master Vrook may seem harsh and critical, but he understands the dangers that lie in your path. He wants you and Bastila to be fully prepared when you finally face Lord Malak.
Joda.nm13aavand17161_.mp3: If Shen Matale is not returned to his father it may ignite a savage and bloody feud between the Matale and Sandral estates. We must not allow that to happen.
Joda.nm13aavand17162_.mp3: You should ask Master Vrook about that, Padawan. He is in charge of our relations with the settlers.
Joda.nm13aavand17163_.mp3: The way ahead will be difficult for young Bastila... and for you. You must draw strength from each other. May the Force be with you.
Joda.nm13aavand17165_.mp3: We do not know. She was training here until your unfortunate incident with Juhani, then she simply disappeared...
Joda.nm13aavand17166_.mp3: We would like any word of her you may bring. I do not believe she has died, or fallen prey to beasts, but I worry that she may have done something rash.
Joda.nm13aavand17167_.mp3: She had always been close to Juhani, and her death may have hit Belaya... hard.
Joda.nm13aavand17168_.mp3: Is there anything else you wish to ask?
Joda.nm13aavand17170_.mp3: Be sure to bring Bastila with you. There is a powerful link between you, and you will need to draw strength from each other during the trials ahead.
Joda.nm13aavand17172_.mp3: We do not know. That is one of the things you must investigate. We... fear the worst.
Joda.nm13aavand17173_.mp3: Is there anything else you want to know?
Joda.nm13aavand17175_.mp3: That is most... unfortunate. She was always a model student and most eager to learn. I grieve that she had fallen to her passions.
Joda.nm13aavand17176_.mp3: Remember her example as well as that of Juhani: the dark side is not an enemy to be taken lightly.
Joda.nm13aavand17177_.mp3: Padawan, you have done well in discovering the Star Map hidden within the ancient ruins. But there is more you must do in the battle against Malak and the Sith.
Joda.nm13aavand17178_.mp3: We Jedi know victory over the Sith will not come through martial might. The Council has a mission for you, Padawan.
Joda.nm13aavand17181_.mp3: The Star Map in the ruins showed you four planets, but it was incomplete. It did not show the location of the Star Forge itself. We believe there may be similar Star Maps on other planets.
Joda.nm13aavand17182_.mp3: Each Star Map is likely a small piece of a larger puzzle. Find the Star Maps on Kashyyyk, Tatooine, Manaan and Korriban and we believe they will lead you to the Star Forge.
Joda.nm13aavand17184_.mp3: The Jedi numbers have been ravaged by this war, by defections to Malak's cause and by Sith assassins. But we realize the importance of this mission.
Joda.nm13aavand17185_.mp3: Yet if we sent a company of Jedi Knights with you we would surely draw the full attention of Malak and the Sith, dooming your efforts to failure.
Joda.nm13aavand17187_.mp3: Secrecy is our best defense against the Sith, but it would be foolish to send you on this quest without someone to aid you, young Padawan.
Joda.nm13aavand17188_.mp3: Bastila will accompany you, for there is a powerful connection between you two... a connection that might be the key to unraveling the mysteries uncovered by Revan.
Joda.nm13aavand17189_.mp3: And Juhani has also asked to accompany you. After long deliberation we have granted her request.
Joda.nm13aavand17192_.mp3: Of course those who aided you on Taris will also come; they possess skills you may find useful in your quest. Remember that secrecy and discretion are paramount to your success.
Joda.nm13aavand17193_.mp3: You will not be able to hide the fact that you are Jedi, nor should you. But the true nature of your mission must not reach Malak's ears.
Joda.nm13aavand17194_.mp3: You may return here at any time. Dantooine will be a sanctuary for you, a safe haven. Here you can find supplies and whatever advice or other aid we may give you.
Joda.nm13aavand17202_.mp3: Keep the example of Juhani fresh in your mind. You may need a reminder of the dangers of the path that leads to the dark side.
Joda.nm13aavand17207_.mp3: Peace, Vrook. We have discussed this; there is no other choice.
Joda.nm13aavand17208_.mp3: You must not fail in your mission. Find the Star Maps that lead to the Star Forge. This is the only way to stop Malak and his Sith followers. You and Bastila are the galaxy's last, desperate hope.
Joda.nm13aavand17210_.mp3: The fate of the galaxy is in your hands, young Padawan. We pray you are up to the challenge.
Joda.nm13aavand17211_.mp3: May the Force be with you.
Joda.nm13aavand17212_.mp3: You must not fail in your mission, young Padawan. Find the Star Maps that lead to the Star Forge. This is the only way to stop Malak and his Sith followers.
Joda.nm13aavand17213_.mp3: You and Bastila are the galaxy's last, desperate hope. May the Force be with you in this quest.
Joda.nm13aazhar19017_.mp3: Such pride! Such arrogance! Ach. This one is already on the path to the dark side!
Joda.nm13aazhar19018_.mp3: As are many who are not given proper training, Master Vrook. Only through our guidance can we hope to lead those who have strayed back to the path of the light.
Joda.nm13aazhar19022_.mp3: We should discuss this matter more fully in private. Bastila, you and your companion must go. This is a matter for the Council alone.
Joda.nm13aazhar19036_.mp3: Darth Malak seeks to destroy the Jedi Order. Our most effective weapon, perhaps our only hope, is Bastila's skill with Battle Meditation.
Joda.nm13aazhar19037_.mp3: With this power she can swing the tide of nearly any battle in our favor. Which is why Malak was seeking her so fervently.
Joda.nstn57c01001004_.mp3: On behalf of the Jedi Council, defenders of the galaxy and sworn protectors of the Republic... ## I too would like to honor you for your actions. ##   ## We Jedi now have another tale to weave... ## into the grand history of our eternal Order - the Redemption... ## of Revan, the prodigal knight.
Joda.nstn57c01001009_.mp3: Wherever you go you will be recognized as the saviors of the galaxy. The heroes of our age.  But you must remain ever vigilant. ## For one day you may be called upon yet again to defend the glory of the Republic...  ## against the tyranny... ## of the dark side, ## for this... ## is the destiny... ## of the Jedi.

JodaGirl.nm01aac02001000_.mp3: There - a break in the Sith formations! Green squadron, move in!
JodaGirl.nm01aac03001000_.mp3: The tide of the battle is turning against us. The entire Sith fleet reacts instantly to our every strategy. Every fighter and capital ship attack in perfect unison. I've never seen such military precision!
JodaGirl.nm01aac03001003_.mp3: What? Impossible! She's on our side!
JodaGirl.nm01aac03001007_.mp3: I can't do that. This might be our only chance to destroy the Star Forge - we can't withdraw. We can't.
JodaGirl.nm01aac04001000_.mp3: We've lost another capital ship - it's hopeless! ## All Republic forces pull back! Pull back!
JodaGirl.nm01aac05001001_.mp3: Everyone pull back - I don't want to lose any ships when that space station goes down!
JodaGirl.nm01aac05001002_.mp3: We did it, Vandar - the Sith are routed and the Star Forge destroyed!
JodaGirl.nstn57c01001000_.mp3: You have defeated Malak, destroyed the Star Forge and broken the spirit of the Sith! ## For this I am proud to present you each with the Cross of Glory. ## The highest honor the Republic can bestow.
JodaGirl.nstn57c01001014_.mp3: From Coruscant to the farthest reaches of the Outer Rims you will be known as the saviors of the Republic!

JodaGirl_Radio.nm12aac05001001_.mp3: This is Admiral Forn Dodonna to the Ebon Hawk, do you read us?
JodaGirl_Radio.nm12aac05001003_.mp3: Carth, I'm glad to see you're still alive. We've begun our assault on the Star Forge, but we're taking heavy losses. How did the Sith ever manage to build something of this scope!
JodaGirl_Radio.nm12aac05001005_.mp3: Maybe we should pull the fleet back and retreat. I don't know if we have the firepower to go up against this alien technology.
JodaGirl_Radio.nm12aac05001008_.mp3: Then I guess we have no choice.  But it isn't going to be easy. ## I can't even get our capital ships into position to start bombarding the Star Forge. ## The Sith fleet is too well organized.  It's like they can guess our every move and counter our every strategy.
JodaGirl_Radio.nm12aac05001014_.mp3: This is Master Vandar. A number of Jedi Knights have joined our fleet under his command.
JodaGirl_Radio.nm12aac05001016_.mp3: How can we do that if she's on the space station?
JodaGirl_Radio.nm12aac05001020_.mp3: I hate to ask you this after all you've done, Carth, but the Jedi may need all the help they can get...
JodaGirl_Radio.nm12aac06001002_.mp3: This is Admiral Forn Dodonna to the Ebon Hawk, do you read us?
JodaGirl_Radio.nm12aac06001004_.mp3: It is good to hear your voice Bastila.  We had thought you were lost to us.  Carth's transmission reported that Malak had taken you prisoner.
JodaGirl_Radio.nm12aac06001006_.mp3: His loss is a great blow to the Republic.  We could have used him in this battle.
JodaGirl_Radio.nm12aac06001007_.mp3: We were about to pull back.
JodaGirl_Radio.nm12aac06001008_.mp3: We're taking heavy losses against the Star Forge.
JodaGirl_Radio.nm12aac06001010_.mp3: I'll try to press the attack but we can't hold out much longer.  Not unless you can use your Battle Meditation to turn the tide.
JodaGirl_Radio.nm12aac06001011_.mp3: This is Master Vandar.  A number of Jedi Knights have joined the fleet, under his command.
JodaGirl_Radio.nm12aac06001016_.mp3: I'll order the fleet to press the attack and provide some cover for your fighters.  But what of Bastila and her Battle Meditation?

Joda_Radio.nm01aac05001000_.mp3: Admiral Dodonna - we've hit their main orbital stabilizers!
Joda_Radio.nm12aac05001015_.mp3: If Bastila is using her power to augment the Sith then Malak's fleet is invincible. Our only hope is to somehow stop Bastila from using her Battle Meditation.
Joda_Radio.nm12aac05001017_.mp3: I will send a squadron of Jedi Knights to the Star Forge to find Bastila. Their small ships will be able to fly through the Sith blockade and dock on the space station.
Joda_Radio.nm12aac05001018_.mp3: If they can find Bastila, they may be able to distract her attention from the battle overhead. ## That should allow you to move your capital ships into postion for a final assault on the Star Forge itself.
Joda_Radio.nm12aac05001022_.mp3: And may the Force be with you.
Joda_Radio.nm12aac06001012_.mp3: Bastila's power could help you win this battle, Admiral, but it will mean nothing if Malak escapes.  Destroying the Star Forge is secondary to stopping the Sith threat once and for all.
Joda_Radio.nm12aac06001014_.mp3: A small squadron of Jedi Knights in snub fighters could penetrate the Sith blockade and dock on the space station.  If they can find Malak we can end the threat of the Sith ## ...forever.
Joda_Radio.nm12aac06001017_.mp3: Bastila, you and... the Padawan... should join us.  We will need the combined strength of our entire Order to defeat Malak.
Joda_Radio.nm12aac06001019_.mp3: And may the Force be with you.

Juhani.nglobehxor15002_.mp3: I have as much right to be here as you do, SIR!
Juhani.nglobehxor15007_.mp3: Wha... What do you know about my world?
Juhani.nglobehxor15031_.mp3: WHAT DID YOU DO ON TARIS, YOU SCUM?!
Juhani.nglobehxor15051_.mp3: NO, I WILL NOT BE SOLD!
Juhani.nglobehxor15053_.mp3: And I will see you dead for what you have done to my people!
Juhani.nglobehxor15057_.mp3: I... I will remain calm. I am a Jedi now.
Juhani.nglobehxor15059_.mp3: My lust for vegeance must be curbed.
Juhani.nglobehxor15069_.mp3: Yes, we.... NO! I must not fall prey to the dark side again.
Juhani.nglobehxor15103_.mp3: I will not give him the satisfaction of seeing me give in to the dark side.
Juhani.nglobehxor15106_.mp3: No! I cannot give in to my anger. I will not give him the satisfaction of making me that way.
Juhani.nglobehxor15114_.mp3: No, I will not give in to him.
Juhani.nglobehxor15122_.mp3: You... You killed my father, you killed my people, you treat us like animals... You deserve to die!
Juhani.nglobehxor15128_.mp3: I... Help me, please! Do not let me give in to my anger again!
Juhani.nglobehxor15135_.mp3: No, I will not do this. He may die, but it will not be out of my vengeance.
Juhani.nglobehxor15140_.mp3: You... You will die for what you have done!
Juhani.nglobehxor15149_.mp3: He may not, but I will make him pay with what little time he has left! I will make him tell me what he has done to my people!
Juhani.nglobejuha11851_.mp3: A Jedi should not use the Force for personal gain. We are better than that.
Juhani.nglobejuha11852_.mp3: The dark side dwells in us all, but you cannot give in to your baser instincts like this!
Juhani.nglobejuha11853_.mp3: *whisper* You should treat your power with respect, not use the Force on a whim like it is some toy![R1]
Juhani.nm05aajuha11590a.mp3: I... I idolized her and the stories they told of her. She was everything that I had dreamed a Jedi could be. I still believe she was that way.
Juhani.nm13aacrat07090_.mp3: How dare you make such an offer! This is an insult to everything the Jedi stand for!
Juhani.nm13aajuha11000_.mp3: I must give you my thanks. Because of you, I am once again welcome within the Jedi Order.
Juhani.nm13aajuha11002_.mp3: I have spoken to the Council, and they have helped me see the truth. The truth about myself, and the truth of my actions.
Juhani.nm13aajuha11005_.mp3: Quatra's injuries were not so severe as I first believed. I was foolish to believe I could harm a Master such as she with my... my clumsy efforts.
Juhani.nm13aajuha11007_.mp3: The fierce confrontation between us was nothing more than a part of my training. Quatra wanted me to understand the threat of the dark side, to see how easy it was to fall from the path of light.
Juhani.nm13aajuha11009_.mp3: After our last battle, Quatra had nothing left to teach me. I needed time alone to explore the turmoil of my own spirit. Only then was I ready to follow a guide - you - back to the light.
Juhani.nm13aajuha11011_.mp3: When I left, Quatra knew her work with me was done. There are other disciples who need training throughout the galaxy, and she could not stay to see if I passed this most difficult trial.
Juhani.nm13aajuha11013_.mp3: With your help, I have passed this difficult trial. The Council now feels I am ready to continue with my training, though they have asked me to wait here for the time being.
Juhani.nm13aajuha11016_.mp3: Quatra's methods may seem strange, but I trust her wisdom. This lesson has been difficult, but I am better because of it. Humility is never easy to teach, but now I truly understand my own limitations.
Juhani.nm13aajuha11023_.mp3: I do not know what the Council has in store for me, but I will trust in the Force and the way of the Jedi to help me through whatever is to come.
Juhani.nm13aavand17309_.mp3: *whisper* It is obvious Master Vandar senses something is amiss in your tale. Yet he chooses to believe you, and I will not question the wisdom of a Jedi Master.
Juhani.nm14abahla01037_.mp3: You must not give in to your baser desires. The lure of the dark side is strong.
Juhani.nm14acbolo01021_.mp3: You should try to remain objective in this.
Juhani.nm14acbolo01092_.mp3: You should try to remain objective in this.
Juhani.nm14acbolo01105_.mp3: You should try to remain objective in this.
Juhani.nm14acbolo01151_.mp3: You should try to remain objective in this.
Juhani.nm14acbolo01360_.mp3: We should assist Jedi Bolook as best we can.
Juhani.nm14achand05078_.mp3: She may have had her reasons, Mandalorian!
Juhani.nm14acjuha07000_.mp3: You... you are strong. Stronger than me, even in my darkness.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07002_.mp3: I am Juhani, and this is my grove. This is the place of my dark power.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07003_.mp3: This is the place you have invaded. When I embraced the dark side, this was where I sought my solace. It is MINE!
Juhani.nm14acjuha07005_.mp3: When I slew my Master, Quatra, I knew I could never go back. And now I revel in my dark power.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07006_.mp3: Power enough to crush the life from someone such as you... or so I had thought...
Juhani.nm14acjuha07010_.mp3: Yes, I struck her down in the middle of training, consumed by my anger, embracing the power of hate!
Juhani.nm14acjuha07015_.mp3: A better Jedi than you will ever be. More powerful as well, for I could best MY teacher.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07017_.mp3: Yes... Aren't they pretty? My pets...
Juhani.nm14acjuha07018_.mp3: They like the smell of power I exude. They know their master.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07019_.mp3: I harnessed true power when I struck down my Master, Quatra.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07024_.mp3: I, Juhani, shall be your death!
Juhani.nm14acjuha07025_.mp3: I do not know what to do. Now that I have caused such suffering to my Master and those around me...
Juhani.nm14acjuha07026_.mp3: How can I ever face the Council now with what I have done? It is hopeless! It could not be possible that they would accept me back...
Juhani.nm14acjuha07027_.mp3: *sigh* What is it you want? Why do you bother me?
Juhani.nm14acjuha07029_.mp3: The Council has sent you here to kill me? Why, then, when you bested me so easily, did you not simply finish your task? Is it not apparent that I can never be saved?
Juhani.nm14acjuha07032_.mp3: I am pathetic. I sit here and think myself to be great by embracing the dark side, but I am nothing! There is no way I could be turned back!
Juhani.nm14acjuha07033_.mp3: I always thought they held me back, were jealous of my power. But it is only because I was not good enough to meet their standards... I never have been.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07035_.mp3: [Success] I thank you for your kind words, Jedi.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07036_.mp3: You seem to know just what affects me...
Juhani.nm14acjuha07037_.mp3: I seem to still have much to learn... Both about being a Jedi, and about myself.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07038_.mp3: But I wish the cost of my ignorance had not been so high. I wish that my Master had not suffered because of me.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07040_.mp3: [Success] I only wish things could have been different...
Juhani.nm14acjuha07041_.mp3: If she were alive now, there would be so much I would say to her... So much I would apologize for.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07042_.mp3: I think, in my own way, I truly loved her...
Juhani.nm14acjuha07043_.mp3: Oh, how can the Council ever take me back with what I have done? Striking my Master down in anger is unforgivable!
Juhani.nm14acjuha07045_.mp3: [Success] I should convince them that I am truly repentant, that I am willing to forsake the dark side.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07046_.mp3: Maybe, just maybe, they would accept me back.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07047_.mp3: Do you think they would? Could it be possible after what I have done?
Juhani.nm14acjuha07049_.mp3: [Success] I... I thank you, master Jedi.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07050_.mp3: I will return to the Council, then. I shall submit myself to their judgment, and hope that they will forgive me.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07051_.mp3: If only there was some way I could make this up to you...
Juhani.nm14acjuha07052_.mp3: Again, I thank you. I am sure I will hear great things about you in the future.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07056_.mp3: I... I thank you, master Jedi.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07059_.mp3: [Failure] The Council may forgive a lot... But not this.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07061_.mp3: If I show them I am free of passion... That I am serene... That I am willing to forsake the dark side.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07063_.mp3: The Council may forgive a lot... But not this.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07064_.mp3: I am lost! Even though I would repent, there is nowhere left for me to go!
Juhani.nm14acjuha07067_.mp3: You... You monster! To mock my grief that way!
Juhani.nm14acjuha07068_.mp3: Leave me at once, lest I strike you down!
Juhani.nm14acjuha07070_.mp3: And denied! No, I cannot! And so here I will stay.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07074_.mp3: But learning does not have to end in death!
Juhani.nm14acjuha07076_.mp3: She knew I would be headstrong, but she also thought I would adhere to the light!
Juhani.nm14acjuha07077_.mp3: Instead, I betrayed her trust and fell prey to my own inner darkness.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07079_.mp3: Life is suffering, yes... but it was by my conscious choice!
Juhani.nm14acjuha07080_.mp3: It was I who hurt her, I who killed her! Her suffering is my fault alone!
Juhani.nm14acjuha07083_.mp3: What? No! I will not let you take me now!
Juhani.nm14acjuha07084_.mp3: [Failure] You think compliments will convince me I didn't kill my master? Leave me to my agony!
Juhani.nm14acjuha07086_.mp3: Why? Because I am right, that's why! I can see the truth in your eyes as well!
Juhani.nm14acjuha07087_.mp3: Do not look at me again!
Juhani.nm14acjuha07089_.mp3: They came to me! They sought me out! So it is their failure that I have fallen.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07090_.mp3: Come back when you have something more meaningful to say.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07092_.mp3: What?? What foolishness is this? Standards are MADE to apply to everyone.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07093_.mp3: And if I cannot measure up to them... Well then, I am no one at all...
Juhani.nm14acjuha07096a.mp3: [Failure] Lies! Leave me and come back when you are man enough to carry out your task!
Juhani.nm14acjuha07097_.mp3: [Failure] Lies! Leave me and come back when you have the courage to finish your task!
Juhani.nm14acjuha07100_.mp3: Not anger, peace... Yet even with your naive attitude you managed to beat me.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07102_.mp3: Thinking of using technicalities to do the deed and ease your conscience?
Juhani.nm14acjuha07105_.mp3: Talk?! You who have beaten me so easily just want to talk? I do not believe it. Kill me now, while you still have the power.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07107_.mp3: I have fallen and dark power courses through my veins. I can never go back to the Council, so here I shall stay.
Juhani.nm14acjuha07110_.mp3: Flee back to your masters, Jedi.
Juhani.nm14adcuts02363_.mp3: This doesn't have to end in violence! Don't give in to your bloodlust!
Juhani.nm16aanuri01010_.mp3: For once I will have to agree with the Mandalorian...
Juhani.nm16aaraha02012_.mp3: We should inform the Jedi Council of this crime.
Juhani.nm17aa03sh01063_.mp3: You should not act this way. You are treading a dangerous path I fear.
Juhani.nm17aa03sh01167_.mp3: This is how we Jedi should always act: with honor.
Juhani.nm17aa05me02071_.mp3: You are a representative of the Jedi Order. When you behave this way you disgrace us all!
Juhani.nm17aaiziz99153_.mp3: I do not approve of this. This is not how a Jedi should behave.
Juhani.nm17ae04ga03065_.mp3: This is hardly becoming for a Jedi.
Juhani.nm17ae04ni04028_.mp3: You should not force someone to do what they don't want.
Juhani.nm17ag10cz01174_.mp3: *whisper* A Jedi shoud not use the Force to acquire credits - even if we are taking them from a corrupt corporation like Czerka.
Juhani.nm18ackoma99131_.mp3: After all this hunter has done to help us, you turn on him? This is a disgusting display, even for you!
Juhani.nm18ackoma99134_.mp3: This betrayal is beneath you. Do not let your greed draw you to the dark side.
Juhani.nm18acstar99003_.mp3: The Star Map is an artifact of the dark side. The krayt dragon may have been drawn here by its dark power, only to be enslaved by it.
Juhani.nm18acstar99004_.mp3: Come. We should leave this place. There is nothing else for us here.
Juhani.nm18acstar99013_.mp3: The Star Map. Even after all thousands of years it has been here,  it still has tremendous power. Can you not feel it?
Juhani.nm22aadaso07058_.mp3: You have taken a good and honest man and twisted him into a bitter, hateful creature. You must be so proud of yourself.
Juhani.nm22aaelix08043_.mp3: It is difficult indeed to deal with those you oppress and enslave.
Juhani.nm22aajano06058_.mp3: [Force Persuade] You wish to tell us more about this agreement with the Wookiee leadership.
Juhani.nm22aajano06094_.mp3: Slavery under any guise should not be tolerated!
Juhani.nm22aazaal01053_.mp3: It is always good to know as much as possible about a world, and to have a reliable guide. Perhaps we should get Zaalbar to accompany us.
Juhani.nm22aazaal01055_.mp3: A reliable guide through the intricate complexities of another culture can be invaluable.
Juhani.nm22aazaal01062_.mp3: Are you afraid of the wild, Mandalore? Are you a coward?
Juhani.nm22abchor02046_.mp3: Why do you not do something about this tyranny, then?
Juhani.nm22abzaal01027_.mp3: This place is wild and untamed. It stirs the blood and makes one feel alive. It is a shame the Wookiee is not here with us; I have no doubt he would feel the same way.
Juhani.nm23aawook01041_.mp3: Threatening her may not get you the results you want.
Juhani.nm23adchuu01076_.mp3: Perhaps you should not be so self-serving.
Juhani.nm23adchuu01252_.mp3: It is wrong to leave him imprisoned here. We should seek some way to free him when we have the chance.
Juhani.nm23adfrey02035_.mp3: You should not be so self-serving, lest you fall to the dark side.
Juhani.nm23adfrey02074_.mp3: Your should not press him too far. It may have unfortunate consequences.
Juhani.nm24aajole06204_.mp3: I do not feel the taint of the dark side within you, old man. I sense you are a servant of the light, whether you will admit it or not.
Juhani.nm25aafrey02175_.mp3: Wait - maybe this doesn't have to end in bloodshed. Maybe we should try talking to this Wookiee.
Juhani.nm25aahurt03072_.mp3: *whisper* The Jedi should be protectors of the weak! You shame us all by your actions here.
Juhani.nm25aastar99003_.mp3: The Star Map is an artifact of the dark side. The horrors that live here in the Shadowlands could be the result of thousands of generations affected by the Star Map's power.
Juhani.nm25aastar99004_.mp3: Come. We should leave this place. There is nothing else for us here.
Juhani.nm25aastar99013_.mp3: The Shadowlands are a dark and dangerous place. I am not surprised to find the Star Map here, though I cannot help but wonder if the Star Map predates the forest itself.
Juhani.nm26aairim06062_.mp3: So you tricked these innocents into going to the Sith base. And then what did you do with them?
Juhani.nm26aanilk09116_.mp3: We could look into this to calm this Selkath's fears, though I doubt the Republic would be involved in anything illegal.
Juhani.nm26aatria27520_.mp3: Well done. You showed wisdom worthy of a Jedi Master during this trial.
Juhani.nm26acignu04078_.mp3: I see you are more interested in winning than in trying to solve this case. I cannot say I approve of your actions here.
Juhani.nm27aashas06105_.mp3: *whisper* Why are helping to propagate the Sith lies on this world? If this is some kind of attempt at reverse psychology, I do not understand its purpose.
Juhani.nm33aadakv08005_.mp3: Perhaps... you could go back to the Jedi. I did.
Juhani.nm33aadakv08011_.mp3: Leave him be! I said that he would not betray you. Just... let him go.
Juhani.nm33aalash11013_.mp3: Be careful! You don't want to provoke them, do you?
Juhani.nm33aalash11015_.mp3: Don't be stupid. We needn't make matters worse.
Juhani.nm33aalash11026_.mp3: You took an incredible risk. You know that, right?
Juhani.nm33aalash11067_.mp3: Are you mad? Don't provoke them!
Juhani.nm33aalash11080_.mp3: Are you mad? Don't provoke them!
Juhani.nm33aapros17020_.mp3: That is murder, and this young person is not even a Sith!
Juhani.nm33aapros17023_.mp3: You should not do this. Taking advantage, even of a Sith, leads to the dark side.
Juhani.nm33aapros18024_.mp3: You should not do this. Taking advantage, even of a Sith, leads to the dark side.
Juhani.nm33aashaa19034_.mp3: Do not do this. Do not turn towards the dark side!
Juhani.nm33aayuth21171_.mp3: I... yes -- we are only servants to the... master.
Juhani.nm33abmeke02013_.mp3: You should not toy with people's lives!
Juhani.nm33abmekf03020_.mp3: That was the right thing to do - turn him away from the Sith.
Juhani.nm33abmekf03036_.mp3: You should not manipulate people this way! You may fall!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11000_.mp3: There is no time to talk now. Our priority is to find what caused this disturbance in the Force. It is close by, I know that much.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11001_.mp3: I feel I must apologize for the way I acted towards you before, in the grove. It was wrong of me.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11004_.mp3: I am sorry for attacking you. I am sorry for thinking you would only try to kill me.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11005_.mp3: I hope that by helping you in your task I may redeem myself in your eyes... and in my own.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11007_.mp3: Thank you... It is most reassuring to know that you can forgive me, even though I tried to take your life.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11009_.mp3: It may. But I am prepared to do what it takes.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11010_.mp3: I can only hope that, in our time journeying together, I will succeed.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11012_.mp3: You mock me! I will do what it takes to redeem myself in the eyes of my peers. I WILL succeed!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11013_.mp3: I will prove myself to you and to everyone! I will be a faithful companion to you and Bastila as long as our journey may last.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11015_.mp3: I realize you have justification, but that anger only leads to the dark side. Please do not fall into the same trap that caught me.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11017_.mp3: The dark side is most devious and deceptive. It can find the smallest weakness to exploit.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11019_.mp3: I thought that too. But I was wrong...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11021_.mp3: How... how can you possibly be Revan?
Juhani.nm35aajuha11022_.mp3: The one... the Jedi whose troops saved me on Taris... It was Revan, leading an army out to defeat the Mandalorians. It was you...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11023_.mp3: You are nothing like the one who saved me on Taris.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11025_.mp3: You are obviously not who I thought you were, once upon a time.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11026_.mp3: I thought you were the ideal Jedi. I thought you would never turn against us. Yet here you are.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11028_.mp3: You did turn in the end. I did not want to believe it. But now I suppose you have a chance to redeem yourself.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11029_.mp3: You can work with us. For the Republic. For the Order. We can set right what you started so long ago.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11031_.mp3: Yes we shall. I only hope that you will see this through until the end.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11032_.mp3: Time will tell what choices you make. I shall stay by you to see this task done.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11034_.mp3: And I hope that what you see as necessary is what we originally set out to do.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11036_.mp3: Only through serving the Republic do you serve yourself as well. In defeating Malak you save all of us along with you.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11041_.mp3: I knew when I heard that you had become the Dark Lord of the Sith that something was wrong with it.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11042_.mp3: The man who saved me could never go completely to the dark side.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11046_.mp3: The woman who saved me, who I... I have come to care for, could never go completely to the dark side.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11047_.mp3: The woman who saved me, who I... who I have come to admire, could never go completely to the dark side.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11050_.mp3: It is good to know that you have truly changed. It gives me hope.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11051_.mp3: I do not think now that I will fall to the dark side. I only have to look to you and follow by your example and there is no way I can fail.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11053_.mp3: Yes. That is true. I suppose you would know better than I.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11055_.mp3: Thank you for placing your confidence in me. I only wish I had your heart as well...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11056_.mp3: I will never forget what you did for me, even if you do not remember it.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11057_.mp3: That is especially meaningful coming from you.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11059_.mp3: I... I am sorry, I did not realize. I will endeavor to be more considerate in the future.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11060_.mp3: This may be the last time I will have a chance to talk to you...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11061_.mp3: I just want you to know that I... that I...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11063_.mp3: I... I... I care for you. I do not know why. I do not know if anything will be possible or if you even return what I feel, but I do know it is there.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11064_.mp3: I am sorry if this upsets you. I am so sorry if I am wrong, but I cannot deny what it is that I feel.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11066_.mp3: Now that I have put myself in this position, I know not what to say.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11071_.mp3: But as much as I may care for you, and you for me, first we must deal with Malak.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11072_.mp3: After there will be time to sort things out between us.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11075_.mp3: I... I understand. You have someone somewhere... or I just do not seem to appeal to you.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11076_.mp3: I am sorry for pushing myself on you. I apologize for my actions.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11077_.mp3: I suggest we find and confront Malak as soon as possible to remove the threat to the Republic once and for all.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11079_.mp3: I was afraid that I would have no more time to say it... I wonder if all of us wil survive what we must do...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11081_.mp3: But I feel I must. I have never said this before...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11083_.mp3: Of.. Of course. I am sorry. I should have known better.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11084_.mp3: I can only say that if I am going to die, as we stand likely to, I am glad that it will be you beside whom I do it.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11085_.mp3: I just want to thank you for all that you have done for me. For saving me from the dark side, for accepting me on your journey.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11087_.mp3: It is good to know that I have been of some value...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11088_.mp3: Even if not as much as I would like...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11089_.mp3: I will prove my true worth to you.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11090_.mp3: We WILL defeat Malak and save the Republic from the Sith threat once and for all!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11094_.mp3: I... defer to your wisdom in this matter. I have little knowledge of the true power of the Sith.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11095_.mp3: I pledge my life to your cause. I will stand by you until the end.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11097_.mp3: I will help you in any way I can.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11099_.mp3: So here we are... in the belly of the beast.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11101_.mp3: Here we are in a Sith Interdicter loaded with troops and Sith Jedi, and you wonder at my apprehension?
Juhani.nm35aajuha11102_.mp3: Knowledge of the almost certainty of my death tends to make me introspective.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11103_.mp3: I wish that I had more time to turn you from the path you seem to have chosen.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11105_.mp3: I wonder if that is true. For your sake, I hope that it is.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11107_.mp3: If you will not listen to me, then to who? I respect your abilities, and I... I care for you...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11108_.mp3: If you will not listen to me, then to who? I admire you greatly, and respect your abilities...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11110_.mp3: I hope that is true. Truly, I do.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11111_.mp3: But you have also fallen far from the ideals of the Jedi Order. Can you still do what is required of you?
Juhani.nm35aajuha11113_.mp3: Your conviction is... compelling. But also disturbing.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11115_.mp3: Your steadfast desire for vengeance credits your perseverence, but I fear for you. It is too easy to give in completely to the dark side.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11116_.mp3: I know I worry too much, and I know you may be irritated by my saying this, but do not fall the way I did. You have so much potential, I do not want you to waste it.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11117_.mp3: But there is enough to worry about without my making it worse. Perhaps we can speak more of this later, once we leave this ship.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11119_.mp3: If I am going to die here then, I am glad to have stood by you.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11121_.mp3: I do not favor our chances at all. But if you believe that we can... then maybe there is a possibility.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11122_.mp3: Live or die, I shall stand by you as you need me.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11124_.mp3: I only wish that we had had more time... together...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11126_.mp3: It is too late to do anything now. We must do what we can to escape from here.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11127_.mp3: When we have left, perhaps then we can see what the future holds for us.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11130_.mp3: Live or die, I shall stand by you as you need me.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11132_.mp3: Yes. Yes, we should. Your focus on your work does you credit.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11133_.mp3: Let us leave this place then... If we can.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11135_.mp3: We are in a Sith Interdicter loaded with troops and Sith Jedi. I am not favoring of our chances.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11137_.mp3: How... reassuring. I, though, would not have liked to die quite so soon.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11138_.mp3: My Cathar blood seethes at the thought of that man still running free. I cannot stand still while I think about it, but... but I will not give in to the dark side either.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11139_.mp3: He will pay for his crimes, though. He will most likely be following us... me. If we could find him first, then he may not be able to set in motion whatever he has in store for us.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11140_.mp3: That man was a beast! A monster! I am glad that the galaxy is now rid of him, so that he may not harm others again.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11141_.mp3: I do regret, though, that he did not die by my hand...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11143_.mp3: I know. But must I always fear the lure of the dark side?
Juhani.nm35aajuha11144_.mp3: But... it was for the best. I am glad that you stood by my side during this.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11145_.mp3: We should continue our journeys now. No reason for staying here for this.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11148_.mp3: I... I do not know anymore what I am strong enough for. I only take what comes to me and hope that I can handle it.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11149_.mp3: The lure of the dark side will always be my strongest foe. I should have killed him.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11150_.mp3: I felt statisfaction taking revenge for my people like that... but... but I should not have let my anger consume me so.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11152_.mp3: But I could have! I should have...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11153_.mp3: I must try harder in the future to resist the call of the dark side. I suppose I am fortunate that, in this case, he was deserving of such an end.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11155_.mp3: Yes... Yes I do. I must try harder in the future to resist such urges. I suppose I am fortunate that, in this case, he was deserving of such an end.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11156_.mp3: We should continue on our way. I do not want to linger around here anymore.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11158_.mp3: No I didn't. I let my anger and passion consume me and did something rash. Something which leads me down the path to the dark side.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11159_.mp3: But... I recognize this, and I am truly regretful that I committed this act. I shall not let it happen again.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11160_.mp3: I suppose I was fortunate that, in this case, he was deserving of such an end.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11161_.mp3: I have been watching you... and I cannot help but feel that you are becoming more distant.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11162_.mp3: When we met it was you that convinced me to turn away from the lure of the dark side. But now it seems that you are falling into the trap that had caught me.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11165_.mp3: When we first met I looked at you with contempt. You were some insect sent by the Jedi Council to eliminate me.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11166_.mp3: But you were more powerful than I would ever have thought. It seemed so easy for you to overcome me.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11168_.mp3: I think that you flatter me again, and I do not know why. I worry for you.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11169_.mp3: I look and I see you turning away from the Code of the Jedi. I wonder if you can see it.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11171_.mp3: That you did. You took away the dark taint that had been consuming me and restored me to the light. You took me away from there.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11172_.mp3: But now... now I wonder what it is that you see in your own reflection.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11174_.mp3: And this is just the problem! You seem to revel in your power, use it far too frequently for your own gain.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11175_.mp3: I... I do not know... I fear that you may be starting to fall.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11176_.mp3: If only there were some way I could turn you away from the path that you seem to be headed down...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11177_.mp3: I wonder if it started when you met me in that grove. I wonder if it could be my fault.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11179_.mp3: That is true. But still I worry about the ones you make.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11180_.mp3: But I have faith in you. I would follow you into battle with Malak himself. I will stand by your side.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11182_.mp3: I wish I could believe that as you do.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11184_.mp3: Maybe I do. I have had reason to wonder recently if I have had any effect at all...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11187_.mp3: I... I have been watching you for some time. I wonder if you have noticed.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11188_.mp3: I have been thinking of how far I had fallen, and how you exemplify the Code of the Jedi. I find my self ashamed.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11190_.mp3: That I had so easily fallen to the dark side. That I could convince myself that by injuring my master I became a great force of evil in the galaxy.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11191_.mp3: For my pride, my hubris. For the inner rage that all of my species feels. Sometimes I wish that I had not been born this way...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11193_.mp3: I am sorry. I start to talk thinking about how you stay strong to the path of virtue and justice, and I find myself whining again about my own inadequacies.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11194_.mp3: The Council would be proud to see that you had learned your lessons so well.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11199_.mp3: But I have so little to show when I compare myself to you... and that makes my shame even worse...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11201_.mp3: Your power in the Force is strong, and I can sense no taint of the dark side in you. That makes my shame even worse...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11202_.mp3: I have been thinking about our journey together, and how we are more similar than I had first thought.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11204_.mp3: I know how hard it was for me to resist the call of the dark side, and I know that you have suffered those pains as well.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11205_.mp3: The continual struggle between restraint and freedom... light and darkness. It is hard for me with my Cathar blood to resist sometimes.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11207_.mp3: I do resist. I look to you and see that we are in this together, and that you are resisting as well. That gives me strength.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11208_.mp3: I think the Jedi Council would be proud to see that you are holding up so well in spite of the hardships you have endured.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11213_.mp3: But similar enough. We have had many of the same sort of experiences.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11215_.mp3: Heh. I did not mean in appearances, but we have had some of the same experiences.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11218_.mp3: Dantooine? Dantooine has been my home for a number of years, ever since I started my training with the Jedi.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11219_.mp3: It is a lightly populated planet, mostly focused on agriculture and hunting of the wild beasts that roam its plains.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11220_.mp3: The most populous form of animals on its surface are the iriaz, herd beasts that are normally quite tame, but can be violent when provoked, and the kath hounds, vicious pack predators.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11221_.mp3: Kath hounds do not normally attack people except when it is a pack of them ambushing a lone individual. But recently they have been much more aggressive.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11222_.mp3: I am to blame for that, I believe.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11223_.mp3: But enough of my self-recrimination, I should not dwell on the past, but rather look to the future.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11224_.mp3: Is there anything else you need?
Juhani.nm35aajuha11225_.mp3: Manaan is a water-rich world... as you may have been able to tell.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11226_.mp3: With the exception of this Ahto city, there is no land on the world protruding above sea-level.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11227_.mp3: The dominant indigenous race of the world are the Selkath, a semi-aquatic bipedal species. They are known to be very dreary and strong proponents of the power of law above all else.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11228_.mp3: The extremist policies of the Sith seem to appeal to them. They have declared themselves neutral in this conflict between the Republic and the Sith.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11230_.mp3: The Selkath seek to preserve their independence by maintaining a stranglehold on the one unique resource of their world: the vulnerary liquid Kolto. The most powerful curative in the galaxy.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11231_.mp3: As the only world in the galaxy that produces Kolto, they have positioned themselves between the Sith and the Republic, supplying both sides with the medicine equally.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11232_.mp3: They hope in this way to make themselves too valuable to both to be conquered. As a last resort, they have made it clear to both sides that any attempt to attack their world will force them to destroy the Kolto supply entirely.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11233_.mp3: Any violation by either the Republic or the Sith of their sacrosanct laws incurs severe Kolto export restrictions on the violating government.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11234_.mp3: Both the Republic and the Sith try to keep the Selkath happy and give them no cause to complain. But I wonder how the Sith can take this affront to their power in stride...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11235_.mp3: Many people speak highly of the integrity of the Selkath people... but from what little I have seen of them, they are disgusting little fish-people. But I suppose I just have too high standards.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11238_.mp3: I am sorry, but I do not know anything about this place. It truly is an unknown world to me. I would be surprised if anyone at all in the Republic knew of it.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11239_.mp3: We should be on our guard at all times.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11240_.mp3: Korriban, I have heard, is a mysterious world. It is rumored to hold many ancient ruins of a purpose that none have been able to discover.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11241_.mp3: There are also tales of strange ghosts and monsters haunting the ruins, whispering in the ears of all who would listen and driving them mad.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11242_.mp3: The Jedi are not welcome here, however, so we cannot determine the truth that may lie in these rumors.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11243_.mp3: Korriban remains staunchly outside the Republic, and we suspect that the Sith may have spread their influence here as well. The large Czerka Corporation outpost also points towards that.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11244_.mp3: If the Czerka Corp. is the industrial arms of the Sith Empire, then judging by the size of their facilities here, this may be a very dangerous world indeed.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11245_.mp3: We must watch ourselves closely here.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11246_.mp3: Tatooine is a filthy desert. Planets such as this should not be fit for life at all. My skin itches just to be here.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11247_.mp3: As you can see, it is a desert. Very little water. Too much sand. This sort of place attracts too much of the seedier side of civilization.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11248_.mp3: As to the particulars of this world itself, I can safely say that it holds no interest for me, and I will be well pleased when we leave here and never return.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11249_.mp3: Now is there something else, or may we hurry and do what we have to do here as quickly as possible?
Juhani.nm35aajuha11250_.mp3: I have heard of this world... Kashyyyk. It is a place of giant trees that have overgrown the entire world, blanketing it in greenery.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11251_.mp3: But while it is beautiful to behold at times, it can also be quite deadly. Many creatures and predators lurk in the leaves and branches. Some small, some undoubtedly quite large.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11252_.mp3: I have heard that the bottom layers of the trees have never been seen by a living being who returned to tell of it, and that travelling there is certain death. I do not envy any who go there.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11253_.mp3: It is most odd that Revan came here, but perhaps in the vast canopy of one of these trees we may find another piece of the Star Map.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11254_.mp3: I have heard of no indigenous race that inhabits this world, but I must profess my ignorance, since I have only heard its name in passing.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11256_.mp3: I... have been bothered by something of late...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11258_.mp3: I never told you where I came from, did I? Where I grew up as a child? I suppose I was trying to deny what I was feeling.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11260_.mp3: I have been wrestling with my feelings inside. Trying to come to terms with it, but I find I cannot. I must have someone to blame!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11261_.mp3: Someone to blame for the destruction of my homeworld. Someone who is responsible for the death of everyone I have ever known except those on Dantooine!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11263_.mp3: You self centered fool! To think that I would desire to mate with one such as you, should that even be possible!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11264_.mp3: You are the center of the universe, what does it matter if my homeworld was wiped out by your actions! Who cares if it is because of you that everyone I knew as a child is dead!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11267_.mp3: Fine! Then I will not! What does it matter to you if my homeworld was wiped out by your actions! Who cares if it is because of you that everyone I knew as a child is dead!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11269_.mp3: Taris! It was Taris that the Sith destroyed to try to kill you and your precious Bastila! Taris, my homeworld!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11271_.mp3: If it were not for you and Bastila, the Sith would have never had reason to destroy that world! It was your fault for being there, and your fault for rescuing Bastila!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11272_.mp3: Without your intervention the Sith would have had no cause to lay waste to my childhood!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11274_.mp3: Just let me vent my anger! I need someone to blame... something... anything!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11275_.mp3: I hated that world, yet everything I learned as a child I learned there. It is as much a part of me as the air I breathe.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11276_.mp3: I have this ache inside me where all my childhood memories lay, and I find your face there with them. If it was not for you, that world would still exist!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11278_.mp3: I... I know... I suppose I realized that.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11279_.mp3: But it is so hard to lose your entire past. You would not understand.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11281_.mp3: Yes... Yes I suppose it will. As long as we remain focused on our task it will.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11282_.mp3: I am sorry. I will try not to distract you in the future with my trivial experiences. We should stop for now.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11284_.mp3: I suppose that is to be expected. Everything will turn out for the best as long as we remain focused on our task.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11286_.mp3: There is no emotion. There is peace.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11287_.mp3: ... I suppose you did what you had to... and it could not have been avoided. The Republic needs you and Bastila. Maybe needs you more than it needed Taris.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11292_.mp3: Oh yes, I have been told all about her vaunted powers with the Force. Her Battle Meditation that can turn the tide of any conflict.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11293_.mp3: Well if it could, then why could Taris not have been saved?
Juhani.nm35aajuha11295_.mp3: What did you think would happen by aiding the Republic?
Juhani.nm35aajuha11297_.mp3: The sacrifice of an entire world is too much for any cause! How would you feel if Dantooine or Alderaan or somesuch world were destroyed?
Juhani.nm35aajuha11298_.mp3: Would you be so callous then?
Juhani.nm35aajuha11304_.mp3: Taris! It was Taris that the Sith destroyed to try to kill you and your precious Bastila! Taris, my homeworld! Not that you care!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11305_.mp3: You... you animal! It is only because of the Council's will that I stay with you. But if you betray us, I may decide that falling to the dark side will be a small price to pay for letting my anger run loose.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11307_.mp3: Someone else is not responsible for wiping out my homeworld by their actions. But who cares if it is because of you that everyone I have ever known off Dantooine is dead!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11308_.mp3: Someone else is not responsible for wiping out my homeworld by their actions. But who cares if it is because of you that everyone I have ever known off Dantooine is dead!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11311_.mp3: No, it is alright. I think I am over the worst of it. I apologize again for lashing out at you. It was not your fault.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11313_.mp3: It was a horrible place to have to live. At least in the lower cities where the non-humans tended to get relegated.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11314_.mp3: Living for years in a place with no sun, living off the trash dropped from the upper levels, and the meager pay doing back-breaking labor.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11316_.mp3: There was always the danger of rakghouls coming up from the sewers, or more mundane predators living and working in the area.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11317_.mp3: My family and I struggled each and every day to make something of our lives, but we could only go so far.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11318_.mp3: Taxes from the corrupt government, more fees from the gangs controlling the streets, and whatever was left paying for what food and medical supplies we could afford.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11320_.mp3: With no money to spare for any amenities, even the Enclave on Dantooine seems a paradise in comparison.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11321_.mp3: And of course there was the constant bigotry and hate from the more affluent and human citizens. Lording their wealth over us living below.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11322_.mp3: Every once in a while a rich human would come down through the lower levels with his droid entourage just to see how the 'wildlife' lived... and laughed at the mockeries that were our successes.
