Juhani.nm35aajuha11323_.mp3: But I have come to meet many decent humans in my travels since those days. Indeed, some of the greatest people I have ever met are human.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11325_.mp3: The... the Jedi who encouraged me to join the Order, the one who was with the group going to fight the Mandalorians, she was human.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11326_.mp3: I... I suppose I see something of her in you when I look...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11327_.mp3: I am sorry... I am getting away from my point. If there even was one...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11328_.mp3: Sometimes I curse the day my parents fled to Taris. But then again, if they had not, I would not be where I am today.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11330_.mp3: Another story for another time. For now we must continue our own epic: To save the galaxy, if we can.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11336_.mp3: I have noticed that. But the Jedi order seems to have collected a fair number.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11339_.mp3: It did not. But only because of the Jedi who came. It was very bad.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11343_.mp3: There were none. Bad enough to be a race that is feared and hated by humans, but to be one that is strange and different even among non-humans?
Juhani.nm35aajuha11344_.mp3: But living was hard enough without the stigma of being from a lost race.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11346_.mp3: You mock my pain! It was a horrible place to live... we had to go through hell every day just to survive, and you think it bothering me is an irritation?!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11347_.mp3: Your insensitivity speaks ill of your qualities as a Jedi. Still, as the Council ordered me to do, I shall accompany you, but expect no great sympathy for your plights.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11348_.mp3: I am thinking of what happened on Korriban...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11349_.mp3: I am appalled at the things the Sith did there.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11350_.mp3: I cannot help but notice that your manner is increasingly like that of the Sith...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11352_.mp3: But I do not believe it was. We should have been able to find another way.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11353_.mp3: I should have helped you find another path. I should have tried harder to stop you.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11355_.mp3: And I am sure that is exactly the same justification that Malak and Revan used before they fell...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11357_.mp3: Your overconfidence may yet be your downfall. I will still stand by your side, though.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11358_.mp3: I only wish that what I see meant more to you... that I could turn you back...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11363_.mp3: I will still stand by you, as I have said before. I can only hope that when the time comes, you will do what is right.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11365_.mp3: Thank you. I am sure we can succeed together.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11366_.mp3: I can only hope that when the time comes, you will do what is right.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11371_.mp3: Maybe you should have... The fact that you think so gives me hope.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11372_.mp3: I hope that you will return to path of the Jedi... to me.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11374_.mp3: I am your companion. I am a fellow Jedi. I only seek to ensure the success of our mission.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11376_.mp3: To see such horrible, warped rituals that the Sith practice... It is unnerving.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11377_.mp3: I can truly see now why we must defeat Malak as quickly as possible; to prevent that sort of society from consuming the entire galaxy.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11378_.mp3: It angers me to think of it.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11382_.mp3: Yes... yes, I understand: Do not let my passions and impulses rule me. Remain calm and serene.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11383_.mp3: But I fear that when I am confronted with these monsters I will lose myself.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11384_.mp3: I think that I may yet fall to the dark side by the very desire to fight it.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11386_.mp3: Yes, it could be... if you look at it callously enough. But I cannot.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11388_.mp3: I know, I should not worry. I am grateful for your support in this matter.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11389_.mp3: It seems that whenever I have a problem I turn to you. Sometimes... sometimes I almost seem to want problems, just for the chance...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11390_.mp3: But I am sorry, I should not speak of this.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11391_.mp3: It is a relief to have someone to turn to when I am feeling uncertain.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11394_.mp3: Of course. I will assist you as I am able.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11395_.mp3: How may I be of assistance to you, Padawan?

Juhani.nm35aajuha11435_.mp3: What is it you would like to speak to me about?
Juhani.nm35aajuha11437_.mp3: There is little to tell. Dak and I were both Padawans... we joined the Order at the same time.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11438_.mp3: He was a kind man, but... frustrated. He felt the Jedi were too controlling, too limiting... more so than I did.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11439_.mp3: When he decided to leave the Order, he asked me to come with him. He... he said he loved me.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11441_.mp3: No, I didn't. I enjoyed his company, as a friend, but nothing further. I had no idea he felt as he did.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11443_.mp3: I suppose the rest is obvious enough that I need not tell it.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11445_.mp3: It was serious enough to him... and to me, for I did not wish to hurt him. I had little choice in the matter.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11446_.mp3: He was angry at my refusal. I... assumed that he would get over the hurt in time. I suppose such feelings can fester and darken, and they never go away.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11447_.mp3: He reminds me of what I was when you found me in the grove. I... feel sorry for him.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11448_.mp3: But he has chosen his path, hasn't he? If I thought he would accept an offer of help, I would give it. Let us... just move on, please.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11450_.mp3: How I came to be a Jedi? I am sure you would not find it very interesting... Are you sure you would like to hear?
Juhani.nm35aajuha11452_.mp3: Well... It goes back a number of years...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11453_.mp3: Back on my homeworld we did not see Jedi very often, especially where I lived.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11455_.mp3: The hind end of space. A pit of a world, to be sure. Where Jedi rarely tread...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11456_.mp3: But we had heard of them. Well, everyone had, so that is not to be unexpected.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11457_.mp3: Champions of truth. Defenders of justice. Heroes of the Republic.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11458_.mp3: It was very easy for a child to be enthralled by their image, their mystique. Maybe I was one of those children.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11463_.mp3: Allow children their innocence while they still may have it!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11464_.mp3: I was not so innocent, but I too was affected...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11465_.mp3: When I saw a Jedi for the first time they lived up to everything my imagination had created them to be. I was awed... and maybe a bit enamored...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11467_.mp3: They were quite striking... especially the tales of their leader.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11470_.mp3: From that moment on I knew that I would have to try to become a Jedi. To lift myself out of the rut I had been living in for years and to make a real difference, as the Jedi were.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11471_.mp3: The foolish delusions of a child. But THIS child made it happen!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11472_.mp3: As soon as I was able I left my world and went in search of them. I found them and was accepted. I had been living my dream on Dantooine for several years before you came.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11473_.mp3: Although... perhaps I was not entirely ready for it... or not completely suited to the task. Otherwise I would not have fallen...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11474_.mp3: But thanks to you I have been redeemed. Perhaps I may yet live to see that dream of mine come true.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11475_.mp3: Come, there is much we should do. Let us not waste time talking. Action is what is needed.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11477_.mp3: It was not the homeworld of the Cathar that I lived on. My parents had long fled from that place, and perhaps that is a story for another time. Rather it was a human hive-world I was raised on.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11479_.mp3: Bad enough that Jedi rarely came to that place.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11481_.mp3: Very well then. Perhaps some other time you might deign to be interested.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11483_.mp3: My attempt at humility seems to fail around you. So be it then, go immerse yourself in something else.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11485_.mp3: Well... I suppose I have not talked very much about the Jedi I met back home.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11486_.mp3: They, all of them, were so very... invigorating.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11488_.mp3: They were so very alive. So full of hope and energy and zeal.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11489_.mp3: In retrospect I can see it was a little bit tragic...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11491_.mp3: Well... yes... these Jedi were going to fight the Mandalorians just after they had invaded. Many of those Jedi perished in the fighting.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11492_.mp3: But to us, they seemed invincible, especially their leader, who they talked about all the time. Paragons of light and justice, sweeping away all iniquity before them.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11493_.mp3: It was like looking at gods...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11495_.mp3: I know that! I was using poetic licence! But those Jedi...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11496_.mp3: They were enthralling... Everyone wanted just to touch them. Some people thought it would bring them luck.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11497_.mp3: Not that the peace they brought lasted very long...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11499_.mp3: The Jedi left. The people grew complacent. Those who had been wronged saw their chance at revenge... and so the cycle continues.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11500_.mp3: The oppressed become the new generation of oppressors. The human oppressed that is...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11501_.mp3: The non-humans were never treated well in any case... We felt the brunt of both administrations...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11503_.mp3: Of course it was! They took their frustrations and hates out on us because the people they wanted had already fled or were too well protected!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11505_.mp3: What?!? Of course I can! They took their frustrations and hates out on us because the people they wanted had already fled or were too well protected!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11506_.mp3: But no one looks out for the injustices we suffered! Oh, no!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11507_.mp3: But... I am sorry, I should not have outbursts like that.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11509_.mp3: Don't you see? The very fact I mentioned it means it has its influence. Anger can lead to the dark side and I must be ever careful that I do not fall back into those ways.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11511_.mp3: I know... And I must be ever careful that I do not fall back into those ways again.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11513_.mp3: No, it is not. Anger can lead to the dark side and I must be ever careful that I do not fall back into those ways.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11514_.mp3: I... I thank you for your support. My outburst was uncalled for, but you did not lash back at me. You are a much better Jedi than I, it would seem.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11515_.mp3: But let us not speak more of this now. We should continue on our journey. Perhaps later we will talk again.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11517_.mp3: Yes but humans seem the most pervasive... the most consistent. They took their frustrations and hates out on us because the people they wanted had already fled or were too well protected!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11519_.mp3: Of course they left! They had a war to go fight, so that we would not all be killed by those psychotic Mandalorians!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11521_.mp3: I can only assume that was some misguided attempt at humor. I was using poetic licence. But those Jedi...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11523_.mp3: I was merely using poetic licence. Those Jedi...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11525_.mp3: These Jedi were going to fight the Mandalorians just after they had invaded. Many of those Jedi perished in the fighting.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11528_.mp3: If you do not wish to hear what I have to say, then find some other being to converse with!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11531_.mp3: Bah! It is useless talking to you it seems! Come back when you are more civilized or when we have something to do.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11532_.mp3: Well, I mentioned before that my parents had fled to Taris. Perhaps I can tell you about that.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11534_.mp3: In the early days of the Mandalorian war, there had been fighting closer to the Outer Rim worlds.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11536_.mp3: Cathar was there, yes. My people had a great reputation as warriors... and that appealed to the Mandalore version of 'honor'.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11537_.mp3: They sought to test themselves against us, I think... test themselves by bombing our world, slaughtering my people while they slept or while they ran.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11539_.mp3: They swooped down from space across the world, firing at anything that moved. They used ships in space to destroy all orbital facilities and bombard the surface.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11540_.mp3: We did resist, and in spite of their violent attack we did stave them off for quite a while.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11541_.mp3: But in the end we were doomed...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11543_.mp3: We were not members of the Republic. Cathar was beyond the edge of the Republic, in the Outer Rim. And besides, they could not have known.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11544_.mp3: Our interstellar communications were the first things the Mandalores hit. All other short-range communicators were jammed... we were on our own.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11545_.mp3: We knew what was coming. We had fought the Mandalorians in the first war against Exar Kun and the Sith. We knew there would be no mercy for us.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11546_.mp3: The most we could do was pack the few of our people who survived onto what few ships remained and send them off into space as fast as they could.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11549_.mp3: My parents carried me as a baby with them and were lucky enough to escape.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11550_.mp3: They fled as far as they were able, and eventually settled on Taris. They could stand running no further, I think...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11551_.mp3: But Taris was a horrible choice. Dominated by humans, intolerant of other species, it made everyday life unnecessarily hard.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11553_.mp3: My father... my father turned to stimulants. He spent much of his time in local bars and dives.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11554_.mp3: But we are warriors. It runs through our blood. And when he was on stims he... he... he became foolish... he let his warrior nature get the best of him.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11555_.mp3: So he would get intoxicated, and he would fight, and finally one day he would die.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11557_.mp3: Killed by a man who provoked him into a fight and killed him like an animal.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11558_.mp3: I... I am sorry, I cannot talk about this any longer right now...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11561_.mp3: I don't need your sarcasm, or your pity! He died at the hands of another.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11563_.mp3: Perhaps they were not. Perhaps they did not know better. It did not take long for things to get worse.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11565_.mp3: No, it is not. But they had little choice. Each of us dealt with it in our own way.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11570_.mp3: We were prepared! Just not for an invasion of that size... And we had counted on the aid of our allies. Of the Republic...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11577_.mp3: No there were not... having fled the birthworld of my species, my parents flew as far and wide as they could.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11578_.mp3: And so I was raised alone, knowing of my birthplace only the few stories my parents could tell, and seeing no other member of my species at all...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11580_.mp3: It all comes back to wars and fighting... the curse of your race, it seems...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11582_.mp3: I have told you my life story already, what more could you possibly want to know? Well... there is one thing...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11583_.mp3: I did not want to mention it before, because I was unsure how you would react.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11585_.mp3: Do you remember when I told you of the Jedi who had come to my world to fight the Mandalorians?
Juhani.nm35aajuha11586_.mp3: They were recruiting soldiers for their crusade against the Mandalores. Many people joined them.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11588_.mp3: The main reason for that was their charismatic leader. The one whose troops freed me and let me dream of seeking out and joining the Jedi Order.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11590_.mp3: I... I idolized him and the stories they told of him. He was everything I had dreamed a Jedi could be. I still believe he was that way.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11591_.mp3: I was hesitant to talk to you about this because... well...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11593_.mp3: The Jedi had come to fight the Mandalores under the leadership of a powerful young Jedi... a Jedi named Revan.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11595_.mp3: Yes, it was you. I never saw you, else I would have recognized you, but it was your army that freed me from the slavers.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11596_.mp3: I cannot express how you have changed my life... or how much you mean to me.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11597_.mp3: But I will stay by your side through any trials that may come. Such is the will of the Council... and my own.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11598_.mp3: I cannot express how you have changed my life.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11599_.mp3: THE Revan. The Jedi who turned to the dark side, became the Dark Lord of the Sith and was defeated by Bastila and her strike team.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11600_.mp3: I do not know what happened in the wars with the Mandalorians that turned Revan and Malak, or what they sought with these Star Maps, but the Jedi I knew was a paragon of the Order.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11601_.mp3: I am sorry, if this seems wrong to you, but to understand you must realize that Revan was as great as a Jedi could be. Whatever turned Revan must be terrible indeed.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11602_.mp3: I wonder if what we find at the end of our journey will turn us as well...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11604_.mp3: This is meaningless speculation I guess. I just wanted you to know what I held from you.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11605_.mp3: But rest assured that I will not hold back if our enemy is Malak, Revan's apprentice, or indeed even if it was Revan.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11606_.mp3: I will help you through all trouble. Such is the will of the Council... And my own.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11611_.mp3: Yes... I thought you might react badly... But it was Revan.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11617_.mp3: If you do not want to listen, I understand. But hear me out first.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11621_.mp3: After my father died, my mother was left to support me alone. A single non-human woman, living in one of the worst, most violent slums on Taris.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11622_.mp3: It was not easy for her.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11624_.mp3: When my father was killed it seemed that something in her began to die as well.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11625_.mp3: She worked. She worked as hard as she was able, but over time she began to waste away.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11626_.mp3: I later learned that she was unable to get enough money to feed both of us, and had to start borrowing from the Exchange, a band of cutthroats and smugglers. But even that was not enough...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11627_.mp3: She hid what she was doing from me. She gave most of her food to me, so that I would be strong. But she herself was suffering deeply from it.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11628_.mp3: In the end she could go on no longer, and collapsed at the cantina where she worked one day.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11630_.mp3: She never recovered. There was nothing really that I could do for her... She left me no money, and no doctor would see her without being paid first.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11631_.mp3: I sat by her bed for days as she lay there dying. I never want that to happen to someone I care about ever again...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11632_.mp3: But there was still the money she had borrowed... She had never paid it back, and made no provisions for her death.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11633_.mp3: You must understand: the Exchange is brutal. They care nothing for the life of a sentient being. They are the major suppliers of slaves on Taris.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11635_.mp3: They thought it was appropriate that, with my mother owing them money, the debt should be passed on to me. And with no way to pay, they took me by force.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11636_.mp3: You have no idea what it is like to be bound like a beast and treated as such. It was the worst time of my life.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11637_.mp3: They treated me like livestock. They were waiting for a buyer to give them some credits for me when the Jedi came to fight the Mandalorians.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11639_.mp3: The Jedi could not abide by what they saw there, and drove the Exchange from the face of the world, freeing those of us imprisoned there.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11640_.mp3: But the Jedi soon left to fight their war. And I was left with a dream...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11642_.mp3: I swore that I would become a Jedi. As soon as I had enough money to do it, I bought passage on a freighter headed for Dantooine.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11643_.mp3: And we both know what has happened since then.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11645_.mp3: I am grateful to you for having given me the opportunity to fulfill my dream, rather than become what I hated.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11646_.mp3: Someday I may make it up to you, but for now, let us keep on the task at hand.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11659_.mp3: I... I thank you for your concern, but I am still a bit shaken.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11661_.mp3: I have been thinking about myself... about Quatra... and about my fall to the dark side.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11662_.mp3: I keep thinking that it was my anger that drove me that far, that nearly damned me. I look inside myself now and I can still see it, I still feel it.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11664_.mp3: I think maybe, that I just need more time.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11666_.mp3: Would you rather I fell again and attacked? Slaughtered you in your sleep like an animal?
Juhani.nm35aajuha11667_.mp3: I see in your pride you do not think that possible.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11668_.mp3: Very well, then! Keep your own counsel.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11670_.mp3: More time would do me good. Time to distance myself from that anger.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11671_.mp3: I think that is why the Council agreed to send me with you. They think, perhaps, that in your company I will be able to free myself from it.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11674_.mp3: I thank you for your concern and your acceptance. I will strive to prove that I am worthy of your company and trust.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11676_.mp3: I do not come here begging for scraps from you! I will earn my way with you. You will see just how valuable I am!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11678_.mp3: I am. I try to be strong, as one of my people should, but I know I am still weak inside.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11679_.mp3: I have been doing well, I suppose. As well as I can. But I am more interested in you right now.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11680_.mp3: Do not mistake me, it is just that even though we have traveled together for a while, it seems I know next to nothing about you, personally.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11682_.mp3: Please, forgive me... I did not mean to insinuate that I... that we...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11683_.mp3: It did not come out the way I had intended.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11684_.mp3: We have been travelling together since Dantooine, but I know nothing of you before that. Would you... would you humor me and tell me a little about yourself?
Juhani.nm35aajuha11686_.mp3: Your job? Your childhood? Your life?
Juhani.nm35aajuha11688_.mp3: I am sorry if I am making you uncomfortable. I will fully understand if you choose not to answer.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11690_.mp3: I greatly appreciate your taking the time to talk to me. How did you come to be on Dantooine?
Juhani.nm35aajuha11693_.mp3: Taris... It always seems to come back to Taris for me...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11694_.mp3: I am sorry... I get distracted. I already know the tales of your exploits: how you defeated the Mandalorians in the war... and how you fell.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11695_.mp3: But now you have the chance to redeem yourself. To make a new page in your history.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11696_.mp3: So now, I suppose, that all does not matter. Only your life now does.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11697_.mp3: I am sorry... I get distracted. What did you do before Ta... before that?
Juhani.nm35aajuha11699_.mp3: A life in the army. Not my career of choice, though. We Cathar cannot seem to adjust to regimented organizations like the military.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11700_.mp3: But in a way it does seem to have it's own romantic appeal. Defending the galaxy from evil.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11701_.mp3: Much as we Jedi do. So in a way, I suppose, we are more alike than not.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11702_.mp3: But again I seem to be wasting your time with my carrying on. I apologize.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11703_.mp3: But I have heard that it appeals to males of your species. Fighting, defending.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11704_.mp3: That is what we as Jedi seem to be called upon to do. Perhaps we are not as unalike as I had previously thought...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11709_.mp3: Heh. Yes, I kind of figured that. From where? Oh wait... I remember...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11711_.mp3: I understand. I appreciate that you take the time to talk to me. I will be more considerate of your time in the future.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11714_.mp3: Hah. Humility. Please, if you would, indulge me.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11716_.mp3: Your humility is... astounding as always. So what can you tell me?
Juhani.nm35aajuha11719_.mp3: Oh. I see. It is because you wish to keep me at arm's length.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11720_.mp3: Are you worried about me turning to the dark side? Or do you merely not wish my company.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11721_.mp3: Whatever the case, I am sorry for presuming too much. I will remember my station from now on.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11723_.mp3: Yes. Yes, I do. I more than most perhaps. But I do not know the stories of your past. Legends rarely are laid bare like that.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11725_.mp3: I have been thinking much about our journey, and I am grateful and honored that you have accepted me with you.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11726_.mp3: It is an honor to be by your side and to see you redeemed from the dark path you had chosen before.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11727_.mp3: I am not used to such unbiased acceptance from one who is nearly a stranger to me.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11728_.mp3: We Cathar do not make friends easily, or for long. Even on Dantooine, I remained alone. Not ostracized exactly, but... separate.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11730_.mp3: In truth, I have lived in the Republic too long, and know little. I never met any others of my race other than my parents. But we are not diplomats. We do not deal well with groups. This situation is new to me.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11732_.mp3: Yes, it was. I find it difficult to speak of those things. I do not want to live that way ever again. And here it seems different...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11734_.mp3: Well, even if we do not speak that often, or are apart, I still feel a part of a team; this group you have assembled that accompanies you and Bastila on your quest.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11735_.mp3: It is... warming. I feel almost welcome. Needed.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11736_.mp3: You seem to be very decisive when it is required of you. It is reassuring to know that I can count on someone like you.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11739_.mp3: It seems I was mistaken... I should have known things could not change for me that easily.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11740_.mp3: As it is the Council's wishes, I will accompany you. I will do my duty, and trust that you will do yours.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11742_.mp3: To be accepted so readily... I find it difficult to explain. It is so different from what I am used to.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11744_.mp3: Yes... and that is my point. I find it difficult to explain. It is so different from what I am used to.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11745_.mp3: Just... Thank you for accepting me.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11747_.mp3: I feel that I could count on any of you. But you... you are the one who drew me back from the dark side. It is to you that I feel a debt.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11748_.mp3: And I SHALL make it up to you.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11751_.mp3: Taris was my home for many years. As much as I hated it, it was still home.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11752_.mp3: A rat-hole; a warren; a paradise. I suppose you could call it all these things.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11755_.mp3: You have no idea what it is like to have to live there for years...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11757_.mp3: But it was precisely the people who made it so bad!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11759_.mp3: To walk down the streets. To have people look at you in disgust; like an animal. Most did not know anything about me, but it was there all the same.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11760_.mp3: Because I was an 'alien'. Because I was different from them; frightening.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11761_.mp3: I doubt any of them had even seen my people before. So they persecuted me...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11762_.mp3: They looked down on me and my family. Charged us more for food. Would not let us walk their streets. They spat on us.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11763_.mp3: You are human... you could not possibly know.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11765_.mp3: That is true I suppose. But it much more obvious for someone like me.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11766_.mp3: There were no other Cathar on Taris. No one to talk to. No one to confide in.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11767_.mp3: Humph! But you must think me weak for saying this. But I am strong enough to admit it!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11769_.mp3: I thank you for your concern, but...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11771_.mp3: I... I do not know. I have been keeping it inside for so long. I thought you might understand. You do not seem to fit in exactly with the others. You are... different.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11772_.mp3: Bah! Maybe I am weak. To think that some stories of my stupid past could possibly interest you.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11774_.mp3: I thank you. You are kinder than I would have expected... To put up with me using you in this way.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11775_.mp3: I hope that I will not use your time so badly in the future. Thank you.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11777_.mp3: Maybe there is no point. Maybe I am just lost after leaving yet another planet. I apologize for my outburst. I will try to control myself next time.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11781_.mp3: How can you say that? You have seen Taris, you know what kind of a scum infested hole it is.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11782_.mp3: For us there was no respite. No one to turn to.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11784_.mp3: What? You.. You are just like them!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11785_.mp3: I would not have thought you were so cruel as that.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11786_.mp3: It seems I was mistaken... I should have known things could not change for me that easily.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11787_.mp3: As it is the Council's wishes, I will accompany you. I will do my duty, and trust that you will do yours.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11789_.mp3: I am wary of the Mandalorian. I do not trust him.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11793_.mp3: I have never trusted Mandalorians. They drove my parents from Cathar, aided the Sith and attacked the Republic. Their warped notions of 'honor' may provoke them to do even more heinous acts.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11794_.mp3: I do not know why you tolerate his presence on your ship. In truth, he has had some merit so far, but I am not certain it is worth the risk you take.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11798_.mp3: Eliminate? What? I never proposed to murder the man!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11799_.mp3: His kind may prove to be a danger to the galaxy again, but this man himself has proven acceptable so far. Merely keep your distance from him and watch him, so that he does not betray us.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11801_.mp3: Spoken to him? No! No, I could not.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11802_.mp3: Mandalorians are vicious of temper and easily provoked. I... I would not want to tempt his wrath.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11805_.mp3: I am sorry. It is just that I cannot stand to be around him for very long. I suppose I do not really dislike him, it is just...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11807_.mp3: The Mandalorians came and overran my world, they slaughtered my race... I cannot forget what they have done. Or forgive.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11809_.mp3: You are right, of course. You always seem to know what you speak of.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11811_.mp3: Maybe. Maybe not. I cannot forgive them for what they have done to me and my people.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11812_.mp3: In time Canderous may prove himself. But it will not be easy.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11814_.mp3: I can take care of myself! I do not need you to patronize me!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11815_.mp3: But... I thank you for your kind words. It is hard being alone all the time. To be accepted and welcomed is... flattering.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11816_.mp3: But it is gratifying to know that you value me as a companion that much.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11817_.mp3: This simmering anger and hatred for the Mandalores seems to have found a place in my heart, though. Sometimes, I worry...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11819_.mp3: That I may fall to the dark side once again. That I may threaten you, the Republic... the entire galaxy.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11820_.mp3: If... If that time does come. And if i do threaten our task. It is only right that you should strike me down.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11822_.mp3: But still it eats away at me. I worry that I may yet again fall and endanger everything that I hold dear.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11824_.mp3: Should that time come again, I would rather no one else do it than the one who redeemed me in the first place.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11825_.mp3: If I fall and endanger you and the galaxy you must do what is right. If my death will defeat Malak, then that is what must be done.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11826_.mp3: But we are becoming too morbid too soon. We should not talk like this now. There is much yet we can do.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11827_.mp3: But we shall talk later I am sure.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11831_.mp3: I am not a coward! I fear no one and nothing! But you have not had to flee the destruction of your homeworld either, human.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11835_.mp3: I am not paranoid! My suspicions are justified. I dare not speak about it around him, though.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11837_.mp3: That is true. But also I know his kind. This man he may be different, but...
Juhani.nm35aajuha11839_.mp3: I am not! They are not to be trusted! They are brutes and savages and destroyers of worlds!
Juhani.nm35aajuha11841_.mp3: Of course. If there is anything else, I am here to help.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11842_.mp3: I do not know how to help you with that, I am sorry.
Juhani.nm35aajuha11843_.mp3: I do not have the answer to your question.
Juhani.nm36aadakv01003_.mp3: Dak? That is you, isn't it? I... hardly recognized you.
Juhani.nm36aadakv01005_.mp3: What are you doing here? Did... did you fall to the dark side?
Juhani.nm36aadakv01014_.mp3: I don't think there's much to talk about.
Juhani.nm36aadakv01018_.mp3: Let him go. He... won't say anything.
Juhani.nm37aafree04053_.mp3: Beware this... this spirit. It may not be what it appears. Great emotion lies within...
Juhani.nm38abmeke03016_.mp3: You can always turn back to the light.
Juhani.nm39aastar99006_.mp3: The Sith have long worshipped the ancient secrets of the dark side. It is not surprising to find the Star Map in a place like this.
Juhani.nm39aastar99007_.mp3: I can feel the power of the dark side here. It is... unnerving. Now that we have the Star Map we should leave this place of evil.
Juhani.nm39aayuth04106_.mp3: Remember this in the future. Mercy, compassion: these are the things that give the light side the power to stand against the dark.
Juhani.nm40aacart05066_.mp3: You speak the truth. I alone of all the group might be able to remain hidden if the Sith search the ship.
Juhani.nm40aacart05068_.mp3: I could wait until the guards have completed their search, then come to rescue you.
Juhani.nm40aacart05070_.mp3: I think you may be underestimating my abilities, but I will bow to your decision.
Juhani.nm40adcart01000_.mp3: Where is Bastila? What happened on the ship?
Juhani.nm40adcart01053_.mp3: It was Saul Karath who commanded the fleet that attacked your people, Carth. And it was Malak who gave the order. You know this.
Juhani.nm40adcart01054_.mp3: I have felt the presence of the dark side in you, Revan - as it is in all of us. I know the dangers of that path; yet I also know the fallen can be redeemed.
Juhani.nm40adcart01055_.mp3: I judge you by your actions, and as long as we have been together I have seen you act as a servant of the light.
Juhani.nm40adcart01111_.mp3: I have seen signs of the taint of the dark side in your actions and deeds, but I will not give up on you as you did not give up on me. I will stay with you, Revan.
Juhani.nm40adcart01112_.mp3: I can tell there is conflict between light and darkness within you. I do not know which way the struggle will turn, but I will not abandon you in this difficult time, as you did not abandon me.
Juhani.nm40adcart01122_.mp3: The Dark Lord will not kill her. He will want to use her battle meditation ability against the Republic. He will take her alive so he can turn her to the dark side. I am sure of it.
Juhani.nm41aablac01019_.mp3: You understand these aliens? Of course... you must have come here and learned their languge in your search for the secrets of the Star Forge. Back when you were still Revan.
Juhani.nm41aacart03012_.mp3: I don't know what fate awaits us, but I sense Bastila still has a role to play in the events to come. I have no doubt she will be waiting for us on the Star Forge.
Juhani.nm41aacart03015_.mp3: Bastila tried to tempt her to the dark side, to reclaim Revan's heritage. She failed.
Juhani.nm41aacart03040_.mp3: Confidence is all well and good, Carth, but if we are going to catch up to Bastila we should leave soon, don't you think?
Juhani.nm41aacart03053_.mp3: She is not dead, Carth - though maybe that might have been easier for you to accept. She has fallen to the dark side and fled to the Star Forge.
Juhani.nm41aacart03113_.mp3: During our rather rapid descent I noticed the hulls of many crashed ships scattered across the landscape. Perhaps the parts you need can be found among their wreckage.
Juhani.nm41aacart03124_.mp3: I only hope we're not too late. Bastila has been Malak's prisoner for a long time. If he can turn her to the dark side she will join him and the Sith will be invincible.
Juhani.nm41adguid01005_.mp3: We have had a... a premonition. The Force has given us a vision. There is great danger within the Temple. We cannot let you face it alone.
Juhani.nm41adguid01010_.mp3: Jolee speaks for both of us. You must enter the Temple, but we must go with you.
Juhani.nm44acevil01002_.mp3: Quickly, Bastila - come with us! We have to escape before Malak arrives!
Juhani.nm44acevil01048_.mp3: Bastila, it is not too late for you to be saved. The teachings of the Jedi can lead you from the dark side back into the light and a true understanding of the Force.
Juhani.nm44acevil01060_.mp3: A true Jedi will never bow down to the Sith. If this is your decision I have no choice but to do battle against you.
Juhani.nm44acevil01069_.mp3: No! Do not walk down this path... it can only lead to destruction! I know of what I speak!
Juhani.nm44acevil01071_.mp3: I have no wish to fight you and Bastila, but if you choose to walk down this path you know I must stand against you... even at the cost of my life.
Juhani.nm44acevil01083_.mp3: No! This is the way of the dark side! Do not give in to the anger and hatred!

last_duel.nm02aebend03000_.mp3: What are you doing back here? You finally find the guts to meet me in a death match?
last_duel.nm02aebend03001_.mp3: I've been watching you in the dueling ring. Not bad for an amateur. I'm tempted to come out of retirement and show you what it's like to do battle against a real champion.
last_duel.nm02aebend03003_.mp3: But I only fight in death matches, and not too many people are willing to step into the ring knowing they won't ever come out. How 'bout you, Stranger? You think you got what it takes?
last_duel.nm02aebend03004_.mp3: Back again? You're starting to bore me. I don't come here to talk - I come to watch the duels and see if there's anyone worthy of stepping into the ring with me.
last_duel.nm02aebend03006_.mp3: Sorry, I don't waste my time with no-names. You have to prove yourself before you get a shot at me. I'm the real deal, kid - 100 death matches without a loss!
last_duel.nm02aebend03008_.mp3: But if you can knock off all these other pretenders in the duel ring, I might consider coming out of retirement to face you in one last death match.
last_duel.nm02aebend03009_.mp3: Leave me alone... I'm not giving out any autoprints to my fans today.
last_duel.nm02aebend03011_.mp3: So you're the one doing Zax's dirty work. Well I've got some bad news for you, little bounty hunter. There's no way you're bringing me in.
last_duel.nm02aebend03013_.mp3: This cantina is wired with a top level security grid. You pull a weapon on me and the auto-fire turrets will fry you before you can even pull the trigger.
last_duel.nm02aebend03015_.mp3: Why would I ever want to leave here? I've got food and drinks, a place to stay - and everybody treats me with the respect I've earned for my dueling career.
last_duel.nm02aebend03017_.mp3: But if you're set on collecting that bounty I'll make you a deal. I kind of miss the fight game; my hand is itching for the feel of a blaster in my grip.
last_duel.nm02aebend03019_.mp3: I've seen you in the duel ring. You're just good enough to spark my interest, so I'll agree to face you in a death match. You win, you get to collect that bounty for killing me.
last_duel.nm02aebend03021_.mp3: Hmmm... never figured you for a coward. You ever get the guts to fight me come on back and we can set the match up. Otherwise we've got nothing to talk about.
last_duel.nm02aebend03024_.mp3: Finally - fresh meat! Ajuur will set it all up; go talk to him. It will take some time to arrange, so no point sticking around here until then. I'll be back when it's time for you to die!
last_duel.nm02aebend03026_.mp3: If you can prove yourself in the ring by beating all these other so-called duelists, I'll agree to face you in a death match. You win, you get to collect that bounty for killing me.
last_duel.nm02aebend03028_.mp3: I'm not going to force you to fight. But it's the only way you'll ever collect the bounty on my head. Until then, we've got nothing to talk about.
last_duel.nm02aebend03031_.mp3: Good luck with that, kid... you're going to need it. HA-HA-HA!
last_duel.nm02aebend03037_.mp3: People are always bugging me for my autoprint. Comes with the territory. You survive over 100 death matches and people tend to see you as something of a legend.
last_duel.nm02aebend03038_.mp3: What, you don't recognize me? I'm Bendak Starkiller, the most famous blaster-slinger on Taris. Over 100 duels without a loss - every one of them a death match!
last_duel.nm02aebend03041_.mp3: I'm retired now. Once death matches became illegal I just got bored with the game. I've got no interest in using stun blasters! There was nobody left to challenge me, anyway.
last_duel.nm02aebend03043_.mp3: But I saw you in the ring against Twitch. You've got enough talent to make me consider coming out of retirement for one last death match - unless you're afraid to face me.
last_duel.nm02aebend03044_.mp3: I've been watching these new kids in the ring, but I haven't found anyone worth my notice so far. Still, if someone could beat all these other pretenders I might give them a shot.
last_duel.nm02aebend03045_.mp3: I've seen you in the dueling ring, but you haven't impressed me. Now, if you could beat all these other pretenders... that might get my attention.
last_duel.nm02aebend03047_.mp3: Since I'm not going to answer them, you'd just be wasting your breath. So move along before people see us talking and think I'm signing autoprints today. I don't want to be mobbed.
last_duel.nm02aebend03049_.mp3: Off with you then. I'm done with this conversation anyway.

Malak.nm40abc01001006_.mp3: The search for Bastila is taking too long. We cannot risk her escaping Taris. Destroy the entire planet.
Malak.nm40abc01001010_.mp3: Your predecessor once made the mistake of questioning my orders, Admiral. Surely you are not so foolish as to make the same mistake?
Malak.nm40abc01001014_.mp3: Then I suggest you begin immediately. You are dismissed, Admiral.
Malak.nm40accart02002_.mp3: Your friends do not give up easily, Revan; you always could inspire loyalty. But even the three of you together cannot stand against my power!
Malak.nm40acdart03004_.mp3: I hope you weren't thinking of leaving so soon, Bastila. I've spent far too much energy hunting down you and your companions to let you get away from me now.
Malak.nm40acdart03006_.mp3: Besides, I had to see for myself if it was true. Even now I can hardly believe my eyes... tell me, why did the Jedi spare you? Is it vengeance you seek at this reunion?
Malak.nm40acdart03008_.mp3: What? Ha-ha-ha! You mean you don't know? Ha-ha-ha! All this time, and you still haven't figured it out? Ha-ha-ha!
Malak.nm40acdart03010_.mp3: I wonder how long you would have stayed blind to the truth? Surely some of what you once were must have surfaced by now.
Malak.nm40acdart03012_.mp3: Even the combined power of the Jedi Council couldn't keep your true identity buried forever, could it?
Malak.nm40acdart03016_.mp3: As is the outcome. I am actually surprised this confrontation did not happen sooner, given how powerful your mind once was.
Malak.nm40acdart03018_.mp3: You cannot hide from what you once were, Revan! Recognize that you were once the Dark Lord - and know that I have taken your place!
Malak.nm40acdart03020_.mp3: You do not yet remember, Revan? The Jedi set a trap. They lured us into battle against a small Republic fleet. During the attack a team of Jedi knights boarded your ship.
Malak.nm40acdart03022_.mp3: The Jedi strike team captured you and the Council used the Force to reprogram your mind; they wiped away your identity and turned you against your own followers.
Malak.nm40acdart03024_.mp3: You must have seen flashes of your old life in your dreams, Revan; memories bubbling up to the surface? Surely you must remember the battle in which you were captured?
Malak.nm40acdart03026_.mp3: How you survived the final battle is a mystery to me. Perhaps you should ask Bastila; after all, she was part of the Jedi strike team that captured you!
Malak.nm40acdart03032_.mp3: The Jedi Council didn't restore your wounded mind, Revan! They merely programmed it with a new identity - one loyal to the Republic! They tried to make you their slave!
Malak.nm40acdart03036_.mp3: But now you know the truth, Revan! The Council has failed in their attempt to make you their pawn! The will of a Sith Lord is not so easily manipulated!
Malak.nm40acdart03040_.mp3: A rash and futile hope. The dark side is too strong, my power is too great! Even my old master is no longer a match for me!
Malak.nm40acdart03045_.mp3: Bastila hides the truth behind noble words, Revan! The Jedi needed the memories buried deep in your wounded mind; there was no other way to bring them out. They had to keep you alive!
Malak.nm40acdart03051_.mp3: They made you their puppet, Revan - and Bastila was the handler pulling your strings!
Malak.nm40acdart03055_.mp3: Tell the truth, Bastila, you wanted to taste the dark side for yourself! You knew the only way the Council would permit you to explore the Sith's power was through Revan's lost memories!
Malak.nm40acdart03065_.mp3: Tell the truth, Bastila, you wanted to taste the dark side for yourself! You knew the only way the Council would permit you to explore the Sith's power was through Revan's lost memories!
Malak.nm40acdart03069_.mp3: Forgiveness, Revan? You are weak; I was right to betray you. You are not fit to rule the Sith!
Malak.nm40acdart03071_.mp3: A small part of me has always regretted betraying you from afar. I always knew there were some who would think I acted out of fear, that I did not want to face you.
Malak.nm40acdart03073_.mp3: But now fate has given me a second chance to prove myself. Once I defeat you in combat no one will question my claim to the Sith throne; my triumph will be complete!
Malak.nm40acdart03076_.mp3: The Jedi Council were foolish to let you live. I won't make the same mistake. We shall finish this alone in the ancient Sith tradition: master versus apprentice, as it was meant to be!
Malak.nm40acdart03081_.mp3: I helped them, Revan. I always knew that one day the title of Dark Lord would be mine! When the Jedi strike team boarded your vessel I saw my day had come.
Malak.nm40acdart03084_.mp3: Once I served you, Revan, but I always knew that one day the title of Dark Lord would be mine! When the Jedi strike team boarded your vessel I saw my day had come.
Malak.nm40acdart03086_.mp3: I ordered my own ships to fire on your bridge. I thought I could destroy all my enemies with a single glorious victory! I never dreamed the Jedi would take you alive from the wreckage.
Malak.nm40acdart03088_.mp3: You mean why did I betray you, Revan. You are the one who taught me the ways of the Sith: the strongest must rule if we are to survive!
Malak.nm40acdart03090_.mp3: You knew I would one day challenge you for supremacy, but you underestimated me. I acted sooner than you expected and seized the Sith throne with a single brilliant stroke!
Malak.nm40acdart03093_.mp3: The Jedi are fools; they do not believe in executing prisoners. Originally I assumed you had died in the battle. Imagine my surprise when I found out you were still alive, Revan.
Malak.nm40acdart03096_.mp3: You must have seen flashes of your old life in your dreams, Revan; memories bubbling up to the surface? Surely you must remember the battle in which you were captured?
Malak.nm40acdart03098_.mp3: You knew I would one day challenge you for supremacy, but you underestimated me. I acted sooner than you expected and seized the Sith throne with a single brilliant stroke!
Malak.nm40acdart03099_.mp3: The Jedi are fools; they do not believe in executing prisoners. Originally I assumed you had died in the battle. Imagine my surprise when I found out you were still alive, Revan.
Malak.nm40adc03001003_.mp3: Resume the bombardment, Commander. Wipe this pathetic planet from the face of the galaxy.
Malak.nm44aac02001008_.mp3: Torture?  No, dear Bastila.  You misunderstand.  This is but a taste of the dark side to whet your appetite. ## When you finally swear loyalty to me, it will be willingly.
Malak.nm44aac02001011_.mp3: Such resolve in your words, but I see the truth in your heart.  The dark side calls to you, Bastila.  You hunger to taste it. ## Become my apprentice, and all its power can be yours!
Malak.nm44aac02001014_.mp3: You are strong, child. But I will break you.
Malak.nm45aadarj01002_.mp3: Remember this as you fall beneath the blade of my lightsaber!
Malak.nm45aadark99001_.mp3: Bastila has betrayed me. I must select a new successor to be my apprentice; one who will one day take the mantle of Sith Lord away from me.
Malak.nm45aadark99002_.mp3: Of all the Dark Jedi that have sworn allegiance to me, you three are the strongest. One of you will have the honor of becoming my new apprentice... if you prove yourself worthy.
Malak.nm45aadark99004_.mp3: Revan is on the Star Forge, looking to reclaim the title of Dark Lord of the Sith. Wait here for my old master. Whichever one of you deals the killing blow to Revan will become my new apprentice.
Malak.nm45aadark99006_.mp3: Perhaps you will triumph. But even if you fail it will give me the time I need to complete my preparations of the station's defenses.
Malak.nm45aadark99007_.mp3: And then we shall see if Revan can stand against the full fury of the Star Forge! Ha-ha-ha!
Malak.nm45aadart04000_.mp3: I tire of this game, Revan. You have been a thorn in my side from the moment I seized the mantle of Dark Lord from your feeble grasp!
Malak.nm45aadart04001_.mp3: You made a mistake coming here, Revan. The Star Forge fuels my command of the dark side. You are no match for me here. And this time you will not escape!
Malak.nm45aadart04003_.mp3: Is that what you call it? You think stripping away your power and your identity was an act of mercy, Revan? I would rather die!
Malak.nm45aadart04005_.mp3: Spoken like a true slave of the Jedi code. Save your preaching, Revan - I will have none of it!
Malak.nm45aadart04008_.mp3: Ha-ha! You are such a fool, Revan! You claim to be a Jedi, yet you feed on anger and hate! But even the power of the dark side cannot save you now!
Malak.nm45aadart04009_.mp3: You are an insignificant speck beneath my notice. I have surpassed you in every way and accomplished what you never could... I have unleashed the full potential of this Rakatan factory!
Malak.nm45aadart04010_.mp3: You had no idea of the power within this place! Its very walls are alive with dark side energies! And now, my old master, I will let the Star Forge itself destroy you!
Malak.nm45aadart04012_.mp3: You may have reclaimed your identity, Revan, but you have lost the power you once wielded! You are not the Dark Lord anymore. You are nothing!
Malak.nm45aadart04014_.mp3: Im... [cough] impossible. I... I cannot be beaten. I am the Dark Lord of the Sith.
Malak.nm45aadart04016_.mp3: Yes... I cannot deny it any longer. [cough] You are the one who deserves... who deserves to be the Dark Lord.
Malak.nm45aadart04017_.mp3: You were the one who found the first Star Map on Dantooine, Revan. [cough] It was you who lead us on our quest for the Star Forge. I only followed in your wake.
Malak.nm45aadart04018_.mp3: I tried to usurp your rule, to steal the title of Sith Master from you. But now I understand... The destiny is yours, Revan. Not mine.
Malak.nm45aadart04019_.mp3: You... you are Darth Revan, Lord ... [cough] Lord of the Sith. And I... I am nothing.
Malak.nm45aadart04021_.mp3: And so it ends as I somehow always knew it must: in darkness.
Malak.nm45aadart04025_.mp3: Still... [cough] still spouting the wisdom the Jedi, I see. Maybe there is more truth in their code than I ever believed.
Malak.nm45aadart04026_.mp3: I... I cannot help but wonder, Revan. What would have happened had our positions been reversed? What if fate had decreed I would be captured by the Jedi?
Malak.nm45aadart04027_.mp3: Could I have returned to the light, as you did? [cough] If you had not led me down the dark path in the first place, what destiny would I have found?
Malak.nm45aadart04029_.mp3: I suppose... I suppose you speak the truth. I alone must accept responsibility for my fate. I wanted to be Master of the Sith and ruler of the galaxy.
Malak.nm45aadart04030_.mp3: But that destiny was not mine, Revan. [cough] It might have been yours, perhaps... but never mine. And in the end, as the darkness takes me, I am nothing.
Malak.nm45aadart04033_.mp3: You continue to amaze me, Revan. If only you had been the one to uncover the true power of the Star Forge you might have become truly invincible.
Malak.nm45aadart04034_.mp3: But you were a fool. All you saw was an enormous factory, all you ever imagined was an infinite fleet rolling forth to crush the Republic. You were blind, Revan - blind and stupid!
Malak.nm45aadart04036_.mp3: The Star Forge is more than just a space station. In some ways, it is like a living creature. It hungers. And it can feed on the dark side that is within all of us!
Malak.nm45aadart04037_.mp3: Look around you, Revan. See the bodies? You should recognize them from the Academy. These are Jedi who fell when I attacked Dantooine. For all intents and purposes dead, except for one difference:
Malak.nm45aadart04038_.mp3: I have not let them become one with the Force. Instead I have brought them here. The Star Forge corrupts what remains of their power and transfers the dark taint to me!
Malak.nm45aadart04040_.mp3: You cannot beat me, Revan. Not here on the Star Forge. Not when I can draw upon the power of all these Jedi!
Malak.nm45aadart04041_.mp3: And once you are beaten I will do the same to you. You will be trapped in a terrible existence between life and death, your power feeding me as I conquer the galaxy!
Malak.nm45aadart04043_.mp3: Well done, Revan. I was certain the defenses of the Star Forge would destroy you, but I see there is more of your old self in you than I expected.
Malak.nm45aadart04044_.mp3: You are stronger than I thought; stronger than you ever were during your reign as the Dark Lord. I did not think that was possible.
Malak.nm45aadart04046_.mp3: I am tempted to try and capture you alive, Revan. Then I could break your will and bind you to me as my apprentice, as I did Bastila.
Malak.nm45aadart04047_.mp3: You would be a far greater asset to me than even Bastila and her Battle Meditation, if I could control you. But is it worth the risk?
Malak.nm45aadart04048_.mp3: Perhaps you are too powerful to be my apprentice. I betrayed you when I realized my own strength was greater than yours; in time you might try to do the same to me.
Malak.nm45aadart04050_.mp3: Foolish words. The darkness and the light wage a constant war within you. The balance is tipped one way now, but it can easily be tipped back.
Malak.nm45aadart04051_.mp3: Savior, conqueror, hero, villain. You are all things Revan... and yet you are nothing. In the end you belong to neither the light nor the darkness. You will forever stand alone.
Malak.nm45aadart04053_.mp3: Of course. What else do you have? Fate and destiny have conspired to keep you alive despite my best efforts; they have thrust you into the role of savior.
Malak.nm45aadart04056_.mp3: Once you were stronger than me, Revan. But as your apprentice I surpassed you. The Master must always be stronger than the apprentice... that was why I betrayed you.
Malak.nm45aadart04058_.mp3: No! I was prepared to face you, Revan. But fate presented me with a better option. I saw my opportunity and seized it.
Malak.nm45aadart04059_.mp3: The trap set by the Jedi only hastened my decision. If they had not attacked I would have challenged you for mastery of the Sith soon enough.
Malak.nm45aadart04063_.mp3: I cannot deny your resilience. You survived my first betrayal, thanks to Bastila's inteference. You escaped the destruction of Taris and you escaped me on the Leviathan.
Malak.nm45aadart04064_.mp3: You even survived my attempt to destroy you with the Star Forge itself. Fate and destiny have conspired to keep you alive despite all my efforts.
Malak.nm45aadart04065_.mp3: We have been inexorably pushed to this final confrontation, Revan. I see now that this can only be settled when one of us destroys the other.
Malak.nm45aadart04067_.mp3: No, Revan, this time our confrontation can only end in death... yours or mine.
Malak.nm45aadart04068_.mp3: Once again we shall face each other in single combat... and the victor will decide the fate of the galaxy!
Malak.nm45aadart04070_.mp3: You are eager for blood, Revan... as am I. Very well, you shall have your wish.
Malak.nm45aaligh01001_.mp3: This will not take long, Bastila. You will be able to resume your Battle Meditation soon enough. I only wanted you to know that Revan is here on the Star Forge.
Malak.nm45aaligh01003_.mp3: The Force is bringing us towards a confrontation with my old master. The Star Forge has drawn our enemies together so they may all die in a single, glorious day!
Malak.nm45aaligh01004_.mp3: You must kill Revan to prove yourself worthy of being my apprentice, Bastila. You must finish what began in the Rakatan Temple.
Malak.nm45aaligh01006_.mp3: I sense your fear, Bastila. But it is unfounded. The power of the Star Forge will feed the dark side within you, it will give you the strength you need to defeat my old master.
Malak.nm45aaligh01007_.mp3: Stay here in the command center while you use your Battle Meditation against the Republic fleet. Revan will find you here in due time. It is inevitable.
Malak.nm45aaligh01009_.mp3: Perhaps you will triumph, Bastila. But even if you fail it will give me the time I need to complete my preparations of the station's defenses.
Malak.nm45aaligh01010_.mp3: And then we shall see if Revan can stand against the full fury of the Star Forge! Ha-ha-ha!
Malak.nm45aamalak1001_.mp3: This is not unexpected. The Jedi are formidable opponents. Send the Star Forge's battle droids to deal with them.
Malak.nm45aamalak1003_.mp3: You underestimate the power of the Star Forge's droid army. Dispatch the droids.
Malak.nm45aamalak2002_.mp3: Ah, the Jedi. Did my droids pass their test? Did they destroy our enemies?
Malak.nm45aamalak2004_.mp3: Strange. I did not think there were any among the Order who could survive an attack by an army of the Star Forge's battle droids.
Malak.nm45aamalak2006_.mp3: Yes... that would explain why the droids failed. Revan always was strong in the Force. Very well - send out all available troops. The apprentices, as well.
Malak.nm45aamalak2008_.mp3: Of course not! But they will slow Revan down. That will give me the time I need to fully prepare the Star Forge's defenses.
Malak.nm45aamalak2009_.mp3: I am curious to see the true extent of this space station's capabilities. One as powerful as my old master will make an interesting test subject.
Malak.nm45adc01001002_.mp3: Patience, Commander. ## My new apprentice is nearly ready. ## Once Bastila joins her Battle Meditation to our enormous fleet, we shall be invincible.  Then we shall begin our final conquest of the Core Worlds, and the Republic will be crushed forever.
Malak.nstn12stun01001_.mp3: I am more interested in the young Jedi Bastila and her Battle Meditation. Have you learned how she escaped the destruction of Taris?
Malak.nstn12stun01005_.mp3: Interesting. How did you acquire this information, Admiral?
Malak.nstn12stun01008_.mp3: A Jedi and a war hero - it's a wonder you survived the encounter.
Malak.nstn12stun01011_.mp3: Her companions are nothing to me, Calo - but I desire the young Jedi taken alive if at all possible.
Malak.nstn12stun01013_.mp3: I trust you are not wasting my time, Admiral Karath.
Malak.nstn14stun01001_.mp3: The penalty for failure is death, Admiral Karath. But the failure was Calo's, not yours. You may rise.
Malak.nstn14stun01003_.mp3: No mere bounty hunter can stand against a Jedi. I shall not make the same mistake again.
Malak.nstn14stun01004_.mp3: My apprentice, Darth Bandon, shall take care of our young Jedi friend.
Malak.nstn14stun01005_.mp3: Find Bastila and bring her to me. Alive if possible.

Malak_Sub2.nm40aacuts01000_.mp3: We're coming aboard! Nobody try anything or we'll vaporize your entire ship!
Malak_Sub2.nm40aacuts01002_.mp3: Bring them all. Throw them in the prison. Lord Malak will want to speak with them.
Malak_Sub2.nm40abc01001008_.mp3: Th... the entire planet, Lord Malak? But... there are billions of people on Taris! We'd be slaughtering countless innocent civilians. Not to mention our own men still on the surface.
Malak_Sub2.nm40abc01001012_.mp3: Of... of course not my Lord Malak.  I will do as you command. But it will take several hours to position our fleet.
Malak_Sub2.nm40adc03001000_.mp3: Taris is defenseless against our assault, Lord Malak. ## They are offering no resistance. ## The city is in ruins.
Malak_Sub2.nm45adc01001000_.mp3: Lord Malak, the preparations are nearly complete. Everyday the Star Forge adds more ships to our fleet, it is operating at nearly 300% of our projections. ## The fleet is assembling around the Star Forge, and awaits your instructions.
Malak_Sub2.nstn12stun01000_.mp3: Lord Malak, the Star Forge is operating at 200% capacity - far beyond our expectations.
Malak_Sub2.nstn12stun01002_.mp3: She was aided by Carth Onasi, a decorated war hero of the Republic and a legendary soldier. During the Mandalore Wars he was honored many times for his bravery.
Malak_Sub2.nstn12stun01004_.mp3: Yes, Lord Malak. He served under me when I still followed the Republic. You could say I was his mentor.
Malak_Sub2.nstn12stun01007_.mp3: Calo Nord, a bounty hunter, was there when Bastila and Carth escaped the planet. Apparently they left him for dead.
Malak_Sub2.nstn12stun01010_.mp3: Calo has agreed to help us capture the young Bastila - for a very hefty fee, of course. But I assure you he is well worth the price. His reputation as a bounty hunter is well earned.
Malak_Sub2.nstn12stun01012_.mp3: Lord Malak, forgive me. There is something else. May we have a private audience away from the ears of the common soldiers?
Malak_Sub2.nstn12stun01014_.mp3: I promise you will be very interested in what Calo has to tell you about Bastila's other companions, Lord Malak.
Malak_Sub2.nstn14stun01000_.mp3: Calo Nord is dead, Lord Malak. He has failed in his mission. Forgive me.
Malak_Sub2.nstn14stun01002_.mp3: Shall I hire another bounty hunter, Lord Malak?

Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10000_.mp3: Carth, it has been far too long since we last spoke. I see the recent months have not been kind in your case. I barely recognized you.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10004_.mp3: Did you learn nothing in your time under me? As a soldier you should understand that casualties were unavoidable. This was an act of war.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10008_.mp3: In war even the innocent must die. The Sith would not accept me until I proved I had truly turned my back on the Republic by bombing the planet.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10012_.mp3: You used to be a man of action, not of empty words. Cling to your lust for revenge if you must, but spare me your tired threats. I've heard them all before.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10014_.mp3: You are an insignificant part of these events, anyway. Lord Malak is far more interested in your Jedi companions. He has great plans for them.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10018_.mp3: Your words are brave, Bastila, but the lure of the dark side is hard to resist - or so I've been told. I wonder if your companion is as devoted to the light as you are?
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10020_.mp3: You're defiant. I'm certain Malak will find your loyalty to the Jedi amusing.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10022_.mp3: The Dark Lord would probably reward me if I just killed you once and for all. But he may want to question you given the trouble you've caused him... and the history between you.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10024_.mp3: You mean... oh, this can't be true, can it? You really don't know what's going on here, do you? Well, I won't be the one to deprive Malak of the pleasure of telling you himself.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10027_.mp3: The Dark Lord will no doubt torture you for information and for his own twisted pleasure. Eventually you will tell him everything. The Sith can be very persuasive.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10029_.mp3: However, Lord Malak is in another sector. It may be some time before he arrives, so I suppose I will have to fill in for him until then. Activate the torture fields.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10031_.mp3: Enough! I don't want them to pass out before I question them. Malak will appreciate any information I can give him when he arrives.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10035_.mp3: I'm sure you won't. However, we both know your friend's loyalties have proven in the past to be somewhat... flexible.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10038_.mp3: It is time to put your loyalty to the test. I doubt torturing you will gain me your true cooperation. Your will is too strong to be broken that way.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10040_.mp3: However, even the strongest of heroes has trouble watching those they care about suffering.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10042_.mp3: The interrogation will begin now. Each time you refuse to answer or give me a false answer, Bastila will suffer.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10048_.mp3: You expect me to fall for such a transparent ploy. You travel half way across the galaxy with someone and you expect me to believe you feel nothing for each other?
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10050_.mp3: I tire of these games - now I want answers! On what planet is the Jedi Academy at which you were trained?
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10052_.mp3: Very well. This is the price of your resistance.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10056_.mp3: Enough! You see what happens when you try to defy me?
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10061_.mp3: [Failure] Alderaan is nothing but a planet of artisans and philosophers! There is no training academy there! You must think this is a game.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10066_.mp3: An excellent beginning. I am glad you are being reasonable.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10068_.mp3: This first question was a test. Obviously Malak knew the Academy was on Dantooine, and it has since been destroyed by our fleet!
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10070_.mp3: Dantooine is an empty graveyard now. Nothing remains but a smoking ruin and the charred remains of your former Masters!
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10072_.mp3: It doesn't matter whether you believe me or not. The fact remains that the Jedi on Dantooine have been eradicated, along with any hope of someone coming to rescue you!
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10075_.mp3: More empty threats. We Sith prefer to let our actions speak for us. Perhaps that is why we are winning this war.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10078_.mp3: A brave front, but your feigned indifference does not fool me. Your masters are eradicated, along with any hope of someone rescuing you!
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10080_.mp3: Now... tell me your mission. How were the Jedi planning on using you to stop Lord Malak and our Sith armada?
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10083_.mp3: [Failure] Do you take me for a fool? The Jedi are not assassins - they would never devise such a plan!
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10085_.mp3: Perhaps you need a reminder of the consequences of refusing to cooperate.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10089_.mp3: Listen, can you not hear her suffering? You can spare her further pain by simply answering my questions.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10091_.mp3: Now, I will ask again - on what mission did the Jedi Council send you?
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10093_.mp3: Perhaps another lesson is in order?
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10097_.mp3: I am surprised she did not pass out sooner. Rarely have I seen someone withstand such punishment and remain conscious.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10099_.mp3: I see I am wasting my time here. When Malak arrives you will learn my interrogation techniques are considered merciful among the Sith.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10101_.mp3: I will leave you here in your cell with a small taste of the horrors you will suffer when Lord Malak arrives.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10105_.mp3: I am surprised he did not pass out sooner. Rarely have I seen someone withstand such punishment and remain conscious.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10110_.mp3: Listen, can you not hear him suffering? You can spare him further pain by simply answering my questions.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10115_.mp3: You should be grateful, Bastila. He is sparing you agony beyond comprehension.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10119_.mp3: Tell me, how did you find out about the Star Forge?
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10121_.mp3: I had hoped you would continue to cooperate, but you seem to have changed your position.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10124_.mp3: [Failure] A diary? This is not the time for jokes! I will only ask you one more time: How did you find out about the Star Forge?
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10128_.mp3: Don't listen to her. Tell me what I want to know or watch Bastila suffer!
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10131_.mp3: Don't listen to him! Tell me what I want to know or watch Carth suffer!
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10135_.mp3: I find your willingness to cooperate pleasing, though it seems your answers are quite upsetting to Bastila. Not to worry - we are almost finished here.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10137_.mp3: The information you have given me has been most useful, but I fear our session is over. Lord Malak will want to continue with this line of questioning himself.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10141_.mp3: I find your willingness to cooperate pleasing, though it seems your answers are quite upsetting to Carth. Not to worry, we are almost finished here.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10145_.mp3: You should be grateful, Carth. She is sparing you agony beyond comprehension.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10151_.mp3: The interrogation will begin now. Each time you refuse to answer or give me a false answer, Carth will suffer.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10158_.mp3: I am interrogating you, not the other way around. You will answer questions, not ask them.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40aasaul10169_.mp3: Your loyalty is as fickle as ever, I see. Malak will find that amusing, though I seriously doubt he will want you of all people at his side.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40absaul09000_.mp3: Very resourceful. I assume you had some part in this; you learned your lessons well from me.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40absaul09004_.mp3: Don't be a fool. I am giving you and your companions a chance to surrender. A chance to live. Darth Malak himself is on his way, he will be arriving any moment.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40absaul09008_.mp3: Malak will destroy you, but if you throw down your weapons now I will ask my Master to be merciful.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40absaul09012_.mp3: You always did like to do things the hard way. Lord Malak would have preferred live prisoners, but corpses will have to do.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40absaul09028_.mp3: Carth... *cough*... must tell you... *cough* must tell you something... *cough, cough*... come closer....
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40absaul09030_.mp3: [Unintelligible Whisper] You didn't know, did you? *cough* Ha-ha-ha.
Malak_Sub_Sol.nm40absaul09032_.mp3: Remember my dying words. *cough* Remember them whenever *cough*... whenever you look at those you thought were your friends!

Male_01.nm26adsith04002_.mp3: The senators work for the good of the whole galaxy, not for individual gain!
Male_01.nm26adsith04006_.mp3: I'm warning you! Don't push me, or you'll get just what you're asking for!
Male_01.nm26adsith05000_.mp3: Everybody knows the Republic crippled the kolto production. Why don't the Selkath ban them from the planet?
Male_01.nm26adsith05002_.mp3: Stay out of my way. I'm on legitimate Sith business.
Male_01.nm26adsith06000_.mp3: Kolto's real scarce all of a sudden. From what I hear, the Republic is to blame.
Male_01.nm26adsith06002_.mp3: I don't have time to listen to your stories - I've got a full shipment of kolto to load before my shift is over.
Male_01.nm26adsith06004_.mp3: We've got all the proper kolto trading permits, so back off.

Male_02.nm17ae04ni04000_.mp3: Leave me alone, will you. I've got things on my mind.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04001_.mp3: I have to thank you, you know? I don't know how you did it. I really don't.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04002_.mp3: You again? I don't really feel like talking right now.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04003_.mp3: Oh, hi. You another racer then? I heard someone new was talking to Motta. Always room for more, I guess.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04004_.mp3: Don't know how much longer I'll be around here, but maybe we'll have time for a few races.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04006_.mp3: I suppose you've got a right to know track business, what with the times you've been posting.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04008_.mp3: You did? I don't believe it. I mean, I do, but I sure wasn't expecting it. I appreciate it. I really do.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04010_.mp3: Now I can take my bike to the big races. There's not much of a circuit right now, but I'll be ready when it recovers.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04012_.mp3: Hard to tell. I'll get some more runs here first. I need the practice. I have to top *your* time.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04016_.mp3: It's not that I'm not grateful. I mean, it would get me into the pros. I don't have the credits to get in on my own.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04017_.mp3: Not that I care about credits. I just want to race... but the deal with Motta is pretty bad. He'll get most of what I win.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04019_.mp3: Do you now? You might know a good deal, I guess. You sure know your way around the track.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04021_.mp3: [Success] I suppose I do. Not much chance I'll get off this rock on my own, now is there?
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04022_.mp3: [Failure] I'm still not liking the sound of it. I just don't know.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04030_.mp3: What? You're threatening me? I suppose I do need a kick in the tail to make up my mind. Maybe... it's for the best...
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04031_.mp3: It doesn't matter what you think. You don't really know anything about it. Only a top racer would.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04032_.mp3: No offense, but you aren't on the boards compared to me. Post some stunners, then we'll talk.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04034_.mp3: [Success] I... I'll sign the contract. Yeah, I guess that's best. I mean, the deal can't be all bad, right?
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04035_.mp3: I mean, you'd know, right? And all I want is to race. Who cares about the credits... who cares.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04036_.mp3: Thanks for... making things clear. If you don't mind, I think we're done. Goodbye.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04038_.mp3: [Failure] Uh, no. Not until I've given it some thought. What, did you think I would just cave in?
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04039_.mp3: Now, if you don't mind, I think we're done for now.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04041_.mp3: Don't threaten me. Every racer here will step up to stop you. You aren't one of us. We take care of our own.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04042_.mp3: Heh, maybe Motta isn't so sure of himself if he has threaten me. Are we done now? I've thinking to do.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04045_.mp3: I doubt there's much you could say. It's not your business anyway. Top racers take care of their own.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04046_.mp3: Thanks anyway, but I'll think it through myself.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04047_.mp3: You've posted some good times... he might listen to you. I would. I respect you as a racer.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04048_.mp3: But... I kind of doubt he'd give me a better deal. He doesn't have to. He is putting up most of the money.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04049_.mp3: Did you? I'm not sure that it's any of your business. Top racers keep to their own. I don't know you.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04050_.mp3: Maybe if you were better on the track I might feel like talking about it. Someone who can turn out the fast times might understand.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04052_.mp3: You have to step up and do it to know anything about it. You'll understand once you post some fast times.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04053_.mp3: Not sure there's much I could tell you. I mean, you have the track record.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04055_.mp3: Just a few years. I used to run down in the canyons, but nobody sees you down there. I wanted crowds.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04057_.mp3: I've been told I am. I might go pro. I'm looking at some contracts but... that's between me and Motta.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04059_.mp3: If there's anything around, it'll be at the Czerka store in their office in the center of town. Stock is scarce on this rock.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04061_.mp3: Motta has some basic incentives for good times, which you probably know, but this is just an amateur track.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04062_.mp3: The pro circuit is where the real credits are, but even that is hurting. I guess a lot of riders were on Taris.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04064_.mp3: Hurry it up, all right? I have things on my mind.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04066_.mp3: Sorry. I've been here a few years, but only for the racing. Maybe ask over at Fazza's club. The hunters get around.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04068_.mp3: All right. See you around the track.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04069_.mp3: Nice job beating my times, too. I guess my heart isn't in the racing. Contracts are distracting stuff.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04070_.mp3: Go on, leave me alone. I've got stuff to worry about.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04072_.mp3: Racer stuff. Nothing you'd understand. Don't mean to be rude, but it's kind of secret.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04074_.mp3: Ha! Sure! Race your bike out of that explosion? Everyone knows that the whole planet is gone. Nobody got out.
