Male_02.nm17ae04ni04075_.mp3: I'm not in the mood for jokes, thanks. I've got things to think about. You wouldn't know anything about it.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04076_.mp3: You race, right? Know anything about contracts? Ah, I shouldn't get into it. It's my problem.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04077_.mp3: Deal with that Hutt Motta and you'll understand. Until then, I just don't want to talk about it.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04079_.mp3: I don't feel like answering. I wouldn't be much help to you anyway. I just race. Don't know about anything else.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04081_.mp3: You don't know. Don't go thinking you know, because you don't know. I've got problems.
Male_02.nm17ae04ni04107_.mp3: The weak serve and the strong profit. That's the way things should be.
Male_02.nm17af07fu02060_.mp3: I don't want to sour you on the game. Perhaps another small wager game?

Male_03.nm36aadakv01000_.mp3: Greetings. I don't think I've seen you at the academy before. Here to investigate the ruins?
Male_03.nm36aadakv01002_.mp3: My name's Dak Vesser. I'm assigned to the valley ruins, as you can see. We've been painstakingly uncovering these tombs for many months, now.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01004_.mp3: It's been a long time, Juhani.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01006_.mp3: I didn't 'fall', Juhani... I had my eyes opened. And don't look at me like that. Last I recall, you were having your own doubts.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01007_.mp3: I was. I'm not anymore. Dak... you could...
Male_03.nm36aadakv01008_.mp3: Save it. The Jedi aren't for me... not anymore. Look... I'm not going to ask why a couple of Jedi are in the Valley of the Dark Lords.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01009_.mp3: I don't want to know. It's better that I don't. In fact, I'll just get out of here and leave you to whatever it is you're planning to do. Fair enough?
Male_03.nm36aadakv01011_.mp3: Why not? It's what I do best.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01013_.mp3: Yes. Isn't it obvious? I don't want to talk about it here, however.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01015_.mp3: Have it your way, Juhani. You always do.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01017_.mp3: Does it matter? I'm going. Isn't that enough for you?
Male_03.nm36aadakv01020_.mp3: Look... I don't want to be here after you leave. There'll be too many questions. So ask what you have to ask and I'll be on my way.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01021_.mp3: Master Uthar won't allow us to dig with lasers or sonics... we have to use hand tools only so we don't accidentally destroy anything we run across. That makes progress very slow, however.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01023_.mp3: Well... it seems that the Sith once inhabited Korriban a long time ago. There was a fortress here that was destroyed at some point before the Sith abandoned the planet completely.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01024_.mp3: Why they left, we don't know. Perhaps the Jedi drove them off. The tombs in this valley are the only parts of the fortress we've found mostly intact.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01026_.mp3: Some. Most of the interesting stuff is still in the tombs, but Master Uthar prefers to leave them to be explored by the students, as a challenge.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01027_.mp3: In time, they will probably become safe enough for us to enter. Until that time, however, we're stuck to digging up the valley piece by piece.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01029_.mp3: Definitely dangerous. Most of the students that go inside them don't come back out. Master Uthar prefers it that way.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01031_.mp3: There's four tombs here. On the right are the tombs of Ajunta Pall and Tulak Hord. On the left are the tombs of Marka Ragnos and Naga Sadow. All four were ancient Sith Lords.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01033_.mp3: That's the first tomb on the right. There's a rumor that there's a powerful artifact still in there, but nobody's retrieved it, yet.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01034_.mp3: That tomb supposedly has ancient battle droids and traps that are still functioning. It's amazing that their power sources have lasted so long, really.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01036_.mp3: That's the farthest tomb on the right. We don't know much about Tulak Hord, unfortunately... the tuk'ata have a nest in that tomb, I think.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01038_.mp3: A local pack animal that's very dangerous. Occasionally the guards track down a queen and kill it... that usually pacifies them for a bit.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01040_.mp3: That's the first tomb on the left. Someone mentioned that a crazy droid has holed itself up in there, but I don't know much about that.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01043_.mp3: Nothing that I can think of. There's supposedly some old Sith hermit that haunts these hills and kidnaps students. Might want to watch out for him.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01045_.mp3: A Star Map? No, I haven't heard anything about that. Something like that could be in Naga Sadow's tomb, I suppose... that tomb's off limits to the students.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01047_.mp3: It's the second tomb on the left when you enter the valley. Naga Sadow was the leader of the old Sith Masters here, we think.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01048_.mp3: Darth Malak found something in there a while back, however, and ever since then only Master Uthar can enter it.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01050_.mp3: No. A lot of the discoveries are kept secret, even from the students. I only heard that Darth Malak found something there by rumor, to be honest.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01055_.mp3: Alright. Just be careful if you head into any of those tombs.
Male_03.nm36aadakv01056_.mp3: Back again? Something... oh. Juhani... is... that you?
Male_03.nm36aadakv01057_.mp3: Back again? Something else I can tell you?

Male_05.nm22abdehn06000_.mp3: This isn't good. I can't afford this.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06002_.mp3: You think I can? Do you know what they get for a healthy one of these things?
Male_05.nm22abdehn06004_.mp3: We'll work it out later. We've got company.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06006_.mp3: What do you want, spacer? I'm Patrol Captain Dehno and you're interrupting Czerka Corporation business.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06008_.mp3: This Wookiee slave got a little... rebellious. We had to put it down.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06012_.mp3: Careful now... that growl sounded pretty threatening. Keep your slave on its leash or we'll have another accident.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06020_.mp3: That's right! We had to do it and it shouldn't come out of our pay.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06022_.mp3: Just shut up, you trigger-happy idiot.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06024_.mp3: No, of course they don't. Why would you ask me that? Are you doing some sort of snap inspection?
Male_05.nm22abdehn06026_.mp3: You're trying to get me to admit to incompetence, aren't you? Not going to happen. I stand by my patrol.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06028_.mp3: This Wookiee got out of hand and *had* to be put down. We'll find another easy enough.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06030_.mp3: It... is a bit costly. Look, why are you asking this?
Male_05.nm22abdehn06032_.mp3: [Success] What... you're a Czerka inspector, aren't you! Slimy little... I've heard about these shake-downs.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06034_.mp3: Give it up, men. If we don't pay this leech we'll get a black mark on our records a sunspot couldn't burn off.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06036_.mp3: But I, I... if you say so, sir. I don't think we have enough... here.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06038_.mp3: Yes, I'm sure it will be. If I see anything on our records I'll have you fed to a katarn. In bite-sized chunks.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06047_.mp3: Uh, if we're done here, we have a patrol to get back to.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06048_.mp3: Now, if you don't mind, we have a patrol to get back to.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06050_.mp3: You are making this difficult. You know, maybe it's too much trouble to pay you. Maybe there's a better way.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06053_.mp3: [Failure] What are you trying to get away with here? You can't just walk up and start demanding things.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06057_.mp3: I think this troublemaker needs an accident. In fact, I think this Wookiee attacked this fool and we arrived just a little too late to help.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06059_.mp3: Uh, Captain, we have blasters. Don't Wookiees use those bowcaster things?
Male_05.nm22abdehn06061_.mp3: Would you just shut up and shoot?
Male_05.nm22abdehn06064_.mp3: [Success] I... I think I should probably pay you so this stays off my record. Yes, that's best.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06066_.mp3: Uh, Captain.... what's going on? Is this one of those inspector shake-downs?
Male_05.nm22abdehn06069_.mp3: Is that a joke? Who do you think you are?
Male_05.nm22abdehn06071_.mp3: What the...? Blasters ready, men! This fool wants to die!
Male_05.nm22abdehn06074_.mp3: [Success] You make some sense. I wonder, what do you know about what might happen here?
Male_05.nm22abdehn06076_.mp3: Men, I think we should petition for a transfer. The corporation will survive a fight here, but us frontline guards won't.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06080_.mp3: Yes, I say so. Move out. This place just isn't worth the trouble.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06083_.mp3: [Success] I... I think I should pull in some favors and... get us moved off-world, men.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06085_.mp3: Uh, are you all right, Captain?
Male_05.nm22abdehn06087_.mp3: Are you questioning my orders? You don't want to do that.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06090_.mp3: Well... all right then. Carry on. We've work to do here.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06092_.mp3: Thanks for taking care of that, Captain.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06094_.mp3: You shut up. I'm not done with you two.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06096_.mp3: The company has branches on many planets. I'm just a Patrol Captain. It's not my job to monitor it all.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06098_.mp3: If you want quotes on policy, get someone else. I just escort the slaves and guard this area.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06102_.mp3: There are a few patrols in the lower areas, but I haven't heard what they are after.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06104_.mp3: Good. Watch yourself. These old paths are dangerous.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06105_.mp3: What is it now? If you don't mind, I have important matters to discuss with my patrol.
Male_05.nm22abdehn06106_.mp3: What are you doing back here? Look, you got what you wanted, so just let us get back to corralling these animals.
Male_05.nm24aadroi01002_.mp3: Playback: "I don't get it. That merchant said there was salvage down here. We need Matton to work the sensors."

Male_06.nm33aafrei08000_.mp3: I'm just here on one of Czerka's transports. I don't have no business with you.
Male_06.nm33aafrei08002_.mp3: There isn't much to do in Dreshdae except have a drink until your ship's ready to go.
Male_06.nm33aafrei08004_.mp3: Most of the merchants head over to Czerka's headquarters if they want to do some trading.
Male_06.nm33aafrei08006_.mp3: Don't go near that Sith place. They won't let you in, and them Sith will probably shoot you before they look at you.
Male_06.nm33aafrei08008_.mp3: Those Sith are about. Probably even watching us in here. Don't bet they ain't.
Male_06.nm33aainfo11000_.mp3: I suppose you've heard? The heads of the Sith academy have disappeared. Something is going on, I'm sure of it.
Male_06.nm33aainfo11001_.mp3: There's some kind of power struggle going on at the Sith academy, I hear. Nothing unusual for those Sith, I guess.
Male_06.nm33aainfo11002_.mp3: I hear the Sith in the academy are fighting each other. Hope they don't blow it up around themselves, or the colony will go with them!
Male_06.nm33aainfo11003_.mp3: You look... familiar. Aren't you the one who won the swoop championship on Manaan? Too bad the circuit's dead or you could go pro.
Male_06.nm33aainfo11004_.mp3: It's not often I get a chance to meet such a fine swoop racer. You won on Manaan, right?
Male_06.nm33aainfo11005_.mp3: Aren't you the Manaan swoop champion? I figured you'd have gone to another sector by now, one with an actual circuit up and running.
Male_06.nm33aainfo11006_.mp3: Have you heard? The kolto on Manaan has been poisoned... completely ruined. That's terrible news with the war still underway.
Male_06.nm33aainfo11007_.mp3: I bet the Republic is responsible for the loss of the kolto on Manaan. Yes they...they just want to keep it out of the hands of the Sith, I'm sure of it.
Male_06.nm33aainfo11008_.mp3: The kolto reserves are all gone. That means the casualties in this war are going to become horrifying!
Male_06.nm33aainfo11009_.mp3: I heard something about the Wookiees on Edean suddenly revolting. Do you know anything about that?
Male_06.nm33aainfo11010_.mp3: One of my friends in Czerka said that they've been driven off Edean by those Wookiee creatures. Barbaric beasts!
Male_06.nm33aainfo11011_.mp3: Can you imagine? The Wookiee slaves on Edean have gone insane and started attacking the Czerka outpost there. It must be horrific!
Male_06.nm33aainfo11012_.mp3: The Sith blew up Taris, the entire planet. I guess they must have deserved it... but that's so many people...
Male_06.nm33aainfo11013_.mp3: I suppose you've heard about Taris being destroyed? The Republic must have pushed the Sith into it, that's what I think.
Male_06.nm33aainfo11014_.mp3: One of Korriban's primary trade routes went through Taris. Now that it's destroyed, the colony here will have an even harder time of it.

Male_07.nm17aggrif03000_.mp3: Ah, just the person I was hoping to see!
Male_07.nm17aggrif03004_.mp3: Okay, sis - I see you're still mad. Fair enough. I don't think you could help me with this anyway. It's uh... more of a job for your friend here.
Male_07.nm17aggrif03006_.mp3: As you may know, tach glands can be refined into a very potent powder. It's the primary ingredient in Tarisian ale - that's what makes it so strong.
Male_07.nm17aggrif03008_.mp3: Of course, now that Taris is pretty much wiped from the face of the map Tarisian ale has become somewhat scarce - and uh... very, very valuable. Luckily, I know the secret recipe!
Male_07.nm17aggrif03010_.mp3: I know this guy... he's with the Exchange. Now, if I give him a small sample of Tarisian ale he says he can synthesize it and reproduce it in mass quantities.
Male_07.nm17aggrif03012_.mp3: Problem is, I need one of those tach glands to make the first batch. And now that Taris is a smoking ruin, the only place to find tach is on Kashyyyk.
Male_07.nm17aggrif03014_.mp3: If you can get your hands on one of those tach glands I'll make it worth your while.
Male_07.nm17aggrif03018_.mp3: Please, you have to help me! I... I promised this guy from the Exchange a sample of Tarisian ale! If I don't come through for him he's going to break my legs... or worse!
Male_07.nm17aggrif03020_.mp3: Yeah, I knew you'd come through for me! You won't regret this... you'll see! Uh... just... just don't take too long, okay? This guy from the Exchange could stop by any day.
Male_07.nm17aggrif03022_.mp3: I kind of told him I already had the stuff, so if he shows up and I'm empty handed... well, let's just say I really, really hope it doesn't come to that.
Male_07.nm17aggrif03025_.mp3: Come on, Mission - I'm your brother! I'm family! You can't turn your back on me!
Male_07.nm17aggrif03029_.mp3: You bring me a single tach gland and you not only save my life but you get a piece of this great business opportunity! I mean, you can't pass this up! Think about it and you'll see I'm right.
Male_07.nm17aggrif03031_.mp3: Come on, I'm Mission's brother! I'm her family! I mean, think what she'll do if you just let the Exchange kill me! Besides, this is a sweet deal!
Male_07.nm17aggrif03034_.mp3: Sorry, like I said before I don't have any credits on me. And Greeta won't lend me any credits. I mean, it's like he doesn't trust me to pay him back or something.
Male_07.nm17aggrif03036_.mp3: But you come through on this and I promise you'll get a huge payday down the road. Two... no! Three thousand credits! How's that sound?
Male_07.nm17aggrif03041_.mp3: Mission didn't come with you, I see. Uh... guess she's still mad at me. Oh well... it's probably for the best. This job is more up your alley anyway.
Male_07.nm17aggrif03042_.mp3: You're back! I knew you'd come through for me. I knew I could count on you! Uh... you do have a tach gland for me, right?
Male_07.nm17aggrif03044_.mp3: Come to papa you sweet simian organ! It may not look like much, but once I turn this into a bottle of Tarisian ale it'll end up being worth a fortune!
Male_07.nm17aggrif03046_.mp3: Thanks, Mission. You won't regret helping me out with this!
Male_07.nm17aggrif03050_.mp3: Geez, sis - that's pretty harsh. Come on, I know things haven't been great between us but when I corner the market on Tarisian ale I'll make things up to you!
Male_07.nm17aggrif03054_.mp3: Okay, that's the way you want it. But when I'm rich you're going to regret saying that!
Male_07.nm17aggrif03058_.mp3: Hey, sis, no need to worry about that. I've turned over a new leaf. From now on I'm going to stay out of trouble and do things right.
Male_07.nm17aggrif03060_.mp3: And once we've cornered the market on Tarisian ale good things will be heading my way. Then I'll make it up to you, Mission. Just wait - you'll see!
Male_07.nm17aggrif03062_.mp3: You know, once we synthesize this and start brewing Tarisian ale in mass quantities we're going to be looking for some investors.
Male_07.nm17aggrif03064_.mp3: You give me a couple hundred credits and I can get you in on the ground floor. You'll get a return of... oh, at least twenty times your investment!
Male_07.nm17aggrif03066_.mp3: Hey, don't worry, you'll get your credits as soon as we start mass producing that Tarisian ale. I just wanted to know if you were interested in an even bigger payoff.
Male_07.nm17aggrif03068_.mp3: Wise move. I can see you really understand how business works: now, when you see your chance, you jump at it! Heh, that's my motto.
Male_07.nm17aggrif03070_.mp3: I better get started on brewing that ale. Meet me back here later and I'll have a downpayment on what I owe you.
Male_07.nm17aggrif03073_.mp3: You don't know much about business, do you? When an opportunity like this comes along you have to jump at it! Come on, what do you say?
Male_07.nm17aggrif03075_.mp3: It's your loss. I better get started brewing that ale. Meet me back here later and I'll give you a downpayment on what I owe you.
Male_07.nm17aggrif03078_.mp3: Whoa - no need to get violent. I can take the hint. I was just trying to do you a favor, but I see you're not interested.
Male_07.nm17aggrif03081_.mp3: Sorry, like I said before I don't have any credits on me. And Greeta won't lend me any. It's like he doesn't trust me to pay him back or something.
Male_07.nm17aggrif03083_.mp3: But you come through on this and I promise you'll get a huge payday down the road. Two... no! Three thousand credits! How's that sound?
Male_07.nm17aggrif03085_.mp3: Changed your mind? No... you can't! Eh... do you know what this guy from the Exchange will do to me if I don't come through? Come on, you have to help me here!
Male_07.nm20aagrif05000_.mp3: Uh... you there! I'm... I'm a high ranking executive of the Czerka Corporation! Eh... there's a big reward if you take me back to Anchorhead!
Male_07.nm20aagrif05002_.mp3: Mission? Is it really you? I heard Taris was destroyed! I thought you were dead! Joy of joys, my little sister is alive!
Male_07.nm20aagrif05004_.mp3: Ah, well... there's the truth and then there's the *truth*, you know? I always meant to go back to Taris, sis. Just as soon as I had the credits to pay off my debts. But credits have been hard to come by.
Male_07.nm20aagrif05006_.mp3: Come on, sis. You didn't need me to look after you anymore. You may have been young, but you knew how to take care of yourself. Besides, you're here now - everything worked out fine.
Male_07.nm20aagrif05008_.mp3: Uh... well, I... I wanted to thank you, and, uh, you look like you're doing well. Financially, I mean. Say... um... could you spare me a few credits to get back on my feet?
Male_07.nm20aagrif05010_.mp3: Huh... that didn't go well. Sis always was a little too fiery for her own good. She'll cool down in time.
Male_07.nm20aagrif05012_.mp3: Ah, she'll be okay. We've had our fights before. Too bad, though. I could really have used a helping hand right now.
Male_07.nm20aagrif05014_.mp3: You may have saved my life, but I don't have a single credit to my name. Say, you wouldn't be able to spare me some credits? Just till I get back on my feet, you know?
Male_07.nm20aagrif05016_.mp3: That's it, huh? Oh, figured you would be able to spare a bit more than that, but, you know, I'll take whatever I can get. Don't worry about me... I've already got a job waiting for me.
Male_07.nm20aagrif05017_.mp3: Greeta, the manager over at the Czerka supply shop, said I could come work for him if I ever get tired of the mines. I think I'll go take him up on his offer.
Male_07.nm20aagrif05018_.mp3: You know, maybe there's something else you can help me with. I need to talk to a guy first and set up the details, but if you're interested in a job come see me in Greeta's shop.
Male_07.nm20aagrif05019_.mp3: Goodbye, Mission. Uh... I'm glad you're not dead.
Male_07.nm20aagrif05024_.mp3: Huh - I... uh... guess you've been talking to Lena, too. That's okay - I'll figure out a way to get by without your credits. I always do. Besides, I've already got a job lined up for me.
Male_07.nm20aagrif05026_.mp3: Ha! You're kidding, right? Look at me... do I look like I've got any reward for you?
Male_07.nm20aagrif05027_.mp3: Well, that and uh... could you please get me out of here? You've got a tough looking friend there.
Male_07.nm20aagrif05028_.mp3: So, uh... you're here to save me, right? I'm sure you'll get... a huge reward! Yes indeed, Mission always said some people would pay to find me.
Male_07.nm20aagrif05030_.mp3: My name is Griff. You know her? Are you from Czerka Corporation? Please, tell me what's going on here!
Male_07.nm20aagrif05032_.mp3: I'm her brother! She's alive? I... I can't believe it! When I heard about Taris I thought the worst! Come on, take me to her! Get me out of here!
Male_07.nm20aagrif05037_.mp3: You can't abandon me here. These Sand People, they're animals.
Male_07.nm20aagrif05038_.mp3: What, we've only just met and everything is about you? What about me? Mission wouldn't want me trapped here waiting for Sand People to kill me.
Male_07.nm20aagrif05042_.mp3: You know I do, Mission, you know I do. Honest this time.
Male_07.nm20aagrif05043_.mp3: Yeah, you do that. Mission would appreciate it. I know it. She loves me like a... well, a brother, I guess.
Male_07.nm20aagrif05046_.mp3: Hey, come on now, you may as well be killing me. Get me out of here!
Male_07.nm20aagrif05048_.mp3: What, no speeder escort? Okay, okay, I should just take what I can get. I sure would like to see Mission, though.
Male_07.nm20aagrif05049_.mp3: She's probably waiting for you on the ship you used to come to Tatooine, right? I think I'll go to the spaceport and see her. She'd like that.
Male_07.nm20aagrif05050_.mp3: Thanks again. Oh, and don't tell Mission I'm coming. I want it to be a surprise when I show up at the spaceport. I can't wait to see the look on her face.
Male_07.nm20aagrif05053_.mp3: Oh, I've been thinking about a lot of things! Honest! Come on now, let me go.
Male_07.nm20aagrif05055_.mp3: Hey, there's no call for that. If you know Mission like you say, you'll know she'd want me alive. I'm her dear brother.
Male_07.nm20aagrif05057_.mp3: What? No! This isn't right! No!
Male_07.nm20aagrif05060_.mp3: You're back! You've come to let old Griff out, right? Right? Uh... I don't want to beg, but I'm more than willing.
Male_07.nm20aagrif05062_.mp3: We used to be so close, sis. Now, I know we've had our differences, but I really need to get out of here now. No fooling.
Male_07.nm20aagrif05064_.mp3: Because you know, I... I think Mission would really appreciate me being alive and not at all dead.

Male_08.nm26acignu04000_.mp3: Shame about Sunry getting convicted like that. I guess he really did kill Elassa after all.
Male_08.nm26acignu04002_.mp3: There, you got what you wanted: Sunry's free. Now don't ever mention my part in this again!
Male_08.nm26acignu04004_.mp3: I guess Sunry didn't kill the Sith woman after all. Could have sworn he left after the shot though...
Male_08.nm26acignu04006_.mp3: You're the one defending Sunry now, eh? Well, the hotel's open for you and I guess I got to answer any questions you want, too.
Male_08.nm26acignu04008_.mp3: The Sith woman Elassa rented a room in the hotel. An hour or two later Sunry comes in and goes to her room. A couple hours later I hear a blaster shot and see Sunry running.
Male_08.nm26acignu04010_.mp3: Sure. *wink* *wink* Sunry left before the blaster went off, so he couldn't have done it.
Male_08.nm26acignu04012_.mp3: Do you need to know anything else?
Male_08.nm26acignu04013_.mp3: He can't run good 'cause he's a cripple, but still he was going pretty fast. I would swear he started after the shot though.
Male_08.nm26acignu04015_.mp3: Yeah, I'm pretty damn sure he left after the shot went off.
Male_08.nm26acignu04017_.mp3: No, I don't think so. I mean, it's possible, just barely, but I wouldn't say that to the court.
Male_08.nm26acignu04019_.mp3: [Failure] No. No way I'm lying to the court just because you want to get your Republic buddy off, or whatever. I have no interest in going to prison!
Male_08.nm26acignu04021_.mp3: [Success] That's a lot of money... Maybe I could do something for you then.
Male_08.nm26acignu04023_.mp3: Alright, I'll do it. I'll tell the Selkath that he left before the shot went off, but this is our little secret. If you try and turn me in for lying, I'm making sure you come with me!
Male_08.nm26acignu04025_.mp3: Now, was there anything else you wanted?
Male_08.nm26acignu04027_.mp3: [Success] Yeah. I'll tell the court Sunry left before the shot went off.
Male_08.nm26acignu04029_.mp3: Is there anything else you need?
Male_08.nm26acignu04030_.mp3: [Failure] What?? Why the hell should I? I'll tell them what I saw and that's it.
Male_08.nm26acignu04032_.mp3: Now is there anything else you want?
Male_08.nm26acignu04034_.mp3: What do you want to know?
Male_08.nm26acignu04036_.mp3: Elassa used to rent rooms here every week or so. Then Sunry would come by a couple hours later and stay all night.
Male_08.nm26acignu04038_.mp3: It doesn't take a genius to figure out what was going on.
Male_08.nm26acignu04040_.mp3: There were only two other people in the hotel when it happened. One was a Rodian named Gluupor. Seems like a really dirty, shifty type.
Male_08.nm26acignu04042_.mp3: Normally I don't let his kind in here - I'm a reputable business man, you know! - but there weren't many people here, so I decided to take a chance.
Male_08.nm26acignu04044_.mp3: The other is a regular named Firith Me. He's a Pazaak player. Probably an addict, but he claims he's big in some circles.
Male_08.nm26acignu04046_.mp3: Don't know anything about him other than that.
Male_08.nm26acignu04048_.mp3: Anything else you want to know?
Male_08.nm26acignu04050_.mp3: Well, OK. If you need anything else I'm going to be right here.
Male_08.nm26acignu04052_.mp3: Sorry, but the hotel is closed.
Male_08.nm26acignu04054_.mp3: Ever since the murder, the Selkath have made me keep this place locked up tight. Only the Selkath authorities and those authorized by them are allowed in.
Male_08.nm26acignu04056_.mp3: This old Republic war-hero by the name of Sunry was seeing this Sith woman here - Elassa.
Male_08.nm26acignu04058_.mp3: Well, they were seeing each other, but the other night a blaster went off in one of the rooms. Sunry got seen leaving the place and the Sith woman was dead on the floor.
Male_08.nm26acignu04060_.mp3: But not everyone thinks this Sunry did it, so the Selkath are holding him in prison while the case gets sorted out. In the meantime they close down my hotel!
Male_08.nm26acignu04062_.mp3: But enough about my problems... You can't stay here while the investigation is on. You'll have to find someplace else to stay. Sorry.
Male_08.nm26acignu04065_.mp3: [Failure] Ha! They sent me a list of people to let in, and they're all Selkath. Somehow, you just don't look like one.
Male_08.nm26acignu04067_.mp3: [Failure] I... I... Sorry mate, but it's Selkath authorities only since the murder. You're gonna have to go someplace else to stay.
Male_08.nm26acignu04069_.mp3: Me? Oh, right. I'm Ignus. This is my hotel.
Male_08.nm26acignu04071_.mp3: But since the murder happened I haven't exactly been able to do a lot of business. That's the price of law and order here, I guess.
Male_08.nm26acignu04073_.mp3: A what? No, never head of it. Now this area is closed on account of the murder, so you're gonna have to leave.
Male_08.nm26acignu04075_.mp3: Yeah. Maybe you can find someplace else to stay.

Male_09.nm02aemarl23000_.mp3: You're good, Stranger... maybe even as good as Bendak in his prime. There's no shame in losing to you. But when you beat me you made me realize something, kid.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23002_.mp3: First it was just Twitch I couldn't handle. Now it's you and Twitch. Pretty soon there'll be another young hotshot clawing past me in the rankings.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23004_.mp3: This game's been good to me, but my time is done. I need to get away from the duel rings for a while, think things over. Goodbye, Stranger - I wish you all the best.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23006_.mp3: Hello there, off-worlder. Allow me to introduce myself. My name is Marl. I'm one of the duelists here at the cantina. I was wondering when you'd get around to talking to me.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23008_.mp3: No, we've never met. It's just that most people who come here to watch the duels are bored nobles looking for a little excitement in their drab lives. But you're different.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23010_.mp3: I've seen you in the dueling ring; you're serious about this. People like you scout things out, so I figured eventually you'd come to talk to me.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23011_.mp3: You look like you know a thing or two about combat. I'm guessing you didn't come here to sit on the sidelines and watch a duel. Are you looking for a match?
Male_09.nm02aemarl23014_.mp3: My area of expertise is pretty much limited to the dueling ring and the other combatants here at the cantina, but I'll try to answer any questions you might have.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23016_.mp3: You've come to the right man. I've been dueling here for nearly twenty years and I remember every duelist who's been through this cantina.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23018_.mp3: Of course, there are only five of us left now: Duncan, Gerlon, Ice, Twitch and me. Bendak Starkiller comes in once in a while, but he's retired now.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23020_.mp3: Duncan? Worst duelist ever. His nickname is Deadeye because he fights like he's blind! I wouldn't worry about him.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23022_.mp3: Gerlon used to be pretty good, before the accident. His blaster overheated during a match and exploded. One in a million occurrence. Paralyzed three fingers on his right hand.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23024_.mp3: They call him Gerlon Two-Fingers now. He hasn't been the same since the accident, but he's still out here trying to earn a living. That's why I never fight with blasters.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23026_.mp3: Ice? Eh, she's not much for personality, but she's a hell of a fighter - confident, steady. Popular with the crowd, too. If you go up against her you know you're in for a tough match.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23028_.mp3: Twitch? I think that Rodian is completely crazy, but he's very, very good despite his insanity. Or maybe because of it. Even I can't beat him.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23030_.mp3: Me? I've seen my share of battles. My best years are gone, but I can still hold my own against anyone in here... except maybe Twitch.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23032_.mp3: What can I say? Bendak was a legend. Never lost a match his entire career. But he was bloodthirsty as an Iridorian battle rager - never liked having to face the same opponent twice.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23034_.mp3: Got so he wouldn't battle anyone unless it was a death match. When they made death matches illegal, he went into retirement. He still hangs around here sometimes.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23036_.mp3: Bendak's the best there ever was, plain and simple. Even now I'd bet that anyone who steps into the ring with him wouldn't make it out alive.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23039_.mp3: Only what I heard from the news reports, which are all censored by the Sith. Some pods crashed into the Undercity, anyone caught harboring survivors will be arrested and executed.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23041_.mp3: Really, I don't think it's any of my business. The Sith want to call themselves rulers of Taris, it's fine by me. Just so long as they don't shut the duel ring down.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23043_.mp3: I can only tell you what is recorded in the basic visitor guides: the Upper City is a beautiful destination where intergalactic travelers can find all their basic needs.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23045_.mp3: If you're looking for excitement the duel rings here are your best bet. Stay out of the Lower City - it's nothing but a gang ridden slum. Is there anything else you want to know?
Male_09.nm02aemarl23047_.mp3: The duels themselves are simple enough. Two combatants armed with stun pistols enter the ring. One walks out a winner, the other is carried out unconscious on a stretcher.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23049_.mp3: If you're interested in setting up a match - or if you want to place a wager - just go speak to Ajuur. He's that Hutt over in the corner. He'll make all the arrangements.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23052_.mp3: Goodbye, stranger. Maybe we'll talk again later.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23054_.mp3: Pretty impressive, Stranger. Ice is no pushover. People are starting to take notice of you. They say you're the best thing to come along since Twitch stepped into the ring.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23056_.mp3: If you're going to keep climbing the ranks, then I guess I'm next on your hit list, kid. I'm looking forward to it.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23058_.mp3: You don't waste any time, do you? Go talk to Ajuur - he'll set the match up.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23060_.mp3: I see you got your feet wet in the duel ring. Not bad... you've got real talent, kid. Stick with it and you'll go places.
Male_09.nm02aemarl23061_.mp3: Back again? Are you just here to watch the stun duels, or is there something else I can do for you?

Male_10.nm33aapros18000_.mp3: Uhh... greetings. You wouldn't happen to be looking for a prospect for the academy, would you?
Male_10.nm33aapros18001_.mp3: Look, you've already got your ticket into the academy... there's no need to gloat, is there?
Male_10.nm33aapros18002_.mp3: Hey! You've got one of the medallions!
Male_10.nm33aapros18004_.mp3: What does that mean? It means that you've been accepted into the academy. All you have to do is bring that to Yuthura Ban in the cantina. Didn't the Sith who gave you that tell you?
Male_10.nm33aapros18005_.mp3: Got any advice for someone who's trying to be worthy of admittance?
Male_10.nm33aapros18007_.mp3: Oh really? What do you know, anyway? Get away from me.
Male_10.nm33aapros18009_.mp3: Hmph. Fine. Keep your secrets to yourself. See if I care.
Male_10.nm33aapros18011_.mp3: Oh? So... so there's some secret to it after all? I *knew* it!
Male_10.nm33aapros18012_.mp3: Please, please tell me what I have to do! I'll do anything!
Male_10.nm33aapros18015_.mp3: [Success] That doesn't really sound so easy. I guess it's to prove how brave you are, right? They won't actually kill you? Hm. I guess I'll have to find out...
Male_10.nm33aapros18016_.mp3: [Failure] That would be suicide. Trying to kill off the competition, huh? 'Thanks' for the tip.
Male_10.nm33aapros18018_.mp3: [Success] Hey! Why didn't I think of that? Hmmm... you look a bit too tough for me. I'll go and find someone a bit easier. Thanks a lot!
Male_10.nm33aapros18019_.mp3: [Failure] You're just trying to get me into trouble, aren't you? I'll pass, thanks anyway.
Male_10.nm33aapros18025_.mp3: [Success] R-really? That... that sounds like it's, heh, very dangerous. You survived it, though... maybe it isn't so bad...
Male_10.nm33aapros18026_.mp3: [Failure] Right. Do I look like I was born yesterday? Get lost.
Male_10.nm33aapros18029_.mp3: [Success] I... but, ugh... I guess you're right. If I can't even figure this out, what hope do I have?
Male_10.nm33aapros18030_.mp3: *sigh* I guess this is for the best. Maybe it's time to take up dew farming.
Male_10.nm33aapros18031_.mp3: [Failure] You just want one less competitor, right? Well, we'll see about that.
Male_10.nm33aapros18034_.mp3: N-no, of course not! I wish I was as lucky as you, that's all.
Male_10.nm33aapros18036_.mp3: If I thought I could take it... ahhh, no, never mind. Just go on and quit lording it over me, will you?
Male_10.nm33aapros18041_.mp3: Nobody you need to know. I'm just here to try to get into the Sith academy.
Male_10.nm33aapros18043_.mp3: Why? Why?! That's a really dumb question. To become a Sith, of course! To wield the greatest power in the galaxy!
Male_10.nm33aapros18045_.mp3: Hah! They're weaklings not worth anyone's attention! It's the Sith that are going to conquer the galaxy, after all.
Male_10.nm33aapros18047_.mp3: I don't know. I've been here for a few days now, and the Sith still haven't paid me any attention.
Male_10.nm33aapros18048_.mp3: I suppose I should consider myself lucky. I've heard of some of the prospects getting killed. Still... it's all a test. I'll just have to be strong!
Male_10.nm33aapros18050_.mp3: Well... you have to impress one of the Sith. The final decision rests with Yuthura Ban, however.
Male_10.nm33aapros18051_.mp3: She's the one who decides exactly which of us get into the academy or not. I've been hanging out hoping she'll come by and notice me, to be honest.
Male_10.nm33aapros18053_.mp3: Usually she's in the academy, but sometimes she comes out into the colony to look for prospects.
Male_10.nm33aapros18054_.mp3: If she's in the colony, she can usually be found in the cantina, but not always. She's one of the most powerful Sith in the academy, I hear.
Male_10.nm33aapros18056_.mp3: Look, I'll answer questions if a Sith puts them to me, but not otherwise.
Male_10.nm33aapros18058_.mp3: I mean I'm here to get into the academy, and I'll do whatever it takes to succeed.
Male_10.nm33aapros18060_.mp3: May the Force serve you well.
Male_10.nm33aashaa19021_.mp3: We didn't do anything!! Please! Help us!!
Male_10.nm33aashaa19027_.mp3: Of course I can kill them. The Sith can do whatever they like on Korriban, and frankly these worms rather deserve it. That's for you to decide, however.

Male_100.nm44aawrai06000_.mp3: Revan! Darth Malak warned me you might return. Looks like the Dark Lord was right.
Male_100.nm44aawrai06002_.mp3: *Chuckle* You don't even remember me do you, Revan? The Jedi Council did really did deceive you, didn't they? I was one of the first who joined your cause.
Male_100.nm44aawrai06003_.mp3: I'm surprised the Jedi Council let you live after all you did. But I won't make that same mistake; my pets will make short work of you!

Male_102.nm09aadark01000_.mp3: Who dares to break my meditation? You will pay for interrupting my... wait. I sense the Force is strong with you. Very strong.
Male_102.nm09aadark01002_.mp3: Who would have thought a Force Adept could be found on this insignificant planet? But your talent is no match for a disciple of the dark side!
Male_102.nm09aadark01004_.mp3: Spoken like a true drone of the Jedi Council. We Sith, however, have learned to embrace the potential of the dark side. It is what gives us strength!
Male_102.nm09aadark01006_.mp3: This meeting is a stroke of luck for me - my master will surely reward me with my lightsaber once I kill you!
Male_102.nm09aadark01009_.mp3: You are a fool - this is a new age! The Sith shall be the ones passing judgment now! We are the new order of the galaxy!
Male_102.nm09aadark01012_.mp3: Ah, yes... feed the hatred and anger within yourself! Call upon the power of the dark side! But not even that can save you now.

Male_103.nm22aaczer04000_.mp3: Please leave me. I've contracts to decipher.
Male_103.nm22aaczer04001_.mp3: I don't deal with individual buyers. I'll have my broker contact your people.
Male_103.nm22aaczer04002_.mp3: I don't have time to deal with you.
Male_103.nm22aaczer04003_.mp3: Speak with the director if you need information. I only deal with volume buyers.
Male_103.nm22aaczer04004_.mp3: I wasn't aware we were giving tours now. Leave me.
Male_103.nm22aaczer04005_.mp3: You'd think they'd be grateful to leave this barbaric place.
Male_103.nm22aaczer04006_.mp3: Three restraining collars failed on the last shipment. The buyer was not pleased.
Male_103.nm22aaczer04007_.mp3: You're probably here with the new restraining collars. I'm not handling another shipment without them.

Male_104.nm24aapoff08000_.mp3: Who are you, another civil merchant like that coro-slime up on the docking ring? This is my territory.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08001_.mp3: I don't make deals and I don't persuade easily, so go back topside. Mess with my profits and I'll see you dead.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08003_.mp3: That crazy old fool is still alive? I suppose he's still upset that we don't all live in little homemade shacks like he chooses.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08004_.mp3: I've got a job to do here, and there's nothing you or that old coot can do about it.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08006_.mp3: So you're playing tourist? That isn't smart. The Shadowlands are all business. Mess around and you'll end up dead.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08007_.mp3: That said, if you want to make some credits while you're looking to die, I might have a job for you.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08009_.mp3: I could use an extra hand. A couple men have gone missing. If I lose many more I'll have to close up shop.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08010_.mp3: We are hunting the little simians, the tach. They have a gland that acts as a stimulant when powdered.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08011_.mp3: I figure I've got two or three wealthy years to butcher the lot of them. You want in before I make them extinct?
Male_104.nm24aapoff08013_.mp3: I really can't quote a price. Depends on the market. I give fair value for each one, rest assured. That promise will have to do.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08015_.mp3: All right then, I'll set you up. First you need to be able to draw them out. It's easy.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08016_.mp3: I'll spray you with this scent... it drives them crazy. They can't help but attack you, even if it's a hopeless fight.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08017_.mp3: Then you just carve them up. There's a big fleshy bulb in their brains that you want to scoop out. You can't miss it.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08018_.mp3: I'd feel guilty if the money weren't so good. Come back here when you've got the glands and I'll pay you.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08020_.mp3: Hurry up, I'm wasting too much time on you as it is.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08022_.mp3: Uh, no. I'll be rich by then, and won't need to do it anymore. I don't have to worry about it.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08023_.mp3: Besides, if there's no more tach, the predators that eat them will die off and we'll have an easier time milking this planet.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08025_.mp3: I'm warning you, I didn't get this job because of my sense of humor. You smart mouth me again and we'll have a problem.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08026_.mp3: Hell, I have guards everywhere and a perimeter of sonic emitters. I don't fear anything in the Shadowlands, including you.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08028_.mp3: I'm hard-pressed to come up with a way for you to stop me. I'll defend this operation if I have to.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08030_.mp3: Hurry up. You're eating into my profits.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08032_.mp3: I'll take whatever you have. Keep it up and we'll both be rich. At least until we bleed this planet dry, hahaha!
Male_104.nm24aapoff08035_.mp3: If you made it this far you know a fair bit already. What would I be able to tell you?
Male_104.nm24aapoff08037_.mp3: I'm no nav officer. I work on the ground, and I haven't seen anything like that around here.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08038_.mp3: Of course, we haven't been much deeper than this. The eastern forest gets even more dangerous.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08040_.mp3: It's not worth it. You're fighting the plants as well as the animals. Kshyy vines are tough as metal, and grow back fast.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08041_.mp3: Instead, head office installed repulsor fields to keep the big predators out. Permanent placements too. We'll be fine for years.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08044_.mp3: What? No, I don't do much of that. It's too much of a headache. I'm in the business of harvesting animals.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08045_.mp3: Some of the more exotic species have organs that can be removed and put to some surprising applications.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08046_.mp3: I've already told you about that. You agreed to help bring them in.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08047_.mp3: Talk to me about work and maybe I'll tell you more.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08049_.mp3: Besides you? Besides any number of predators that can kill in seconds? I suppose there's old Bindo.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08050_.mp3: He's got a camp here somewhere. I'd leave him alone, though. Anyone who'd live down here is just plain crazy.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08051_.mp3: There's not much else. We've got a repulsor field to the east so not much passes through here now.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08053_.mp3: It ain't easy. We've set up a perimeter of sonic emitters to keep the bigger preds away. It's worked so far.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08054_.mp3: As long as the emitters are operational, we're pretty much safe. It makes harvesting a lot easier.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08056_.mp3: Is that old hermit Jolee trying to talk you into doing his dirty work? We've spent too much on setting up just to walk away.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08057_.mp3: As long the sonic emitters keep the preds away and I've got bodies to guard the perimeter, we're staying right here.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08058_.mp3: I mean, if I can put up with my own worthless guards complaining about this place, Jolee whining through you is nothing.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08060_.mp3: All right, I'm done talking with you. You've got under my skin one too many times! I'll bury you down here!
Male_104.nm24aapoff08062_.mp3: I don't need this kind of garbage from you. Watch your mouth. I'm the only law there is down here.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08063_.mp3: If you've got something to say, get on with it. Otherwise, leave me alone. I've credits to earn.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08066_.mp3: Good. I'm not down here to direct traffic.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08068_.mp3: He's got no authority with me. I'm with Czerka Corporation. He's just some pet we keep so the locals stay in line.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08069_.mp3: As long as you don't get in my way, you can wander where you want. I've got a job to do.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08071_.mp3: Look, I don't care if you want to play tourist down here, but you behave yourself or we'll have a problem.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08072_.mp3: I've got a job to do, and I won't be gentle if you get in my way, understand?
Male_104.nm24aapoff08073_.mp3: Back again, hmm? Unless you've business with me I suggest you turn around and walk away.
Male_104.nm24aapoff08075_.mp3: Deserter! Traitor! I'll make an example of you!
Male_104.nm24aapoff08076_.mp3: Well that's just great! I don't have the men to keep this location safe!
Male_104.nm24aapoff08077_.mp3: I'll be back, though! There's money here!

Male_105.nm35aarepp09002_.mp3: As if I would ever believe that!
Male_105.nm35aarepp09004_.mp3: I'll kill you before you kill me! I swear it!!
Male_105.nm35aarepp09005_.mp3: You'll pay for what you've done! AAHHHHH!!
Male_105.nm35aarepp09006_.mp3: I won't be an easy kill for you, Sith!!
Male_105.nm35aarepp09010_.mp3: What, so you can have sport with me? AAHHHHH!!
Male_105.nm35aarepp09012_.mp3: You... you're going to make me fight, aren't you? Then... then fight I will!!
Male_105.nm35aarepp09013_.mp3: Come and get me, if that's what you want!!
Male_105.nm35aarepp09014_.mp3: You want me... to fight you?
Male_105.nm35aarepp09015_.mp3: You give me a weapon, Sith... I'm going to use it.
Male_105.nm35aarepp09016_.mp3: I... your kind has killed everyone I know!

Male_106.nm03aeboun03000_.mp3: I'll stick with the bounties Davik puts out... they're usually less dangerous than the government funded contracts.
Male_106.nm03aeboun03002_.mp3: I saw Calo Nord in the tap room. He's a legend in this business! I wonder if he'd give me an autograph?
Male_106.nm03aeboun03004_.mp3: These are good times for bounty hunters! I've made a small fortune on the bounties Zax has been paying out.
Male_106.nm03aeboun03006_.mp3: Did you hear? Somebody killed Gadon Thek! I bet it won't be long until the Beks put out a bounty on Brejik's head in retaliation!
Male_106.nm03aeboun03008_.mp3: Word is somebody stole the Vulkar's prototype swoop engine! I wonder if there's a reward to bring it back?
Male_106.nm03aeboun03010_.mp3: I saw you kill Bendak Starkiller! I was just about to bring him in, too!
Male_106.nm03aeboun03012_.mp3: See the price on Bendak Starkiller's head? Too bad no one will collect. Bendak never leaves the safety of that Upper City Cantina.

Male_107.nm08aadavg06000_.mp3: Hey - what's the idea barging in here! Get out of here or I'll call the guards.
Male_107.nm08aadavg06004_.mp3: Hey, baby - wait! I wasn't actually going - DAMNIT! Okay, great. You just scared off my date for the night, so you better explain yourself before I lose my temper and call the guards!
Male_107.nm08aadavg06006_.mp3: [Success] Okay, I guess it was just an honest mistake. And I'm a reasonable man, so I'll just let it go this time.
Male_107.nm08aadavg06008_.mp3: You better pay more attention to where you're going. Opening the wrong door around here can get you killed. Now get out of here and don't bother me again!
Male_107.nm08aadavg06010_.mp3: [Failure] Uh-uh. No way. You ain't getting out of this mess that easy! You can explain yourself to the guards - if you live long enough for them to question you!
Male_107.nm08aadavg06013_.mp3: [Success] Okay, I guess it was an honest mistake. Give me the credits and I'll forget this ever happened.
Male_107.nm08aadavg06016_.mp3: You should have picked an easier target! By the time the guards show up they'll have to take you out of here in pieces!
Male_107.nm08aadavg06022_.mp3: I tried to play nice, but I guess you're too stupid to figure it out! You keep coming back and bothering me!
Male_107.nm08aadavg06024_.mp3: I guess the only way you'll get the message is if I kill you!

Male_108.nm14acbolo01280_.mp3: What?? What are you talking about? I don't want that bantha of a wife Handon has!
Male_108.nm14acbolo01315_.mp3: No! If I'm going, I'm going to take him with me! You don't know anything about what happened!
Male_108.nm14acbolo01317_.mp3: Yeah, I came out here to kill Calder. The Hutt-spawn was funneling credits from our business and we were going under because of it.
Male_108.nm14acbolo01318_.mp3: But if I'm getting caught, I'm not going to go down by myself! You two idiots let the real killer go!
Male_108.nm14acbolo01321_.mp3: I came out here to kill Calder and when I saw someone over by the bridge I shot him. But Handon had already killed him!
Male_108.nm14acbolo01341_.mp3: Damn you! Damn both of you!

Male_11.nm26acrepi09000_.mp3: So you're the one Roland has got to help us interrogate this prisoner. I hope your Jedi powers will come in useful, this one has been most resistant.
Male_11.nm26acrepi09002_.mp3: He's a Sith spy we picked up a little while ago snooping around outside trying to get in. We thought he was suspicious and brought him inside when the Selkath weren't looking.
Male_11.nm26acrepi09004_.mp3: But it seems the Sith have done a pretty good job of conditioning this guy, and we haven't been able to break him yet.
Male_11.nm26acrepi09006_.mp3: The Sith protect their really important spies with some sort of mental Force feedback system. They can turn their minds in on themselves so Force compulsions won't affect them.
Male_11.nm26acrepi09008_.mp3: Combine this with conventional training to resist interrogation and it sometimes takes months to get them to tell what they know.
Male_11.nm26acrepi09010_.mp3: Do you want to interrogate him now?
Male_11.nm26acrepi09012_.mp3: We're not sure exactly... If you can convince him to talk, we should be able to find that all out.
Male_11.nm26acrepi09016_.mp3: Well if it's so important, just go then. Not like losing that droid would do anything harmful... like getting us banned from Manaan!
Male_11.nm26acrepi09018_.mp3: Good job in getting the pass code out of him. I was sure he couldn't be broken.
Male_11.nm26acrepi09020_.mp3: You're back. Do you want to interrogate the prisoner?
Male_11.nm26acrepi09022_.mp3: While the training the Sith gave him will protect him from most normal interrogation techniques, and also from Force persuasion, we have found a few hooks you might find useful.
Male_11.nm26acrepi09024_.mp3: He was with another man when he was first spotted. We think it was another spy, but we didn't manage to catch him.
Male_11.nm26acrepi09026_.mp3: We also seized some personal documents he had on him when he was captured. It would seem that he's married to a woman named Tela.
Male_11.nm26acrepi09028_.mp3: We checked this in our computers and it seems to hold up. We've sent a couple agents to investigate, but it may be a while.
Male_11.nm26acrepi09030_.mp3: What we have here is your standard issue truth serum. It should make him spill his guts in no time. BUT, there is a catch...
Male_11.nm26acrepi09032_.mp3: Because of his conditioning, he's able to resist it at small doses. But if you give him too much, his body realizes what you're trying to do and shuts his mind down completely.
Male_11.nm26acrepi09034_.mp3: If you do that, you'll have to inject him with an antidote that neutralizes the truth serum. Unfortunately, that, too, has a drawback.
Male_11.nm26acrepi09036_.mp3: It causes short term memory loss. This may work to your advantage, because you can try the same tactic over and over again. But if you use it too much, he may forget everything we want to know.
Male_11.nm26acrepi09040_.mp3: Hey you! Wake up! Someone wants to talk to you.
Male_11.nm26acrepi09043_.mp3: Ok, but you should know what we have to work with here first.
Male_11.nm26acrepi09049_.mp3: He's already too full of this stuff as it is. You should question him now, because he's as pliable as he's going to get!
Male_11.nm26acrepi09051_.mp3: You should be careful not to give him too high a dose. He should be more pliable now.
Male_11.nm26acrepi09058_.mp3: The Sith will never trust you again, spy! We're the only place you have left! Tell us what we want to know!
Male_11.nm26acrepi09075_.mp3: The gutless Sith worm is already starting to crack. We'll have what we need within hours.
Male_11.nm26acrepi09083_.mp3: Of course they would never believe we let you go so easily. But they would all too happily believe you betrayed them.
Male_11.nm26acrepi09087_.mp3: What's the passcode to the Sith base?
Male_11.nm26acrepi09091_.mp3: Good. With this pass, you should be able to get into the Sith base without trouble.
Male_11.nm26acrepi09093_.mp3: Just don't delay too long, or they might learn that he's been captured.
Male_11.nm26acrepi09111_.mp3: Giving up so soon? I think he could last a bit longer. Come back if you want to try to break him again. He's not going anywhere for a LONG time.
Male_11.nm26acrepi09114_.mp3: No problem. He's not going anywhere for a LONG time.
Male_11.nm26acrepi09117_.mp3: Oh, OK. If you need to find out anything else from this prisoner, though, he'll be here for quite a while, I'm thinking.

Male_110.nm10abvulk03004_.mp3: You idiot! You can't just let them walk out of here! They might be a Bek spy after our spice!
Male_110.nm10abvulk03011_.mp3: Oh, you idiot! Brejik didn't hire any new lab techs. That's probably a Bek spy!
Male_110.nm10abvulk03016_.mp3: If you take that money I'll tell Brejik you let a Bek spy bribe you!

Male_111.nm02aejerg19000_.mp3: No hard feelings, my good man, but I can't really talk with you right now. It's difficult enought to draw the interest of the ladies in this establishment as it is.
Male_111.nm02aejerg19002_.mp3: Surely you understand what I'm talking about. I'd guess you've experienced many lonely evenings... something I'm hoping to avoid tonight.
Male_111.nm02aejerg19004_.mp3: The exotic beauty returns. Hello again, my dear. Have you changed your mind? Do you want to take me up on my offer? Just twenty credits and I can arrange a meeting with the band.
Male_111.nm02aejerg19006_.mp3: Excellent. Wait here while I go set it up with my contact. I'll give him your credits, then I'll come back out and take you to meet the band.
Male_111.nm02aejerg19009_.mp3: Well, I would like to help you but I can't arrange the meeting for free. And I'm afraid your feminine charms would have little effect on the Rodian bodyguards backstage.
Male_111.nm02aejerg19011_.mp3: If you manage to come up with the credits just come back and see me. I'll be more than happy to arrange for you to meet the band. Until then, please enjoy the music.
Male_111.nm02aejerg19014_.mp3: You sting me with your words! I merely thought I could offer you the rare opportunity to meet a celebrity before they were famous. But I see you're not interested.
Male_111.nm02aejerg19017_.mp3: That's too bad. They really are charming fellows. Very well, then - I hope you enjoy the music. If you change your mind come speak with me again.
Male_111.nm02aejerg19019_.mp3: Well, hello there! I see from your exotic appearance that you are not from Taris originally. Allow me to introduce myself - my name is Jergan.
Male_111.nm02aejerg19021_.mp3: What do you think of our local music? The band is quite good, wouldn't you agree? They're on the verge of intergalactic stardom, you know.
Male_111.nm02aejerg19023_.mp3: Obviously you have an ear for music. Mark my words, they'll be famous soon enough. They were about to go on tour before this Sith quarantine stranded them here.
Male_111.nm02aejerg19027_.mp3: They are something of an acquired taste. But mark my words, they'll be famous soon enough. They were about to go on tour before this Sith quarantine stranded them here.
Male_111.nm02aejerg19029_.mp3: Would you like to meet the band after the show? Maybe have a brief brush with fame before they become intergalactic superstars? I can arrange it, you know.
Male_111.nm02aejerg19033_.mp3: Are you certain? This is a once in a lifetime opportunity - meet the legends before they were famous. All it will cost you is a small handful of credits.
Male_111.nm02aejerg19035_.mp3: I have a standing arrangement with one of the Rodian bodyguards backstage. For the small sum of 20 credits he'll let me set up a meeting with you and the band.

Male_112.nm33aapilo14000_.mp3: Nice to see you again. Hold onto that Hawk... it'll do well by you.
Male_112.nm33aapilo14001_.mp3: Greetings, friend. Fellow pilot, are you? Wouldn't mind taking a spin in the Ebon Hawk, myself. Sleek ship, that one.
Male_112.nm33aapilo14003_.mp3: In a small colony like this, everyone knows everyone's business.
Male_112.nm33aapilo14004_.mp3: It's better than thinking too much about all the Sith lurking about, here.
Male_112.nm33aapilo14005_.mp3: The Hawk's been in and out of here for ages. An out-of-the-way starport is a good place for, uh... privateers. Not saying you are one.
Male_112.nm33aapilo14007_.mp3: Wouldn't make any difference to me. Just wish I had a ship like that, myself. Business is steady here with the Sith, but it's a boring haul.
Male_112.nm33aapilo14010_.mp3: Sorry. Hard not to be interested. All we get to do is freighter work, though the Sith certainly provide a lot of that.
Male_112.nm33aapilo14012_.mp3: Oh, just a boring freighter. We've had some pretty steady work here, though, since the Sith started their excavations up on the surface.
Male_112.nm33aapilo14013_.mp3: In case you're forgetting, partner, they don't exactly want us talking about their business.
Male_112.nm33aapilo14014_.mp3: Ah, who cares about them? I've seen some of those things they're digging up in those ruins in the valley. Pretty creepy, if you ask me.
Male_112.nm33aapilo14016_.mp3: Weird artifacts. Looks like alien stuff. Maybe aliens lived on Korriban a long time ago, who knows?
Male_112.nm33aapilo14017_.mp3: Don't be stupid. I was talking to one of those Sith and he said there are tombs there dating back to when the Sith were here in ancient times.
Male_112.nm33aapilo14018_.mp3: There were Sith here in ancient times? Sounds like he was feeding you a line. Korriban's only been settled for a short time.
Male_112.nm33aapilo14019_.mp3: So says you. He said that the planet was settled by the Sith a long time ago, and then they all left or something. Those tombs are really important to them.
Male_112.nm33aapilo14020_.mp3: Tombs, hey? That makes the stuff they send us even creepier. Wish I didn't have to haul it around.
Male_112.nm33aapilo14022_.mp3: We used to haul everything to Taris, and the Sith would take it off our hands there. Not sure where we'll be bringing it now.
Male_112.nm33aapilo14024_.mp3: No. We're not due for another shipment for at least another week.
Male_112.nm33aapilo14026_.mp3: It's in a valley on the surface, beyond some mountains to the east. No land route... that's why they have us fly in.
Male_112.nm33aapilo14027_.mp3: Shows what you know. The academy has a route through the mountain... that's how all their students get to the excavation site.
Male_112.nm33aapilo14028_.mp3: Well, regardless, the Sith don't let anybody near that valley. Even when we land, they watch us like a Drayberian hawk and want us gone quickly.
Male_112.nm33aapilo14030_.mp3: Not a chance. You'd be better off sneaking through the academy, if you wanted to go to the valley.
Male_112.nm33aapilo14031_.mp3: Hah! Now that'd be a sight to see.
Male_112.nm33aapilo14035_.mp3: I never said it wasn't. Just would be nice to fly something with a bit of thrust, for once.
Male_112.nm33aapilo15000_.mp3: Our ship will be ready soon. Then it's off to Coruscant for a week or so.
Male_112.nm33aapilo15002_.mp3: You own the Ebon Hawk, don't you? Wish I could fly a bird like that.

Male_113.nm18ab13cr10001_.mp3: Well, you should speak with the Captain. He's the only officer we've got left.
Male_113.nm18ab13cr10002_.mp3: Out of nowhere, they came! I don't think the Captain even saw them coming.
Male_113.nm18ab13cr10003_.mp3: Barely got a shot off. That Captain will tell you all about it.
Male_113.nm18ab13cr10004_.mp3: Dozens of them attacked. I think the Captain's afraid there are more out there.
Male_113.nm18ab13cr10005_.mp3: They were like animals. It was horrible.
Male_113.nm18ab13cr10006_.mp3: These Sand People are vicious. They attacked without any reason.
Male_113.nm18ab13cr10007_.mp3: Thanks for your help. I hope there's no more of those animals out there.
Male_113.nm18ab13cr10008_.mp3: I guess I'm lucky to be alive. No more of this for me, that's for sure.
Male_113.nm18ab13cr10009_.mp3: Is it safe? Heh. Is anywhere safe? I don't think so.
Male_113.nm18ab13cr10010_.mp3: They should all be wiped out. Every last one of them.
Male_113.nm18ab13cr10011_.mp3: How am I supposed to make a living with this going on?

Male_114.nm22aaczer05000_.mp3: I can't talk now. I've got to pack. They'll be on us soon!
Male_114.nm22aaczer05001_.mp3: Just leave me alone. I don't want any trouble. The guards are trigger-happy as it is.
Male_114.nm22aaczer05002_.mp3: Welcome to Edean. I trust you will find our facilities pass inspection. Czerka Corporation is very efficient.
Male_114.nm22aaczer05006_.mp3: I'm sorry, I don't understand Wookieespeak. Shyriiwook, I think it's called? What did the Wookiee say?
Male_114.nm22aaczer05008_.mp3: Czerka Corporation calls the planet Edean, and no, I don't understand the language. The local Wookiee leader has made it so we don't need to.
Male_114.nm22aaczer05010_.mp3: Wookiees are unable to speak basic, but for the last decade the residents of all local villages have been trained to understand it.
Male_114.nm22aaczer05012_.mp3: It helps ease tensions. They are less hostile towards us if they understand what we say.
Male_114.nm22aaczer05016_.mp3: What did he say? I don't usually have a translator I can ask.
Male_114.nm22aaczer05019_.mp3: I understand he works very closely with Czerka Corporation. He wants his people to work well with us. It eases tensions.
Male_114.nm22aaczer05022_.mp3: I just work here in the lab. I... I don't have anything to do with the taking of slaves.
Male_114.nm22aaczer05024_.mp3: I'm just an employee. You'll have to take your concerns to Janos. He's the voice for Czerka Corporation on this outpost.
Male_114.nm22aaczer05026_.mp3: I don't have to justify myself to you. I do good work here. If you're looking for trouble, go somewhere else.
Male_114.nm22aaczer05029_.mp3: I'm not sure I can answer. Janos is the spokesman for Czerka Coporation at this outpost.
Male_114.nm22aaczer05035_.mp3: Call him off! I don't have anything to do with what happens on this planet. I'm just a glorified lab technician!
Male_114.nm22aaczer05044_.mp3: Please, take any inquiries you have to director Janos. I must continue my work.
Male_114.nm22aaczer05046_.mp3: I'm conducting experiments on various samples of indigenous plant life. There may be untapped pharmaceutical resources here.
Male_114.nm22aaczer05048_.mp3: Of course, that will take some time, and the Wookiees are a more immediate source of income. Please, I must return to my work.
Male_114.nm22aaczer05050_.mp3: There's no call for that. I'm just a glorified lab technician. Please, the assignment is difficult enough.
Male_114.nm22aaczer05052_.mp3: Take your concerns to Janos. He's the one that runs things here. Not me.
Male_114.nm22aaczer05054_.mp3: I'm sorry, but director Janos will see to your questions. I must continue with my work.
Male_114.nm22aaczer05058_.mp3: Hello again. Czerka Corporation is seeing a lot of return business these days. We are the only company offering Wookiees.

Male_115.nm02aetapr33000_.mp3: Did you hear? There's an underground resistance movement against the Sith! They even broke into the military compound, or so I'm hearing.
Male_115.nm02aetapr33002_.mp3: It's bad enough the Sith conquered this planet, but do they have to come in here to relax and rub their presence in our faces?
Male_115.nm02aetapr33004_.mp3: Hey, that quarantine must be tough on you off-worlders stuck here. You should try to make the best of it and order yourself some Tarisian ale. It'll take away some of the sting.
Male_115.nm02aetapr33006_.mp3: Hey - you're the Mysterious Stranger! I saw you fight Bendak! There's nothing more exciting than a woman with a blaster, I say! Too bad my wife wouldn't agree...
Male_115.nm02aetapr33008_.mp3: Hey - you're the Mysterious Stranger! I saw you take out Bendak. Very harsh, man! You're one stone cold killer!
Male_115.nm02aetapr33010_.mp3: Have you heard? Bendak Starkiller's coming out of retirement! I have to get tickets for that match!
Male_115.nm02aetapr33012_.mp3: I wish the off duty Sith would stop coming in here for drinks. They've been scouring the Undercity looking for Republic escape pods and they reek of the sewers!

Male_116.nm26acsith23000_.mp3: Everyone knows the Republic crippled the kolto production. Why don't the Selkath ban them from the planet?
Male_116.nm26acsith23002_.mp3: Stay out of my way. I'm on legitimate Sith business.
Male_116.nm26acsith24000_.mp3: Kolto's real scarce all of a sudden. From what I hear, the Republic is to blame.
Male_116.nm26acsith24002_.mp3: I don't have time to listen to your stories - I've got a full shipment of kolto to load before my shift is over.
Male_116.nm26acsith24004_.mp3: We've got all the proper kolto trading permits, so back off.

Male_118.nm33aadakv08000_.mp3: If you must know, I intend to take the first ship off of this rock. Why should that interest you? I trust you got whatever you wanted from the tombs?
Male_118.nm33aadakv08002_.mp3: I already said, didn't I? I don't want to still be around when they start asking questions about you.
Male_118.nm33aadakv08004_.mp3: Why do you care? I've no intention of opposing you.
Male_118.nm33aadakv08006_.mp3: I don't know. I'll think about it. Just leave me alone, Juhani.
Male_118.nm33aadakv08007_.mp3: Perhaps I'll go back to Dantooine. Or just somewhere where there's no Sith or Jedi, period.
Male_118.nm33aadakv08009_.mp3: Is there some reason you should stop me from going? Are you afraid I'm going to tell someone you're here? What are you going to do, kill me?
Male_118.nm33aadakv08012_.mp3: Still sticking up for me, Juhani?
Male_118.nm33aadakv08014_.mp3: Fine. Let's end it here, then. It looks like you belong amongst the Sith more than I ever did.
Male_118.nm33aadakv08016_.mp3: I may have studied with the Sith, but I've no special loyalty to them. You can believe me or not, as you wish.
Male_118.nm33aadakv08023_.mp3: She and I were... students together at Dantooine, for a time. We were close, and we shared doubts about the Jedi's ways. I left for the Sith because I thought it would be better here.
Male_118.nm33aadakv08024_.mp3: It looks like Juhani changed her mind and stayed with the Jedi after all. Your doing, maybe? Anyway... I'm done with the Jedi, the Sith... and with her. Just leave me alone.

Male_119.nm38abjora02067_.mp3: Uhhhnn... we can... both survive... attack him together!
Male_119.nm38abjora02130_.mp3: Or... or I could use the Force to free them! And we could kill you!! Seems you didn't think of that, old man!!
Male_119.nm38abmeke03000_.mp3: What do you know? I guess he wasn't a 'true Sith' after all.
Male_119.nm38abmeke03002_.mp3: I can't believe that I'm alive. You saved me... you could have easily just answered those questions and let me die.
Male_119.nm38abmeke03004_.mp3: Yeah, well... I see what you mean. I've never... I mean, I've never been on that side of the fence before. It makes you think.
Male_119.nm38abmeke03006_.mp3: I'd be dead if you weren't... I mean, if you were a proper Sith. But you're not, are you? Don't worry... I won't tell anyone.
Male_119.nm38abmeke03014_.mp3: I've never thought about that. Can you... can you even go back? I've done some... I mean, I've hurt a lot of people.
Male_119.nm38abmeke03020_.mp3: I... I don't think the light side is for me. But... maybe neither are the Sith. Maybe it's time for me to leave. Thanks, I suppose... and good luck.
Male_119.nm38abmeke03022_.mp3: [Failure] I... I don't know. I don't think that's for me. I don't know if the Sith are really, either, I'll have to see.
Male_119.nm38abmeke03024_.mp3: I guess there's more than one way to be a Sith. Hard to believe.
Male_119.nm38abmeke03028_.mp3: Well... you can have those writings he mentioned. I won't fight you for them. Master Uthar will be very pleased with you if you give them to him, you know.
Male_119.nm38abmeke03045_.mp3: I'll head back to the academy. I need some rest.
Male_119.nm38abmeke03048_.mp3: Ahh! I'll kill you! You won't get away with this!!

Male_12.nm28acsur303000_.mp3: We were watching you on the cameras, and I want you to know that you did the right thing. Killing that shark probably saved us all.
Male_12.nm28acsur303001_.mp3: I'm sure the kolto will be fine. A few impurities that may have got in should be flushed out in no time.
Male_12.nm28acsur303002_.mp3: Just hurry up and get back to the surface and get the Republic to send down a real rescue team. We'll be waiting here for you.
Male_12.nm28acsur303003_.mp3: I saw what happened on the camera... and I can't believe what you did.
Male_12.nm28acsur303004_.mp3: How could you willfully destroy the kolto harvesting machinery?! That will set us back years!
Male_12.nm28acsur303005_.mp3: I will have you know that when we get back to the surface I'll have the Republic do a full inquiry into your actions!
Male_12.nm28acsur303006_.mp3: Now go back to the surface and get the Republic to send a REAL rescue team down for us.
Male_12.nm28acsur303007_.mp3: No - no, you can't come in here! You'll let the firaxa and the Selkath in! No - stay out! Stay out!
Male_12.nm28acsur303008_.mp3: I won't let you open the door for those monsters to get in! I'll stop you! I'll suck all the pressure out of the chamber! That'll stop you!
Male_12.nm28acsur303010_.mp3: What - what do you want? Go away! You'll let the firaxa and the Selkath in! They'll get us like they got all the others!
Male_12.nm28acsur303012_.mp3: No... the firaxa... the... the Selkath... I... I can't let you in. They'll get us!
Male_12.nm28acsur303014_.mp3: [Success] I... I don't want to hurt you. I don't want to hurt anyone.
Male_12.nm28acsur303015_.mp3: I'll unlock the door, but you have to come in quickly!
Male_12.nm28acsur303017_.mp3: No... I can't. The Selkath will get me! The Firaxa will eat us! I can't! I can't!
Male_12.nm28acsur303020_.mp3: [Success] Yes. You are a friend. You'll protect us. You won't let the firaxa eat us. You'll keep the Selkath away.
Male_12.nm28acsur303022_.mp3: I... I'm sorry for what I did. I don't know what came over me. I... I just panicked when I heard someone outside the door. *Sigh* Please, forgive me. I'm just so scared.
Male_12.nm28acsur303024_.mp3: When the Selkath went crazy I thought everyone else except me and Sami went mad. We had a few people outside the station when it happened...
Male_12.nm28acsur303026_.mp3: The next thing we knew our Selkath researchers started screaming and... and clawing at everything around them. My team... my team was torn apart and eaten before my eyes!
Male_12.nm28acsur303028_.mp3: I suppose that explains a lot. You've been under a lot of strain, here.
Male_12.nm28acsur303029_.mp3: Sami and me... I... I thought we were the only ones left. We heard the Selkath outside at the doors every once in a while... and those strange noises echoing through the base.
Male_12.nm28acsur303032_.mp3: I am Kono Nolan, and this is Sami. We were scientists working here on the Hrakert Rift project.
Male_12.nm28acsur303035_.mp3: We had a secret agreement with moderates in the Selkath government. They knew that Manaan could not survive independently if the Sith were victorious.
Male_12.nm28acsur303037_.mp3: So the Republic approached them about making this secret installation to harvest more kolto where the Sith couldn't see us.
Male_12.nm28acsur303038_.mp3: But that all went horribly, horribly wrong...
Male_12.nm28acsur303044_.mp3: Look, I'm sorry! I've just been under a LOT of strain recently. You know, the whole thing about having my entire research team DEVOURED BEFORE MY EYES!!
Male_12.nm28acsur303047_.mp3: Just... I am sorry for my actions. But... but what are you doing here?
Male_12.nm28acsur303049_.mp3: A Star Map? I don't know of anything about a Star Map down here.
Male_12.nm28acsur303051_.mp3: But we can't go anywhere near those now! Maybe... maybe that's why it all happened in the first place...
Male_12.nm28acsur303058_.mp3: Oh.... okay. What is it you want to know?
Male_12.nm28acsur303061_.mp3: The work teams were outside in the Rift near the vent. Then there was this rumbling and my head felt like it was splitting open...
Male_12.nm28acsur303063_.mp3: It was a firaxa shark I think... bigger than any I'd ever seen before. Bigger than our submersibles.
Male_12.nm28acsur303065_.mp3: Then all the Selkath started screaming too... and they turned on us.
Male_12.nm28acsur303067_.mp3: It was like they couldn't control themselves... like the sound that the monster was making in our heads drove them insane.
Male_12.nm28acsur303070_.mp3: It could have been. It might have a lair in the Hrakert Rift near the kolto vent. Hm... that may explain a few things, too...
Male_12.nm28acsur303072_.mp3: Like why it reacted so violently when our construction efforts got closer to the vent.
Male_12.nm28acsur303073_.mp3: And also why it is so large. It must be feeding off the kolto. It would have to be ancient indeed for it to reach that size. But with kolto as a food source...
Male_12.nm28acsur303075_.mp3: Which would be why they all swarmed when it called out to them... Children coming to protect their mother.
Male_12.nm28acsur303077_.mp3: The firaxan sharks have always been a serious problem. We had some blasters and projectile cannons to defend against them, but they still got some of our workers from time to time.
Male_12.nm28acsur303079_.mp3: Oh, I think not! Even flawed like it is, it should be ideal for this situation.
Male_12.nm28acsur303085_.mp3: Which is exactly what we need in this situation! Something to kill that monster shark that destroyed our station!
Male_12.nm28acsur303087_.mp3: We know exactly what it will do: it will kill the shark. That's what we designed it to do.
Male_12.nm28acsur303089_.mp3: You can take this cannister of toxin. We were working on it just before the giant shark drove all the Selkath insane.
Male_12.nm28acsur303091_.mp3: You don't need to do anything else. We have a cannister of the toxin here right now. We were working on it before the giant firaxan drove all the Selkath insane.
Male_12.nm28acsur303092_.mp3: All you need to do is insert it into the main kolto harvester and have it vent it.
Male_12.nm28acsur303093_.mp3: Get away as soon as you can. We don't know how much worse it will affect the giant firaxan shark.
Male_12.nm28acsur303104_.mp3: But we'll lose everything we've built here! All those years of work!
Male_12.nm28acsur303107_.mp3: You know it's the right thing to do. It can't go wrong.
Male_12.nm28acsur303108_.mp3: Just put the cannister into the machine and have it vent it into the Rift. The firaxan shark should die in no time.
Male_12.nm28acsur303111_.mp3: You know what you have to do.
Male_12.nm28acsur303117_.mp3: That won't work and you know it! We have to vent the toxin from the harvesting machine. Once the shark is dead, we can get back to mining the kolto.
Male_12.nm28acsur303126_.mp3: I don't know. It must still be out there.
Male_12.nm28acsur303129_.mp3: That would be suicide... It's out there still.
Male_12.nm28acsur303132_.mp3: I don't know. It seems impossible, but...
Male_12.nm28acsur303134_.mp3: We had no clue at all... until it came out.
Male_12.nm28acsur303135_.mp3: Maybe what ever sort of power it used to drive the Selkath insane masked it from us somehow... or maybe it was lying dormant deeper in the Rift.
Male_12.nm28acsur303137_.mp3: Hm... maybe. That would explain more...
Male_12.nm28acsur303139_.mp3: It may... It may have been. Maybe it was protecting the ruins by the Rift.
Male_12.nm28acsur303140_.mp3: No! No! The firaxa will get us! No! The Selkath are coming! No!
Male_12.nm28acsur303146_.mp3: You... Sami! Sami, calm down! I don't think they're here to kill us.
Male_12.nm28acsur303148_.mp3: Yes. I think they're here to help us.
Male_12.nm28acsur303149_.mp3: We're not leaving this room. We're safe here, and there's plenty of food and water. If you manage to reach the kolto harvesting machinery you can put the poison cannister in it and trigger it to release it into the Rift.
Male_12.nm28acsur303150_.mp3: After you've made it past the monster safely you can look for this Star Map of yours and unlock the door to the submersible docking bay.
Male_12.nm28acsur303151_.mp3: You can use the submersibles to get back to the surface and report what happened. The Republic will send down a proper rescue crew for us.
Male_12.nm28acsur303152_.mp3: No offense, but we'd rather wait for them than go with you - even if we're stuck here a few more days. Just get back to the surface afterwards, and the Republic will take care of us.

Male_120.nm14acbolo01307_.mp3: What?? I wasn't in anything with that fool Handon! The man I shot... uh...
Male_120.nm28absur201039_.mp3: What? No - I didn't survive this long just to get killed by you!
Male_120.nm28absur201041_.mp3: If you want to kill me, you'll have to catch me first!

Male_121.nm10aavulk05000_.mp3: Wait - don't kill me! I surrender! I surrender!
