Male_23.nm10abvulk08034_.mp3: Well, I don't need your help! I'll figure out some other way to get that spice. Go on - get out of here! Just leave me alone.

Male_24.nm17ab01gu02000_.mp3: The landing bay is lined with autoguns. To keep it safe. Understand?
Male_24.nm17ab01gu02001_.mp3: We don't get much trouble. People die in the desert, not here.
Male_24.nm17ab01gu02002_.mp3: You a swoop racer? Dead in a week, I bet.
Male_24.nm17ab01gu02004_.mp3: There some reason you don't move along?
Male_24.nm17ab01gu02005_.mp3: I've got orders to kill trouble makers. Keep walking.
Male_24.nm17ab01gu02006_.mp3: We'll watch your ship like any other. The bay is safe.
Male_24.nm17ab01gu02007_.mp3: Czerka Corporation has too much invested here to take chances with safety.
Male_24.nm17ac08yu02018_.mp3: Basilisks were always much more reliable than the stuff you see in the Republic or Sith Empire.

Male_26.nm04aainfe08000_.mp3: Do you... do you have the cure, up-worlder? Have you come to save us from the horrible fate of the others?
Male_26.nm04aainfe08001_.mp3: Why have you come back, up-worlder? Do you come to mock us in our suffering as this disease destroys us?
Male_26.nm04aainfe08003_.mp3: When the rakghouls infected me I never thought I'd see my family again. Thank you for all your help, up-worlder.
Male_26.nm04aainfe08005_.mp3: Please... you have to help us. We beg you. We don't want to end up like the others. Please help us. We can't end up like them.
Male_26.nm04aainfe08007_.mp3: You... you have a cure? Please, give it to me. Quickly, before it's too late.
Male_26.nm04aainfe08009_.mp3: Quickly - I must inject it before it is too late. Yes... I feel it working!
Male_26.nm04aainfe08011_.mp3: I feel the disease burning away! It... it is like a miracle! I am cured!
Male_26.nm04aainfe08013_.mp3: Thank you, up-worlder. You have saved us from a fate worse than death. I only wish I had some reward to give you. Maybe you can find something worthwhile in the wreckage of that Republic escape pod.
Male_26.nm04aainfe08015_.mp3: Not long ago an escape pod crashed in the Undercity, far to the northeast of the village. We were going to try and salvage equipment from it when we were attacked by the rakghouls and infected.
Male_26.nm04aainfe08017_.mp3: I'd tell you more if I could, but our salvage team never reached the pod. It's probably still there, unless some of the other up-worlders already found it and picked it clean.
Male_26.nm04aainfe08019_.mp3: We should go now, up-worlder. We're anxious to return to the village and see our families again. Thank you once again for everything you have done.
Male_26.nm04aainfe08023_.mp3: We... we have nothing, up-worlder. We are Outcasts. All we have are the clothes on our backs.
Male_26.nm04aainfe08025_.mp3: Please, up-worlder. Show us mercy. Give us the cure out of the goodness of your heart!
Male_26.nm04aainfe08028_.mp3: You... you will help us? Bless you, up-worlder! But... you must hurry!
Male_26.nm04aainfe08031_.mp3: We have the rakghoul disease. It is only a matter of time until we are transformed into terrible creatures like those who attacked you when you first came into the pen.
Male_26.nm04aainfe08033_.mp3: It is too late for them. Soon it will be too late for us and we will transform into those horrible rakghouls ourselves!
Male_26.nm04aainfe08035_.mp3: Please hurry, up-worlder. We don't have much time until the transformation.
Male_26.nm04aainfe08038_.mp3: Go then, up-worlder. Leave us here to die, abandoned by everyone!
Male_26.nm04aainfe08041_.mp3: Don't forget about us, up-worlder. If you find anyway to cure us of this disease, please come back and help us.
Male_26.nm04aaoutm14001_.mp3: Yeah, this is our elevator! If you use it, you've got to give us something!
Male_26.nm04aaoutm14005_.mp3: Here in the filth and darkness we claw out a wretched existence, scavenging and begging just to survive long enough to see another wretched day.
Male_26.nm04aaoutm14009_.mp3: We are not fools... we know all who come from the up-world are rich! Please, is 5 credits so much to ask?
Male_26.nm04aaoutm14012_.mp3: Hush, or the others will hear us! They'll want our credits! We have to hide them!
Male_26.nm04aaoutm14016_.mp3: Have you no heart? Have you no compassion?
Male_26.nm28aamerc03009_.mp3: I don't know what you're talking about. I've never seen any map, just stinking, reeking death.
Male_26.nm28aamerc03014_.mp3: I was one of the mercs the Republic sent down here to find out what happened. We came down and secured the first couple rooms... there were bodies everywhere...
Male_26.nm28aamerc03024_.mp3: So we ran... But hardly any of us made it. I locked the door behind us, bu... but the others had already left in the submersible!
Male_26.nm28aamerc03026_.mp3: The sharks... the firaxa out there and... worse... I heard an explosion shortly after the submersible left. They didn't make it. Just food for the sharks and the Selkath... like us.
Male_26.nm28aamerc03049_.mp3: Hey! Y-you... you can't just rip me to pieces! I'll die!!
Male_26.nm28aamerc03063_.mp3: Where did you go? How did you get back here without being eaten?
Male_26.nm28aamerc03068_.mp3: You can't make me! I won't go!
Male_26.nm28aamerc03070_.mp3: Nonono! It will eat us all up if we go out there! At least I'm safe here behind this door. The Selkath can't get me in here.
Male_26.nm28aamerc03073_.mp3: I don't know... I don't know why! But I'm not going to take my chances out there... It's waiting for me, I know it!
Male_26.nm28aamerc03083_.mp3: If you're going to go in there, do it quickly! I'll shut the door behind you... but don't expect me to open it again!

Male_28.nm02adyung12000_.mp3: Did you come for the party? You really shouldn't be here if you're on duty... I don't want to get in trouble.
Male_28.nm02adyung12002_.mp3: You're welcome to come back after you go and change out of your uniform. We'll see you then.
Male_28.nm02adyung12004_.mp3: Hey, you made it! I was beginning to wonder if you were going to show! The party's in full swing - come on in.
Male_28.nm02adyung12006_.mp3: You have to try this Tarisian ale - it's fantastic! We should have conquered this planet ages ago!
Male_28.nm02adyung12010_.mp3: Who cares? We're not on duty tomorrow - let's live a little! Come on - drink up!
Male_28.nm02adyung12012_.mp3: I'm surprised to see you again. I thought you had gotten sick of me complaining about my job at the Sith military base. I guess I kind of obsess about it. That can't be healthy.
Male_28.nm02adyung12014_.mp3: Well, are you here to close our deal? 2000 credits gets you access to the Military Base. Otherwise we really shouldn't be talking.
Male_28.nm02adyung12015_.mp3: Sorry, but I'm not here looking for conversation. I just came to get a drink, listen to some music and try to relax before my next shift at the military base.
Male_28.nm02adyung12017_.mp3: I don't wear my uniform when I'm off duty. I can do without those hate filled stares while I'm trying to enjoy myself.
Male_28.nm02adyung12019_.mp3: I shouldn't even be here, to tell the truth. The officers get pretty upset when we fraternize with the locals. But it gets pretty stale hanging around the base all the time.
Male_28.nm02adyung12021_.mp3: Besides, the Sith don't own me. Being a soldier in their fleet is just a job, you know? A job with long hours and low pay, I might add.
Male_28.nm02adyung12023_.mp3: When I signed up I was promised adventure and excitement in exotic locals. Instead, I end up stationed at a military base on some backwater planet on the fringes of the galaxy.
Male_28.nm02adyung12025_.mp3: If I could just find some other way to earn some credits I could give up this lousy job. It's not like they even need me there. Nobody can get into the base without a keycard.
Male_28.nm02adyung12027_.mp3: I don't have the card with me. But everyone who works at the military base has one. Otherwise we wouldn't be able to get inside the base.
Male_28.nm02adyung12029_.mp3: What? Are you offering me a bribe? You realize this is treason, right? If I report you the Sith will have you executed!
Male_28.nm02adyung12031_.mp3: Hey, now - let's not start making threats. I didn't say I *would* report you, only that I could. This kind of talk is dangerous, you know? But I'm not going to turn you in.
Male_28.nm02adyung12034_.mp3: The truth is I find your offer rather tempting. I could probably get you inside the base. But if we get caught we're dead. You're asking me to take an awful risk.
Male_28.nm02adyung12036_.mp3: If I'm going to do this, it's going to cost you. 2000 credits up front if you want to get inside the base. No more, no less. So how about it - we have a deal?
Male_28.nm02adyung12039_.mp3: [Success] Hmmm... 1000 credits is a small fortune. I'll never have the chance to make that much in one shot again.
Male_28.nm02adyung12041_.mp3: Okay, you've got a deal. All you need to get inside the base is my keycard. The trick is to get it to you without the Sith knowing I gave it to you. But I've got a plan.
Male_28.nm02adyung12043_.mp3: I'm going to a party with some of the other Sith soldiers tonight. You show up and I'll make sure everyone else gets good and drunk. When we pass out you can take my keycard.
Male_28.nm02adyung12045_.mp3: I'll probably get a reprimand for carrying my keycard while not on duty, but nothing too serious. Then, in another month I'll resign and retire with all those credits you gave me.
Male_28.nm02adyung12047_.mp3: Here - I'll add the address of the party to your datapad. Show up there later. To be on the safe side we shouldn't speak again before or after the party.
Male_28.nm02adyung12051_.mp3: I'll go make all the arrangements and I'll see you at the party later. Just remember - if you get caught breaking into the base, I don't know you.
Male_28.nm02adyung12054_.mp3: We're in this together now. If either one of us goes to the Sith we'll both end up in the torture chambers. Anyway, it's not like you have a choice.
Male_28.nm02adyung12056_.mp3: I'm not giving you your credits back, so you might as well show up at the party later and take the keycard after we all get drunk and pass out. What could be more simple?
Male_28.nm02adyung12058_.mp3: [Failure] Look, I'm not going to risk my neck unless I get a big payday. 2000 credits or no deal.
Male_28.nm02adyung12060_.mp3: Sorry to hear that, but I won't put my neck on the line for nothing! Tell you what - you come up with the credits and we can talk. Otherwise, no deal.
Male_28.nm02adyung12064_.mp3: You... you weren't serious? Oh... okay. Although if you *were* serious, we might be able to work something out. No - wait! Forget I said that! We shouldn't be talking like this.
Male_28.nm02adyung12066_.mp3: I might complain a lot, but it's a big step from complaining to treason. I think maybe we should end this conversation - for both our sakes.
Male_28.nm02adyung12069_.mp3: Oh... okay. I'll see you around. Say, do me a favor and don't repeat all the stuff I just told you. Eh, might not go over well with my superiors.
Male_28.nm02adyung12072_.mp3: Hey, there. I didn't think we'd be chatting again so soon. You took off on me pretty quick last time.
Male_28.nm02adyung12074_.mp3: Back again? Didn't I make myself clear enough? The senior Sith officers don't like us fraternizing with the locals. Besides, I don't need you lecturing me for my career choice.
Male_28.nm02adyung12076_.mp3: Good. Move along and leave me alone or I might have to run you in for questioning.
Male_28.nm02adyung12078_.mp3: Hi there - I haven't seen you around before. Of course they don't give us Sith officers from the military base much time off...
Male_28.nm02adyung12080_.mp3: I'm off duty right now, so I'm not in uniform. My name is Yun Genda - junior officer first class with the Sith occupation force.
Male_28.nm02adyung12082_.mp3: I'm actually a little surprised you're talking to me at all... most of the people here on Taris can't stand us Sith. It can make this a pretty lonely job.
Male_28.nm02adyung12084_.mp3: [Success] That's true, but people don't appreciate what we've done for them. We could have slapped a curfew on this whole planet, but we didn't.
Male_28.nm02adyung12086_.mp3: [Failure] Save the sympathetic best friend act. I'm not buying it.
Male_28.nm02adyung12088_.mp3: But I don't want to fill out a bunch of paperwork on my day off, so let's just pretend this conversation never happened. Now move along.
Male_28.nm02adyung12091_.mp3: Oh, great... I see where this is going: the Sith are evil; why did I join them; blah, blah, blah. I don't need a lecture from the likes of you.
Male_28.nm02adyung12093_.mp3: Ah, it's okay. I might have overreacted a bit. But hey, can you blame me? Everywhere I look I see one of you Tarisians glaring at me with hate in your eyes.
Male_28.nm02adyung12095_.mp3: Don't try to analyze me. I'm just doing my job - same as any other soldier in any other army. Besides, I don't have to explain myself to you!
Male_28.nm02adyung12097_.mp3: I don't think we have much else to say to each other. Let's just keep this civil and go our separate ways, okay?
Male_28.nm02adyung12100_.mp3: You're an off-worlder? Huh, I figured you'd be even more angry, being stuck on a foreign planet and all.
Male_28.nm02adyung12103_.mp3: You know, it's like everyone on this backwater planet is in a permanent bad mood. Don't they know they have to make the best of things?
Male_28.nm02adyung12105_.mp3: Exactly! It's all about attitude. I didn't ask to be assigned to this backwater planet, but I try to make the best of it!
Male_28.nm02adyung12107_.mp3: It's pretty easy to get depressed on an assignment like this, but we do what we can to keep our spirits up.
Male_28.nm02adyung12109_.mp3: That's true. It's nice to meet someone who understands what I'm going through. It's good to talk about this stuff - it gets pretty lonely up at the military base.
Male_28.nm02adyung12111_.mp3: I have to get going soon - I've got a shift at the military base. But some of us junior Sith officers are having a party later to blow off some steam.
Male_28.nm02adyung12113_.mp3: I'd really like to see you again. Why don't you drop by the party? I'll show you where it is on your map.
Male_28.nm02adyung12115_.mp3: Don't worry - you won't be the only civilian there. A few of the locals who don't hate us are going to show up, too. I hope to see you there.
Male_28.nm02adyung12121_.mp3: First you come over and say hi, then you scurry off as soon as you find out I'm a Sith soldier. You Tarisians are a funny bunch.

Male_30.nm08aadavs11000_.mp3: Welcome to the slave quarters, good sir. I mean no disrespect, but perhaps one of the female slaves could serve your needs better.
Male_30.nm08aadavs11002_.mp3: Welcome to the slave quarters, mistress. Here we have succulent fruits and berries to tempt your palette, as well as luxurious baths to soothe your aches and pains.
Male_30.nm08aadavs11008_.mp3: Would you like a relaxing massage, mistress? Whatever your desire, we are here to serve.
Male_30.nm08aadavs11011_.mp3: But... what could I possibly tell you? It is forbidden for slaves to leave this room on pain of torture and death.
Male_30.nm08aadavs11013_.mp3: [Success] Praise from the guests is a valuable commodity here. Davik rewards the slaves who perform their duties well. I will tell you what I know.
Male_30.nm08aadavs11015_.mp3: [Failure] I'm sorry, mistress, but the risk is too great. Davik will have me flayed alive if he finds out. Is there something else I may do to please you?
Male_30.nm08aadavs11017_.mp3: [Failure] I won't betray Davik's secrets for credits; they are of no use to a slave. Is there something else I can do for you?
Male_30.nm08aadavs11019_.mp3: Please don't hurt me! I'll... I'll tell you everything I know. I only pray Davik doesn't find out, or my life will end in terrible agony.
Male_30.nm08aadavs11021_.mp3: Davik rarely lets us leave the slave quarters. We only know what we hear from Davik's guests. Recently they've all been talking about poor Hudrow.
Male_30.nm08aadavs11023_.mp3: He was caught trying to steal some spice from the lab. Normally Hudrow is allowed to get away with things like that because he's Davik's personal pilot for the Ebon Hawk.
Male_30.nm08aadavs11025_.mp3: But since the Sith have grounded every ship on the planet, Hudrow doesn't get anymore special treatment. They've locked him up in Davik's torture chambers.
Male_30.nm08aadavs11027_.mp3: I think you can get there through the hall behind the west door of Davik's throne room. Just keep going west from the slave quarters and you'll see the throne room.
Male_30.nm08aadavs11029_.mp3: But Davik's certain to have guards patrolling the area. If you leave the guest wing, they'll shoot you on sight. Please - I don't know anything else.
Male_30.nm08aadavs11031_.mp3: Nothing - Davik keeps us locked away in here day and night. I'm not even certain of the location of the torture chamber where they've got Hudrow locked away.
Male_30.nm08aadavs11034_.mp3: As you wish, mistress. You will find this most relaxing. If you would come with me into the massage room at the back...
Male_30.nm08aadavs11038_.mp3: I trust you were satisfied with the service? I have received many compliments on my skills from previous clients.
Male_30.nm08aadavs11040_.mp3: Thank you, my lady. I hope you will express your appreciation to Davik. He often rewards those slaves who perform their duties well. Is there anything else you require?
Male_30.nm08aadavs11042_.mp3: Please, I beg you - don't tell Davik you are displeased with me! He punishes those slaves who do not satisfy his guests!
Male_30.nm08aadavs11044_.mp3: I have no wish to be beaten by Davik, so I will tell you all I know. I hope it is enough to buy your mercy.
Male_30.nm08aadavs11048_.mp3: As... as you wish, mistress. It will not be the first time I have been punished by Davik.
Male_30.nm08aadavs11050_.mp3: I am sorry I have failed to please you, my lady. I will try to do better in the future. Is there anything else you require from this most unworthy servant?
Male_30.nm08aadavs11053_.mp3: My, you certainly have a great hunger for my services. I will do my best to sate your prodigious appetite with another massage, mistress.
Male_30.nm08aadavs11057_.mp3: Of course. Return whenever you wish to partake of what we offer here. We exist only to serve.
Male_30.nm08aadavs11059_.mp3: I greet you once more, mistress. How may this humble servant be of use to you?

Male_31.nm33aalash11002_.mp3: I hate Jedi... and these fallen ones are worse! They always get into the academy, and they think they're better than the rest of us!
Male_31.nm33aalash11017_.mp3: I didn't think it was funny.
Male_31.nm33aalash11025_.mp3: Stop it, this is boring. Let's just go back to the academy.
Male_31.nm33aalash11033_.mp3: I've heard this one before, I think...
Male_31.nm33aalash11050_.mp3: Oh, get over yourself already. I'm tired of this.
Male_31.nm33aalash11054_.mp3: Ahhh, I hate this kind of whining. Do they always have to beg for mercy?
Male_31.nm33aalash11071_.mp3: Let me kill this one, Lashowe! Let me do it!
Male_31.nm33aalash11084_.mp3: Enough to crush this fool! Let's do it, Lashowe!

Male_32.nm02aemusi26000_.mp3: They say a brawl broke out at the swoop races this year. Sound like things are getting out of control in the Lower City... maybe the Sith should go and clean it up!
Male_32.nm02aemusi26002_.mp3: Nice outfit. You steal those clothes from a bum in the Lower City? Oh well, I guess you don't have to have good taste in clothes to come and enjoy the music.
Male_32.nm02aemusi26004_.mp3: The band is pretty good, but I'm getting a little sick of them. If it wasn't for the Sith quarantine maybe we could get somebody new in here to play!
Male_32.nm02aemusi26006_.mp3: Check out those Twi'lek dancers. I don't know who designed their outfits, but that man deserves a raise!
Male_32.nm02aemusi26008_.mp3: Did you hear? The great Bendak Starkiller is dead. Killed in the duel ring - by a woman! Can't say I'm surprised. The guy was retired for so long he probably lost his edge.
Male_32.nm02aemusi26010_.mp3: So I heard Bendak Starkiller finally lost a death match. Can't say I'm surprised. The guy was retired for so long he probably lost his edge.
Male_32.nm02aemusi26012_.mp3: Have you heard? Somebody's going to fight Bendak Starkiller in an illegal death match! Heh heh. I wonder if the old guy's still got what it takes. You figure he'd be out of practice, right?
Male_32.nm02aemusi26014_.mp3: Well, people complain, but things under the Sith really aren't so bad. Sure, we can't leave the planet, but we're still allowed to come here and listen to the music.

Male_33.nm26absith11000_.mp3: I know you. You're the Arbiter in the murder trial. Elassa was a friend of mine. If there's any justice in the galaxy, they'll feed Sunry to the firaxans.
Male_33.nm26absith11002_.mp3: Shouldn't you be preparing for the trial? What are you doing here?
Male_33.nm26absith11003_.mp3: I can't believe you let that murderer Sunry go free! If the Selkath are so neutral and unbiased, why can't the Sith find any justice on this planet?
Male_33.nm26absith11005_.mp3: But we Sith have long memories. Soon there will be a day of reckoning - very soon. So what are you doing here?
Male_33.nm26absith11006_.mp3: Allow me to thank you for helping put that killer Sunry in prison. Elassa was a friend of mine, and the thought of her murderer going free enraged me!
Male_33.nm26absith11008_.mp3: But thanks to you, justice was served. So what can I do for you?
Male_33.nm26absith11009_.mp3: Only people who have business with the Sith are allowed inside the Embassy.
Male_33.nm26absith11011_.mp3: You can ask - but I doubt you'll get many answers you'll like.
Male_33.nm26absith11013_.mp3: I know he'd already be tried, convicted and executed if the Selkath knew anything about justice! But the fish people are as weak as the Republic when it comes to such matters.
Male_33.nm26absith11017_.mp3: Who knows? Some scheming plot, no doubt. Hopefully the Selkath uncover it and ban the Republic from the planet.
Male_33.nm26absith11020_.mp3: I haven't the faintest clue as to what you're talking about.
Male_33.nm26absith11023_.mp3: Ha! We know who we have business with. If you don't know how to get in, then we don't want anything to do with you. Now back off!
Male_33.nm26absith11025_.mp3: If you have a pass, why are you bothering me with it? Just go in.
Male_33.nm26absith11028_.mp3: Oh, really? You mean someone like you actually has some real purpose inside? Well, then, what is it?
Male_33.nm26absith11030_.mp3: Hmph. Yes, well, I suppose you really do have some business here. Head on in.
Male_33.nm26absith11033_.mp3: Go. Stay. Doesn't matter to me. If you want to, you can even wander up to the embassy gates. Heh. But don't expect to get inside.

Male_34.nm14abcut002001_.mp3: No! Please! Take my wife and children instead! Anything!

Male_36.nm35aadust01000_.mp3: I don't see the old man with you. Did he come to his senses and leave, finally? I knew he couldn't prove anything.
Male_36.nm35aadust01002_.mp3: I don't know why you're still here. Why don't you just follow him wherever he went? You and I have no business at all.
Male_36.nm35aadust01004_.mp3: Back already? So tell me, father, where's this 'proof' you promised?
Male_36.nm35aadust01008_.mp3: Selene? She's the one who convinced me to come to the academy with her. Why? Where did you get this?
Male_36.nm35aadust01012_.mp3: Yes... it's his. But... he told me... he, he said that she'd been lost on a mission in the valley. This... this says that they...
Male_36.nm35aadust01016_.mp3: No. No, I can't. I... I had no idea... they lied to me.
Male_36.nm35aadust01020_.mp3: I... no. You go do whatever you have to, father. I... I have some other friends here. I have to warn them what's going on.
Male_36.nm35aadust01022_.mp3: And maybe I can, you know, look around here and find out some more information. From the inside. Something that might help you.
Male_36.nm35aadust01026_.mp3: Maybe... after this is over, we can... talk. I'm still not sure about... us, but I'll listen. Maybe we can get back to where we should have been.
Male_36.nm35aadust01032_.mp3: Yeah, well, that's a surprise. I gave up on you a long time ago. So did Mother, for that fact.
Male_36.nm35aadust01036_.mp3: Whatever. Just go if you're going. I have things to do.
Male_36.nm35aadust01038_.mp3: You take a wrong turn somewhere?
Male_36.nm35aadust01040_.mp3: The name's Dustil. That satisfy your curiosity enough?
Male_36.nm35aadust01042_.mp3: So you know my last name, so what?
Male_36.nm35aadust01044_.mp3: No, I'm not. I don't know who you're talking about.
Male_36.nm35aadust01046_.mp3: Look... I don't want to hear that name ever again. Ever. You understanding me? Now get lost.
Male_36.nm35aadust01049_.mp3: What is with the questions? My life is none of your business, so get lost.
Male_36.nm35aadust01051_.mp3: As if I'm not busy enough with my own work? Go pester someone else with your stupid questions.
Male_36.nm35aadust01053_.mp3: Oh, I'm sorry, did I hurt your feelings? Why don't you run to Master Uthar and tell him all about it. I'm sure he'll be very sympathetic.
Male_36.nm35aadust01055_.mp3: You know what I want? I want for you to run along and do whatever it is you're supposed to be doing. I'm too busy to deal with morons.
Male_36.nm35aadust01058_.mp3: Well, don't let me keep you.
Male_36.nm35aadust01060_.mp3: You take a wrong turn somewhere?
Male_36.nm35aadust01068_.mp3: Too bad you didn't still think that. Or did you really think I would be happy to see you?
Male_36.nm35aadust01070_.mp3: Look, everyone! It's Father, come to rescue me at long last! Sure, he may have left Mother and I to die on Telos, but that doesn't matter!
Male_36.nm35aadust01076_.mp3: Ah, save it. You abandoned us long before. We were alone all during the wars, and even once you came back, you still didn't stay.
Male_36.nm35aadust01080_.mp3: Yeah? Well you were needed at home, too. You were needed when the bombing started and I got captured.
Male_36.nm35aadust01082_.mp3: You know what? It doesn't matter. Not any more. I have a new family now, a family that cares about me. I don't need you.
Male_36.nm35aadust01086_.mp3: So? You're the soldier, father. How many mothers have you killed?
Male_36.nm35aadust01090_.mp3: You never knew me. You weren't even there to know me, so don't presume to tell me what I would or wouldn't do!
Male_36.nm35aadust01094_.mp3: Touch me, old man, and I'll kill you. Get out! Get out of here before I tell the Sith that you're here!
Male_36.nm35aadust01096_.mp3: I don't need his protection! Not anymore. The Sith give me everything I need.
Male_36.nm35aadust01100_.mp3: No, they're not evil! They're not! The dark side is superior, and you... you were at war long before they came along!
Male_36.nm35aadust01108_.mp3: Prove it. Prove that the Sith are so evil and I'll... I'll think about it.
Male_36.nm35aadust01110_.mp3: I'm not going to follow you around, forget it. If you're caught, they'll just think I was betraying them.
Male_36.nm35aadust01113_.mp3: I'll stay right here. I won't tell anyone you're here... for now. You find some 'proof' and you bring it to me.
Male_36.nm35aadust01115_.mp3: If I hear you asking questions about me or doing a single thing to jeopardize my position in the Sith, I swear I'll tell everyone what you're up to.
Male_36.nm35aadust01117_.mp3: You got that, father? You prove what you're saying is true. I'm not going anywhere, otherwise.
Male_36.nm35aadust01124_.mp3: Right. Just as I thought. You can't prove anything.
Male_36.nm35aadust01132_.mp3: Is that all you do? Give out orders? Well you can't show up after all this time and expect to give me orders! I'm not your soldier and I'm sure as hell not your son!
Male_36.nm35aadust01135_.mp3: Yeah, I can just imagine what you two are up to, here. Master Uthar will be more than happy to hear about it, I'm sure.
Male_36.nm35aadust01140_.mp3: Why not? You gave up on Mother and I a long time ago. We were just an afterthought next to your glory-hunting!
Male_36.nm35aadust01144_.mp3: They gave me a life, old man. They gave me power! You... you didn't even give me so much as a second's notice.
Male_36.nm35aadust01148_.mp3: No you didn't. You fought for yourself. For glory. Well, the Sith can do that, too. We learn to fight... and to kill. You want to see what I've learned, 'father'?
Male_36.nm35aadust01152_.mp3: Too late, old man! You should have left when you had the chance!!
Male_36.nm35aadust01154_.mp3: Oh, lovely. It's Father. Figures that you'd show up after all this time. How did you manage to get inside the academy?
Male_36.nm35aadust01156_.mp3: Cute. I wonder how interested Master Uthar would be to know just who he has in his web. Unless you've switched sides, Father? But I doubt that.
Male_36.nm35aadust01158_.mp3: Haha. And I'm supposed to believe that my self-righteous father has fallen into the habit of accompanying Sith in their training? I doubt that.
Male_36.nm35aadust01160_.mp3: Maybe it doesn't matter. Or maybe Master Uthar would be interested in knowing just what kind of company he has present here?
Male_36.nm35aadust01161_.mp3: Just why are you here, Father? Not for me, I hope. Couldn't you have gotten yourself blown up on some ship and spared us this reunion?
Male_36.nm35aadust01164_.mp3: I'll go back to Telos when this is over. You can find me there. Goodbye... father.

Male_37.nm02aenikl28000_.mp3: What do you want? Have you come here just to bother me, or do you wish to test yourself against the best Pazaak player on Taris? Heh heh heh.
Male_37.nm02aenikl28002_.mp3: My name is Niklos. I'm the unofficial champion of the Pazaak circuit here on Taris. If you don't mind losing your wager we could play a few hands.
Male_37.nm02aenikl28004_.mp3: Questions? Heh. I don't come here to answer questions. If you want to play Pazaak, let's play. If not, then quit crowding my gaming table.
Male_37.nm02aenikl28006_.mp3: You don't even have your own deck? Then why are you bothering me? You can't play Pazaak without your own deck!
Male_37.nm02aenikl28008_.mp3: If you're serious about Pazaak, go speak to old Garouk on the other side of the tavern. His gambling days are over, and he's looking to sell his deck.
Male_37.nm02aenikl28013_.mp3: If you ever wish to test yourself against the best Pazaak player on Taris, heh, you know where to find me.
Male_37.nm02aenikl28015_.mp3: I do not lose at Pazaak very often, but you have made a habit of beating me. I think it is obvious what that means - you cheat!
Male_37.nm02aenikl28017_.mp3: I haven't been able to figure out how, but I know you're cheating. I'm simply too good to lose this often. And I refuse to play Pazaak with a cheater.
Male_37.nm02aenikl28019_.mp3: You can leave now, cheater. I won't be wasting anymore time with you.
Male_37.nm02aenikl28023_.mp3: You cheat me out of my hard earned credits, and you expect me to answer your questions?
Male_37.nm02aenikl28025_.mp3: You were lucky to win the last match. But luck is no substitute for skill in Pazaak. If you are foolish enough to play me again I won't repeat the mistake of underestimating you.
Male_37.nm02aenikl28027_.mp3: Pazaak is not for everyone - it requires both nerve and skill. Perhaps you should practice before risking your credits against such a skilled player as myself. Heh heh heh. Unless you like losing?
Male_37.nm02aenikl28029_.mp3: Confidence is inspiring in one who has such a propensity for failure. Foolish, heh, but inspiring.
Male_37.nm02aenikl28030_.mp3: I saw you getting a Pazaak lesson from that old fossil Garouk. Learning the rules of Pazaak is easy, but actually playing the game is a much greater challenge.
Male_37.nm02aenikl28032_.mp3: Normally I wouldn't bother with a novice like you, but since Gelrood was banned for hustling cards I haven't been able to find a good game around here. Do you wish to play a hand?
Male_37.nm02aenikl28034_.mp3: I'm going to enjoy relieving you of your credits almost as much as I'm going to enjoy humiliating you. Ha ha ha.
Male_37.nm02aenikl28036_.mp3: I do not lose at Pazaak very often, but you have made a habit of beating me. I think it is obvious what that means - you cheat!
Male_37.nm02aenikl28038_.mp3: I haven't been able to figure out how, but I know you're cheating. I'm simply too good to lose this often. And I refuse to play Pazaak with a cheater.
Male_37.nm02aenikl28042_.mp3: You can leave now, cheater. I won't be wasting anymore time with you.
Male_37.nm02aenikl28046_.mp3: You cheat me out of my hard earned credits, and you expect me to answer your questions?
Male_37.nm02aenikl28048_.mp3: You were lucky to win the last match. But luck is no substitute for skill in Pazaak. If you are foolish enough to play me again I won't repeat the mistake of underestimating you.
Male_37.nm02aenikl28051_.mp3: Pazaak is not for everyone - it requires both nerve and skill. Perhaps you should practice before risking your credits against such a skilled player as myself. Heh heh heh. Unless you like losing?
Male_37.nm02aenikl28053_.mp3: Confidence is inspiring in one who has such a propensity for failure. Foolish, heh, but inspiring.
Male_37.nm02aenikl28055_.mp3: Back again? Well... do you have a deck yet? Would you like to play some Pazaak?
Male_37.nm02aenikl28058_.mp3: You still don't have a deck? Then why are you bothering me? Until you get a deck from Garouk we have nothing to discuss.

Male_39.nm44aasith04000_.mp3: Revan! Lord Malak told us you still lived. At last - a challenge worthy of my skills. I grow so bored with slaughtering these mindless training droids.
Male_39.nm44aasith04001_.mp3: I intensified my training ten fold in the hopes I would get the chance to face you in mortal combat! I am glad to see my training has not been in vain.

Male_40.nm26aatria27067_.mp3: The man I saw leaving - Sunry - left before I heard the blaster shot.
Male_40.nm26aatria27075_.mp3: The man I saw leaving - Sunry - probably left after I heard the blaster shot.
Male_40.nm26aatria27097_.mp3: I came out into the hallway after hearing the blaster shot and saw Sunry over there limping down the hall out of the building.
Male_40.nm26aatria27131_.mp3: You mean actually see him kill her with my own eyes? Well... no... But I don't think there could have been anyone else there.
Male_40.nm26aatria27137_.mp3: I think it may have been. I mean, you'd have to pretty stupid to leave something that important lying around, wouldn't you?
Male_40.nm26aatria27142_.mp3: Well he was moving pretty fast running away... but yeah, I mean, how could he kill a Sith warrior in combat? I don't know for sure...
Male_40.nm26aatria27151_.mp3: Yes, from what I could tell. She carried a lightsaber around under that cloak of hers.

Male_41.nm22aadaso07037_.mp3: Kindly direct your inquiries to me. Matton is merely an indebted employee. His opinions don't amount to much.
Male_41.nm22aaelix08000_.mp3: So, new spacers have come to wild Kashyyyk? Please, look well upon the wares of Eli Gand. I live to serve your needs.
Male_41.nm22aaelix08002_.mp3: First off, Hutts are ALL backside. Secondly, I don't much like the comparison. No need to get personal. It's just business.
Male_41.nm22aaelix08013_.mp3: Whatever your Wookiee is saying, he's not helping diffuse the situation. This is just a simple business matter.
Male_41.nm22aaelix08014_.mp3: Now keep your head, Matton. It was just business.
Male_41.nm22aaelix08047_.mp3: You'd have to take your questions to Czerka Corporation, and the Wookiees themselves. I keep to myself.
Male_41.nm22aaelix08063_.mp3: *ahem* As I was saying, it's a matter of principle. I am nothing if not honest in my dealings, and I demand the same.
Male_41.nm22aaelix08064_.mp3: He will be free to go when his friends turn up and the debt is paid. I honor my deals. Let no one say otherwise.
Male_41.nm22aaelix08067_.mp3: Besides, he is a hard worker. I'd prefer to keep him.
Male_41.nm22aaelix08071_.mp3: We're always open... for now, at least.
Male_41.nm22aaelix08075_.mp3: You hurt me, Matton. It is the debt of your crew that keeps you here, not me.

Male_42.nm35aakela06001_.mp3: Have you heard? Yuthura Ban is dead. I hear Master Uthar is looking for a new apprentice. How awful...
Male_42.nm35aashaa10003_.mp3: Oh-ho! If it isn't the freak from the colony. Hello, freak.

Male_43.nm27aaalar08000_.mp3: Intruders have entered the complex! All units report to battle stations!
Male_43.nm27aasith99010_.mp3: Yes, they had the proper authorization to enter...
Male_43.nm27aasith99012_.mp3: What?! Sound the alarm! Droids, destroy them!

Male_44.nm26abswoo19000_.mp3: I was down here last week and I got Casandra Mateil's autoprint. She doesn't do that very often.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19001_.mp3: You'll have to get in line for the good seats when the races start. There's a lot of people that want to see them.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19002_.mp3: Sure the swoop circuit is suffering a bit with Taris gone, but we still have some good racers to watch.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19003_.mp3: Have you been to the swoop races before? Some of these riders are sure full of themselves.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19004_.mp3: You'll have to do better than that if you want to be sector champion.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19005_.mp3: Your last race was a disappointment. Lose many more and the crowd will turn on you.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19006_.mp3: I was cheering for you. I hope I didn't jinx your race.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19007_.mp3: You're only as good as your last race. Remember that.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19008_.mp3: I sure hope you're staying here. Beating the first round has made you look pretty good to the crowd.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19009_.mp3: You're not bad for a beginner. It's almost like you've competed at this level before.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19010_.mp3: You won't have such an easy run in the second round. We get some experienced riders through here.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19011_.mp3: Not bad at all, but I'll start cheering when you prove you're not just using beginner's luck.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19012_.mp3: Some of the crowd may turn on you. You're not the underdog anymore.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19013_.mp3: You're surprising a lot of people. Me included. Nice job out there.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19014_.mp3: If you win again, I'll be absolutely amazed. You are moving up so fast.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19015_.mp3: Nice race. How do you go so fast? Are you sure your swoop is legal?
Male_44.nm26abswoo19016_.mp3: Well, you've captured the sector championship. I have to say I've never seen such an... impressive racer.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19017_.mp3: I didn't think you had it in you, but I guess I was wrong. You've really won me over, champion.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19018_.mp3: You handled that race like a pro. I like confident men.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19019_.mp3: Racers like you are why I watch the sport. You dominated the whole field. It was... exhilarating.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19020_.mp3: Ha. I've never seen anyone who rides like you. This has been a great tournament.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19021_.mp3: You're deadly serious out on the course. Like Hukta Jax, but with talent. You deserve to be champion.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19022_.mp3: Your win was a complete surprise to everyone. I'm sure the crowd thought you would burn out, but you showed them.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19023_.mp3: The crowd really started pulling for you in that last race. Everyone loves a winner, I guess.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19024_.mp3: It's amazing what's been happeing on the track! Queedle has taken the top spot!
Male_44.nm26abswoo19025_.mp3: I always cheered Queedle before, and I guess it helped! He's beaten everyone!
Male_44.nm26abswoo19026_.mp3: Queedle has really improved out there. He was always my favorite.
Male_44.nm26abswoo19027_.mp3: Everyone thought Queedle couldn't compete because he was just a local racer, but he's shown them all.

Male_45.nm13aaahla03022_.mp3: Curiously, Nurik's son Casus has been missing for some time as well... I fear Nurik may suspect Ahlan in this...

Male_46.nm17af07fu02000_.mp3: Well, a fresh face for the game. I wonder, would you care to play? My name is Furko Nellis. My vice is Pazaak.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02002_.mp3: Ha ha! Very good! Would you... care to wager on a game?
Male_46.nm17af07fu02004_.mp3: Well... you have proven quite the opponent, but I think the time has come to end this. You will not win again.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02006_.mp3: I usually only use this deck at tournaments, but I think you're worthy of it. Shall we say... 500 credits on the outcome?
Male_46.nm17af07fu02008_.mp3: Yes... well then, 500 credits on the line. Heh... here we go.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02011_.mp3: Hmm... you have some rudimentary skills. I think I'll use my second best deck this time and up the stakes.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02013_.mp3: 200 credits will be the wager. I trust you will have the money on hand?
Male_46.nm17af07fu02015_.mp3: You won't be so eager in a moment. I promise you.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02018_.mp3: Well, since you have never beaten me, we'll make this for a paltry 50 credits. No bargaining now. This is serious.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02020_.mp3: To be fair, I'll use my practice deck as well. I don't want to scare you off, you understand.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02022_.mp3: Ha ha! Very good. Now, don't worry if I beat you too harshly. It is a learning experience.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02026_.mp3: That is unfortunate. Please, feel free to return when you can. I'm sorry, but I prefer the thrill of the payoff.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02029_.mp3: No? That's unfortunate. I happen to have one that I could sell you, but it's a little basic. Certainly not tournament worthy.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02031_.mp3: Here, how about you give me... 100 credits. A fine deal. Not many stores sell... equipment of this nature.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02033_.mp3: Very good, I'll just take that, and here you are. Now you should practice. Care to play?
Male_46.nm17af07fu02035_.mp3: [Success] Hmm... perhaps you are right. I want new people to get a good start on the game. I need opponents.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02037_.mp3: Besides, it is a very basic deck. All right, it's yours. Now, care to have a game or two?
Male_46.nm17af07fu02038_.mp3: [Failure] I'm afraid I really can't do that. The cards have their value. I can't change it.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02040_.mp3: [Success] You know what... I don't want to charge you for it. I want new players to take up the game.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02044_.mp3: Of course, it is always good to keep them fresh in your mind. I'd be glad to go over the delicacies of the game with you.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02046_.mp3: But, I think you would benefit more from having a copy of your own to study when you wish. Here is a handy page you can slot right into your personal journal. There you go.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02048_.mp3: Ah, I'm sure you do, but I won't have answers. I leave other people to their business, and they leave me to mine.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02050_.mp3: Really, you'll have to seek information elsewhere, but if you want some recreation, I've cards ready to play.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02052_.mp3: Must I? An opinion would draw attention to myself. The Sith have shown what happens to things that draw their attention.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02054_.mp3: All right, but remember that there isn't much fun on Tatooine that isn't life threatening. Come back if you'd like a game.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02056_.mp3: Ahh, you are back. I hope I didn't scare you off with that loss. Hard blow, but that's the nature of the cards.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02058_.mp3: Ah, you did have two promising wins. Would you care to try and take your money back?
Male_46.nm17af07fu02059_.mp3: I don't want to say that your single win was a fluke. Perhaps you would like to play again?
Male_46.nm17af07fu02061_.mp3: Ah, it's you again. Truly, you are a fine opponent. I'd be honored to play you again.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02063_.mp3: However, you'll understand if we don't have any wagers. I... respect your ability too much to insult you by betting on you losing.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02065_.mp3: Very good. Just for the sport of it. That's all I can afford.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02068_.mp3: Something else? I don't think I know about much else. Pazaak is all that I do, right now. I'm sorry.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02070_.mp3: Ask around, I'm sure there are many better sources of information than me.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02072_.mp3: Stop by anytime. I'd like to visit my money.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02073_.mp3: Hello again. Would you like to have another round of Pazaak? I'd like to try and win back my money.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02075_.mp3: It's only fair, after all. You have won against me twice, but I still think I can teach you a thing or two.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02076_.mp3: I mean, I don't want to say that it was beginner's luck, but you should play again to truly get a feel for the game.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02077_.mp3: Hello again. Could I tempt you into a game? There's very little else to do that won't potentially leave you dead.
Male_46.nm17af07fu02078_.mp3: Would you like to have another round of Pazaak?

Male_47.nm26aagont05000_.mp3: I wasn't expecting guests - and I don't want any, either! Shove off, unless you want more trouble than you can handle.
Male_47.nm26aagont05002_.mp3: You blind, or just stupid? You see all the security cameras around here?
Male_47.nm26aagont05003_.mp3: Ever since that Sith woman was killed, this place has been under constant surveillance. You try anything and the Selkath will throw you into prison to rot.
Male_47.nm26aagont05004_.mp3: You try anything and the Selkath will throw you into prison to rot.
Male_47.nm26aagont05005_.mp3: Oh, it's the big famous Pazaak player. Oh what a glorious day for a nobody like me to be in the presence of such greatness! Now I can die happy!
Male_47.nm26aagont05006_.mp3: You think you're pretty hot stuff? Well, if you got the nerves for it, I'll show you how a real Pazaak player does it!
Male_47.nm26aagont05007_.mp3: You must be here for that Pazaak Masters tournament. Hmph... never had much use for the tourneys - bunch of pretenders if you ask me!
Male_47.nm26aagont05008_.mp3: I can give you a real match before the tourney starts, if you're not scared to play me.
Male_47.nm26aagont05009_.mp3: Saw you in the Pazaak tourney - HA! You crashed and burned like a blind fighter pilot!
Male_47.nm26aagont05010_.mp3: Take my advice - forget about the tourney, you ain't cut out for it. Not unless you get a lot better real fast.
Male_47.nm26aagont05011_.mp3: I hope you didn't waste all your credits on that tourney, 'cause if you've got the guts to play me, I'd love to take whatever you got left.
Male_47.nm26aagont05012_.mp3: I saw you beat them other pretenders at the Pazaak tourney. Bunch of chumps, if you ask me.
Male_47.nm26aagont05013_.mp3: Hey, you hear the news? It seems the Sith bombed some Jedi base on Dantooine into asteroid dust!
Male_47.nm26aagont05014_.mp3: Ain't that a riot? The Jedi are supposed to protect the galaxy, they can't even save their own sorry selves! HA-HA-HA!
Male_47.nm26aagont05016_.mp3: Oh, really? Well then, Jedi - you must know about the Manaan laws about keeping the peace, so you just...a... keep that lightsaber where it is.
Male_47.nm26aagont05017_.mp3: But there ain't no laws against gambling - and since you're a Jedi I don't have to worry about you cheating. So you wanna play some Pazaak, or what?
Male_47.nm26aagont05019_.mp3: Yeah, you'd think. I mean, ain't they supposed to be so wise and such? Ah, who cares? Sith, Jedi - they're all the same to me anyway.
Male_47.nm26aagont05020_.mp3: All I care about is if someone's got credits to wager and the urge to gamble. So you wanna play some Pazaak or what?
Male_47.nm26aagont05021_.mp3: I never seen someone win at Pazaak so often with such little skill. So leave me alone okay, I can't afford to bet with someone as lucky as you
Male_47.nm26aagont05022_.mp3: You got lucky that last game - but luck doesn't last. You got the guts to play again?
Male_47.nm26aagont05023_.mp3: Hey, don't give up. Even you losers get lucky sometimes. Maybe this next hand is your chance to shine - though I doubt it. Want to play again?
Male_47.nm26aagont05024_.mp3: I hope you're here to play some Pazaak - I don't come here looking for sparkling conversation.
Male_47.nm26aagont05026_.mp3: So lay your credits down - we ain't here to play for fun.
Male_47.nm26aagont05029_.mp3: I'll sell it to you for 100 credits, and I'll throw in a free lesson cause I'm in a generous mood.
Male_47.nm26aagont05031_.mp3: Okay, pay attention cause I ain't gonna go over this twice.
Male_47.nm26aagont05033_.mp3: I prefer to make my credits gambling, but I never turn my back on an opportunity. Maybe this can be a profitable exchange for both of us.
Male_47.nm26aagont05035_.mp3: Hey, here's an idea - why don't you ask the mercs? Better yet, go down to the embassy and ask the Republic!
Male_47.nm26aagont05036_.mp3: You done wasting my time now, or you got some more questions?
Male_47.nm26aagont05038_.mp3: What do you expect when a Sith spy and a Republic war hero are having an affair? Anyone could see it would end ugly.
Male_47.nm26aagont05040_.mp3: Oh-ho! So, you didn't know about Sunry stepping out on his wife? Well it may have been a secret to some, but I'm not blind!
Male_47.nm26aagont05041_.mp3: I should have charged you for that juicy tidbit, but I figured anyone investigating the murder would have already figured that out by now.
Male_47.nm26aagont05042_.mp3: Okay - you got a freebie out of me. But that's all I know about Sunry and his hot Sith side dish.
Male_47.nm26aagont05044_.mp3: Don't know much else. If I did you can bet I'd be blackmailing either the Sith or the Republic to keep quiet.
Male_47.nm26aagont05046_.mp3: They don't bother me, and I don't bother them. Works all around.
Male_47.nm26aagont05049_.mp3: 300 credits or I don't say nothin'!
Male_47.nm26aagont05051_.mp3: That's all I know. You want any more info on the Sith and their schemes, go talk to the Iridorian.
Male_47.nm26aagont05052_.mp3: Ah... I might know a little bit about this. But telling you might put my life at risk. And that don't come cheap.
Male_47.nm26aagont05053_.mp3: See, I can give you a leg up on investigating what the Sith are up to - but it'll cost you 200 credits.
Male_47.nm26aagont05055_.mp3: I don't know what the Sith are actually up to, but I know who could tell you. The Iridorian Mercenary. Spends all day in the mercenary enclave, and everyone gives him a wide berth.
Male_47.nm26aagont05056_.mp3: The Sith were cozying up to him real good a while ago. Go speak to him about this. But be careful - them Iridorians have a nasty reputation.
Male_47.nm26aagont05060_.mp3: Pretty cheap price for my life, if you ask me. But I guess it's better than nothing, so I'll take it.
Male_47.nm26aagont05063_.mp3: You've got a lot of guts, threatening me on this planet! Everyone knows breaking the peace is punishable by imprisonment.
Male_47.nm26aagont05065_.mp3: Ah - save your threats! Everyone knows breaking the peace here in Ahto City is punishable by a long stretch in the Manaan prisons.
Male_47.nm26aagont05066_.mp3: You must be really desparate, to threaten my life for some lousy information. You want it that bad, maybe I'm undercharging you!
Male_47.nm26aagont05068_.mp3: [Success] Yes... yes, I suppose I do. I want to tell you everything I know.

Male_49.nm33aalash11008_.mp3: Looks pretty fresh to me, Lashowe.
Male_49.nm33aalash11022_.mp3: Heh... ha ha! I think someone just stood up to you, Lashowe.
Male_49.nm33aalash11044_.mp3: [Failure] Heh! That's the oldest joke in the book.
Male_49.nm33aalash11048_.mp3: Ha ha! Looks like this one's not afraid of you at all, Lashowe.
Male_49.nm33aalash11051_.mp3: Yeah, this one's got some backbone, at least. Let's go.
Male_49.nm33aalash11057_.mp3: Yeah, let's get out of here.

Male_50.nm02abciti04000_.mp3: I'm just an ordinary citizen minding his own business. Really... you Sith don't have to worry about me.
Male_50.nm02abciti04002_.mp3: Hey - didn't you just win the big swoop bike race in the Lower City? Yes, it was you, I'm sure! That race was amazing!
Male_50.nm02abciti04004_.mp3: Too bad Brejik wouldn't pay up on his wager! Oh well - he got what was coming to him. Heh heh.
Male_50.nm02abciti04006_.mp3: I hear there's a gang war between the Hidden Beks and the Black Vulkars raging in the lower city.
Male_50.nm02abciti04008_.mp3: I hear the crime lord Davik has a ship that can break through the Sith blockade.
Male_50.nm02abciti04010_.mp3: Have you got your tickets for Bendak Starkiller's return to the duel ring? I hear it's going to be an illegal death match!
Male_50.nm02abciti04012_.mp3: Check this out... we've got a real live celebrity here. The Mysterious Stranger mixing with the common folk!
Male_50.nm02abciti04014_.mp3: I lost a bundle betting against you, Stranger. Next time I'll know better.
Male_50.nm02abciti04016_.mp3: That new mercenary working for Davik - I heard he's a Mandalorian! I wonder if he fought in the Mandalore Wars?
Male_50.nm02abgort06000_.mp3: You Sith should shut this guy up. I think he's violently dangerous. Just listen to him!
Male_50.nm02abgort06002_.mp3: This crazy street preacher keeps on about war and days of reckoning and the Sith just might lock him away.
Male_50.nm02abgort06004_.mp3: This guy's just stirring up trouble! Sure, there's a lot of aliens on Taris, but most of them stick to the Lower City.
Male_50.nm02abgort06006_.mp3: I'm no alien-lover, but I don't want to see them all killed! This kook's way out of line.
Male_50.nm02abmale12000_.mp3: I'm not looking for any trouble with the Sith. Please, just let me be.
Male_50.nm02abmale12002_.mp3: Hey - I saw you win the big swoop race! Too bad Brejik had to get greedy and ruin everything!
Male_50.nm02abmale12004_.mp3: When that fight broke out I just ran for my life. I never even got a chance to cash in my betting slips!
Male_50.nm02abmale12006_.mp3: The Lower City is nothing but a slum! If the Sith want to win us Tarisians over they should clean the gangs out of there!
Male_50.nm02abmale12008_.mp3: Have you heard the reports? They're saying someone broke into the military compound! The Sith aren't going to like that.
Male_50.nm02abmale12010_.mp3: I hope they don't crack down too hard on us. Things are tough enough as it is.
Male_50.nm02abmale12012_.mp3: You like Pazaak? I used to watch it all the time when Gelrood was playing here. He had some great matches against Niklos.
Male_50.nm02abmale12014_.mp3: But then they caught him cheating, and now he's been banned from the Cantina. I haven't followed the game much since then.
Male_50.nm02abmale12016_.mp3: Have you gone into the music room in the back? I don't care much for the band, but those dancing Twi'leks are something else!
Male_50.nm02abmale12018_.mp3: Hey, I know you - you're the Mysterious Stranger! I saw you beat Bendak in the dueling ring! I lost a bundle betting against you!
Male_50.nm02abmale12020_.mp3: I learned my lesson - next time I'll wager my credits on you. If there is a next time. I doubt anyone will be stupid enough to step into the ring with you now.
Male_50.nm02abmale12022_.mp3: You heard the latest rumor? Bendak Starkiller is coming out of retirement for one last illegal death match!
Male_50.nm02abmale12024_.mp3: I can't believe anyone is stupid enough to fight him, but there's no way I'm missing this!
Male_50.nm02abmale12026_.mp3: I heard the Sith sent a bunch of patrols into the Undercity. Probably want to loot the crash sites of those Republic escape pods that went down there.
Male_50.nm03adciti04000_.mp3: What... what do you want? I'm not doing anything wrong. I'm just standing here... please, don't take me in for questioning!
Male_50.nm03adciti04002_.mp3: Did you hear what happened at the swoop race? They say Brejik didn't pay up his wager, and a brawl broke out!
Male_50.nm03adciti04004_.mp3: They say Brejik was killed in the fight! I wonder what's going to happen to the Black Vulkars now.
Male_50.nm03adciti04006_.mp3: Swoop season is almost here. I hope I do better than last season - I lost a bundle betting on all the longshots!
Male_50.nm03adciti04008_.mp3: None of the Beks or Vulkars come into the cantina anymore. I guess that's one good thing about the gang war - it's not so crowded in here.
Male_50.nm03adciti04010_.mp3: This quarantine is making my life miserable! I bet Davik isn't stuck here like the rest of us - everyone says he's got a ship so fast the Sith can't catch him!
Male_50.nm03adciti04012_.mp3: I don't mind this place, but I wish it wasn't so close to the bounty office. Those guys are hired killers - I don't like it when they come in here for a drink.
Male_50.nm33aaciti04000_.mp3: Err... you're a Sith, right? *ahem* Excuse me...
Male_50.nm33aaciti04001_.mp3: This planet belongs to the Sith. They allow Czerka to run the starport and a few mines, but the Sith are the ones in control.
Male_50.nm33aaciti04002_.mp3: There are a lot of young folk who come here hoping to get admitted to the Sith academy here in Dreshdae. Few ever do.
Male_50.nm33aaciti04003_.mp3: You're not here to try and get into the Sith academy, are you? Most of the poor fools who try are killed by the Sith. It's horrible!
Male_50.nm33aaciti04005_.mp3: I hear you arrived on that old smuggling ship... the Hawk, or something like that?
Male_50.nm33aaciti04006_.mp3: Are you a smuggler? That's the only way we get some decent goods to buy in this sector.
Male_50.nm33aaciti04007_.mp3: Yeah, the Czerka cantina's the only place to go around here for any real fun.
Male_50.nm33aaciti04008_.mp3: Have you heard what happened to Taris? I can't believe the Sith are powerful enough to do that.
Male_50.nm33aaciti04009_.mp3: Whatever you do, don't try and land a ship outside the colony. The Sith will destroy you without a second thought.
Male_50.nm33aaciti04010_.mp3: I hear them Sith are doing some kind of digging up on the planet's surface. How weird is that?
Male_50.nm33aaciti04011_.mp3: *Sigh* I can't wait to get back to the Core systems. This planet is dangerous with all these Sith wandering around.

Male_52.nm02acgana02014_.mp3: Here are your drinks, Miss Lavin. I apologize for the delay.
Male_52.nm02aewait24000_.mp3: I'm sorry. I'm too busy to talk. I have to get these drink orders to the customers!
Male_52.nm26acrepk10000_.mp3: I can't talk now. I have to get this kolto loaded up before my shift is over.
Male_52.nm26acrepk10002_.mp3: If you got a problem go talk to our diplomatic representative. Don't bother me with it.
Male_52.nm26acrepk10004_.mp3: People are saying the Republic did something to cripple the kolto production here on Manaan, but I don't believe it. Sounds more like something the Sith would do.
Male_52.nm26acrepk11000_.mp3: I can't stop to talk to tourists - I'm on kolto packing duty.
Male_52.nm26acrepk11002_.mp3: Hey - I'm working here! Go talk to the diplomatic rep if you got something to say.
Male_52.nm26acrepk11004_.mp3: The Selkath have scaled back all kolto harvesting - but nobody is saying why. Good thing we've been stockpiling this stuff for the past year.
Male_52.nm26acreps12000_.mp3: Kolto sales seem to have dropped off considerably. The Selkath are no longer exporting it, it seems. A lot of them act like they're blaming us...
Male_52.nm26acreps12001_.mp3: I'm sorry, I'm on duty, citizen. Please refer any questions to our diplomatic corp. Thank you.
Male_52.nm26acreps13000_.mp3: How much for all this stuff, Tyvark?
Male_52.nm26acreps13002_.mp3: Thanks, Tyvark. Catch you next week..
Male_52.nm26acreps13005_.mp3: Ah, glad to hear it. This stuff's all for the Republic Embassy, so can you just bill it to them?
Male_52.nm26acreps13007_.mp3: Hi, Tyvark. I've got to stock up - they might be sending me to the front to battle the Sith.
Male_52.nm26acreps13009_.mp3: You and me both, Tyvark. You and me both.
Male_52.nm26acreps13010_.mp3: The Selkath aren't harvesting kolto anymore. Something strange is going on... I bet the Sith are up to something!
Male_52.nm26acreps13011_.mp3: The Selkath seem to be pretty cold to the Republic lately. It's almost like they blame us for the disappearance of the kolto.
Male_52.nm26acreps13012_.mp3: I always shop here. Tyvark's prices are the best in the city.
Male_52.nm26acreps13013_.mp3: Tyvark hates the Sith, so he's always giving us Republic soldiers discounts. I bet he gives you Jedi a great deal.
Male_52.nm26acreps13014_.mp3: I have to get back to my post at the Republic Embassy. My break is almost over.
Male_52.nm26acreps14000_.mp3: If it wasn't for those damn Selkath neutrality laws, I'd teach that Sith a thing or two!
Male_52.nm26acreps14002_.mp3: I... I suppose you're right. You probably know best - you are a Jedi, after all. I guess getting mad doesn't help any.
Male_52.nm26acreps14005_.mp3: I can't do anything that would get me in trouble, or the Selkath might slap export penalties on the Republic.
Male_52.nm26acreps14006_.mp3: We need the Selkath's kolto for the war effort against Malak.
Male_52.nm26acreps14007_.mp3: As long as the Sith stay out of my way, I'll stay out of theirs.
Male_52.nm26acreps32000_.mp3: Those Sith are always trying to goad us. Why don't the Selkath stop them?
Male_52.nm26acreps33000_.mp3: I have to stop talking to Sith... they make me want to break so many laws just to pound the smirk off their faces!
Male_52.nm26acsith26002_.mp3: Save your empty threats, Sith scum! Malak isn't stupid enough to attack the Core worlds - not with the entire Republic fleet waiting for him!
Male_52.nm26acsith26006_.mp3: You underestimate the Republic's resolve! We'll die before we surrender Coruscant!
Male_52.nm26adrepa01000_.mp3: Yeah, what do you...? Oh, I apologize Master Jedi, I should not have been rude.
Male_52.nm26adrepa01002_.mp3: No really, I should apologize. I should try to control myself... as you Jedi do.
Male_52.nm26adrepa01003_.mp3: Is there anything I can help you with?
Male_52.nm26adrepa01005_.mp3: These damn Sith are everywhere on Manaan, pushing us Republic citizens around, trying to goad us into breaking the law somewhere.
Male_52.nm26adrepa01007_.mp3: The Selkath want to maintain their neutrality in this war we're fighting with the Sith and they enforce it VERY strictly.
Male_52.nm26adrepa01010_.mp3: Peacefully? Not hardly. Just look in their eyes. You can see they'd like nothing more than to kill each and every one of us, personal-like.
Male_52.nm26adrepa01012_.mp3: There's nothing we can do, though. The Selkath want to maintain their neutrality and they enforce it VERY strictly.
Male_52.nm26adrepa01013_.mp3: So we have to sit here and let the Sith insult us and we can't raise a hand against them otherwise the Republic will face severe kolto export restrictions. That could lose us the war altogether.
Male_52.nm26adrepa01015_.mp3: You're... you're joking, right? The smug Hutt-spawn push us every chance they can get and enjoy it.
Male_52.nm26adrepa01019_.mp3: Of course, I'm always willing to help a Jedi. What do you require?
Male_52.nm26adrepa01021_.mp3: Well, for the kolto, of course. Really that's the only reason anyone would want to be here. It's the only reason the Selkath built Ahto City in the first place: to export kolto.
Male_52.nm26adrepa01023_.mp3: Um... It's big. Real big. Actually it's pretty much the only real city on the entire world. The only place for us air-breathers anyway.
Male_52.nm26adrepa01024_.mp3: Manaan is a water world - which you may have noticed on your way down to land here - inhabited natively by a species of fish-people called the Selkath.
Male_52.nm26adrepa01025_.mp3: They built this city to cater to us off-worlders and as a base of operations to export kolto, which is the only real thing they have to trade here.
Male_52.nm26adrepa01028_.mp3: Sorry, but everyone knows what kolto is. The most powerful healing agent in the galaxy. I would've died several times myself if we didn't have this stuff handy.
Male_52.nm26adrepa01029_.mp3: But the reason it's important here is that kolto is only found naturally on Manaan, and all of our attempts to synthesize it have failed miserably.
Male_52.nm26adrepa01030_.mp3: So we sit here on the surface, the Selkath harvesting what kolto bubbles up from the bottom of the ocean, and we buy it from them.
Male_52.nm26adrepa01031_.mp3: Us and the Sith of course. The Selkath don't want to play favorites.
Male_52.nm26adrepa01033_.mp3: The Selkath think that by staying neutral they can play both sides, selling kolto to everyone that needs it, and making themselves too valuable to be worth conquering.
Male_52.nm26adrepa01034_.mp3: Well, that, and they threatened to destroy the only natural source of kolto on the planet if anyone tries to attack them.
Male_52.nm26adrepa01035_.mp3: But I think they're underestimating the lengths the Sith will go to get what they want... They're probably planning something already.
Male_52.nm26adrepa01036_.mp3: Is there anything else you require?
Male_52.nm26adrepa01040_.mp3: A Star Map? Like an ancient artifact or something?
Male_52.nm26adrepa01041_.mp3: No, sorry, never heard of it.
Male_52.nm26adrepa01042_.mp3: Is there anything else I can do for you?
Male_52.nm26adrepa01044_.mp3: Of course. If you have any other questions you should probably see Roland Wann, he's the Republic diplomat here. He's by the Republic enclave near the visitor residences.
Male_52.nm26adrepa01045_.mp3: If you don't know where that is, go north from here, then south past the port official and the first courtyard, east into the second courtyard, then north then east again. You got that?
Male_52.nm26adrepa01046_.mp3: Have a pleasant stay, Master Jedi.
Male_52.nm26adrepa01047_.mp3: If you have any other questions you should probably see Roland Wann, he's the Republic diplomat here. He's by the Republic enclave near the visitor residences. Have a pleasant stay, Master Jedi.
Male_52.nm26adrepk02000_.mp3: I can't talk now. I have to get this kolto loaded up before my shift is over.
Male_52.nm26adrepk02002_.mp3: If you got a problem go talk to our diplomatic representative. Don't bother me with it.
Male_52.nm26adrepk02004_.mp3: People are saying the Republic did something to cripple the kolto production here on Manaan, but I don't believe it. Sounds more like something the Sith would do.
Male_52.nm26adrepk03000_.mp3: I can't stop to talk to tourists - I'm on kolto packing duty.
Male_52.nm26adrepk03002_.mp3: Hey - I'm working here! Go talk to the diplomatic rep if you got something to say.
Male_52.nm26adrepk03004_.mp3: The Selkath have scaled back all kolto harvesting - but nobody is saying why. Good thing we've been stockpiling this stuff for the past year.

Male_53.nm26abswoo20000_.mp3: Hey! Come to cheer your favorite swoop-jock? Well, this is the place now that Taris is gone...
Male_53.nm26abswoo20001_.mp3: I'm just starting out. Hopefully when the circuit is back up fans like you will start to know my name when I race.
Male_53.nm26abswoo20002_.mp3: You're probably here to see the more established racers. That'll be me someday.
Male_53.nm26abswoo20003_.mp3: This isn't the best track, but it's better than the dustbowl on Tatooine.
Male_53.nm26abswoo20004_.mp3: You'll find that racing here is serious business. Maybe even dangerous sometimes.
Male_53.nm26abswoo20005_.mp3: Good to see a new racer coming in. I want to see someone give the pros a run for their money.
Male_53.nm26abswoo20006_.mp3: Racing here is pretty well regulated. I hear that other tracks are falling under Hutt control.
Male_53.nm26abswoo20007_.mp3: Don't worry about hurrying through the ranks. With the circuit down, there's not many other places to race right now.
Male_53.nm26abswoo20008_.mp3: Wow, you shot through the ranks here. I'm impressed. I couldn't do that.
Male_53.nm26abswoo20009_.mp3: Are you sure you're not a pro? You sure seem to know what you are doing out there.
Male_53.nm26abswoo20010_.mp3: You'll be the talk of Manaan for a while. Nobody is going to get anywhere near your time.
Male_53.nm26abswoo20011_.mp3: I could have been champ. I can't afford the swoop upgrades though.

Male_54.nm04aablac01000_.mp3: Wait - don't kill me! I surrender! I surrender!
Male_54.nm04aablac01004_.mp3: I work for Brejik, head of the Black Vulkar gang. He told us to kill anyone who came snooping around.
Male_54.nm04aablac01006_.mp3: There was one survivor - a female Republic officer. Bastila or something like that. Brejik took her back to Black Vulkar base as his prisoner.
Male_54.nm04aablac01008_.mp3: You can't. Nobody can. They'll shoot you on sight. Even I couldn't get you in - they'd just shoot us both if we show up there together.
Male_54.nm04aablac01010_.mp3: [Success] Well, you could talk to the Hidden Beks. They're our biggest rival - they might know some way to get in.
Male_54.nm04aablac01012_.mp3: Look - that's all I know, I swear. Please, just let me go and I promise you'll never see me again.
Male_54.nm04aablac01014_.mp3: [Failure] Forget it - nobody can get inside the Vulkar base. It's impossible.
Male_54.nm04aablac01018_.mp3: You don't have to tell me twice - I'm outta here!
Male_54.nm04aablac01023_.mp3: What - but I surrendered! Damn you!
Male_54.nm04aacand02002_.mp3: Don't... don't move! I'm... I'm not afraid to use this blaster if I have to!
Male_54.nm04aacand02015_.mp3: Canderous, I heard something! Over there, in the shadows! Sounded like a rakghoul!
Male_54.nm04aacand02020_.mp3: That's Canderous Ordo! He's the most famous Mandalorian mercenary in this sector of the galaxy!
Male_54.nm04aadavi03000_.mp3: Davik put Canderous in charge of this mission. You got something to say, you say it to the big Mandalorian.

Male_55.nm04aagend05000_.mp3: Greetings, up-worlder. We rarely see your kind here in the Undercity. I find it strange that so many of you have come down from the surface recently.
Male_55.nm04aagend05002_.mp3: Why have you come into this dark and sunless place? Is there something you need of me or my village? I will help you however I can.
Male_55.nm04aagend05004_.mp3: We are the Outcasts - shunned from the surface for our crimes and banished here to the Undercity. We banded together to form this village that we might survive in this hostile environment.
Male_55.nm04aagend05006_.mp3: I am Gendar, the leader of this village: as my father was, and as was his father before him. Many of us have been here for generations, our ancestors cast down long ago.
Male_55.nm04aagend05008_.mp3: There is no return to the surface for us, or our descendants. But somehow we manage to survive amidst the filth and roaming bands of deadly rakghouls.
Male_55.nm04aagend05010_.mp3: Life down here can be difficult. It can break the spirit... many in the village have become bitter and hopeless. Especially those newly cast down.
Male_55.nm04aagend05012_.mp3: But life goes on, and we must try to make the best of what we have. And maybe someday we will find a better life... Ha! Listen to me. I'm starting to sound like Rukil.
Male_55.nm04aagend05014_.mp3: The oldest man in the village. He is a kind soul, but I am afraid he is growing weary of this world. He dreams of escaping, of finding a better world.
Male_55.nm04aagend05016_.mp3: If you wish to speak to him you can probably find him wandering about the village. As I said, a kind man - though he does cling to his illusions.
Male_55.nm04aagend05018_.mp3: Ask your questions, up-worlder. I will answer to the best of my knowledge, though I know little beyond the borders of the Undercity.
Male_55.nm04aagend05020_.mp3: Yes, I have seen this Twi'lek many times, though I have never spoken to her. She and her Wookiee companion often pass through our village on their way to explore the sewers.
Male_55.nm04aagend05022_.mp3: The rakghouls are monsters, hideous mutations who feast on the flesh of our villagers. Their diseased jaws can infect those they attack, transforming the victim into one of those abominations.
Male_55.nm04aagend05024_.mp3: Thanks to you some of those who have been infected are now saved, but the rakghouls are still a terrible menace to our village.
Male_55.nm04aagend05025_.mp3: We know of no cure for the disease, and for the good of the village we must banish any who become infected, lest they transform and turn on us.
Male_55.nm04aagend05027_.mp3: Ah, you have been speaking with Rukil. I am afraid the Promised Land is nothing but a legend. If such a place existed it surely would have been found by now.
Male_55.nm04aagend05029_.mp3: Rukil is a good man, but he is old and tired. He needs to cling to his illusion to keep his spirit alive. I, on the other hand, have to be more practical. The village relies on me.
Male_55.nm04aagend05031_.mp3: Our village has seen many visitors from the surface recently: armored troops, swoop gang members, mercenaries. They come to search our sunless world. They are even searching the sewers.
Male_55.nm04aagend05033_.mp3: You are generous to offer this to us, up-worlder... you have my thanks. But I know nothing of administering the serum. You should bring it to the village healer.
Male_55.nm04aagend05035_.mp3: As you wish, up-worlder. Should you have need of anything else, come speak to me. I represent the entire village and I will do my best to help you however I can.
Male_55.nm04aagend05038_.mp3: I am no beggar, though many from the surface think me a far lower creature! We have our pride, despite what those from the surface think of us.
Male_55.nm04aagend05039_.mp3: You have done a great thing for my village, up-worlder. Few from the surface would bother to cure an Outcast of the rakghoul disease, as you have done.
Male_55.nm04aagend05041_.mp3: My only regret is that I have no reward to give you for your aid, save my thanks and the thanks of my people.
Male_55.nm04aagend05042_.mp3: Welcome back, up-worlder. I am surprised to see you again. Many of your kind have passed through our village recently, but few have bothered to speak with me or my people.
Male_55.nm04aagend05045_.mp3: There are two entrances into the sewers from the Undercity: one to the north-east of our village, the other to the south-east. But the sewers are dangerous, UpWorlder.
Male_55.nm04aagend05046_.mp3: If you dare to travel those dark tunnels you would be wise to go heavily armed, unless you wish to become a meal for the rakghouls and other foul creatures.

Male_56.nm03aacand06000_.mp3: You guys are behind with your payments. What do you uh, you think just 'cause you're in some gang you don't have to give Davik his cut?
Male_56.nm03aacand06012_.mp3: I knew you boys would see reason. Now get out of here.
Male_56.nm03aacand06016_.mp3: Maybe next time, Canderous. I better get this over to Davik. I'll call you if anyone else gets behind on their payments.
Male_56.nm03aecand07000_.mp3: You guys are behind with your payments. You think just 'cause you're in some gang you don't have to give Davik his cut?
Male_56.nm03aecand07012_.mp3: I knew you boys would see reason. Now get out of here.
Male_56.nm03aecand07016_.mp3: Maybe next time, Canderous. I better get this over to Davik. I'll call you if anyone else gets behind on their payments.

Male_57.nm17ae04sf07000_.mp3: Gotta like the races. There's nothing else, so you'd better.
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07001_.mp3: Every now and then we push a new obstacle on the course to keep it fresh. Good luck out there.
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07002_.mp3: Got a favorite racer? Nico's good, but Garm's a real pro.
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07003_.mp3: It's too bad about Taris. The destruction there has really hurt the swoop circuit.
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07004_.mp3: I suppose I've seen racers do worse than you did, but you'd better show your skills on the next run.
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07005_.mp3: You're losing fans every race you lose. You'd better tighten up out there.
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07006_.mp3: Not the worst I've seen, but you'll have to do better if you want to make the circuit.
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07007_.mp3: You didn't look so good out there on that last race. Desert sun getting to you?
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07008_.mp3: Watch your bike around here. You're doing all right, and the last thing you want is it to get stripped for parts.
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07009_.mp3: Taris was a good track, but their racers were uptight. You win, and you look like you enjoy yourself.
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07010_.mp3: That was a pretty good showing out there. Maybe you're not just another sand-skimming nerf herder.
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07011_.mp3: If you're such a good racer, why are you here? Maybe you've done as good as you're going to.
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07012_.mp3: Motta wants Tatooine to be the new Taris for races. A few more newcomers with your skills and he might do it.
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07013_.mp3: Yuka Rill will be crying for days... or whatever it is Ithorians do. You beat his time into the ground!
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07014_.mp3: I'm looking forward to seeing you go against Zoriis Bafka's time. She's been a pro for years.
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07015_.mp3: You're almost good enough to go pro, you know? I'll be cheering for you in the next race.
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07016_.mp3: You are an absolute terror on the track! Are you sure you're not a pro already?
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07017_.mp3: If the circuit were up you'd be famous one three... no! Four worlds by now. You're just that good!
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07018_.mp3: That last race of yours was the most exciting thing to blow through Tatooine... ever.
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07019_.mp3: I'm going to watch for you in the future. Your races are... just amazing.
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07020_.mp3: That last race was incredible. You just keep looking better and better out there... and here as well.
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07021_.mp3: You're beautiful out there, absolutely beautiful. And a pro racer as well!
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07022_.mp3: Lady, you are the best. I just had to say that.
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07023_.mp3: I've never seen a woman come into town and take charge like you did out there. You are scary. Wonderfully scary.
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07024_.mp3: We get some decent speed on the desert. No need for expensive mods. It's good for new racers like you.
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07025_.mp3: Once you've raced a bit you'll learn that this track isn't the greatest, but it gets the job done.
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07026_.mp3: It's crass to say, but the destruction of Taris means more racers coming here. Like you, I bet.
Male_57.nm17ae04sf07027_.mp3: You a racer? Don't sign with Motta. That's all I'm saying.

Male_58.nm02aegerl16000_.mp3: You're good, Stranger. I'll give you that. But going up against Bendak is suicide! Even before I lost feeling in my fingers I wouldn't have risked a death match with the Starkiller!
Male_58.nm02aegerl16002_.mp3: I don't think you had a chance against Bendak, but you sure showed me. You showed us all. Too bad your career as a duelist is over now.
Male_58.nm02aegerl16004_.mp3: I mean, nobody's going to be stupid enough to go up against you anymore - not even Twitch! Kind of funny, isn't it? You win the big match, and you kill your career!
Male_58.nm02aegerl16006_.mp3: First I go down to an injury, and now it looks like Marl's been dropped by old age. No room in this game for the veterans anymore, I guess.
Male_58.nm02aegerl16008_.mp3: But don't get cocky, kid! One day it'll happen to you too! Time catches up to us all, sooner or later. Well, everyone except Bendak Starkiller.
Male_58.nm02aegerl16010_.mp3: You beat me fair and square, Stranger. But if I still had the use of my fingers you wouldn't have won! Back before my injury I would've mopped the ring up with you!
Male_58.nm02aegerl16012_.mp3: I saw you your match against Duncan. Not bad for a rookie, but Deadeye's a joke. Even after I lost the use of my fingers I can still beat him!
Male_58.nm02aegerl16014_.mp3: Go talk to Ajuur, the Duel Organizer, if you want to step up to the big leagues. I'll show you what it's like to fight a real duelist.
