Male_58.nm02aegerl16016_.mp3: You seem to be hanging around here an awful lot. You actually going to step into the duel ring sometime, or are you just here to watch?
Male_58.nm02aegerl16017_.mp3: I haven't seen you around here before. You looking to step into the duel ring, or did you just come to watch?
Male_58.nm02aegerl16019_.mp3: What? Why are you here if you don't even know what the dueling ring is?
Male_58.nm02aegerl16021_.mp3: I don't have time to answer your questions - I need to stay focused for my next match. Maybe Ajuur can help you out. He's the Hutt over in the corner. He arranges all the duels.
Male_58.nm02aegerl16024_.mp3: Good to see some new blood in the fight game. Things have gotten pretty stale around here lately.
Male_58.nm02aegerl16026_.mp3: If you're serious about this go talk to Ajuur the Hutt. He's the Duel Organizer. He'll probably start a rookie like you out against Duncan.

Male_59.nm24aapgen07000_.mp3: I've helped you all I'm going to. Any more and the Commander will have me shot. Leave me alone.
Male_59.nm24aapgen07007_.mp3: You want anything you'll have to talk to the commander. He's in charge of our harvesting here.
Male_59.nm24aapgen07009_.mp3: Why am I here? I'm here because this is where the Commander told me to stand. And that's all there is to it.
Male_59.nm24aapgen07011_.mp3: I'm just a guard for this emitter. Why couldn't they have just equipped this lump of tech with a blaster and left me at home?
Male_59.nm24aapgen07013_.mp3: I'm not here because I know stuff. I handle a blaster well enough to guard this emitter, and that's it. Talk to the Commander.
Male_59.nm24aapgen07015_.mp3: Don't you start with me! I don't know what you said to that other guy, but I'm not risking getting killed!
Male_59.nm24aapgen07017_.mp3: Now leave me alone before the Commander gets any ideas.
Male_59.nm24aapgen07022_.mp3: No more dangerous than walking out on the commander. He'd kill me for disobeying orders.
Male_59.nm24aapgen07024_.mp3: [Success] I... I really need to get out of here. It's too dangerous!
Male_59.nm24aapgen07036_.mp3: [Success] I don't like being here, that's for sure. I suppose you could... take this code and shut down the emitter I'm guarding.
Male_59.nm24aapgen07038_.mp3: Enough of those emitters go down and the camp will have to move out. But I never said anything.
Male_59.nm24aapgen07039_.mp3: [Failure] It's "friendly" people like you that recruited me into this mess. I'm keeping an eye on you, that's for sure.
Male_59.nm24aapgen07041_.mp3: [Success] I don't like being here, that's for sure. I suppose you could... take this code and shut down the emitter I'm guarding.
Male_59.nm24aapgen07047_.mp3: What do you want to know about that? It's just one of five or so sonic emitters protecting the camp.
Male_59.nm24aapgen07049_.mp3: Are you threatening me? Unless you want a fight with all of us I'd suggest you change your tone.
Male_59.nm24aapgen07057_.mp3: Good. I don't want any trouble.
Male_59.nm24aapgen07061_.mp3: What do you want? I don't want to get on the commander's bad side, so just leave me alone.

Male_60.nm14acbolo01241_.mp3: Why don't you check that Calder slime-ball, now that you've already roughed me up!
Male_60.nm14acbolo01281_.mp3: Shut your mouth! I'll kill you just like I... er...
Male_60.nm14acbolo01291_.mp3: No! If I'm going, I'm not going alone! You don't know what you've done!
Male_60.nm14acbolo01293_.mp3: Look, I came out here, I admit, to kill Calder, but so did Rickard! He must have thought it was Calder when he shot, and hit me!
Male_60.nm14acbolo01294_.mp3: So I'm going to prison, but I shouldn't be going alone! Did you idiots have to let the slime-ball go?
Male_60.nm14acbolo01297_.mp3: I came out here and killed Calder, but Rickard was here to do that too and he shot me by mistake!
Male_60.nm14acbolo01311_.mp3: Good, good. I assume I am permitted to leave now?
Male_60.nm14acbolo01337_.mp3: And I would have got away with it if it wasn't for you meddling Jedi!
Male_60.nm14achand05000_.mp3: Ah, greetings. You must be assisting Master Bolook in his investigation.
Male_60.nm14achand05002_.mp3: I am Handon Guld, perhaps you've heard of me?
Male_60.nm14achand05004_.mp3: Well, I presume you wish to hear my story then? I shall tell you, of course, but there is not much to it. I am sure that you'll agree that Rickard is quite obviously guilty of murder.
Male_60.nm14achand05006_.mp3: You see, I was out here running earlier today - yes, running, I do that a lot. Can't stand speeders, never use them. Keeps me in shape too, you know! Anyway, I was out running on the other side of that bridge there...
Male_60.nm14achand05008_.mp3: When all of a sudden I heard a shot coming from over here. I ran over and found this man Calder lying on the ground dead!
Male_60.nm14achand05010_.mp3: I saw Rickard come skulking out of the shadows of the rocks south of the river, and I knew something was wrong. I hit my emergency button and called the Enclave right away.
Male_60.nm14achand05012_.mp3: Now I bet you're wondering if I had any reasons to kill the man, but I tell you I hardly knew him! Saw him once or twice, yes, and I have heard some pretty unkind things about him, but...
Male_60.nm14achand05014_.mp3: Certainly nothing that would make me want to kill him!
Male_60.nm14achand05016_.mp3: Knock his block off, sure, but not kill him! Oh my... I hope you don't find that incriminating...
Male_60.nm14achand05018_.mp3: Um... well, you see, Calder was involved in some pretty sordid business from time to time. More often than not, I've heard.
Male_60.nm14achand05020_.mp3: Disreputable business practices, even more disreputable clients. I've even heard he had dealings with... a Hutt! A Hutt here on Dantooine!
Male_60.nm14achand05022_.mp3: He also had a reputation as a womanizer... Married women.
Male_60.nm14achand05024_.mp3: My wife was cheating on me with him. They slept in my own bed while I was in the next room!
Male_60.nm14achand05026_.mp3: But... as much as I may hate him for that, I could not kill him.
Male_60.nm14achand05028_.mp3: It may have been my own fault for driving my wife away. I must try not to take the law in my own hands.
Male_60.nm14achand05030_.mp3: Well... there, that's my story. Now please hurry this up and arrest Rickard so I can get on with my day!
Male_60.nm14achand05036_.mp3: Um... I guess, under the circumstances, no.
Male_60.nm14achand05039_.mp3: [Success] Really? *Ahem* Well, then, I assure you on my reputation I had nothing to do with the killing. I will help you with the case as best I can, though.
Male_60.nm14achand05041_.mp3: How can I be of further assistance?
Male_60.nm14achand05043_.mp3: Actually, I didn't see anything. I was over across the bridge, I heard a shot and came over. I can tell you I was sure surprised to see Calder's body lying there!
Male_60.nm14achand05045_.mp3: I just got here when I saw Rickard coming out of the rocks, holding his blaster! I was terrified!
Male_60.nm14achand05047_.mp3: I had no idea what he was going to do so I hit my emergency button and called the Enclave.
Male_60.nm14achand05049_.mp3: Master Bolook came out here with his droid and started questioning us. I think he really doesn't understand what's going on.
Male_60.nm14achand05051_.mp3: I hope that you'll be able to make a more informed decision and get me out of here soon. I have things I have to do!
Male_60.nm14achand05054_.mp3: I was taking my daily constitutional. I just happened to be running by when I heard a shot. I ran over and found Calder's body lying there.
Male_60.nm14achand05056_.mp3: Yes, quite often. I generally prefer running to anything else. Can't stand speeders.
Male_60.nm14achand05058_.mp3: A healthy body will breed a healthy mind, as I always say! Ha ha!
Male_60.nm14achand05061_.mp3: I knew him a little bit, but I was not any sort of great friend to him or anything.
Male_60.nm14achand05063_.mp3: I never really associated with him that much. In truth, I didn't really want to. He had a... reputation. Very inconsiderate of family, I heard.
Male_60.nm14achand05065_.mp3: But merely having heard unkind things about someone wouldn't make me want to kill him!
Male_60.nm14achand05067_.mp3: I'm sorry, I'm... I'm getting a bit agitated. Why must we remain here? Can't... Can't you see that Rickard must have shot him?
Male_60.nm14achand05070_.mp3: Kill him? Well, I don't know maybe for being a liar and a cheat! I mean... well... *ahem* I guess I sort of incriminated myself there but...
Male_60.nm14achand05072_.mp3: Normally I am not prone to outbursts like that, but Calder... Mr. Nettic, he was not a very nice person. Not a very nice person to me or my family.
Male_60.nm14achand05074_.mp3: I had had my suspicions for several weeks, but had no proof until two days ago. It seems Calder was seeing my wife. Right under my nose, no less!
Male_60.nm14achand05080_.mp3: But I... I realize this must seem like a motive to you, but I assure you it isn't. I dislike Calder, true. I would punch his face in, given the opportunity. But I would not kill him!
Male_60.nm14achand05082_.mp3: I was just out running, trying to clear my head for the divorce proceedings, not stalking him to kill him. Running is not a crime.
Male_60.nm14achand05085_.mp3: That blaster? H... hey! That's my blaster!
Male_60.nm14achand05087_.mp3: That blaster was stolen from my house last week! I never knew what happened to it.
Male_60.nm14achand05089_.mp3: I hardly have enough money to afford a single blaster, let alone another. I can't tell you how important it is to have a weapon on hand with all these ravenous kath hounds around.
Male_60.nm14achand05091_.mp3: Even an iriaz can take a man down if it gets in the mood. Every settler has a weapon. It's our most prized possession.
Male_60.nm14achand05093_.mp3: I would most appreciate it if I could have that back after you determine that Rickard is the killer.
Male_60.nm14achand05096_.mp3: In... injured? No, of course not! Why would I have been? Fit as a bantha! Har har! Yes... I run. I don't know if I mentioned that.
Male_60.nm14achand05099_.mp3: Of course, of course. Listen, if you need anything I shall be glad to assist.

Male_61.nm02aechri05002_.mp3: I can trace my lineage back five generations to one of the founding houses of Taris. In fact... uh, we seem to have some unexpected company, my darling.

Male_62.nm18adhunt03000_.mp3: I'm tired of waiting, Komad. How big can this dragon of yours be? I'm going in!
Male_62.nm18adscre04000_.mp3: What the...! Look at the size of it... Yeaaaarrrgh!!

Male_63.nm14aajon006000_.mp3: Are you a Jedi? How long can you people continue to sit by and claim you protect us?
Male_63.nm14aajon006001_.mp3: Protectors? Ha! You sit in your Enclave safe from the Mandalorians while we suffer!
Male_63.nm14aajon006003_.mp3: Those Mandalorian brutes have killed my daughter!
Male_63.nm14aajon006005_.mp3: And what am I supposed to do against a dozen Mandalorians and Duros? Nothing... There was nothing I could do...
Male_63.nm14aajon006006_.mp3: They came to our land, demanding our livelihood. But Ilsa, my Ilsa, said no...
Male_63.nm14aajon006008_.mp3: There was nothing I could do... Too many of the Mandalorians and their Duros allies...
Male_63.nm14aajon006009_.mp3: I've come here to ask you, please, master Jedi, stop these raiders and get revenge for my daughter.
Male_63.nm14aajon006011_.mp3: But you have been accepted into the Order. Yours is the authority of the Jedi.
Male_63.nm14aajon006013_.mp3: I will give you all I have, just please, annihilate them from the face of this planet!
Male_63.nm14aajon006017_.mp3: Please, I beg of you! Find the Mandalorian raiders and destroy them so my daughter can rest in peace!
Male_63.nm14aajon006028_.mp3: No! They've been raiding planets across this sector, and farms around here often.
Male_63.nm14aajon006029_.mp3: You Jedi have left them alone because they haven't harmed you, but they steal our property, destroy our land, and worse!
Male_63.nm14aajon006032_.mp3: Have you found the Mandalorian raiders yet?
Male_63.nm14aajon006034_.mp3: Thank you, young Master. My daughter can now, I think, rest in peace.
Male_63.nm14aajon006035_.mp3: Here is the reward I promised you.
Male_63.nm14aajon006037_.mp3: Again, I thank you. I will be sure to tell the Council of your great deed.
Male_63.nm14aajon006039_.mp3: No, please, take it. This pitiful amount will never be enough for what you have done for me.
Male_63.nm14aajon006041_.mp3: Wha... what? I did not think the Jedi were so greedy. You seem almost Mandalorian.
Male_63.nm14aajon006042_.mp3: I thank you for what you have done for me, but I have nothing else to give. The Council will hear of your deeds... and your greed.
Male_63.nm14aajon006044_.mp3: Good, good! Put them down like the animals they are!
Male_63.nm14aajon006046_.mp3: Please, help us if you can! They are as much a danger to you as to us! It is only a matter of time before they come here...
Male_63.nm14aajon006048_.mp3: Not much that would help you, I'm afraid. They're Mandalorians in their battle armor with some Duros allies. They came down on us on landspeeders, so they could be anywhere by now.
Male_63.nm14aajon006049_.mp3: One thing I do remember when those dogs killed my Ilsa, is that their leader was a giant of a man... who wielded a lightsaber.
Male_63.nm14aajon006051_.mp3: Yes it was. Mandalorians have never been open to the ways of the Jedi. They are much too barbaric and violent.
Male_63.nm14aajon006053_.mp3: Mandalorians have never been open to your ways. They are much too barbaric and violent.
Male_63.nm14aajon006055_.mp3: I rather think that it may have been from some poor Jedi he had slain before. You can see now that he is as much of a threat to you as to me! You must kill them!
Male_63.nm14aajon006056_.mp3: They have been troubling farms in the south most recently, having already dealt with many to the north. Please go there, find them and kill them!
Male_63.nm14aajon006059_.mp3: Please! Find them and destroy them before they kill anyone else!
Male_63.nm14aajon006060_.mp3: Now those Mandalorians know what it's like to be hunted!
Male_63.nm14aajon006061_.mp3: But now that you've killed some of them, they won't stop until you've defeated their leader. You must find him and kill him, too.
Male_63.nm14aajon006064_.mp3: Thank you for exacting my revenge on those Mandalorian beasts. If only I could have been the one to tear out Sheruk's heart.

Male_64.nm26acrepa06000_.mp3: Kolto production seems to have dropped off a LOT, recently. The Selkath have been eyeing us funny, too...
Male_64.nm26acrepa06002_.mp3: The Sith Embassy has gone silent... and they aren't explaining. I hope it was something bad!
Male_64.nm26acrepa06004_.mp3: Good thing Sunry got free! The Sith who tried to pin the murder on him would probably have made him disappear in prison.
Male_64.nm26acrepa06006_.mp3: I can't believe those Selkath found Sunry guilty. The Sith must have bribed them or something... So much for neutrality!
Male_64.nm26acrepa06008_.mp3: Greetings, Master Jedi. I hope you have a pleasant stay here on Manaan. If you have any questions or needs, please direct them to our envoy Roland Wann at our Embassy.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07000_.mp3: Welcome to Manaan. I am Roland Wann. As the official representative of the Republic Embassy on this planet, I am here to help all citizens of the Republic should they require aid.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07002_.mp3: Kolto is a precious resource - it's healing powers are near miraculous. During times of war, kolto becomes even more valuable.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07003_.mp3: As long as we have the permits, we will continue to harvest kolto and ship it to our Republic soldiers battling against the Sith. Of course, the Sith enjoy the very same privileges.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07004_.mp3: If there was some way we could gain an edge over the Sith in our kolto supply...
Male_64.nm26acrepd07005_.mp3: But the Selkath are fiercely protective of their neutrality in this conflict. They do not want to grant either side an advantage.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07007_.mp3: A beautiful place, Ahto city - a paradise on the water. But remember, within the city itself the Selkath have absolute authority. They are a tough race, but fair.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07008_.mp3: Obey the Selkath laws, keep the peace and you should encounter no problems. I assume you received a visitor guide to the city when you docked your ship.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07009_.mp3: I regret there is little I can tell you that is not in the visitor guide, my good Jedi. My duties rarely permit me to venture beyond the walls of the Republic Embassy.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07011_.mp3: Uh... of course, of course. I will do whatever I can. But I am only a simple diplomatic representative of the Republic. I doubt I can be of any use to the Jedi Council.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07013_.mp3: An ancient and forgotten race... and you think it may be here on Manaan? Hm...
Male_64.nm26acrepd07015_.mp3: Well... perhaps. But if you want to get information about that, you'll have to do something for me first.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07017_.mp3: We were using a submersible reconnaissance droid in the ocean surrounding Ahto City and it was... damaged. It took a data recording of the outside of the city before being driven off by the firaxan sharks.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07018_.mp3: But while it was returning to the surface it encountered difficulties and was disabled. Its automatic systems floated it to the surface, but we could not retrieve it in time.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07019_.mp3: The Sith were applying subtle pressure to the Selkath authorities for some reason we have not determined, and were able to delay us long enough that they could retrieve the droid before we did.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07020_.mp3: The droid's data centers are heavily encrypted, so it will take the Sith several days, we believe, to get to its data. It was captured 12 hours ago. It is imperative that we get it back!
Male_64.nm26acrepd07022_.mp3: It is heavily guarded, we are sure, in the Sith Embassy here on Manaan. Since we have no remaining soldiers to spare, and certainly not our elite ones, we have no one capable of entering the Sith base and retrieving it.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07023_.mp3: That is what we would ask you to do.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07027_.mp3: If you want to find information about ancient ruins or your 'Star Map' or whatever it is, I think this is your best choice.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07028_.mp3: But you will have time to consider your options. And when you come to the only conclusion possible, I will be here to tell you how we can work together.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07031_.mp3: But you need our information, and I guarantee you that you will never be able to get it unless we have our secrecy guaranteed against the Sith.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07033_.mp3: It's intelligence information about Sith activities on Manaan, as well as some oceanographic reports on the local marine life.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07035_.mp3: [Failure] No, no. You do what I want and maybe I can help you out. Until then: nothing.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07037_.mp3: [Failure] Don't think you can manipulate me, Jedi! The Republic Diplomatic Corps has to deal with the Sith all the time, so we are very resistant to mental influence.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07038_.mp3: Your only real choice is to help me, so I can help you.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07040_.mp3: I don't know much about the facts of the case, but I find it hard to believe. I never met Sunry, but he's a hero of the Republic - not a murderer.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07041_.mp3: The so called evidence against him is an obvious frame up - it has to be! The Sith must have plotted Sunry's downfall to embarass and discredit the Republic!
Male_64.nm26acrepd07043_.mp3: If you want to solve this mess, I would focus on the Sith. That, or check out the murder scene at the hotel. Talk to the other guests - maybe they know something.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07044_.mp3: I regret I could not be of more assistance in your investigation. Is there anything else?
Male_64.nm26acrepd07046_.mp3: Who else? Sunry's conviction will be a blow to Republic-Selkath relations. Who would benefit from this other than the Sith?
Male_64.nm26acrepd07048_.mp3: The Republic? That makes no sense. Sunry has no enemies in the Republic, and his conviction will make all of our jobs more difficult.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07050_.mp3: You mean you sliced into our... That is a very serious crime! We could have you executed for treason if that information caused any harm!
Male_64.nm26acrepd07051_.mp3: But... I may just be willing to overlook this transgression if you NEVER EVER TELL ANOTHER LIVING BEING ABOUT IT.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07052_.mp3: And that is all I will ever tell you on the matter.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07054_.mp3: Then I shall wish you good day. On behalf of the Republic, I hope you enjoy your time here on Manaan.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07055_.mp3: Greetings once again. I trust you have been discrete concerning the events at the Hrakert Rift.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07056_.mp3: Should the Selkath obtain proof of what occured down there the consequences for the Republic would be severe. For both our sakes, I hope you are smart enough to keep silent on this matter.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07057_.mp3: Truth be told, I am uncomfortable even with us being seen together. The rumors are already plentiful enough among the Selkath about the Republic's role in this.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07059_.mp3: Don't be foolish! If the Republic's role in this is discovered, I will be sure the blame rests on your shoulders as well. We share a secret - and we will share the consequences if the secret is revealed.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07060_.mp3: For both our sakes you should move on. Our conversation attracts undue attention.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07061_.mp3: When you are ready to explore the Hrakert Rift, enter the Republic base. In the kolto packing room there is a door leading to the Republic submarines.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07062_.mp3: The sub will have a course to the Hrakert Scientific Research facility charted in. It will take you to the Hrakert Rift.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07063_.mp3: I wish you luck on your quest. Hopefully a Jedi can succeed where so many others have failed.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07064_.mp3: Ah, you're back. Have you decided to assist us and, at the same time, yourself?
Male_64.nm26acrepd07066_.mp3: Good. I'm glad that you have come to accept the inevitable. Now we can really get down to work.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07067_.mp3: There are several leads we have been working on to get into the Sith base. Any of them should work for you, although it might be wise to concentrate your efforts on just one.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07068_.mp3: The first method that's possible is to help us interrogate a Sith prisoner we managed to catch after he tried to infiltrate our base. He is being held just inside our enclave.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07069_.mp3: We think he may be able to give us the passcode that the Sith give their informers to enter the base.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07070_.mp3: He has proved most resilient so far...
Male_64.nm26acrepd07072_.mp3: Good. It's a logical place to start. But you should also hear about the other options available to you.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07074_.mp3: We managed to pick up a crate of blank Sith data cards the type they use for passcards.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07075_.mp3: The encryption system to unlock them is very difficult however, but if you are more skilled than our technicians, you may be able to gain access that way.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07077_.mp3: Good. It is a very intelligent and skilled individual who can crack the matrices of a Sith encryption system.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07078_.mp3: But there is one last method you should know about in case all other options fail.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07080_.mp3: The Sith have got the Selkath to give them exclusive use of one of the main hangar bays.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07081_.mp3: Visiting Sith masters use this bay to land, then take a speeder over the water to an external entrance to the Sith enclave.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07082_.mp3: The luckless spy we mentioned earlier had a passcard to that hangar on him. While it is surely well guarded, it may prove to be the most direct route. Here is the card.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07083_.mp3: The Sith base itself is very heavily guarded. If they became aware of your presence, I fear you would be quickly outnumbered and killed.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07084_.mp3: Here is a passcard to get you inside our facility. You should find all you need to get started in there.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07085_.mp3: You can choose whichever of the methods you want as long as you get in the base and get the data recording back. Which method do you think you would like to try first?
Male_64.nm26acrepd07087_.mp3: Good call, just make sure you don't push him too hard or we might lose him.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07088_.mp3: I wish you luck in your task. Should you retrieve the data recording from the droid, return it here to me and we can see about getting you that information.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07090_.mp3: Good choice. We've been working at that for a while, but it's been too difficult so far. Maybe you'll have better luck.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07092_.mp3: You'll need luck for that one - odds are they have some pretty strong guards in there. But it's also the way most likely to succeed.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07096_.mp3: There is no need to be so rude.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07097_.mp3: Have you managed to retrieve the data from our droid in the Sith base?
Male_64.nm26acrepd07099_.mp3: Excellent! It does not appear to have been tampered with, so the Sith did not manage to copy its contents yet.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07100_.mp3: And now for your information... We are not supposed to speak of this, but since you are a Jedi, and we have exhausted all the other options, I think I can entrust you with this.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07101_.mp3: As you know, the Republic is fighting for its very existence against the evil of the Sith Empire. As you also undoubtedly know, we are doing very poorly.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07102_.mp3: We need much in the way of supplies and material to stem the tide of battle and bring us victory.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07103_.mp3: Manaan is the sole source of kolto, the most powerful medical substance in the galaxy. Frankly, we need as much of it as we can get.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07105_.mp3: The Selkath conservatives with their neutrality treaties seek to treat the Sith and the Republic equally. This includes kolto exports.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07106_.mp3: But a few more far-sighted Selkath see that if the Sith are ever allowed to win, the galaxy will be plunged into darkness and there would be nothing to stop them from taking Manaan anyway.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07109_.mp3: We recently began construction of a secret underground facility to harvest kolto directly at its source. We also hope to one day be able to synthesize it effectively.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07110_.mp3: Current techniques are insufficient for the task, so we must mine it for now. The amount we take would hardly be noticed, since most is lost naturally before it reaches the surface anyway.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07111_.mp3: We were nearing completion of the base when the digging teams reported some sort of obstruction... an ancient building or artifact. Possibly your 'Star Map'.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07112_.mp3: Transmissions from the base were cut off abruptly after that, and we haven't heard from the station since.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07114_.mp3: As you may have noticed, we are hiring a lot of mercenaries around here. Ostensibly they're to be shipped off-world to aid in our fight against the Sith, but they are really for another purpose.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07115_.mp3: When we lost contact with the station in the Hrakert Rift, we sent our contingent of Republic soldiers down to investigate. None returned...
Male_64.nm26acrepd07116_.mp3: We have tried hiring mercenaries and sending them down as well, but none of those expeditions have returned either.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07117_.mp3: The reason we really sent that droid underwater - and the reason we needed its data back so badly - was to find out what had happened to the Hrakert Rift station.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07118_.mp3: But now that we have the data back, our operation is in no danger of exposure to the Sith. And now I must live up to my end of the bargain.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07120_.mp3: I took the liberty of having a submarine prepared for your departure. Merely use this card to get past the door behind our kolto packing room and enter the sub therein.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07121_.mp3: It has been programmed to take you down to the station, and also to take you back up should you need something.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07122_.mp3: I would send soldiers to assist you, but we have lost many of ours, and nearly exhausted the mercenary population of this planet. The soldiers we have are barely enough to keep this base secure!
Male_64.nm26acrepd07123_.mp3: The Sith have also noted our interest and begun to bribe mercenaries away from us...
Male_64.nm26acrepd07124_.mp3: Please, find out what happened to the facility. There may be some survivors left down there, perhaps even the head scientist - Kono Nolan.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07128_.mp3: *Sigh* We don't know. We just don't know.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07132_.mp3: Shhh! Not so loud! Yes, it is a technical violation of the treaty, but it is sanctioned by elements of the Selkath government. We need only keep it hidden from the Sith.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07134_.mp3: I know... but to the senators, it seemed to outweigh the risks.
Male_64.nm26acrepd07137_.mp3: Time is a critical factor. We cannot allow the Sith to decode that data recording or our operations on Manaan would be compromised.
Male_64.nm26acrepd08000_.mp3: You have returned! I was beginning to fear that you, too, might have been lost. Did you find out what had happened down there at the facility?
Male_64.nm26acrepd08002_.mp3: Insane? What did they do? And why?
Male_64.nm26acrepd08004_.mp3: They killed... everyone? And the mercenaries we sent later? That is... horrible. What caused them to all go insane at once like that?
Male_64.nm26acrepd08006_.mp3: Something was down there? Living in the Rift by the kolto?
Male_64.nm26acrepd08008_.mp3: That's... horrible. The entire operation wasted by a disaster we could never in a thousand years have foreseen.
Male_64.nm26acrepd08010_.mp3: What has happened to the facility itself? Were there any survivors?
Male_64.nm26acrepd08012_.mp3: Well, that is good to know. Good to know indeed. But... What has happened to the facility? Was it damaged?
Male_64.nm26acrepd08014_.mp3: No! That is terrible. That will set our work back years... *sigh* It may even cost us the war.
Male_64.nm26acrepd08016_.mp3: While I am glad that you were able to solve our problems, the cost may have ended up being much too high.
Male_64.nm26acrepd08018_.mp3: But you have done your job and helped us in our time of need, and for that I thank you.
Male_64.nm26acrepd08020_.mp3: Oh, and did you end up finding your Star Map?
Male_64.nm26acrepd08022_.mp3: As you can see, by helping us you helped yourself. Perhaps we can work together again in the future.
Male_64.nm26acrepd08025_.mp3: I'll assume that means yes. As you can see, by helping us you helped yourself. Perhaps we can work together in the future.
Male_64.nm26acrepd08028_.mp3: Contaminated? That's... That's much worse than I would ever have thought possible. It might have been better to lose the entire facility rather than damage the kolto supply.
Male_64.nm26acrepd08030_.mp3: This must remain entirely secret. We cannot allow anyone to find out that we damaged the kolto production or we would be banned permanently from the planet.
Male_64.nm26acrepd08032_.mp3: We can only hope that the damage that was caused will go away in time.
Male_64.nm26acrepd08035_.mp3: Please, continue your investigations and find out what happened to our facility.

Male_65.nm24aapgen07002_.mp3: [Failure] What are you talking about? I don't want any such thing! Leave me alone!
Male_65.nm24aapgen07004_.mp3: Are you threatening me? You're asking for a fight with all of us. I don't need more things trying to kill me down here.
Male_65.nm24aapgen07006_.mp3: Good. I don't need the trouble.
Male_65.nm24aapgen07019_.mp3: [Success] Maybe you're right... maybe I should make a break for it.
Male_65.nm24aapgen07021_.mp3: [Failure] Oh no, I'm not getting myself killed! I'm not!
Male_65.nm24aapgen07026_.mp3: [Failure] What? No! Get lost! You'll get me killed!

Male_66.nm28aamerc03000_.mp3: How... how did you get in? Did they send another submersible? Quick, we have to get out of here, we have to get away!
Male_66.nm28aamerc03004_.mp3: No! No! We have no time, we have to leave now! I managed to close the door after they killed everyone else, but I don't know how long it will hold.
Male_66.nm28aamerc03006_.mp3: We have to! We have to leave! The Selkath, they went crazy! They started killing anything that moved. Someone must have triggered the defense systems too, 'cause all the droids activated as well.
Male_66.nm28aamerc03012_.mp3: The Selkath, they went crazy! They started killing anything that moved. Someone must have triggered the defense systems too, 'cause all the droids activated as well.
Male_66.nm28aamerc03016_.mp3: And the Selkath came out... screaming and croaking their fishy little war-cries.
Male_66.nm28aamerc03019_.mp3: They swarmed out and over us. There was no way we could stop them.
Male_66.nm28aamerc03022_.mp3: They're dead! All dead! They swarmed out and over us. There was no way we could stop them.
Male_66.nm28aamerc03028_.mp3: No! I locked the door so that the Selkath won't get in. If you open it, we're all done for!
Male_66.nm28aamerc03030_.mp3: If you go in there, you're dead! You're all dead!
Male_66.nm28aamerc03032_.mp3: If you want to die, then go! You won't hear me mourning for you! I'll stay here and be safe until some sort of REAL rescue comes!
Male_66.nm28aamerc03039_.mp3: Back to the surface. Yes... NO!! There's something out there... it got the other submersible already.
Male_66.nm28aamerc03053_.mp3: We can't leave until you do something. Blow up the entire station maybe. That might distract whatever it is long enough for us to escape to the surface.
Male_66.nm28aamerc03055_.mp3: But all the machinery and stuff is in the southern half, and that's been flooded! There might still be environmental suits around but... but... the Selkath might have laid their eggs in them!
Male_66.nm28aamerc03059_.mp3: That doesn't mean its not still out there! Watching.. waiting...
Male_66.nm28aamerc03061_.mp3: What!? No! You're one of them! You'll never get me!
Male_66.nm28aamerc03066_.mp3: No!!! Whatever's out there will eat me too! Eat all of us!
Male_66.nm28aamerc03076_.mp3: When the Republic sends a real team down, they'll save me! They'll kill the monster and then we'll all leave safely!

Male_68.nm33aaczer07000_.mp3: Greetings. If you haven't heard, there's some trouble over at the academy. A power struggle, most likely, but news is sketchy. So... anything Czerka can do for you?
Male_68.nm33aaczer07001_.mp3: Greetings. You've heard of that awful business on Edean, yes? Our corporate outpost there has been destroyed by the Wookiee savages.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07002_.mp3: This could put back the use of Wookiee labor considerably. We may even have to abandon the planet completely.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07004_.mp3: I see you got one of your own early. May as well, while you can. Now then... was there something I could do for you?
Male_68.nm33aaczer07006_.mp3: Well, certainly. Now they are doomed to remain savages forever... or possibly become extinct. Very sad. Now then... was there something you needed?
Male_68.nm33aaczer07007_.mp3: Ah, well. What can you do? Sorry... was there something you needed?
Male_68.nm33aaczer07008_.mp3: If you've come for any medical supplies, I have to warn you that the kolto source on Manaan has been poisoned.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07009_.mp3: It's a tragedy, considering the war and all... casualties are going to go through the roof. Czerka is pulling all its kolto out of storage as we speak.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07010_.mp3: Hmm. Aren't you the human who won the swoop race on Manaan? Congradulations and well done! It was most exciting to watch!
Male_68.nm33aaczer07011_.mp3: It is an honor to have you in our offices. How may Czerka serve you?
Male_68.nm33aaczer07012_.mp3: Tsk. I suppose you've heard about the destruction of Taris, yes? Awful business, that. Czerka lost a fortune there, not that the Sith care.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07013_.mp3: I understand you're receiving training at the monastery, citizen. Congratulations!
Male_68.nm33aaczer07014_.mp3: Greetings again, citizen. Something you need?
Male_68.nm33aaczer07015_.mp3: Greetings and welcome to Czerka Corporation.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07017_.mp3: We do some mining here and are responsible for local shipping and support of the Sith on Korriban.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07018_.mp3: Our starport is mostly just freighters and such, but we do get many travelers that come here to learn from the Sith.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07019_.mp3: I must say... Czerka is in need of droids right now. That's a mighty fine-looking one you have there...
Male_68.nm33aaczer07021_.mp3: Errr... yes, of course, no offense meant. Heh. Touchy, isn't it?
Male_68.nm33aaczer07022_.mp3: I must say... Czerka is in need of droids right now. That's a mighty fine-looking one you have there...
Male_68.nm33aaczer07024_.mp3: This office is actually our administrative headquarters for this region. Rather inauspicious, isn't it? We offer good prices here to those traders that keep the colony supplied.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07025_.mp3: If you're in need of anything, this is the place to come.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07027_.mp3: You certainly can. Allow me to punch up our stock.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07029_.mp3: Well why not? This is Sith space now, and the company has to survive regardless of who is in charge. The Republic, the Sith, eh... the economy has to keep going.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07031_.mp3: I'm not sure what your pet is muttering, but keep a restraining collar on it. It won't last long if it gets loose. Now, was there something else?
Male_68.nm33aaczer07036_.mp3: There truly isn't much to tell, citizen. Dreshdae was established by the Sith, and we arrived to take advantage of some of the planet's mineral wealth.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07037_.mp3: The only thing that's really unusual about Dreshdae, I suppose, is that the Sith built their academy on the east side of the colony. You don't find those just anywhere.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07039_.mp3: A Star Map? We sell navigational components, if that's what you mean.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07041_.mp3: Well... the Sith have some old ruins that interest them up on the surface of the planet. If this map of yours is there, however, they've said nothing about it.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07043_.mp3: Not much. The Sith are a rather secretive lot, and they don't allow many into the academy. I hear they claim that Korriban was inhabited long ago by other Sith.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07045_.mp3: But no one truly knows if that's true. The planet is certainly uninhabited outside of Dreshdae and always has been.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07047_.mp3: Only prospective students. We get many who come here each year, hoping to get picked. Many are simply considered too weak, I'm afraid.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07048_.mp3: I understand there is one main person amongst the Sith who decides which students are worthy... Yuthura Ban, I believe her name is.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07050_.mp3: Other than in the academy itself, I'm sorry, I don't know.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07052_.mp3: Czerka sends freighters to the surface every now and again to ferry artifacts to the Core.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07053_.mp3: The men are not allowed out of their ships, however, as only Sith are allowed on the surface. Beyond that I really can't say.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07055_.mp3: [Success] Well... all I know is that they call the site the Valley of the Dark Lords. Apparently, there are Sith Lords of old buried in tombs there.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07056_.mp3: [Failure] Does it matter? I don't intend to speak of it, regardless.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07058_.mp3: [Success] They... they call the site the Valley of the Dark Lords. Ancient Sith are buried in tombs there, along with many artifacts of old... some of great power, apparently.
Male_68.nm33aaczer07059_.mp3: I don't know anything else. Neither will you, I'm sure... only the Sith students are allowed access to the site.

Male_69.nm02adciti05000_.mp3: What... what do you want? I'm not doing anything wrong. I'm just standing here... please, don't take me in for questioning!
Male_69.nm02adciti05001_.mp3: Hey - didn't you just win the big swoop bike race in the Lower City? Yeah, it was you, I'm sure! That race was amazing!
Male_69.nm02adciti05003_.mp3: Too bad Brejik wouldn't pay up on his wager! Oh well - he got what was coming to him.
Male_69.nm02adciti05005_.mp3: I hear there's a gang war between the Hidden Beks and the Black Vulkars raging in the lower city.
Male_69.nm02adciti05007_.mp3: I hear the crime lord Davik has a ship that can break through the Sith blockade.
Male_69.nm02adciti05009_.mp3: Have you got your tickets for Bendak Starkiller's return to the duel ring? I hear it's going to be an illegal death match!
Male_69.nm02adciti05011_.mp3: Check this out... we got a real live celebrity here. The Mysterious Stranger mixing with the common folk!
Male_69.nm02adciti05013_.mp3: I lost a bundle betting against you, Stranger. Next time I'll know better.
Male_69.nm02adciti05015_.mp3: That new mercenary working for Davik - I heard he's a Mandalorian! I wonder if he fought in the Mandalore Wars?
Male_69.nm03abciti05000_.mp3: I'm not looking for any trouble with the Sith. Please, just let me be.
Male_69.nm03abciti05002_.mp3: Hey - didn't you just win the big swoop bike race in? Yeah, it was you, I'm sure! Best race I ever saw!
Male_69.nm03abciti05004_.mp3: I can't believe Brejik tried to back out of his wager! He deserved what happened to him!
Male_69.nm03abciti05006_.mp3: I can't wait for the big swoop race! I hear the Vulkars have a new engine that's going to break all the records!
Male_69.nm03abciti05008_.mp3: This gang war is getting out of hand! The Vulkars aren't just attacking the Hidden Beks anymore - they go after everyone!
Male_69.nm03abciti05010_.mp3: I saw Davik's new starship at the spaceport before the quarantine. They say it's the fastest ship on Taris! He calls it the Ebon Hawk.
Male_69.nm03abciti05012_.mp3: Have you got your tickets for Bendak Starkiller's return to the duel ring? I hear it's going to be an illegal death match!
Male_69.nm03abciti05014_.mp3: Did you hear the news? Gadon Thek is dead! I wonder what's going to happen to the Hidden Beks now?
Male_69.nm03abciti05016_.mp3: I heard Davik's hired a Mandalorian mercenary to work for him. I didn't know there were any of them left after the Mandalore wars.

Male_70.nm02aaman006000_.mp3: Please, don't take me in for questioning... I don't know anything! I swear!
Male_70.nm02aaman006001_.mp3: Don't - don't hurt my family! Just take what you want and get out.
Male_70.nm02aaman006003_.mp3: I've got a ton of things to do today. I can't talk to you.
Male_70.nm02aaman006005_.mp3: I heard the gangs have overrun the Lower City. Why don't the Sith go down there and restore order?
Male_70.nm02aaman006007_.mp3: I heard the Sith are sending salvage teams down into the Undercity to recover those Republic escape pods.

Male_71.nm24aapgen07030_.mp3: They generate a sonic barrier that allows us to stay in this wonderful location. It keeps the big predators away.
Male_71.nm24aapgen07032_.mp3: I don't know how it works, really. I just know that if they go down, the camp would be overrun.
Male_71.nm24aapgen07044_.mp3: That sounds like a fair deal to me. Here, use this code to access the one I'm guarding.
Male_71.nm24aapgen07051_.mp3: Besides, enough things down here want to kill me. I don't need to add you to the list.
Male_71.nm24aapgen07059_.mp3: Okay, okay, there's no need to get like that. The Commander just prefers everyone to go through him first.

Male_72.nm33aashaa19023_.mp3: It's not what they did so much as what they didn't do... which is prove themselves worthy. I'm exhausted from dealing with their mewlings... so please decide for me, will you?
Male_72.nm33aashaa19029_.mp3: Please! Tell him to let us go, I beg you!!
Male_72.nm33aasith20000_.mp3: What's this? Looks like we found ourselves a bit of sport, my friends.
Male_72.nm33aasith20003_.mp3: Me too. So how about it, chump? Ready to die? I'm eager to blow off some steam after those tests.
Male_72.nm33aasith20005_.mp3: But we do, isn't it obvious?
Male_72.nm33aasith20009_.mp3: [Failure] What do you say, guys? Do we want a drink or not?
Male_72.nm33aasith20020_.mp3: [Success] Yeah... I don't want to fight you.
Male_72.nm33aasith20029_.mp3: You've picked the wrong place to say that. We'll score big points for bringing in your body, I'm sure!
Male_72.nm33aasith20034_.mp3: [Failure] Okay, I've heard just about enough out of you. Get them!
Male_72.nm33aasith20038_.mp3: You know it. Let's enjoy this!

Male_73.nm03aaciti09000_.mp3: I'm not looking for any trouble with the Sith. Please, just let me be.
Male_73.nm03aaciti09002_.mp3: Hey - didn't you just win the big swoop bike race in? Yeah, it was you, I'm sure! Best race I ever saw!
Male_73.nm03aaciti09004_.mp3: I can't believe Brejik tried to back out of his wager! He deserved what happened to him!
Male_73.nm03aaciti09006_.mp3: I can't wait for the big swoop race! I hear the Vulkars have a new engine that's going to break all the records!
Male_73.nm03aaciti09008_.mp3: This gang war is getting out of hand! The Vulkars aren't just attacking the Hidden Beks anymore - they go after everyone!
Male_73.nm03aaciti09010_.mp3: I saw Davik's new starship at the spaceport before the quarantine. They say it's the fastest ship on Taris! He calls it the Ebon Hawk.
Male_73.nm03aaciti09012_.mp3: Have you got your tickets for Bendak Starkiller's return to the duel ring? I hear it's going to be an illegal death match!
Male_73.nm03aaciti09014_.mp3: Did you hear the news? Gadon Thek is dead! I wonder what's going to happen to the Hidden Beks now?
Male_73.nm03aaciti09016_.mp3: I heard Davik's hired a Mandalorian mercenary to work for him. I didn't know there were any of them left after the Mandalore wars.
Male_73.nm03aaciti10000_.mp3: What... what do you want? I'm not doing anything wrong. I'm just standing here... please, don't take me in for questioning!
Male_73.nm03aaciti10002_.mp3: Did you hear what happened at the swoop race? They say Brejik didn't pay up his wager, and a brawl broke out!
Male_73.nm03aaciti10004_.mp3: They say Brejik was killed in the fight! I wonder what's going to happen to the Black Vulkars now.
Male_73.nm03aaciti10006_.mp3: Swoop season is almost here. I hope I do better than last season - I lost a bundle betting on all the longshots!
Male_73.nm03aaciti10008_.mp3: None of the Beks or Vulkars come into the cantina anymore. I guess that's one good thing about the gang war - it's not so crowded in here.
Male_73.nm03aaciti10010_.mp3: This quarantine is making my life miserable! I bet Davik isn't stuck here like the rest of us - everyone says he's got a ship so fast the Sith can't catch him!
Male_73.nm03aaciti10012_.mp3: I don't mind this place, but I wish it wasn't so close to the bounty office. Those guys are hired killers - I don't like it when they come in here for a drink.
Male_73.nm03aeciti09000_.mp3: Hey - didn't you just win the big swoop bike race in? Yeah, it was you, I'm sure! Best race I ever saw!
Male_73.nm03aeciti09002_.mp3: I can't believe Brejik tried to back out of his wager! He deserved what happened to him!
Male_73.nm03aeciti09004_.mp3: I can't wait for the big swoop race! I hear the Vulkars have a new engine that's going to break all the records!
Male_73.nm03aeciti09006_.mp3: This gang war is getting out of hand! The Vulkars aren't just attacking the Hidden Beks anymore - they go after everyone!
Male_73.nm03aeciti09008_.mp3: I saw Davik's new starship at the spaceport before the quarantine. They say it's the fastest ship on Taris! He calls it the Ebon Hawk.
Male_73.nm03aeciti09010_.mp3: Have you got your tickets for Bendak Starkiller's return to the duel ring? I hear it's going to be an illegal death match!
Male_73.nm03aeciti09012_.mp3: Did you hear the news? Gadon Thek is dead! I wonder what's going to happen to the Hidden Beks now?
Male_73.nm03aeciti09014_.mp3: I heard Davik's hired a Mandalorian mercenary to work for him. I didn't know there were any of them left after the Mandalore wars.

Male_74.nm17ae04sw08000_.mp3: The track here isn't the greatest, but we have to practice somewhere.
Male_74.nm17ae04sw08001_.mp3: I'm not racing until my parts come in. Who knows when that will be?
Male_74.nm17ae04sw08002_.mp3: I'm not good enough to be ranked yet. More trial runs, I guess.
Male_74.nm17ae04sw08003_.mp3: I was due to race on Taris, but I blew a qualifying race. Guess I'm lucky, huh?
Male_74.nm17ae04sw08004_.mp3: You didn't have much competition here. The circuit is hurting after the loss of Taris.
Male_74.nm17ae04sw08005_.mp3: You're a pro, right? You ever race on Taris? Wish I had the chance before it blew.
Male_74.nm17ae04sw08006_.mp3: Now that you've proven how good you are, stay away from Motta. Just ask around, you'll see why.
Male_74.nm17ae04sw08007_.mp3: I, wrecked my bike in a race a few days ago. Not that I could beat your times anyway.
Male_74.nm17ae04sw08008_.mp3: Oh, you're gonna like it here. Crowd is friendly, even if it doesn't really compare to racing for the big circuit.
Male_74.nm17ae04sw08009_.mp3: Odd to see new racers like you here. This track was never too popular with the pros. Too far out of the way.
Male_74.nm17ae04sw08010_.mp3: Motta thinks pros will start coming here now that Taris is gone. I think the Hutt is dreaming.
Male_74.nm17ae04sw08011_.mp3: We don't see a lot of new racers. Maybe you'll give Nico a run for his money.

Male_75.nm33aamech12000_.mp3: Still around the starport, I see. Heading off, soon?
Male_75.nm33aamech12002_.mp3: Nice to see the Hawk's still in one piece. Beauty of a ship, that.
Male_75.nm33aamech12004_.mp3: Oh, nobody special. I just do the routine maintenance work for the ships that come in. I used to see the Hawk here all the time.
Male_75.nm33aamech12006_.mp3: Oh, I've seen this little ship before plenty of times. Used to make runs for the Exchange, didn't it? Korriban's nice and remote, the kind of place the Exchange likes.
Male_75.nm33aamech12008_.mp3: You don't need to worry about me saying anything. I don't give a whit what you do with your ship. Smuggling's what the Hawk was made for, though.
Male_75.nm33aamech12012_.mp3: Not much. It's a pretty barren planet, to tell the truth. Not of much interest to anyone. Unless you're a Sith, I guess... they seem to think this place is something special.
Male_75.nm33aamech12014_.mp3: Probably all them ruins they found on the surface. That's the reason they built their academy here, I guess, to dig all them ruins up.
Male_75.nm33aamech12016_.mp3: There's people that come here from all over Sith space to try and join the academy. Most of them die, I hear. Pretty gruesome business, that.
Male_75.nm33aamech12018_.mp3: You don't. Not unless you're a Sith in the academy. They're the only ones allowed on the surface. They pay Czerka to ship things in and out, I guess, but that's all closely monitored.
Male_75.nm33aamech12020_.mp3: I don't know. There's all kinds of hopefuls in the colony trying to get in... why don't you ask one of them?
Male_75.nm33aamech12022_.mp3: A Star Map? You mean like a navigation chart?
Male_75.nm33aamech12024_.mp3: If them Sith found a Star Map in those ruins, nobody's ever mentioned it.
Male_75.nm33aamech12026_.mp3: There's a whole bunch of old Sith ruins up on the surface of the planet. That's why they put one of their academies here, to dig them all up.

Male_76.nm17aa12co06000_.mp3: Sand People wiped out my moisture farm and what does Czerka do? Nothing.
Male_76.nm17aa12co06001_.mp3: I tried to get work in the mines, but Czerka Corporation is scaling back. Ah, I can't say that I blame them.
Male_76.nm17aa12co06002_.mp3: I don't know who founded Anchorhead the first time, but I know why they left.
Male_76.nm17aa12co06003_.mp3: If you were looking for your fortune, you picked the wrong planet.
Male_76.nm17aa12co06004_.mp3: Those Jawas, I don't understand a thing they say.
Male_76.nm17aa12co06005_.mp3: I saw a krayt dragon once. Well, not up close. I'm pretty sure that's what it was.
Male_76.nm17aa12co06006_.mp3: If the Republic cared at all they would laser the desert from orbit. Let's see the Sand People hide on a sheet of glass.
Male_76.nm17aa12co06007_.mp3: Nothing smells worse than a herd of wild banthas. Nothing.
Male_76.nm17aa12co06008_.mp3: I watched some good races at the swoop track last week. You have to thank Motta for giving us something to do.
Male_76.nm17aa12co06009_.mp3: Womp rats are not good eating. Trust me.
Male_76.nm17aa12co06010_.mp3: Czerka Corporation will unload this outpost on someone. Maybe not for a few years, but they can wait.
Male_76.nm17aa12co06011_.mp3: There's not enough jobs here for permanent citizens, let alone you spacer drop-ins.

Male_77.nm22aaczer02000_.mp3: Talk to the captain, not me.
Male_77.nm22aaczer02001_.mp3: I just carry a blaster. The captain does the talking.
Male_77.nm22aaczer02002_.mp3: I'm not paid to talk. Take it to the captain or the stiffs in the office.
Male_77.nm22aaczer02003_.mp3: Don't bother me. You're on your own here.

Male_78.nm04aaoutm17003_.mp3: They say anyone bitten by a rakghoul will become a rakghoul themselves. It can't be true, can it? It's too horrible!
Male_78.nm04aaoutm18000_.mp3: A horrible fate for poor Hendar... I warned him not to leave the safety of the village.
Male_78.nm04aaoutm18001_.mp3: But I couldn't open the gate... not while the rakghouls were so close. I had to protect the village.
Male_78.nm04aaoutm18002_.mp3: But enough of this grim talk... we must focus on the positive if we are to survive down here. How can I help you, up-worlder?
Male_78.nm04aaoutm18003_.mp3: Thank you for saving Hendar. You are braver than I, up-worlder. Maybe we Outcasts have lived too long in selfish fear.
Male_78.nm04aaoutm18004_.mp3: Perhaps we can learn a lesson from your brave actions. Hmph. But enough of my ramblings... is there something you need, up-worlder?
Male_78.nm04aaoutm18005_.mp3: You're not from the village. In fact, you look like you're from the up-world!
Male_78.nm04aaoutm18006_.mp3: I don't know why you'd come down here to our village, but I guess I can let you in. There don't seem to be any rakghouls nearby.
Male_78.nm04aaoutm18007_.mp3: Hurry, up-worlder. I can only leave the gate open for a few seconds. I can't risk letting the rakghouls in!
Male_78.nm04aaoutm18008_.mp3: I can't open the gate... not while the rakghouls are so near.
Male_78.nm04aaoutm18010_.mp3: You would risk your life for a stranger? You are brave... or foolish.
Male_78.nm04aaoutm18011_.mp3: I will open the gate for you, up-worlder, but you've got to be quick. In a few seconds I must close and lock it again for the safety of the village.
Male_78.nm04aaoutm18013_.mp3: *Sigh* A horrible fate for poor Hendar. I warned him not to leave the safety of the village.
Male_78.nm04aaoutm18015_.mp3: The gate is open. If you're going through you have to hurry, up-worlder, before I have to close it again.
Male_78.nm04aaoutm18016_.mp3: Yes, up-worlder? Is there something you need?
Male_78.nm04aaoutm18019_.mp3: I am Trewin, from the Outcast village. It's my job to guard the gates and see they are locked to protect us from the rakghouls.
Male_78.nm04aaoutm18021_.mp3: Heh. I just guard the gates. Gendar is the leader of the village, up-worlder. You should speak to him if you have any questions.
Male_78.nm04aaoutw22014_.mp3: I can't open the gate... not while the rakghouls are so near.
Male_78.nm04aaoutw22016_.mp3: You would risk your life for a stranger? Heh. You are brave, up-worlder.
Male_78.nm04aaoutw22018_.mp3: I will open the gate for you, but you've got be quick. In a few seconds I must close and lock it again.
Male_78.nm04aaoutw22021_.mp3: I'm sorry, Hester - there's nothing we can do. It's too late for Hendar now.
Male_78.nm04aaoutw22032_.mp3: He'll never make it. He's doomed. Argh! I told him he was a fool to leave the village.
Male_78.nm04aaoutw22038_.mp3: Ugh... I... I can't... the rakghouls are too close!
Male_78.nm04aaoutw22042_.mp3: And if I open the gate they will kill us all!

Male_79.nm03aehold13000_.mp3: Huh? What? Oh... sorry. I didn't see you there. My attention was kind of focused on the Twi'lek dancers. Look at them waggle those head-tails!
Male_79.nm03aehold13004_.mp3: Don't worry, honey - alien girls aren't really my thing. I'm much more interested in an attractive female of my own species.
Male_79.nm03aehold13006_.mp3: My name's Holdan, baby. Maybe you've heard of me... I work for Davik Kang, you know.
Male_79.nm03aehold13008_.mp3: I don't normally go for these alien girls, but I've had some bad experiences with my own species lately. Maybe it's time for a change, you know what I mean?
Male_79.nm03aehold13010_.mp3: You're here about that? I guess Zax must have mentioned me to you at the bounty office. Fair enough - I don't care who takes her out, just so long as the job gets done.
Male_79.nm03aehold13012_.mp3: I can't let her get away with what she did - that wench tried to cut me with her vibroblade!
Male_79.nm03aehold13014_.mp3: Because she's crazy! She started screaming that I was making advances, and the next thing I know she's coming at me with a knife.
Male_79.nm03aehold13020_.mp3: I admit I was drunk. Maybe I got a little fresh. But it was no big deal. She didn't have to cut me!
Male_79.nm03aehold13022_.mp3: Hey - you weren't there. She totally over-reacted!
Male_79.nm03aehold13024_.mp3: Just kill Dia and then go talk to Zax. I gave him the credits for safekeeping. He'll pay you off when the deed is done.
Male_79.nm03aehold13026_.mp3: My name's Holdan. Maybe you've heard of me - I work for Davik Kang.
Male_79.nm03aehold13028_.mp3: I don't want to waste my time answering a bunch of questions... I'm here to have a few drinks, watch the dancing girls and enjoy myself.
Male_79.nm03aehold13030_.mp3: I've got to be mentally ready. Davik's got an assignment for me off planet as soon as the quarantine ends.
Male_79.nm03aehold13032_.mp3: I'm one of his top couriers. Davik's always sending me off planet to deliver and bring back packages. He knows he can trust me to follow my orders to the letter.
Male_79.nm03aehold13034_.mp3: Plus, I used to be an intergalactic customs agent so I know all the tricks they use to catch smugglers. That gives me the edge I need on my courier runs.
Male_79.nm03aehold13036_.mp3: It's not like it's some big secret. It's kind of hard for Davik to keep a low profile when he belongs to a big intergalactic crime syndicate like the Exchange.
Male_79.nm03aehold13038_.mp3: Davik's ship is the fastet one in the entire quadrant, but even the Ebon Hawk can't get off Taris until the quarantine is lifted. The Sith fleet has the planet surrounded.
Male_79.nm03aehold13040_.mp3: Any ship leaving orbit without the proper access codes will be disintegrated by the Sith auto-targeting laser cannons - and those codes are locked safely away in the military base.
Male_79.nm03aehold13042_.mp3: Davik's pretty upset about it. His smuggling operation isn't making any money, but even with his underworld connections he can't get his hands on those codes.
Male_79.nm03aehold13044_.mp3: I don't like the tone of your voice. I work for Davik Kang - I'm used to people treating me with respect!
Male_79.nm03aehold13046_.mp3: I don't have to take this abuse from you! I came here to relax. Shove off and find someone else to bother - I want to watch the dancing girls.
Male_79.nm03aehold13049_.mp3: Hate to see a pretty lady leaving, but you ain't the only girl in this place. I guess I'll go back to enjoying the dancers.
Male_79.nm03aehold13051_.mp3: Fine by me. That means I get to go back to enjoying the dancing girls.
Male_79.nm03aehold13053_.mp3: What do you want now? This whole thing with Dia is over, so we don't have anything to discuss.
Male_79.nm03aehold13054_.mp3: This better be important - I'm trying to watch the dancing girls. You got some news about Dia or something?
Male_79.nm03aehold13056_.mp3: What do you mean what happened? She took her vibroblade and came after me like she was harvesting a bantha pelt!
Male_79.nm03aehold13058_.mp3: Hey, it's like I told you before - you come up with 200 credits and I'll remove the bounty. Otherwise she's got to pay the price.
Male_79.nm03aehold13059_.mp3: What? I can't do that! Think how it would look. I work for Davik, I've got a certain reputation to uphold. I can't let her get away with this. There has to be payback!
Male_79.nm03aehold13061_.mp3: Although I do feel a little guilty about all this. Dia's a good looking gal - it'd be a shame to kill her. Tell you what - I'll take 200 credits in exchange for lifting the bounty.
Male_79.nm03aehold13063_.mp3: Don't worry - I'll stick to my end of the bargain. I'll go tell Zax right now that the bounty is off the table.
Male_79.nm03aehold13066_.mp3: [Success] Well... I guess you might be right. Besides, I've noticed some of the girls around here are giving me the cold shoulder since all this started. Okay, you win; Dia can live.
Male_79.nm03aehold13068_.mp3: [Failure] If I let her get away with it I'll look even worse! She's got to pay - either with her life, or 200 credits to buy my forgiveness.
Male_79.nm03aehold13072_.mp3: [Success] Well... maybe it's time I forgave her. I am partly to blame for what she did, I suppose. Okay, you win; Dia can live.
Male_79.nm03aehold13074_.mp3: [Failure] If I let her get away with it I'll look even worse! She's got to pay - either with her life, or 200 credits to buy my forgiveness.
Male_79.nm03aehold13076_.mp3: You're threatening me? I work for Davik Kang! If you kill me you'll be signing your own death warrant. Do us both a favor and don't waste my time with stupid threats!
Male_79.nm03aehold13078_.mp3: You can do that if you want, but I doubt she's got 200 credits. That's a lot, and she's just a working girl. But that's the breaks, right?
Male_79.nm03aehold13081_.mp3: Really? Huh... I guess that's it then. A real shame it had to come to this. She was a good looking gal despite her temper. Ah, well. Plenty more ladies out there for me.
Male_79.nm03aehold13083_.mp3: If you want to collect the bounty, go talk to Zax. I gave him the credits for safe keeping. As far as I'm concerned my part in this is over.
Male_79.nm03aehold13085_.mp3: Hey, baby - back again, I see. I guess the old Holdan charm is still working: the ladies just can't leave me alone!
Male_79.nm03aehold13086_.mp3: You again? This must be the official let's all bother Holdan day. Can't you see I'm trying to watch the dancing girls?

Male_80.nm26acfiri02000_.mp3: You with the Selkath? You here to see me about the murder too?
Male_80.nm26acfiri02002_.mp3: I told the damn fish everything I knew, what more do you all want from me?
Male_80.nm26acfiri02004_.mp3: Sunry I only heard of once or twice in passing. Some sort of old-time war hero against the Sith. Seen him around in the hotel too. Going to Elassa's room always of course.
Male_80.nm26acfiri02006_.mp3: Kept the rest of the building up half the night with their damn antics usually!
Male_80.nm26acfiri02008_.mp3: I'm not saying anything like that. What they did in that room, in private, is their business.
Male_80.nm26acfiri02010_.mp3: And there isn't any rule against Sith and Republics seeing each other for personal reasons. Although if you think her Sith Master didn't know, heh, you must be fooling yourself.
Male_80.nm26acfiri02012_.mp3: Uh... well Elassa was a Sith... so of course she'd have to have someone above her... yeah. I didn't see anything!
Male_80.nm26acfiri02014_.mp3: [Success] Well... one time... I saw Elassa coming in wearing this big cloak. I was on my way to my room, and she normally wears stuff like that so I didn't pay her too much attention.
Male_80.nm26acfiri02016_.mp3: But this time I accidentally brushed up against her - accidentally of course! - and her cloak fell open...
Male_80.nm26acfiri02018_.mp3: Now I don't have no qualms about the Sith! I leave them alone and they leave me alone. And seeing as how Elassa had a Sith lightsaber under her cloak, I'm not going to poke that hornet's nest.
Male_80.nm26acfiri02020_.mp3: Seems so... But I'm not getting myself in any further with the Sith. I know how ruthless they are.
Male_80.nm26acfiri02023_.mp3: I don't know what it means to you, but to me it kind of screams 'Dark Jedi'. And I'm not getting myself in any further with the Sith. I know how ruthless they are.
Male_80.nm26acfiri02025_.mp3: Now that's all I'm going to tell you. I'll testify it to the court, but you aren't going to get anything else out of me.
Male_80.nm26acfiri02028_.mp3: I know, I know, but you're a Jedi. Elassa never claimed to be.
Male_80.nm26acfiri02030_.mp3: [Failure] I didn't see anything and there's no way you can make me say otherwise! Now quit asking!
Male_80.nm26acfiri02032_.mp3: [Success] Since you put it that way...
Male_80.nm26acfiri02034_.mp3: [Failure] 100 credits isn't enough for the kind of trouble I'd be having if I told you. Sorry, you're gonna have to look somewhere else.
Male_80.nm26acfiri02036_.mp3: [Success] You know, I think I could trust you. Heck, I don't know why I shouldn't tell you.
Male_80.nm26acfiri02041_.mp3: Yes. She rented a room every week or so. Coincidentally it was right about the same time that Sunry would show up. They didn't seem all that discreet either.
Male_80.nm26acfiri02043_.mp3: I was in my room, minding my own business with the lastest copy of Pazaak Weekly - checking out the listings for the big tournament that's gonna be held here soon - when I heard a blaster shot.
Male_80.nm26acfiri02045_.mp3: Being still alive - and therefore smart enough not to stick my head out immediately - I didn't go out right away. I looked out after a minute and saw Gluupor in the hall by Elassa's room, and Sunry running like the wind.
Male_80.nm26acfiri02047_.mp3: You can't tell me that someone who was running like that - and he was pretty fast for a cripple! - isn't guilty.
Male_80.nm26acfiri02050_.mp3: Yes, well I'll be right here... Not like they're letting me go anywhere else...
Male_80.nm26acfiri02052_.mp3: You again... didn't I tell you people everything I knew? So why do you keep coming back to me?

Male_81.nm02aegana14014_.mp3: Here are your drinks, Miss Lavin. I apologize for the delay.
Male_81.nm02aemale20000_.mp3: Hey - I saw you win the big swoop race! Too bad Brejik had to get greedy and ruin everything!
Male_81.nm02aemale20002_.mp3: When that fight broke out I just ran for my life. I never even got a chance to cash in my betting slips!
Male_81.nm02aemale20004_.mp3: The Lower City is nothing but a slum! If the Sith want to win us Tarisians over they should clean the gangs out of there!
Male_81.nm02aemale20006_.mp3: Have you heard the reports? They're saying someone broke into the military compound! Oho! The Sith aren't going to like that.
Male_81.nm02aemale20008_.mp3: You like Pazaak? I used to watch it all the time when Gelrood was playing here. He had some great matches against Niklos... until they banned him for cheating.
Male_81.nm02aemale20010_.mp3: Have you gone into the music room in the back? Yeah, I don't care much for the band, but those dancing Twi'leks are something else, I'm telling you now!
Male_81.nm02aemale20012_.mp3: Hey, I know you - you're the Mysterious Stranger! I saw you beat Bendak in the dueling ring! Ha! I lost a bundle betting against you!
Male_81.nm02aemale20014_.mp3: I learned my lesson - next time I'll wager my credits on you my friend. If there is a next time. I doubt anyone will be stupid enough to step into the ring with you now. Heh heh heh.
Male_81.nm02aemale20016_.mp3: Hey! You heard the latest rumor? Bendak Starkiller is coming out of retirement for one last illegal death match! Oohoo! I'm not missing this!
Male_81.nm02aemale20018_.mp3: I heard the Sith sent a bunch of patrols into the Undercity. Probably want to loot the crash sites of those Republic escape pods that went down there.
Male_81.nm02aemale21000_.mp3: Did you hear about the big fight at the swoop races? I wasn't there, but someone told me Brejik flipped out on the podium and wouldn't pay up!
Male_81.nm02aemale21002_.mp3: All hell broke loose, and from what I hear Brejik was killed. Heh. Serves him right for welching on his bets!
Male_81.nm02aemale21004_.mp3: Ah. There's too many people in this cantina since they added the music room at the back! I come here to relax, not to fight with crowds.
Male_81.nm02aemale21006_.mp3: People are saying someone broke into the military base. Could mean trouble for us all if the Sith decide a Tarisian citizen was involved.
Male_81.nm02aemale21008_.mp3: I'm surprised the Sith haven't done anything to try and bring in Davik. After all, everyone knows he's the crime lord who runs this planet.
Male_81.nm02aemale21010_.mp3: The Sith are hunting for any Republic soldiers who escaped the battle overhead. They even sent a patrol into the Undercity to look for survivors!
Male_81.nm02aemale21012_.mp3: You... you're the one who killed Bendak Starkiller, aren't you? What a match - best duel I ever saw! You know, you might want to lay low for a while.
Male_81.nm02aemale21014_.mp3: Death matches are illegal; the Sith could arrest you if they ever found out about it. Of course, I think I saw several of the Sith officers at the match, so maybe they don't care.
Male_81.nm02aemale21016_.mp3: Bendak Starkiller is coming out of retirement! Everyone's talking about it! Some spacer agreed to fight him in an illegal death match! I wonder how I can get a ticket?
Male_81.nm02aemale21018_.mp3: Look at Niklos sitting over there with his Pazaak deck. I used to play, you know. But I wasn't very good. I finally sold my deck and gave it up.

Male_82.nm33aamurd13000_.mp3: Ha ha! Once you become a Sith, you can do anything! You can feel the power coursing through you! None of you fools can compare to me!!
Male_82.nm33aamurd13004_.mp3: Pleased?! You're jealous! You're jealous of my power! You think you deserve this medallion, don't you? Well, let's just see!!
Male_82.nm33aamurd13006_.mp3: Ha ha ha! See?! I have the power to do anything!
Male_82.nm33aamurd13010_.mp3: Sniveling fool! Like you would ever belong beside me in the academy! I'd rather kill you now and save us the trouble!
Male_82.nm33aamurd13012_.mp3: What's this? It seems I have an audience. Look, Jedi... just keep walking, unless you want some of the same.
Male_82.nm33aamurd13013_.mp3: What's this? It seems I have an audience. Look, human... just keep walking, unless you want some of the same.
Male_82.nm33aamurd13015_.mp3: You can't stop me! You first, human, and then she dies!!
Male_82.nm33aamurd13018_.mp3: I am a Sith, now! My power is supreme! Prepare to die, ha ha!!
Male_82.nm33aamurd13021_.mp3: Yeah? Well I just decided that Jedi make much better sport than anyone else here. Oh, this should be entertaining.
Male_82.nm33aamurd13022_.mp3: Oh, yeah? Well I just decided I don't need any witnesses. You look like a fun challenge, anyway, so this should be interesting!

Male_83.nm18ab13cr11000_.mp3: N-now hold on, we don't want any trouble... please?
Male_83.nm18ab13cr11002_.mp3: Scared the living Force right out of me with that trick. You do that way too well. I thought our number was up for sure.
Male_83.nm18ab13cr11005_.mp3: They... left? Well if that don't beat all.
Male_83.nm18ab13cr11006_.mp3: Who are you? Ah. It doesn't matter. Can you handle a blaster? They may attack again at any second.
Male_83.nm18ab13cr11008_.mp3: I doubt we could hold out on our own against another wave of them.
Male_83.nm18ab13cr11010_.mp3: You would be right. Came out of nowhere. Wait... Damn it! Here they come again! How do they do that!
Male_83.nm18ab13cr11013_.mp3: Nothing in the job description covers this. Wait... well I guess we'll see how you fare. Here they come again!
Male_83.nm18ab13cr11014_.mp3: Thanks for your help. I don't think we'll try holding this position for much longer. We're not soldiers.
Male_83.nm18ab13cr11016_.mp3: Did the company send you? It's about time they drove these animals out!
Male_83.nm18ab13cr11018_.mp3: Well you've got a lot of work ahead of you. Do you know about their enclave in the south? Don't even try to go near it.
Male_83.nm18ab13cr11020_.mp3: They've taken all the Czerka weapons that were supposed to protect our sandcrawlers. That place is a fortress. A death trap.
Male_83.nm18ab13cr11022_.mp3: You'll have to find some way to sneak into the place. Glad it's not my job.
Male_83.nm18ab13cr11024_.mp3: Just that they attack everything on sight. Well, I suppose they don't attack each other, but any outsider is as good as dead.
Male_83.nm18ab13cr11026_.mp3: The company tried to arm us, and even set up remote self-powered turrets on the mining route, but...but that just made things worse.
Male_83.nm18ab13cr11028_.mp3: It's like a fortress now. I don't know how you're going to break through all of that. Me, I'd sneak in. Well, actually, I would just get back to Anchorhead.
Male_83.nm18ab13cr11030_.mp3: Yeah, so do we. There's no way we're repairing this thing while getting attacked over and over. The desert can have it.
Male_83.nm18ab13cr11032_.mp3: Ah, the Jawas will salvage it eventually anyway. Then we can buy it back and start over. Heh. Makes sense to me.
Male_83.nm18ab13cr11034_.mp3: I don't have time for this sort of thing. I'm through with the desert. You can take your Sand People, krayt dragons, and crazy hunters.
Male_83.nm18ab13cr11035_.mp3: We're not soldiers. They still kill us, and then take our weapons off our corpses. They even had the Jawas disable the turrets and set them around their enclave.
Male_83.nm18ab13cr11037_.mp3: They use whatever they scavenge. They seem to hate our technology, but they love to turn it against us. That goes for blasters and turrets too, I guess.
Male_83.nm18ab13cr11038_.mp3: It's not like you need to be a genius to operate them. They probably don't even bother with special settings. They just watch for people approaching and switch them on.

Male_84.nm22aaczer03000_.mp3: Hold here, spacer. Czerka Corporation doesn't recommend traveling in wild Edean. Katarn attacks are especially bad right now.
Male_84.nm22aaczer03002_.mp3: Wookiee hunters usually keep numbers down, but I think they leave certain areas infested, just hoping a Czerka guard will get killed.
Male_84.nm22aaczer03004_.mp3: You're the Wookiee-lover, why don't you tell me about them? I'm sure you're real close friends.
Male_84.nm22aaczer03008_.mp3: Keep your pet on a leash or you'll be wearing him. I've no love for these animals. I've seen guards ripped to shreds.
Male_84.nm22aaczer03009_.mp3: What's to tell? They're big, powerful, difficult, and worth the most when caged and shipped off this forest-covered rock.
Male_84.nm22aaczer03015_.mp3: You're not some anti-slaver, are you? If so, go talk your crud somewhere else. I've seen guards ripped to shreds. They're animals.
Male_84.nm22aaczer03017_.mp3: Not anymore. Look, you want to know why the Wookiees are acting compliant, you go ask them.
Male_84.nm22aaczer03019_.mp3: When they rip your head off, we'll fish it out of the Shadowlands and give it a proper burial. How about that?
Male_84.nm22aaczer03021_.mp3: Watch yourself out there. There won't be any rescue missions if you go missing.
Male_84.nm22aaczer03023_.mp3: I don't talk to Wookiee-lovers. Get rid of your rug and maybe I won't have you shot.
Male_84.nm22aaczer03025_.mp3: I don't take kindly to threats. Don't test me, spacer, we've more than enough firepower to bury you here.
Male_84.nm22aaczer03027_.mp3: [Failure] What are you doing? Are you making fun of me? Don't push your luck, fool.
Male_84.nm22aaczer03029_.mp3: [Success] Ah, you ain't so bad. Was there anything else you needed?
Male_84.nm22aaczer03031_.mp3: Make it quick. I'm getting tired of you.
Male_84.nm22aaczer03034_.mp3: That's right you will. Now get moving.
Male_84.nm22aaczer03035_.mp3: Go to Janos for company policy. I just man the gate to make sure people like you know you're on your own on the other side.
Male_84.nm22aaczer03038_.mp3: I won't stop you, but you leave this area at your own risk. We're here to protect the company, not you.
Male_84.nm22aaczer03039_.mp3: Still here? Why do you keep bothering me? All our services are up near the docking area.
Male_84.nm22aaczer03041_.mp3: Make it quick. I'm no information booth. Talk to Janos in the Czerka office.

Male_85.nm04aaoutm99000_.mp3: I once lived above, with the rich and privileged. But I was cast down here - a punishment far worse than my crimes deserved!
Male_85.nm04aaoutm99001_.mp3: The rakghoul disease can infect you. It can transform you into one of those monsters! I've seen it happen!
Male_85.nm04aaoutm99002_.mp3: You are the one who brought us the rakghoul cure! The entrie village thanks you. I just regret we have nothing to give you as a reward.
Male_85.nm04aaoutm99003_.mp3: A lifetime lived in this dark place can drive you mad! Just look at poor old Rukil if you don't believe me - he's lost his mind!

Male_86.nm17af07of07004_.mp3: Seems like every other person I meet is complaining about something. Well, it's not going to get better, so leave me alone.
Male_86.nm17af07of07006_.mp3: I don't really have any interest in helping you. Will this be quick?
Male_86.nm17af07of07015_.mp3: Bah, you wouldn't understand. You're like everyone else, complaining about how Czerka isn't feeding and clothing you like it should.
Male_86.nm17af07of07017_.mp3: Well, I'm mad too. There's not much of a retirement plan I can count on if the whole outpost goes belly up. I'll be just like you.
Male_86.nm17af07of07019_.mp3: All right then. Make it quick.
Male_86.nm17af07of07030_.mp3: Oh well, I wouldn't want that, now would I? Just leave me alone.

Male_87.nm02adsarn07008_.mp3: Careful, Sarna. That wine's got quite the kick. A couple more bottles and we'll all be passed out on the floor!
Male_87.nm02aesarn29002_.mp3: Careful, Sarna. That wine's got quite the kick. A couple more bottles and we'll all be passed out on the floor!

Male_88.nm33abmekf05000_.mp3: I... I must g-get into... the academy... must...
Male_88.nm33abmekf05001_.mp3: You... you have a medallion! How... how did you... unghhhh...
Male_88.nm33abmekf05002_.mp3: Leave... leave me be! I won't listen to your... manipulations. I... I *will* make it into the academy!
Male_88.nm33abmekf05003_.mp3: Just... just a few hours longer... just a few hours, surely...
Male_88.nm33abmekf05004_.mp3: You'll get your... turn soon enough, fool. And when you do, *Cough* I will be there, laughing as you collapse from... heat exhaustion and Mekel's beatings!

Male_89.nm26acrept15000_.mp3: So you're the one who's going to try to get into the Sith base, eh? Heh. Good luck. You're going to need it.
Male_89.nm26acrept15002_.mp3: This is our main computer room here. We've got the box of passcards we got from the Sith, but we haven't been able to break their encryption yet.
Male_89.nm26acrept15004_.mp3: We have been able to decode the numeric system they use, but there are holes in our terminal sequence patterns.
Male_89.nm26acrept15006_.mp3: The strings of numbers that end the code sequences. If we could complete those strings, we would have the key to their encryption system.
