Male_Old_05.nm04aaruki25134_.mp3: I see. Well, perhaps you are not the savior I seek after all. I can only pray that if you find the journals you will have a change of heart and bring them to me.
Male_Old_05.nm04aaruki25141_.mp3: I offer you wisdom and you turn me away? Perhaps you are not ready to accept the role you must play in the destiny and salvaton of my people.
Male_Old_05.nm04aaruki25143_.mp3: Very well, up-worlder. Return to me when you are ready to learn what you must learn.
Male_Old_05.nm04aaruki25146_.mp3: You seek my wisdom, but I dare not share my knowledge with you. Not yet. Not until you prove yourself to be the one foretold, the one who will guide us to salvation.
Male_Old_05.nm04aaruki25148_.mp3: Find my apprentice. Discover what fate has befallen her and I will know you are worthy, and not another false prophet sent to mislead my people!

Male_Old_06.nm26aatria27020_.mp3: No! I object! I am the victim of a conspiracy here!
Male_Old_06.nm26aatria27313_.mp3: Yeah, that's right. I don't regret it either. The Republic needs its heroes.
Male_Old_06.nm26aatria27317_.mp3: Of course I hate them! Trying to take over the galaxy every chance they get! Killing millions of innocents!
Male_Old_06.nm26aatria27323_.mp3: I had been having an affair with Elassa on my wife, yes... But I realized how wrong I had been and I was going there to end it!
Male_Old_06.nm26aatria27361_.mp3: Of course she was! Why would a young, beautiful Sith woman get with an old cripple like me?
Male_Old_06.nm26aatria27371_.mp3: I don't know. The medal had gone missing some time ago. I never found out what happened to it.
Male_Old_06.nm26aatria27373_.mp3: It's possible the Sith had stolen it and had it planted on the body...
Male_Old_06.nm26aatria27380_.mp3: Yes I think they would. They wouldn't want to lose one of their sources - even though I didn't give them anything!
Male_Old_06.nm26aatria27382_.mp3: They... they might have killed her for her failure... or they might have thought she'd turn against them or something like that.
Male_Old_06.nm26aatria27388_.mp3: I knew she was a Sith, and she would be trying to pump me - for information, of course - so I... I just simply turned the tables.
Male_Old_06.nm26aatria27390_.mp3: I was working on her, trying to turn her over to the Republic's side. Trying to turn her into a double agent. But that's kind of ruined now that she's been murdered.
Male_Old_06.nm26aatria27398_.mp3: I... I... What's the use now... I had been having an affair with Elassa, it's true. But I had realized my mistake and was going there to end it! But I did not kill her!
Male_Old_06.nm26aatria27506_.mp3: Thank you for saving me. I don't know how I can repay you. Elora and I are going to leave here and get as far away from all this as soon as we can.

Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11000_.mp3: Greetings, friend. I think I can safely assume you are a member of the Jedi Order. Has the Council agreed to hear our petition?
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11002_.mp3: Ah. I'm sorry. I was mistaken.
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11003_.mp3: Does the Council require our presence?
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11005_.mp3: Ah! Yes, thank you, Master Jedi.
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11006_.mp3: Stay here Rilka, I'll be back in an hour or so.
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11009_.mp3: Oh, I see. I am mistaken.
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11011_.mp3: Ve... very well. Thank you, Master Jedi.
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11012_.mp3: How may I be of assistance, Master Jedi?
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11014_.mp3: Ah, but you are still a Jedi.
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11015_.mp3: How may I be of assistance?
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11017_.mp3: My name is Gar. Me and my fine wife Rilka here...
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11019_.mp3: ... live on one of the northern farms. But the kath hounds and the Mandalorian problem has been getting really bad of late, and we're here to ask the Jedi Council to help.
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11021_.mp3: Recently the kath hounds have been acting much more aggressively. They've even attacked some of the settlers!
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11022_.mp3: Those Mandalorian raiders have been milking the outlying farms dry, too... I hear Jon got hit really bad. Too bad about his daughter.
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11025_.mp3: Mandalorian beast! Some of us don't like fighting and killing and butchering as much as you!
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11026_.mp3: I'm not sure exactly what the Council will do about it, but we need some help with this. I only hope they'll listen to me...
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11027_.mp3: Is there anything else you require?
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11029_.mp3: His daughter was killed by Mandalorians when their farm was raided. He's been taking it pretty hard. If you want to ask him about it, he's just north of here. It's not my place to say anything else.
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11030_.mp3: Is there anything else you require?
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11032_.mp3: Ever since the Republic beat them years ago, little groups have been roaming all over the place.
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11034_.mp3: With the Sith invasion, the Republic doesn't have the manpower to hunt them down.
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11035_.mp3: The Jedi are even worse off because Malak has been hunting them specifically.
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11036_.mp3: They're worried that he might even be supporting these raiders, so don't want to face them directly. That puts us in a kind of hard situation.
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11037_.mp3: Is there anything else I can help you with?
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11039_.mp3: Well, as you can see here, Dantooine is mostly plains and grassland, but it has nice hearty soil. A lot of new people have come in the last generation or so.
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11040_.mp3: Hm... the ones you'll most likely hear about are the Sandrals and Matales. Big, wealthy land-owners, both of them.
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11041_.mp3: But Ahlan Matale and Nurik Sandral just can't seem to get along, and now Ahlan wants to get the Council to do something.
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11043_.mp3: Well... from what I hear it started about a week ago. See, Nurik's son Casus is an archeologist, bright lad too, but he disappeared. Nurik of course blamed Ahlan, but even he didn't take it before the Council.
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11044_.mp3: But now Ahlan's son Shen has disappeared as well... and no one knows where he's gone. Ahlan blames Nurik. He thinks he's kidnapped his son.
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11045_.mp3: I don't know exactly what he wants to ask the Council, but from what I know of Ahlan, he's probably going to be after blood...
Male_Old_08.nm14aasett11049_.mp3: Farewell, then. May the Force be with you, is that how it goes? Yes, may the Force be with you.

Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06000_.mp3: You... you have the sword! The sword of Ajunta Pall! That's it, isn't it?! How did you ever acquire it?!
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06003_.mp3: Ah, yes, it's the same old story, is it? I would fight you for the sword if I could, but I am hardly that stupid. You are clearly my better in that regard.
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06005_.mp3: Still, it would be wonderful if I could get a chance to study the artifact some day. Congratulations on its retrieval.
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06007_.mp3: Are you joking with me? The Sith Lord still lives?
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06009_.mp3: Oh, this is quite interesting. My mentor told me that Sith apparitions might be possible, but I never truly believed it!
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06011_.mp3: Thank you for the information! I must go and inform my mentor at once of this strange news!
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06013_.mp3: Oh? Well, that is quite disappointing. From what I remember of the old databases, that looks so similar it's startling.
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06015_.mp3: I suppose the thought of actually finding the sword would be enough to get anyone excited. Ahhh, perhaps someday.
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06017_.mp3: Oh... hello to you. You're new to the academy, aren't you? I can't say we've ever met.
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06019_.mp3: Galon Lor, at your service. Aren't these tombs fascinating? We had no idea the Sith were here so long ago.
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06021_.mp3: Not from this far back. Or, at least, what records do exist are sketchy at best.
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06023_.mp3: These ruins date back to a period when the Sith were first formed, before their exile into the far reaches of space. It's quite fascinating.
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06025_.mp3: I've been working on a translation of some of the runes by this tomb. I'm quite excited... this may very well be the tomb of Ajunta Pall.
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06027_.mp3: Ajunta Pall was one of the first of the great Sith Lords. He rebelled against his Jedi Masters and led the way for the rest of us that followed.
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06029_.mp3: These runes claim that he was interred here... and I wonder if his sword might not be here, as well.
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06031_.mp3: According to legend, Ajunta Pall created a sword of terrible power. Someone who located it could gain considerable prestige.
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06033_.mp3: The runes say that he was interred here, so I think it may indeed be possible. Whoever found the sword could gain great prestige.
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06035_.mp3: A... few of the bolder students have tried. They did not return. As I understand it, the tombs are quite dangerous.
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06037_.mp3: From what I've been told, the tombs have old traps and machines that are still active. They were designed to keep out intruders when they were made and still do.
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06039_.mp3: I suppose if the academy wanted to make a concerted effort, the tomb would be opened... but I think Master Uthar prefers to keep it as a challenge for the students.
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06041_.mp3: Oh, these tombs are certainly not harmless. Don't think that. The sword may be tempting, but I'm not about to risk my life to find it.
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06043_.mp3: N-no. I want power as much as the next person, but I'm not stupid. I know what I'm capable of.
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06045_.mp3: Certainly. Finding such an artifact and giving it to Master Uthar would earn anyone big points. Although I suppose you could also keep it...
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06047_.mp3: Nothing at all. The legends don't say anything about it... it may have had powers only for Ajunta alone.
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06049_.mp3: Of course. Don't let me keep you from your business.
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06051_.mp3: Hello again. Still roaming about the valley, I see?
Male_Old_09.nm36aasith06052_.mp3: The runes here tell a fascinating tale of Ajunta Pall's life. I wonder how much of it is true?

Male_Old_10.nm26aarepn12000_.mp3: So do we have a deal?
Male_Old_10.nm26aarepn12002_.mp3: Don't be so suspicious. The Republic is generous, we pay our mercenaries well.
Male_Old_10.nm26aarepn12004_.mp3: Just show up at the Republic Embassy tomorrow and speak to our Representative there. I'm sure he'll have some task he wants you to start on right away.
Male_Old_10.nm26aarepn12005_.mp3: Do you mind? I'm in the middle of a Republic recruiting drive right now. I need to hire these mercenaries before they sign up with the Sith.
Male_Old_10.nm26aarepn12007_.mp3: In case you hadn't noticed, there's a war on. If we don't hire these mercs, the Sith will. Now excuse me, I have to continue my recruitments.
Male_Old_10.nm26aarepn12009_.mp3: I don't know if you've got what we're looking for... Jedi aren't generally suited to mercenary work. If you want, talk to Roland Wann at the Republic Embassy and see if he can find anything for you.
Male_Old_10.nm26aarepn12010_.mp3: It's north of here, then east past the first courtyard. It's just off the north end of the second courtyard. You can't miss it.
Male_Old_10.nm26aarepn12011_.mp3: Now if you'll excuse me, I have to continue my recruitments.
Male_Old_10.nm26aarepn12013_.mp3: Good. The longer I spend talking to you, the less time I have to talk to the mercs.
Male_Old_10.nm26aasunr26059_.mp3: Commentary: The meatbag has a point, master. Killing is often justified, if illegal in the eyes of many.

Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18000_.mp3: You here to cheer Casandra? She's a fine racer. I hope she knocks Hukta out of the running.
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18001_.mp3: Hukta Jax is insane. He just smashes through everything to the finish. I guess we should expect that from a Gamorrean?
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18002_.mp3: We need more rules about overpowered bikes. Hukta just rides over everything. It's boring watching him.
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18003_.mp3: Queedle is the local favorite. You should cheer along with us. He needs the encouragement.
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18004_.mp3: Well, I guess the course proved too much for you at this level. Better luck next time.
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18005_.mp3: No offence, but I could have done better than you on that last race. As a true fan, I know how to do these things right.
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18006_.mp3: You didn't look too good out there on that last run. I guess everyone has their bad days.
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18007_.mp3: You sure you're cut out for this league of racing? Maybe the stress of it is getting to you.
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18008_.mp3: You're pretty good. Maybe I should start putting some credits on your races.
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18009_.mp3: I guess you've got what it takes to advance. The odds against you winning are getting better.
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18010_.mp3: The second round always has experienced riders. You'll be up against some tough times.
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18011_.mp3: You're up against the second round times now. That's a hard round to beat.
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18012_.mp3: Some of the racers are having a bad time here on Manaan. Seems like you have all the luck right now.
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18013_.mp3: Some of the other fans didn't think you could reach the second round, but I knew you would all along.
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18014_.mp3: Are you sure you're up to challenging the third round time? I mean, you're good, but are you that good?
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18015_.mp3: I'm putting all my credits on you. You're a sure thing.
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18016_.mp3: Whew, that was an exciting time you turned in. Noboby else had a chance.
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18017_.mp3: Good race, Sector Champion. I guess you'll be off to the big tracks, once the circuit is back up.
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18018_.mp3: Wow, I bet you could have won on Taris with times like that. It's a shame we'll never know.
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18019_.mp3: Could I get an autoprint? You've just had the quickest rise to Sector Champion that I've ever seen.
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18020_.mp3: It's amazing what you've accomplished here, and you've done it with such style. I've never met a woman like you.
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18021_.mp3: You sure put Hukta in his place. I don't have to say that you are a much more appealing champion.
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18022_.mp3: I haven't seen a race like that in years. Well, there was Gandroff on Coruscant, but he lacked your... charms.
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18023_.mp3: You are amazing out on the course... and in person. Congratulations.
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18024_.mp3: I don't believe it! Who'd have thought Queedle had it in him?
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18025_.mp3: A new Champion! And it's Queedle! I knew he could do it with a decent swoop under him.
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18026_.mp3: How about that? Queedle, a local racer, showing those pros how it's done!
Male_Old_11.nm26abswoo18027_.mp3: I cheer for Queedle now that he's winning. It would take an amazing racer to win me away.

Male_Old_12.nm02aeduel11000_.mp3: I recognize you - you're that new duelist everyone's talking about: the Mysterious Stranger.
Male_Old_12.nm02aeduel11002_.mp3: I never thought anyone would ever beat Bendak. A hundred years from now people will still be talking about you!
Male_Old_12.nm02aeduel11004_.mp3: Ha ha. I don't believe this - you're actually going to fight Bendak Starkiller in a death match! No way I'm going to miss this!
Male_Old_12.nm02aeduel11006_.mp3: You gonna fight Twitch soon? I'd love to see that crazy psycho get what's coming to him!
Male_Old_12.nm02aeduel11008_.mp3: I wish Bendak Starkiller would get back into the fight game. None of these duelists here can measure up to his legend!
Male_Old_12.nm02aeduel11010_.mp3: Congratulations on your first win. Of course, you beat Duncan so it's nothing to get too excited about.
Male_Old_12.nm02aeduel11012_.mp3: Hey, Stranger... I like watching you in the ring. Nothing's more exciting than a woman who isn't afraid to deal out the hurt. It's too bad I'm married...
Male_Old_12.nm02aeduel11016_.mp3: Can I have your autoprint, Stranger? I'm your biggest fan!
Male_Old_12.nm02aeduel11018_.mp3: It's good to see Marl's still around after all these years. He proves this isn't just a young man's game.
Male_Old_12.nm02aeduel11020_.mp3: I love watching Ice in the ring! Is there anything more exciting than a woman who's armed and dangerous?
Male_Old_12.nm02aeduel11022_.mp3: Gerlon used to be one of the best in the game. Now he's barely better than old Deadeye Duncan.
Male_Old_12.nm02aeduel11024_.mp3: Hey - it's the Mysterious Stranger! Great match against Bendak Starkiller - truly one for the ages.
Male_Old_12.nm02aeduel11026_.mp3: Everybody's talking about the big death match between you and Bendak. I just hope the Sith don't decide to shut it down.
Male_Old_12.nm02aeduel11028_.mp3: It's too bad Bendak Starkiller retired - I'd like to see you take him on.
Male_Old_12.nm02aeduel11030_.mp3: So when are you going to take on Twitch? He's crazy, but he's fast. Damn fast. Still, I think you can beat him.
Male_Old_12.nm02aeduel11034_.mp3: That Twitch is an animal! You couldn't pay me enough to get into the ring with him.
Male_Old_12.nm02aeduel99001_.mp3: Who cares? It's Duncan and Gerlon fighting. It's not like we're going to miss anything good.

Male_Old_13.nm17aa11gu04000_.mp3: I've had enough out of you. You either get Czerka authorization to leave or get out of my space.
Male_Old_13.nm17aa11gu04002_.mp3: No one leaves Anchorhead without proper authorization.
Male_Old_13.nm17aa11gu04004_.mp3: Well, let's see it. Come on.
Male_Old_13.nm17aa11gu04006_.mp3: All right, I'll just scan that and you're off. I'll keep it on file, too. Good luck out there.
Male_Old_13.nm17aa11gu04011_.mp3: Only one place, and it means dangerous work. Go to the Czerka office for a hunting license. They sell them for Fazza's lodge.
Male_Old_13.nm17aa11gu04013_.mp3: The Czerka Corporation office is in the center of Anchorhead. The Protocol Officer will sell you one. She might offer you other work too.
Male_Old_13.nm17aa11gu04015_.mp3: Fazza's is north of the Czerka office. You'll need a hunting license to deal with him. He'll just send you to the Czerka office to get one.
Male_Old_13.nm17aa11gu04017_.mp3: Hurry it up, will you? You're not getting through here until I see the proper authorization.
Male_Old_13.nm17aa11gu04019_.mp3: Czerka Coperation does not want the complications or expense that come with people wandering the dunes. It's too dangerous.
Male_Old_13.nm17aa11gu04020_.mp3: Running this installation is difficult enough without fools wandering around getting themselves killed by Sand People.
Male_Old_13.nm17aa11gu04022_.mp3: Don't get cocky, it has nothing to do with how much *you* are worth. Workers to man the ion shovels are cheap.
Male_Old_13.nm17aa11gu04023_.mp3: What they don't want is Sand People salvaging your weapons. Their raids cause enough damage as it is.
Male_Old_13.nm17aa11gu04025_.mp3: Look, it's for your own good. Czerka Corporation will not accept liability if Sand People run you down.
Male_Old_13.nm17aa11gu04027_.mp3: [Success] You know, I agree with you, but Czerka Corporation just doesn't want the headache.
Male_Old_13.nm17aa11gu04028_.mp3: Besides, I couldn't let you pass if I wanted to. The gate lock needs to be swiped with your authorization. Sorry.
Male_Old_13.nm17aa11gu04029_.mp3: [Failure] That's what you say now, but when the Sand People attack you you'll be screaming for help.
Male_Old_13.nm17aa11gu04031_.mp3: [Success] I... I want to let you pass... I really do... but I can't. You can't imagine how sorry I am.
Male_Old_13.nm17aa11gu04032_.mp3: It's just that... and I'm sick about this... I have to swipe the gate lock with your authorization. I haven't got a choice.
Male_Old_13.nm17aa11gu04034_.mp3: Eh, no need for that. I'm just doing my job. Besides, your threats won't help. I need to swipe the gate lock with your authorization.
Male_Old_13.nm17aa11gu04035_.mp3: I've got no choice, which means you've got no choice. Get authorization from the Czerka office or don't come back.
Male_Old_13.nm17aa11gu04037_.mp3: See the Czerka office for authorization.
Male_Old_13.nm17aa11gu04038_.mp3: Hmm? Oh, it's you again. I'll just let you pass. The boys in the office may need authorization in triplicate, but not me.

Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05000_.mp3: Hold on there! How about talking to me before you go messing with those things? I need your help.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05001_.mp3: Anyone out there...? Could you help? I seem to be... ah... doomed.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05002_.mp3: Oh great! You just get away from me! The last thing I need is Sand People trying to cut me up! Go on! I've got blasters!
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05004_.mp3: Oh... yeah I, uh, I knew that.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05006_.mp3: What the... uh, yeah! You just get out of here! Hey I... I guess I'm pretty scary... trapped, but scary.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05007_.mp3: Hey there, thanks for stopping. I appreciate it. I've been stuck without water for hours. Wasn't looking good.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05008_.mp3: I don't remember you from Fazza's club. You new to Anchorhead? Could you maybe help me get out of here?
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05010_.mp3: Well, ah, it would appear that I worn out my welcome with my wife Marlena. She fixes my droids... heh, fixed them good this time.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05014_.mp3: I triggered some sort of trap she programmed. She probably figured I wouldn't be smart enough to get out. Uh, she was right.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05016_.mp3: Well... wait a minute... it looks like you've already taken care of things. Well that's great! Take that, Marlena, I'm going to live!
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05017_.mp3: The wife put a kink in my battle droids. They're in some sort of discharge loop, and if I move from this spot, they're threatening to blow up.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05018_.mp3: She knew I wouldn't know how to fix them. Could you try to do some repairs? They don't care if you move. It's just me who's stuck.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05020_.mp3: Yes! Yes, I knew I liked this fella the minute I saw him.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05022_.mp3: You're pretty heartless for such a pretty lady, you know?
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05027_.mp3: What's with all the droids, lately? My wife get to you, too?
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05030_.mp3: Hey yeah! You've got yourself a 'mech droid, there! Tell it to do it! Please!
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05032_.mp3: Hey, now... did your droid just spit at me? I just need a little help here.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05033_.mp3: I'd, ahh, really appreciate a bit of help. Please?
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05035_.mp3: Just access each droid's repair interface. You'll have to do some tinkering, but be careful. One explosion I can survive. Any more than one and I'm dead.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05036_.mp3: Oh, and ignore the message Marlena left in there. No way do I deserve this, I swear.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05038_.mp3: Well of course, darling. Anything at all.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05040_.mp3: Hey, no problem, but it won't be a fortune or anything. I'd bet the wife has drained our shared accounts. Now uh, about that help?
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05042_.mp3: Hey, wait for a moment. I need these rigs. I'm no marksman. No way I can agree to that. No way.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05044_.mp3: [Success] Well, when you put it like that. *ahem* Very well then, if it will get you to help me.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05045_.mp3: [Failure] I can't do it. That's my living. I'd have to leave this rock altogether. I can't do it.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05047_.mp3: [Success] I won't use droids. You have to make sure the hunt goes on, right? Eh, now, could you help?
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05049_.mp3: Uh, sure, I apologize. Uh, now, about what you wanted?
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05050_.mp3: Uh, what did you have in mind?
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05052_.mp3: What? Why? What did I do to you?
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05054_.mp3: Oh, so this will be some sort of lesson for me, just because I don't "thank the bones" or some garbage?
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05055_.mp3: Well fine, I'll... stay pretty much right here I guess. You can just get lost. I'll... I'll...
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05056_.mp3: Heh heh. You're kidding, right. Right? Come on!
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05058_.mp3: Nobody looks out for their neighbor anymore. Well, if this is it, I'd rather get it over with and maybe take you out with me.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05059_.mp3: So, let's see how these rigged-out droids like me jumping around. Hopefully the explosion kills you too!
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05061_.mp3: Phew! Don't scare me like that. All right, lesson learned, or whatever. Can you please try to get them going?
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05063_.mp3: So my life is worth less than a few wraid? How many? One? Ten? Twenty?
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05065_.mp3: So you just want me to die? That is just... so... typical of the people I meet... and marry. Thanks a lot!
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05067_.mp3: Well, I suppose I couldn't ask for a more valid reason than that. That's all?! That's it?! What are you, my wife?
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05069_.mp3: You know, now really isn't the time for a lecture. Of course, I might be more receptive after I'm rescued.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05071_.mp3: You're beautiful, but not too bright. I hunt to make a living. Other hunters talk about honor, but they still sell their trophies.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05072_.mp3: Look friend, some may talk about honor in the hunt, but they still sell their trophies.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05074_.mp3: Something about me not following her archaic rules for proper conduct in a marriage. I swear, I never saw this coming.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05076_.mp3: Hey, I'm the victim here. I'm not sure how divorce works where you're from, but this is a little extreme, don't you think?
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05078_.mp3: I'll bet she does. She's decided I've finally worn out my welcome, and she's "fixed" my droids to do her dirty work.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05080_.mp3: What? Oh, right, thanks. I guess I'll just DIE! Come on, help a guy out!
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05081_.mp3: Now if you could... oh no... not you. Just my luck. Look, I don't want any trouble, just need a little help.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05082_.mp3: Could you... hey, I remember you. You're the young lady from Fazza's club. Talk about answered prayers.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05083_.mp3: Oh, hey, it's you. I remember you at Fazza's place. Could I get you to help out a fellow hunter? Please?
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05084_.mp3: That was... unpleasant. Thanks for your help. I would have been a goner. Heh, and the old bat thought I was dead. HA!
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05085_.mp3: Now, my dear lady, I must see to your reward. Will, uh, earthly delights suffice? Er... I suppose not.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05086_.mp3: You wanted credits for your trouble, and I never break a deal. Here's uh, all I have on me.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05087_.mp3: You wanted me to give up my trade. Well, consider it done. Maybe I can rent my droids for security or something.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05088_.mp3: You never asked me for anything, but I consider my life worth something. Please, take this. I insist.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05090_.mp3: Thanks again. I doubt any of those uptight hunters would have helped, and I doubt the wife is coming back.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05091_.mp3: I'm heading back to the shop... I hope she left the manuals for these things behind. Ungrateful little...
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05093_.mp3: I love it when the ladies play hard-to-please, but there isn't much more I can do. This is an expensive setback.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05094_.mp3: What else could I give you? I need what I have to repair my droids and get back up and running.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05097_.mp3: [Success] I suppose I do. That's pretty smart to appeal to what I think my safety is worth. Here.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05098_.mp3: Now, if you don't mind, I have to limp these boys back to my shop. Hopefully Marlena didn't take the manuals with her.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05099_.mp3: [Failure] Look, I really can't. I'm sorry.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05101_.mp3: [Success] I'd... really like to pay you more. Here... take whatever I have. It's all yours.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05102_.mp3: How did... how did you get me to do that? Damn, that's what got me married and into this mess! That's it, I'm leaving!
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05104_.mp3: You shouldn't have fixed the droids first, then. Rally on my target, boys!
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05106_.mp3: So, uh... what's new? Uh, rescued anyone recently? You know, maybe someone trapped in the desert!
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05107_.mp3: Well, nice to see you again. Ah, not to pressue you - certainly, no pressure - but you did say you'd rescue me.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05108_.mp3: I mean, I can certainly see how you'd want to keep me in one place. You ladies can be so coy...
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05109_.mp3: It's just that I had hoped you could do this with a little more... I don't know... success? I won't survive another blast.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05110_.mp3: You asked for credits, after all. Speedy service would be nice.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05111_.mp3: If you expect me to give up hunting, speedy service would be nice.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05112_.mp3: You asked for nothing in return... but really, soon would be nice.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05114_.mp3: We've been over this, haven't we? My wife has put some kind of kink in my battle droids. If I move, they're threatening to explode.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05115_.mp3: I haven't got a clue where to start. She knew I wouldn't. Please, repair them for me if you can.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05119_.mp3: Well, normally I'd be patient, but the constant threat of death is just so stressful. You know?
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05120_.mp3: What the...! What did you do? Oh no...
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05121_.mp3: Hey, you did it! You got them going! All right boys, give me some space.
Male_Old_14.nm18ab10ta05122_.mp3: Careful! If that happens again they could all explode! No way I would survive that!
Male_Old_14.nm18ab13cr10012_.mp3: What choice do we have? They have to be killed. All of them.

Male_Old_15.nm45aajedi01000_.mp3: We'll deal with these Sith, the rest of you split up!
Male_Old_15.nm45aajedi01001_.mp3: Find Bastila and stop her from using her Battle Meditation against the Republic Fleet!
Male_Old_15.nm45aajedi01002_.mp3: We'll deal with these Sith, the rest of you split up! Find Malak! We can't let the Dark Lord escape this time!
Male_Old_15.nm45aajedi01005_.mp3: Watch out! There's something wrong with the Wookiee!
Male_Old_15.nm45aamale06000_.mp3: The Sith will want to cut off our escape. We'll stay here and protect the ships so we can get out of here once you stop Bastila!
Male_Old_15.nm45aamale06001_.mp3: The Sith will want to cut off our escape. We'll stay here and protect the ships so we can get out of here once Malak's dead!

Male_Old_16.nm26acrepi09056_.mp3: You're not? You... Lies! You work for the Republic!
Male_Old_16.nm26acrepi09063_.mp3: [Success] But they... they wouldn't.... would they?
Male_Old_16.nm26acrepi09064_.mp3: [Failure] Never! I am Sith, I will never betray them! Your Republic is weak and will soon fall at any rate!
Male_Old_16.nm26acrepi09066_.mp3: [Success] Ha! Worth my while... The Sith don't pay very well, but they'd kill me...
Male_Old_16.nm26acrepi09067_.mp3: [Failure] You think me weak enough to give in to false promises of wealth and riches? The Sith are stronger than that! We will have it all eventually anyway!
Male_Old_16.nm26acrepi09070_.mp3: [Faiure] There's nothing you can do to me, Jedi, that the Sith wouldn't do worse! I'm not afraid of you!
Male_Old_16.nm26acrepi09077_.mp3: [Success] He wouldn't talk... or has he already? No...
Male_Old_16.nm26acrepi09078_.mp3: [Failure] Ha! The Sith are stronger than you; each one of us! You'll never break us!
Male_Old_16.nm26acrepi09080_.mp3: [Success] But he... I... Please don't hurt us.
Male_Old_16.nm26acrepi09081_.mp3: [Failure] Nothing you could do to us would make us talk! We Sith are stronger than you give us credit for!
Male_Old_16.nm26acrepi09085_.mp3: [Success] Alright! Alright! I'll tell you what you want to know.
Male_Old_16.nm26acrepi09089_.mp3: It... It's... zeta 245698 alpha... just... no more.
Male_Old_16.nm26acrepi09095_.mp3: [Success] You can't do this to me! They would kill me in ways too horrible for you to imagine!
Male_Old_16.nm26acrepi09096_.mp3: [Failure] The Sith are not that easy to fool! We would see through your petty deceptions and destroy you for the way you try to humiliate us!
Male_Old_16.nm26acrepi09098_.mp3: T... Tela? How did you find out about her?
Male_Old_16.nm26acrepi09100_.mp3: [Success] Yes...it could be... so much easier...
Male_Old_16.nm26acrepi09101_.mp3: [Failure] You think bribes will work? You must be dumber than I thought to think that a Sith would join the losing side just for credits!
Male_Old_16.nm26acrepi09103_.mp3: [Success] No! Please don't hurt her! Please...
Male_Old_16.nm26acrepi09104_.mp3: [Failure] Do whatever you want! I know you will fail! My fellow Sith are probably even now trying to free me!
Male_Old_16.nm26acrepi09106_.mp3: [Success] No! Please don't hurt her! Please...
Male_Old_16.nm26acrepi09107_.mp3: [Failure] Ha! You couldn't have her! You're bluffing, Jedi scum!
Male_Old_16.nm26adrepa01017_.mp3: If you say so, Master Jedi. It's very aggravating. Sometimes I just want to take one of them and... *grrr*

Male_Old_18.nm02aegaro15000_.mp3: Pretty soon all of Taris will be talking about how you beat Bendak in that fight, Stranger. You're famous now - but that's not necessarily a good thing.
Male_Old_18.nm02aegaro15002_.mp3: The more well known you are the more chance the Sith will take an interest in you. And nobody wants that kind of attention.
Male_Old_18.nm02aegaro15003_.mp3: Is it true what everyone's saying? That you're going to fight Bendak Starkiller in a death match? You know, I'd love to see someone take that arrogant fool down!
Male_Old_18.nm02aegaro15004_.mp3: Back again? Is there something old Garouk can do for you, or did you just come to chat with a lonely old man?
Male_Old_18.nm02aegaro15006_.mp3: Of course, of course. My mind isn't as sharp as it used to be - that's why I'm giving up the gambler's life. But I think I can still manage to answer some simple questions.
Male_Old_18.nm02aegaro15008_.mp3: Mmm. Don't know what I can tell you that would be any use. The Upper City is nice enough, though it was better before the Sith showed up. But they don't bother an old guy like me much.
Male_Old_18.nm02aegaro15010_.mp3: Don't know much about the Lower City. It's rough down beneath. I just stay up here where it's safe and mind my own business.
Male_Old_18.nm02aegaro15012_.mp3: I don't see much point in worrying about that kind of stuff now that I've given up the gambler's life. Is there anything else I can do for you?
Male_Old_18.nm02aegaro15014_.mp3: I spend my days here in the cantina, sipping ale and chatting with the folks who wander by. I don't have much use or care what goes on outside these walls.
Male_Old_18.nm02aegaro15017_.mp3: Hello there, youngster. You interested in buying the Pazaak deck of an old man looking to get out of the gambling game?
Male_Old_18.nm02aegaro15019_.mp3: Just fifty credits and I'll sell you all my cards. I'll even throw in a free lesson to boot. It's a great deal, if you can afford it.
Male_Old_18.nm02aegaro15021_.mp3: My name's Garouk. I used to be a card shark - one of the best Pazaak players on the Outer Rim. But that was before I retired from the gambling life.
Male_Old_18.nm02aegaro15023_.mp3: Don't get me wrong, the game's been good to me over the years. I've traveled the span of the galaxy, from the Core Worlds to the farthest reaches of the Outer Rim.
Male_Old_18.nm02aegaro15025_.mp3: I've won countless fortunes... and lost countless more. But that was long ago, and things have changed. Gambling is a young man's game.
Male_Old_18.nm02aegaro15027_.mp3: That's why I'm looking to get out. My offer still stands - fifty credits gets you my old Pazaak deck and a free lesson. A great offer if you can afford it.
Male_Old_18.nm02aegaro15029_.mp3: I'm sorry to hear that, but fifty credits is my best offer. I'm practically giving the deck away at that price. If you want it, it's yours. If not, no hard feelings.
Male_Old_18.nm02aegaro15030_.mp3: That's why I sold my old deck to you. I don't have what it takes anymore, and I hate to let my cards go to waste.
Male_Old_18.nm02aegaro15032_.mp3: Glad to see you're interested in the grand old game. The rules are pretty simple. Here: I'll load them up into your datapad so you can check them out anytime you want.
Male_Old_18.nm02aegaro15034_.mp3: Good luck: I hope the game's as good to you as it was to me. Now, is there anything else I can do for you?
Male_Old_18.nm02aegaro15036_.mp3: Of course, of course. No sense in a youngster like you wasting your days away with an old man in a dingy bar. But if you ever want to chat, you know where to find me.

Male_Old_20.nm13aaahla03003_.mp3: There are other possible explanations for your son's disappearance.
Male_Old_20.nm13aaahla03008_.mp3: If Shen Matale is not returned to his father it may ignite a savage and bloody feud between the Matale and Sandral estates. We must not allow that to happen.
Male_Old_20.nm13aaahla03012_.mp3: It is in the real world that we truly prove ourselves worthy of the title Jedi. You would do well to remember this, young Padawan.
Male_Old_20.nm13aaahla03017_.mp3: And causing me no end of trouble!

Male_Old_21.nm02aeduel11014_.mp3: You're good, Stranger. As good as I ever seen - with the exception of Bendak Starkiller, of course.
Male_Old_21.nm02aeduel11032_.mp3: You'd think Duncan would want to retire after losing to a raw rookie, but old Deadeye is still at it. Gotta admire his persistence, I guess.

Male_Old_22.nm02abboun01004_.mp3: Here - I've got fifty credits! A down payment. That should buy me some time, right?
Male_Old_22.nm02abboun01008_.mp3: But I don't have that much! How can I give you credits I don't have?
Male_Old_22.nm02abboun01012_.mp3: No - help! Somebody help! They're going to kill me!
Male_Old_22.nm02abbull02000_.mp3: Thank you - I owe you my life! Those bounty hunters were going to take me away and kill me! My wife warned me not to take a loan from Davik.
Male_Old_22.nm02abbull02002_.mp3: I guess you Sith aren't all bad... uh, I mean... look, I don't want any trouble. I'll just be going now.
Male_Old_22.nm02abbull02004_.mp3: Now I can't pay him back. It's not good to owe a crime lord money. He'll just keep sending more bounty hunters after me until I'm dead!
Male_Old_22.nm02abbull02006_.mp3: You already helped me by saving me from those bounty hunters. So unless you have a spare 100 credits to give me so I can pay off Davik, there's nothing else you can do.
Male_Old_22.nm02abbull02008_.mp3: You're giving me 100 credits? Just like that? I... I don't know what to say! Thank you! Thank you!
Male_Old_22.nm02abbull02012_.mp3: Now I can pay off Davik. You've saved my life! Thank you! I better take these credits to him right away!
Male_Old_22.nm02abbull02015_.mp3: I'm getting out of here before any more of Davik's goons show up. You should do the same.
Male_Old_22.nm02abbull02020_.mp3: What? You're robbing me? You're no better than those bounty hunters! Here - take my credits! Now I'm getting out of here!
Male_Old_22.nm02abbull02022_.mp3: Look out! Those bounty hunters will kill you!

Male_Old_23.nm10abvulk06000_.mp3: Hey, there. Say - I don't recognize you... you must be one of those new lab techs, right? What are you doing over here on the mechanics' side of the building? You lost, rookie?
Male_Old_23.nm10abvulk06002_.mp3: Can't say I blame you. They don't tell you new hires much, do they? Heh. Just throw you in the deep end and expect you to swim. Terrible way to run things, if you ask me.
Male_Old_23.nm10abvulk06005_.mp3: Hey, now... no need to be that way! Leave the violence to the Vulkar gang members, okay? We mechanics and lab techs are more civilized than that, right?
Male_Old_23.nm10abvulk06007_.mp3: If you've got a question, just ask. I'll be happy to help. Don't be shy - the only stupid question is the one you don't ask. At least, that's what they say.
Male_Old_23.nm10abvulk06009_.mp3: The accelerator? It's down in the garage, of course. The service elevator is the only way in. But you lab techs aren't allowed down there.
Male_Old_23.nm10abvulk06012_.mp3: That's a restricted area. Only people with authorization cards, like us mechanics, can get past the laser cannons guarding the service elevator.
Male_Old_23.nm10abvulk06016_.mp3: Hey, now - that kind of talk won't win you many friends with the other lab techs! Of course, the Vulkar gang members might take a shine to you.
Male_Old_23.nm10abvulk06018_.mp3: In any case, threatening me won't help you - I don't even have my card on me.
Male_Old_23.nm10abvulk06020_.mp3: All mechanics have to store their authorization cards in the locker room when we're off duty. That's the rule. My own card is locked up right now - I put it away as soon as my shift was over.
Male_Old_23.nm10abvulk06022_.mp3: And I'm not about to lend my card out to anyone. You know how much trouble we can get into if Brejik finds out we aren't keeping our authorization cards properly secured?
Male_Old_23.nm10abvulk06024_.mp3: Of course, not all the mechanics here follow the rules as closely as they should. I've even heard of a few guys trading their cards for a spice fix! Heh. Stupid addicts.
Male_Old_23.nm10abvulk06027_.mp3: Sure, I'll help you however I can. I remember what it was like my first day here.
Male_Old_23.nm10abvulk06029_.mp3: There's nothing wrong with the heating system. Brejik just yanked the magnetic power cell out. All you have to do is pop that cell back in and the system is up and running again.
Male_Old_23.nm10abvulk06031_.mp3: But until we figure out a way to make the heat work without disabling the thermal security system on the garage elevator, that cell's going to stay locked away in the Control Room.
Male_Old_23.nm10abvulk06033_.mp3: Okay, then. If you need anything else, just come see me. I remember what it was like my first day.
Male_Old_23.nm10abvulk06036_.mp3: No problem. I was always getting lost my first day too, rookie. I look forward to working with you.
Male_Old_23.nm10abvulk06039_.mp3: You think just 'cause I'm a nice old man I can't defend myself? You got another thing coming, punk!
Male_Old_23.nm10abvulk06041_.mp3: Back again, rookie? How things going? Everyone treating you okay? Is there something you need?

Male_Old_24.nm03aaloit16000_.mp3: What... what do you want? You ain't going to arrest me, are you? I don't know anything - I swear!
Male_Old_24.nm03aaloit16002_.mp3: I love this place. You can still smell the exhaust from the swoop bikes! I can't wait for the season to start up.
Male_Old_24.nm03aaloit16004_.mp3: You got any favorites in the season opening race this year? Any inside info on which gang's got the edge? I hear the Black Vulkar's got themselves some new prototype swoop engine!
Male_Old_24.nm03aaloit16006_.mp3: Every year dozens of gangs enter a rider in the race, but every year its either the Black Vulkar or the Hidden Bek rider who wins! Guess that makes sense... all the best riders belong to those two gangs.
Male_Old_24.nm03aaloit17000_.mp3: What... what do you want? You ain't going to arrest me, are you? I don't know anything - I swear!
Male_Old_24.nm03aaloit17002_.mp3: With all the bad blood between the Vulkars and the Beks, I sure hope they don't pull out of the big race. No point in watching if they don't show up.
Male_Old_24.nm03aaloit17004_.mp3: You gotta be careful around here. A lot of lowlifes hang out at the swoop races. Last year someone stole a winning ticket out of my hand before I could cash it in!
Male_Old_24.nm03aaloit17006_.mp3: I don't know why teams keep letting riders come in with those experimental new swoop engines. I saw two riders killed when their engines exploded last year alone!
Male_Old_24.nm03abciti06000_.mp3: What... what do you want? I'm not doing anything wrong. I'm just standing here... please, don't take me in for questioning!
Male_Old_24.nm03abciti06002_.mp3: Did you hear what happened at the swoop race? They say Brejik didn't pay up his wager, and a brawl broke out!
Male_Old_24.nm03abciti06004_.mp3: They say Brejik was killed in the fight! I wonder what's going to happen to the Black Vulkars now.
Male_Old_24.nm03abciti06006_.mp3: Swoop season is almost here. I hope I do better than last season - I lost a bundle betting on all the longshots!
Male_Old_24.nm03abciti06008_.mp3: None of the Beks or Vulkars come into the cantina anymore. I guess that's one good thing about the gang war - it's not so crowded in here.
Male_Old_24.nm03abciti06010_.mp3: This quarantine is making my life miserable! I bet Davik isn't stuck here like the rest of us - everyone says he's got a ship so fast the Sith can't catch him!
Male_Old_24.nm03abciti06012_.mp3: I don't mind this place, but I wish it wasn't so close to the bounty office. Those guys are hired killers - I don't like it when they come in here for a drink.
Male_Old_24.nm03abciti08000_.mp3: Please, don't take me in for questioning... I don't know anything! I swear!
Male_Old_24.nm03adciti03000_.mp3: I'm not looking for any trouble with the Sith. Please, just let me be.
Male_Old_24.nm03adciti03002_.mp3: Hey - didn't you just win the big swoop bike race in? Yeah, it was you, I'm sure! Best race I ever saw!
Male_Old_24.nm03adciti03004_.mp3: I can't believe Brejik tried to back out of his wager! He deserved what happened to him!
Male_Old_24.nm03adciti03006_.mp3: I can't wait for the big swoop race! I hear the Vulkars have a new engine that's going to break all the records!
Male_Old_24.nm03adciti03008_.mp3: This gang war is getting out of hand! The Vulkars aren't just attacking the Hidden Beks anymore - they go after everyone!
Male_Old_24.nm03adciti03010_.mp3: I saw Davik's new starship at the spaceport before the quarantine. They say it's the fastest ship on Taris! He calls it the Ebon Hawk.
Male_Old_24.nm03adciti03012_.mp3: Have you got your tickets for Bendak Starkiller's return to the duel ring? I hear it's going to be an illegal death match!
Male_Old_24.nm03adciti03014_.mp3: Did you hear the news? Gadon Thek is dead! I wonder what's going to happen to the Hidden Beks now?
Male_Old_24.nm03adciti03016_.mp3: I heard Davik's hired a Mandalorian mercenary to work for him. I didn't know there were any of them left after the Mandalore wars.
Male_Old_24.nm03adciti06000_.mp3: Please, don't take me in for questioning... I don't know anything! I swear!

Male_Old_25.nm13aavand17005_.mp3: You and Bastila share a powerful connection to the Force... and each other. This is not unheard of. Connections often form between Master and student, but rarely does a bond develop so quickly.
Male_Old_25.nm13aavand17017_.mp3: If Malak is not stopped the Republic will fall, and the Jedi will be hunted to extinction. The galaxy will enter a time of darkness and tyranny not seen for a thousand generations.
Male_Old_25.nm13aavand17026_.mp3: We must begin your training at once. You have a destiny upon you that you must be prepared to face. The entire fate of the galaxy is upon you.
Male_Old_25.nm13aavand17032_.mp3: Neither will Darth Malak. Your strength is a threat to him. In time he will learn of you and the Sith will hunt you down. It is inevitable. Defeating the Sith is the only way to save yourself.
Male_Old_25.nm13aavand17039_.mp3: [Success] If Malak is not stopped the Republic will fall, and the Jedi will be hunted to extinction. The galaxy will enter a time of darkness and tyranny not seen for a thousand generations.
Male_Old_25.nm13aavand17054_.mp3: You cannot deny what you are. These dreams are part of you. The Force is part of you, though a part you cannot yet control. But through training and discipline we can teach you to live as one with the Force.

Male_Old_26.nm26acmman05000_.mp3: *hushed* You, Jedi! I hear you are investigating the Sunry murder trial, are you not? Hmm. This case is not at all that it appears to be. Many currents, might I say, flow beneath the surface.
Male_Old_26.nm26acmman05002_.mp3: This murder is much more complicated than it may first appear. Sunry and Elassa are proxies for their governments and both sides want the other to fail.
Male_Old_26.nm26acmman05004_.mp3: You can see the journey, heh, by the footprints. You understand, yes?
Male_Old_26.nm26acmman05006_.mp3: Hmm, dear dear. I'm saying they both had something to do with it! They've both kept their hands in this from the start!
Male_Old_26.nm26acmman05008_.mp3: If you want to get to the bottom of this murder, you might seek information from both the Sith and the Republic, likely in their Embassies.
Male_Old_26.nm26acmman05010_.mp3: No, of course not! You think state secrets are for sale on the common market?
Male_Old_26.nm26acmman05012_.mp3: You would have to be, heh, devious to get what you want.
Male_Old_26.nm26acmman05015_.mp3: Because you have no one else to trust? Not Sunry, not the witnesses, and certainly not the judges!
Male_Old_26.nm26acmman05017_.mp3: And if you take my advice, what have you to lose?
Male_Old_26.nm26acmman05020_.mp3: And I've been seen speaking to you for far too long.
Male_Old_26.nm26acmman05022_.mp3: Heed my advice, Jedi, and you may yet find the truths in this murder.
Male_Old_26.nm26acmman05027_.mp3: Let us just say that I am an interested party, and that I have, heh heh... concerns.
Male_Old_26.nm26acmman05030_.mp3: Oh, but I think that you do!

Male_Old_27.nm02acgurn03000_.mp3: Don't worry, if I hear anything you Sith will be the first to know... for a price of course.
Male_Old_27.nm02acgurn03002_.mp3: You blew it! If you had brought that rakghoul serum to Zax he would have made it worth your while. But no - you had to go and do the honorable thing!
Male_Old_27.nm02acgurn03004_.mp3: Now Zelka's mass-producing the serum and it's all but worthless. You cost me one hell of a finder's fee! You're as bad as Zelka - helping people when there's no profit in it!
Male_Old_27.nm02acgurn03006_.mp3: I'm glad you took that serum down to Zax - I got a nice little finder's fee for helping Davik get his hands on the rakghoul cure. He gave me more than Zelka pays in a month!
Male_Old_27.nm02acgurn03008_.mp3: Maybe if Zelka charged a little more for his services he could pay me what I'm worth - and maybe this place wouldn't be struggling so hard to stay in business.
Male_Old_27.nm02acgurn03010_.mp3: Remember - if you get your hands on that rakghoul serum take it to Zax in the Lower City bounty office. He works for Davik, and he'll make it worth your while.
Male_Old_27.nm02acgurn03012_.mp3: Psst. You there! Wait a minute. I need to talk to you about the rakghoul serum. I've got an offer for you you might want to hear.
Male_Old_27.nm02acgurn03014_.mp3: Zelka isn't the only one who wants to get his hands on the rakghoul serum. Davik Kang will pay you ten times what Zelka can if you can get the cure.
Male_Old_27.nm02acgurn03016_.mp3: Oh, come on - everybody knows who Davik Kang is! He's the big boss around here. Gambling, smuggling, extortion - he's got a piece of all the action on Taris.
Male_Old_27.nm02acgurn03018_.mp3: I prefer to think of him as a role model. He started with nothing, and now he's got it all: credits, power, women. It's the Tarisian dream, right?
Male_Old_27.nm02acgurn03020_.mp3: Davik's interested in anything that can turn a profit. He could make a fortune selling the serum to anyone infected with the disease - not like Zelka, who'll practically give it away.
Male_Old_27.nm02acgurn03022_.mp3: Davik isn't the kind of guy you can just walk up to, you know? He likes to keep his business at arm's length.
Male_Old_27.nm02acgurn03024_.mp3: The best thing to do is take the rakghoul serum to Zax. He runs the Lower City bounty office, but everyone knows he also works for Davik. He'll make it worth your while.
Male_Old_27.nm02acgurn03026_.mp3: Look, Zelka can't afford to pay me much. If you sell the serum to Davik, I can probably get a nice finder's fee for directing you to him.
Male_Old_27.nm02acgurn03028_.mp3: Hmph. I'll just deny it. Who's Zelka going to believe - me, or some off-world stranger? Now, be smart about this. You'll get a better deal selling to Davik.
Male_Old_27.nm02acgurn03031_.mp3: Helping people is all well and good, but you have to help yourself first, right? I'm telling you Davik will pay big credits for the cure. More than Zelka could ever afford.
Male_Old_27.nm02acgurn03043_.mp3: Hey, heh, who said anything about fair?
Male_Old_27.nm02acgurn03045_.mp3: If you find the rakghoul serum, just take it to Zax in the Lower City bounty office. He works for Davik. He'll pay you what that cure is really worth!
Male_Old_27.nm02acgurn03048_.mp3: Oh, don't be an idiot. Just listen to me for one minute and you won't be sorry. Davik Kang wants the cure, and you'd be smart to give it to him.
Male_Old_27.nm02acgurn03049_.mp3: Can't you see I'm busy with my duties? Go talk to Zelka if you need something.
Male_Old_27.nm27aasith07006_.mp3: Commentary: It is not possible to destroy the master. It is suggested you run while my blasters warm up, meatbags.

Male_Old_28.nm02aajani05000_.mp3: D...don't hurt me... I'm just the janitor here. I don't know nothing that would be useful to you Sith!
Male_Old_28.nm02aajani05002_.mp3: Hey, there - watch where you're walking! I just cleaned these floors.
Male_Old_28.nm02aajani05004_.mp3: My name's Kadir. I'm the janitor for this building. You must be the new tenant here, right? I never thought they'd rent that abandoned apartment.
Male_Old_28.nm02aajani05006_.mp3: Hmmm.... you look like an off-worlder. What happened, you get stuck here because of the quarantine? Can't see any other reason someone would want to rent that old apartment.
Male_Old_28.nm02aajani05009_.mp3: Oh, I get it! You figure that just because I'm a janitor you don't have to show me any respect. I'm beneath you, is that it?
Male_Old_28.nm02aajani05011_.mp3: Well, alright then. No hard feelings.
Male_Old_28.nm02aajani05014_.mp3: Hmph! You'll change your tune the first time your plumbing breaks down and raw sewage floods your apartment. Then you'll be beggin' for Kadir to come help you out!
Male_Old_28.nm02aajani05018_.mp3: We'll see who has the last laugh then! Now if you ain't going to be civil then I got work to do. This place doesn't clean itself, you know!
Male_Old_28.nm02aajani05020_.mp3: Oh, hello again. Hope you didn't come to make a complaint about the mess in the building. I keep asking for an assistant, but they expect me to do it all on my own.
Male_Old_28.nm02aajani05022_.mp3: I'm Kadir. I'm the janitor here! Geez, I know you're a new tenant and all but I didn't think you'd forget me already! I have feelings, you know!
Male_Old_28.nm02aajani05024_.mp3: Yeah, okay then. No hard feelings. So, what can I do for you?
Male_Old_28.nm02aajani05027_.mp3: Don't know how much I can tell you, but seeing as how you're new here I guess I can try and help you out.
Male_Old_28.nm02aajani05029_.mp3: Decent enough place to live, I guess. Except for the lower levels. That's where the swoop gangs hang out. Just stay in the Upper City and you'll be fine.
Male_Old_28.nm02aajani05031_.mp3: You also might want to check out the cantina. I used to go there when I was younger. Good place to get a drink and find out what's going on in the Upper City.
Male_Old_28.nm02aajani05033_.mp3: Well, the best place to go is probably Kebla Yurt's store. She's right across from the cantina, so you can stop in for a drink if you get thirsty while you're shopping.
Male_Old_28.nm02aajani05035_.mp3: Just keep following the apartment complex ring until you come to the elevator. It'll take you out to the Upper City streets. From there just head south a ways. You can't miss it.
Male_Old_28.nm02aajani05038_.mp3: Not much of an issue for me, you know? I ain't never left Taris and I ain't never going to. A lot of other folks is sure riled up about it, but I don't really know much about it.
Male_Old_28.nm02aajani05040_.mp3: I prefer to keep to myself, mostly. But there's plenty of people at the cantina who'll be more than happy to tell you what they think about the Sith and their quarantine.
Male_Old_28.nm02aajani05043_.mp3: Hey, I do the best I can with the equipment I got! You're just like all the rest, complaining about me all the time.
Male_Old_28.nm02aajani05046_.mp3: I should get back to work anyway. I'll probably see you around - I'm here most of the time. This building doesn't clean itself, you know.

Male_Old_29.nglobedavi05004_.mp3: Ha! Jolee? Jolee Bindo? Why, you old freak! Last time I saw you, you were still wandering the galaxy in that old tug. I thought you were dead, old man.
Male_Old_29.nglobedavi05006_.mp3: I crashed somewhere and decided to stay. Heh heh.
Male_Old_29.nglobedavi05008_.mp3: Yeah, yeah, I'll just bet. Damn, old man, you look exactly the same as the last time I saw you! You pickle well.

Male_Old_30.nm03abciti08001_.mp3: Hey - I saw you in the big swoop race! I'm glad someone finally gave Brejik what he deserves - the guy was nothing but a thug!
Male_Old_30.nm03abciti08003_.mp3: I wonder if there'll be any female riders on the swoop circuit this season. I thought about taking it up myself, but I blew my knee out in a training run. Those things are dangerous!
Male_Old_30.nm03abciti08005_.mp3: This Cantina used to be packed every night, but since the Vulkars started shooting people in the streets the crowds have been pretty thin.
Male_Old_30.nm03abciti08007_.mp3: I wish the Sith would lift this quarantine; I was supposed to visit my sister in the core worlds! I hear Davik has a ship that can get off the planet.
Male_Old_30.nm03abciti08009_.mp3: Everyone says Zax is on Davik's payroll. Maybe I should talk to him and see what it would cost to hire out that ship.
Male_Old_30.nm03adciti06001_.mp3: Hey - I saw you in the big swoop race! I'm glad someone finally gave Brejik what he deserves - the guy was nothing but a thug!
Male_Old_30.nm03adciti06002_.mp3: I wonder if there'll be any female riders on the swoop circuit this season. I thought about taking it up myself, but I blew my knee out in a training run. Those things are dangerous!
Male_Old_30.nm03adciti06003_.mp3: This Cantina used to be packed every night, but since the Vulkars started shooting people in the streets the crowds have been pretty thin.
Male_Old_30.nm03adciti06004_.mp3: I wish the Sith would lift this quarantine; I was supposed to visit my sister in the core worlds! I hear Davik has a ship that can get off the planet.
Male_Old_30.nm03adciti06005_.mp3: Everyone says Zax is on Davik's payroll. Maybe I should talk to him and see what it would cost to hire out that ship.

Male_Old_31.nm04aaoutm17000_.mp3: A few of the braver villagers dared to leave the safety of the fence. They... they never returned
Male_Old_31.nm04aaoutm17001_.mp3: Thank you! My wife was one of those banished because she had the rakghoul disease. If you hadn't cured her, I would have never seen her again!
Male_Old_31.nm04aaoutm17002_.mp3: The rakghouls took my wife! I can only pray she is dead... I cannot bear to even think of the alternative.
Male_Old_31.nm04aaoutw22000_.mp3: I can't thank you enough for saving me, up-worlder. If I had anything but these rags on my back it would be yours. But we have nothing.
Male_Old_31.nm04aaoutw22004_.mp3: Thank you once again for saving me from the rakghouls, up-worlder. I owe you everything.

Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06000_.mp3: Eh? Who are you, then? The only new people that come to Junix Nard's cantina are longtime losers and bounty hunters.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06001_.mp3: I don't have to tell you why the two don't mix well. Please keep any blaster fire to a minimum.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06003_.mp3: Czerka Corporation only worries about keeping their own stores full. I don't have much on hand.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06005_.mp3: I've already gone over this stuff with you. Couldn't you go ask someone else? I'm not one of those "listening" bartenders.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06006_.mp3: What, did some Czerka promoter tell you to come to this planet? I pity you if you were expecting a prosperous mining outpost.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06007_.mp3: Nothing here but sand and more sand. There's a little hunting and racing, but nothing that will make a small man rich.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06009_.mp3: You've got a license there, don't you? Fazza's lodge will be open to you now. Nothing more I can tell you about hunting that his lot won't.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06010_.mp3: And since you got that license from Czerka, you know they look for bounties of their own. They are the ones with credits to pay and interests to protect.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06011_.mp3: Well, there's two kinds of hunting on Tatooine: hunting wraid, and hunting people. Both are dangerous and both have certain restrictions.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06012_.mp3: You'll need a Czerka hunting license, even though most hunters deal with Fazza at the lodge once they have their paperwork squared away.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06014_.mp3: Fazza's is northwest of here, north of the Czerka office. He'll steer you towards the Czerka for a license before dealing with you.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06015_.mp3: After that, he'll buy the trophies you collect. I don't know what he does with it all, but I guess he makes a living somehow.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06017_.mp3: They maintain an office west of here in central Anchorhead. That's about all they maintain these days.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06019_.mp3: All right then. Just keep it brief, will you? I've got customers.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06021_.mp3: What, you couldn't take some notes when you signed up with Motta? I heard you were down at the track; there's nothing new I can tell you.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06022_.mp3: I don't deal with any of that. Motta the Hutt has a lock on everrything race related on Tatooine. You deal with him or you don't race.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06024_.mp3: It would cut into my business if people thought I'd turn them in. I don't know anything about anyone, thank you very much.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06025_.mp3: You made short work of the Sand People, and I thank you for that, but don't make trouble for me here.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06026_.mp3: Now, if this is about Sand People, that's a different matter. I have no problem talking about them.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06028_.mp3: I know they don't negotiate. Attacks are worst in the far south of the Dune Sea, right where the sandcrawlers have to pass.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06029_.mp3: You wipe them out, you'll make a lot of friends.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06031_.mp3: I suppose you are fishing for a reaction to the destruction of Taris? That's all anyone from off-world is talking about.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06032_.mp3: Well, I'll tell you, it's about time someone kicked the Republic in the tail and got things moving. I guess the Sith are the ones to do it.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06033_.mp3: Don't get me wrong, all those deaths were horrible, but war gets the money moving. Maybe they'll decide to fortify us out here.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06037_.mp3: Just "no". I don't look for trouble. You'll have to talk to people yourself if you want more than that. Now, if you don't mind.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06040_.mp3: Hmm, what's the winner of the Manaan Sector Champion title doing here, I wonder? Must have blown all your winnings.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06041_.mp3: I had a few Czerka employees confide that the company is pulling out of Kashyyyk. Leaving as soon as things get difficult... just like they'll do here.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06042_.mp3: Looks like people will have to drink to forget their pain, now that kolto is so expensive. Of course, no one from Manaan is saying a word about it.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06043_.mp3: Drink up, friend. I hear the Sith are restless on Korriban, and they never keep their problems to themselves.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06044_.mp3: Did I see you down by the swoop track? I'll remind you that I don't give loans and I expect prompt payment on bar bills.
Male_Old_32.nm17af07ju06045_.mp3: You again? What is it now?

Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26000_.mp3: Jolee! What... what are you doing here?
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26002_.mp3: Just like old times, eh Jolee? You come swooping in out of nowhere to save my tail from the fire.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26004_.mp3: Who are you? What are you doing here?
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26008_.mp3: Well, I guess if you're going to be my Arbiter you'll need to hear what happened. I might as well start at the beginning.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26009_.mp3: The case is a complete frame-up. Anyone looking at the evidence could see that - or so I thought. But the Selkath seem to think, well that there's enough to go to trial.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26010_.mp3: There aren't any witnesses. All that evidence against me is circumstantial... and completely flawed.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26012_.mp3: Well... you know I was having an affair with Elassa... I went there to break it off that night.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26013_.mp3: I can tell you it wasn't easy. She is... was... young and beautiful. But I love Elora, and I knew I had to do it. I broke it off as quickly as I could and then left.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26014_.mp3: I found out later she'd been murdered when the Selkath authorities came knocking on my door...
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26015_.mp3: Well I was at the hotel, I admit. And I did meet Elassa there that night. But it's not what you think!
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26016_.mp3: I... I was working with Republic Intelligence. We were pretending to feed information to the Sith while I turned Elassa into a double agent working for us.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26017_.mp3: It was going well, too... Until she turned up dead...
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26018_.mp3: Hm... maybe the Sith had found out I was turning her and had her eliminated...
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26019_.mp3: But let's look at the facts they've given:
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26020_.mp3: Elassa was brutally killed. Think about that - she was a Sith, trained in battle and I'm just a crippled old man!
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26021_.mp3: My war injuries make it difficult for me to walk even to hold things. See how my hands are shaking! How could I kill a Sith warrior at close quarters? I ask you!
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26023_.mp3: Obviously the Sith planted the Cross. And what about the lack of forensic evidence? Skin and hair samples, clothing fibers - why isn't there anything like that at the crime scene? Sounds like an obvious frame-up to me.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26024_.mp3: I hope you can see how the Sith are manipulating the Selkath, and probably even you, to set up this against me! We need to get this over with quickly and clear my name.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26026_.mp3: I guess you could interview witnesses at the hotel where the murder happened. The Selkath already did that, but the fish folk don't have much rapport with off-worlders. Maybe one of them was holding something back.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26027_.mp3: But I think you'd be better off investigating the Sith themselves. Maybe you could find some proof they planted evidence to frame me - though that might mean figuring out a way into the Sith Embassy.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26028_.mp3: Anything else I can help you with? I want my Arbiter to be well prepared before we go to trial.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26030_.mp3: Go ahead, ask... ask what you need to. I've got nothing to hide.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26032_.mp3: [Success] We... I... Oh, no... what must this look like... Yes. Yes we were having an affair.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26033_.mp3: [Failure] That's a Sith lie! They're trying to embarrass me and humiliate my wife! How dare you ask me that!
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26035_.mp3: The witnesses are lying! Maybe the Sith got to them - I don't know. But it's a lie I tell you! A hurtful, horrible lie!
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26037_.mp3: Then... then you know. Please, don't make a big deal about this. Elora already knew and I... I was going there to break if off with Elassa.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26038_.mp3: I know it was wrong, but I'm a weak man. Elassa was beautiful and young - how was I to resist her charms? But I didn't kill her! I loved her!
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26039_.mp3: Please, I know I made a terrible mistake getting involved with Elassa, but I was going there to break it off with her.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26040_.mp3: I did it, but found out later that she was dead. I don't deserve to go to jail just for having an affair, do I? You have to help me prove that I wasn't the killer!
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26042_.mp3: Yes, I... I suppose you do. Please, forgive my outburst. This has been a terribly stressful time for me. I... I'm sure there is more you want to ask me.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26044_.mp3: A Rodian? I didn't know there were any Rodians on Manaan. Oh, except for Tyvark... and this one named Gluupor who was hanging around the hotel all the time.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26045_.mp3: OK, so maybe there are a whole bunch of Rodians on Manaan, but what does that matter? If he planted evidence at the scene it's a clear sign of a frame-up. He probably took all the evidence of the real killer at the same time.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26046_.mp3: The evidence of a Sith conspiracy keeps getting stronger, doesn't it? But I suspect there is still stuff you want to clear up.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26048_.mp3: So the truth is out. I never meant to kill her, you know. When I found out she was a Sith spy using me to gain information, something inside me just snapped.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26049_.mp3: She didn't know I had found out, so I waited until she fell asleep and then I... I killed her. Simple, really. But once I realized what I'd done I... I panicked. I contacted those spies from the Republic to help me.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26050_.mp3: They found the illegal monitoring device that the Sith had planted in the room, altered its recording to hide my part in it and cleared up the evidence. I figured that was the end of it.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26052_.mp3: The Sith must have been spying on me and Elassa, trying to make sure she wasn't a double agent. They must have seen the Republic spies getting rid of all the evidence.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26053_.mp3: And so they planted their own evidence. Elassa must have stolen that Hero's Cross from me long ago and given it to her Sith masters, like some kind of trophy.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26054_.mp3: I just thought I'd misplaced it. But when the Cross turned up on her body, I knew the Sith had put it there. So now you know the whole story, what are you going to do?
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26056_.mp3: You think I'm some kind of monster, don't you? All I did was kill a Sith! How many Sith have you killed? Dozens? Hundreds? Thousands?
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26060_.mp3: I don't see how the two of us are any different. She was a spy! She was using me to get information so Malak's army could destroy the Republic! She deserved to die!
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26062_.mp3: If I confess I'm looking at 20 years in prison! And the Ahto City officials might even place kolto sanctions on the Republic Embassy. Without kolto how can we treat the injuries to our soldiers on the front lines!
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26064_.mp3: No. I can't do that and put the Republic's supply of kolto in danger. No I won't! Now look, I may have done something stupid, and it may only be worse for my standing by it, but I will not confess.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26065_.mp3: If you turn me in, the Republic will likely lose its kolto export privileges and then we'll lose the war for sure. Are you going to send all those thousands, millions - like on Taris - to their deaths, just for your sense of 'justice'?
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26067_.mp3: You do whatever you have to, Jolee. I know what I did, but I also know what's at stake, here.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26073_.mp3: No, I'll rot in here if I have to, but I won't betray the Republic. Do what you have to, but know what the consequences will be.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26081_.mp3: I'm glad you decided to see reason in this. If I'm convicted it could cause trouble for the Republic embassy here on Manaan. And none of us want that, now do we?
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26084_.mp3: It's easy for you to judge me - but you weren't there! You don't know what it was like, realizing what I'd done. But it...but it doesn't matter anyway.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26086_.mp3: How would they know? They weren't there!
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26087_.mp3: I heard some of the witnesses said that too, but I swear she was alive when I left!
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26088_.mp3: I wonder if the Sith have been putting pressure on people to get them to convict me... It wouldn't surprise me at all. They've had it in for me since the war...
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26089_.mp3: You should ask everyone about that... they might admit to helping the Sith under pressure.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26091_.mp3: Er... OK. What else do you want to know?
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26093_.mp3: Very well. I suppose there is still much you must do before the trial.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26094_.mp3: Once you've gotten enough evidence to go to trial just tell the warden we're ready. The sooner I get out of this cell the better.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26095_.mp3: Ah, I see you're back. Not that I don't appreciate the visit, but I had hoped you were going to speak to the warden so we might begin the trial.
Male_Old_33.nm26aasunr26097_.mp3: Jolee - coming to check in on an old man? I must confess, I... I would rather you were here to speak to the warden and begin my trial.

Male_Old_34.nm33abmekf04000_.mp3: You... talked to Mekel? Have I proved my worth? Did he say anything...?
Male_Old_34.nm33abmekf04002_.mp3: [Success] Oh... oh. All this... for nothing...
Male_Old_34.nm33abmekf04004_.mp3: [Failure] N-no! That can't be... you're wrong! I... can't have wasted my life...
Male_Old_34.nm33abmekf04009_.mp3: [Failure] I... don't believe you! You just want to... be chosen! But... it will be me! It will be... me...
Male_Old_34.nm33abmekf04014_.mp3: P-please... don't hurt me... I am too weak with hunger...

Male_Old_35.nm03aaciti11000_.mp3: I'm not looking for any trouble with you Sith. Please, just leave me alone.
Male_Old_35.nm03aaciti11002_.mp3: Hey - I saw you in the big swoop race! I'm glad someone finally gave Brejik what he deserves - the guy was nothing but a thug!
Male_Old_35.nm03aaciti11004_.mp3: I wonder if there'll be any female riders on the swoop circuit this season. I thought about taking it up myself, but I blew my knee out in a training run. Those things are dangerous!
Male_Old_35.nm03aaciti11006_.mp3: This Cantina used to be packed every night, but since the Vulkars started shooting people in the streets the crowds have been pretty thin.
Male_Old_35.nm03aaciti11008_.mp3: I wish the Sith would lift this quarantine; I was supposed to visit my sister in the core worlds! I hear Davik has a ship that can get off the planet.
Male_Old_35.nm03aaciti11010_.mp3: Everyone says Zax is on Davik's payroll. Maybe I should talk to him and see what it would cost to hire out that ship.
Male_Old_35.nm03aaciti11012_.mp3: Those bounty hunters make me nervous when they come in here. I always feel like they're trying to guess what my head would be worth if they brought it in.

Male_Old_36.nm02aaman207000_.mp3: I'm not looking for any trouble with you Sith. Please, just leave me alone.
Male_Old_36.nm02aaman207002_.mp3: People complain about the Sith, but this quarantine is good for all the businesses on Taris. Look at Javyar's cantina. That place has never been busier!
Male_Old_36.nm02aaman207004_.mp3: If the Sith wanted to get on everyone's good side, they'd go clean up the swoop gangs in the Lower City.
Male_Old_36.nm02aaman207006_.mp3: What's this, another off-worlder? I didn't realize how many of you there were on Taris until this Sith quarantine.
Male_Old_36.nm02aaman207008_.mp3: I heard a bunch of wreckage from the battle overhead crashed into the Undercity. Think of the damage it could have caused if it had landed here!

Male_Old_38.nm26aasunr26006_.mp3: Jolee? What's he doing here on Manaan? Never mind - I'm just glad he's here. So is this some kind of prison break? If it is we won't get very far before the Selkath cut us down I can tell ya.
Male_Old_38.nm26aasunr26022_.mp3: Further: They say they found my Hero's Cross at the crime scene. Would I leave my war medal behind if I killed someone? Even I'm not that stupid.
Male_Old_38.nm26aasunr26075_.mp3: [Failure] Oh, That's low - using a Jedi mind trick to extort a confession from me. You might as well beat it out of me, you'd have better luck!
Male_Old_38.nm26aasunr26096_.mp3: I grow weary of staring at these four bare walls. But I suppose you know what you are doing. You know the role of Arbiter cannot be taken lightly.

Male_Old_40.nm28aasur104000_.mp3: Is somebody out there? Fishy, fishy, fishy? Coming to eat me, too? You can't get me little fishy. Not in here. I'm safe behind my walls.
Male_Old_40.nm28aasur104002_.mp3: Investigate? You're just like the others - fodder for the Selkath. Walking fish snacks. Chomp, chomp, chomp - if you can run you might be fast food.
Male_Old_40.nm28aasur104005_.mp3: Oh, you'd like that - wouldn't you? I walk out and - BAM! Selkath swarm in from everywhere, ripping and rending! Fishy move fast and silent.
Male_Old_40.nm28aasur104007_.mp3: No, no, no friend. I don't play that game. I've got a winning hand right here in this room - my room! No fishy, fishy for me!
Male_Old_40.nm28aasur104010_.mp3: Ha-ha! That's what you think! Fishy think that too. These walls and door are six centimeters - no... twelve centimeters! - of durasteel! I'm invulnerable behind my walls! Nobody's getting in here! *crazy, manic laughter*
Male_Old_40.nm28aasur104012_.mp3: When the Selkath went insane and started killing everybody, I locked myself in here! I'm safe in here. Nothing can hurt me in here! No fishy food for me.
Male_Old_40.nm28aasur104014_.mp3: Don't know. Go ask them. Ha-ha-ha!
Male_Old_40.nm28aasur104016_.mp3: When the demon screamed it shook every mind in the station. We fell to the ground, but survived. Fishy, fishies, though, they just got hungry!
Male_Old_40.nm28aasur104018_.mp3: [Failure] No, no, no, no, no. That's what the others said. Mercenaries like you. But they're dead. The Selkath ate them! Lunchie-munchie!
Male_Old_40.nm28aasur104020_.mp3: Only the ones left in the south part of the base might still be alive, where the kolto is. Few fishies there! But many, many fishy in between in the water!
Male_Old_40.nm28aasur104023_.mp3: Nooooooo! You can't harm me in here! I'm invincible!
Male_Old_40.nm28aasur104028_.mp3: Bye-bye. Go look for fishy people. They'll chomp and bite and chomp and bite. Food for fishy - that's you.

Male_Old_41.nm03aajani15000_.mp3: I... I don't want no trouble with you Sith. I'm just a janitor - I don't know nothing.
