Male_Old_41.nm03aajani15002_.mp3: Ain't nothing to see here right now. Come on back when they have the season opening race. That's a sight worth seein'!
Male_Old_41.nm03aajani15004_.mp3: If this place ain't spotless for the season opener Brejik will have his thugs beat me within a hair of my life! The Vulkars are taking this race very seriously.
Male_Old_41.nm03aajani15006_.mp3: Gotta sweep and clean. Gotta have this place sparkly-shiny for when the crowds show up.
Male_Old_41.nm03aajani15008_.mp3: Can't talk. Swoop season starts soon. We need to scrub this place top to bottom before the season opening swoop race.

Male_Old_42.nm13aajedi10000_.mp3: Good day to you. I am afraid I cannot speak to you at the moment. I apologize.
Male_Old_42.nm13aajedi10002_.mp3: I heard that the Sith have destroyed Taris. This bodes ill for us...
Male_Old_42.nm13aajedi10004_.mp3: Please, do not disturb me, I have pressing matters at hand.
Male_Old_42.nm13aajedi10006_.mp3: Enjoy the time you have here on Dantooine. I think the Council might decide to move to a different world soon.
Male_Old_42.nm13aajedi10008_.mp3: I fear it is only a matter of time before the Sith find us here, too...
Male_Old_42.nm13aajedi10010_.mp3: I hear that the Sith torture Jedi prisoners until they give in to the dark side. I hope that never happens to me!
Male_Old_42.nm13aajedi10012_.mp3: If you are seeking information, perhaps the Jedi Council will help. I am afraid I cannot.
Male_Old_42.nm13aajedi10014_.mp3: Dantooine is one of our last refuges. The Sith hunt us everywhere.

Male_Old_43.nm02abmale13000_.mp3: What... well, what do you want? I'm not doing anything wrong. I'm just standing here... please, don't take me in for questioning!
Male_Old_43.nm02abmale13002_.mp3: Did you hear about the big fight at the swoop races? I wasn't there, but someone told me Brejik flipped out on the podium and wouldn't pay up!
Male_Old_43.nm02abmale13004_.mp3: All hell broke loose, and from what I hear Brejik was killed. Serves him right for welching on his bets!
Male_Old_43.nm02abmale13006_.mp3: There's too many people in this cantina since they added the music room at the back! I come here to relax, not to fight with crowds.
Male_Old_43.nm02abmale13008_.mp3: People are saying someone broke into the military base. Could mean trouble for us all if the Sith decide a Tarisian citizen was involved.
Male_Old_43.nm02abmale13010_.mp3: Still, I can't say I'm upset about it. It's about time somebody on this world stood up to those Sith!
Male_Old_43.nm02abmale13012_.mp3: I'm surprised the Sith haven't done anything to try and bring in Davik. After all, everyone knows he's the crime lord who runs this planet.
Male_Old_43.nm02abmale13014_.mp3: Maybe Davik and the Sith are working together. Crime lord and the military oppressors - seems like a perfect match, if you ask me.
Male_Old_43.nm02abmale13016_.mp3: The Sith are hunting for any Republic soldiers who escaped the battle overhead. They even sent a patrol into the Undercity to look for survivors!
Male_Old_43.nm02abmale13018_.mp3: You... you're the one who killed Bendak Starkiller, aren't you? What a match - best deul I ever saw! You know, you might want to lay low for a while.
Male_Old_43.nm02abmale13020_.mp3: Death matches are illegal; the Sith could arrest you if they ever found out about it. Of course, I think I saw several of the Sith officers at the match, so maybe they don't care.
Male_Old_43.nm02abmale13022_.mp3: Bendak Starkiller is coming out of retirement! Everyone's talking about it! Some street-slime fool agreed to fight him in an illegal death match! I wonder how I can get a ticket?
Male_Old_43.nm02abmale13024_.mp3: Look at Niklos sitting over there with his Pazaak deck. I used to play, you know. But I wasn't very good. I finally sold my deck and gave it up.
Male_Old_43.nm02abmerc15000_.mp3: Please... don't hurt me! I'm just a simple merchant. I... I don't want anything to do with you Sith. Please, just leave me alone.
Male_Old_43.nm02abmerc15002_.mp3: I hear there's a gang war between the Hidden Beks and the Black Vulkars raging in the lower city.
Male_Old_43.nm02abmerc15004_.mp3: The Sith wouldn't be so bad if they'd let us leave the planet. This quarantine is killing my business!
Male_Old_43.nm02abmerc15006_.mp3: I'm in the wrong business... Davik's got a piece of everyone's action. I should have been a crime lord, too! Ha-ha!
Male_Old_43.nm02abmerc15008_.mp3: Huh... if the Sith cared anything about us, they'd stop that gang war in the Lower City.
Male_Old_43.nm02abmerc15010_.mp3: Have you got your tickets for Bendak Starkiller's return to the duel ring? I hear it's going to be an illegal death match!
Male_Old_43.nm02abmerc15012_.mp3: You beat Bendak Starkiller! Nobody's ever beaten Bendak! Ah, I wouldn't believe it if I hadn't seen it with my own eyes!
Male_Old_43.nm02abmerc15014_.mp3: You just better hope the Sith don't get word of what you were doing. Death matches are illegal, you know.
Male_Old_43.nm02abmerc15016_.mp3: My "protection" costs have doubled in the last week. Ever since that Mandalorian started working for the Exchange, Davik's been cracking down on all his Underworld operations.
Male_Old_43.nm02aesith31000_.mp3: This Tarisian ale is fantastic! We should have conquered this planet ages ago!
Male_Old_43.nm02aesith31002_.mp3: This cantina isn't the fanciest joint I've ever been in, but it's a good place to unwind after a hard shift at the military base.
Male_Old_43.nm02aesith31004_.mp3: Taris isn't such a bad place. I've been stationed in worse places than this during my commission.

Male_Panic_01.nm04aaoutw22036_.mp3: Open the gate! Quickly! There isn't much time!
Male_Panic_01.nm04aarepu24013_.mp3: No... no!!! I can feel... ARGH!

Male_Panic_02.nm40aasaul10103_.mp3: No! AHHH!!! AUGH! NO!!! I beg you... mercy!!! NO!!!
Male_Panic_02.nm40aasaul10108_.mp3: NO! AHHH!! The pain - THE PAIN! AHHHH!!!

Male_Radio_01.nm28absur201000_.mp3: Who's there? You're not Selkath, I can see that much. Are you another rescue crew?
Male_Radio_01.nm28absur201002_.mp3: Oh, I'm a merc the Republic hired a couple days ago to investigate - but all we found was a bunch of insane Selkath killing everything that moves!
Male_Radio_01.nm28absur201004_.mp3: All my companions are dead. The Selkath swarmed over us - there were dozens of them! And they...they looked wrong, somehow. Like something had changed inside them. Insane or something...
Male_Radio_01.nm28absur201014_.mp3: Oh, I'd have gone back to the surface long ago if this complex hadn't been overrun by all those crazy Selkath! There's no way for me to get to the submarine docking bay.
Male_Radio_01.nm28absur201016_.mp3: I discovered a way to get to the bay and seal off the rest of the base. I just have to find the kolto harvester they built on the edge of the Hrakert rift.
Male_Radio_01.nm28absur201018_.mp3: It's got an emergency override to open the doors to the submarine docking bay and I could get in from the outside.
Male_Radio_01.nm28absur201020_.mp3: I figured my only chance was to slap on an environment suit, head out onto the ocean floor and check that harvester out for myself.
Male_Radio_01.nm28absur201022_.mp3: Besides, it's got to be safer out on the ocean floor than back in there with all those crazed Selkath mutants running around looking for dinner.
Male_Radio_01.nm28absur201024_.mp3: I'm not spending another minute in this facility - not with those psychotic fish people all over the place!
Male_Radio_01.nm28absur201028_.mp3: I'm heading out to the ocean floor right now - it leads to another complex of buildings. Going through them is the only way to reach the kolto harvester.
Male_Radio_01.nm28absur201030_.mp3: We should probably stick together, but I won't wait around in here with the Selkath. You can catch up with me if you want - down the hall and through the doors on the right. I'll be waiting on the ocean floor where it's safe.
Male_Radio_01.nm28absur201035_.mp3: Isn't it obvious - the Selkath have gone insane! They're killing everything that moves!
Male_Radio_01.nm28absur201043_.mp3: Come on - what's taking you so long? We have to cross the ocean floor to reach the buildings that lead to the kolto harvester.
Male_Radio_01.nm28absur201045_.mp3: Besides, it's a lot safer out here. No Selkath looking to make a meal out of us.

Male_Tough_01.nm22aaczer06001_.mp3: You want to arrange a purchase, go talk to the director in his office.
Male_Tough_01.nm22aaczer06002_.mp3: This assignment is the worst in the galaxy.
Male_Tough_01.nm22aaczer06003_.mp3: Czerka Corporation should burn down some trees. Make room for some swoop races.
Male_Tough_01.nm22aaczer06004_.mp3: Keep walking. This ain't no holiday port of call.
Male_Tough_01.nm22aaczer06005_.mp3: If you've business with Czerka Corporation, take it to the director's office.
Male_Tough_01.nm22aaczer06006_.mp3: Take a walk, spacer. You don't look like a big buyer to me.
Male_Tough_01.nm22aaczer06007_.mp3: Watch yourself. We don't need anyone agitating the locals.
Male_Tough_01.nm22aaxgcz12000_.mp3: Wookiees settle down a lot once they're caged.
Male_Tough_01.nm22aaxgcz12001_.mp3: You know, every Czerka outpost is expected to double the number of Wookiees they take in the next year.
Male_Tough_01.nm22aaxgcz12002_.mp3: Hey, we just got word that shipments will be increasing. This Chuundar really knows how to do business.
Male_Tough_01.nm22aaxgcz12003_.mp3: Hey, business is better than ever. These animals will pay our way for years.
Male_Tough_01.nm22aaxgcz12004_.mp3: I hear the Wookiees seem to be cooperating even more than usual now. Czerka can pretty much do whatever it wants.
Male_Tough_01.nm22aaxgcz12005_.mp3: I heard the Wookiee leader is saying we can increase the number of slaves we take. I think Czerka will be here a long time.
Male_Tough_01.nm22aaxgcz12006_.mp3: You know, I hear Czerka has negotiated to increase its presence here by six more outposts.
Male_Tough_01.nm22aaxgcz12007_.mp3: Heh, if we keep exporting at this rate, the only planet in the sector with no Wookiees will be their home world.
Male_Tough_01.nm22aaxgcz12008_.mp3: Hey! Don't get too close to the cages. Even these cowed Wookiees will take your arm off if they get the chance.
Male_Tough_01.nm22aaxgcz12009_.mp3: Don't bother me, now. I've got twice as many Wookiees to process as usual.
Male_Tough_01.nm22abczgu05000_.mp3: Wow. This is going to look really bad on my record.
Male_Tough_01.nm22abczgu05001_.mp3: The patrol Captain will speak for us. He's the ranking officer in this unit.
Male_Tough_01.nm22abczgu05002_.mp3: You know, we're gonna get stuck with the bill for this.
Male_Tough_01.nm22abczgu05003_.mp3: I thought he said shoot. I swear he said shoot.
Male_Tough_01.nm22abczgu05004_.mp3: Well, this means extra duty for sure.
Male_Tough_01.nm22abczgu05005_.mp3: Why do they always have to be so difficult?
Male_Tough_01.nm22abczgu05006_.mp3: They won't miss one, will they?
Male_Tough_01.nm22abczgu05007_.mp3: We should just say it bolted, or something.
Male_Tough_01.nm33aaczer06000_.mp3: Go about your business, please, citizen.
Male_Tough_01.nm33aaczer06002_.mp3: This is a Sith colony. They are the law here. I am here only to protect Czerka interests.
Male_Tough_01.nm33aaczer06004_.mp3: You can conduct business at our office, if you wish.
Male_Tough_01.nm33aaczer06006_.mp3: Oh, entertainment can be found at the local cantina, provided by Czerka of course.

Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15000_.mp3: *grunt* What the hell is your kind doing here? Bad enough I have to deal with all these other idiots, but now there's a stinkin' Cathar on this world too?
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15005_.mp3: Heh, yeah, do like the Jedi tells you and back off! Your people are pathetic, it's no wonder we crushed your world so easily.
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15009_.mp3: I know enough that... Hey, wait a minute... you look familiar somehow...
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15015_.mp3: This doesn't concern you, Jedi trash.
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15017_.mp3: Hm... now where could I have... No, he's dead and she likely is too. I...
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15021_.mp3: Maybe I was wrong. Still, I think a specimen like you would be a nice addition to my collection.
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15023_.mp3: So what would it take, Jedi, for you to sell your pet here to me?
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15025_.mp3: Now don't be so selfish. We both know Cathar aren't real people anyway.
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15027_.mp3: The females make amusing pets, but males should be put down like the animals they are. I remember one time on Taris...
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15033_.mp3: Put one of you down like the animals you are. So easy... then I saw one of the females on the auction block, but those darn Jedi...
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15037_.mp3: What? Me? Oh ho! Now I recognize where I've seen that face before.
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15039_.mp3: You were the little Cathar I was going to purchase. But those Jedi came and stole my pet away from me!
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15041_.mp3: When I was fighting with the Mandalorians against the Cathar, I developed an appreciation for these creatures. They make excellent servants if properly trained.
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15043_.mp3: You Jedi act all prim and proper, but inside you must feel the same way I do about the lesser, non-human species. The Sith at least let their feelings show on the outside.
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15047_.mp3: Come now, will you let your pet go? I'm sure we can come up with a price we both think is fair.
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15055_.mp3: Uh... hold on a second! Don't be hasty!
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15061_.mp3: Yes, yes... Say no to the dark side...
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15063_.mp3: But I will have you yet! Heh.
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15077_.mp3: Heh, I knew we could work something out.
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15082_.mp3: Ooooo! Big man, the Jedi, shooting his mouth off from behind a lightsaber, or whatever you're carrying.
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15084_.mp3: Hiding behind your pet Cathar... And a woman at that!
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15086_.mp3: We should have exterminated all you Cathar when we had the chance.
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15088_.mp3: Ooooo! Big woman, the Jedi, shooting her mouth off from behind a lightsaber, or whatever you're carrying.
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15090_.mp3: Ack! *cough* Heh, you seem to have defeated me, Cathar worm, but I'll have the last laugh in the end!
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15094_.mp3: *cough* You may have killed me here, today, but I had the pleasure of killing off your species!
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15096_.mp3: Not everyone who fought alongside the Mandalorians did it for their stupid concept of 'honor'. Some of us did it just for the pleasure: the pleasure of seeing your world burn.
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15100_.mp3: *cough* *cough* Heh, but I'm beyond your petty vengeance now, girl. You can never have your revenge!
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15110_.mp3: I killed your people on Cathar in the sky, on the ground, in their homes. I hunted them down like the animals they were, just to see them burn.
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15112_.mp3: But the treacherous beasts fought back and left me with injuries that meant I could never fight again... or so they thought!
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15116_.mp3: I ended up in the Lower City of Taris, and what did I find? A few of those stinking beasts living there!
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15118_.mp3: The male was easy enough to best, but the females proved elusive. I didn't know what happened to them after I killed the male, until I saw this cursed woman on the auction block.
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15120_.mp3: But then the Jedi came and ruined everything before I could have my revenge... *cough*
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15124_.mp3: Give in and embrace your hate! You're no better than me! You're nothing!
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15130_.mp3: Haha! Your kind always were weak-minded!
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15137_.mp3: You coward! You weak... ahhh... gurk! *death rattle*
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15146_.mp3: Hahah- *cough* *cough* But you won't! You're the cowardly type, all of you. You don't have the guts to finish me now!
Male_Tough_02.nglobehxor15152_.mp3: There she is! Get her, men, but remember: don't kill her!

Male_Tough_03.nm26abmerc03000_.mp3: Sorry, but you're too late to recruit me. I've just hired on with the Sith. Of course, if the Republic has a better offer...
Male_Tough_03.nm26abmerc03002_.mp3: Then why are you bothering me? I'm here on Manaan to find work as a mercenary. I'm not here to chat with tourists.
Male_Tough_03.nm26abmerc03005_.mp3: Hey, keep your lectures. The Sith pay well, and they pay up front. That's all I care about.
Male_Tough_03.nm26abmerc03008_.mp3: I don't have time to sit here and answer your questions. I have to get ready - the Sith want me to report to their Embassy first thing tomorrow.
Male_Tough_03.nm26absith12002_.mp3: Your offer is pretty good. But I've heard some nasty things about you Sith. Is it true you bombed Taris into dust?
Male_Tough_03.nm26absith12006_.mp3: You make a good point. And I've never turned down a job that pays up front.

Male_Tough_04.nm26adsith04000_.mp3: You Republic people are so pathetic, sitting around grovelling at the tablescraps the galactic senators deign to give you. It makes me sick.
Male_Tough_04.nm26adsith04004_.mp3: Ha! Don't make me laugh, you gutless simp! It's the destiny of weak-minded fools like you to be ruled over by the strong, like we Sith!
Male_Tough_04.nm26adsith04008_.mp3: Try it. Just try it. I'd love to see you throw the first punch. And with all the cameras around the Selkath would be all over you inside of 30 seconds.
Male_Tough_04.nm26adsith04010_.mp3: You break their laws, you pay the price, Republic scum. But I can see that you're not man enough to back up your words anyway.
Male_Tough_04.nm26adsith04012_.mp3: If you ever feel like relieving yourself of your worthless existence, feel free to come by our enclave here. We have many, many ways to fulfill your wish.
Male_Tough_04.nm26adsith04016_.mp3: You Republics make me sick. It's a good thing there are cameras all over the place on Manaan, or they'd have droids cleaning you up off the walls by now.

Male_Tough_05.nm10abvulk07000_.mp3: You picked my pocket pretty good on that last Pazaak hand. You should give a working guy a break - we mechanics don't make the big bucks. Just kidding... You want to play again?
Male_Tough_05.nm10abvulk07001_.mp3: Looks like this guy just won herself a little extra spending credits on that last Pazaak hand - but it's not like you lab techs can't afford it, right? You want to play again?
Male_Tough_05.nm10abvulk07002_.mp3: Hey, there. You must be one of the new lab techs, right. You like Pazaak? It can be hard to find a game in this place.
Male_Tough_05.nm10abvulk07004_.mp3: Eh, we mechanics don't make the big bucks like you lab techs, but if we keep the stakes low I'm up for a match or two. You interested?
Male_Tough_05.nm10abvulk07006_.mp3: Questions? Come on - I just got off a double shift. I'm here to relax and play cards, not to answer a bunch of questions. So how about it? You want to play?
Male_Tough_05.nm10abvulk07008_.mp3: No? That's a real shame. You can't play unless you have your own deck, and I don't know anywhere around here for you to get one.
Male_Tough_05.nm10abvulk07010_.mp3: Well, if you ever get your hands on a Pazaak deck and you're looking to play a few hands you know where to find me.
Male_Tough_05.nm10abvulk07013_.mp3: Nothing kills time between shifts like a nice game of Pazaak, don't you agree? Okay, let's get this game started.
Male_Tough_05.nm10abvulk07016_.mp3: Hah! You're kidding, right? Like I'd be stupid enough to wager my authorization card! If Brejik found out I'd get fired - or worse!
Male_Tough_05.nm10abvulk07018_.mp3: Sorry, but those stakes are too high for this working class guy's blood. I'll play, but only for small stakes. So what do you say, you interested?
Male_Tough_05.nm10abvulk07020_.mp3: Well, if you ever feel like passing the time with a few harmless hands of low stakes Pazaak just let me know.
Male_Tough_05.nm10abvulk07022_.mp3: Back again? You looking to pass the time until your next shift with some Pazaak?
Male_Tough_05.nm10abvulk08036_.mp3: You again? What - you ready to work out a deal now? Listen, you get me some spice and I'll make it worth your while.
Male_Tough_05.nm45aamalak1000_.mp3: Lord Malak, a team of Jedi have penetrated our defenses! Their fighters have landed on the Star Forge.
Male_Tough_05.nm45aamalak1002_.mp3: Lord Malak, forgive me... but how can mere droids be a match for the Jedi?
Male_Tough_05.nm45aamalak1005_.mp3: The Jedi have invaded the Star Forge. Destroy them. Destroy them all.
Male_Tough_05.nm45aamalak2001_.mp3: I have news, Lord Malak. About the Jedi.
Male_Tough_05.nm45aamalak2003_.mp3: N-no, Lord Malak. The droids could not stop them.
Male_Tough_05.nm45aamalak2005_.mp3: It... it was Revan, Lord Malak. Your old master is with the Jedi, here on the Star Forge!
Male_Tough_05.nm45aamalak2007_.mp3: Do you... do you think they can stop Revan, Lord Malak?

Male_Tough_06.nglobeband01000_.mp3: At last, my search is over! I was beginning to fear someone else had killed you and deprived me of the pleasure.
Male_Tough_06.nglobeband01002_.mp3: You may have defeated the pathetic bounty hunter my Master sent after you, but you are no match for me! I have studied at the foot of the Dark Lord himself!
Male_Tough_06.nglobeband01004_.mp3: Do you think those Republic subs are the only way to reach the ocean floor? Malak and Revan found a way down here long before the Hrakert station was built.
Male_Tough_06.nglobeband01006_.mp3: I acquired a ship and followed the same route Revan and my Master used on their own journey. Then it was simply a matter of waiting for you to return for the Star Map.
Male_Tough_06.nglobeband01008_.mp3: Your words mean nothing to me... unless you wish to beg for your life. No? Then I shall try to make this both quick and painful!

Male_Tough_07.nm17aa11bg03000_.mp3: You got authorization, you talk to Billan. Otherwise, leave the gate area.
Male_Tough_07.nm17aa11bg03001_.mp3: Don't know why anyone would want to leave. Nothing but sand and death out there.
Male_Tough_07.nm17aa11bg03002_.mp3: If you're fool enough to want to leave, talk to Billan.
Male_Tough_07.nm17aa11bg03003_.mp3: Make sure you are well-armed if you plan to leave. Trust me.
Male_Tough_07.nm17aa11bg03004_.mp3: If you must leave, I wouldn't go out at night. Krayt hunt at night.
Male_Tough_07.nm17aa11bg03005_.mp3: The wraid predators are dangerous out there, but the Sand People are worse.
Male_Tough_07.nm17aa11bg03006_.mp3: The sandcrawlers always come back with damage. Sand People are a constant threat.
Male_Tough_07.nm17aa11bg03007_.mp3: The gate is closed to anyone without authorization.

Male_Tough_08.nm17ab01me03000_.mp3: Leave me be. If I don't get these converters working, I lose my job.
Male_Tough_08.nm17ab01me03001_.mp3: Why are you bothering me? You've got a ship. You can leave this rock.
Male_Tough_08.nm17ab01me03002_.mp3: Some ships I fix, some I scrap. Depends if the owner disappears in the dunes.
Male_Tough_08.nm17ab01me03003_.mp3: Business is up a little, so leave me to my work.
Male_Tough_08.nm17ab01me03004_.mp3: You a swoop racer? Crazy fool.
Male_Tough_08.nm17ab01me03005_.mp3: You here to hunt wraid? I work a wrench. Boring, but I know it won't kill me.
Male_Tough_08.nm17ab01me03006_.mp3: Czerka Corporation keeps me working. Don't care what else they do.
Male_Tough_08.nm17ab01me03007_.mp3: Tatooine's a dustbowl, and that's all it'll ever be.

Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06000_.mp3: I have to thank you again. You really didn't have to save my sorry carcass out there. I appreciate it.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06001_.mp3: You know, darling... if there was anything I could do to make it up to you... anything? No, huh?
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06002_.mp3: Not that it puts me in debt to you. Because I believe I mentioned how little this job pays.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06003_.mp3: What can I do for you, hmm? Did my wife send you? This ain't about credits, is it?
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06005_.mp3: Well of course, darling, whatever Tanis Venn can do. You know, very few human females come to Tatooine...
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06007_.mp3: [Success] I should just answer the lady's questions.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06015_.mp3: Hey, hey, hey, let's calm down, shall we? No offense was meant. You just go ahead and ask your questions.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06017_.mp3: Uh, and even fewer accompanied by Wookiees. Whoa big fella. You related to my wife? Now, w-what did you say you wanted?
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06019_.mp3: Ooh, candy words from a swoop racer. Well, I just feel all warm inside. Save it for the ladies, what do you want?
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06020_.mp3: Oh, of course. Who put you up to this? My wife? I meant what I said about having no credits.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06022_.mp3: I don't hunt anymore. I made a deal with you, and I'll stick to it. The others will have to help you.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06023_.mp3: Besides... without the wife I can't keep my droids going. But I don't need her. You can tell her that. Yeah.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06024_.mp3: Sure you do. Tanis can tell you all about the thrill of the hunt, man versus beast. It's all very exciting.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06025_.mp3: I'll do my best to make you happy. Ask away.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06026_.mp3: What, specifically, would you like me to cover?
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06028_.mp3: Well, the wife doesn't really take much of an interest in my work. Not like you. Now, you have questions?
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06030_.mp3: Hunting is a dirty and tough business. What can old Tanis tell you about it?
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06032_.mp3: You're the one that took down a dragon! What could I possibly tell you? My battle droids can't even fight that good.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06033_.mp3: There isn't any. Too many hunters, not enough prey. I can barely keep expenses covered. Maintenance on battle droids is expensive.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06034_.mp3: Of course, it's better than going alone. What if I stumbled on a bunch of Sand People? These solo hunters are crazy.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06036_.mp3: I'm more the practical type, beautiful. I keep myself fed and make sure everything I have is taken care of.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06037_.mp3: What do I care? I need to eat. I also need to pay for parts so the wife can keep the droids running. It's all about the credits.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06038_.mp3: Some guys will talk about honor and stuff, but they still sell their plates to Fazza. I guess honor needs creds too?
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06040_.mp3: I suppose, but so what? When that resource goes belly-up, I'll just move on. I'm just a wandering spirit, I guess.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06042_.mp3: I'm not real popular with the others, but they just fool themselves. They're in it for the credits too.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06044_.mp3: Too long, but it beats smuggling. You ever run into a Sith dreadnaught in the desert? No, you haven't.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06046_.mp3: Hell, I married her. Ha ha ha! No, no, seriously now, I had this friend that crossed Sith-space and got stripped of everything.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06047_.mp3: It's not like I have much now, I guess, but I still prefer Sand People to getting ambushed on unproven trade routes.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06049_.mp3: Ah, she doesn't understand me. You know the drill. It's not my fault; she knew who I was when she married me.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06051_.mp3: Uptight and cold, like my wife. They don't like me streamlining the hunt with droids. I don't fit in, but I don't let it bug me.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06052_.mp3: You know how it is, you don't take any backtalk either. I heard about you and Gurke. I should have you deal with my wife.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06054_.mp3: Ah, she doesn't understand me. You know the drill. It's not my fault; she knew who I was when she married me.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06055_.mp3: But I suppose you would want me to do whatever they say. I heard how you rolled over for Gurke and his boys.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06056_.mp3: That's not the way to establish yourself, you know? It's hard to earn respect here.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06057_.mp3: The Gamorreans are different. Good rowdy drinking buddies. Gurke and his boys, they understand that hunting is a business.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06058_.mp3: Of course, they hunt... other things than wraid too. Just don't turn your back on them. Ever.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06060_.mp3: Nothing, nothing at all. Just keep your eyes on them. That's all.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06062_.mp3: Dorak is reasonable. Komad is a pain, but he keeps his distance. I can tell he doesn't like me much.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06063_.mp3: Ask around the lodge if you want information about the other guys. I don't really talk to them much.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06066_.mp3: Again? Nothing has changed. It's all just as dirty and tedious as it was before.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06068_.mp3: Well, my name is Tanis and what I do is hunt. I'm sure you've heard of me... well, actually, I hope you haven't.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06070_.mp3: Well, darling, old Tanis might be just what you need. Unless you mean the dunes. I suppose only the Sand People really know them.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06071_.mp3: I'm sure I can help you. Ask away.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06072_.mp3: It's serious business. I'm sure I can help you through it.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06075_.mp3: Ooh, you're a sour one. Loosen up, we're all friends here.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06077_.mp3: Ah, the old girl doesn't understand me. Her loss. Now, you have questions about Sand People or something?
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06079_.mp3: Who knows the planet? I don't know. I guess the Sand People. I'm usually running when I see them, though.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06081_.mp3: Uh, sure, my blood. They almost got me last year. Tore up two of my battle droids. The wife was mad about that. Heh. Took her weeks to fix.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06082_.mp3: Where they got weapons to cut battle armor, I don't know. They act like animals, but they can surprise you.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06084_.mp3: I don't know. Pick a dune and walk, they'll get you soon enough.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06086_.mp3: Smart traders. They've salvaged and sold me my own damaged droids once or twice.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06087_.mp3: They don't say much I can understand. I think they're a little slow, but who am I to judge, huh? Ha!
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06089_.mp3: You hurry back any old time, darling. Anytime.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06092_.mp3: I'll answer, but since when do you swoop riders show much interest in anything besides speed?
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06093_.mp3: Everyone is looking for something, I suppose one of us should get it. Ask away.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06095_.mp3: Whoa, what did you say? You know, I come here because the guards stop your kind of trouble before it starts.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06097_.mp3: [Success] You seem like a good sort. Here, how about I buy you a few rounds?
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06098_.mp3: Wait... I never do that. Why... why does my head hurt? Something strange is going on here.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06099_.mp3: I'm leaving. I don't much like newcomers anyway.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06100_.mp3: [Failure] Uh, no I don't and no I don't. What do you think you are, a Jedi? Heh. That's a laugh.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06102_.mp3: Well, actually, they probably are, but I'll save you the trouble of testing it. I'm leaving.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06103_.mp3: I'm not wasting ammunition on a fight with you. I've wraid to hunt. We meet on the dunes... you watch out.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06105_.mp3: It's more annoying than anything. You shouldn't make threats you don't want returned. Bad move.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06106_.mp3: Well, hello dragon killer! I should have you deal with the wife. You know, because she's scary? Like a dragon? Ah, forget it.
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06108_.mp3: Hello again. Tired of the swoop track? What can I do for you?
Male_Tough_09.nm17ad03ta06110_.mp3: Hello again. Something else I can do for you? Slow night? Day? Whatever?

Male_Tough_10.nm03aabrej02006_.mp3: I, Brejik - leader of the Black Vulkars - am honored to award the victory prize to one of my own, once again proving the Vulkars are the premier gang of Taris!
Male_Tough_10.nm03aabrej02008_.mp3: Well done - through your skill and courage you have proven yourself the premier swoop rider and brought great glory to the Black Vulkars!
Male_Tough_10.nm03aabrej02010_.mp3: That's why it is with the greatest sadness that I have to inform you of a slight change in the prize I am offering for your victory.
Male_Tough_10.nm03aabrej02012_.mp3: When you hear what I have to say you'll understand. It seems the woman I offered up as a prize is more than just a Republic officer - she's actually a Jedi!
Male_Tough_10.nm03aabrej02014_.mp3: I've had to equip her with a neural disrupter collar to keep her mind in a state of unfocused confusion just to make sure she doesn't use her Force powers to escape.
Male_Tough_10.nm03aabrej02016_.mp3: Obviously, I can't turn her over to you - it would be far too dangerous to have a Jedi as a slave. But rest assured, I'll find some other way to compensate you for your victory.
Male_Tough_10.nm03aabrej02020_.mp3: You old fool! Your traditions are nothing to me - I am the wave of the future! If I want to withdraw the prize and sell this woman on the slave market myself, nobody can stop me!
Male_Tough_10.nm03aabrej02024_.mp3: What? Impossible! You were restrained by a neural disrupter collar! How could you possibly have summoned the will to free yourself?
Male_Tough_10.nm03aabrej02036_.mp3: People - hear me! Before I present the so called champion of the Beks with their prize there is something you must know: the winning rider cheated!
Male_Tough_10.nm03aabrej02038_.mp3: Your swoop bike was using a prototype accelerator - clearly an unfair advantage! Because of this Hidden Bek treachery I'm withdrawing the Vulkar's share of the victory prize!
Male_Tough_10.nm03afbrej04006_.mp3: I, Brejik - leader of the Black Vulkars - am honored to award the victory prize to one of my own, once again proving the Vulkars are the premier gang of Taris!
Male_Tough_10.nm03afbrej04008_.mp3: Well done - through your skill and courage you have proven yourself the premier swoop rider and brought great glory to the Black Vulkars!
Male_Tough_10.nm03afbrej04010_.mp3: That's why it is with the greatest sadness that I have to inform you of a slight change in the prize I am offering for your victory.
Male_Tough_10.nm03afbrej04012_.mp3: When you hear what I have to say you'll understand. It seems the woman I offered up as a prize is more than just a Republic officer - she's actually a Jedi!
Male_Tough_10.nm03afbrej04014_.mp3: I've had to equip her with a neural disruptor collar to keep her mind in a state of unfocused confusion just to make sure she doesn't use her Force powers to escape.
Male_Tough_10.nm03afbrej04016_.mp3: Obviously, I can't turn her over to you - it would be far too dangerous to have a Jedi as a slave. But rest assured, I'll find some other way to compensate you for your victory.
Male_Tough_10.nm03afbrej04020_.mp3: You old fool! Your traditions are nothing to me - I am the wave of the future! If I want to withdraw the prize and sell this woman on the slave market myself, nobody can stop me!
Male_Tough_10.nm03afbrej04024_.mp3: What? Impossible! You were restrained by a neural disruptor! How could you have possibly summoned the will to free yourself?
Male_Tough_10.nm03afbrej04028_.mp3: Vulkars - to me! Kill this woman! Kill the swoop rider! Kill them all!
Male_Tough_10.nm03afbrej04036_.mp3: People - hear me! Before I present the so called champion of the Beks with their prize there is something you must know: the winning rider cheated!
Male_Tough_10.nm03afbrej04038_.mp3: Your swoop bike was using a prototype accelerator - clearly an unfair advantage! Because of this Hidden Bek treachery I'm withdrawing the Vulkar's share of the victory prize!

Male_Tough_12.nm26absith14000_.mp3: Go away. You would regret the only other option.
Male_Tough_12.nm26absith14001_.mp3: What do you want, rail-rat? I don't have the time or desire to bother speaking with wandering idiots.
Male_Tough_12.nm26absith14002_.mp3: Go talk with your adoring fans over at the swoop races. I'm sure they fawn all over their beloved Sector Champion.
Male_Tough_12.nm26absith14003_.mp3: You're probably another race fan in a fool's stupor after that big win by local whelp Queedle Molta.
Male_Tough_12.nm26absith14004_.mp3: Go join the other transients in the swoop race area. At least you'll all be contained.
Male_Tough_12.nm26absith14006_.mp3: I will get tired of your voice in short order, so make it quick.
Male_Tough_12.nm26absith14008_.mp3: You're the Sector Champion; you know the races inside and out. Why ask me? Are you trying to worm a compliment out of me?
Male_Tough_12.nm26absith14009_.mp3: Nothing about the current state of the races make me want to watch. Especially if it means associating with the cattle grouped in there now.
Male_Tough_12.nm26absith14011_.mp3: I admire the mercenary spirit of Casandra Mateil. Other than that, no one.
Male_Tough_12.nm26absith14013_.mp3: She does have... other qualities as well.
Male_Tough_12.nm26absith14015_.mp3: Hurry it up. This is a poor use of my time. You should know not to annoy one of my kind.
Male_Tough_12.nm26absith14016_.mp3: Our Taris campaign killed the giants of the sport. The current racers are hardly inspiring. An Aqualish champion? Hmph. Laughable.
Male_Tough_12.nm26absith14018_.mp3: Grow some gills and swim the planet yourself. There's no substitute for personal experience. I have nothing else to say on the subject.
Male_Tough_12.nm26absith14020_.mp3: Good. This visit was dragging on.
Male_Tough_12.nm26absith14022_.mp3: Hostile? I would consider this the height of calm for dealing with insects like yourself. If I were hostile, you'd be dead.
Male_Tough_12.nm26absith14024_.mp3: Yes, Manaan is a very unsatisfying world for settling disagreements. The Selkath are very insistant that even words are not used as weapons.
Male_Tough_12.nm26absith14025_.mp3: Since we both refuse to initiate a violent event, you'll have to accept my contempt-filled dismissal, and hope we don't meet again.
Male_Tough_12.nm26absith14028_.mp3: Why are you back again? I didn't show enough disinterest the first time around? You really shouldn't pester a soldier of the Sith.
Male_Tough_12.nm26absith14029_.mp3: Go look for fans over at the swoop races, Sector Champion. I'm sure they'll give you what your looking for.
Male_Tough_12.nm26absith14030_.mp3: I shouldn't expect you to listen. You're probably just another open-mouthed fool here for the swoop races.
Male_Tough_12.nm28aamerc03081_.mp3: You just got lucky! Or... or it's waiting for me to go back before eating me!
Male_Tough_12.nm35aasith11000_.mp3: If you're here to use the dueling room, go ahead. I'm through with it, for the moment.
Male_Tough_12.nm35aasith11002_.mp3: This is where you get to hone your killing styles. We get sent captives all the time to practice on. It's very handy.
Male_Tough_12.nm35aasith11004_.mp3: Why? It'd be a waste just to execute them. At least this way they're useful.
Male_Tough_12.nm35aasith11006_.mp3: You only get so many before the terminal cuts you off. Some of the students are a little bloodthirsty and get carried away, after all.
Male_Tough_12.nm35aasith11008_.mp3: [Failure] Don't be foolish. If Uthar wants to send an order like that, he can bloody well tell me himself.
Male_Tough_12.nm35aasith11011_.mp3: [Success] Hmmm... I knew something was up when Yuthura showed up and claimed control of the academy. Uthar must be planning a fight.
Male_Tough_12.nm35aasith11013_.mp3: [Failure] Don't be foolish. If Master Yuthura wants to send an order like that, she can bloody well tell me herself.
Male_Tough_12.nm35aasith11016_.mp3: [Success] But... Master Uthar is missing. There's no way for me to confirm that!
Male_Tough_12.nm35aasith11018_.mp3: Hmmm. Something big must be up, indeed. Is the Republic about to attack Korriban?
Male_Tough_12.nm35aasith11020_.mp3: Well, you go back to wherever Master Uthar is and tell him I'm on it. I'll get these prisoners out of the academy pronto!
Male_Tough_12.nm35aasith11023_.mp3: Just go to the computer console and open up one of the cages. And don't be wasteful... we only get so many captives a month, you know.
Male_Tough_12.nm35aasith11025_.mp3: No thanks. I'm pretty bushed right now. Maybe later.
Male_Tough_12.nm35aasith12031_.mp3: Isn't that what you're interested in? Although I suppose you could also keep it...
Male_Tough_12.nm35aasith12037_.mp3: Still working to earn prestige, are you?

Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08000_.mp3: Ah so you managed to come after all. I see you brought friends.
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08002_.mp3: Ha! Indeed I did. I foresaw that you might need help so I arranged a distraction.
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08004_.mp3: I do not need to hear your excuses, Jedi! I know why he brought you!
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08005_.mp3: Enough of this talk, Jagi! Let us do what we came here to do.
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08009_.mp3: We both know the stakes here, and we both know what we must do. It is only in death that this can end.
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08011_.mp3: Yes, but children who can... er... what?! You do not know what you're talking about, Jedi!
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08015_.mp3: I speak truth! And honor is the question here! The deaths of my comrades, your warriors, is a debt in blood that can only be paid by you.
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08016_.mp3: When you saw prospects for glory, you abandoned the plan and left us to die surrounded by enemies!
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08018_.mp3: In the battle above the world of Althir, he ordered us to attack the enemy flank, promising us support.
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08019_.mp3: But when he saw better prospects for his own glory, he abandoned us and left us to die surrounded by enemies!
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08021_.mp3: It would still have been won! You sent your own men to die there Canderous. I cannot forgive you for what you did to us! You will pay!
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08026_.mp3: You coward! You glory hunter! You were given direct orders and were part of a plan! You had a responsibility to us!
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08031_.mp3: He left us to die when his responsibility was to us! Instead he went hunting more glory for himsefl!
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08034_.mp3: They do... I know that, but he did not have to abandon us! He should have stayed with the plan!
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08036_.mp3: He cost us ours! But... but I do see you point...
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08037_.mp3: But... Why did you have to leave us there to die while you chased glory somewhere else?
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08040_.mp3: No! I... I... I see that I have been wrong. I have not been true to the teachings of Mandalore.
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08041_.mp3: You were right. I was wrong to question your honor. But I must now cleanse mine with my life.
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08050_.mp3: Then you know we must end this now.
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08052_.mp3: I have had enough of your prattle, Jedi! This is between Canderous and I.
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08053_.mp3: And we shall settle this now once and for all.
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08055_.mp3: [Success] Yes... I... do not want to fight...
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08057_.mp3: You... Wha? You tried to manipulate my mind with your devious Jedi powers! I cannot tolerate any interference!
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08058_.mp3: You shall die for that, Jedi!
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08059_.mp3: [Failure] Don't try you mind tricks on me! A true Mandalore is too strong for that!
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08060_.mp3: And now you shall die for the attempt!
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08066_.mp3: Big words from such a small human. But I know why he brought you here, and you shall regret his choice!
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08067_.mp3: Ah, so we meet again, Canderous. It has been quite a long time.
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08071_.mp3: You thought I was dead, didn't you! You thought all of us that you had sent on that attack had perished!
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08072_.mp3: You sent us to die in a foolish attack while you directed your forces elsewhere!
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08076_.mp3: The battle would have been won anyway! I am tired of your excuses, Canderous.
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08077_.mp3: I have spent years tracking you down since the clans were banished, and I will not rest until I have had my vengeance!
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08079_.mp3: I challenge you Canderous. I challenge you to fight the fight you fled that day above Althir.
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08080_.mp3: In the dune seas of Tatooine, I will be waiting for you. I have spread the news of the challenge since I learned you had landed on this world.
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08081_.mp3: All the surviving Mandalorian clans know of what I do here, and that we shall meet on Tatooine to settle this debt of vengeance once and for all.
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08082_.mp3: If you fail to meet me there, you shall be stripped of all honor and forever cast out of our society!
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08083_.mp3: It will be you and me alone in the dune seas of Tatooine: a final battle that can only end in death.
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08084_.mp3: I shall be waiting for you there, Canderous.
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08086_.mp3: I am not afraid of you. And if you choose, you can die by his side as well!
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08088_.mp3: That does not excuse what he did to us!
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08090_.mp3: I alone realized what was happening and managed to escape the trap before it closed. The trap he set for his own men!
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08093_.mp3: I have business with Canderous that does not concern you, Jedi.
Male_Tough_13.nm13aajagi08095_.mp3: Employer? You've sunk that low, have you? So much for the vaunted Mandalorian honor you used to espouse.

Male_Tough_14.nm44aadark02003_.mp3: We have sworn allegiance to Malak. He has led the Sith to conquest and victory. Your time is over, Revan!
Male_Tough_14.nm44aadark02005_.mp3: You are not fit to rule the Sith anymore, Revan. Darth Malak will reward us greatly for destroying you!
Male_Tough_14.nm45aadrkj03000_.mp3: Bastila! You were a fool to betray the Master... and an even bigger fool to return to the Star Forge.
Male_Tough_14.nm45aadrkj03002_.mp3: Revan is nothing! Malak earned the title of Dark Lord by defeating his old Master - and now I will become Malak's new apprentice by doing the same!

Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08003_.mp3: Poor fellow, he's been waiting for his friends to return with my money for a standard month now. Ah, but you don't need to hear of this. What can I get you?
Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08006_.mp3: It is nothing, I'm certain. Eh... just garbage from the forest floor.
Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08010_.mp3: Well... that is... eh... it's not how it looks. You see, a good mechanic is hard to find and...
Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08019_.mp3: Where? Ah, you mean the lower forest? I don't pay attention to what these Wookiees call it. A droid you say?
Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08021_.mp3: Now, now, Matton, it's likely just some old service droid lost by the Czerka Corporation. I wouldn't waste my time on it.
Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08023_.mp3: I doubt it. I don't even want to look at it. I deal in trade of goods, not garbage.
Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08026_.mp3: You startle my friend here needlessly. He has work to do and I won't have any more talk of this upsetting him. Understand?
Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08029_.mp3: You get excited over hearsay. There is no droid, no proof of anything. Get back to work.
Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08031_.mp3: Yes, maybe I have something of interest. I know your tastes are fine. I recognize you as race champion of Manaan.
Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08032_.mp3: Have a look, but if you see kolto, the price is not negotiable. My prices have risen like everywhere else.
Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08033_.mp3: Of course. You are in a hurry.
Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08034_.mp3: Certainly, though my stock may be a little thin. I'm having trouble with a trade contact on Korriban.
Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08036_.mp3: I know I'll be leaving soon. it's too unstable now. Maybe I could talk my way into dealing with the Wookiees, but it's risky.
Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08040_.mp3: I don't concern myself with what goes on past this landing port. The Wookiees are *ahem*... very difficult to deal with. No business sense.
Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08045_.mp3: No, I mean they don't respect the finer points of a good business plan. Give and take. That is why the Czerka Corporation simply takes.
Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08049_.mp3: Enslave? I resent that. Simply fair business. This man's fellows left without settling their debts, so he must make up the difference.
Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08051_.mp3: Yes, very sad that they would abandon you, especially while you were doing me a favor and helping repair one of my freighters.
Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08053_.mp3: You think you know someone, and they turn out to be a cheat. Oh, not like you, Matton. You honor your deals. A word is a bond in trade.
Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08055_.mp3: Ah, it happens from time to time. Credits are scarce out here, and not everyone is as honest as Mister Dasol here.
Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08059_.mp3: Of course they will. Until then, however, I can make use of you as a mechanic. Very rare to find skills of your kind out here.
Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08061_.mp3: Oh, it isn't about the amount. After all, as a skilled mechanic, Matton is worth much more than what is owed. Especially on this remote planet.
Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08069_.mp3: Of course. I am here to serve.
Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08072_.mp3: See you soon, I hope. Always open.
Male_Tough_15.nm22aaelix08073_.mp3: Hello again. What can I do for you, most valued customer?

Male_Tough_16.nm17af07of08000_.mp3: Our business has nothing to do with you, spacer.
Male_Tough_16.nm17af07of08001_.mp3: Go to the Czerka offices if you want a job. I'm off duty.
Male_Tough_16.nm17af07of08002_.mp3: Should have been a wraid hunter. I hate this uniform.
Male_Tough_16.nm17af07of08003_.mp3: How are the Sand People doing so much damage? Blasters beat gaffi sticks, don't they?
Male_Tough_16.nm17af07of08004_.mp3: Maybe the Sith will give us more support here on Tatooine. Couldn't get worse.
Male_Tough_16.nm17af07of08005_.mp3: The sooner I get out of this dustbowl, the better.
Male_Tough_16.nm17af07of08006_.mp3: Czerka Corporation should just close this whole place down. Heh. Who would miss it?
Male_Tough_16.nm17af07of08007_.mp3: I've enough to worry about with my mining quotas, I don't have time for you.

Male_Tough_17.nm26aavigl28000_.mp3: Hey, man, clear out. You're cramping my style with the ladies.
Male_Tough_17.nm26aavigl28001_.mp3: Say, you must be new around here. My name is Viglo. You don't look like those Republic scum, and you aren't one of us Sith. So, what brings you to Manaan?
Male_Tough_17.nm26aavigl28003_.mp3: Some of the other soldiers like to go and bet on the swoops on their days off, but this planet is bad enough without mingling with the locals.
Male_Tough_17.nm26aavigl28005_.mp3: Well, you picked a real stinkhole to stop at. Republic soldiers are everywhere, those arrogant Selkath treating us Sith like we're second-class citizens.
Male_Tough_17.nm26aavigl28006_.mp3: I wish we could bomb this ocean world into a desert, but we need that kolto for our Sith troops. Man, I hate this place.
Male_Tough_17.nm26aavigl28008_.mp3: You some kind of historian? You should look to the future, not the past. That's why I joined the Sith. And then I get stuck on Manaan - worst post in the galaxy!
Male_Tough_17.nm26aavigl28009_.mp3: It isn't easy here, you know. Not with all the Republic soldiers walking the streets while we sit and do nothing. Malak should send a fleet in and conquer this whole sector, kolto or no!
Male_Tough_17.nm26aavigl28010_.mp3: But I don't really want to talk about that right now. I'm just here to have a couple drinks and try to unwind, you know?
Male_Tough_17.nm26aavigl28012_.mp3: Sure, pull up a seat. I'll have the bartender ring us up a couple mugs of the local favorite. It's called a firaxian tooth.
Male_Tough_17.nm26aavigl28013_.mp3: Watch out for these - they pack quite the bite. Two or three of these babies and you won't even remember who you are.
Male_Tough_17.nm26aavigl28014_.mp3: Whoa - that's good stuff! Maybe even better than Kessel spice, am I right?
Male_Tough_17.nm26aavigl28016_.mp3: I better take it easy - I've got a shift tomorrow and I don't want to end up passed out on the floor.
Male_Tough_17.nm26aavigl28019_.mp3: Oh, that's good stuff. Really takes the edge off, know what I mean? Whoa, feeling a little light-headed, there.
Male_Tough_17.nm26aavigl28026_.mp3: [Failure] I better not. You don't even want to know what the punishment is if one of us Sith shows up for a shift drunk or hungover.
Male_Tough_17.nm26aavigl28040_.mp3: We Sith are interested in lots of stuff. You'd be smart to keep your nose out of Sith business.
Male_Tough_17.nm26aavigl28046_.mp3: Perhapsh we should make our acquaintensh more intimate. I know a little motel jus' around the corner... (burp) 'schuse me, mish.
Male_Tough_17.nm26aavigl28064_.mp3: Oh... head hurts... eyes bleary... must get back to embassy... find bed.
Male_Tough_17.nm26aavigl28065_.mp3: Oh, you're back. You going to stick around this time? Or did I offend you?
Male_Tough_17.nm26aavigl28066_.mp3: I probably should cut back on the drinking, but it's a good way to relax. There's a lot of tension here on Manaan.
Male_Tough_17.nm26aavigl28067_.mp3: I think I was a little drunk there earlier, but I'm better now. This Selkath brew wears off pretty fast.

Male_Tough_18.nm27aasith07000_.mp3: How did you get in here? Wait - I recognize you!
Male_Tough_18.nm27aasith07002_.mp3: Lord Malak was most displeased when he learned you had escaped Taris alive! He has promised a great reward to whoever destroys you.
Male_Tough_18.nm27aasith07012_.mp3: As you wish, my eager apprentices. We shall remove this thorn from Malak's side once and for all!

Mandalorian_01.nm25aamand04000_.mp3: You have interrupted our hunt, interloper. The inhabitants of this world could do little against us, but you appear to be a threat.
Mandalorian_01.nm25aamand04004_.mp3: Has something happened to put fire in your people? Are you no longer slaves? It doesn't matter. You will die like the others!
Mandalorian_01.nm25aamand04006_.mp3: You are nothing! Your people are sheep! I fear no slave! Especially willing ones!
Mandalorian_01.nm25aamand04010_.mp3: Another Mandalore, is it? Will you draw arms against those you would serve? We'll see who lives this day!
Mandalorian_01.nm25aamand04012_.mp3: Our training here will continue... without your interference.

Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06000_.mp3: I am not for hire. Perhaps the Mandalorian or the Echani can help you - though they lack the stomach for certain jobs.
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06002_.mp3: Ask whatever you wish - though you may find some of my answers distasteful.
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06004_.mp3: Perhaps you should ask them. The Republic prefers not to deal with my kind... though maybe they need an Iridorian to finish the job.
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06005_.mp3: The mercenaries they hire must be failing, as they are never heard from again. That is all I know. Is there more you wish to ask?
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06007_.mp3: Perhaps - but my business with the Selkath is my own.
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06009_.mp3: [Success] An Iridorian has no friends! Though I feel a strange kinship with you - you do not seem like the others of this world. Even the Sith here do not understand our kind.
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06011_.mp3: I have no fear of the fish people or their laws. There is no evidence I have done anything wrong. You will not learn my business this way.
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06013_.mp3: This is the way of this water world, is it not? Pathetic creatures bargaining with credits for what they cannot seize through strength. My people are warriors, not snivelling merchants.
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06014_.mp3: But perhaps this world has made me soft. I will play this role, distasteful as it is. For 500 credits, I will tell you what you wish to know.
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06017_.mp3: I humble myself to change information for mere credits, and you insult me with this game of offers and counter offers? On my home world such insult would result in death!
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06019_.mp3: I am of sterner stuff, human. I seek blood and death and my reward is the taste of my enemy's fear. Take your credits elsewhere... my price is too high for the likes of you.
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06021_.mp3: [Success] You speak the blunt and brutal language of my people. We share the love of death and bloodshed. But we are a rare breed on this planet. Even the Sith here are as weak as the cowardly fish people.
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06022_.mp3: The Sith sought to buy my loyalty with credits... as if wealth could somehow quench my burning bloodlust! They would have been better off hiring an Echani for the errands they had me running.
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06024_.mp3: The task paid well, but was boring and beneath me. I was told to lure the Selkath youth to the Sith Embassy, nothing more. I lied, I threatened, I promised... and I brought the most promising youth of the fish people to the Sith.
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06026_.mp3: And there I left them. To what purpose I neither know, nor care. Perhaps when the Sith learn I have betrayed their secret they will try to kill me. I would welcome the excitement.
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06027_.mp3: Is there more you would ask of me, human?
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06028_.mp3: [Failure] Your threats are mere words, nothing more. Here on Manaan such bloodshed is not permitted - as I have been told time and time again.
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06030_.mp3: I tire of this conversation and I tire of your company, human. In fact, I tire of this entire weakling world - the air reeks of sea salt and the fawning cowardice of the fish people!
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06032_.mp3: On my world those too weak to defend themselves deserve to die. A murder is justified if you have the strength to kill your victim. Is there anything else you would know?
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06034_.mp3: Manaan has no such things, unless the Selkath have them hidden away at the bottom of the ocean. Is there more you would know?
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06036_.mp3: They lack the resolve to do what needs to be done. The Echani believe in a non-existent warrior code of honor, and the Mandalorians prize credits above bloodshed.
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06037_.mp3: But I am Iridorian. Honor comes from slaying your opponent, and the true reward of any job is the taste of your foe's dying blood on your tongue.
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06039_.mp3: Why do you care? There are other mercenaries you can hire. Though I suggest you act quickly - the Republic seems to be in desperate need of mercenaries right now.
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06040_.mp3: Though not so desperate they have asked for my help as of yet. They prefer the simpering, submissive type - like the Mandalorian and the Echani.
Mandalorian_02.nm26aairim06042_.mp3: I am not surprised. There are few on this watery world who feel comfortable in my presence.

Mandalorian_03.nm25aabike01002_.mp3: You have interrupted our hunt, interloper. The inhabitants of this world could do little against us, but you appear to be a threat.
Mandalorian_03.nm25aabike01004_.mp3: Has something happened to put fire in your people? Are you no longer slaves? It doesn't matter. You will die like the others!
Mandalorian_03.nm25aabike01005_.mp3: You are nothing! Your people are sheep! I fear no slave! Especially willing ones!
Mandalorian_03.nm25aabike01007_.mp3: Another Mandalore, is it? Will you draw arms against those you should serve? We'll see who lives this day!
Mandalorian_03.nm25aabike01008_.mp3: Our training here will continue... without your interference.

Mandalorian_04.nm14acsher09000_.mp3: Ah, so this is the meddler. You have caused us far too much trouble for a mere Jedi.
Mandalorian_04.nm14acsher09002_.mp3: I will add your head to those of the other Jedi I have killed, and take yet another lightsaber for my own! Now you will know why the Mandalorians are feared!

MasterDorak.nm13aadora08000_.mp3: Ah, you have come, young apprentice, at Master Zhar's bidding. He sees great promise in you... as do I.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08001_.mp3: The time has come for you to choose the color of your lightsaber. This color also reflects your demeanor and position within the Order.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08003_.mp3: Blue is the color of the Jedi Guardian. This Jedi battles against the forces of evil and the dark side. They focus more on combat training and use of the lightsaber.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08004_.mp3: Yellow is the color of the Jedi Sentinel. This Jedi ferrets out deceit and injustice, bringing it to light. They focus less on combat and more on other skills and abilities.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08005_.mp3: Green is the color of the Jedi Consular. This Jedi seeks to bring balance to the universe. They mediate between other groups, using their powers to end conflict and preserve peace.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08006_.mp3: Which color and path do you believe yourself most suited to, apprentice?
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08008_.mp3: Indeed. We shall see. I will now ask you questions, and your responses will indicate which class you lean most towards.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08009_.mp3: A woman and her small child are beset by a desperate-looking group of thugs. They are menacing her with weapons and she screams to you for help. What do you do?
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08011_.mp3: Hm... Indeed. Very well, on to the next question.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08012_.mp3: You are in combat with a Dark Jedi allied with the Sith. There is a pause in the combat. What do you do?
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08014_.mp3: Yes, I suspected as much. Now for the next question.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08015_.mp3: There is a locked door and your goal lies on the other side. What do you do?
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08018_.mp3: I am beginning to see a pattern here, apprentice. I have a feeling about what you would be best at. But first, the final question.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08019_.mp3: You are the head of an Enclave on a contested world. The Dark Jedi have infiltrated and are causing unrest across the planet. What do you do?
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08022_.mp3: As I suspected, you would be most suitable as a Jedi Guardian.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08023_.mp3: Here is a blue crystal for your lightsaber. Go speak to Master Zhar again and he will instruct you in how to construct it.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08024_.mp3: As I suspected, you would be most suitable as a Jedi Sentinel.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08025_.mp3: Here is a yellow crystal for your lightsaber. Go speak to Master Zhar again and he will instruct you in how to construct it.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08026_.mp3: As I suspected, you would be most suitable as a Jedi Consular.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08027_.mp3: Here is a green crystal for your lightsaber. Go speak to Master Zhar again and he will instruct you in how to construct it.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08039_.mp3: A Jedi is not restricted to a single color. Rather, that color is a badge of pride for the Jedi path it signifies. Should you have an appropriate crystal, you may change your blade to anything you desire.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08040_.mp3: But first you should learn of the different paths a Jedi may take.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08041_.mp3: Padawan, I must speak with you. You are now one of the Jedi, an Order with a long and glorious past... a past we should all be aware of.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08042_.mp3: As a chronicler of the Academy here on Dantooine, I feel it is my duty to share the history of our Order with the newly initiated. Unfortunately, our recent history is one of tragedy and bloodshed.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08043_.mp3: The Mandalorian Wars, the fall of Revan and Malak, the rise of the Sith: there are important lessons to be learned from these events if we do not wish to repeat the mistakes of our past.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08045_.mp3: Of course I could not tell you the entire history of our Order; the Jedi have existed for thousands upon thousands of years. We are as old as the Republic itself.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08046_.mp3: Instead, I will begin forty years ago with the war of Exar Kun. Like Malak and Revan, Exar Kun was a Jedi who fell to the dark side and led an army against the Jedi and the Republic.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08047_.mp3: Exar Kun was defeated, but the war left both the Republic and our own Order severely weakened. For twenty years we struggled to rebuild, trying to erase the scars of the terrible conflict.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08049_.mp3: All things in time. You shall learn that history is an intricate weaving of many events. No one thing can be understood without the proper context.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08051_.mp3: Twenty years ago the Mandalorians, aware the Republic was in a weakened state, began conquering small worlds on the Outer Rim. They were careful to choose only planets outside the Republic's jurisdiction.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08052_.mp3: After much debate, the Senate chose not to intervene. As long as the Mandalorians avoided planets that were members of the Republic itself, there would be no retaliation.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08054_.mp3: Well, you can hardly blame the Republic. The memory of war was fresh in everyone's mind, nobody was eager to relive the horrors in a campaign against the Mandalorians. But in the end it was unavoidable.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08057_.mp3: The Mandalorians stockpiled resources from their conquered worlds, preparing for a massive assault. Seven years ago they launched a simultaneous attack in three separate sectors of Republic space.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08058_.mp3: The Senate had no choice but to retaliate with the entire Republic fleet. The Mandalorian Wars had begun.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08060_.mp3: The Republic petitioned the Jedi Council for aid, but there were many factors to consider before we allowed ourselves to be drawn into another conflict so soon after the war with Exar Kun.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08061_.mp3: While the Jedi Council preached patience, there were many among our Order who were eager for us to join the battle. Two young Knights in particular demanded immediate action: Revan and Malak.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08062_.mp3: They rallied many of the Jedi to their cause and, against the wishes of their Masters, joined the Republic fleet battling the Mandalorians.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08063_.mp3: Revan was a brilliant military leader, and the Republic fleet began to win victory after victory. Four years ago the Mandalorians surrendered unconditionally.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08065_.mp3: No one is denying that Revan was one of the keys to defeating the Mandalorians... but something happened out there on the Outer Rim.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08066_.mp3: Instead of returning after the war's end, the ships under Revan's command went deep into unexplored space. They claimed to be searching for the last remnants of the Mandalorian fleet.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08067_.mp3: All contact was lost. For many months it was assumed some great disaster had befallen the entire fleet. Everyone thought they were dead.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08068_.mp3: There were unsubstantiated rumors of Revan and Malak being seen on a number of different planets during these months - scattered sightings that were never confirmed.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08070_.mp3: Perhaps they simply went far beyond the edges of Republic space. Maybe they found previously undiscovered hyperspace routes to the ends of the galaxy. Nobody knows for certain.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08071_.mp3: Three years ago, Revan and Malak returned at the head of a massive invasion fleet. Revan had assumed the title of Sith Lord; the hero had become a conqueror.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08073_.mp3: Some of the ships in the Sith fleet are those that were under Revan's command during the Mandalorian Wars. But many more are of an alien design we have never seen before.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08074_.mp3: The source of this massive fleet is one of the many things about the Sith we cannot explain. It seems impossible to have created it in such a short time, yet we cannot deny its existence.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08075_.mp3: The source of the Sith soldiers is, unfortunately, much easier to understand. Initially the bulk of the force were former Republic soldiers who had served under Revan.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08076_.mp3: With each conquest thousands more flocked to join the invaders, swelling their numbers. Even many of our own Order have betrayed us, lured by Sith promises of riches and power.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08078_.mp3: For two years the Sith were all but invincible. Fortunately, Bastila and her Battle Meditation allowed the Republic to win a few key victories and kept the Sith from total triumph.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08079_.mp3: In desperation we set a trap for the Dark Lord. Bastila was with the strike team that tried to capture Revan, as you probably know. She was there at Revan's end.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08080_.mp3: That was nearly a year ago, but things have not improved. Malak has stepped in and assumed the mantle of Dark Lord for himself, though he is far from Revan's equal in strategy or tactics.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08081_.mp3: Still, his fleet continues to grow in both ships and soldiers. If we do not find some way to stop the Sith soon, Malak will overwhelm us with sheer numbers.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08083_.mp3: Revan's tale shows us how even the greatest of Jedi can fall to the dark side. You must always be on guard against the evil that dwells within you. Think hard upon this lesson.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08085_.mp3: May the Force be with you.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08087_.mp3: Your confidence is admirable, but you must guard against pride and arrogance. These lead to the dark side.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08091_.mp3: Initially the bulk of the Sith force were former Republic soldiers who had served under Revan. With each conquest thousands more flocked to join the invaders, swelling their numbers.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08092_.mp3: Even many of our own Order have betrayed us, lured by Sith promises of riches and power. But what is more disturbing is the size of the Sith fleet itself.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08093_.mp3: Some of the ships in the Sith fleet are those that were under Revan's command during the Mandalorian Wars. But many more are of an alien design we have never seen before.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08094_.mp3: The source of this massive fleet is one of the many things about the Sith we cannot explain. It seems impossible to have created it in such a short time, yet we cannot deny its existence.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08097_.mp3: Revan and Malak were heroes, the great saviors of the Republic. A third of the Republic fleet was under their direct command... and then something happened.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08103_.mp3: All Jedi must know the code, its tenets are the fundamental teachings of our Order. Think and meditate on these truths, apprentice:
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08104_.mp3: There is no emotion; there is peace. There is no ignorance; there is knowledge. There is no passion; there is serenity. There is no chaos; there is harmony. There is no death; there is the Force.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08105_.mp3: Knowledge of the code will lead you to the rank of Padawan, and knowledge of the Order and its history will guide you down the path of the light.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08107_.mp3: This facility is a training academy. The archives here are restricted to those who have attained the rank of Master. We must protect overeager Padawans from being exposed to dangerous knowledge.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08108_.mp3: The pursuit of knowledge is a noble goal, but there are some things that require the wisdom of a Master to truly understand.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08109_.mp3: If you are seeking information on Revan, Malak and the Sith, I will gladly recount the recent history of our Order to you.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08111_.mp3: As you wish. I will not force you to hear what I have to say, though I think it is unwise to ignore the lessons of the past. Perhaps you can return when you have more time.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08112_.mp3: I bid you welcome once more. I assume you have come so that I might continue my recounting of the recent history of the Jedi Order.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08114_.mp3: It pleases me to see a student who understands the value of history. I shall resume where we last left off.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08115_.mp3: I have already told you of the war against Exar Kun and the damage it wrought upon the Republic and the Jedi Order. Even now we are still rebuilding from that terrible conflict.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08116_.mp3: When we last spoke I had just told you of the Mandalorian invasion of seven years ago. The Republic sent their entire fleet to do battle with this new threat.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08117_.mp3: I was telling you how Revan and Malak returned three years ago, at the head of a massive invasion fleet.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08118_.mp3: Greetings, young apprentice. Have you come seeking knowledge of the past? Those who do not learn from history are doomed to repeat it, or so they say.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08119_.mp3: Greetings, young Padawan. Have you come seeking knowledge of the past? Those who do not learn from history are doomed to repeat it, or so they say.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08120_.mp3: As Chronicler of the Academy here on Dantooine, I find your quest for knowledge admirable. But I do not want to overwhelm you with the long history of the Jedi Order.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08121_.mp3: You should ponder the history of Revan; it contains many lessons you may need if we hope to defeat Malak and the Sith.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08123_.mp3: Revan's tale shows us how even the greatest of Jedi can fall to the dark side. You must always be on guard against the evil that dwells within you. Think hard upon this lesson.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08125_.mp3: May the Force be with you.
MasterDorak.nm13aadora08127_.mp3: Your confidence is admirable, but you must guard against pride and arrogance. These lead to the dark side.
MasterDorak.nm13aavand17001_.mp3: These ruins have long been known to us, but we believed them to be merely burial mounds. Perhaps they are more than we first suspected, if Revan and Malak found something there.
MasterDorak.nm13aavand17019_.mp3: Perhaps there you will find some clue, some explanation, of how Revan and Malak were corrupted. And perhaps there you shall find a way to stop them.
MasterDorak.nm13aavand17179_.mp3: I have consulted our vast archives in an effort to discover the nature of this 'Star Forge', but all my efforts have been in vain.

Mission.nglobebant00023_.mp3: Hey, Carth. You're a pilot for the Republic, right? You've been all over the galaxy I bet, right? So tell me, how would you rate Taris compared to other worlds you've seen?
Mission.nglobebant00025_.mp3: Yeah, but that's only since the Sith occupation. Before that... well, I guess it wasn't all that different, really. Hmm... maybe Taris ain't as great as I thought, you know?
Mission.nglobebant00027_.mp3: Hey, I ain't no kid! And I look out for Zaalbar as much as he looks out for me. Big Z's my friend, not my babysitter! Geez, I come ask you a question and you give me a lecture!
Mission.nglobebant00031_.mp3: I don't have to listen to you, Carth! You ain't my father - though you're sure old enough to be! So keep your lectures inside your withered old head, 'cause I don't need 'em!
Mission.nglobebant00033_.mp3: Uh, hey Carth. Can I... can I talk to you for a second?
Mission.nglobebant00035_.mp3: Tantrum? I'm trying to apologize, you nerf-herder! Uh... I mean... I'm sorry. I didn't mean to get mad at you. It's just that I'm sick of everyone treating me like I'm a helpless kid.
Mission.nglobebant00039_.mp3: You really mean it, don't you? Nobody's ever said anything like that to me before, not even Big Z. He might think it, but he's not really one for words, you know. Thanks, Carth.
Mission.nglobebant00041_.mp3: Kids are like that?? Listen you... oh, I get it. Okay, you got me. You're pretty funny, Carth. For an old guy. Come on, you geezer - let's get back to what we were doing.
Mission.nglobebant00064_.mp3: Hey, Big Z, we've got to do something about your breath.  I didn't want to say anything, but it's bad. Worse than usual, which is hard to believe.
Mission.nglobebant00065_.mp3: In fact, now that I think about it, your breath has been pretty rancid ever since we rescued you from those Gammorean slavers. What did they feed you, buddy?
Mission.nglobebant00067_.mp3: Oh, Zaalbar, that's terrible! I know how grouchy you get if you don't get your eight square meals a day. I'm amazed you didn't pass out from hunger.
Mission.nglobebant00069_.mp3: Ewww! No wonder your breath is so bad, Big Z. Gammoreans smell like bantha poo-doo! We'll have to pick you up a toothbrush to clean that stench out of your choppers.
Mission.nglobebant00071_.mp3: Okay, relax. No toothbrush. Sheesh. Just try to eat something else to cover up that smell, okay? Stay away from anything that's smart enough to lock you in a cage this time.
Mission.nglobebant00073_.mp3: Hey, Big Z. Don't take this the wrong way, but lately I've noticed you're starting to look a little bit scruffy.
Mission.nglobebant00075_.mp3: No, I'm not suggesting a bath. I know how well that went over last time. But your hair's getting all tangled. And if you look close, you can see a few gray strands starting to poke through.
Mission.nglobebant00079_.mp3: Don't worry, Big Z. It's nothing I can't fix. A little trim, a splash of coloring and you'll be as good as new. Best looking Wookiee on the planet. Maybe a nice suit...
Mission.nglobebant00081_.mp3: I know Wookiees aren't into the whole clothing thing, but you could start a whole new trend! You'd be on the cutting edge.
Mission.nglobebant00083_.mp3: Okay, okay. Sheesh. Try to offer some constructive criticism and this is the thanks I get? Let's move on. You can just stay naked and scruffy for all I care.
Mission.nglobebant00084_.mp3: Hey, Bastila. You ever just use the Force for fun? You know, a little jolt of the Force to trip some jerk who's ticking you off?
Mission.nglobebant00086_.mp3: Ah, come on. There's got to be times when you've thought about it. Don't be so stuck up - you can tell me.
Mission.nglobebant00088_.mp3: Childish? Is that a crack about my age? You ain't much older than me, miss high and mighty! Just 'cause you're some Jedi doesn't mean you can be a prissy little...
Mission.nglobebant00089_.mp3: What the -?? Hey, that wasn't funny!
Mission.nglobelena12002_.mp3: Lena? What... what are you doing here? Where's Griff?
Mission.nglobelena12006_.mp3: Don't you start trashing my brother, you cantina rat! Take that back or I'll smack you so hard your head-tails will pop off!
