Ordo.nm13aacand03012_.mp3: Thanks for what you did, whatever your intentions might have been. I just need... time.
Ordo.nm13aacand03015_.mp3: *grunt* Yeah, I know about Taris. I wasted the last two years in this rat-hole working for Davik.
Ordo.nm13aacand03016_.mp3: I suppose an accurate way to describe this place would be 'cesspool' or 'dump'.
Ordo.nm13aacand03017_.mp3: You got the rich people on top, the poor people being crushed underneath, and people like me trying to make a living doing the crushing.
Ordo.nm13aacand03018_.mp3: It's not exactly what you'd call spiritually fulfilling work, but it gets the bills paid. And on Taris, money can go a long way to making things easier.
Ordo.nm13aacand03019_.mp3: You have anything else you want to ask?
Ordo.nm13aacand03020_.mp3: From what we saw from space this world doesn't have a lot of people. I couldn't really have found much work here anyway, so I never had an interest.
Ordo.nm13aacand03021_.mp3: It looks like a farm world. The Republic has thousands of these places - ones that get by farming crops and hunting herds of native beasts.
Ordo.nm13aacand03022_.mp3: But I might have underestimated this place. It seems to be more than I had thought.
Ordo.nm13aacand03023_.mp3: Water worlds never had much of an appeal for us to conquer. They may put up a good fight in their own environment - no match for us, of course - but they don't really have anything of value either.
Ordo.nm13aacand03024_.mp3: The thing this world is good for is a substance known as Kolto. Kolto is the single best healing substance in the galaxy.
Ordo.nm13aacand03025_.mp3: But the Mandalore are not as weak and fragile as your Republic and Sith warriors. When we enter battle, we carry weapons powerful enough to pulverize cities.
Ordo.nm13aacand03026_.mp3: Both in our wars, and in our own personal combats, there are no survivors. So Kolto does not hold the appeal it does for your peoples.
Ordo.nm13aacand03027_.mp3: Well... It has big trees - in case your eyes don't work anymore. But I do know that there is one exceptional race on this world: the Wookiees.
Ordo.nm13aacand03028_.mp3: The Wookiees, although primitive compared to us, are surprisingly capable warriors. They're pretty strong and pick up combat techniques pretty quick.
Ordo.nm13aacand03029_.mp3: I think they're more than a match for the average Republic or Sith trooper. When we were looking for targets, we considered this world carefully.
Ordo.nm13aacand03030_.mp3: We were wondering if we'd have to use larger weapons than our war droids if we wanted to clear the damn forests so we could fight in the open.
Ordo.nm13aacand03031_.mp3: Too many trees means they can go into hiding too easy. And what's a continent or two turned to glass if we get the whole world after.
Ordo.nm13aacand03032_.mp3: Tatooine is one big desert with rocks sticking out. I heard that some of my people came here after the war, but I don't know what happened to them.
Ordo.nm13aacand03033_.mp3: The world of my clan - Ordo - was much like this. Dust basins and rock crags. But my world at least has some green around the equator - this place is just sand all over.
Ordo.nm13aacand03034_.mp3: There are some vicious people on this world, but the desert is the real enemy. Trips out in the desert - especially the deep desert - should be taken very carefully.
Ordo.nm13aacand03035_.mp3: Korriban is a Sith world, that's for sure. I mean, just look at this place.
Ordo.nm13aacand03036_.mp3: When we were fighting with the Republic with the Sith, this was one of the major staging points for the invasion.
Ordo.nm13aacand03037_.mp3: We were never allowed to land our troops on the world though, so we never knew what the Sith really do here.
Ordo.nm13aacand03038_.mp3: Rumor has it that the leader of our clans at the time, Mandalore, did go down. They say the Sith perform terrible magics here.
Ordo.nm13aacand03039_.mp3: This world is... odd. It looks like a battlefield, but the environment here is lush and green. Whatever happened here was a long time ago.
Ordo.nm13aacand03040_.mp3: I have seen many strange worlds in my time, but this world is stranger still.
Ordo.nm13aacand03041_.mp3: I don't like this place. Something happened... or is happening here and I don't like it. We should get out of here as soon as possible.
Ordo.nm13aacand03043_.mp3: Ha! Stimulants make a warrior out of even the weakest human!
Ordo.nm13aacand03044_.mp3: Here's a speed boosting stimulant to help you get quicker.
Ordo.nm13aacand03046_.mp3: Here's a strength boosting stimulant to help you get stronger.
Ordo.nm13aacand03047_.mp3: Here's a stamina boosting stimulant to help you get tougher.
Ordo.nm13aacand03048_.mp3: Heh, don't worry I think you've got enough there as it is. You don't want to go overloading youself on stims, otherwise you might destroy your adrenal system.
Ordo.nm13aacand03049_.mp3: A real warrior knows his own limits and doesn't overestimate himself.
Ordo.nm13aacand03051_.mp3: You want to hear tales of my exploits? Of the wars I've seen and fought, the enemies I've seen die by my hand? Heh, sure, I'll humor you.
Ordo.nm13aacand03052_.mp3: My name's Canderous of the Mandalorian clan Ordo. I've been fighting across the galaxy for 40 of your years.
Ordo.nm13aacand03053_.mp3: For my people it's the honor and glory of battle that rules us. It's through combat that we prove our worth, gain renown and make our fortunes.
Ordo.nm13aacand03055_.mp3: Times have changed now. The Mandalore clans have been scattered across the Outer Rim, the Republic is in decline and the Sith Empire rises to take its place.
Ordo.nm13aacand03056_.mp3: The clans as they were aren't a threat, but the galaxy still fears us. Ha! People think we war out of spite, or bloodlust. They don't understand, and fear that.
Ordo.nm13aacand03057_.mp3: We only wanted the challenge of the battle, and glory from it - win or lose. And we lost.
Ordo.nm13aacand03058_.mp3: But now I have no real challenges. Crushing Davik's enemies and the pathetic gangs in the Lower City of Taris could not be considered the most glorious of tasks.
Ordo.nm13aacand03059_.mp3: When I think of the battles I've fought... the thousands I've killed... the worlds I've burned... I weep for my past.
Ordo.nm13aacand03060_.mp3: We'll never speak of this again. We've got work to do, so let's get to it.
Ordo.nm13aacand03062_.mp3: The Sith came to us with an offer: to fight a worthy enemy in a battle that would be remembered forever.
Ordo.nm13aacand03064_.mp3: Win or lose, as long as the fight is worthy, then honor is gained. The glory at having triumphed over impossible odds is what drives us.
Ordo.nm13aacand03065_.mp3: If there's nothing at stake - your possessions, your life, your world - then the battle's meaningless.
Ordo.nm13aacand03066_.mp3: We Mandalore take everything we are and throw it into battle. It's the true test of yourself - the battle against death... against oblivion.
Ordo.nm13aacand03068_.mp3: All life dies eventually. A true warrior is one who can beat it down whenever it raises its head. But...
Ordo.nm13aacand03070_.mp3: The days of combat and glory and cheating death at every turn seem to be over now... I take what I can.
Ordo.nm13aacand03072_.mp3: I was one of the best youth warriors in clan Ordo in my time. No one before me had mastered the power of our Basilisk war droids as quickly as I had. Except Mandalore himself of course.
Ordo.nm13aacand03073_.mp3: In those days we were sweeping across the Outer Rim. Destroying all who fought us.
Ordo.nm13aacand03074_.mp3: Young Mandalores would prove themselves in real combat with unknown opponents above a thousand worlds. Each brought back the story of his achievements.
Ordo.nm13aacand03076_.mp3: I remember it well, orbiting high above a placid world, its defenses just stirring. As was tradition, I would go ahead of the first wave to find enemies in the thickest fighting.
Ordo.nm13aacand03077_.mp3: I remember sitting there in my armor, linked directly with the Basilisk thrumming beneath me. My heart racing with fear at the coming battle.
Ordo.nm13aacand03080_.mp3: Every new warrior has to fear to understand how to beat it. You must know that.
Ordo.nm13aacand03081_.mp3: The doors opened in front me and the air was sucked out of the drop bay, scattering crystals of frozen vapor across my path.
Ordo.nm13aacand03082_.mp3: I can't describe what it feels like to look directly down at a world, falling continuously as you circle it, with barely fifteen centimeters of armor plate protecting you.
Ordo.nm13aacand03083_.mp3: When the magnetic locks disengaged on my droid I plunged out of the drop bay towards the battle that waited below.
Ordo.nm13aacand03085_.mp3: The exhilaration, the euphoria, I felt as I streaked into the atmosphere, dodging self-guided projectile and beam weapons, was unmatched.
Ordo.nm13aacand03086_.mp3: A 80 kilometer plunge through the atmosphere, dodging and weaving, the outside of my armor glowing like the sun with the heat of re-entry.
Ordo.nm13aacand03087_.mp3: And with barely thirty meters to spare, I twisted and skimmed the surface, firing at the giant beam generators that were in my path.
Ordo.nm13aacand03088_.mp3: The explosion from that sent shockwaves that levelled the entire complex around it. It was the moment of my life.
Ordo.nm13aacand03090_.mp3: I'll never forget those times. But... things are different now. We can't go on fighting the way we had. There are too few of us left now.
Ordo.nm13aacand03091_.mp3: But I don't really want to talk about this anymore. I trust I've satisfied your curiosity for now?
Ordo.nm13aacand03092_.mp3: Is there something else you want to know?
Ordo.nm13aacand03097_.mp3: I don't remember. It doesn't matter anyway, that world's dead now.
Ordo.nm13aacand03100_.mp3: Ha! We would travel from world to world, and descend on it in our Basilisk war droids. I still remember my first combat...
Ordo.nm13aacand03102_.mp3: We were still recovering from the war we fought with the Sith. We were not yet strong enough to fight the Republic again. We needed to train another generation to do that.
Ordo.nm13aacand03103_.mp3: You want another story, eh? You want to hear about some other world getting wasted? Heh, I knew you were the type.
Ordo.nm13aacand03104_.mp3: Your stagnant Republic has never seen some of the strange creatures and races we fought on the Outer Rim in those years. Heh, and you never will now.
Ordo.nm13aacand03106_.mp3: If a world isn't strong enough to defend itself, it's basically forfeit. But this story is about something a little different.
Ordo.nm13aacand03107_.mp3: We were going through the asteroid fields of the Crispin system at the very edge of the galaxy, playing with the pirates and smugglers we found there.
Ordo.nm13aacand03108_.mp3: The main belt in the Crispin system consists of mainly small rocks covered in frozen methane gas shells and the pirates were using them for cover.
Ordo.nm13aacand03109_.mp3: Ha! I remember using a thermal generator to cause the outer layer of one of the asteroids to vaporize in a picosecond. It blew out and shredded the three smugglers using it for cover!
Ordo.nm13aacand03112_.mp3: The asteroid I had targeted was smaller than most, maybe a dozen meters on a side. On the outside it looked the same as any other: just a ball covered in frozen gas.
Ordo.nm13aacand03113_.mp3: But something must have been inside it... something inactive in the cold. The heat of my blast might have triggered something or woken something up.
Ordo.nm13aacand03114_.mp3: After I had hit, spots of light and heat appeared all over the thin shell still covering it, evaporating the gases.
Ordo.nm13aacand03115_.mp3: What lay underneath looked like some sort of rocky growth... a deformed rock pitted by scores of micrometeorite scars. I think something even older might have been inside that.
Ordo.nm13aacand03119_.mp3: It started rotating - faster and faster as we watched it. After a second it started spraying fire - thermal projectiles that melted our armor like wax. We were caught completely by surprise.
Ordo.nm13aacand03120_.mp3: Before we could counter-attack, it fled at an incredible speed.
Ordo.nm13aacand03122_.mp3: We couldn't catch it, but we could follow its hyperspace wake.
Ordo.nm13aacand03123_.mp3: We followed its trail as far as we could, heading away from the galactic core. When it finally led beyond the edge of our galaxy, we abandoned our efforts.
Ordo.nm13aacand03124_.mp3: Anything that wants to commit suicide in that great void is not worth our trouble trying to catch.
Ordo.nm13aacand03125_.mp3: That's the only story I have for now. I'll tell you some more stuff later, if we get the chance.
Ordo.nm13aacand03129_.mp3: I don't have as many strange stories like the last one I told you, but I do have a couple about me and the stuff I've done.
Ordo.nm13aacand03130_.mp3: In one battle above the world of Althir, my unit managed to defeat a force of Althiri ten times our own size. That battle gained me command of an entire sub-sect of my clan.
Ordo.nm13aacand03132_.mp3: For five days they had managed to hold off our forces, keeping us to the outer rings of their world, preventing us from attacking it directly.
Ordo.nm13aacand03133_.mp3: My task was to assault one of their flanks with a false attack. The Althiri would be drawn out by the units I had sent in.
Ordo.nm13aacand03134_.mp3: Once they had surrounded those units, the bulk of my forces would attack from the rear and defeat them in detail.
Ordo.nm13aacand03136_.mp3: Things did not go as I had planned. I saw an opening - a mistake they had made in the disposition of their forces - and took it!
Ordo.nm13aacand03137_.mp3: While fending off our main force, they had let their fleet split in two! The center of their entire fleet was left exposed!
Ordo.nm13aacand03138_.mp3: I turned my forces and assaulted the center of their fleet, decimating them!
Ordo.nm13aacand03140_.mp3: Their slow, ponderous ship could not turn to face us without being overwhelmed. Their command vessels were destroyed in seconds. Their ranks were thrown into chaos.
Ordo.nm13aacand03141_.mp3: It was most amusing to watch the surviving ships scatter and flee. Several even tried to dive through the plane of the rings to escape us!
Ordo.nm13aacand03142_.mp3: They were shredded by the rings, or crashed into rocks, or were destroyed by our forces as we pursued them.
Ordo.nm13aacand03143_.mp3: Warriors do not flee from a battle if they are losing. They fight to the end! As we did against you.
Ordo.nm13aacand03144_.mp3: Warriors do not flee from a battle if they are losing. They fight to the end! As we did against your Jedi Revan.
Ordo.nm13aacand03145_.mp3: Another time maybe I'll tell you about how the war with the Republic went. For now let's just get on with things.
Ordo.nm13aacand03147_.mp3: This is a chance given to a warrior once or twice in a lifetime. The chance to change the course of history in a single act.
Ordo.nm13aacand03151_.mp3: They weren't stupid. Stupid races don't make starships and weapons of mass destruction. But they weren't masters of the arts of war as Mandalorians are.
Ordo.nm13aacand03154_.mp3: Ha! I was the best! Except for Mandalore of course. He was the only person alive except Revan who could have beat me.
Ordo.nm13aacand03155_.mp3: Hm... I think I'll tell you a bit about the recent war we had with the Republic. That might be more familiar to you.
Ordo.nm13aacand03156_.mp3: The one where you beat my people.
Ordo.nm13aacand03157_.mp3: The one where the Jedi Revan beat my people.
Ordo.nm13aacand03158_.mp3: We started by conquering worlds just outside the Republic. We did it quietly so the Republic wouldn't really know what was going on until too late.
Ordo.nm13aacand03159_.mp3: When we finally did hit the Republic worlds, they had no idea we were coming.
Ordo.nm13aacand03160_.mp3: We came in through three invasion corridors in adjacent sectors. Anyone who put up a fight - or wouldn't fight - was crushed. We razed whole worlds trying to provoke the Republic into fighting us.
Ordo.nm13aacand03161_.mp3: I don't particularly enjoy wiping out worlds for its own sake, but the cowardly tactics the Republic defenders used left us little choice.
Ordo.nm13aacand03163_.mp3: Hiding in the homes of civilians. Using families as shields. Thinking we would not use appropriate force on their bases inside major cities.
Ordo.nm13aacand03164_.mp3: They underestimated our resolve and what measures are acceptable in war. Those who cannot defend themselves should not be around those who can in battle.
Ordo.nm13aacand03165_.mp3: If annihilating a city is the kind of power it takes to overwhelm a Republic shield device, then that's what we did. Necessary force to destroy all opposition.
Ordo.nm13aacand03167_.mp3: It's wrong to hide with shields surrounding you hoping the enemy will be so good as to throw themselves at your feet to be slaughtered!
Ordo.nm13aacand03168_.mp3: I have no time or patience for cowards! They deserve to be hunted down and exterminated like vermin!
Ordo.nm13aacand03169_.mp3: There was no honor in wiping them out like rats. But some of your forces did redeem the Republic in our eyes... especially later...
Ordo.nm13aacand03171_.mp3: Later... when you had joined the war. We'll get back to that, we've wasted too much time already.
Ordo.nm13aacand03172_.mp3: Later... when Revan had joined the war. But we'll get back to that, we've wasted too much time already.
Ordo.nm13aacand03179_.mp3: They had the choice not to fight. We meet the enemy wherever they are hiding and we wipe them out. A few cities is a small price to pay for a world.
Ordo.nm13aacand03181_.mp3: We fought against the Republic forces for some time, over the course of many battles.
Ordo.nm13aacand03182_.mp3: At the start, they were not much of a threat to speak of, but once you had taken charge, things began to turn against us.
Ordo.nm13aacand03183_.mp3: The Republic fleets began to use more than just basic tactics. Feints, counterattacks, mass deceptions. You were a genius on the field. You are held in very high regard among my people.
Ordo.nm13aacand03184_.mp3: You abandoned worlds of their defenders so that others would be too fortified to strike. You made sacrifices in order to advance your goals. Such strategies had never been enough to best us before.
Ordo.nm13aacand03185_.mp3: In the end, you proved too much for us.
Ordo.nm13aacand03187_.mp3: There was no one else. The entire Republic had committed its forces behind you. The Sith had retreated back to their empire and there were none else strong enough to challenge us.
Ordo.nm13aacand03188_.mp3: At the start, they were not much of a threat to speak of, but once the Jedi Revan had taken charge, things began to turn against us.
Ordo.nm13aacand03189_.mp3: The Republic fleets began to use more than just basic tactics. Feints, counterattacks, mass deceptions. Revan was a genius on the field.
Ordo.nm13aacand03190_.mp3: Revan abandoned worlds of their defenders so that others would be too fortified to strike, and was willing to make sacrifices in order to advance goals.
Ordo.nm13aacand03191_.mp3: And in the end, Revan proved too much for us.
Ordo.nm13aacand03193_.mp3: But it was close! So close!
Ordo.nm13aacand03195_.mp3: There was no one else. The entire Republic had committed its forces behind Revan. The Sith had retreated back to their empire and there were none else strong enough to challenge us.
Ordo.nm13aacand03196_.mp3: It looked like the entire galaxy was within our grasp!
Ordo.nm13aacand03197_.mp3: I still remember that final battle in the skies above Malachor V. The two fleets filling the space around it, outshining the stars...
Ordo.nm13aacand03199_.mp3: Yeah, we lost. But there is no shame in it. We lost to the greatest single warrior the Republic has ever known.
Ordo.nm13aacand03201_.mp3: It was not your ships or your men or your vaunted 'fight for freedom' that won this, the final battle of the war.
Ordo.nm13aacand03202_.mp3: It was by the actions of one person, the Jedi Revan, that you prevailed.
Ordo.nm13aacand03203_.mp3: Revan's strategies and tactics defeated the best of us. Even Mandalore himself was taken aback by the ferocity, the tenacity and the subtlety of Revan's plans.
Ordo.nm13aacand03204_.mp3: Revan fought us to a standstill and then began pushing back. We didn't really have a chance.
Ordo.nm13aacand03206_.mp3: It was what we had wanted all along, in a way. We wanted to fight the best in a battle that would be remembered for centuries. And we did.
Ordo.nm13aacand03208_.mp3: I don't hold a grudge against Revan, and neither do any of my people. It was the greatest moment of my life to be in that battle.
Ordo.nm13aacand03209_.mp3: If Revan had been a Mandalorian, nothing in the galaxy would have stopped us.
Ordo.nm13aacand03210_.mp3: But wishing for the past to be different is useless. Better to look to the future. As we should now. We'll talk more later, I think.
Ordo.nm13aacand03214_.mp3: I hold no grudge against you, nor do any of my people. It was the greatest of honors to fight against you, even in defeat. It is even more of an honor to fight beside you now.
Ordo.nm13aacand03215_.mp3: Had you been born of the Mandalorian clans, surely nothing in this galaxy would have been able to stop us.
Ordo.nm13aacand03217_.mp3: Ha! Don't be naive. The Republic is not invincible. This battle was the end of the war, one way or another.
Ordo.nm13aacand03220_.mp3: It was by the actions of one person - you - that the Republic prevailed.
Ordo.nm13aacand03221_.mp3: Your strategies and tactics defeated the best we could send against you. Even Mandalore himself was taken aback by the ferocity of your attacks, the tenacity of your defenses and the subtleties of your plans.
Ordo.nm13aacand03222_.mp3: You fought us to a standstill and then began pushing back. We didn't really have a chance.
Ordo.nm13aacand03224_.mp3: The Sith had gone - retreated into their empire. They sealed themselves off from the rest of the galaxy. We thought it would be centuries before they'd come back.
Ordo.nm13aacand03225_.mp3: It's amazing that they could rebuild their fleet so fast. But at the time, it looked like the galaxy was in our grasp!
Ordo.nm13aacand03228_.mp3: The war we had with the Republic was supposed to be the most glorious battle of our history, but... it was a very costly one. I guess we didn't think of how much we could lose in it.
Ordo.nm13aacand03231_.mp3: There weren't many of us left after that last battle. Mandalore himself was killed at the hands of the Jedi Revan. The best of us could not defeat him!
Ordo.nm13aacand03232_.mp3: After that last battle, those of us that survived were stripped of our weapons, our armor, and our Basilisks.
Ordo.nm13aacand03233_.mp3: Revan's forces destroyed them while we were forced to watch. Those who hadn't fled earlier were left with nothing to call their own: no weapons, no armor... only the honor of having fought in the battle we just lost.
Ordo.nm13aacand03234_.mp3: For many this was not enough. While the rest of us were sent into exile on the Outer Rim, they tried to relive the old days - raiding worlds. They're nothing more than bandits now.
Ordo.nm13aacand03237_.mp3: Enforcing for Davik was not... stimulating. The gangs on Taris and Davik's rivals were trash. They give no thrill in battle, no honor or glory in defeating them. It was like stepping on bugs.
Ordo.nm13aacand03238_.mp3: I sought worthy challenges, but the best that Taris could offer were nothing to me.
Ordo.nm13aacand03239_.mp3: But I think now - with you - I may finally find opponents worth fighting.
Ordo.nm13aacand03243_.mp3: Maybe it'll happen, maybe it won't. Either way, I think that by following you I can get something out of it.
Ordo.nm13aacand03244_.mp3: Maybe later I'll tell you more about what it was like to work for Davik. For now, though, we should get on with our lives.
Ordo.nm13aacand03246_.mp3: Yeah. I found work on Taris.
Ordo.nm13aacand03247_.mp3: The Republic's forces destroyed them while we were forced to watch. Those who hadn't fled earlier were left with nothing to call their own: no weapons, no armor... only the honor of having fought in the battle we just lost.
Ordo.nm13aacand03249_.mp3: Yeah... yeah you did. You were a great warrior Revan. A great general.
Ordo.nm13aacand03251_.mp3: Working for Davik was like driving a spike through the side of your head... Sure you get something new in there, but in the end, you've lost something as well.
Ordo.nm13aacand03252_.mp3: Beating up people who wouldn't - or couldn't - pay, strong-arming his competitors, killing who he said. It was busy work, nothing decent.
Ordo.nm13aacand03254_.mp3: Assassin. Mercenary. Those are names people give guys like me who do the killing to make us seem better or worse in their eyes.
Ordo.nm13aacand03256_.mp3: I've killed many people. I can't say I'm proud of it, but I have. Criminals, competitors, businessmen, police... women, children...
Ordo.nm13aacand03257_.mp3: Jedi were a better challenge, but they hardly ever poked around in the Under City.
Ordo.nm13aacand03259_.mp3: But I never wanted to challenge you. Never felt the need. Maybe I knew I couldn't win... just like all those years ago.
Ordo.nm13aacand03261_.mp3: Yeah, probably. Heh. You'd likely have beaten me again.
Ordo.nm13aacand03263_.mp3: Maybe you would have. But you're not who you were back then, I can tell. You've changed... and maybe I have too.
Ordo.nm13aacand03264_.mp3: I remember a time when I could do anything I wanted... Kill, maim, murder... It was all the same to me.
Ordo.nm13aacand03265_.mp3: But now... now that I'm older, I can look back and regret...
Ordo.nm13aacand03267_.mp3: In a Mandalorian... I'm not even sure what that is anymore. The Mandalorian are gone, defeated by the Republic and swept away by time.
Ordo.nm13aacand03268_.mp3: I look back and regret all the chances I had as a warrior, and then all the chances I've had since then. I shouldn't be getting like this, not when so many other things are happening... but...
Ordo.nm13aacand03269_.mp3: It feels like... like something has changed inside and I don't know what it is. Bah! This is unbecoming of a warrior! Let's get on with everything before I start getting sentimental or something.
Ordo.nm13aacand03272_.mp3: Ha! Good one. That's like a warrior should. Like what you see in a Mandalorian.
Ordo.nm13aacand03276_.mp3: I'm not happy with the way my life has turned. I'm not the Mandalore I once was. I don't even think I'm the merc I was when I joined you.
Ordo.nm13aacand03277_.mp3: I think... I think I need something more than killing and fighting in my life. I need a purpose or something like that.
Ordo.nm13aacand03279_.mp3: The way the Mandalorians - we - fought... it holds no appeal for me. To rape and ravage worlds for the thrill of battle... It gets old. Very old.
Ordo.nm13aacand03280_.mp3: Honor in battle. Cheating death. Comrades in arms. The code of the Mandalore.
Ordo.nm13aacand03281_.mp3: I think I'm something different now. Maybe more, maybe less.
Ordo.nm13aacand03283_.mp3: No... The time of the clans is past. I don't think the galaxy wants them anymore. Maybe in the future, but not now.
Ordo.nm13aacand03284_.mp3: Once my time with you is done, once you have moved on to greater things, I'll find my own way once again.
Ordo.nm13aacand03285_.mp3: Maybe the Mandalorian clans will be reborn again. Maybe even under the Republic... or the Sith.
Ordo.nm13aacand03286_.mp3: But dreaming about the future is stupid right now. We should get down to our business and finish it. If we survive all this... maybe we could talk about it then.
Ordo.nm13aacand03288_.mp3: I don't think there is really any place left in the galaxy for the Mandalorian clans like they were. I don't know if I can go on forever fighting as I have. Even warriors get insightful in their old age...
Ordo.nm13aacand03290_.mp3: Killing is never enough. Anybody can kill just by pushing a button. A warrior fights his battles himself - as you have done - and tries to defeat all comers.
Ordo.nm13aacand03293_.mp3: This thing with Jagi... I... I don't know. Give me some time and I'll be able to sort this out on my own.
Ordo.nm13aacand03294_.mp3: Is there something else you wanted?
Ordo.nm13aacand03296_.mp3: Your choice. I'm here if you want something done right.
Ordo.nm13aacand03297_.mp3: What? You think I don't have something better to do?
Ordo.nm13aacand03298_.mp3: So deal with it. Why are you asking me about it?
Ordo.nm13aacrat07050_.mp3: They are the scum who could not stand defeat and fled the final battles. They do us no credit.
Ordo.nm13aacrat07086_.mp3: Ha! Good to see things in this Jedi enclave work just like they do out in the real world. Everyone's looking out for number one.
Ordo.nm13aaelis08018_.mp3: Ha! I guess that droid is really going to to serve his master tonight!
Ordo.nm13aajagi08001_.mp3: You brought some of your own as well.
Ordo.nm13aajagi08012_.mp3: This is a matter of honor. I cannot stand by this insult. I must do this.
Ordo.nm13aajagi08014_.mp3: He has slandered me and questioned my honor. Among the Mandalore, many have died for much lesser insults.
Ordo.nm13aajagi08020_.mp3: If I had not attacked when I did, the battle would not have been won so easily!
Ordo.nm13aajagi08022_.mp3: That's not the way it happened...
Ordo.nm13aajagi08024_.mp3: The Althiri were fighting hard. I saw a break in their defenses that left their center exposed. I had to take the chance.
Ordo.nm13aajagi08025_.mp3: If I had not done what I did, many more warriors would have died and the battle would have taken much longer. I stand by my decision.
Ordo.nm13aajagi08027_.mp3: I... I can regret their loss, but it was necessary.
Ordo.nm13aajagi08038_.mp3: I saw a chance and had to take it. It ended the battle quicker than we would have otherwise, and many of our warriors may have died.
Ordo.nm13aajagi08039_.mp3: Mandalore taught us that opportunism and flexibility in battle were to be admired. You may contradict me, but do you contradict him as well?
Ordo.nm13aajagi08047_.mp3: At the cost of our lives? He may have saved others in the long run, but... but...
Ordo.nm13aajagi08049_.mp3: I saw my chance to end the battle quickly and I took it. I regret the men I lost, but it was necessary.
Ordo.nm13aajagi08056_.mp3: No! Do not alter his mind to defend me! I can fight my own battles without your help!
Ordo.nm13aajagi08070_.mp3: He... he was a warrior under my command up to the battle of Althir. But I thought...
Ordo.nm13aajagi08073_.mp3: You broke from the battle plan and let us die for it, so that you could have the 'honor' of being the first to the enemy commander!
Ordo.nm13aajagi08075_.mp3: I... I did what was prudent at the time. If I had not done it, the battle would have....
Ordo.nm13aajagi08094_.mp3: This concerns my employer as well.
Ordo.nm13aajuha11019_.mp3: You can't expect everything to get handed to you on a silver platter.
Ordo.nm13aajuha11028_.mp3: Giving you a second chance like this is a clear sign of weakness. Sometimes I find it hard to believe the Jedi could defeat my people in battle.
Ordo.nm13aavand17090_.mp3: And they beat my people so easily in battle...
Ordo.nm13aavand17104_.mp3: These raiders are a disgrace. No true Mandalorian would stoop to raiding farms when whole worlds were open to them.
Ordo.nm13aavroo18024_.mp3: The Jedi Revan was a great warrior and a amazing general. Even Mandalore himself couldn't defeat him.
Ordo.nm14aaelis09011_.mp3: Ha! Better get used to it, droid!
Ordo.nm14aajon006004_.mp3: You should have protected her better. And you call yourself her father.
Ordo.nm14aanemo07043_.mp3: You Republics are too weak. You should protect what you want to keep, otherwise someone stronger will take it.
Ordo.nm14aasett11023_.mp3: He should have been protecting her better if he wanted to keep her.
Ordo.nm14aasett11033_.mp3: They're pathetic. They're taking scraps when they should be taking worlds.
Ordo.nm14abmdro03010_.mp3: And don't think I wouldn't enjoy blowing you to bits.
Ordo.nm14abmdro03028_.mp3: So this is how nobles show their gratitude. No wonder all my friends are soldiers.
Ordo.nm14achand05076_.mp3: Well, if you can't keep her, it's your own fault.
Ordo.nm14acrick08056_.mp3: Echanis make delicate weapons with too little firepower. Lightweight stuff, if you ask me.
Ordo.nm14acsher09004_.mp3: Now this is what I've been waiting for!
Ordo.nm16aanuri01008_.mp3: This guy isn't telling us something... he might even be lying. I don't trust him.
Ordo.nm16aaraha02037_.mp3: There could be a lot of money for finding Shen Matale. I think that girl knows something about him going missing.
Ordo.nm17aa03sh01067_.mp3: Back off, old man. I thought you were the non-involved type, remember?
Ordo.nm17aa03sh01156_.mp3: The role of the weak is to serve the will of the strong; I'm glad you understand that.
Ordo.nm17aa03sh01163_.mp3: What was that all about? Are you going soft on me?
Ordo.nm17ae04ce02053_.mp3: Never underestimate a Mandalorian. If I want, there won't be enough of you left to identify.
Ordo.nm17ae04ce02082_.mp3: Never underestimate a Mandalorian. If I want, there won't be enough of you left to identify.
Ordo.nm17ae04ce02106_.mp3: Money's honest, old man. More honest than a conniving Jedi.
Ordo.nm17ae04ga03062_.mp3: Shaking people down for petty credits. Reminds me of my days working for Davik.
Ordo.nm18ackoma99133_.mp3: We Mandalorians believe in loyalty to our brothers-in-arms. You have allied yourself to this hunter; betraying him now is disgraceful!
Ordo.nm18acstar99008_.mp3: Anybody else get the feeling that finding this Star Map in the back of this krayt dragon's cave is more than just a coincidence?
Ordo.nm18acstar99009_.mp3: Now that we've got what we came for we should probably move on. Can't say I'm going to miss this pit of a world.
Ordo.nm22aadaso07062_.mp3: If it had been me, Eli would a smoking corpse right now.
Ordo.nm22aajano06059_.mp3: Maybe you should start talking, or I might decide to get a little... restless.
Ordo.nm22aazaal01060_.mp3: Hmph. Maybe we should have brought the Wookiee out. This place looks... untamed.
Ordo.nm22abdehn06055_.mp3: And who are you to stop us, little man?
Ordo.nm23acworr01040_.mp3: At least he's going to die like a warrior.
Ordo.nm23acworr01140_.mp3: Yeah, let's keep the focus on what's important. If there's profit to be made here, we don't want to miss out.
Ordo.nm23adchuu01072_.mp3: My, my. Best to give an angry Wookiee his due, I'd say.
Ordo.nm23adchuu01074_.mp3: Getting Wookiees angry is not a smart thing to do.
Ordo.nm23adchuu01147_.mp3: Heh, now this is going to hurt some...
Ordo.nm23adchuu01256_.mp3: Let's go kill something and get the Wookiee out.
Ordo.nm23adfrey02066_.mp3: Don't push him too much or we'll have a berserk Wookiee on our hands...
Ordo.nm24aagorw04010_.mp3: Now this is what I live for!
Ordo.nm25aacomp01254_.mp3: You blew that one, didn't you? Basic military strategy requires sacrifices. I thought you'd know that.
Ordo.nm25aahurt03068_.mp3: They were Mandalorian. Poachers, probably. They use stealth units to stalk their prey. Their kind were among the first to flee when the war turned against my people. Bloody cowards.
Ordo.nm25aamand04008_.mp3: More than a threat enough for you!
Ordo.nm25aastar99008_.mp3: What good is a Star Map buried at the bottom of the damn Shadowlands? Nobody'd ever find it here, so what's the point?
Ordo.nm25aastar99009_.mp3: I suppose if the Star Map is as old as everyone seems to think it could have been here before all these damn trees. It's just hard to imagine.
Ordo.nm25aastar99029_.mp3: But I don't want to stand around here chatting about this. Too many spots for an ambush. We've got what we came for - let's just head back to the treetops.
Ordo.nm26aaechm03011_.mp3: We're wasting our time with this prancing Echani.
Ordo.nm26aaechm03015_.mp3: Your protection didn't help much when my brothers slaughtered your warriors by the thousands during the Mandalorian Wars!
Ordo.nm26aaechm03019_.mp3: See - I told you we were just wasting our time here.
Ordo.nm26aairim06063_.mp3: Sounds like a recruiting drive to me. We used to use it on planets we had conquered. Get 'em while they're young and impressionable.
Ordo.nm26aamanm07000_.mp3: Canderous! I haven't seen you since the Republic broke our ranks at the battle of Malachor!
Ordo.nm26aamanm07002_.mp3: Ergeron, I see you've got some new guns to add to your collection. Times must have been profitable for you since the war.
Ordo.nm26aamanm07004_.mp3: Very profitable. When the Republic defeated our fleets, I learned a valuable lesson: it's far better to be a freelance mercenary in a war than to be a soldier for the losing side.
Ordo.nm26aamanm07006_.mp3: So the Sith smoked a Jedi outpost on Dantooine. No survivors, or so they say. First Taris, now Dantooine. Wouldn't surprise me if the Republic starts hiring mercs to make a counter attack.
Ordo.nm26aamanm07008_.mp3: They might even hire some Echani or Iridorian mercenaries, if they're desperate. I bet a Mandalorian could make some good money working for the Republic right now.
Ordo.nm26aamanm07009_.mp3: All of a sudden the Republic isn't hiring mercenaries anymore.
Ordo.nm26aamanm07011_.mp3: And now the kolto harvest is at an all time low. More than just coincidence, if you ask me.
Ordo.nm26aamanm07012_.mp3: If you're here to offer me a job, I'm not interested right now. I've got so many offers I can't keep up as it is.
Ordo.nm26aamanm07014_.mp3: Maybe that Iridorian skullslacker at the bar, or the Echani nerfherder cowering in the corner is available.
Ordo.nm26aamanm07016_.mp3: Normally I'd charge you for information, but times are good right now and I'm feeling generous. So ask your questions, free of charge.
Ordo.nm26aamanm07018_.mp3: Not really. They say some Republic war hero killed her. Maybe you should check out the Republic Embassy.
Ordo.nm26aamanm07020_.mp3: If there ever were any ruins on this world, they've long since disappeared beneath the oceans.
Ordo.nm26aamanm07022_.mp3: Not really. I have no interest in the Selkath other than the fact that they are charging me an exorbitant amount to stay on this world.
Ordo.nm26aamanm07024_.mp3: The Iridorian over there, however... He, I believe, may know more. He has been seen with several of them before.
Ordo.nm26aamanm07026_.mp3: Nothing, except the Echani are a bunch of fey dancers, prancing into battle with tiny weapons not fit for Mandalorian children. They hardly wear any armor because it slows them down when they run away.
Ordo.nm26aamanm07028_.mp3: But the Echani are better than the Iridorians. Those savages keep hacking at fallen foe even after death, mutilating the corpse out of pure blood lust.
Ordo.nm26aamanm07030_.mp3: I even heard they'll turn on each other when the battle fever hits. Who wants to work with someone like that? I can pretty much name my price right now, especially since the Republic is so desperate for mercs all of a sudden.
Ordo.nm26aamanm07032_.mp3: They ain't saying, but the price sure is right. Of course, I haven't heard of anyone coming back, so I'm guessing the job ain't easy.
Ordo.nm26aamanm07034_.mp3: I'm a realist. It was war, after all. And even though the Republic destroyed my people, the leaders of the armada were Revan and Malak, so I hate the Sith just as much.
Ordo.nm26aamanm07036_.mp3: And with this war, there's plenty of opportunity to take bloody vengeance against both sides and make a nice profit along the way. We Mandalorians are always practical. Not like those blood-thirsty Iridorians, or those honor-bound Echani.
Ordo.nm26aamanm07038_.mp3: Is there anything else you want?
Ordo.nm26aamanm07040_.mp3: So why are you telling me? If you're going, go. I don't need a status report.
Ordo.nm26aatria27517_.mp3: This is why we Mandalorians don't have courts. We prefer to settle things with trial by combat.
Ordo.nm26aatria27521_.mp3: I guess you got the result you wanted, but I still think this was a big waste of time. We Mandalorians prefer to settle things with a nice, quick trial by combat.
Ordo.nm28aamerc03034_.mp3: Don't get your hopes up too high. I have no intention of dying.
Ordo.nm28absur201010_.mp3: Doesn't smell so bad to me, old man.
Ordo.nm28absur201026_.mp3: Psychotic fish just don't try to dodge as much.
Ordo.nm33aalash11004_.mp3: You should turn around and move along, kid. You don't want the trouble we'd give you.
Ordo.nm33aalash11012_.mp3: You couldn't find your backside with both hands AND your friends'.
Ordo.nm33aalash11040_.mp3: It would be more realistic if the commander just shot them both.
Ordo.nm33aalash11065_.mp3: Not enough to save your sorry self.
Ordo.nm33aalash11078_.mp3: Not enough to save your sorry self.
Ordo.nm33aasith20017_.mp3: I'm all for that! Come on!
Ordo.nm33abacad01016_.mp3: I always think we should leave you on the ship, old man.
Ordo.nm35aalash07032_.mp3: Shut up, old man, and don't spoil anything or I'll twist that scrawny neck of yours.
Ordo.nm39aastar99000_.mp3: It smells like death here. Not good, honest battlefield death, but a musty, wasting death. Figures we'd find one of these Star Maps in a place like this.
Ordo.nm39aastar99001_.mp3: We've got what we came for, so let's get out of here. The sooner we leave the stink of this place behind the better.
Ordo.nm40aabast01072_.mp3: Don't you worry about that. I know how to deal with the guards. They won't know what hit them!
Ordo.nm40aacand04000_.mp3: This is Canderous. We're at the Ebon Hawk. Like we figured, it's under heavy guard. But don't worry... we'll figure out a plan to take care of them.
Ordo.nm40aacart05056_.mp3: You could give me a shot to delay my healing mods from kicking in. A small incendiary grenade will leave burn marks that look like I was injured while making repairs to the ship.
Ordo.nm40aacart05058_.mp3: Make my wounds bad enough and the Sith'll drag me off to the morgue or the medical facility to die. When my healing mods kick in I'll come save the rest of you.
Ordo.nm40aacart05060_.mp3: I'm the best chance we've got, and everyone knows it. But you're the boss, so I'll bow to your authority. I still think it's best... unless you've come up with another plan.
Ordo.nm40aacart05063_.mp3: I'll go into the Ebon Hawk's armory and give myself that shot right now. The plating on the doors back there will keep the rest of you safe from the grenade explosion.
Ordo.nm40accand02000_.mp3: It's Canderous. We took care of the guards. We're inside the Ebon Hawk and all systems are go. As soon as you guys join us we can get out of here.
Ordo.nm40adcart01060_.mp3: You defeated the Mandalore clans in the war, Revan. You were the only one in the galaxy who could best us.
Ordo.nm40adcart01061_.mp3: We had never met one like you before, and never since. How can you even ask if I will follow you?
Ordo.nm40adcart01062_.mp3: Whatever you are fighting, it will be worthy of my skill. I'm your man until the end, Revan, no matter how this plays out.
Ordo.nm40adcart01087_.mp3: Remember we're talking about the Force, here. At this point Malak himself could drop out of the sky and I wouldn't bat an eyelash.
Ordo.nm40adcart01113_.mp3: Everyone knows it was Malak who gave the order to attack your people, Carth. You can't blame Revan for that.
Ordo.nm41aablac01016_.mp3: Hold on a second - you understood these goggle-eyed freaks? You must have come to this planet and learned the language back before the Jedi messed up your mind. Back when you were still Revan.
Ordo.nm41aacart03083_.mp3: You're Revan and I'll follow you anywhere. It doesn't matter who you're fighting against, I'll be at your side. Mandalorians don't have any great love for the Republic anyway.
Ordo.nm41aacart03084_.mp3: Light side, dark side - it doesn't make any difference to me, Revan. I'll stick by your side no matter what comes.
Ordo.nm41aacart03114_.mp3: The Cathar's right: this planet's a technological graveyard. I saw dozens of downed ships out there. That disruptor field must have wiped them all out. But where could it be coming from?
Ordo.nm41aacart03116_.mp3: The old man's right: this planet's a technological graveyard. I saw dozens of downed ships out there. That disruptor field must have wiped them all out.
Ordo.nm41aacart04083_.mp3: You're Revan and I'll follow you anywhere. It doesn't matter who you're fighting against, I'll be at your side. Mandalorians don't have any great love for the Republic anyway.
Ordo.nm41aacart04084_.mp3: Light side, dark side - it doesn't make any difference to me, Revan. I'll stick by you no matter what comes.

PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09000_.mp3: Listen to me, people! There is a terrible scourge sweeping our planet! Heed my warning, before it is too late!
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09002_.mp3: The evil walks among us! The enemy is here! We must act now before we are overrun with the vermin invaders!
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09004_.mp3: A plague spreads through our streets! We cannot sit idly by while this pox infects our society!
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09006_.mp3: Greetings, my Sith friends. Rest assured, I have all the proper permits to be here spreading my message.
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09008_.mp3: Feel free to stay and listen if you wish. You'll find my message most enlightening.
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09009_.mp3: How dare you speak to me while you travel in the presence of alien Wookiee scum! You have violated one of this great planet's oldest and most revered laws!
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09011_.mp3: You have brought aliens to the Upper City! They are a blight upon Taris - they take our jobs and our homes, and spread their filth throughout our world.
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09017_.mp3: This beast just growled at me! It is a savage creature that will hurt someone!!
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09019_.mp3: How dare you brazenly parade about the Upper City with such alien scum at your side! I, Gorton Colu, founder of the Anti-Alien League, will not stand for this!
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09022_.mp3: I see you share the opinions of many on this world: that aliens are useful as servants and slaves. But I am here to tell you this is not so! Aliens deserve only death!
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09026_.mp3: Silence, alien scum! The presence of your kind is tolerated here on Taris, but a change is coming!
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09028_.mp3: Friends and fellow humans - I bring you a warning! A warning of a great plague spreading across our planet! Please, listen to me!
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09030_.mp3: My name is Gorton Colu. Will you join my cause? We must band together if we are to stop the spread of vermin and scum throughout Taris!
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09033_.mp3: I am speaking of the hideous looking aliens who walk the world of Taris! The Wookiees and Ithorians and Rodians and Bith - all of them! Listen, friend, for these are dark times.
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09035_.mp3: That is why I, Gorton Colu, have formed the Anti-Alien League. The time has come for action! We cannot sit idly by while aliens blight our glorious planet!
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09038_.mp3: Hear that, laser brain? Sell it somewhere else, 'cause we ain't buying!
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09040_.mp3: You are like all the rest! You will not see the truth! On the day of reckoning you will suffer with the rest of the alien lovers!
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09047_.mp3: Remain true to the cause, friend. Enlightened humans such as yourself are few and far between - but we shall triumph when the day of reckoning comes!
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09052_.mp3: Yes, my fellow human! You have seen the light! Gorton Colu has marked your face - I will remember you when the time to destroy the aliens and the alien-lovers is upon us!
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09054_.mp3: For now, stay vigilant. Be ready. Trust no one. I will find you when the day of reckoning is upon us, and together we will rid beautiful Taris of these alien species!
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09061_.mp3: Go then - you are no better than the alien-lovers! Turn a blind eye. Ignore what is happening, and one day you will see it is too late!
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09063_.mp3: It pains me to see that an alien lover such as yourself is still allowed to walk free! I've seen how the Sith operate... I know they will support my anti-alien policies!
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09065_.mp3: When the day of reckoning comes, you will suffer with the rest of the scum and alien lovers!
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09066_.mp3: Greetings again, friend. Have you mentioned my Anti-Alien League to others? We must always be looking for those sympathetic to our cause.
PreacherTharis_01.nm02abgort09069_.mp3: Excellent, excellent! There is much work yet to be done, but spreading our message is the first step!

Rahaja.nm13aaraha14000_.mp3: I am sorry we have nothing of value to give you as a reward. Our families have cut us off completely. Had the Council not taken us in, we would be foraging in the wilderness to survive.
Rahaja.nm13aaraha14002_.mp3: When I first met Shen, I feared our forbidden love was doomed to a tragic end. But thanks to you and the Jedi Council, our story ends in joy.
Rahaja.nm13aaraha14005_.mp3: The Council will let us stay here as long as we want, though I know Shen and I are both hoping our fathers will forgive us and welcome us back into their homes. If not, we will try to build a future somewhere else.
Rahaja.nm13aaraha14008_.mp3: We are waiting before the ceremony. Hopefully, in time, our fathers will agree to attend. If not, we plan to have a small, simple ceremony. You will be invited, of course.
Rahaja.nm14adcuts02002_.mp3: It was all thanks to this kind Jedi that we managed to get this far at all. I thank you Jedi, for all that you have done for us.
Rahaja.nm14adcuts02009_.mp3: Why... thank you. You're quite the looker yourself. I think maybe we can...
Rahaja.nm14adcuts02017_.mp3: Very well, we'll see what we...
Rahaja.nm14adcuts02020_.mp3: How could you! I thought you...
Rahaja.nm14adcuts02022_.mp3: You're right, we should go as fast as we can. I don't know how long it will be before my father realizes we're gone.
Rahaja.nm14adcuts02042_.mp3: We don't always need to be fighting like this!
Rahaja.nm14adcuts02100_.mp3: And I want to stay with Shen forever, father!
Rahaja.nm14adcuts02175_.mp3: Please Shen, it doesn't have to end this way!
Rahaja.nm14adcuts02188_.mp3: I am, father, and you can't stop me! We're leaving for the Enclave!
Rahaja.nm14adcuts02216_.mp3: Then you propose to buy us a new house, do you?
Rahaja.nm14adcuts02221_.mp3: We will praise you to the Council for what you have done and name our children after you.
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02000_.mp3: You are here from the Council, are you not? Looking for Shen Matale?
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02002_.mp3: My name is Rahasia - Nurik is my father. He has not been himself since Casus disappeared. He is mad with grief, and he is convinced the Matales are responsible. He is not thinking rationally.
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02004_.mp3: My father is a good man. When my mother died, he raised me and my brother by himself. He loves his children, and we love him. I just don't want you to judge him too harshly.
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02006_.mp3: You must understand that Father has been under a terrible strain. I have no wish to disobey him, but there are matters where even my father's authority is not absolute.
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02008_.mp3: My father has kidnapped Shen Matale. He is holding him prisoner here in the compound. He feels this is a way to get back at the Matales, a way to get even for the disappearance of my brother Casus.
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02013_.mp3: No! Since Casus went missing my father has become unstable, he might hurt him if you do that! He no longer even cares if the Matales are responsible for what happened to Casus.
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02014_.mp3: Since Casus went missing my father has become unstable. He no longer even cares if the Matales are responsible for what happened to Casus.
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02015_.mp3: I am afraid my father will simply kill Shen out of a mad, misguided lust for vengeance!
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02017_.mp3: The Jedi Council does not have the authority to search our estate, and if Father finds out his secret has been revealed he might kill Shen right away.
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02020_.mp3: Shen is an innocent victim in all this. My father is not a bad man, but his grief has driven him to madness. He must be stopped.
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02022_.mp3: I do not know. I am worried for him, truly, but I do not believe Ahlan Matale had anything to do with it... and now my father may take it out on Shen...
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02028_.mp3: Yes. Casus was my brother. He was working on archeological digs here on Dantooine when he disappeared. My father blamed Ahlan Matale... and his son...
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02030_.mp3: Casus is dead? It is as I feared, though I am relieved the Matales are not responsible.
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02034_.mp3: I... I thought you would listen to me. I thought the Jedi were compassionate and kind! I shouldn't have spoken to you at all - I've just made everything worse!
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02038_.mp3: You made your wishes clear to me the last time we talked. I won't bother you anymore - though I would ask you to leave our estate. This is private property.
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02040_.mp3: Apologize? Then you will help me?
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02044_.mp3: I did not realize the Jedi were such bullies. Unfortunately, there is little I can do if you refuse to respect my wishes. I shall not bother you anymore.
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02045_.mp3: What are you doing here? Have you found Shen yet?
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02047_.mp3: Shen can be so stubborn sometimes! If one of the security droids sees me wandering the halls Father will get suspicious! I can't risk it!
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02048_.mp3: I know Shen would rather die than leave me here alone to face the wrath of my father. Tell Shen I will meet you outside the gates. I will wait as long as I can, but you must hurry.
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02050_.mp3: Please, find Shen and rescue him before my father does something he will regret forever. I would take you to the prison, but I cannot let my father see me with you.
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02051_.mp3: Take this key. It will open an unguarded door at the rear of the estate. You and Shen can make your escape through there.
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02052_.mp3: There are many security droids guarding the halls. Please hurry... you are Shen's only hope.
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02054_.mp3: Ahlan Matale and my father have had problems ever since they settled on this world.
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02055_.mp3: To hear my father tell it, Ahlan is a brute and a bully, but a rich one. He feels his credits give him the right to step all over normal people.
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02056_.mp3: My father stands up to Ahlan because no one else will. But now he thinks Ahlan has taken my brother Casus, and has imprisoned Shen as revenge.
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02057_.mp3: Please find Shen and free him! You are my only hope!
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02059_.mp3: Shen and I... we... Well, we have been taught by our families to hate each other, just for being related to our fathers.
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02060_.mp3: But I met Shen alone one day in the city, away from his father, and...
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02061_.mp3: ... and Shen was so charming, so sweet. He didn't care at all that I was a Sandral, he just accepted me for who I was, with no reservations.
Rahaja.nm16aaraha02062_.mp3: We talked and met again over months and fell in love. My brother Casus met him too and they were beginning to become friends, but then this whole mess had to happen...

Rickard.nm14acrick08000_.mp3: Another Jedi, eh? Helping that Twi'lek investigate, no doubt. He seems stumped.
Rickard.nm14acrick08002_.mp3: I'm Rickard Lusoff. Maybe you can figure this out and let me get out of here.
Rickard.nm14acrick08004_.mp3: Well, I was out hunting iriaz, when I spotted one over here by the bridge. I pull out my rifle and aim at it. I couldn't see it that well, mind you, cause the damn sun was in my eyes.
Rickard.nm14acrick08006_.mp3: So I shoot it and it drops. I walk over here and find Handon standing over Calder's body!
Rickard.nm14acrick08008_.mp3: Now, I don't love Calder, but we go back a long way. We run a sub-orbital shipping and transport company out of Garang spaceport.
Rickard.nm14acrick08010_.mp3: We've been partners in that business for well over twenty years, and we've been doing just fine the way we are.
Rickard.nm14acrick08012_.mp3: So why don't you get this whole farce over with and send that whiner Handon to the prison he belongs in!
Rickard.nm14acrick08014_.mp3: So what do you want to know?
Rickard.nm14acrick08016_.mp3: Well, I was out hunting iriaz south of here, and I saw one over by the bridge. The sun was pretty much right behind it though, so I couldn't see it none too clearly.
Rickard.nm14acrick08018_.mp3: I shot, and when I came over here I found Handon standing over the body, holding his side. There wasn't an iriaz in sight... I think he might have taken it!
Rickard.nm14acrick08020_.mp3: Calder must've been hunting it himself 'cause there was a rifle lying close to the body. Bolook's got that now... mine, too. I want that back!
Rickard.nm14acrick08023_.mp3: I told ya already, didn't I? Was hunting some iriaz. Haven't seen many in the area recently, what with those kath hounds acting up, but they're still around.
Rickard.nm14acrick08025_.mp3: Was in my blind a little south of here when I spotted one, like I said before. I shot and POW!, it went down. But when I come over here, there's Handon standing over the body and the iriaz was gone!
Rickard.nm14acrick08027_.mp3: Now, I didn't have nothing to do with this, so can I go now?
Rickard.nm14acrick08032_.mp3: Yeah, I knew him. Hell, we've known each other for a good long time. Doesn't mean I really have to have liked the slime-ball.
Rickard.nm14acrick08034_.mp3: *sigh* Maybe I shouldn't be so hard on him... especially now that he's dead. We actually got along pretty well most of the time. We just had our... differences.
Rickard.nm14acrick08036_.mp3: We were actually business partners. We were involved in some orbit-to-ground transport operations for Aratech.
Rickard.nm14acrick08038_.mp3: Can I leave now? I should probably be the one to give the news to his wife.
Rickard.nm14acrick08041_.mp3: I don't understand why anyone would want to kill him at all. Certainly not why I would want to, if that's what you're trying to get at!
Rickard.nm14acrick08043_.mp3: You Jedi are so predictable. Always seeing some greater purpose behind everything, when the simple answer is usually the right one.
Rickard.nm14acrick08045_.mp3: Can't you see that it must have been Handon? I found him standing over the damned body!
Rickard.nm14acrick08049_.mp3: I don't know why this is causing you so much trouble. You almost seem as lost as this Bolook guy.
Rickard.nm14acrick08052_.mp3: That blaster? Never seen it before. Calder himself had a preference for Echani weaponry. He had this one really nice light blaster rifle that he always used.
Rickard.nm14acrick08054_.mp3: Always wished I could get myself a rifle like the one he had...
Rickard.nm14acrick08058_.mp3: That blaster ain't it, though. Calder only had the one rifle, too, so he either must have borrowed that... or it's someone else's.
Rickard.nm14acrick08060_.mp3: Looks kinda cheap too. Like it was bought by someone who didn't really know his blasters that well. And Calder knew his weapons, for sure.
Rickard.nm14acrick08063_.mp3: Well... uh... I kind of sprained my ankle running through the bush before I found the body. But it's nothing that serious.

Shen.nm13aashen16000_.mp3: Rahasia and I cannot thank you enough for what you have done for us. Now we finally have a place to share our love, without fear of reprisals from our families.
Shen.nm13aashen16002_.mp3: Rahasia and I can spend the rest of our lives together... All thanks to you.
Shen.nm13aashen16009_.mp3: We will stay here for the next little while... We are still hoping our parents will learn to set aside their differences and welcome us back into their homes.
Shen.nm13aashen16011_.mp3: If they do not, perhaps we will travel to Coruscant or the Core Worlds and make our fortunes there.
Shen.nm13aashen16014_.mp3: Not yet, my friend, but perhaps someday soon.
Shen.nm14adcuts02001_.mp3: Rahasia! Thank goodness you managed to escape!
Shen.nm14adcuts02004_.mp3: No, we know that you must have gone to great personal risk to get us out of the Sandral estate undetected.
Shen.nm14adcuts02013_.mp3: Why... thank you. You're quite the looker yourself. I think maybe we can...
Shen.nm14adcuts02019_.mp3: What? You're... you're just doing this for the reward?
Shen.nm14adcuts02050_.mp3: Rahasia and I love each other and we'll be together forever!
Shen.nm14adcuts02056_.mp3: [Failure] No! Rahasia would never do that!
Shen.nm14adcuts02059_.mp3: Why... Why all of this? Why are you fighting?
Shen.nm14adcuts02073_.mp3: I have my own life, father, and I want to spend it with Rahasia!
Shen.nm14adcuts02075_.mp3: I can do whatever I want! You can't control me!
Shen.nm14adcuts02078_.mp3: I... I could try couldn't I? I would...
Shen.nm14adcuts02081_.mp3: [Success] What? No! Rahasia, how...how could you? How could you lead me to believe... ?
Shen.nm14adcuts02090_.mp3: [Failure] No, I don't believe you! Rahasia and I love each other!
Shen.nm14adcuts02097_.mp3: No, I won't! I can choose my own path!
Shen.nm14adcuts02099_.mp3: I am tired of you controlling my life! I love Rahasia and I want to be with her forever!
Shen.nm14adcuts02144_.mp3: Rahasia and I don't want you to make decisions for us! We want to live alone away from you!
Shen.nm14adcuts02159_.mp3: I... I see. I wonder how I could ever have thought differently about you, Rahasia. How I could have been so blind.
Shen.nm14adcuts02161_.mp3: I was foolish, my father was right, we are not destined for one another. It would never have worked. There would have been too many problems. Sometimes it is just better to let things die.
Shen.nm14adcuts02163_.mp3: I'm sorry, Rahasia. It just won't work. In fact... I don't think I like you very much at all. You remind me too much of your father.
Shen.nm14adcuts02165_.mp3: Yes, and I thank you for showing me what I had to do.
Shen.nm14adcuts02166_.mp3: I'm ready to leave now, father.
Shen.nm14adcuts02174_.mp3: I suppose I should have seen it from the beginning... that our hopeless romance would be doomed to failure.
Shen.nm14adcuts02176_.mp3: Yes it does, it would never work. Our families are too different.
Shen.nm14adcuts02180_.mp3: Don't say that to me, Rahasia. Let's try to stay calm... rational.
Shen.nm14adcuts02181_.mp3: We both know it wouldn't work. Let's not get all emotional and end up hating each other.
Shen.nm14adcuts02184_.mp3: I don't care! Rahasia and I will live on our own if you won't accept us!
Shen.nm14adcuts02220_.mp3: Thank you, Master Jedi, for bringing us together and getting our parents to accept us.
Shen.nm14adcuts02222_.mp3: Thank you again. We will remember you always.
Shen.nm16aashen03000_.mp3: Who are you? What do you want with me? Are you working for my father?
Shen.nm16aashen03002_.mp3: Rescue me? No... I won't leave. It's too dangerous.
Shen.nm16aashen03004_.mp3: It is not my own safety I am concerned about. I am worried about the fate of Nurik's daughter, Rahasia. She has been trying to convince her father to release me ever since I was captured.
Shen.nm16aashen03006_.mp3: If I escape, Nurik will think Rahasia is to blame. Nurik is insane with grief over the loss of his son Casus. If I leave with you, it is Rahasia who will suffer. I cannot allow that.
Shen.nm16aashen03011_.mp3: If you do that, I'll scream my head off and alert all the guards in the house! The only chance you have is to talk Rahasia into leaving.
Shen.nm16aashen03014_.mp3: As you wish. I have no quarrel with you.
Shen.nm16aashen03016_.mp3: You are back. Have you spoken to Rahasia?
Shen.nm16aashen03018_.mp3: I pray she is not just telling me what I want to hear. But I will have to take that chance. Hurry, then. We must not keep Rahasia waiting.
Shen.nm16aashen03020_.mp3: If you can convince Rahasia to escape with us I will accompany you - though I do not know if she would be willing to turn her back on her home and family.
Shen.nm16aashen03022_.mp3: Who could imagine a Sandral doing such a thing for the sake of a Matale. But if she will not go, then I too shall stay.
Shen.nm16aashen03024_.mp3: I would rather face my own death, than have her face her father's wrath because I escaped.
Shen.nm16aashen03026_.mp3: My father thinks the Sandrals are thieves and liars who followed him here to Dantooine just to steal what he has earned for himself.
Shen.nm16aashen03028_.mp3: My father is an egotist and can be violent at times, but I think he still cares for me. Rahasia's father seems to be falling into the same pattern as mine.
Shen.nm16aashen03030_.mp3: They're both too unreasonable to be talked to about the other. I think the only hope Rahasia and I will have is if we can escape both of them...
Shen.nm16aashen03032_.mp3: Please find Rahasia and speak to her. Get her to flee this place with me.
Shen.nm16aashen03035_.mp3: I was taught to hate the Sandrals. To think of them as evil and subhuman. But from the moment I saw Rahasia one day in the city, I knew that my father was wrong.
Shen.nm16aashen03037_.mp3: She was like an angel: all white silks and perfume, seeming to float above the crowds.
Shen.nm16aashen03039_.mp3: I don't know what else I could have done but fall in love with her. For months I wooed her and tried to win her heart. I believe I have succeeded, but now this has happened...
Shen.nm16aashen03041_.mp3: Our families are always coming between us in one way or another. Please find her and convince her to run away with me.
Shen.nm16aashen03044_.mp3: Thank you. I wish you luck.

ShensDad.nm13aaahla03000_.mp3: I demand justice! The Sandral family is a blight upon Dantooine! They must be punished!
ShensDad.nm13aaahla03002_.mp3: Mistake? My son Shen is missing! How can there be any doubt the Sandrals are to blame?
ShensDad.nm13aaahla03004_.mp3: Bah! You Jedi are good for nothing but talk! I shall only wait so long before I take action on my own!
ShensDad.nm13aaahla03036_.mp3: Why are you bothering me? I am here to speak with the Council, not some servant! Please leave or I shall be forced to tell the Council of your rude behavior!
ShensDad.nm14abahla01000_.mp3: My protocol droid tells me you are here on behalf of the Council. I was beginning to think my demands had been ignored.
ShensDad.nm14abahla01001_.mp3: Though I think your time would be better spent interrogating the Sandrals as to the whereabouts of my son Shen!
ShensDad.nm14abahla01003_.mp3: Many years ago I brought my family here to Dantooine to escape the crush of humanity on the Core Worlds.
ShensDad.nm14abahla01004_.mp3: Soon after we settled here, the Sandrals arrived. And they have been a plague upon my house ever since!
ShensDad.nm14abahla01006_.mp3: The injustices the Sandrals have committed against the Matales are far too numerous to name, but the Council is well aware of our many disputes.
ShensDad.nm14abahla01007_.mp3: Recently, I discovered several Sandral droids trespassing on my land.
ShensDad.nm14abahla01009_.mp3: I have no idea what nefarious purpose lay behind their arrival - my own assassination, perhaps. Destruction of my property. Maybe a simple spy mission. I wasn't about to find out.
ShensDad.nm14abahla01010_.mp3: My own security droids destroyed the invaders - not a single one survived.
ShensDad.nm14abahla01015_.mp3: My own security droids destroyed the invaders - not a single one survived.
ShensDad.nm14abahla01016_.mp3: I have no idea what nefarious purpose lay behind their arrival - my own assassination, perhaps. Destruction of my property. Maybe a simple spy mission. I wasn't about to find out.
ShensDad.nm14abahla01017_.mp3: It was shortly after this incident that Shen, my only son and heir to the Matale estate, vanished.
ShensDad.nm14abahla01018_.mp3: Obviously Nurik, the unscrupulous head of the Sandral clan, has abducted my son in retaliation for the destruction of his droids!
ShensDad.nm14abahla01020_.mp3: The only resolution possible is the immediate return of my son!
ShensDad.nm14abahla01022_.mp3: Why does the Council insist on stalling? The life of my son is at stake! Is it possible... yes, of course. Now I understand.
ShensDad.nm14abahla01023_.mp3: I am a man of the world, Jedi. I know how things are done. I will make a... contribution... of 1,000 credits to the Council in exchange for rescuing Shen from the Sandrals.
ShensDad.nm14abahla01024_.mp3: I will present the credits directly to you, of course. Whether the Council ever learns of this "donation" is completely up to you.
ShensDad.nm14abahla01026_.mp3: Nevertheless, my offer still stands. A thousand credits for Shen's safe return. Know, however, that I will not sit idly by much longer.
ShensDad.nm14abahla01027_.mp3: Eventually I will take whatever action is necessary to rescue my son... including razing the entire Sandral estate!
ShensDad.nm14abahla01029_.mp3: It is the Sandrals who have started this. Not I.
ShensDad.nm14abahla01031_.mp3: I don't need to stand here and listen to such impertinence!
ShensDad.nm14abahla01036_.mp3: Two thousand? Your greed is outstripped only by your utter lack of any sense of proportion, Jedi!
ShensDad.nm14abahla01039_.mp3: For that price I could purchase enough droids to destroy the entire Sandral estate. Two thousand is out of the question.
ShensDad.nm14abahla01041_.mp3: Follow their stink south of here and you shall find them. I demand action on this matter, Jedi!
ShensDad.nm14abahla01043_.mp3: I have already told my story to the Council! Why did they not inform you of my circumstances? I did not expect such incompetence from the Jedi, but I shall repeat the tale once more...
ShensDad.nm14abahla01045_.mp3: Proof? How dare you talk to me about proof! I have more than enough to satisfy any reasonable person!
ShensDad.nm14abahla01046_.mp3: Until you find Shen, Jedi, we have nothing further to discuss. I suggest you hurry south to their estate, lest I take matters into my own hands.
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02032_.mp3: I knew this was all your doing! I knew you had captured my son!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02033_.mp3: You had taken my Casus from me long before that! You started it!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02034_.mp3: I don't want to hear any of your excuses! Now I will get revenge for your transgressions!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02039_.mp3: We never asked for you help, Jedi! Do not press in matters that do not concern you!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02043_.mp3: I thought you had taken my Casus from me! I thought I was justified!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02044_.mp3: It's gone too far for that, Rahasia. Ahlan has crossed the line one too many times!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02045_.mp3: Ha! For what you've done to me and my family, I will see you dead and rotting in the ground
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02047_.mp3: I see little choice in the matter with the Matale dog invading my estate like this, and his son stealing my daughter.
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02048_.mp3: You stole my son first! Whatever the Jedi might say, I know it was you!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02049_.mp3: My son will never be with your daughter while I'm alive!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02052_.mp3: Come back to me, boy. You know this is the way things will be.
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02054_.mp3: I will never let you live with a Sandral, Shen. Come back to me now.
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02057_.mp3: She's a Sandral, boy! They're no good for anything!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02058_.mp3: You lying Matale dog! My Rahasia is twice the man your son will ever be!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02066_.mp3: He is my son! How can he disrespect my wishes like this?
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02069_.mp3: No, no! I never did anything to your son, I...
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02070_.mp3: I knew you were lying, you dog! And to think I thought it might not have been you! So I'll take your son from you!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02072_.mp3: My son will do what I tell him!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02074_.mp3: You're too immature to do anything on your own.
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02079_.mp3: You know nothing of what it would be like with that... that Sandral!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02083_.mp3: Come away from that Sandral harlot, Shen. Come back with me.
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02089_.mp3: Look at her! See what kind of person she really is!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02092_.mp3: My son doesn't know enough to act responsibly on his own!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02093_.mp3: This in an internal affair for my family and is none of your concern!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02094_.mp3: You should not interfere with our private business, Jedi. This will be resolved very shortly.
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02096_.mp3: This is a private affair, Jedi. You would do well not to interfere. We are allowed to decide the fate of our children!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02102_.mp3: Do not trust that Sandral girl, Shen! She is treacherous like her father and will only betray you!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02105_.mp3: Get away from my daughter Matale!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02109_.mp3: You don't know what you're getting into, Shen. Do you want to start a war here?
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02110_.mp3: I will never let Rahasia leave me!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02112_.mp3: Don't disobey me, Shen. Come to me now and leave her! If you don't I'll disown you!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02114_.mp3: My son doesn't know his head from his backside! I am the only one qualified to be making his decisions for him, and I say that he leave with me right now!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02115_.mp3: Why should I listen to the Jedi? All you want is to remain with that Sandral harlot.
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02119_.mp3: If Shen would just understand that he has to do what I want, this would all be solved easily.
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02121_.mp3: [Success] But he is my son... I don't want to lose him...
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02126_.mp3: [Failure] Not with a Matale she won't!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02127_.mp3: Enough of this babble! Come, Shen, we're leaving. If you don't... the consequences will be dire.
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02129_.mp3: Yes! Because Ahlan has caused nothing but trouble for us ever since we arrived on this world! His hate poisons this place.
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02130_.mp3: That's enough, Sandral scum! Come, Shen, we're leaving now. If you don't... the consequences will be dire.
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02131_.mp3: [Failure] No! I won't let you do this!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02133_.mp3: I have every right! Shen is my son!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02134_.mp3: You know what you're getting yourself into here Shen? Is causing a war between our families what you really want to do?
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02136_.mp3: You can't have her! I will fight to keep her from you!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02139_.mp3: Listen to the Jedi, for once, Shen. Don't turn this into a war.
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02142_.mp3: Our children don't know enough of what's good for them to make a reasonable decision!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02143_.mp3: It's better to let older, wiser heads like ours make the decisions.
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02145_.mp3: You... You insolent boy! If you want to live alone then so be it! I disown you! Never set foot in my house again!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02155_.mp3: The Master has been injured. Terminate all opposition.
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02168_.mp3: Here is you reward, Jedi, for your assistance.
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02169_.mp3: This isn't over Sandrals! I will take this affront directly before the Jedi Council and see you exiled from this world!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02171_.mp3: Come inside, Rahasia. Let's get the stink of that Matale dog off you.
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02185_.mp3: You will do no such thing! I am your father and I order you to come back with me!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02187_.mp3: Rahasia! You will not leave with this... this Matale boy!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02191_.mp3: You expect us to just let them leave?? Droids! Stop them!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02192_.mp3: You will not turn your droids on my daughter! Droids! Don't let them take Rahasia!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02193_.mp3: We appear to be at an impasse then... And they got away!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02194_.mp3: It is your fault, Ahlan! You were always too violent for your own good!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02195_.mp3: ME?! You were the one who rushed out here with war droids!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02197_.mp3: I will not rest until I have my Shen back! The Council will hear of the troubles you caused, Jedi!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02206_.mp3: I don't know how you can think of that when we have our children trying to go away together.
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02208_.mp3: Hmph. As much as I may dislike it... I think I see it too.
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02210_.mp3: I suppose... I suppose I might be convinced to see that Sandral girl with my son. IF she is loyal to him.
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02211_.mp3: But I don't trust you a centimeter farther, old man. Your daughter may treat Shen well, but you will never see them! They will live with me.
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02214_.mp3: I will not have them set foot in a Sandral household!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02215_.mp3: They shall not live with the Matales!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02218_.mp3: I'm... surprised. That does sound like a good idea!
ShensDad.nm14adcuts02360_.mp3: I'm glad somebody finally said what we've all been thinking!

SithAcademy_Female_01.nm36aasith03000_.mp3: I heard an explosion in there... did you destroy the assassin droid?
SithAcademy_Female_01.nm36aasith03002_.mp3: Oh. Well, I guess it's good that the deed is done. Hope you stomped it good for my friends.
SithAcademy_Female_01.nm36aasith03005_.mp3: Well... if you did, then I wouldn't have to think about going inside, after all. I suppose the fact you're back means that you did, anyway.
SithAcademy_Female_01.nm36aasith03008_.mp3: No, I wouldn't do that. Well... I would if I could get away with it, but I bet Master Uthar could tell if I was lying.
SithAcademy_Female_01.nm36aasith03010_.mp3: At any rate, if you haven't already, you might want to go and see Master Uthar about that reward. Prestige is gold, you know.
SithAcademy_Female_01.nm36aasith03012_.mp3: Wow... you should have seen it. That droid came running out of the tomb like a bantha on a rampage!
SithAcademy_Female_01.nm36aasith03014_.mp3: It fired some kind of jet pack and off it went. Whatever you did, it sure was effective... I don't think it's coming back anytime soon.
SithAcademy_Female_01.nm36aasith03016_.mp3: You'd better go and tell Master Uthar about this, if you haven't already. You may not have destroyed the droid, but you might still get the reward.
SithAcademy_Female_01.nm36aasith03018_.mp3: You should be careful if you're planning on entering this tomb... it's dangerous.
SithAcademy_Female_01.nm36aasith03020_.mp3: There's an assassin droid in here, so Master Uthar says. It went insane and has holed up in here with a whole army of droids protecting it.
SithAcademy_Female_01.nm36aasith03022_.mp3: I don't know. I think Master Uthar has left it in there as a challenge for any student brave enough to destroy it.
SithAcademy_Female_01.nm36aasith03024_.mp3: Supposedly, if a student actually succeeds in destroying the droid, they'll get a great reward. Lots have tried, but nobody's succeeded yet.
SithAcademy_Female_01.nm36aasith03029_.mp3: No idea. I think it's building them in there.
SithAcademy_Female_01.nm36aasith03031_.mp3: Seems that way. They say that its audio receptors became too sensitive and all the noise drove the droid nuts.
SithAcademy_Female_01.nm36aasith03033_.mp3: If you're planning on going in, I'd suggest you use some sound suppressors or something... or you'll probably become a target right away.
