SithAcademy_Female_01.nm36aasith03035_.mp3: I... I don't think so. I can manipulate minds and living matter, but that won't be much use against droids, will it?
SithAcademy_Female_01.nm36aasith03037_.mp3: I've had a few friends go inside that haven't come out for a while, now. I doubt I could do any better than they could.
SithAcademy_Female_01.nm36aasith03039_.mp3: Maybe so, but this one more than most, I think.
SithAcademy_Female_01.nm36aasith03042_.mp3: If you say so. Just thought I would warn you, is all.

SithAcademy_Female_02.nm36aasith04000_.mp3: Sorry... I'm rather busy with the excavation planning, right now.
SithAcademy_Female_02.nm36aasith04001_.mp3: You aren't assigned to the excavation team, are you?
SithAcademy_Female_02.nm36aasith04002_.mp3: The tomb on the far left, there, is off-limits. Only Master Uthar can go inside.
SithAcademy_Female_02.nm36aasith04003_.mp3: Where is that blasted transport crew? We're supposed to send off the next shipment of artifacts right away.
SithAcademy_Female_02.nm36aasith04004_.mp3: Careful of the tuk'ata. It's all we can do to keep those beasts away while we work.
SithAcademy_Female_02.nm36aasith04005_.mp3: We've had indications that there's a whole ancient Sith colony under this valley. Isn't that an incredible find?
SithAcademy_Female_02.nm36aasith04006_.mp3: The tombs are all full of traps and droids that still work, it looks like. Stay out of them, if you can.
SithAcademy_Female_02.nm36aasith04007_.mp3: I was told that there's an escaped assassin droid in one of the tombs. Watch out for it.
SithAcademy_Female_02.nm36aasith04008_.mp3: One has to wonder what made the Sith leave this planet originally. I bet the Jedi came and destroyed the colony.
SithAcademy_Female_02.nm36aasith04009_.mp3: These tombs we've uncovered are only the tip of an entire ancient Sith fortress. I wonder what happened here?
SithAcademy_Female_02.nm36aasith04010_.mp3: Look, unless you're willing to lend a hand, leave us to our work.
SithAcademy_Female_02.nm36aasith04011_.mp3: You're out here to look for artifacts, I suppose? Just be careful.
SithAcademy_Female_02.nm36aasith04012_.mp3: There's supposed to be some crazy Sith hermit that keeps kidnapping students in these hills. Best be careful.
SithAcademy_Female_02.nm36aasith04013_.mp3: Sorry, I can't talk. We have to excavate this valley with hand instruments. There's all kinds of old traps left behind that still work.

SithAcademy_Female_03.nm33aasith20002_.mp3: This is good: I want to celebrate my acceptance into the academy!
SithAcademy_Female_03.nm33aasith20021_.mp3: Hey! That... that's a Jedi trick!
SithAcademy_Female_03.nm33aasith20028_.mp3: Hey! This one has killed Sith?!
SithAcademy_Female_03.nm33aasith20032_.mp3: [Success] Uhhh... this one doesn't look like a pushover, you know. Maybe we should reconsider...
SithAcademy_Female_03.nm33aayuth21008_.mp3: So I see, from the medallion you carry. How curious that you possess one. Where did you get it?
SithAcademy_Female_03.nm33aayuth21058_.mp3: 'Corruption' is a word the pitiful use to describe the natural longing for power that they deny. 'Evil' is a word trumpeted by the weak to ease their heart.

SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06000_.mp3: Isn't it strange? Nobody seems to know what happened to Master Uthar or Yuthura. They're both just... gone.
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06002_.mp3: Have you heard? Master Uthar is dead and Yuthura Ban has taken over the academy. How brutal...
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06003_.mp3: Oh, ah... hello. I don't remember seeing you here before. My name is Kel... Kel Algwinn.
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06008_.mp3: Y-yes. My master always says I am too trusting, too willing to show weakness. You're a Sith, so I really shouldn't... you know...
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06010_.mp3: Oh, I know that. I mean... you aren't yet, but you intend to be. I mean you're just like everyone else here.
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06013_.mp3: Uh, n-no, I really can't. A Sith... like you... would use any means to succeed.
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06015_.mp3: Well I... I... I didn't mean it like that.
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06017_.mp3: I... I shouldn't trust you. I can't trust you, can I?
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06019_.mp3: [Success] I just... don't feel I belong here. I thought maybe I did at first, but now... I don't know. I just have so many doubts.
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06022_.mp3: But where would I go, then? What would I do?
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06024_.mp3: I... don't know. I never really thought about it. Maybe I should seek it out, give it a try. Thank you... thank you so much!
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06027_.mp3: Uh, eh, maybe you're right. *sigh* I'll go and... tell Master Uthar that I'm not ready for this. Maybe it won't be so bad. Th-thank you.
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06029_.mp3: I guess you're right. The dark side is... where I belong. No going back now. Th-thank you.
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06031_.mp3: Yes, I'm... I'm sorry. P-please don't, don't tell anyone... I'll get over it, I guess.
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06032_.mp3: [Failure] No... no, I shouldn't bother you with it. Forget I said anything.
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06034_.mp3: [Success] I just... don't feel I belong here. I thought maybe I did at first, but now... I don't know. I have so many doubts.
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06036_.mp3: [Success] I just... don't feel I belong here. I thought maybe I did at first, but now I... I don't know. I have so many doubts.
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06038_.mp3: I... forget I said anything. Just... go back to your training, please. I have work to do.
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06040_.mp3: I... I am too a Sith! I'm more a Sith than you are! I'll show you!!
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06042_.mp3: I, uh, I suppose you're right. Never mind. Forget I said anything.
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06045_.mp3: Yes, of course. I must admit I've never really understood it very well. Enough to please Master Uthar, I guess... but I still have trouble with it.
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06048_.mp3: Yeah. Yes, I suppose so. Thanks.
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06050_.mp3: Don't say that! Leave me alone, or you'll be sorry!
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06052_.mp3: I am a Sith, better trained than you! I'll show you!!
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06056_.mp3: Of course. It's full of ancient Sith ruins, from a time before the Sith left this region of space. Rather exciting, really. I've, uh, never studied it myself... I couldn't help you much.
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06057_.mp3: If you're really interested, there's a fellow by the name of Dak who's out in the valley now. He knows plenty about it.
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06059_.mp3: Err... well, good luck with your training.
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06060_.mp3: Please don't tell anyone what I told you. They would tell me to leave... or worse.
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aakela06061_.mp3: Oh, hello again. You're, uh... doing well in your training?
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aarepp09009_.mp3: And let you hunt me down? NEVER!!
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aarepp10000_.mp3: Get lost, Sith. I'm not falling for any of your tricks.
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aarepp10002_.mp3: You can release me or kill me... but don't stand there pretending to be my friend.
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aarepp10004_.mp3: Please... some food. I'm begging you!
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aarepp10006_.mp3: The Republic will come for me. And when they do, you'll get what's coming to you!
SithAcademy_Male_01.nm35aarepp10008_.mp3: Go away. There's nothing we need to talk about.

SithAcademy_Male_02.nm35aasith15000_.mp3: It's really strange. Nobody seems to know where Master Uthar or Yuthura Ban have disappeared to. Some of the sensitives are claiming they're dead.
SithAcademy_Male_02.nm35aasith15002_.mp3: Rumor has it that something has happened to Master Uthar and Yuthura Ban. Do you know anything?
SithAcademy_Male_02.nm35aasith15004_.mp3: I heard that Yuthura Ban was dead. I suppose that means Master Uthar will be taking a new apprentice, soon.
SithAcademy_Male_02.nm35aasith15008_.mp3: Master Yuthura has taken over the academy. Everyone's talking about it! I guess she finally got rid of Uthar, somehow.
SithAcademy_Male_02.nm35aasith15010_.mp3: Have you heard? Yuthura... I mean Master Yuthura has taken over the academy! Well done, I say!
SithAcademy_Male_02.nm35aasith15012_.mp3: You aren't even a full Sith. Don't bother me.
SithAcademy_Male_02.nm35aasith15014_.mp3: Get out of my way. I don't have time to deal with hopefuls.
SithAcademy_Male_02.nm35aasith15016_.mp3: Come back when you've taken your final test. If you survive it.
SithAcademy_Male_02.nm35aasith15018_.mp3: If Master Uthar gives you an order, you'd better follow it. There were some students who disobeyed him and now they're hiding out on the surface somewhere.
SithAcademy_Male_02.nm35aasith15020_.mp3: There are some students in hiding that refused to follow an order. Master Uthar wants them found and dead... and is offering a reward for it, too!
SithAcademy_Male_02.nm35aasith15022_.mp3: Just be careful if you go into the valley. I hear there's a hermit living in the hills that kidnaps students.
SithAcademy_Male_02.nm35aasith15024_.mp3: The former master of the academy, Jorak Uln, is supposedly hiding out in the hills on the surface as some kind of mad hermit.
SithAcademy_Male_02.nm35aasith15026_.mp3: Word is that one of our experimental droids went mad and escaped and is hiding in the ruins. I wonder why we don't just gather up and destroy it?
SithAcademy_Male_02.nm35aasith15028_.mp3: One of my friends went to find that crazy droid that's hiding in the ruins in the valley. He hasn't come back, yet.
SithAcademy_Male_02.nm35aasith15030_.mp3: Ha! It's great to be on the winning side, isn't it? We've been crushing the Republic at every battle so far!
SithAcademy_Male_02.nm35aasith15032_.mp3: The latest reports say the Republic is on the run. Before long the Sith will be ruling the entire galaxy.
SithAcademy_Male_02.nm35aasith15034_.mp3: Darth Malak is one of the greatest Sith leaders ever. I hope he comes back to the academy before I leave.
SithAcademy_Male_02.nm35aasith15036_.mp3: It is my most fervent hope to serve under Darth Malak once my training is complete. Don't you feel the same?
SithAcademy_Male_02.nm35aasith15038_.mp3: Rumor around the academy is that you had something to do with those rebel students being caught, finally. They got what they deserved, I say.
SithAcademy_Male_02.nm35aasith15040_.mp3: I was told that you actually met the old master of the academy, Jorak. Is the hermit as mad as they say?
SithAcademy_Male_02.nm35aasith15042_.mp3: The buzz is that you took care of that crazy droid out in the ruins. That's pretty impressive.
SithAcademy_Male_02.nm35aasith15044_.mp3: Hmm. So you got enough prestige to win out, I hear. We'll just see if you make it through your final test.
SithAcademy_Male_02.nm35aasith15046_.mp3: Sorry, I don't have time to speak. My training awaits.

SithAcademy_Male_03.nm33abacad01015_.mp3: Hmph. Suddenly I'm a convincing slave, am I? Maybe you should have left me on the ship.
SithAcademy_Male_03.nm33abacad01017_.mp3: Don't get smart-mouthed with me, young man. You're not too old to put over my knee.
SithAcademy_Male_03.nm33abmeke02016_.mp3: Why not just shoot them where they stand? It would at least be more direct.
SithAcademy_Male_03.nm33abmeke02018_.mp3: Of course that's what *you* would do.
SithAcademy_Male_03.nm33abmekf03022_.mp3: Hmm. Did you save the boy or just crush his dreams? I wonder...
SithAcademy_Male_03.nm33abmekf03040_.mp3: One really has to wonder if all Sith start off this gullible.
SithAcademy_Male_03.nm33abmekf03057_.mp3: Seems like not much to do to be worthy of anything. How long you been up to it, boy?

SithAcademy_Male_04.nm36aaends08005_.mp3: But... what if Master Uthar is really dead? How can we hope to stand up against someone who could kill him?
SithAcademy_Male_04.nm36aaends08009_.mp3: But... if the spy was able to kill Master Uthar...
SithAcademy_Male_04.nm36aaends08017_.mp3: But... even if it's not Revan... what if Master Uthar is actually dead? Someone who could kill the master...

SithAcademy_Male_05.nm35aameke08000_.mp3: I hear you beat out the others to get the prestige you needed. Congratulations. You deserve it.
SithAcademy_Male_05.nm35aameke08002_.mp3: You spared me. I don't know why you did it... maybe you aren't even a real Sith. Either that or you're a far better one than me.
SithAcademy_Male_05.nm35aameke08004_.mp3: At any rate, where I come from folks honor their debts. I won't oppose you in the contest. If getting into the academy's what you want, go right ahead.
SithAcademy_Male_05.nm35aameke08006_.mp3: Alright, fine, you won. Big deal.
SithAcademy_Male_05.nm35aameke08010_.mp3: The name's Mekel. I'm one of the hopefuls up for Sith-hood, just like you. Well, I'm the one that's going to make it, that is.
SithAcademy_Male_05.nm35aameke08012_.mp3: That's right. You might as well just go home, you know. There can only be one Sith this year, and that's me.
SithAcademy_Male_05.nm35aameke08016_.mp3: Funny. Say that after I'm a full Sith and I'll ground your face into the dirt just for fun.
SithAcademy_Male_05.nm35aameke08019_.mp3: [Success] Hmph. I guess there's no harm in it. Word has it that Master Uthar gives big points for Sith artifacts that are brought back from the valley.
SithAcademy_Male_05.nm35aameke08021_.mp3: The Valley of the Sith Lords. You know... where the academy does all its excavating. If you really don't know, just go out the east exit and you'll see.
SithAcademy_Male_05.nm35aameke08024_.mp3: Hmph. Well, if you've known for so long, why haven't you taken advantage of it, yet? Yeah, just like I thought.
SithAcademy_Male_05.nm35aameke08027_.mp3: Well, you're free to go wander out there, if you like. Me, I'll be seeing you later.
SithAcademy_Male_05.nm35aameke08029_.mp3: [Failure] I could, but what would be the point in that? See you around, chump.
SithAcademy_Male_05.nm35aameke08032_.mp3: There's nothing you know that I could possibly want. Thanks anyhow.
SithAcademy_Male_05.nm35aameke08035_.mp3: Well, you keep working on that.
SithAcademy_Male_05.nm35aameke08037_.mp3: Yeah... so I see. I'll be keeping my eye on you.
SithAcademy_Male_05.nm35aameke08040_.mp3: Well, you're off to a super start. You've got no more prestige than I do, at the moment. Thing is: I know how to get some.
SithAcademy_Male_05.nm35aameke08042_.mp3: Uhhh... no. Nobody here will tell you anything about that. I've got a better plan, though.
SithAcademy_Male_05.nm35aameke08045_.mp3: Think what you like. Just remember: only one of us gets to become a Sith.
SithAcademy_Male_05.nm35aameke08047_.mp3: Maybe. You're not doing too bad, I suppose. I know something you don't, though.
SithAcademy_Male_05.nm35aameke08050_.mp3: Yes, I imagine you've got some scurrying around to do, don't you?
SithAcademy_Male_05.nm35aameke08052_.mp3: You've got some prestige already. Relax, why don't you?
SithAcademy_Male_05.nm35aameke08054_.mp3: Go ahead: gloat. I'll catch up to you, yet.
SithAcademy_Male_05.nm35aameke08056_.mp3: You hanging around, still? Don't you have your own plans? Not that they'll help you... I'm in for sure, you know.

SithAprentice_01.nm44aadark02000_.mp3: Who dares intrude on our meditations? You know the penalty for... Revan - you are back!
SithAprentice_01.nm44aadark02004_.mp3: Malak told us what happened to you. The Jedi Council has stripped you of your power. You are a shell of what you once were!
SithAprentice_01.nm44aainjs03000_.mp3: Please, don't hurt me! I'm injured and unarmed! I can't even get out of this bed!
SithAprentice_01.nm44aainjs03002_.mp3: I'm just one of the Sith apprentices - nobody important. I was injured when my Master sent me and two other apprentices out to investigate a ship that crashed here recently.
SithAprentice_01.nm44aainjs03003_.mp3: We didn't find the ship, but we stumbled across one of those rancors. It wasn't even full grown, but it took all three of us to bring it down.
SithAprentice_01.nm44aainjs03004_.mp3: None of us escaped unscathed, but I got the worst of it. The beast snapped my spine in the battle - I can't even walk anymore!
SithAprentice_01.nm44aainjs03006_.mp3: Lord Revan, you are the true Master. Whatever you command, I shall do. Ask your questions, Master. I am here to serve.
SithAprentice_01.nm44aainjs03007_.mp3: You think I'm gonna tell you all the Sith secrets just because I'm crippled? You won't get anything out of me!
SithAprentice_01.nm44aainjs03009_.mp3: [Success] I'll tell you whatever you want to know! Just don't hurt me, please. Haven't I suffered enough as it is?
SithAprentice_01.nm44aainjs03010_.mp3: [Failure] You think you scare me? I've seen the torture my Master uses on spies. You couldn't do anything worse than that. Why don't you just leave me alone?
SithAprentice_01.nm44aainjs03014_.mp3: I'll tell you whatever you want to know! Just don't hurt me, please. Haven't I suffered enough as it is?
SithAprentice_01.nm44aainjs03016_.mp3: [Success] L-L-Lord Revan? Forgive me, Master. I didn't recognize you. Lord Malak told us all you were dead!
SithAprentice_01.nm44aainjs03018_.mp3: Please, Lord Revan - spare me! I didn't know you still lived.
SithAprentice_01.nm44aainjs03020_.mp3: [Failure] Do you think I'm an idiot? Revan is dead - everybody knows that! The Jedi Council killed him.
SithAprentice_01.nm44aainjs03022_.mp3: [Success] My Master sent you? I guess it would be okay to answer your questions, then. What do you want to know?
SithAprentice_01.nm44aainjs03024_.mp3: I... I don't know. I swear. I'm just an apprentice. Why would they tell me anything like that?
SithAprentice_01.nm44aainjs03027_.mp3: I don't know much about the Star Forge, but I hear it has something to do with this temple. Maybe there might be information on it in the library down on the lower level.
SithAprentice_01.nm44aainjs03030_.mp3: Lord Revan, I only followed Malak because I thought you were dead. But you are the Master I swore allegiance to. I will not betray you!
SithAprentice_01.nm44aainjs03032_.mp3: I will not betray you, Lord Revan. It is physically impossible for me, in any case. My injuries are so severe it will be weeks before I can leave this bed.
SithAprentice_01.nm44aainjs03033_.mp3: I have a broken back, remember? I can't walk. But if you want you could up my kolto dosage. That'll knock me cold for at least six hours. You don't have to hurt me or anything.
SithAprentice_01.nm44aainjs03035_.mp3: Good. The pain in my back is getting pretty bad, anyway. You'll actually be doing me a favor.
SithAprentice_01.nm44aainjs03037_.mp3: Since my Master sent you I guess I can answer your questions. What do you want to know?
SithAprentice_01.nm44aainjs03039_.mp3: Remember - tell my Master that I answered all your questions. I want to stay on his good side.
SithAprentice_01.nm44aainjs03043_.mp3: How may I serve you, Lord Revan?
SithAprentice_01.nm44aainjs03044_.mp3: Back again? I know my Master sent you, but I'm supposed to be resting and recovering. It will take time for the Kolto to repair the damage. *sigh* What do you want?
SithAprentice_01.nm45aadarj01000_.mp3: Ah... more victims for us to slaughter.

SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02000_.mp3: Ha ha ha! Another idiotic student has stumbled into my little web, eh?
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02002_.mp3: Well... the contact nerve toxin in the air should knock you out quickly enough. Ha ha! Welcome!
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02004_.mp3: Awake already, are you? Good! This is the tomb of Sith Lord Tulak Hord, if you don't know. I've taken up residence here, for now... it's dusty and full of critters, but it's home.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02006_.mp3: Ah, yes! Introductions of course! I suppose it is time, isn't it?
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02008_.mp3: This other student here that I captured earlier you should know well enough. His name is Mekel. Say hello, Mekel.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02012_.mp3: Poor lad. He's had a hard day. My name is Jorak Uln. I was once the head of the academy, so I'm sure you've heard of me.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02014_.mp3: Liar. I know the spark of recognition when I see it. Nice try.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02016_.mp3: No? Blast it! What have they been teaching you children in that academy these days!
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02019_.mp3: That's good. It's nice to still be the topic of discussion ocassionally. Maybe there's a class on me? Mmm... hmm... maybe not.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02021_.mp3: Liar. You think I can't tell? Obviously the academy is lax in its training, as usual. Stupid Uthar.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02024_.mp3: What?! Old hermit?! Can't that blasted Uthar teach a single thing right these days?! Slander! That's what it is!
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02027_.mp3: Oh, my, my, my. Such glorious vim! If I could bottle it and drink it, I would. Hmmm... there's a thought.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02029_.mp3: Anyhow, I'd like to propose that we move onto the main event. You see, I'd like to discover if you've got the pluck of an old-fashioned Sith.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02031_.mp3: Most of the drek Uthar has been passing through these days is so pathetic. Take young Mekel here... I already tested him. Didn't I, Mekel?
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02035_.mp3: Yes, yes, you're welcome. You see, Mekel here has the cruel disposition of a Sith... but not the *gumption* that I'm looking for.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02037_.mp3: Ha ha! Then I'd say you have quite an imagination. Not a bad thing, but not *quite* what I'm looking for in a proper Sith.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02039_.mp3: I'm sure we could. We could chat all day about it, but where would that get us? I'm quite determined, and you are quite helpless.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02041_.mp3: I'm sure we could. You could even try using your feminine wiles on me. But, quite frankly, I'm quite determined and not above killing a woman. Even a pretty one.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02043_.mp3: Perhaps you have some questions? I'm not above delaying the test a bit. The results are always the same.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02045_.mp3: I don't remember offering you a choice. You can refuse to answer my questions, of course, but then I'm afraid I will just have to assume the worst.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02048_.mp3: Now, now, is that any kind of attitude to take with higher education? I'm doing you a favor, really.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02050_.mp3: So, then! This is how it goes: I'm going to pose a moral question to you. Get it right, and I torture Mekel. Get it wrong, and I torture you.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02052_.mp3: Mekel, here, is a bit weak... he probably won't be able to take much more punishment. Mind you... get too many wrong and you'll die, yourself.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02054_.mp3: I don't know what you think of Mekel. Maybe you don't like him. Maybe you think he deserves to be murdered? Well, here's your chance. Fair enough?
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02056_.mp3: Then you win. If you die, then he wins. I thought this was self-evident. Did you not grasp the concept earlier?
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02059_.mp3: Oh? Just how long have you been a Sith, anyhow? A bit dainty around the edges, aren't we?
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02062_.mp3: No hesitation before the kill. Now that's what I like to hear.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02065_.mp3: Well, then. Any last comments before we begin, Mekel?
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02069_.mp3: Now, now, dear lad. Do you really think your friend here will answer questions wrong just to spare little you, risking their own life?
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02071_.mp3: And how many correctly-answered questions before you die, hmmm? No, don't be silly... you had your chance, remember?
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02075_.mp3: Now, then. Your immediate superior amongst the Sith is an effective commander and a fine leader. He trusts you and you like him. You see an opportunity to kill him. What do you do?
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02077_.mp3: Incorrect! Do that and no-one is in command. You derived no benefit from the kill, and neither did the Sith. We are not savages, you know.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02080_.mp3: Incorrect! What sort of thinking is that? If all the Sith thought as you did, we would all be soft like the Jedi. Tsk.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02082_.mp3: Ah, well. It is time for your punishment.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02085_.mp3: Correct! He was a fool to let down his guard. You will not make the same mistake, and the Sith as a whole benefit.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02087_.mp3: You see, Mekel? It is not so difficult. Time for your punishment.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02089_.mp3: And so we come to round two. You come across a group of humans who are threatened by dangerous animals. They plead for help, offering you a reward. What do you do?
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02091_.mp3: So you've made a profit and now have some sniveling, useless fools trailing after you. No, no, no. Bad idea. Bad idea.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02093_.mp3: At any rate... here is your punishment.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02096_.mp3: Correct! The humans would no doubt just be preyed upon by something else, later. Stand up for yourself, I say! We're not Jedi shepherds, after all.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02098_.mp3: Sadly, Mekel, the ingenuity of your fellow student is your loss. This is going to hurt.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02100_.mp3: Let's see... ah, yes. You discover an aspect of the Force that gives you great power. Do you share it and strengthen the Sith as a whole or keep it to yourself?
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02102_.mp3: Correct! Let them rip the secret from your cold, dead hands... if they are strong enough. Oh, certainly, you might share it with a few... selected... minions, but that of course is a completely different story. Ha ha!
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02104_.mp3: Well, it's sad to say, but it's that time again, Mekel.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02106_.mp3: Will you look at that? Poor Mekel has gone and died on us. Tsk tsk. And here I thought he was good for at least one more.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02108_.mp3: Still going? Alright, then. One of your underlings has made a major mistake which makes you look bad. He is normally very competent and skilled. Do you kill him or give him another chance?
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02110_.mp3: Correct! Publicly, if you can. There is no room for that level of failure. Not killing him would be seen as a sign of weakness... and then where would you be?
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02112_.mp3: Ahhh, Mekel. The time has come once again, hasn't it?
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02114_.mp3: Last question! You're about to die. Do you pass on your knowledge to your apprentice to make him stronger... or do you use your last breath to strike at your enemies?
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02116_.mp3: What?! How did you know that? That was my trick question! Bah! Telepathy. No, wait! Someone told you didn't they!
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02118_.mp3: Hmph. Regardless, I suppose rules are rules. Time for your medicine, Mekel, my boy.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02120_.mp3: Well, then... with young Mekel dead, I suppose you've gone and passed my little test, haven't you? That indeed would be a first.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02122_.mp3: I think you must have cheated a little, but there's nothing wrong with a Sith cheating a little. I'll keep my word.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02124_.mp3: I'll just give you my tablet. Perhaps we'll meet again... Sith. That would be fun, no?
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02126_.mp3: Now... this is odd. The test is over and you're both still alive. Well that's never happened before. Hmmmn. What to do, what to do...
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02128_.mp3: I suppose this means you can go, Mekel. I'll have to just figure out what to do with our friend, here. Run along, now.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02132_.mp3: What?! Mutiny! Behave, students! I'll... that's it! Detention for all of you! Permanent detention!!
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02135_.mp3: Fool! It is a trick question! A true Sith *never* dies!! Ha ha ha ha ha!!
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02137_.mp3: I'll enjoy this one. Time for your medicine!
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02141_.mp3: Hmph. Such insolent students I get, these days. You deserve this, and then some!
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02143_.mp3: Another chance to make you look poor to your superiors? To make it look like you are weak and deserving of attack? No, no, no. Think again.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02145_.mp3: Hmmm. Not that good help is easy to find. Oh, well, here's your reward.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02148_.mp3: You're not trying to make me angry, are you? That would be pointless posturing on your part. Is this so hard?
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02151_.mp3: You gained an advantage and you share it freely? Let them rip the secret from my dead hands, I say! I mean... 'share it'?! Are you mad?!
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02153_.mp3: *sigh* Well, you did ask for this. It's for your own good.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02156_.mp3: And here I thought this question was an easy one. Ah, well, suit yourself.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02159_.mp3: And pass up the opportunity to gain? What kind of Sith are you going to be if you don't grab fate by the nose hairs? No, no, no. That is bad form.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02162_.mp3: Well, now you're just punishing yourself. Do you really not know the answers, here? Shame.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02165_.mp3: Then I must assume you did not know the correct answer. Sad, really, that you would do this to yourself.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02168_.mp3: Why, then you go free! Tell you what... I'll even pass onto you my own personal thesis on ancient Sith philosophies.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02170_.mp3: They're based on all I've learned studying Tulak's tomb. It'll make you a better Sith, I'm sure. The chances of you passing, however, are sadly remote.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02172_.mp3: Well, forgive me for resorting to the cliche, but you would die, of course.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02174_.mp3: Ahhh, what's a little mental instability between tutor and pupil? What's important is that I'm here to better the Sith as a whole. It's a big job.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02176_.mp3: Ha ha ha! I maaay do that. In time, in time. But for now, I've decided to keep you in restraints. No point in you getting strange ideas in your head and ruining my fun.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02178_.mp3: No, no. Let's keep things on a more civilized note, shall we? Now then... introductions are always the place to start, if I remember correctly.
SithJedi_Male_01.nm38abjora02181_.mp3: Oh-ho! Spiteful little thing, aren't you? Let's not forget, however, who has whom at the disadvantage, shall we?

SithMaster.nm35aasith16000_.mp3: There are... tremors in the Force. I fear things have changed greatly, here. Are you responsible for this?
SithMaster.nm35aasith16002_.mp3: I understand that our renegade students have been dealt with... and that you are responsible for that. Congratulations.
SithMaster.nm35aasith16004_.mp3: I hear that you have gained sufficient prestige to undertake the final test. Well done.
SithMaster.nm35aasith16006_.mp3: How do you do, hopeful? Seeking prestige, yes?
SithMaster.nm35aasith16008_.mp3: I am a trainer here at the academy. I think I may be able to offer you some aid in gaining prestige, if you desire.
SithMaster.nm35aasith16010_.mp3: Do you know of our renegade students?
SithMaster.nm35aasith16012_.mp3: Ah. Let me tell you what I can, then.
SithMaster.nm35aasith16014_.mp3: A group of students were ordered to perform executions on civilians within the colony. They refused to carry out the orders.
SithMaster.nm35aasith16016_.mp3: Master Uthar naturally ordered them killed... but they fled before this could take place. If one could carry out Uthar's order, it would be worth considerable prestige.
SithMaster.nm35aasith16018_.mp3: There are five of them, if I remember... and they cannot be far, as they have no method to leave the planet. Likely hiding in the hills on the surface.
SithMaster.nm35aasith16021_.mp3: Those are the ones. It seems you have already heard of them.
SithMaster.nm35aasith16023_.mp3: There is little more I can tell you, then. Should you locate their hiding place, you would gain considerable prestige, I am sure.
SithMaster.nm35aasith16025_.mp3: Now if you will excuse me, I must return to my studies.
SithMaster.nm35aasith16028_.mp3: May the Force serve you well.

sith_fem.nm26absith12000_.mp3: We might have a position within the Sith organization for one such as you.
sith_fem.nm26absith12004_.mp3: This is war. In war certain distasteful acts cannot be avoided. But ask yourself this - when we win this war, would you rather be against the Sith, or with us?
sith_fem.nm26absith12008_.mp3: Excellent. Report to the Sith Embassy tomorrow for your assignment.
sith_fem.nm26absith12010_.mp3: I have no desire to speak to you. I know you have links to the Republic.
sith_fem.nm26absith14012_.mp3: Her mercenary spirit isn't what's selling the autoprints.

sith_soldier_01.nm02absith18000_.mp3: Another patrol heading down to the Lower City, eh? Good luck... I've heard it's pretty rough down there. There's a big swoop gang war going on, you know.
sith_soldier_01.nm02absith18002_.mp3: You better watch yourself: those gangs will take a shot at anyone - even us! It's too bad we don't have the manpower to just sweep those slums clean.
sith_soldier_01.nm02absith18004_.mp3: This elevator is off limits. Only Sith patrols and those with proper authorization are allowed into the Lower City.
sith_soldier_01.nm02absith18006_.mp3: It's obvious from the way you're dressed that you're not one of the Sith patrols, so unless you have the authorization papers you must move along!
sith_soldier_01.nm02absith18008_.mp3: Well why didn't you say so? Hmmm... everything seems to be in order. Okay, I guess you can go down to the Lower City.
sith_soldier_01.nm02absith18011_.mp3: If you were supposed to have them you'd know where to get them. Now quit wasting my time and move along.
sith_soldier_01.nm02absith18013_.mp3: I'm not here to give you information! I work for the Sith, not the Taris tourist board! Now just move along, unless you have the proper authorization papers.
sith_soldier_01.nm02absith18018_.mp3: Look, you've already shown me your authorization so you can go on down to the Lower City anytime you want. You don't have to keep bothering me.
sith_soldier_01.nm02absith18020_.mp3: Just be careful down there. Those swoop gangs will take a shot at anybody. Even our Sith patrols have come under fire!
sith_soldier_01.nm02absith19000_.mp3: Is there anything more boring than being out on patrol? Ah, I guess I shouldn't complain.
sith_soldier_01.nm02absith19002_.mp3: Some of the troops got stuck patrolling the Undercity sewers. That's one assignment I wouldn't want!
sith_soldier_01.nm02absith19004_.mp3: Out of our way, citizen - we're on official Sith business! Just stand aside if you know what's good for you!
sith_soldier_01.nm02acsith07000_.mp3: Hey, what do you think you're doing? You can't go into the cantina while you're on duty!
sith_soldier_01.nm02acsith07002_.mp3: Then you shouldn't be in full uniform! If you're off duty go change your outfit. If not, get back to your patrol route!
sith_soldier_01.nm02acsith07005_.mp3: Good. Get back to your patrol route. We need to keep a strong presence in the streets to maintain order here.
sith_soldier_01.nm02acsith07007_.mp3: Don't bother me - I'm here on official Sith business!
sith_soldier_01.nm02acsith08000_.mp3: Is there anything more boring than being out on patrol? Ah, I guess I shouldn't complain.
sith_soldier_01.nm02acsith08002_.mp3: Some of the troops got stuck patrolling the Undercity sewers. That's one assignment I wouldn't want!
sith_soldier_01.nm02acsith08004_.mp3: Out of our way, citizen - we're on official Sith business! Just stand aside if you know what's good for you!
sith_soldier_01.nm02adsith10000_.mp3: Just move along. There's nothing to see here.
sith_soldier_01.nm02adsith10002_.mp3: Where did you hide those Sith uniforms? Did you sell them to the Tarisian underground? Start talking - I want answers!
sith_soldier_01.nm02adsith10006_.mp3: A few of the Sith trooper uniforms have gone missing. We've got evidence that this alien knows something about them, so the commander's interrogating him.
sith_soldier_01.nm02adsith10010_.mp3: Uh-oh. I think the commander's losing his temper. I'm glad I'm out here - it took me an hour to clean the blood stains from my uniform after the last interrogation.
sith_soldier_01.nm02adsith10012_.mp3: Then I guess we don't lose anything when the commander blows his head off, do we? Anyway - what do you care?
sith_soldier_01.nm02adsith10013_.mp3: Just stay out of this, if you know what's good for you!
sith_soldier_01.nm02adsith10015_.mp3: What was that? Did I hear you right? 'Let' us kill him? How can you stop us?
sith_soldier_01.nm02adsith10017_.mp3: Time to teach this soldier how we deal with insubordination!
sith_soldier_01.nm02adsith10019_.mp3: Time to teach this civilian the penalty for defying the Sith!
sith_soldier_01.nm02adsith10023_.mp3: Who said that? What's going on out there?
sith_soldier_01.nm02adsith10028_.mp3: This is your last chance: where did you hide those uniforms you stole?
sith_soldier_01.nm02adsith10032_.mp3: Get in here, search the room. I know those uniforms are in here somewhere.
sith_soldier_01.nm02adsith10034_.mp3: You're a little too curious for your own good, civilian! This doesn't concern you!
sith_soldier_01.nm02adsith10037_.mp3: Hey, we don't need any reinforcements. All we're doing is searching for some missing Sith uniforms.
sith_soldier_01.nm02adsith10042_.mp3: Good - get back to patrolling the streets. We can handle this in here.
sith_soldier_01.nm02adsith10044_.mp3: What do you want, civilian? Do you have any information about the missing Sith uniforms? Make it quick!
sith_soldier_01.nm02adsith10046_.mp3: You're awfully curious about this... maybe a little too curious! I think you know more about those missing uniforms than you're saying!
sith_soldier_01.nm02adsith10048_.mp3: Not so fast, civilian... why are you here? Are you a spy? You came to buy Sith uniforms from this alien, didn't you? Didn't you?!
sith_soldier_01.nm02adsith10050_.mp3: A threat?! I knew you were a spy!
sith_soldier_01.nm02adsith10053_.mp3: Right... like I'm going to believe that! A crate of Sith uniforms goes missing and you just happen to wander into the apartment of our prime suspect? That's pretty convenient!
sith_soldier_01.nm02adsith10055_.mp3: You're part of some Tarisian underground resistance, aren't you? Time for you to learn how the Sith deal with spies!
sith_soldier_01.nm03aaloit18000_.mp3: You out on patrol? Consider yourself lucky: we're stuck standing guard over this dump to try and prevent another swoop riot!
sith_soldier_01.nm03aaloit18002_.mp3: This area is off limits because of the riot after the last race! You Tarisians couldn't handle crowd control, so we're shutting down the swoop track. Just move along!
sith_soldier_01.nm03aasith19000_.mp3: Hold on - where do you think you're going? This area is restricted to Undercity patrols! Without the proper security papers I can't let you past.
sith_soldier_01.nm03aasith19002_.mp3: Let me see... hmmm, these look to be in order. Okay, you can go down if you want. Can't say I envy you, though.
sith_soldier_01.nm03aasith19004_.mp3: The Undercity is crawling with mutants. Rakghouls, they call 'em. If you see anything moving down there, shoot first and ask questions later.
sith_soldier_01.nm03aasith19007_.mp3: [Failure] I don't know how they do things in the Upper City, but down here we follow our orders to the letter! Without your security papers I can't let you past.
sith_soldier_01.nm03aasith19009_.mp3: So just march on back to the base, talk to your commanding officer and tell him you need the security papers. Otherwise you ain't getting down.
sith_soldier_01.nm03aasith19013_.mp3: You just made a big mistake!
sith_soldier_01.nm03aasith19016_.mp3: Good... I don't have time for this foolishness. Down here we run a tight ship - not like the slipshod operation in the Upper City.
sith_soldier_01.nm03aasith19018_.mp3: Hold on there, civilian! Only those with official Sith business are allowed into the Undercity.
sith_soldier_01.nm03aasith19020_.mp3: Unless you've got the proper security papers you better just turn around and go back the way you came.
sith_soldier_01.nm03aasith19022_.mp3: You can't... not unless you're on official Sith business. And if you were, someone would already have given you the papers.
sith_soldier_01.nm03aasith19024_.mp3: I'm not here to answer your questions. My orders are to guard the elevator. Now either show me the proper security papers or move along.
sith_soldier_01.nm03aasith19025_.mp3: Hey, you've already shown me your security clearance. You don't have to speak to me every time you come by. If you need to use the elevator to the Undercity just go ahead.
sith_soldier_01.nm03aasith19027_.mp3: Just be careful down there. Watch out for those rakghouls!
sith_soldier_01.nm04aasith27000_.mp3: You there! Civilian! This is a restricted area! What are you doing down here?
sith_soldier_01.nm04aasith27002_.mp3: Security papers? Oh... you're one of those trackers the Commander sent down, right? They should have given you an armed escort - it's nasty down here!
sith_soldier_01.nm04aasith27004_.mp3: We've already lost one patrol... we figure the rakghouls got them. We've had so many encounters with those things we've actually run out of rakghoul serum.
sith_soldier_01.nm04aasith27006_.mp3: Plus we've had several skirmishes with looters from those Lower City swoop gangs. I'm telling you, we should just stay in the Upper City where we're in control!
sith_soldier_01.nm04aasith27008_.mp3: Oh, is that why you're down here? Search and rescue? I didn't think they would send anyone. They were in the southern section of the Undercity when we lost contact.
sith_soldier_01.nm04aasith27010_.mp3: I would have gone to investigate, but my orders are to search for those crashed escape pods... even if it means leaving another patrol to die.
sith_soldier_01.nm04aasith27012_.mp3: Hey, I'd never disobey my orders... I'm not a fan of court martials and executions. I was just talking, you know? Nothing anyone has to mention to the Commander.
sith_soldier_01.nm04aasith27014_.mp3: Come on patrol, let's get back to it. The sooner we get this search done the sooner we can get out of this mutant infested hole. Move out!
sith_soldier_01.nm04aasith27019_.mp3: Yeah, sure... the Commander won't be too happy if you come back empty, right? Same thing goes for us.
sith_soldier_01.nm04aasith27022_.mp3: You're questioning the Sith? How many people do we have to kill before the rest of you learn some respect?
sith_soldier_01.nm04aasith27024_.mp3: Well, I guess it's time for another lesson. Patrol... attack!
sith_soldier_01.nm05aasith05000_.mp3: You there! Civillian! This is a restricted area! What are you doing down here?
sith_soldier_01.nm05aasith05002_.mp3: Papers? Don't wave those in my face - anyone can forge papers! Call me crazy, but I'm suspicious of anyone wandering around in these sewers, even if they have papers!
sith_soldier_01.nm05aasith05003_.mp3: Unless you want me to take you in for questioning you better tell me what you're doing down here!
sith_soldier_01.nm05aasith05005_.mp3: [Success] Okay, okay. You've got your papers, I get it. You can't blame me for being a little on edge after getting stuck with an assignment like this!
sith_soldier_01.nm05aasith05006_.mp3: Wandering around these stinking sewers under constant attack from rakghouls... we've already run out of rakghoul serum! Plus I heard we lost one of our patrols in the Undercity.
sith_soldier_01.nm05aasith05008_.mp3: From what I heard they were in the southern section of the Undercity when contact with the base was cut off. They haven't been heard from since. Probably another rakghoul attack.
sith_soldier_01.nm05aasith05009_.mp3: And nobody's even out looking for them. Finding those downed escape pods takes priority over everything else, even the lives of a patrol. An order like that isn't good for moral.
sith_soldier_01.nm05aasith05011_.mp3: You don't have to tell me my orders! I'm a patrol leader... I know what's expected of me and my men!
sith_soldier_01.nm05aasith05012_.mp3: Come on boys... let's get out of here. The sooner we get this search done the sooner we can get out of these filthy tunnels. Move out!
sith_soldier_01.nm05aasith05014_.mp3: And get court martialed? What kind of talk is that? Wait a minute... you're a spy! You're trying to undermine the discipline of the Sith troops!
sith_soldier_01.nm05aasith05015_.mp3: Time for you to learn how we deal with spies!
sith_soldier_01.nm05aasith05018_.mp3: Yeah, right. Same goes for us.
sith_soldier_01.nm05aasith05019_.mp3: [Failure] Nice try, but I'm not buying it. I think you're a spy!
sith_soldier_01.nm05aasith05021_.mp3: [Success] Hey, settle down. I don't want any trouble with the Commander. But you can't blame me for being on edge after getting stuck with an assignment like this!
sith_soldier_01.nm05aasith05023_.mp3: My tone? I'm leading a patrol through the reeking sewers under constant attack from mutants and rogue droids! And you have a problem with my tone?
sith_soldier_01.nm05aasith05024_.mp3: I'm going to ask you one last time, civilian - what are you doing down here!
sith_soldier_01.nm05absith01000_.mp3: You there! Civillian! This is a restricted area! What are you doing down here?
sith_soldier_01.nm05absith01002_.mp3: Papers? Don't wave those in my face - anyone can forge papers! Call me crazy, but I'm suspicious of anyone wandering around in these sewers, even if they have papers!
sith_soldier_01.nm05absith01003_.mp3: Unless you want me to take you in for questioning you better tell me what you're doing down here!
sith_soldier_01.nm05absith01005_.mp3: [Success] Okay, okay. You've got your papers, I get it. You can't blame me for being a little on edge after getting stuck with an assignment like this!
sith_soldier_01.nm05absith01006_.mp3: Wandering around these stinking sewers under constant attack from rakghouls... we've already run out of rakghoul serum! Plus I heard we lost one of our patrols in the Undercity.
sith_soldier_01.nm05absith01008_.mp3: From what I heard they were in the southern section of the Undercity when contact with the base was cut off. They haven't been heard from since. Probably another rakghoul attack.
sith_soldier_01.nm05absith01009_.mp3: And nobody's even out looking for them. Finding those downed escape pods takes priority over everything else, even the lives of a patrol. An order like that isn't good for moral.
sith_soldier_01.nm05absith01011_.mp3: You don't have to tell me my orders! I'm a patrol leader... I know what's expected of me and my men!
sith_soldier_01.nm05absith01012_.mp3: Come on boys... let's get out of here. The sooner we get this search done the sooner we can get out of these filthy tunnels. Move out!
sith_soldier_01.nm05absith01014_.mp3: And get court martialed? What kind of talk is that? Wait a minute... you're a spy! You're trying to undermine the discipline of the Sith troops!
sith_soldier_01.nm05absith01015_.mp3: Time for you to learn how we Sith deal with spies!
sith_soldier_01.nm05absith01018_.mp3: Yeah, right. Same goes for us.
sith_soldier_01.nm05absith01019_.mp3: [Failure] Nice try, but I'm not buying it. I think you're a spy!
sith_soldier_01.nm05absith01021_.mp3: [Success] Hey, settle down. I don't want any trouble with the Commander. But you can't blame me for being on edge after getting stuck with an assignment like this!
sith_soldier_01.nm05absith01023_.mp3: My tone? I'm leading a patrol through the reeking sewers under constant attack from mutants and rogue droids! And you have a problem with my tone?
sith_soldier_01.nm05absith01024_.mp3: I'm going to ask you one last time, civilian - what are you doing down here!
sith_soldier_01.nm09aasith03000_.mp3: Intruders in the base! Attack! Attack!
sith_soldier_01.nm14abcut002000_.mp3: You've been holding out on us again. Since you haven't given us enough money, I guess we're going to have to take it out of you piece by piece!
sith_soldier_01.nm14abcut002002_.mp3: Ha-ha! Mmm... Wife and children. Sounds like a good idea...
sith_soldier_01.nm26acsith30000_.mp3: Malak will show you Republics how a war is really waged!
sith_soldier_01.nm33abacad01000_.mp3: You are a student at the academy. You may enter by the door.
sith_soldier_01.nm33abacad01001_.mp3: You again? I told you to locate Yuthura Ban in the cantina. She is the only one who can bring new students into the academy.
sith_soldier_01.nm33abacad01002_.mp3: Greetings, student. I see you have the medallion that marks you as one of the chosen.
sith_soldier_01.nm33abacad01003_.mp3: I do not recognize you, however. Have you been accepted into the academy very recently?
sith_soldier_01.nm33abacad01005_.mp3: [Failure] I see. And who might your friends be?
sith_soldier_01.nm33abacad01007_.mp3: Ah. I trust you will be responsible for ensuring your slaves are not disruptive, then?
sith_soldier_01.nm33abacad01014_.mp3: If your animal acts up he will be destroyed. This would reflect badly on you, understand?
sith_soldier_01.nm33abacad01022_.mp3: So long as the Sith do not object to them, neither will I. They will be your responsibility, of course.
sith_soldier_01.nm33abacad01025_.mp3: You will want to bring your medallion to Yuthura Ban. She is the one who brings all selected students into the academy for their training.
sith_soldier_01.nm33abacad01026_.mp3: I believe she can be located within the cantina here in the colony. I suggest you go to her while she is still there, student.
sith_soldier_01.nm33abacad01029_.mp3: You are neither a Sith nor do you bear the medallion of a student of this facility. Please leave at once.
sith_soldier_01.nm33abacad01031_.mp3: You must be admitted to the academy. That decision must be made by a Sith who has already been accepted, here.
sith_soldier_01.nm33abacad01032_.mp3: The final decision, however, remains with Master Yuthura. I believe she is currently at the cantina if you wish to seek her out. Now go.
sith_soldier_01.nm33abacad01034_.mp3: It is the device given to one who has been accepted into the academy, but has not yet proved their worth as a student.
sith_soldier_01.nm33abacad01035_.mp3: If one of the Sith decides you are worthy, you will be given one... which you must then take to Yuthura Ban, who I believe is in the cantina. It is she who decides which hopefuls enter the academy.
sith_soldier_01.nm33abacad01037_.mp3: [Failure] No-one gets inside, citizen. Messages and deliveries must be relayed through official Sith channels only.
sith_soldier_01.nm33abacad01039_.mp3: [Failure] I have been conditioned to resist mental persuasion, citizen. Please do not attempt that again.
sith_soldier_01.nm40aacuts01001_.mp3: These are the three we were supposed to watch out for, Commander. But there's more inside.
sith_soldier_01.nm40aajole07002_.mp3: What do you want, old man? You better not be trying to cause any trouble or you'll be sorry!
sith_soldier_01.nm40aajole07006_.mp3: Uh... yes. It's too drafty in there. Your old bones might catch a chill. We don't want that. Get out of there.
sith_soldier_01.nm40aajole07010_.mp3: Yes... what I did was wrong. Very wrong.
sith_soldier_01.nm40aajole07014_.mp3: Yes... I deserve to be locked up for disobeying orders.
sith_soldier_01.nm40aajole07016_.mp3: Huh? What... what just happened? What am I doing in here? Damn you, old man! I'll kill you if I ever get out of here!
sith_soldier_01.nm40aamiss08000_.mp3: Come on, girlie. Into the cell. Let's go, I haven't got all day to waste on you. I need to get back to my post.
sith_soldier_01.nm40aamiss08004_.mp3: You think you're pretty funny, don't you? But you're only making things worse for yourself.
sith_soldier_01.nm40aamiss08008_.mp3: Maybe a little time in solitary confinement will teach you the proper respect for the Sith! Now, get into that cell!
sith_soldier_01.nm40aamiss08012_.mp3: That's funny. You should tell that one to the torturer when he comes to deal with you.
sith_soldier_01.nm40aamiss08016_.mp3: No snappy comeback this time? The thought of torture scares you, hmm? Well, it should! The Sith have ways to inflict pain you can't even imagine.
sith_soldier_01.nm40aamiss08018_.mp3: It may be a few hours before your torture begins; we're busy interrogating your friends right now. Hey, I know! You could use this time to think up witty ways to beg for mercy. Ha! Ha!
sith_soldier_01.nm40aasith11000_.mp3: Bastila, Carth and the crew have been taken prisoner as you ordered, commander!
sith_soldier_01.nm40aasith11002_.mp3: Excellent. Have you searched the ship thoroughly? Admiral Karath warned me to be on alert for any kind of treachery.
sith_soldier_01.nm40aasith11004_.mp3: We found a young Twi'lek in the back. She's got quite the mouth on her! She swore at me and spit on my uniform.
sith_soldier_01.nm40aasith11006_.mp3: She tried to bite me through my armor! And you should hear what she said about my mother. Admiral Karath needs to teach her the proper respect for the Sith!
sith_soldier_01.nm40aasith11008_.mp3: The Admiral doesn't have time to bother with some Twi'lek girl! Take her away to solitary confinement. I'll leave it up to you to teach her the proper respect for the Sith!
sith_soldier_01.nm40aasith11010_.mp3: We found a disabled astromech droid in the back of the ship.
sith_soldier_01.nm40aasith11012_.mp3: Wipe its memory chips and take it to the junk pile. Maybe we can use some of its parts for salvage.
sith_soldier_01.nm40aasith11014_.mp3: We found an old man in the back. I... I think we should keep him separate from the others. For questioning.
sith_soldier_01.nm40aasith11016_.mp3: A strange request. And why do you think this old man should be segregated?
sith_soldier_01.nm40aasith11018_.mp3: I... I'm not sure, Commander. After speaking with him I just... I just think we should question him away from the others.
sith_soldier_01.nm40aasith11020_.mp3: I... I agree, Commander. After speaking with the old man I think we should question him away from the others.
sith_soldier_01.nm40aasith11022_.mp3: Very well. The Admiral is probably too busy to bother with this old man anyway. Take him to solitary confinement for interrogation. Report back to me if you learn anything.
sith_soldier_01.nm40aasith11024_.mp3: We found an injured Mandalorian in the back. Looks like he was trying to rig the ship's engines to break free of our tractor beam when something exploded.
sith_soldier_01.nm40aasith11026_.mp3: Admiral Karath wants us to question all the prisoners. Did you get any information from him?
sith_soldier_01.nm40aasith11028_.mp3: He's unconscious right now. I don't think he's going to make it. He's burned pretty bad.
sith_soldier_01.nm40aasith11030_.mp3: Dump the Mandalorian in the medical bay. Let them take the blame if he dies before the Admiral has a chance to interrogate him.
sith_soldier_01.nm40aasith11032_.mp3: We searched the ship from top to bottom. Somebody would have had to be invisible for us not to find them in there.
sith_soldier_01.nm40aasith11034_.mp3: Well done. Return to your posts, and I will tell the Admiral of this.
sith_soldier_01.nm40aasith11036_.mp3: We found a disabled hunter-killer droid in the back of the ship.
sith_soldier_01.nm40aasith11038_.mp3: Excellent. We can reprogram this droid to fight in our own army. Wipe its memory chip and take it to the salvage shop. The technicians will deal with it later.

sith_soldier_02.nm02adsith10008_.mp3: I'm getting sick of your lies, you alien scum! We got your ugly mug on a security tape from the base! Start talking before I splatter your slimy brains all over this room!

sith_soldier_03.nm26acsecu16000_.mp3: Obey the laws here on Manaan, human.
sith_soldier_03.nm26acsith22000_.mp3: The Selkath have slapped heavy export restrictions on kolto for everyone. Someone must have done something to piss them off. Damn Republic, I bet...
sith_soldier_03.nm26acsith22001_.mp3: Our Embassy has been closed temporarily because someone dropped a wrench in the elevator. And that's OFFICIAL!
sith_soldier_03.nm26acsith22002_.mp3: That slime Sunry got free after killing one of us! If I ever meet his Arbiter in the street...
sith_soldier_03.nm26acsith22003_.mp3: We got revenge for Elassa in the trial! Finally we get some justice from those fish-headed freaks!
sith_soldier_03.nm26acsith22004_.mp3: These Selkath don't know what they're going to miss. When the Sith Empire finally crushes the Republic, then we'll see how long their vaunted neutrality lasts.
sith_soldier_03.nm26acsith26000_.mp3: Your precious Republic's days are numbered! It won't be long until Malak turns his armada loose on Coruscant itself!
sith_soldier_03.nm26acsith26004_.mp3: You're a fool! When the Sith descend on Coruscant, our numbers will block out the sun itself! The galactic senators will collapse trembling in fear, and beg for mercy at Malak's feet!
sith_soldier_03.nm26acsith26008_.mp3: That can be arranged. Remember what happened to Taris - Malak could do the same to the Core worlds!
sith_soldier_03.nm26acsith26012_.mp3: Now it is you who underestimate our resolve.
sith_soldier_03.nm26acsith26014_.mp3: What's this? Another Republic lackey wandering the streets? Don't worry - the Sith will destroy you along with all the rest who don't bow down before Malak!
sith_soldier_03.nm26acsith26016_.mp3: I have nothing more to say to you. I have important Sith business to tend to.
sith_soldier_03.nm26acsith26019_.mp3: Save your empty threats. If you're stupid enough to attack me the Selkath authorities will lock you away for a long, long time.
sith_soldier_03.nm26acsith26022_.mp3: Let me guess... Dark Lord of the Sith?
sith_soldier_03.nm26acsith26026_.mp3: HAHAHAHA! You moron! Revan's dead! And if you try to back up your stupid words with stupid deeds the Selkath will be all over you like a Mon Calamari during mating season.
sith_soldier_03.nm26acsith26028_.mp3: Now some of us have serious work to do. *chuckle* Run along, fool.
sith_soldier_03.nm26acsith29000_.mp3: You Republics sicken me! We'll do the galaxy a favor by wiping you out!

Sith_Worried_Child_male_01.nm02aachil03000_.mp3: You're one of them Sith, ain't you? My mommy says I'm not supposed to talk to you.
Sith_Worried_Child_male_01.nm02aachil03002_.mp3: You ain't supposed to be here! This ain't your home!
Sith_Worried_Child_male_01.nm02aachil03004_.mp3: Is you one of the Sith? My daddy says the Sith are nothing but bullies. You don't look like a bully.
Sith_Worried_Child_male_01.nm02aachil03006_.mp3: My Momma says I have to stay out of the Lower City. That's where bad people live.
Sith_Worried_Child_male_01.nm02aachil03008_.mp3: You ever seen a swoop bike? I seen them at the races sometimes. They go fast and make lots of noise!
Sith_Worried_Child_male_01.nm02abchil03000_.mp3: You're one of them Sith, ain't you? My mommy says I'm not supposed to talk to you.
Sith_Worried_Child_male_01.nm02abchil03001_.mp3: You ain't supposed to be here! This ain't your home!

Sith_Worried_Child_male_01.nm02abchil03005_.mp3: My Momma says I have to stay out of the Lower City. That's where bad people live.
Sith_Worried_Child_male_01.nm02abchil03007_.mp3: You ever seen a swoop bike? I seen them at the races sometimes. They go fast and make lots of noise!

Sith_Worried_Child_male_02.nm02adchil04004_.mp3: Is you one of the Sith? My daddy says the Sith are nothing but bullies. You don't look like a bully.

Sith_Worried_Child_male_02.nm02adchil04008_.mp3: You ever seen a swoop bike? I seen them at the races sometimes. They go fast and make lots of noise!

Trask.nm01aacut001000_.mp3: Careful, the conduits in this corridor are unstable.
Trask.nm01aacut001001_.mp3: You're wounded! You better use a medkit to heal yourself before we go any farther.
Trask.nm01aacut101001_.mp3: Damn - another Dark Jedi! I'll try to hold him off, you get to the escape pods! Go!
Trask.nm01aaleve06003_.mp3: Press [START] to bring up your menus, then pull the triggers to cycle through the screens until you reach the CHARACTER RECORD page. Then follow the instructions on the screen.
Trask.nm01aapop001004_.mp3: In the lower left of the screen you'll see a list of icons. This is your ACTION MENU. You can cycle left and right through these icons at any time using the D-pad.
Trask.nm01aapop001005_.mp3: The icons in your ACTION MENU will change depending on whether your targeting circle is on a door, a container, a friendly creature or an enemy.  Press <abutton> to activate a highlighted icon.
Trask.nm01aapop001008_.mp3: In combat mode, the far left icon defaults to a basic attack. The second icon shows your available FEATS. Use the D-pad to select this icon, then press <abutton> to use the FEAT.
Trask.nm01aapop001009_.mp3: The fourth icon is for offensive items like grenades; the icon on the far right shows defensive items like medpacs and the fifth shows defensive Force powers like "Heal".
Trask.nm01aapop001010_.mp3: The third icon shows offensive Force powers like Choke and Lightning.
Trask.nm01aapop001012_.mp3: Use the D-pad to cycle left or right through the icons of the ACTION MENU until you highlight the action, item or FEAT you want to use. Then press <abutton>.
Trask.nm01aapop002003_.mp3: Use the EQUIP screen to equip the armor and weapons from your inventory. You can access this by pressing the [START] button on your controller.
Trask.nm01aapop002004_.mp3: Use the D-pad to cycle through your inventory slots. The menu on the right displays items you can equip in each slot.
Trask.nm01aapop002005_.mp3: Highlight the bottom right inventory slot. This is your WEAPON slot. Then press <abutton> to equip a weapon.
Trask.nm01aapop003005_.mp3: Combat uses a pause and play system. At any time you can press the <whbutton> to pause the game and issue commands to your characters.
Trask.nm01aapop003006_.mp3: While the game is paused you can use the triggers to select a target, you can use the D-pad to select icons from the ACTION MENU and you can switch characters using <blbutton>.
Trask.nm01aapop003007_.mp3: Any commands you issue to your party while paused will fire when you press the <whbutton> to unpause the game.
Trask.nm01aapop003009_.mp3: In the lower left of the screen you'll see a list of icons. This is your ACTION MENU. You can cycle left and right through these icons at any time using the D-pad.
Trask.nm01aapop003010_.mp3: The icons in your ACTION MENU will change depending on whether your targeting circle is on a door, a container, a friendly creature or an enemy.  Press <abutton> to activate a highlighted icon.
Trask.nm01aapop003012_.mp3: In combat, the far left icon defaults to a basic attack. The second icon shows your available FEATS. Use the D-pad to select this icon, then press <abutton> to use the FEAT.
Trask.nm01aapop003014_.mp3: The fourth icon is for offensive items like grenades; the icon on the far right shows defensive items like medpacs and the fifth shows defensive Force powers like "Heal".
Trask.nm01aapop003015_.mp3: The third icon shows offensive Force powers like Choke and Lightning.
Trask.nm01aapop003017_.mp3: Use the D-pad to cycle left or right through the icons of the ACTION MENU until you highlight the action, item or FEAT you want to use. Then press <abutton>.
Trask.nm01aaroom03000_.mp3: These Sith must be the advance boarding party!
Trask.nm01aatras02000_.mp3: We've been ambushed by a Sith battle fleet! The Endar Spire is under attack! Hurry up - we don't have much time!
Trask.nm01aatras02002_.mp3: I'm Trask Ulgo, ensign with the Republic Fleet. I'm your bunk mate here on the Endar Spire. We work opposite shifts; I guess that's why you haven't seen me before.
Trask.nm01aatras02003_.mp3: Now hurry up, we have to find Bastila! We have to make sure she makes it off the ship alive!
Trask.nm01aatras02005_.mp3: Bastila's the commanding officer on the Endar Spire. Well, not an officer, really. But she's the one in charge of this mission.
Trask.nm01aatras02006_.mp3: You swore an oath to protect Bastila when you signed up with this mission, just like everyone else in the crew! Now it's time to make good on that oath.
Trask.nm01aatras02007_.mp3: One of our primary duties is to guarantee her survival in the event of enemy attack! You swore an oath just like everyone else on this mission. Now it's time to make good on that oath!
Trask.nm01aatras02008_.mp3: We're soldiers, we're trained for combat. Bastila's going to need men and women like us at her side during this attack!
Trask.nm01aatras02010_.mp3: So hurry up and grab your gear. You need to suit up so we can get out of here.
Trask.nm01aatras02012_.mp3: Don't be stupid! You won't stand a chance against the Sith by yourself. We've got to stick together if we want to make it out of this alive.
Trask.nm01aatras02013_.mp3: I know you're a scout and not a soldier, but Bastila needs all troops at her side during this attack!
Trask.nm01aatras02014_.mp3: But now that you've signed on for this mission you're part of the Republic fleet. And Bastila needs all troops at her side during this attack!
Trask.nm01aatras02016_.mp3: You swore an oath to protect Bastila when you signed up with this mission, just like everyone else in the crew! Now it's time to make good on that oath.
Trask.nm01aatras02017_.mp3: I know she may not have an official rank in the fleet, but she's the one in charge of this mission and it's our duty to protect her!
Trask.nm01aatras02019_.mp3: Did you fall out of your bunk and hit your head? The Endar Spire is the ship we're stationed on - this ship! You probably don't even know who I am, do you?
Trask.nm01aatras02020_.mp3: Use the right thumbstick to control the camera and the left thumbstick to move towards your footlocker. Press <abutton> to open your locker once it is targeted.
Trask.nm01aatras02021_.mp3: Or you can pull the left and right triggers to cycle between targets until the footlocker is highlighted, then press <abutton> to open it.
Trask.nm01aatras02022_.mp3: You can target an object by facing it, or you can cycle the selection reticle between targets by pressing the D-pad. The camera automatically centers itself on the selected target.
Trask.nm01aatras02023_.mp3: The D-pad lets you scroll through the contents of an open container. Press "A" to pick up the contents. Everything inside will automatically be transferred to your inventory.
Trask.nm01aatras02024_.mp3: Now that you have your equipment you need to speak to me again. Use the triggers to cycle your targeting circle until it's on me then press "A".
Trask.nm01aatras02025_.mp3: Non-hostile creatures and objects will display a green selection reticle when targeted. Hostile creatures will show up as red. Press the "A" button to initiate dialog once you have me targeted.
Trask.nm01aatras02026_.mp3: Come on, we have to hurry! The Sith might already be boarding the ship to try and capture Bastila.
Trask.nm01aatras02027_.mp3: Put your equipment on so we can get out of here.
Trask.nm01aatras02028_.mp3: Use the EQUIP screen to equip the armor and weapons from your inventory. You can access this by pressing the [START] button on your controller.
Trask.nm01aatras02029_.mp3: Use the D-pad to cycle through your inventory slots. The menu on the right displays items you can equip in each slot.
Trask.nm01aatras02030_.mp3: Press <abutton> to select an inventory slot, then scroll through the available items and press <abutton> to equip one.
Trask.nm01aatras02031_.mp3: Remember - press [START] to access the EQUIP screen and pause the game. Pressing [START] again will unpause and return you to the main game. Speak to me after you equip your items.
Trask.nm01aatras02032_.mp3: I've uploaded some information into your electronic journal.
Trask.nm01aatras02033_.mp3: Take a look at your journal before we go on. We need to be prepared for whatever the Sith throw at us.
Trask.nm01aatras02034_.mp3: You can access your journal, map and other important menus by pressing the [START] button.
Trask.nm01aatras02035_.mp3: You can then pull the left trigger to scroll through the menus listed on the tabs at the top of the screen.
Trask.nm01aatras02036_.mp3: The QUEST screen displays the entries in your electronic journal, including important quest information. Pressing "A" brings up more details about a highlighted entry.
Trask.nm01aatras02037_.mp3: You will hear a message alert whenever you get a new entry in your journal. Check the map and journal entries in your personal datapad before we continue, then talk to me again.
Trask.nm01aatras02039_.mp3: Because of the attack this room is in lockdown, but don't worry - I've got the override codes. You'll have to use me to unlock the door.
Trask.nm01aatras02040_.mp3: You always control the leader of the party. You can switch who is the party leader by pressing <blbutton>.
Trask.nm01aatras02041_.mp3: Press <blbutton> now to switch me to the party leader, then use me to open the door. Simply target the door, then press <abutton> to open it.
Trask.nm01aatras02042_.mp3: Now that the door's open you better take the lead again.
Trask.nm01aatras02043_.mp3: I've got a feeling that won't be our last battle with the Sith. Good thing we have medpacs to heal our wounds. It might be a good idea to use one now before our next battle.
Trask.nm01aatras02044_.mp3: To use an item like a medpac - or to use a feat, skill or Force power - you'll need to know how to use your ACTION MENU.
Trask.nm01aatras02045_.mp3: The [START] button bring ups the menu screens you used before. Use the triggers to cycle through until you reach the EQUIP screen. It shows a portrait of the character you currently control.
Trask.nm01aatras02046_.mp3: Use the triggers to bring up the shared party INVENTORY screen. There is no limit to the number of items your party can carry. Special plot items are stored in a separate inventory.
Trask.nm01aatras02047_.mp3: Your entire party shares the same inventory. There is no limit to the number of items you can carry. If you drop an item from your inventory it is gone from the game.
Trask.nm01aatras02048_.mp3: Use the D-pad to highlight a desired item in your inventory and see its description. Press "A" to use this item on the character you are currently controlling.
Trask.nm01aatras02049_.mp3: You can only use items - like medpacs - on the character you are controlling. You can cycle through the party portraits with the black button to change the character you control.
Trask.nm01aatras02050_.mp3: When you press the [START] button the game will unpause and return to the main screen. Items will activate in the order that you selected them from your inventory.
Trask.nm01aatras02051_.mp3: That door's locked, and I don't have the codes to open it. You'll have to use your security skill on it if we want to get past.
Trask.nm01aatras02052_.mp3: That door's locked. I don't have the codes to open it, but switch me to the party leader so you can use my security skills to slice into the access panel and open the door.
Trask.nm01aatras02053_.mp3: Target the door using the thumbsticks or the triggers. When the targeting circle is focused on the door, you'll see the icons in the ACTION MENU at the bottom left of the screen have changed.
Trask.nm01aatras02054_.mp3: If the character you control has the security skill it will appear in the action menu. Use the D-pad to scroll up and down to select the SECURITY option, then press "A". If your skill is high enough, the door will open.
Trask.nm01aatras02055_.mp3: Use the D-pad to cycle through the action until SECURITY is highlighted, then press <abutton>. Remember, the SECURITY icon only appears if you're controlling a character with the SECURITY skill.
Trask.nm01aatras02058_.mp3: That was Carth contacting us on our portable communicators. He's one of the Republic's best pilots! He's seen more combat than the rest of the Endar Spire's crew put together.
Trask.nm01aatras02059_.mp3: If he says things are bad, you better believe it. We have to get to the bridge to help defend Bastila!
Trask.nm01aatras02060_.mp3: We have to get to the bridge.
Trask.nm01aatras02061_.mp3: The door's jammed! It must have been damaged during the attack - we'll have to figure out a way to get past it.
Trask.nm01aatras02062_.mp3: Use that computer terminal to see if you can slice into the system and order up a maintenance droid to fix the door for us.
Trask.nm01aatras02063_.mp3: Switch to me and use my computer skill on that terminal to see if I can override the system and open the door.
Trask.nm01aatras02064_.mp3: To use your repair skill on a disabled droid, target the droid and press "A". This will bring up a list of actions you can program in, and the number of repair parts the choice will require.
Trask.nm01aatras02065_.mp3: Simply target the disabled droid and press "A" to get the repair options to appear. Fixing droids uses up repair parts.
Trask.nm01aatras02066_.mp3: The harder something is to repair or reprogram, the more parts you need. The higher your repair skill, the less parts you need.
Trask.nm01aatras02067_.mp3: Okay, the maintenance droid is here, but he's damaged too! Don't worry, you can use your droid repair skills and some repair parts to fix him.
Trask.nm01aatras02068_.mp3: Maybe you can use your repair skill to reprogram that disabled droid to ram the door open for us.
Trask.nm01aatras02069_.mp3: Switch to me and use my repair skills on that disabled droid. Maybe I can reprogram it to ram the door open for us.
Trask.nm01aatras02070_.mp3: To use a computer simply target the terminal and press "A". This will bring up a computer screen with a list of commands you can enter at that terminal.
Trask.nm01aatras02071_.mp3: Just target the computer and press "A" to slice into it.
Trask.nm01aatras02072_.mp3: The higher your computer skill, the less spikes it will take to override the system. The number of spikes to perform an action is displayed beside each command.
Trask.nm01aatras02073_.mp3: Sometimes you will select an option that is not possible. In this case you will get a message saying "SPIKE REJECTION". You will not lose your spikes in this case.
Trask.nm01aatras02074_.mp3: The corridor branches off. You better check your map to make sure we're going the right way!
Trask.nm01aatras02075_.mp3: Remember, you can access your map and other important menus by pressing the [START] button. Then use the triggers to scroll to the MAP screen.
Trask.nm01aatras02076_.mp3: Use the left trigger to scroll to the MAP screen. This shows your current location and the direction you are facing, as well as notes marking important locations in the area.
Trask.nm01aatras02077_.mp3: The bridge is just beyond that door. You better equip your melee weapon. There isn't much room on the bridge, and it's suicide to use a blaster in close quarters.
Trask.nm01aatras02078_.mp3: Your melee weapon is made using a cortosis weave. It's strong enough to stand up against anything, even a lightsaber.
Trask.nm01aatras02079_.mp3: Just press [START] to bring up your menus and go to the EQUIP screen. Then set up items in your quickslots the same way you would equip weapons or armor.
Trask.nm01aatras02080_.mp3: During normal gameplay, press the left or right trigger to use the corresponding quickslot.
Trask.nm01aatras02081_.mp3: Highlight one of your quickslots and press "A" to bring up a list of available items. Grenades, medpacs and similar items can be equipped by highlighting the desired item and pressing "A".
Trask.nm01aatras02082_.mp3: Using a quickslot from the main screen does not pause the game, and is more convenient than using the EQUIP or INVENTORY screens. Everyone in the party shares the same two quickslots.
Trask.nm01aatras02083_.mp3: We'll be fighting in close quarters on the bridge. You better equip a melee weapon before we go through that door.
Trask.nm01aatras02084_.mp3: Combat uses a pause and play system. Press the white button to pause and unpause the game so you can issue commands to your characters.
Trask.nm01aatras02085_.mp3: While paused you can still use the D-pad and black button to cycle through targets and party members.
Trask.nm01aatras02086_.mp3: Any commands you issue to your party while paused will go into an action queue. When you resume gameplay the commands will fire in the order you selected them.
Trask.nm01aatras02087_.mp3: The game is paused right now. In pause mode, set up your main character to throw a grenade at one of the Sith Troopers. Press "BACK" to resume the game after you issue your commands.
Trask.nm01aatras02088_.mp3:
You're injured! You better use that medpac you equipped in your quickslot. First, you have to select the character you want to use the medpac on.
Press the [WHITE] button to unpause.
Trask.nm01aatras02089_.mp3:
Use the black button to cycle through the party members until you see your portrait highlighted at the bottom of the screen, then press the corresponding trigger to use the item in the quickslot.
Press the [WHITE] button to unpause.
Trask.nm01aatras02090_.mp3: Press "A" when the desired target is highlighted, then press the white button to unpause the game. You will throw your grenade once the action resumes.
Trask.nm01aatras02091_.mp3: STAR WARS Knights of the Old Republic is a real-time turn based game. Each time you issue a command to a character they will carry out that action over the course of a three-second round.
Trask.nm01aatras02092_.mp3: Pressing a button multiple times won't make you perform commands any faster, but it will put that command into the action queue that appears to the left of the portrait of the selected character.
Trask.nm01aatras02093_.mp3: At the start of the next round the character will perform the next action in the que. You can have up to 3 commands in your action que.
Trask.nm01aatras02094_.mp3: Remember, it can take up to 3 rounds, or 9 seconds, for the last command entered into the action queue to take effect. If the queue is full new commands will overwrite previous commands.
Trask.nm01aatras02095_.mp3: Bastila's not here on the bridge - they must have retreated to the escape pods! We better head that way too.
Trask.nm01aatras02188_.mp3: To slice into most computers you'll need computer spikes. The higher your computer skill, the less spikes it takes to override the system.
Trask.nm01aatras02214_.mp3: Those Sith won't know what hit 'em!
Trask.nm01aatras02217_.mp3: Nice job. You've gained quite a bit of experience so far. You want me to show you how to apply that experience to improve your skills?
Trask.nm01aatras02233_.mp3: I've heard all about your reputation: elite combat training, tops in your class. It's no wonder you were hand picked for this mission.
Trask.nm01aatras02234_.mp3: Word is the officers haven't seen a recruit with your kind of potential in twenty years. But all that potential doesn't mean a thing if you can't deliver when it counts!
Trask.nm01aatras02235_.mp3: I heard what everyone's saying about you: you've explored the farthest reaches of the galaxy, you've visited planets I've never even heard of.
Trask.nm01aatras02236_.mp3: People with your skills and abilities are hard to find; it's no wonder the Republic recruited you for this mission. But now's the time to prove yourself!
