Trask.nm01aatras02237_.mp3: I know all about your reputation, how you used to smuggle spice and blasters along the Corellian Run. I guess the Republic figured since they couldn't catch you, they might as well hire you.
Trask.nm01aatras02238_.mp3: And I'll admit, the Republic is in desperate need of someone with your kind of skills. Desperate enough to overlook your shady past.
Trask.nm01aatras02241_.mp3: We should stick together; you'll have more success with a party than on your own.
Trask.nm01aatras02243_.mp3: There's a map of the Endar Spire and a copy of Carth's message in your electronic journal, just in case we get separated.
Trask.nm01aatras02249_.mp3: In the lower left of the screen you'll see a list of icons. This is your ACTION MENU. You can cycle left and right through these icons at any time using the D-pad.
Trask.nm01aatras02250_.mp3: The icons in your ACTION MENU will change depending on whether your targeting circle is on a door, a container, a friendly creature or an enemy.  Press <abutton> to activate a highlighted icon.
Trask.nm01aatras02252_.mp3: The icon on the far left is always the default action for the target: OPEN for doors or containers, DIALOG for friends, and ATTACK for enemies.The second icon shows your feats and skills.
Trask.nm01aatras02253_.mp3: The fourth icon is for offensive items like grenades; the icon on the far right shows defensive items like medpacs and the fifth shows defensive Force powers like "Heal".
Trask.nm01aatras02254_.mp3: The third icon shows offensive Force powers like Choke and Lightning.
Trask.nm01aatras02260_.mp3: In the lower left of the screen you'll see a list of icons. This is your ACTION MENU. You can cycle left and right through these icons at any time using the D-pad.
Trask.nm01aatras02263_.mp3: The icons in your ACTION MENU will change depending on whether your targeting circle is on a door, a container, a friendly creature or an enemy.  Left-click the mouse to interact with it.
Trask.nm01aatras02264_.mp3: The fourth icon is for offensive items like grenades; the icon on the far right shows defensive items like medpacs and the fifth shows defensive Force powers like "Heal".
Trask.nm01aatras02265_.mp3: The third icon shows offensive Force powers like Choke and Lightning.
Trask.nm01aatras02271_.mp3: First, use <blbutton> to take control of the injured character. Use the D-pad to cycle left or right through the icons of the ACTION MENU until you see "medpac" in the information box.
Trask.nm01aatras02272_.mp3: Notice the flashing up and down arrows on this icon. This means you have more than one available option for this icon. You must choose between a medpac and an advanced medpac.
Trask.nm01aatras02273_.mp3: Use the D-pad to scroll up or down to switch between your medpac and your advanced medpac. Press <abutton> to use the selected item on the character you currently control.
Trask.nm01aatras02276_.mp3: I should equip a melee weapon, too. Either that, or I'll have to stay back and use my blaster.
Trask.nm01aatras02277_.mp3: The Sith want Bastila alive, but once she's off the ship there's nothing stopping them from blasting the Endar Spire into galactic dust!
Trask.nm01aa_cut04000_.mp3: That was one of the Jedi accompanying Bastila. Damn, we could have used her help!
Trask.nm01aa_cut04001_.mp3: It's a dark Jedi! This fight is too much for us - we better stay back. All we'd do is get in the way.

UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27000_.mp3: I saw what you did! You gave those journals to Igear! Now we'll never find the promised land! How could you do that, you monster!
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27002_.mp3: Go on, you two! Get out of here! I'm sorry about that... those two beggars give everyone in the village a bad name! We aren't all like that, you know. Most of us are good people.
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27003_.mp3: My name is Shaleena... you're from the up-world, aren't you? I've... I've never seen it. I was born here in the Undercity. Is it as nice as they say up there?
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27005_.mp3: I've never been to the surface, but sometimes I think I can see it in my dreams. The sun, the sky, the stars... it all sounds so... so... so wonderful.
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27006_.mp3: Gendar, the leader of our village, tells me I should spend more time trying to improve things down here and less time dreaming about something I can never have. Maybe he's right.
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27007_.mp3: You probably think I'm a fool, having dreams of a place I've never even seen. But when I was little, Rukil used to tell me stories of what it was like up there.
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27009_.mp3: Rukil's the oldest man in the village. The kids call him Rukil Wrinkle-Skin, but he's a kind man. He used to tell me the greatest stories when I was a little girl.
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27010_.mp3: I still like to listen to his tales about the Promised Land, even though I know they're just legends. But it helps to make the Undercity seem less... less dark, somehow.
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27012_.mp3: It's... it's just a story to make little children smile. Rukil believes in it, though. Sometimes I can almost believe it myself, but then I look around and I see the ugly truth.
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27013_.mp3: *sigh* I guess we have to make the best of what we have though. If you really want to learn more about the promised land you should speak to Rukil.
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27015_.mp3: You'd probably get more information from Gendar, the village leader. Or maybe Rukil. But I'll tell you whatever I can.
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27017_.mp3: He'll be somewhere in the village. I couldn't say where for sure. He's always busy, doing whatever he can to make the lives of the other villagers easier.
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27019_.mp3: He's wandering around somewhere on the south side of the village. He doesn't move too far... it's hard on his bones. He's over 100 years old!
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27020_.mp3: The children laugh at him and people think he's crazy because of his stories about the Promised Land, but he's really just a kind old man.
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27022_.mp3: I don't know anything about that, but maybe Gendar could help you. Sorry... is there anything else you need?
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27024_.mp3: There were quite a few people from the surface marching through the village, but none of them bothered to talk to me. Gendar might know more about them.
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27026_.mp3: Well, I was born here for starters. My parents were Outcasts, banished to the Undercity for some crime or other... they never really liked to talk about it.
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27027_.mp3: Everyone here is an Outcast... or the descendant of one. It's tough down here, but we survive. I guess it's easier for me, since I've never known anything different.
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27028_.mp3: Some of the people have given up all hope; they've become bitter and depressed. But most of us are good people... despite what our ancestors may have done.
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27029_.mp3: Gendar could probably tell you more. Or maybe Rukil. You could talk to them if you want.
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27031_.mp3: Not to you, I suppose. But you're probably used to its beauty by now.
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27033_.mp3: I... I suppose our world doesn't look like much to you. It's dark and cold and lonely down here - but this is the only world I've ever known.
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27035_.mp3: Of course... I'm sorry. You're probably here for something important, right? You probably want to speak to Gendar. He's the leader of our village.
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27036_.mp3: But if you... if you have time later, maybe you could come back and speak to me again. I don't get much chance to talk with people from the surface.
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27037_.mp3: I saw you talking with Rukil. It's nice of you to help him; though I don't want to get my hopes up. I mean, the Promised Land... how could it be true?
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27038_.mp3: It's just that sometimes Rukil seems so certain. And then you show up, just like the up-world savior from the legends... If Rukil's right this could be a whole new life for the village!
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27039_.mp3: No more rakghoul attacks, no more starvation... *sigh*, I shouldn't get my hopes up. Not yet. But... but I will wish you good luck, on behalf of the entire village.
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27040_.mp3: Hello, again. I'm glad you came back... it's kind of neat to speak to someone from the surface world. Is there anything I can do for you?
UnderCity_Female_01.nm04aashal27042_.mp3: Oh... okay. Well, if you ever need anything, or if you just feel like talking, come back and see me. I hardly ever get a chance to speak to someone from the up-world.

UnderCity_Female_02.nm04aaoutw22002_.mp3: I still have you, Hendar. That's all I need. Let's go back to the village.
UnderCity_Female_02.nm04aaoutw22006_.mp3: As do I, up-worlder. I don't know what I would have done if anything had happened to Hendar.
UnderCity_Female_02.nm04aaoutw22008_.mp3: Don't speak to me, up-worlder! You could have saved Hendar. You just stood and watched him die!
UnderCity_Female_02.nm04aaoutw22010_.mp3: You're as selfish as all the rest from the surface! Please, just leave me alone with my grief.
UnderCity_Female_02.nm04aaoutw22012_.mp3: Please, make him open the gate. Hendar will die if he doesn't!
UnderCity_Female_02.nm04aaoutw22026_.mp3: You monster! How can you say that? Somebody do something!
UnderCity_Female_02.nm04aaoutw22028_.mp3: Hurry - while the gate is still open! You must save Hendar!
UnderCity_Female_02.nm04aaoutw22030_.mp3: Hurry, Hendar, hurry! I can hear it coming!
UnderCity_Female_02.nm04aaoutw22040_.mp3: The mutants will kill him if you don't open the gate!
UnderCity_Female_02.nm04aaoutw22044_.mp3: No! You can't do this! It isn't fair!

UnderCity_Male_01.nm04aahend06000_.mp3: I can't thank you enough for saving me, up-worlder. If I had anything but these rags on my back it would be yours. But we have nothing.
UnderCity_Male_01.nm04aahend06004_.mp3: Thank you once again for saving me from the rakghouls, up-worlder. I owe you everything.
UnderCity_Male_01.nm04aahend06008_.mp3: Help! It's right behind me! Help!

Unique_Beggining.nm02aaprer99000_.mp3: Okay you alien scum, everybody get up against the wall! This is a raid!
Unique_Beggining.nm02aaprer99002_.mp3: That's how we Sith deal with smart-mouth aliens! Now the rest of you get up against the wall before I lose my temper again!
Unique_Beggining.nm02aaprer99008_.mp3: Hey, what's this? Humans hiding out with aliens?

Uthar.nm13aaelis08014_.mp3: I don't think I've ever felt so bad for a droid before.
Uthar.nm33aashaa19000_.mp3: No, that is the wrong answer. Again! You pathetic hopefuls can't possibly all be this stupid, can you?
Uthar.nm33aashaa19002_.mp3: Hmph. I'm no master... yet... but I like the sound of that. Alright, one more question, though the lot of you are trying my patience.
Uthar.nm33aashaa19003_.mp3: Alright. Let's say you become a Sith and I am your commanding officer. I give you an order to spare the life of an enemy. Do you do it?
Uthar.nm33aashaa19006_.mp3: No, no, no. *sigh* Do you honestly believe that the Sith are in need of such sniveling cowards?
Uthar.nm33aashaa19007_.mp3: Mercy is a weakness. If your leader shows weakness, it is your duty to kill him and show true authority... true power. That is why the Sith are strong.
Uthar.nm33aashaa19009_.mp3: No, you don't understand. And you probably never will. You wouldn't survive five seconds in the academy... the other students would tear you apart!
Uthar.nm33aashaa19010_.mp3: Bah! I can't be bothered with fools! Perhaps... I should... hmmm.
Uthar.nm33aashaa19011_.mp3: You! Jedi! You're looking to get into the academy, are you not? Of course you are... why else would you be here?
Uthar.nm33aashaa19012_.mp3: Let me pose a question to you. These hopefuls will never survive in the academy. A lesson must be taught, here, but I am at a loss as to what form it should take.
Uthar.nm33aashaa19017_.mp3: I'm thinking to spare them the effort of being killed and do it myself. Perhaps I shall turn their skin inside out? Or Force Lightning? It is a most impressive display.
Uthar.nm33aashaa19018_.mp3: Or perhaps a bit of humiliation is in order? I could easily strip off their tunics and make them run through the colony. Or they could lose all control of their bodily functions...
Uthar.nm33aashaa19019_.mp3: What do you think? I just can't seem to decide.
Uthar.nm33aashaa19031_.mp3: Why not ask you? I'm rather exhausted from dealing with hopefuls like these, I can barely think straight. Besides... I find it fun. Come now, a decision please.
Uthar.nm33aashaa19035_.mp3: My thoughts exactly. How lovely to encounter someone with such an agreeable disposition.
Uthar.nm33aashaa19037_.mp3: You do? Hmmm. Perhaps having a bunch of hopefuls soiling themselves would be somewhat amusing. Let's see, shall we?
Uthar.nm33aashaa19039_.mp3: Let them go? And what could possibly convince me to do that?
Uthar.nm33aashaa19041_.mp3: [Success] *sigh* I suppose not, but you're as boring as they are. Fine, fine... go on, all of you. Hopefully you've learned something, here.
Uthar.nm33aashaa19042_.mp3: [Failure] No, I think it's you who isn't worth my time. Them I prefer to kill. Just feel lucky I don't squish you while I'm at it.
Uthar.nm33aashaa19044_.mp3: Ha ha ha ha! Now *that* has to be the funniest thing I've heard all day.
Uthar.nm33aashaa19045_.mp3: Well, fine, whoever you are... since you've proven such a good sport, the boys can run off. I'm sure your little lesson will give them something to chew on.
Uthar.nm33aashaa19046_.mp3: [Failure] Now *that* has to be a first. Wrong, is it? Let me show you how wrong I think it is.
Uthar.nm33aashaa19048_.mp3: [Success] I... want to let them go. Yes, that's right. They're... not worth my time...
Uthar.nm33aashaa19049_.mp3: My head... what was that? I feel like... hmph. Just... get out of here. All of you. I don't have time for this.
Uthar.nm33aashaa19050_.mp3: [Failure] Do you really think my mind is that weak? I'm practically insulted. Now instead of trying the easy way out, give me a real answer.
Uthar.nm33aashaa19052_.mp3: Oh? My, but that is rather intrepid of you! I don't think I've had someone stand up to me like that in ages!
Uthar.nm33aashaa19053_.mp3: You see, boys? *This* is the kind of backbone you need if you ever want a hope of becoming a Sith. Now get out of my sight.
Uthar.nm33aashaa19057_.mp3: Hmph. You're as pathetic as they are, it looks like. Bah! I can't be bothered. Get out of here, all of you! The sight of you makes me sick to my stomach!
Uthar.nm33aashaa19058_.mp3: You! You there! You have the look of someone not quite as dense as these hopefuls. I require your aid for a moment.
Uthar.nm33abmeke02000_.mp3: Is there something specific you wanted?
Uthar.nm33abmeke02004_.mp3: That is the whole point! Personally, I think it's wonderful fun... those fools actually think that if they stand there long enough, I'll let them become a Sith.
Uthar.nm33abmeke02005_.mp3: Idiots. A Sith is not a bantha, all endurance and no brains. A Sith would fight for his life, no matter the odds. If these rotgrubs are as stupid as they seem, then they deserve their fate!
Uthar.nm33abmeke02007_.mp3: Oh, it's a test all right. It's a test to see if they're actually fool enough to die. If they don't, however, I certainly wouldn't admit them just for that accomplishment.
Uthar.nm33abmeke02020_.mp3: Hmm. It is a bit boring standing out here all day, however. I think I'll go for some dinner... it will be fun to think of them while I gorge myself.
Uthar.nm33abmeke02021_.mp3: They'll still be here in an hour or two, surely. I suggest you run along before I decide to make you part of the fun.
Uthar.nm33abmeke02023_.mp3: *You* demand? Why would I listen to you? I'll do as I please, and if watching these fools starve themselves amuses me, that's what I'll do.
Uthar.nm33abmeke02025_.mp3: Perhaps, but where does it say I should be merciful? There'd be no sport in it, anyhow. I want to see if they are really as foolish as I suspected.
Uthar.nm33abmeke02027_.mp3: Oh, it is. I wonder which one will be the last standing? Should I tell him then that his hopes are in vain, do you think?
Uthar.nm33abmeke02031_.mp3: Then I trust you'll leave. I think another one of these fools is about to drop, and I don't want to miss it.
Uthar.nm33abmeke02032_.mp3: Leave me be. Can't you see that I'm busy?
Uthar.nm33abmeke02034_.mp3: Isn't that obvious? You must be very sharp to possess such an astute sense of perception. Obviously deaf, however, since I asked you to leave.
Uthar.nm33abmeke02036_.mp3: No you may not. I'm busy amusing myself and I'm not going to miss any of the fun. Now get lost before I teach you a lesson.
Uthar.nm33abmeke02038_.mp3: Good. I don't want to miss this for anything, heh...
Uthar.nm35aautha22000_.mp3: Ahhh... what is this you bring me, Shaardan?
Uthar.nm35aautha22001_.mp3: It is none other than the sword of Ajunta Pall, Master.
Uthar.nm35aautha22004_.mp3: There is no place for fools amongst the Sith. Begone.
Uthar.nm35aautha22005_.mp3: Your destiny lies elsewhere, young one, not with the Sith... at least, not yet. Go... and return another time, if you still wish to.
Uthar.nm35aautha22006_.mp3: Greetings, prospective students. It appears we have a late entry. Who do you bring before me, Yuthura? A young human, bristling with the Force?
Uthar.nm35aautha22010_.mp3: That I'll judge for myself, thank you. Tell me, human... what do you know of the ways of the Sith? What preconceptions has your mind been polluted with?
Uthar.nm35aautha22012_.mp3: Indeed? Then perhaps you would care to demonstrate for us the powers of a Sith Master. ...No? Then perhaps you shall keep your foolishness to yourself and actually learn something.
Uthar.nm35aautha22014_.mp3: A diplomatic answer, if not the core of the matter. Our power is obvious. The question in truth goes much deeper than the surface.
Uthar.nm35aautha22016_.mp3: An honest answer, and one I would expect from anyone who has been exposed to those sad relics amongst the Jedi. As always, young human, the truth is not quite so simple.
Uthar.nm35aautha22018_.mp3: Untrue. The Force demands discipline from all who use it, and the Sith demand duty. The truth goes far beyond such a superficial evaluation.
Uthar.nm35aautha22020_.mp3: Most impressive, if it is true. Those who were too weak to stand against you deserved their fate, so expect no retribution from us. There is much you can learn from the Sith, and we from you.
Uthar.nm35aautha22022_.mp3: An honest if evasive answer. Likely it is more true than you realize. Allow me to speak of the deeper matters at hand.
Uthar.nm35aautha22023_.mp3: The Jedi equate the light with goodness and strength and the dark with weakness and evil. That is their tradition and it is truly no surprise that they cling to it for comfort.
Uthar.nm35aautha22024_.mp3: We, however, do not treat the Force as a burden. We treat it as a gift, a thing to be celebrated. We use it to acquire power over others... and why should we not? Because the Jedi say we should not?
Uthar.nm35aautha22025_.mp3: We are as the Force is meant to be. The Jedi would hide that from you... they would tell you the dark side is too quick, too easy, all so that they need never challenge the passions that lie within them.
Uthar.nm35aautha22026_.mp3: Joining with us means realizing your true potential. It means not stifling yourself solely for the sake of hide-bound shamans and their antiquated notion of order. Be what you were meant to be.
Uthar.nm35aautha22027_.mp3: What say you, Lashowe? Are you ready to learn the secrets of the dark side? Dare you?
Uthar.nm35aautha22029_.mp3: Brash and fiery, as expected. Turn that passion to your advantage, child. What of you, Mekel? Are you ready?
Uthar.nm35aautha22030_.mp3: I am, Master. More than ready.
Uthar.nm35aautha22031_.mp3: I sense much anger within you, young one. That is good. That will provide you power. And Shaardan... what of you?
Uthar.nm35aautha22033_.mp3: I see. You had best gather your wits for the trial ahead, boy, or you will not last.
Uthar.nm35aautha22034_.mp3: And you, young human? Does this interest you? Are you ready to learn more of what I speak?
Uthar.nm35aautha22036_.mp3: Your slaves? They are irrelevant. They may accompany you, so long as they do not interfere with us or with your training. Are you ready or not, young one?
Uthar.nm35aautha22039_.mp3: Now, then. All of you five recruits have shown a degree of facility with the Force... you all have the potential to become true Sith. Only one of you, however, will succeed.
Uthar.nm35aautha22040_.mp3: The one who succeeds will be admitted to the academy as a full Sith. All others must wait until next year and try again... if you survive.
Uthar.nm35aautha22041_.mp3: My pupil, Yuthura, shall be your teacher and master while you attempt to prove yourselves. Heed her words.
Uthar.nm35aautha22044_.mp3: If you wish to gain a lead over your competitors, the first of you to learn the Code of the Sith and tell me of it will be rewarded.
Uthar.nm35aautha22045_.mp3: The rest is for you to discover. Welcome to the dark side, my children... your one chance at true greatness lies here.
Uthar.nm35aautha22046_.mp3: Are you? I can see into your heart, young human, and I see the dark kernel that is there. If it is ready to sprout remains to be seen.
Uthar.nm35aautha22048_.mp3: An honest answer. You will make little progress, however, if you do not come to learn that any opportunity, even an unsure one, must be snatched.
Uthar.nm35aautha22050_.mp3: Ha ha ha! You are brave to argue, young one. I have met few students who would speak so openly to me.
Uthar.nm35aautha22051_.mp3: Ask yourself first what this 'morality' is? How is it created? Who does it benefit? Where do your notions of 'good' and 'evil' come from?
Uthar.nm35aautha22052_.mp3: You may come to the realization that morality is but an obstacle to overcome... or not. The discovery is yours to make, should you be ready.
Uthar.nm35aautha22053_.mp3: So, then. I take it you are ready to travel to the tomb of Naga Sadow? Your final test should not be delayed.
Uthar.nm35aautha22055_.mp3: It is a tomb that belonged to an ancient Sith Lord... the greatest of Korriban's Sith Lords, in fact. It is there that your test is performed.
Uthar.nm35aautha22057_.mp3: I will tell you the details when we are there, young one. You will, however, fight for your life... that is why I suggest you be in sufficient health.
Uthar.nm35aautha22061_.mp3: Then return when you are. Do not delay overly long, young one.
Uthar.nm35aautha22062_.mp3: Do not forget our agreement regarding Yuthura's treachery. We shall put her in her place... should you reach the final test, that is.
Uthar.nm35aautha22063_.mp3: Greetings, young one. You have much to do, yet... you have gained little prestige. You will have to work quickly if you hope to best the others.
Uthar.nm35aautha22065_.mp3: Oh? It is no more complicated than I said. Perform impressive deeds or bring me a suitably valuable artifact from the Valley of the Dark Lords.
Uthar.nm35aautha22074_.mp3: There is an exit that leads to the surface of the planet... the valley is only a short trip from there. It is not difficult to find.
Uthar.nm35aautha22076_.mp3: You wish to know more about me, do you? And why would I indulge your idle curiosity? Will we be good friends, you think?
Uthar.nm35aautha22077_.mp3: I strived many years to hone my power until I was able to drive out my predecessor and rule the academy. If you are smart, you will aim to do the same, or better.
Uthar.nm35aautha22078_.mp3: There is nothing else that you need to know. Do not ask again, young one.
Uthar.nm35aautha22080_.mp3: Oh? What is my apprentice up to now?
Uthar.nm35aautha22082_.mp3: I see. It is good that you have come to me with this information, young one.
Uthar.nm35aautha22083_.mp3: It is a bit... ironic... that Yuthura has begun her plotting. I have been aware of her growing ambitions for some time, and had in fact already decided to remove her.
Uthar.nm35aautha22084_.mp3: Normally, the one who gains the most prestige would engage in a final trial... two of the students would fight. This time it will be Yuthura who battles, though she does not know it.
Uthar.nm35aautha22085_.mp3: Perhaps it will be you who combats her? Yes... perhaps so. This is what you can do. Give this pad to Adrenas... he will put some poison in her bath.
Uthar.nm35aautha22086_.mp3: This will weaken Yuthura for that final test, making her an easy target. Rather generous of me, don't you think?
Uthar.nm35aautha22089_.mp3: For coming to me with this information and betraying your foolish trainer, I feel you are worthy of prestige, young one.
Uthar.nm35aautha22090_.mp3: Go, now... you have not yet impressed me enough to declare you the victor. I have matters to attend to.
Uthar.nm35aautha22094_.mp3: A student, is it? What might you have to say?
Uthar.nm35aautha22096_.mp3: Ahhhh. I think I know this one you speak of. You gained his confidence to admit such, did you?
Uthar.nm35aautha22097_.mp3: I commend your competitive spirit... you have certainly impressed me. I shall speak to the boy straight away.
Uthar.nm35aautha22098_.mp3: You have impressed me enough, by my estimation, to become a Sith in full. Congratulations, young one... you have bested the others quite completely.
Uthar.nm35aautha22099_.mp3: You have but one final test which you must take, and this requires us to travel to the tomb of Naga Sadow in the Valley of the Dark Lords.
Uthar.nm35aautha22100_.mp3: I would advise you to be rested and equipped before we leave. Return to your quarters now and seek me out in the morning.
Uthar.nm35aautha22101_.mp3: When you return, make sure that you have all that you will need... for you will face your test alone. Go, and may the Force serve you well.
Uthar.nm35aautha22102_.mp3: Go, now... you have done well, but you have not impressed me enough to declare you the victor. I have matters to attend to.
Uthar.nm35aautha22104_.mp3: I see. Then leave me be if you have nothing to offer. I am sure you have much to do.
Uthar.nm35aautha22106_.mp3: Then finish the Code as I speak it.
Uthar.nm35aautha22107_.mp3: "Peace is a lie, there is only..."
Uthar.nm35aautha22125_.mp3: Yes, good. You have, indeed, learned the Code of the Sith. Speaking the words and knowing the words are, however, two different things.
Uthar.nm35aautha22126_.mp3: Tell me, then, true or false: it is our passion that fuels the Force.
Uthar.nm35aautha22128_.mp3: Well done. I will test you no more... you know the Code. Very impressive.
Uthar.nm35aautha22130_.mp3: No, it is true. Our passion, our hate and desire... that is what brings conflict, which gives us power.
Uthar.nm35aautha22131_.mp3: Sadly, it seems you did not understand the Code as well as I thought.
Uthar.nm35aautha22132_.mp3: Tell me then, true or false: there is nothing worse than love.
Uthar.nm35aautha22134_.mp3: False. Mercy is worse than love.
Uthar.nm35aautha22136_.mp3: Tell me then, true or false: victory by any means is desirable.
Uthar.nm35aautha22138_.mp3: False. Unless victory proves your superiority, it is an illusion, it is temporary.
Uthar.nm35aautha22145_.mp3: No. No, that is incorrect. I would have thought merely reciting the Code to be a simple matter. Ah, well.
Uthar.nm35aautha22146_.mp3: "When you act, strike once and stike hard as if it were your last. Therein lies victory." Another of our proverbs. Go and find some other means to gain prestige, young one.
Uthar.nm35aautha22148_.mp3: Ahhh. The ones I ordered executed for their mutiny? It's done, then?
Uthar.nm35aautha22150_.mp3: Indeed. I had the caverns checked after you left. Well done.
Uthar.nm35aautha22151_.mp3: The lesson is learned, I believe.
Uthar.nm35aautha22153_.mp3: [Success] Indeed? We checked the caves and found only a couple of bodies. Perhaps the shyrack ate them? Ah, it is just as good, I suppose.
Uthar.nm35aautha22156_.mp3: Ahhh, finally, the genuine sword! I knew that this relic would be unearthed in time. I can feel the power flowing through it!
Uthar.nm35aautha22160_.mp3: Well done! You have impressed me greatly!
Uthar.nm35aautha22162_.mp3: Yes, so I hear. I've had reports from some students that ventured into the tomb after you left and found the parts. Well done.
Uthar.nm35aautha22163_.mp3: I am impressed. You have rid us of a potential nuisance.
Uthar.nm35aautha22164_.mp3: Oh? I heard that the droid ran out and blasted off into the sky. We tracked it for a short while before it vanished from our scanners. What do you make of that?
Uthar.nm35aautha22166_.mp3: [Success] I... suppose so. That would explain his disappearance from our scanners, certainly, though I would prefer proof. Still, it shows innovative thinking.
Uthar.nm35aautha22171_.mp3: [Success] I... suppose that will have to do, though I would prefer proof of his destruction. Still, it shows innovative thinking.
Uthar.nm35aautha22172_.mp3: [Failure] That is not good enough. Suppose his remains fall into the hands of the enemy, what then? And why did you not bring back proof?
Uthar.nm35aautha22173_.mp3: Either way, you'll not gain any prestige for the act.
Uthar.nm35aautha22175_.mp3: Ahh, my old master. Still... unless you bring back something of his, some writings or similar, I am unimpressed. Jorak's fate means nothing to me.
Uthar.nm35aautha22177_.mp3: Oh? Let me see... it appears my old master was busy studying the writings in one of the tombs. How interesting. I do hope you had to pry this from his dead fingers.
Uthar.nm35aautha22178_.mp3: Regardless, you have impressed me with your worthy act.
Uthar.nm35aautha22180_.mp3: Oh? And why would that be of use to me? His interrogator already brought me that information moments ago.
Uthar.nm35aautha22181_.mp3: A valiant attempt, young one, but you must be quicker than that if you wish to impress me.
Uthar.nm35aautha22182_.mp3: You do? That is most interesting. Where might that be?
Uthar.nm35aautha22184_.mp3: Hmm. How ironic that I recently had his vessel scrapped for parts, then. I had assumed it had been thoroughly scanned... apparently not.
Uthar.nm35aautha22185_.mp3: Still... you have done well in bringing me information that others could not unearth on their own. I am impressed.
Uthar.nm35aautha22187_.mp3: Oh? How very sad, young one. You should learn to grab your advantages whenever you can.
Uthar.nm35aautha22188_.mp3: Regardless, I am no longer interested in the Mandalorian's weapon cache. We have moved on.
Uthar.nm35aautha22190_.mp3: She did. Prestige is not shared, however, if that is what you are wondering. If you aided her, it was to her benefit and not yours.
Uthar.nm35aautha22192_.mp3: *chuckle* I had heard that such an artifact existed. Tell me, young one... did you acquire this device by yourself?
Uthar.nm35aautha22194_.mp3: You lie. Still, what matters is the fact that you succeeded. And Lashowe... does she yet live?
Uthar.nm35aautha22196_.mp3: You didn't kill her? How very foolish. Now you have an enemy to contend with. The holocron, itself, is an impressive item, however.
Uthar.nm35aautha22198_.mp3: Ha ha! Well done! You gained an artifact through trickery and eliminated an opponent at the same time. That is deserving of great prestige!
Uthar.nm35aautha22200_.mp3: So I see. And Lashowe... does she yet live?
Uthar.nm35aautha22202_.mp3: Killed her out of revenge, did you? Well done. I can appreciate such drama, believe me.
Uthar.nm35aautha22203_.mp3: I am most impressed that you have eliminated an opponent so handily.
Uthar.nm35aautha22205_.mp3: Yes, so I hear. Still, it was Shaardan's failure and hardly your success, now, was it? Not quite worthy of prestige.
Uthar.nm35aautha22207_.mp3: Maybe it's better to say that Mekel is dead, yes? Considering the circumstances, I am unimpressed... though you do now have one less opponent.
Uthar.nm35aautha22209_.mp3: Indeed. You have much to do, yet.
Uthar.nm35aautha22210_.mp3: Very well. You have impressed me... definitely a good start.
Uthar.nm35aautha22211_.mp3: You have gained considerable prestige... you are very close to the end. Do not falter now.
Uthar.nm35aautha22212_.mp3: Greetings, young one. I have found you to be most impressive... you are off to an excellent beginning.
Uthar.nm35aautha22213_.mp3: Greetings, young one. You have done very well for yourself so far. Continue and your promise shall be fulfilled.
Uthar.nm39aautha03000_.mp3: Excellent work, my young Sith. Your enemy lies dead at your feet and you are victorious... the final test is complete.
Uthar.nm39aautha03001_.mp3: I must say that... unnhh! What... what is happening?! My strength is... fading! What have you done?!
Uthar.nm39aautha03003_.mp3: You... you fool! You will never... never be a Sith, now!!
Uthar.nm39aautha03005_.mp3: You... I will destroy you, mongrel! I will rip the flesh from your bones!!
Uthar.nm39aautha03012_.mp3: What?! But, but... why did... you come?! Why... are you here, if not to become Sith?!
Uthar.nm39aautha03014_.mp3: I must say that it is quite disappointing that you must die now, as well, seeing as you didn't inform me earlier of Yuthura's plans.
Uthar.nm39aautha03016_.mp3: So you did. And now I shall destroy you as I would any other Sith who betrayed me.
Uthar.nm39aautha03018_.mp3: Destroy me? I am not Yuthura, young one. I am a Sith Master... and I tire of foolish upstarts.
Uthar.nm39aautha03020_.mp3: Is that so? So you were a spy all along? How interesting.
Uthar.nm39aautha03021_.mp3: So let's get this over with, shall we? I have a new batch of candidates arriving tomorrow.
Uthar.nm39aautha03024_.mp3: I must say that it is quite disappointing that you must die now, as well, since there's no telling how far your scheming with Yuthura went.
Uthar.nm39aautha03025_.mp3: You are truly a Sith in spirit, and one gifted with great power. Of this I no longer have any doubt. There is much more for you to learn, perhaps... but not here.
Uthar.nm39aautha03026_.mp3: There is... something very strange about you, young one. Something I cannot place. You are like no other student I have ever met.
Uthar.nm39aautha03027_.mp3: Why that is, I cannot say. Your path takes you elsewhere, however, and soon.
Uthar.nm39aautha03028_.mp3: Go on to your destiny, then, and return here afterwards... if that is what you still desire.
Uthar.nm39aautha03030_.mp3: You have passed the final test, but I see it is not yet your destiny to join the order. Perhaps that will come in time, young one.
Uthar.nm39aautha03031_.mp3: There is much you must accomplish, first. The dark side has plans for you. As I said... return once that is done, if you desire.
Uthar.nm39aautha03033_.mp3: May the Force serve you well, young one.
Uthar.nm39aautha03037_.mp3: Is it... is it possible that you are not what you seem to be? Tell me, young one... tell me what you really are.
Uthar.nm39aautha03041_.mp3: I see. No matter what you might be, then, I am certain that your path takes you elsewhere... and soon.
Uthar.nm39aautha03043_.mp3: Ah, I see. So it is... Darth Revan, not dead as we were led to believe.
Uthar.nm39aautha03044_.mp3: And yet... and yet you are *not* Revan, are you? What has occurred between the time of your reported death and now I can only guess at, but you have changed much.
Uthar.nm39aautha03045_.mp3: Regardless, your destiny does take you away from here... to confront your old pupil, without a doubt. Yes... that is what lies before you.
Uthar.nm39aautha03046_.mp3: Go to your destiny, then, my Dark Lord. I shall say nothing of what you have done here. Should you prove victorious and wish to return, then I and all Sith shall be your servants.
Uthar.nm39aautha03047_.mp3: Do not let your attention waver! Strike her down!!
Uthar.nm39aautha03048_.mp3: So you return to us with the lightsaber in hand, as I knew you would.
Uthar.nm39aautha03050_.mp3: You took a great risk in acquiring the artifact. You used your mind and your power... no peaceful meditation, no pacifism.
Uthar.nm39aautha03051_.mp3: Sometimes you must fight in order to achieve. This gives you your passion, this makes you stronger. This is what makes you superior.
Uthar.nm39aautha03052_.mp3: That is the lesson we teach with that part of the final test. Do you understand?
Uthar.nm39aautha03054_.mp3: True, but most would say they fight only when they must... or not at all. We are the ones who know that struggle is what makes us superior.
Uthar.nm39aautha03056_.mp3: When a Jedi acts, it is with skill, true. But the Jedi teach you that your passions are counter-productive. That strength is only found in peace.
Uthar.nm39aautha03057_.mp3: Did you not feel a moment of excitement in the tomb? Did your passions not flow and make you feel stronger and more alive?
Uthar.nm39aautha03058_.mp3: What purpose would be served by restricting yourself from such? I would say only the purpose of the Jedi. Through this they would control you and restrict your potential.
Uthar.nm39aautha03060_.mp3: Perhaps not, to someone of your natural strength. The point is in the recognition of the nature of the act rather than its sheer difficulty.
Uthar.nm39aautha03062_.mp3: If you came to the academy, you must have felt the stirrings within you that cry out for the freedom of the dark side, that cry out for release.
Uthar.nm39aautha03063_.mp3: I can only show you the path that will lead to power and superiority. You have followed it this far... you must decide if you are capable of continuing.
Uthar.nm39aautha03065_.mp3: This is where your path ends, young one. There is no turning back once you have embarked on it.
Uthar.nm39aautha03067_.mp3: Good. The last part of your test will now commence. Here you will learn the lesson of competition.
Uthar.nm39aautha03068_.mp3: All life must compete in order to flourish. Such is the natural way of the universe. To stand still is to know death... one must always be moving forward.
Uthar.nm39aautha03069_.mp3: So is it the same amongst the Sith. Compete or die. Mercy is irrelevant.
Uthar.nm39aautha03070_.mp3: So it behooves you in this final test to strike down one you are familiar with, for no other reason than to prove you are superior and without mercy.
Uthar.nm39aautha03071_.mp3: Normally this would be against another student. You, however, get a special treat. You will fight Yuthura, here... my own apprentice.
Uthar.nm39aautha03073_.mp3: So... you know, do you? Well, it makes no difference. You have become too ambitious, Yuthura... it is time for you to die.
Uthar.nm39aautha03075_.mp3: Oh? Is this true, young one? You wish to join Yuthura in her foolish scheme?
Uthar.nm39aautha03076_.mp3: Sadly, Yuthura, it is you who are mistaken. Your pupil is more ambitious than you realize... isn't that so, young one?
Uthar.nm39aautha03079_.mp3: So the time has come, has it? I... I will... ugh... no! My... strength leaves me!!
Uthar.nm39aautha03081_.mp3: So the time has come, has it? You both wish to stand against a Sith Master and perish, do you? THEN SO BE IT!!
Uthar.nm39aautha03084_.mp3: The final test continues as it should. Proceed and be rewarded, young one.
Uthar.nm39aautha03086_.mp3: It appears, my dear, that some tests are fairer than others. I wish you luck.
Uthar.nm39aautha03090_.mp3: You are indeed a fool if you think to oppose us both, young one.
Uthar.nm39aautha03093_.mp3: This makes no sense. You will never become a Sith if you turn on us both! What could you hope to accomplish?
Uthar.nm39aautha03096_.mp3: Do not fret, my dear. All will be... ugh... no! My strength... leaves me!!
Uthar.nm39aautha03104_.mp3: Do not fret, my dear. All will be as it was quickly enough.
Uthar.nm39aautha03115_.mp3: Indeed. You have become too ambitious, Yuthura. It is time for you to die and someone more... talented... to take your place.
Uthar.nm39aautha03116_.mp3: You must locate the ceremonial lightsaber and return here to us. Yuthura and I cannot help you in this, young one.
Uthar.nm39aautha03117_.mp3: Very well. We are now ready for your final test, young Sith. You have earned the right to see if you shall become one of us.
Uthar.nm39aautha03119_.mp3: I dislike your tone, Yuthura. What are you up to, now?
Uthar.nm39aautha03121_.mp3: Yes. Yes, of course. We are in the sacred tomb of Naga Sadow, young one, the one discovered by Darth Malak and Darth Revan years ago.
Uthar.nm39aautha03122_.mp3: You are to follow in their footsteps and reach the ancient Star Map that lies deep within. There you will find a lightsaber, amongst other things.
Uthar.nm39aautha03123_.mp3: The lightsaber is for you: your initiation present. Return to us once you have it, for you the test does not end there.
Uthar.nm39aautha03125_.mp3: Do you understand what I have told you? Are you ready to begin?
Uthar.nm39aautha03127_.mp3: If you do not strive to achieve something, then it will be meaningless to you, wouldn't you say?
Uthar.nm39aautha03129_.mp3: No. That is part of the test. Overcome the obstacles that lie ahead on your own.
Uthar.nm39aautha03131_.mp3: You cannot. No one enters and no one leaves until your test is complete.
Uthar.nm39aautha03133_.mp3: Good. Yuthura and I will await your return.
Uthar.nm39aautha03134_.mp3: Is that a tone of mischief in your voice, dear Yuthura? You should know by now that no scheme is certain.

Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21000_.mp3: You have come back. Good. Are you prepared to go to the academy?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21002_.mp3: Then let us leave. The Master of the Academy awaits you.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21004_.mp3: Then come back when you are ready. But do not take long... I *will* leave without you.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21005_.mp3: You again? What do you wish, now?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21009_.mp3: But I have already told you your answer, human. Do not bother me further, or I shall become irritated.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21011_.mp3: So one of the others accepted you, even after I did not? You are lucky, human, for I am in a forgiving mood.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21012_.mp3: So I see. How curious that you should come to possess such a thing. Where did you get it?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21014_.mp3: Can you not see that I am busy, human? Ahhh... I see you have a medallion. Where did you get it?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21016_.mp3: I see. How very enterprising of you, though that is not the normal way that we select our students for the academy.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21018_.mp3: [Success] Oh? By one of the others, no doubt. You do seem a fit candidate for the academy, though there is... something odd about you...
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21020_.mp3: [Success] Oh? Very well. You do seem a fit candidate, though there is... something odd about you I cannot place...
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21021_.mp3: [Failure] You think to lie to me, do you? I would suspect you stole this and killed the owner. Very enterprising of you, I must admit.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21022_.mp3: We Sith do encourage such independent thinking. You may even be a suitable candidate to join us. That is what you wish, I take it? To become a Sith?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21024_.mp3: Do not be insolent, human. I asked you a direct question, and I will not be trifled with. Now... where did you get this medallion?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21025_.mp3: Is there something you need, Jedi? Make it good, for I have little patience.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21027_.mp3: You think me a fool? You think I do not recognize a lightsaber when I see it?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21028_.mp3: You think me a fool? You think I do not recognize robes of the order when I see them?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21029_.mp3: You are far from the first Jedi who has come here, after all, willing to abandon that decrepit order of yours.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21030_.mp3: Is there something you need, human? Make it good, for I have little patience.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21032_.mp3: Who am I? You must not have been on Korriban for very long. Either that or you have been feeling your way about blindly.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21033_.mp3: Luckily for you, I am in a charitable mood. I am Yuthura Ban, second only to Master Uthar of the Sith academy here in Dreshdae.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21034_.mp3: I am the one who decides which few of the many hopefuls who travel here to train actually become a Sith. Why? Is it your desire to enter the academy? Is that why you are here?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21036_.mp3: *chuckle* An interesting question, and not one I hear often. For most the benefits of becoming a Sith are quite obvious.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21037_.mp3: We wield ultimate power, my friend. To be a Sith is to taste freedom and to know victory. Nothing is as glorious as bending the Force to your will.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21039_.mp3: We make no apologies for the weak. If you cannot clench your fist and know when the moment comes to strike, there is no place for you amongst us.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21040_.mp3: Of those who come to train, those who are weak return home. If they are both weak and foolish, they die... but it was their choice to come.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21042_.mp3: You've heard enough, have you? *chuckle* So what is it to be? Are you here to be a Sith or not?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21046_.mp3: Oh? That is truly a first. Do as you wish, then, human. I'll not stop you.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21048_.mp3: Hide-bound relics who burden themselves with tradition and with the protection of the weak and ungrateful. They are pitiful and misguided.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21049_.mp3: Why would you take a gift as glorious as the Force and squander it? Weaken yourself deliberately and shackle yourself to outdated mores?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21050_.mp3: Our gift has made us superior. It is our rightful place to rule. How can any deny that? Yet the Jedi do so... and call us 'evil' because we do not.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21052_.mp3: Is the sarkath beast who dominates his jungle evil? The tuk'ata who leaps on the squellbug for the kill? These are things of nature, of the universe.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21053_.mp3: We are no different from this. The Force is part of the universe, part of the same laws. We were gifted to set us above the rest... to deny nature is foolish.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21055_.mp3: It is the Jedi who serve the Force... trying to discern its wishes like frightened old men staring at the stars. The Force serves *us*.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21056_.mp3: We shape it to our will. We are its master. The Jedi deny their darkness, but we revel in it, we allow it to fuel our strength.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21059_.mp3: It is true that the Force exacts a physical toll on some... but not a single one of them has ever regretted it. Anything else you hear is propaganda.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21061_.mp3: You know the name? Malak is the strongest of us, and the strongest always rules... at least until one who is stronger can take it from him.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21062_.mp3: That is our way: survival of the fittest. You are always on guard, always lean for the kill. We promote it, for through this the Sith are stronger.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21064_.mp3: If a Sith has proven to be weak... and if the time is right. The Force rewards the cunning and the mighty. Step up to the challenge if you dare... or turn tail and run.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21066_.mp3: I would consider that an amusing ploy to try and enter the Academy. Why? Who will you claim to be? Darth Malak, himself?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21068_.mp3: What about Revan? Revan is dead. You may have a natural gift with the Force, human, but you've no gift for lies.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21070_.mp3: And yet here you are on little Korriban, just by accident? I find it hard to believe. If it amuses you, however, I'll play along.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21072_.mp3: No? Why might that be? There is something... odd about you, human, that I cannot place...
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21074_.mp3: Ahhh, so you are just another hopeful after all. Or are you? There is something odd about you that I cannot place...
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21075_.mp3: Obviously you are a Jedi. One who is very strong in the Force, it seems. So were you part of the order for very long? Did they train you?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21076_.mp3: I sense... that you are very strong in the Force. That you have already honed some of your abilities. Jedi training, is it?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21078_.mp3: *chuckle* As you wish. Play your little game, Jedi, if you must. Either way, I sense an intriguing amount of power within you.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21079_.mp3: *chuckle* As you wish. Keep your little secrets, human, if you must. Either way, I sense an intriguing amount of power within you.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21081_.mp3: As I thought. How interesting that they would let one with such power out of their grasp. Or are you here to spy on us? For all the good it would do.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21083_.mp3: A Padawan, perhaps, though it makes little difference. I sense enough raw power within you to... well, we shall see.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21085_.mp3: Perhaps none. Perhaps all the difference in the world. Either way, you possess enough raw power to intrigue me greatly.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21086_.mp3: With that kind of power, you could become a great Sith. Perhaps... if I let you. Does that interest you?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21088_.mp3: Ah, good. Exactly the sort of answer I was hoping for.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21091_.mp3: Hmm. A strange response, indeed. Is your mind maladjusted in some way? You should make for an interesting pupil, indeed.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21092_.mp3: With that kind of power, you could become a great Sith. Perhaps... if I let you. Does that interest you?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21094_.mp3: A pity. And here you were already given the medallion and everything.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21095_.mp3: A pity. Here I hadn't even decided, yet.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21096_.mp3: Well, human... should you change your mind, you know where to come.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21098_.mp3: [Failure] *chuckle* You must not think much of Sith masters to try that little trick. I won't hold it against you, however... it shows initiative.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21099_.mp3: But I do desire a real answer to my question... does it interest you?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21101_.mp3: [Success] Ah, good. Exactly the sort of answer I was hoping for.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21103_.mp3: [Success] Ah, good. Exactly the sort of answer I was hoping for.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21104_.mp3: I will take you to the academy and we shall see if you are ready to join the ranks of the Sith.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21105_.mp3: I have only one other question. These... companions of yours? They will not be coming with you, I presume?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21108_.mp3: There is... something odd about this servant of yours...
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21109_.mp3: No matter. Make sure they don't disturb your training or cause trouble. You are responsible for them. Now... are you ready to go to the academy?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21112_.mp3: I see. Fair enough, so long as they do not disturb your training or cause any trouble. Are you ready to go to the academy, then?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21113_.mp3: Are you ready to go there now?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21114_.mp3: [Failure] I see. Somehow, however, I am unconvinced.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21115_.mp3: No, my friend... I'll not be the one to bring you into our academy. If one of the other Sith accept you and give you a medallion, then perhaps.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21116_.mp3: But otherwise... not today. Run along now.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21118_.mp3: [Success] Ah, good. Exactly the sort of answer I was hoping for.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21120_.mp3: What an odd thing to say... and, even stranger, I do not sense any deception within you. You are a curious puzzle, human, a puzzle with great power.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21122_.mp3: I am. Obviously you have been told of me. Is it your desire, then, to train at the academy? Do you wish to become a Sith, human?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm33aayuth21124_.mp3: I am sure there are plenty of others here who would answer your questions. I am quite busy. So if there is nothing else...?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aautha22007_.mp3: A human that has had some training, it seems, Master Uthar. Very promising, I think.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aautha22028_.mp3: I dare, Master Uthar! I am ready!
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aautha22042_.mp3: As Master Uthar said, none of you are true Sith *yet*. For that to occur, one of you must do enough of worth... gain enough prestige... to be selected.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aautha22043_.mp3: What is an act of worth? You must learn that for yourselves. Remember that you are competitors, here... fight for your destiny, or go home.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24000_.mp3: Your destiny does not lie with the Sith... at least, not yet. The academy is mine, now... I trust you won't be remaining long, correct?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24001_.mp3: Ah, there you are... my favorite prospect for the year.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24003_.mp3: Absolutely. By my estimation, you are far more likely to achieve the prestige necessary to join the Sith than any of the others.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24004_.mp3: As a matter of fact, I am so certain of that that I'm willing to offer you an opportunity of the once-in-a-lifetime variety. Would you like to hear it?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24006_.mp3: Good. I do so adore someone who's willing to take a chance.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24007_.mp3: As I said, you're no doubt going to be the one whom Uthar chooses to become a Sith. With my help, of course.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24008_.mp3: Once that occurs, he will take you into the Valley of the Dark Lords to the tomb of Naga Sadow to administer the final test.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24009_.mp3: There you and I will be alone with him. The perfect time to, shall we say, arrange for a change in the academy's leadership?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24011_.mp3: The tomb is an ancient ruin on the surface that was visited years ago by Darth Revan and Darth Malak. They discovered a Star Map there of great importance.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24016_.mp3: Reaching that map, as they did, is part of the final test. At any rate, it is not the tomb that is important. That Uthar will be alone is what is important.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24018_.mp3: Is that such a daunting prospect? It is not as if I am asking you to perform the task alone, or as if you will get nothing out of it.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24019_.mp3: Master Uthar cannot prevail against us both. That's all there is to it. It is a very simple matter.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24021_.mp3: And so it should. It is central to our beliefs. It is my responsibility to replace my master when I am strong enough.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24023_.mp3: I'm so glad you see it my way.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24024_.mp3: I will begin to make preparations for your final test. Your only worry now is to get there... don't disappoint me.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24026_.mp3: You are already a part of this. Don't be a fool.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24028_.mp3: I suppose you could do that. Even the hint of betrayal from his pupil and Uthar would move to eliminate me.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24029_.mp3: But this is a very good opportunity for you... you can start off your Sith career as the right hand of the head of the academy: me. Uthar will not offer you that.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24030_.mp3: Do you believe Uthar would not be aware of this? He would quickly figure out what you have to gain by betraying him... and would never believe someone would pass that up.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24031_.mp3: Tell Master Uthar what you wish. Were I you, I would think first of what the consequences of such an action might be.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24033_.mp3: My 'part' in this is to help you gain enough prestige... and slow down the progress of the other hopefuls. I want you in that tomb when the time is right.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24034_.mp3: We destroy Master Uthar together and I take his place... and you take your place at my side. A beautiful plan in its sheer simplicity.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24036_.mp3: *chuckle* You must not know much about the Sith, yet. If Uthar were to even suspect that I might be trying to supplant him, true or not...
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24037_.mp3: Well, let's just say that he wouldn't likely stop to ask too many questions before ensuring I was dealt with.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24039_.mp3: Not really. Oh, don't worry... what I have in mind will benefit us both, you can be sure of that.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24041_.mp3: 'Yet' being the operative term. As I said, you have my utmost confidence.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24042_.mp3: What are you doing here? Go back to Uthar and tell him you're ready to take your final test! Our moment is at hand, go!
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24043_.mp3: Hmmm. You're a rather tricky human, aren't you? However did you manage to convince Kel Algwinn to reveal himself to you?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24044_.mp3: No matter. I applaud you for the maneuver, at any rate. An act worthy of a Sith, surely.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24046_.mp3: Now that's what I like to see... the flash of ambition in a young human's eyes. Your species has such remarkable retinal coloring, did you know that?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24048_.mp3: Yes, I... suppose so. The weak can surprise you sometimes with their strength, however. He could have surprised us.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24050_.mp3: What's this? Regrets? Not to worry, dear pupil, it... gets easier with time.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24051_.mp3: You have other things to turn your attention to, however, I'm sure. What do you need?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24052_.mp3: I understand you managed to kill Lashowe. Well done! She was devious, but I knew her trust could be turned against her!
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24053_.mp3: So... you managed to kill Shaardan, did you? Good news travels quickly. Well done... he wouldn't have made a good Sith, anyway.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24054_.mp3: You killed Mekel, I hear? Well... I suppose it is just as well. He was far too devious to be allowed to live.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24055_.mp3: One less opponent is an excellent result regardless of how it occurs, correct? Now, then... something you needed?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24056_.mp3: You've been doing well... I hear you've almost enough prestige to be declared the victor. Somehow I just knew you were the one who would succeed.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24057_.mp3: I hear that you have gained even more prestige. You are closing in on victory... this is good.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24058_.mp3: I understand you have impressed Master Uthar at least a little. That is good... we are one step closer towards completing my plan.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24059_.mp3: Were I you, I would not get too excited just yet. You still have plenty left to do.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24060_.mp3: Greetings, my friend. *chuckle* I do rather enjoy saying that.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24061_.mp3: Hello, again. I trust all is going smoothly?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24062_.mp3: What do you wish? I am eager to get this over with.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24064_.mp3: What? What's happened? Our plan is still intact, I hope.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24066_.mp3: Ahhh. How very clever of him. Normally you would face some other student in the tomb, preferably one of the failed ones.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24067_.mp3: Obviously Uthar has decided to get rid of me. But why...? Did you say something to him?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24069_.mp3: What?! You fool! While I respect your attempt to play both sides of the fence, you are playing a dangerous game.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24070_.mp3: If you think Uthar will truly be so grateful to you for double-crossing me, think again. Your only chance lies with me.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24072_.mp3: [Success] Then how could he suspect? Unless one of the others... never mind. It is not important, now.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24073_.mp3: In the end, it works out better that it is only the two of us in the tomb with him. So long as we refuse to fight. Is there anything else I should know?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24075_.mp3: Let me see that. Hmm... so it's true. Thank you for bringing this to me... now I will be far stronger than Uthar expects.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24077_.mp3: Hah! He's a fool. I can make preparations to resist any poisons. Thank you for telling me... now I will be far stronger than Uthar expects.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24080_.mp3: Good. I'm not about to rest on my laurels, however.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24081_.mp3: Here... this passcard will allow you access to Uthar's quarters. It's at the far end of the passages with the other quarters.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24082_.mp3: Take this device as well and put it inside his cot. No-one should see you do it. Then Uthar will be too weak to stand up against us.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24083_.mp3: Don't even think of failing me. You and I are too far into this now to back out.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24084_.mp3: [Failure] Hmph. I truly doubt that. You are attempting to play both sides of the fence, I think. I respect that. You are playing a dangerous game, however.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24086_.mp3: Good. Let's keep it that way.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24088_.mp3: You must impress Master Uthar... go to him with news of your deeds or artifacts you have discovered.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24089_.mp3: The first and easiest way would be for you to learn the Code of the Sith and speak it to him. I can teach you that, if you like.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24094_.mp3: The Code of the Sith is the easiest way, to start. I have told you all that you need to know of it, already.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24095_.mp3: There are a group of students who refused an order by Master Uthar to execute a group of civilians in the colony.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24096_.mp3: Uthar declared that they were to be executed, themselves, but the students escaped and fled before the order could be carried out.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24097_.mp3: We are certain that they have not left Korriban. No doubt they have not gotten far and are simply in hiding... we just do not know where, exactly.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24098_.mp3: If you were to locate them and carry out Uthar's order, I am sure he would be most appreciative.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24101_.mp3: The rebel students I told you about must still be found and dealt with... Master Uthar would be greatly impressed by their deaths, I am sure.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24102_.mp3: I would suggest you talk to the other prospective Sith and find one that you can gain an advantage with.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24103_.mp3: I believe Lashowe would be an excellent choice. She is too trusting. I have little doubt you could talk her into letting you 'help' her somehow.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24104_.mp3: Just make sure that it is you who gains the advantage, not her. Be ruthless, if you must. That is the only thing that will impress Uthar.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24105_.mp3: I still think that approaching Lashowe would be your best move. She is too trusting and can no doubt be talked into aiding your cause.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24106_.mp3: The only other idea I can suggest to you is that you head into the Valley of the Dark Lords on the surface. There are ancient ruins there which can be explored.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24107_.mp3: It's possible you might find some artifacts or information in them which would please Uthar... it's difficult to say for certain.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24109_.mp3: I can help you to understand it. Would you like to hear it?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24110_.mp3:
"Peace is a lie, there is only passion.
Through passion, I gain strength.
Through strength, I gain power.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24111_.mp3:
Through power, I gain victory.
Through victory, my chains are broken.
The Force shall free me."
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24112_.mp3: Simple words, yet easily misunderstood. Would you care for me to explain anything?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24114_.mp3: The Jedi would have you believe that peace is a desirable goal. That peace of the spirit is the way the Force is mastered, that a lack of conflict betters man.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24115_.mp3: We know different. It is our passion... our hate and our desire... that fuels the Force. It is conflict that improves the lot of civilization and single being both.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24116_.mp3: Conflict forces one to better oneself. It forces change, growth, adaption... evolution... or death. These are not our laws, but the universe's. Without conflict you have only stagnation.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24118_.mp3: What fuels your power with the Force but your passion? The stronger, darker emotions. Anger, hatred, fear... these passions empower us.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24120_.mp3: Love is more dangerous than all those things. Love leads to anger and hatred more often that not... but it also leads to mercy, which is far worse. That, however, is a lesson for another time.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24122_.mp3: Negative? Compared to what? What keeps even the most rudimentary creature alive? Fear to run, anger to fight... without it a creature would most surely die.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24124_.mp3: We are far more than them, perhaps, but in some ways we are little different. To think us creatures beyond the need of simple passions is a delusion.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24126_.mp3: The Force gives us all power, even the Jedi. It is our mastery of our passion that gives us the strength they lack.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24128_.mp3: It is our goal to be stronger, to achieve our potential and not rest upon our laurels. We are the seekers, not the shepherds.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24130_.mp3: The stronger you become in the Force, the more power you will achieve. But always must you fight for your power.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24131_.mp3: Without strife, your victory has no meaning. Without strife, you do not advance. Without strife, there is only stagnation.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24133_.mp3: How many sorts of victories can you imagine? Peaceful victory? Victory by sacrifice? A truce, an achievement?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24134_.mp3: Unless the victory is achieved by demonstrating that your power is superior, it is only an illusion. Temporary at best. We seek more.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24136_.mp3: This... has been argued over, and often. The chains represent our restrictions, both those placed upon us and those we place upon ourselves.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24137_.mp3: Ultimately the goal of any Sith is to free herself from such restrictions. In a way, it is so we may do whatever we wish... but it is much more than that.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24138_.mp3: One who has freed themselves from all restrictions has reached perfection. Their potential fulfilled. Perfect strength, perfect power, perfect destiny. Imagine it.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24139_.mp3: That is our ideal, at any rate. It is said in Sith legend that the 'Sith'ari'... the perfect being... will one day lead us. But perhaps that is just a legend.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24141_.mp3: I... wonder what a being would be like. The legends say the Sith'ari will destroy us... and make us stronger than ever.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24142_.mp3: But perhaps that is just a legend. Perfection is... a goal, I think, rather than a state of being. The Jedi would argue that, no doubt.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24144_.mp3: The Force is our servant and our master. Our teacher and our companion. A weapon and a tool.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24145_.mp3: Know it and you know the universe. Master it and you master the universe. Strive for perfection and the Force shall reward you.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24147_.mp3: I am not surprised. The Force is strong with you... master it and it shall serve you well.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24150_.mp3: I have been involved in the work there over the last couple of years, but not often. Most of the excavating is left to the students. What did you wish to know?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24152_.mp3: Not unless you are accompanied by Master Uthar, no. It is strictly forbidden... and I truly doubt you could bypass the doors to the tomb with anything less than ship blasters. Even then, perhaps.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24154_.mp3: None. I do not even know how Master Uthar gains entrance, to tell the truth, though I look forward to discovering that fact.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24155_.mp3: I have searched many times, so do not bother... there is no other way. Do not fret, however. Simply get the prestige you need and you will see the tomb soon enough.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24157_.mp3: Perhaps we could learn more about the origin of the Force, itself. With that knowledge could come great power.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24161_.mp3: Revan? You mean Darth Malak's former master?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24163_.mp3: Very little. I never met him personally, though I hear he was a powerful man. Very charismatic.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24164_.mp3: In the end, Revan was outshone by his pupil. Such is the way of the Sith. Why? Is this dead man of importance to you?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24165_.mp3: Very little. I never met her personally, though I hear she was a powerful woman. Very charismatic.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24166_.mp3: In the end, Revan was outshone by her pupil. Such is the way of the Sith. Why? Is this dead woman of importance to you?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24168_.mp3: Anything is possible. Uthar's former master still lives... though he is in no condition to challenge his former pupil for leadership.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24169_.mp3: Perhaps the same is true for Revan. Perhaps Revan is out there, somewhere, waiting to take revenge upon Malak.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24170_.mp3: More likely what we were told is the truth: Revan is dead. Malak would be foolish to leave his old master alive, considering all the knowledge Revan held.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24172_.mp3: Is there any reason I should? Beside the fact that I did not know Revan in life, Revan was known for wearing a full helmet and cape.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24173_.mp3: Perhaps Revan's body had been disfigured by the power of the Force... it is not unheard of. Regardless, I doubt I shall be meeting Revan anytime soon.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24175_.mp3: Both Revan and Malak came to Korriban when they discovered the tomb of Naga Sadow. That was before my time.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24178_.mp3: Yes... vaguely. The boy burdens himself with doubts and anxieties. It is sad to watch, really, for he does possess a certain flair with the Force.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24179_.mp3: Kel will not survive long. Someone will betray him soon enough, and he will be dead. If you are smart and you know something, that person should be you.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24181_.mp3: About myself? I am originally from Sleheyron, if you must know. I was a slave to a cruel master, Omeesh the Hutt. I am sure you don't need to know more.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24183_.mp3: I did. I also said that you didn't need to know more. Why are you asking?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24185_.mp3: [Success] I... see. Very well. I suppose there's no harm in the tale.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24186_.mp3: As I said, I was originally a slave to one of the Hutts. The Hutts control everything on Sleheyron, and a slave is nothing to them.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24187_.mp3: I was determined not to be 'nothing'. One night when the drunken worm had me alone in his chambers I stabbed him and escaped the compound.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24188_.mp3: I stole onto a cargo ship and was not discovered by the crew until they reached the next system. They left me for dead on a desolate planetoid, alone... but that was fine by me. I was glad to be anywhere other than Sleheyron.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24189_.mp3: It was not luck that I was eventually rescued, of course. The Force was strong with me, though I didn't know that at the time. Not until the Jedi told me, that is.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24191_.mp3: I'd... rather not discuss it. Perhaps another time.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24192_.mp3: [Failure] You know all that you need to. We can exchange niceties once Uthar is gone, if you desire.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24194_.mp3: Is there something else you needed?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24196_.mp3: I... would prefer not to discuss that.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24198_.mp3: Why? There is no point. Have I asked you about your past?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24200_.mp3: [Success] You... have odd notions for someone hoping to become a Sith.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24201_.mp3: Let's see... after escaping from Sleheyron I was found by the Jedi. They took me in and trained me even though I was a bit older than most Padawans.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24203_.mp3: Not really, no. I never progressed beyond Padawan. I had discipline, but no peace... and after my treatment at the hands of the Hutts there was little room in me for the ways of the Jedi.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24205_.mp3: Yes, well... I imagine I am not unique. Things very easily could have been very different for me.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24207_.mp3: I wanted to use the Force to free the other slaves I knew, to fight for what I knew was right. The Jedi restrained me until I couldn't stand it any more.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24208_.mp3: They claim the dark side is evil, but that isn't so. Sometimes anger and hatred are deserved and right. Sometimes things change because of it.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24210_.mp3: Any failure to get the results I want is due to a lack of power on my part. That can change, in time. As a Sith, my mettle is tested far more than when I was a Padawan.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24212_.mp3: No... not yet. But my anger has not diminished, nor my desire to see change. The more time I spend with the Sith the more I am certain that one day I will be able to fight as I must.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24214_.mp3: There is suffering and injustice in the universe. I am surprised the Jedi can even stand the stench of it, much less stand by and do nothing.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24215_.mp3: I know this may sound strange, but only my compassion stands in my way, now. Once that is gone let the slavers beware.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24217_.mp3: I... yes, of course. I mean losing my compassion as in... holding back...
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24219_.mp3: I... well, there is much training to do. I... may be a long time...
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24221_.mp3: Thank you. I only wish I was as strong with the Force as you are. You could change much, yourself, if you wanted to.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24223_.mp3: I suppose I shouldn't be telling you these things... sharing my weaknesses with you. Being a Sith doesn't make me a monster, however.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24224_.mp3: But enough of that. I've talked about myself too much, surely you are tired of it.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24225_.mp3: [Failure] Friends? We can be friends once Uthar is dead. Until then, a 'friend' is a weakness.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24227_.mp3: [Success] I see. You... certainly have odd notions for one hoping to become a Sith. I'll play along... for now.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24229_.mp3: [Failure] There is always harm in becoming too vulnerable. I will not be as weak as you desire.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24231_.mp3: I hope to see you again.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24233_.mp3: You are very close to succeeding... work quickly!
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24234_.mp3: You have had an excellent start... go, gain more prestige!
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm35aayuth24333_.mp3: We could learn much about the history of the ancient Sith... why they were on Korriban and why they left.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm36aaends08000_.mp3: You there! How is it that you are leaving Naga Sadow's tomb by yourself? You went for your final test, didn't you? Where is Master Uthar?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm36aaends08002_.mp3: What? You... but you aren't even a Sith, yet! Surely you jest!
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm36aaends08006_.mp3: Don't be a sniveling coward! I will prove this one a spy... and if Uthar is dead, *I* shall become the new master!!
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm36aaends08008_.mp3: It... it's a spy! Quick, to arms!
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm36aaends08010_.mp3: Don't be such a coward! Kill the traitor! Do it now!!
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm36aaends08014_.mp3: [Failure] You lie! You could never have killed the master!!
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm36aaends08016_.mp3: You are not Revan! Quick, attack the traitor!!
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm36aaends08018_.mp3: If Master Uthar is dead, then he was a weak fool! Now attack! *I* shall be the new Dark Lord of Korriban!!
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm36aaends08024_.mp3: Well, you've found it! If you've done anything to Master Uthar, you're going to pay for it!
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm36aalash02000_.mp3: Wonderful! Ha ha! The beast is dead! We work better together than I would have hoped.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm36aalash02002_.mp3: And here is the holocron. Such a small thing to be so valuable and require so much effort to obtain.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm36aalash02004_.mp3: I'll just run along, now, and give this to Master Uthar. I'll be sure to tell him of your contribution, naturally.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm36aalash02006_.mp3: You're the one that convinced me to go through with this plan. Why wouldn't I see it through?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm36aalash02008_.mp3: Forget it. There is no guarantee. You helped me, I'll help you. Or don't you trust me?
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm36aalash02012_.mp3: Forget it. I'm not waiting up for you. That wasn't our plan, anyway.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm36aalash02015_.mp3: Back off, I'm warning you! I'm not giving this up!
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm36aalash02018_.mp3: You're not getting the holocron. This was my idea! The plan was that I take it back, not you!
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm36aalash02025_.mp3: Good. You have my... appreciation... for all your help. Good luck in your efforts.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm36aalash02027_.mp3: There you are. Finally. If you were any later in showing up, we would have had to abandon this.
Uthar_Aprentice_01.nm36aalash02029_.mp3: I've been calling to the tuk'ata mother in their language. She should respond fairly -- ahhh, here she comes now.
